en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As unknown, and yet well known; as dying, and, behold, we live; as chastened, and not killed;
target: sebagai orang yang tidak dikenal, namun terkenal; sebagai orang yang nyaris mati, dan sungguh kami hidup; sebagai orang yang dihajar, namun tidak mati;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And so it is written, The first man Adam was made a living soul; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit.
target: Seperti ada tertulis: "Manusia pertama, Adam menjadi makhluk yang hidup", tetapi Adam yang akhir menjadi roh yang menghidupkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O LORD God of Israel, thou art righteous: for we remain yet escaped, as it is this day: behold, we are before thee in our trespasses: for we cannot stand before thee because of this.
target: Ya TUHAN, Allah Israel, Engkau maha benar, sebab kami masih dibiarkan tinggal sebagai orang-orang yang terluput, seperti yang terjadi sekarang ini. Lihatlah, kami menghadap hadirat-Mu dengan kesalahan kami. Bahwasanya, dalam keadaan demikian tidak mungkin orang tahan berdiri di hadapan-Mu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now, O LORD God, the word that thou hast spoken concerning thy servant, and concerning his house, establish it for ever, and do as thou hast said.
target: Dan sekarang, ya TUHAN Allah, tepatilah untuk selama-lamanya janji yang Kauucapkan mengenai hamba-Mu ini dan mengenai keluarganya dan lakukanlah seperti yang Kaujanjikan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because their office was to wait on the sons of Aaron for the service of the house of the LORD, in the courts, and in the chambers, and in the purifying of all holy things, and the work of the service of the house of God;
target: "Tugas mereka ialah membantu anak-anak Harun untuk menyelenggarakan ibadah di rumah TUHAN, mengawasi pelataran, bilik-bilik dan pentahiran segala barang kudus serta melakukan pekerjaan yang berhubungan dengan ibadah di rumah Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore should I fear in the days of evil, when the iniquity of my heels shall compass me about?
target: Aku akan menyendengkan telingaku kepada amsal, akan mengutarakan peribahasaku dengan bermain kecapi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Tell us therefore, What thinkest thou? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar, or not?
target: Katakanlah kepada kami pendapat-Mu: Apakah diperbolehkan membayar pajak kepada Kaisar atau tidak?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king kept the city of the damascenes with a garrison, desirous to apprehend me:
target: Di Damsyik wali negeri raja Aretas menyuruh mengawal kota orang-orang Damsyik untuk menangkap aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will be his father, and he shall be my son: and I will not take my mercy away from him, as I took it from him that was before thee:
target: Aku akan menjadi Bapanya, dan ia akan menjadi anak-Ku. Tetapi kasih setia-Ku tidak akan Kuhilangkan dari padanya seperti yang Kuhilangkan dari pada orang yang mendahului engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: On the first day of the first month shalt thou set up the tabernacle of the tent of the congregation.
target: "Pada hari yang pertama dari bulan yang pertama haruslah engkau mendirikan Kemah Suci, yakni Kemah Pertemuan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as they sat and did eat, Jesus said, Verily I say unto you, One of you which eateth with me shall betray me.
target: Ketika mereka duduk di situ dan sedang makan, Yesus berkata: "Aku berkata kepadamu, sesungguhnya seorang di antara kamu akan menyerahkan Aku, yaitu dia yang makan dengan Aku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This poor man cried, and the LORD heard him, and saved him out of all his troubles.
target: Tujukanlah pandanganmu kepada-Nya, maka mukamu akan berseri-seri, dan tidak akan malu tersipu-sipu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he trembling and astonished said, Lord, what wilt thou have me to do? And the Lord said unto him, Arise, and go into the city, and it shall be told thee what thou must do.
target: Tetapi bangunlah dan pergilah ke dalam kota, di sana akan dikatakan kepadamu, apa yang harus kauperbuat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they said, Thy servants are twelve brethren, the sons of one man in the land of Canaan; and, behold, the youngest is this day with our father, and one is not.
target: Lalu jawab mereka: "Hamba-hambamu ini dua belas orang, kami bersaudara, anak dari satu ayah di tanah Kanaan, tetapi yang bungsu sekarang ada pada ayah kami, dan seorang sudah tidak ada lagi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; Go and tell the men of Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem, Will ye not receive instruction to hearken to my words? saith the LORD.
target: "Beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam, Allah Israel: Pergilah dan katakanlah kepada orang Yehuda dan kepada penduduk Yerusalem: Tidakkah kamu mau menerima penghajaran, yaitu mendengarkan perkataan-perkataan-Ku?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then he asked the men of that place, saying, Where is the harlot, that was openly by the way side? And they said, There was no harlot in this place.
target: Ia bertanya-tanya di tempat tinggal perempuan itu: "Di manakah perempuan jalang, yang duduk tadinya di pinggir jalan di Enaim itu?" Jawab mereka: "Tidak ada di sini perempuan jalang."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But these, as natural brute beasts, made to be taken and destroyed, speak evil of the things that they understand not; and shall utterly perish in their own corruption;
target: Tetapi mereka itu sama dengan hewan yang tidak berakal, sama dengan binatang yang hanya dilahirkan untuk ditangkap dan dimusnahkan. Mereka menghujat apa yang tidak mereka ketahui, sehingga oleh perbuatan mereka yang jahat mereka sendiri akan binasa seperti binatang liar,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And said, O sir, we came indeed down at the first time to buy food:
target: "Mohon bicara tuan! Kami dahulu datang ke mari untuk membeli bahan makanan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD is exalted; for he dwelleth on high: he hath filled Zion with judgment and righteousness.
target: TUHAN tinggi luhur, sebab Ia tinggal di tempat tinggi; Ia membuat Sion penuh keadilan dan kebenaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That the land spue not you out also, when ye defile it, as it spued out the nations that were before you.
target: supaya kamu jangan dimuntahkan oleh negeri itu, apabila kamu menajiskannya, seperti telah dimuntahkannya bangsa yang sebelum kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I thought it good to shew the signs and wonders that the high God hath wrought toward me.
target: Aku berkenan memaklumkan tanda-tanda dan mujizat-mujizat yang telah dilakukan Allah yang maha tinggi kepadaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But they set their abominations in the house, which is called by my name, to defile it.
target: Mereka menempatkan dewa-dewa mereka yang menjijikkan di rumah yang di atasnya nama-Ku diserukan, untuk menajiskannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness, and receive with meekness the engrafted word, which is able to save your souls.
target: Sebab itu buanglah segala sesuatu yang kotor dan kejahatan yang begitu banyak itu dan terimalah dengan lemah lembut firman yang tertanam di dalam hatimu, yang berkuasa menyelamatkan jiwamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They soon forgat his works; they waited not for his counsel:
target: Tetapi segera mereka melupakan perbuatan-perbuatan-Nya, dan tidak menantikan nasihat-Nya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will meet them as a bear that is bereaved of her whelps, and will rend the caul of their heart, and there will I devour them like a lion: the wild beast shall tear them.
target: Aku mau mendatangi mereka seperti beruang yang kehilangan anak, Aku mau mengoyakkan dada mereka. Di sana Aku memakan mereka seperti singa; binatang liar di padang akan merobek mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They shall teach Jacob thy judgments, and Israel thy law: they shall put incense before thee, and whole burnt sacrifice upon thine altar.
target: mereka mengajarkan peraturan-peraturan-Mu kepada Yakub, hukum-Mu kepada Israel; mereka menaruh ukupan wangi-wangian di depan-Mu dan korban yang terbakar seluruhnya di atas mezbah-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joshua at that time turned back, and took Hazor, and smote the king thereof with the sword: for Hazor beforetime was the head of all those kingdoms.
target: Pada waktu itu Yosua kembali, direbutnya Hazor, dan rajanya dibunuhnya dengan mata pedang. Sebab Hazor pada waktu dahulu adalah yang terutama di antara segala kerajaan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Submit yourselves to every ordinance of man for the Lord's sake: whether it be to the king, as supreme;
target: Tunduklah, karena Allah, kepada semua lembaga manusia, baik kepada raja sebagai pemegang kekuasaan yang tertinggi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the contention was so sharp between them, that they departed asunder one from the other: and so Barnabas took Mark, and sailed unto Cyprus;
target: Hal itu menimbulkan perselisihan yang tajam, sehingga mereka berpisah dan Barnabas membawa Markus juga sertanya berlayar ke Siprus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be not wroth very sore, O LORD, neither remember iniquity for ever: behold, see, we beseech thee, we are all thy people.
target: Ya TUHAN, janganlah murka amat sangat dan janganlah mengingat-ingat dosa untuk seterusnya! Sesungguhnya, pandanglah kiranya, kami sekalian adalah umat-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hear the voice of my supplications, when I cry unto thee, when I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle.
target: Dengarkanlah suara permohonanku, apabila aku berteriak kepada-Mu minta tolong, dan mengangkat tanganku ke arah tempat-Mu yang maha kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:
target: dan terimalah ketopong keselamatan dan pedang Roh, yaitu firman Allah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And immediately the king sent an executioner, and commanded his head to be brought: and he went and beheaded him in the prison,
target: Raja segera menyuruh seorang pengawal dengan perintah supaya mengambil kepala Yohanes. Orang itu pergi dan memenggal kepala Yohanes di penjara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Surely I have seen yesterday the blood of Naboth, and the blood of his sons, saith the LORD; and I will requite thee in this plat, saith the LORD. Now therefore take and cast him into the plat of ground, according to the word of the LORD.
target: Sesungguhnya, Aku telah melihat darah Nabot dan darah anak-anaknya tadi malam, demikianlah firman TUHAN, maka Aku akan membalaskannya kepadamu di kebun ini, demikianlah firman TUHAN. Oleh sebab itu angkat dan lemparkanlah mayatnya ke kebun ini, sesuai dengan firman TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I looked on my right hand, and beheld, but there was no man that would know me: refuge failed me; no man cared for my soul.
target: Ketika semangatku lemah lesu di dalam diriku, Engkaulah yang mengetahui jalanku. Di jalan yang harus kutempuh, dengan sembunyi mereka memasang jerat terhadap aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But know ye for certain, that if ye put me to death, ye shall surely bring innocent blood upon yourselves, and upon this city, and upon the inhabitants thereof: for of a truth the LORD hath sent me unto you to speak all these words in your ears.
target: Hanya ketahuilah sungguh-sungguh, bahwa jika kamu membunuh aku, maka kamu mendatangkan darah orang yang tak bersalah atas kamu dan atas kota ini dan penduduknya, sebab TUHAN benar-benar mengutus aku kepadamu untuk menyampaikan segala perkataan ini kepadamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in all things that I have said unto you be circumspect: and make no mention of the name of other gods, neither let it be heard out of thy mouth.
target: Dalam segala hal yang Kufirmankan kepadamu haruslah kamu berawas-awas; nama allah lain janganlah kamu panggil, janganlah nama itu kedengaran dari mulutmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And though they go into captivity before their enemies, thence will I command the sword, and it shall slay them: and I will set mine eyes upon them for evil, and not for good.
target: Sekalipun mereka berjalan di depan musuhnya sebagai orang tawanan, Aku akan memerintahkan pedang untuk membunuh mereka di sana. Aku akan mengarahkan mata-Ku kepada mereka untuk kecelakaan dan bukan untuk keberuntungan mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then they said one to another, We do not well: this day is a day of good tidings, and we hold our peace: if we tarry till the morning light, some mischief will come upon us: now therefore come, that we may go and tell the king's household.
target: Lalu berkatalah yang seorang kepada yang lain: "Tidak patut yang kita lakukan ini. Hari ini ialah hari kabar baik, tetapi kita ini tinggal diam saja. Apabila kita menanti sampai terang pagi, maka hukuman akan menimpa kita. Jadi sekarang, marilah kita pergi menghadap untuk memberitahukan hal itu ke istana raja."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Meshezabeel, Zadok, Jaddua,
target: Mesezabeel, Zadok, Yadua,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the people turneth not unto him that smiteth them, neither do they seek the LORD of hosts.
target: Maka TUHAN mengerat dari Israel kepala dan ekor, batang dan ranting pada satu hari juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore arise, go forth, and speak comfortably unto thy servants: for I swear by the LORD, if thou go not forth, there will not tarry one with thee this night: and that will be worse unto thee than all the evil that befell thee from thy youth until now.
target: Oleh sebab itu, bangunlah, pergilah ke luar dan berbicaralah menenangkan hati orang-orangmu. Sebab aku bersumpah demi TUHAN, apabila engkau tidak keluar, maka seorang pun tidak akan ada yang tinggal bersama-sama dengan engkau pada malam ini; dan hal ini berarti celaka bagimu melebihi segala celaka yang telah kaualami sejak kecilmu sampai sekarang."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It is better to hear the rebuke of the wise, than for a man to hear the song of fools.
target: Mendengar hardikan orang berhikmat lebih baik dari pada mendengar nyanyian orang bodoh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When he was come down from the mountain, great multitudes followed him.
target: Setelah Yesus turun dari bukit, orang banyak berbondong-bondong mengikuti Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The word that Isaiah the son of Amoz saw concerning Judah and Jerusalem.
target: Firman yang dinyatakan kepada Yesaya bin Amos tentang Yehuda dan Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So mightily grew the word of God and prevailed.
target: Dengan jalan ini makin tersiarlah firman Tuhan dan makin berkuasa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And whatsoever soul it be that doeth any work in that same day, the same soul will I destroy from among his people.
target: Setiap orang yang melakukan sesuatu pekerjaan pada hari itu, orang itu akan Kubinasakan dari tengah-tengah bangsanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there they were with David three days, eating and drinking: for their brethren had prepared for them.
target: Mereka tinggal di sana bersama-sama Daud tiga hari lamanya, makan dan minum, sebab saudara-saudara mereka menyajikan makanan bagi mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD will strengthen him upon the bed of languishing: thou wilt make all his bed in his sickness.
target: TUHAN akan melindungi dia dan memelihara nyawanya, sehingga ia disebut berbahagia di bumi; Engkau takkan membiarkan dia dipermainkan musuhnya!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true.
target: Siapa yang menerima kesaksian-Nya itu, ia mengaku, bahwa Allah adalah benar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when David heard of it, he sent Joab, and all the host of the mighty men.
target: Ketika Daud mendengar hal itu, disuruhnyalah Yoab maju dengan segenap tentara dan pahlawan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence, they were gathered together.
target: Ketika orang-orang Farisi mendengar, bahwa Yesus telah membuat orang-orang Saduki itu bungkam, berkumpullah mereka

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the chapiters upon the two pillars had pomegranates also above, over against the belly which was by the network: and the pomegranates were two hundred in rows round about upon the other chapiter.
target: yakni ganja-ganja yang di atas kedua tiang itu, di sebelah atas sekali, lewat jala-jala yang meliliti perut ganja itu; dan buah-buah delima ada dua ratus berjajar berkeliling pada ganja yang satu, demikian juga pada yang kedua.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As he saith also in another place, Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec.
target: sebagaimana firman-Nya dalam suatu nas lain: "Engkau adalah Imam untuk selama-lamanya, menurut peraturan Melkisedek."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yea, whereto might the strength of their hands profit me, in whom old age was perished?
target: Lagipula, apakah gunanya bagiku kekuatan tangan mereka? Mereka sudah kehabisan tenaga,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the women also, which came with him from Galilee, followed after, and beheld the sepulchre, and how his body was laid.
target: Dan perempuan-perempuan yang datang bersama-sama dengan Yesus dari Galilea, ikut serta dan mereka melihat kubur itu dan bagaimana mayat-Nya dibaringkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Greatly desiring to see thee, being mindful of thy tears, that I may be filled with joy;
target: Dan apabila aku terkenang akan air matamu yang kaucurahkan, aku ingin melihat engkau kembali supaya penuhlah kesukaanku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the prophet departed, and waited for the king by the way, and disguised himself with ashes upon his face.
target: Sesudah itu nabi itu pergi dan berdiri menantikan raja di jalan, sambil menyamar dengan membubuh kain pembalut pada matanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD, Ye shall not go up, nor fight against your brethren: return every man to his house: for this thing is done of me. And they obeyed the words of the LORD, and returned from going against Jeroboam.
target: Beginilah firman TUHAN: Janganlah kamu maju dan janganlah kamu berperang melawan saudara-saudaramu. Pulanglah masing-masing ke rumahnya, sebab Akulah yang menyebabkan hal ini terjadi." Maka mereka mendengarkan firman TUHAN dan pulang dengan tidak pergi menyerang Yerobeam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then he said, I did see all Israel scattered upon the mountains, as sheep that have no shepherd: and the LORD said, These have no master; let them return therefore every man to his house in peace.
target: Lalu jawabnya: "Telah kulihat seluruh Israel bercerai-berai di gunung-gunung seperti kambing domba yang tidak mempunyai gembala, sebab itu TUHAN berfirman: Mereka ini tidak punya tuan; baiklah masing-masing pulang ke rumahnya dengan selamat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, It is a light thing that thou shouldest be my servant to raise up the tribes of Jacob, and to restore the preserved of Israel: I will also give thee for a light to the Gentiles, that thou mayest be my salvation unto the end of the earth.
target: "Terlalu sedikit bagimu hanya untuk menjadi hamba-Ku, untuk menegakkan suku-suku Yakub dan untuk mengembalikan orang-orang Israel yang masih terpelihara. Tetapi Aku akan membuat engkau menjadi terang bagi bangsa-bangsa supaya keselamatan yang dari pada-Ku sampai ke ujung bumi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Saul gathered the people together, and numbered them in Telaim, two hundred thousand footmen, and ten thousand men of Judah.
target: Lalu Saul memanggil rakyat berkumpul dan memeriksa barisan mereka di Telaim: ada dua ratus ribu orang pasukan berjalan kaki dan sepuluh ribu orang Yehuda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For my mouth shall speak truth; and wickedness is an abomination to my lips.
target: Karena lidahku mengatakan kebenaran, dan kefasikan adalah kekejian bagi bibirku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Poverty and shame shall be to him that refuseth instruction: but he that regardeth reproof shall be honoured.
target: Kemiskinan dan cemooh menimpa orang yang mengabaikan didikan, tetapi siapa mengindahkan teguran, ia dihormati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Woe to the rebellious children, saith the LORD, that take counsel, but not of me; and that cover with a covering, but not of my spirit, that they may add sin to sin:
target: Celakalah anak-anak pemberontak, demikianlah firman TUHAN, yang melaksanakan suatu rancangan yang bukan dari pada-Ku, yang memasuki suatu persekutuan, yang bukan oleh dorongan Roh-Ku, sehingga dosa mereka bertambah-tambah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: According to the lot shall the possession thereof be divided between many and few.
target: seperti yang ditunjukkan undian haruslah dibagikan milik pusaka setiap suku, di antara yang besar dan yang kecil jumlahnya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said the Jews unto him, Now we know that thou hast a devil. Abraham is dead, and the prophets; and thou sayest, If a man keep my saying, he shall never taste of death.
target: Kata orang-orang Yahudi kepada-Nya: "Sekarang kami tahu, bahwa Engkau kerasukan setan. Sebab Abraham telah mati dan demikian juga nabi-nabi, namun Engkau berkata: Barangsiapa menuruti firman-Ku, ia tidak akan mengalami maut sampai selama-lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For they being ignorant of God's righteousness, and going about to establish their own righteousness, have not submitted themselves unto the righteousness of God.
target: Sebab, oleh karena mereka tidak mengenal kebenaran Allah dan oleh karena mereka berusaha untuk mendirikan kebenaran mereka sendiri, maka mereka tidak takluk kepada kebenaran Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he had made an end of prophesying, he came to the high place.
target: Setelah habis ia kepenuhan seperti nabi, pulanglah ia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.
target: Sebab barangsiapa menabur dalam dagingnya, ia akan menuai kebinasaan dari dagingnya, tetapi barangsiapa menabur dalam Roh, ia akan menuai hidup yang kekal dari Roh itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will deliver thee out of the hand of the wicked, and I will redeem thee out of the hand of the terrible.
target: Aku akan melepaskan engkau dari tangan orang-orang jahat dan membebaskan engkau dari genggaman orang-orang lalim."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD shall increase you more and more, you and your children.
target: Kiranya TUHAN memberi pertambahan kepada kamu, kepada kamu dan kepada anak-anakmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they went, and came unto the mountain, and abode there three days, until the pursuers were returned: and the pursuers sought them throughout all the way, but found them not.
target: Mereka pun pergilah dan tiba di pegunungan. Mereka tinggal di sana tiga hari lamanya, sampai pengejar-pengejar itu pulang. Pengejar-pengejar itu telah mencari di mana-mana sepanjang jalan tanpa menemukan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These four were born to the giant in Gath, and fell by the hand of David, and by the hand of his servants.
target: Keempat orang ini termasuk keturunan raksasa di Gat; mereka tewas oleh tangan Daud dan oleh tangan orang-orangnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The wicked is driven away in his wickedness: but the righteous hath hope in his death.
target: Orang fasik dirobohkan karena kejahatannya, tetapi orang benar mendapat perlindungan karena ketulusannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Uriah was come unto him, David demanded of him how Joab did, and how the people did, and how the war prospered.
target: Ketika Uria masuk menghadap dia, bertanyalah Daud tentang keadaan Yoab dan tentara dan keadaan perang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore the LORD heard this, and was wroth: so a fire was kindled against Jacob, and anger also came up against Israel;
target: Sebab itu, ketika mendengar hal itu, TUHAN gemas, api menyala menimpa Yakub, bahkan murka bergejolak menimpa Israel,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And out of the city he took an officer that was set over the men of war, and five men of them that were in the king's presence, which were found in the city, and the principal scribe of the host, which mustered the people of the land, and threescore men of the people of the land that were found in the city:
target: Dari kota itu ditangkapnya seorang pegawai istana yang diangkat mengepalai tentara, dan lima orang pelayan pribadi raja yang terdapat di kota itu, dan panitera panglima tentara yang mengerahkan rakyat negeri menjadi tentara, dan enam puluh orang dari rakyat negeri yang terdapat di kota itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shouldest not have entered into the gate of my people in the day of their calamity; yea, thou shouldest not have looked on their affliction in the day of their calamity, nor have laid hands on their substance in the day of their calamity;
target: Janganlah masuk ke pintu gerbang umat-Ku pada hari sialnya, bahkan janganlah memandang ringan malapetaka yang menimpanya pada hari sialnya; dan janganlah merenggut kekayaannya pada hari sialnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither did Asher drive out the inhabitants of Accho, nor the inhabitants of Zidon, nor of Ahlab, nor of Achzib, nor of Helbah, nor of Aphik, nor of Rehob:
target: Suku Asyer tidak menghalau penduduk Ako, penduduk Sidon serta Ahlab, Akhzib, Helba, Afek dan Rehob,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, that, as they went in the way, a certain man said unto him, Lord, I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest.
target: Ketika Yesus dan murid-murid-Nya melanjutkan perjalanan mereka, berkatalah seorang di tengah jalan kepada Yesus: "Aku akan mengikut Engkau, ke mana saja Engkau pergi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who whet their tongue like a sword, and bend their bows to shoot their arrows, even bitter words:
target: Sembunyikanlah aku terhadap persepakatan orang jahat, terhadap kerusuhan orang-orang yang melakukan kejahatan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That he told her all his heart, and said unto her, There hath not come a razor upon mine head; for I have been a Nazarite unto God from my mother's womb: if I be shaven, then my strength will go from me, and I shall become weak, and be like any other man.
target: Maka diceritakannyalah kepadanya segala isi hatinya, katanya: "Kepalaku tidak pernah kena pisau cukur, sebab sejak dari kandungan ibuku aku ini seorang nazir Allah. Jika kepalaku dicukur, maka kekuatanku akan lenyap dari padaku, dan aku menjadi lemah dan sama seperti orang-orang lain."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be not afraid of their faces: for I am with thee to deliver thee, saith the LORD.
target: Janganlah takut kepada mereka, sebab Aku menyertai engkau untuk melepaskan engkau, demikianlah firman TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Philip, and Bartholomew; Thomas, and Matthew the publican; James the son of Alphaeus, and Lebbaeus, whose surname was Thaddaeus;
target: Filipus dan Bartolomeus, Tomas dan Matius pemungut cukai, Yakobus anak Alfeus, dan Tadeus,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thorns also and thistles shall it bring forth to thee; and thou shalt eat the herb of the field;
target: semak duri dan rumput duri yang akan dihasilkannya bagimu, dan tumbuh-tumbuhan di padang akan menjadi makananmu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because they have committed villany in Israel, and have committed adultery with their neighbours' wives, and have spoken lying words in my name, which I have not commanded them; even I know, and am a witness, saith the LORD.
target: oleh karena mereka telah melakukan kebebalan di Israel, telah berzinah dengan isteri sesama mereka dan telah mengucapkan demi nama-Ku perkataan dusta yang tidak Kupesankan kepada mereka. Aku sendirilah yang mengetahui dan menyaksikannya, demikianlah firman TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This thou hast seen, O LORD: keep not silence: O Lord, be not far from me.
target: Engkau telah melihatnya, TUHAN, janganlah berdiam diri, ya Tuhan, janganlah jauh dari padaku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses sent them to spy out the land of Canaan, and said unto them, Get you up this way southward, and go up into the mountain:
target: Maka Musa menyuruh mereka untuk mengintai tanah Kanaan, katanya kepada mereka: "Pergilah dari sini ke Tanah Negeb dan naiklah ke pegunungan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses took the anointing oil, and anointed the tabernacle and all that was therein, and sanctified them.
target: Musa mengambil minyak urapan, lalu diurapinyalah Kemah Suci serta segala yang ada di dalamnya dan dikuduskannya semuanya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Zacchaeus stood, and said unto the Lord: Behold, Lord, the half of my goods I give to the poor; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation, I restore him fourfold.
target: Tetapi Zakheus berdiri dan berkata kepada Tuhan: "Tuhan, setengah dari milikku akan kuberikan kepada orang miskin dan sekiranya ada sesuatu yang kuperas dari seseorang akan kukembalikan empat kali lipat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in those times there was no peace to him that went out, nor to him that came in, but great vexations were upon all the inhabitants of the countries.
target: Pada zaman itu tidak dapat orang pergi dan pulang dengan selamat, karena terdapat kekacauan yang besar di antara segenap penduduk daerah-daerah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As many were astonied at thee; his visage was so marred more than any man, and his form more than the sons of men:
target: Seperti banyak orang akan tertegun melihat dia — begitu buruk rupanya, bukan seperti manusia lagi, dan tampaknya bukan seperti anak manusia lagi —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They saw it, and so they marvelled; they were troubled, and hasted away.
target: Sebab lihat, raja-raja datang berkumpul, mereka bersama-sama berjalan maju;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Better is an handful with quietness, than both the hands full with travail and vexation of spirit.
target: Segenggam ketenangan lebih baik dari pada dua genggam jerih payah dan usaha menjaring angin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To hear the groaning of the prisoner; to loose those that are appointed to death;
target: sebab Ia telah memandang dari ketinggian-Nya yang kudus, TUHAN memandang dari sorga ke bumi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer with her suburbs, and Jahazah with her suburbs,
target: Dan dari suku Ruben: Bezer dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya, Yahas dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A time to cast away stones, and a time to gather stones together; a time to embrace, and a time to refrain from embracing;
target: ada waktu untuk membuang batu, ada waktu untuk mengumpulkan batu; ada waktu untuk memeluk, ada waktu untuk menahan diri dari memeluk;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt take the bullock also of the sin offering, and he shall burn it in the appointed place of the house, without the sanctuary.
target: Ambillah lembu jantan untuk korban penghapus dosa itu dan orang harus membakarnya di tempat yang sudah ditentukan sekitar Bait Suci, di luar tempat kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover I have given to thee one portion above thy brethren, which I took out of the hand of the Amorite with my sword and with my bow.
target: Dan sekarang aku memberikan kepadamu sebagai kelebihanmu dari pada saudara-saudaramu, suatu punggung gunung yang kurebut dengan pedang dan panahku dari tangan orang Amori."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To bring Vashti the queen before the king with the crown royal, to shew the people and the princes her beauty: for she was fair to look on.
target: supaya mereka membawa Wasti, sang ratu, dengan memakai mahkota kerajaan, menghadap raja untuk memperlihatkan kecantikannya kepada sekalian rakyat dan pembesar-pembesar, karena sang ratu sangat elok rupanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses and the priests the Levites spake unto all Israel, saying, Take heed, and hearken, O Israel; this day thou art become the people of the LORD thy God.
target: Juga berbicaralah Musa dan imam-imam orang Lewi kepada seluruh orang Israel: "Diamlah dan dengarlah, hai orang Israel. Pada hari ini engkau telah menjadi umat TUHAN, Allahmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they came near to the steward of Joseph's house, and they communed with him at the door of the house,
target: Karena itu mereka mendekati kepala rumah Yusuf itu, dan berkata kepadanya di depan pintu rumah:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That the saying might be fulfilled, which he spake, Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none.
target: Demikian hendaknya supaya genaplah firman yang telah dikatakan-Nya: "Dari mereka yang Engkau serahkan kepada-Ku, tidak seorang pun yang Kubiarkan binasa."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The city of confusion is broken down: every house is shut up, that no man may come in.
target: Kota yang kacau riuh sudah hancur, setiap rumah sudah tertutup, tidak dapat dimasuki.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will extol thee, my God, O king; and I will bless thy name for ever and ever.
target: Puji-pujian dari Daud. Aku hendak mengagungkan Engkau, ya Allahku, ya Raja, dan aku hendak memuji nama-Mu untuk seterusnya dan selamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: God shall bless us; and all the ends of the earth shall fear him.
target: Tanah telah memberi hasilnya; Allah, Allah kita, memberkati kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when I rose in the morning to give my child suck, behold, it was dead: but when I had considered it in the morning, behold, it was not my son, which I did bear.
target: Ketika aku bangun pada waktu pagi untuk menyusui anakku, tampaklah anak itu sudah mati, tetapi ketika aku mengamat-amati dia pada waktu pagi itu, tampaklah bukan dia anak yang kulahirkan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the saying pleased the whole multitude: and they chose Stephen, a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost, and Philip, and Prochorus, and Nicanor, and Timon, and Parmenas, and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch:
target: Usul itu diterima baik oleh seluruh jemaat, lalu mereka memilih Stefanus, seorang yang penuh iman dan Roh Kudus, dan Filipus, Prokhorus, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas dan Nikolaus, seorang penganut agama Yahudi dari Antiokhia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall kill it on the side of the altar northward before the LORD: and the priests, Aaron's sons, shall sprinkle his blood round about upon the altar.
target: Haruslah ia menyembelihnya pada sisi mezbah sebelah utara di hadapan TUHAN, lalu haruslah anak-anak Harun, imam-imam itu, menyiramkan darahnya pada mezbah sekelilingnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And therefore it was imputed to him for righteousness.
target: Karena itu hal ini diperhitungkan kepadanya sebagai kebenaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.
target: Dan Roh Kudus itu adalah jaminan bagian kita sampai kita memperoleh seluruhnya, yaitu penebusan yang menjadikan kita milik Allah, untuk memuji kemuliaan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For Moses describeth the righteousness which is of the law, That the man which doeth those things shall live by them.
target: Sebab Musa menulis tentang kebenaran karena hukum Taurat: "Orang yang melakukannya, akan hidup karenanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: LORD, I have hoped for thy salvation, and done thy commandments.
target: Aku menantikan keselamatan dari pada-Mu, ya TUHAN, dan aku melakukan perintah-perintah-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I do set my bow in the cloud, and it shall be for a token of a covenant between me and the earth.
target: Busur-Ku Kutaruh di awan, supaya itu menjadi tanda perjanjian antara Aku dan bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all this assembly shall know that the LORD saveth not with sword and spear: for the battle is the LORD's, and he will give you into our hands.
target: dan supaya segenap jemaah ini tahu, bahwa TUHAN menyelamatkan bukan dengan pedang dan bukan dengan lembing. Sebab di tangan TUHANlah pertempuran dan Ia pun menyerahkan kamu ke dalam tangan kami."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Every man is brutish in his knowledge: every founder is confounded by the graven image: for his molten image is falsehood, and there is no breath in them.
target: Setiap manusia ternyata bodoh, tidak berpengetahuan, dan setiap pandai emas menjadi malu karena patung buatannya. Sebab patung tuangannya itu adalah tipu, tidak ada nyawa di dalamnya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said some of them of Jerusalem, Is not this he, whom they seek to kill?
target: Beberapa orang Yerusalem berkata: "Bukankah Dia ini yang mereka mau bunuh?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD is merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and plenteous in mercy.
target: TUHAN adalah penyayang dan pengasih, panjang sabar dan berlimpah kasih setia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Ahithophel saw that his counsel was not followed, he saddled his ass, and arose, and gat him home to his house, to his city, and put his household in order, and hanged himself, and died, and was buried in the sepulchre of his father.
target: Ketika dilihat Ahitofel, bahwa nasihatnya tidak dipedulikan, dipasangnyalah pelana keledainya, lalu berangkatlah ia ke rumahnya, ke kotanya; ia mengatur urusan rumah tangganya, kemudian menggantung diri. Demikianlah ia mati, lalu ia dikuburkan dalam kuburan ayahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself: he that believeth not God hath made him a liar; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son.
target: Barangsiapa percaya kepada Anak Allah, ia mempunyai kesaksian itu di dalam dirinya; barangsiapa tidak percaya kepada Allah, ia membuat Dia menjadi pendusta, karena ia tidak percaya akan kesaksian yang diberikan Allah tentang Anak-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He hath bent his bow like an enemy: he stood with his right hand as an adversary, and slew all that were pleasant to the eye in the tabernacle of the daughter of Zion: he poured out his fury like fire.
target: Ia membidikkan panah-Nya seperti seorang seteru dengan mengacungkan tangan kanan-Nya seperti seorang lawan; membunuh segala yang menyenangkan mata dalam kemah puteri Sion, memuntahkan geram-Nya seperti api.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whatsoever soul it be that eateth any manner of blood, even that soul shall be cut off from his people.
target: Setiap orang yang memakan darah apa pun, nyawa orang itu haruslah dilenyapkan dari antara bangsanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And while he yet talked with them, behold, the messenger came down unto him: and he said, Behold, this evil is of the LORD; what should I wait for the LORD any longer?
target: Selagi ia berbicara dengan mereka, datanglah raja mendapatkan dia. Berkatalah raja kepadanya: "Sesungguhnya, malapetaka ini adalah dari pada TUHAN. Mengapakah aku berharap kepada TUHAN lagi?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Balaam saw that it pleased the LORD to bless Israel, he went not, as at other times, to seek for enchantments, but he set his face toward the wilderness.
target: Ketika dilihat Bileam, bahwa baik di mata TUHAN untuk memberkati Israel, ia tidak mencarikan pertanda lagi seperti yang sudah-sudah, tetapi ia menghadapkan mukanya ke arah padang gurun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And shall make him of quick understanding in the fear of the LORD: and he shall not judge after the sight of his eyes, neither reprove after the hearing of his ears:
target: ya, kesenangannya ialah takut akan TUHAN. Ia tidak akan menghakimi dengan sekilas pandang saja atau menjatuhkan keputusan menurut kata orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus saith unto them, Fill the waterpots with water. And they filled them up to the brim.
target: Yesus berkata kepada pelayan-pelayan itu: "Isilah tempayan-tempayan itu penuh dengan air." Dan mereka pun mengisinya sampai penuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore thou art great, O LORD God: for there is none like thee, neither is there any God beside thee, according to all that we have heard with our ears.
target: Sebab itu Engkau besar, ya Tuhan ALLAH, sebab tidak ada yang sama seperti Engkau dan tidak ada Allah selain Engkau menurut segala yang kami tangkap dengan telinga kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said Jesus unto them, I will ask you one thing; Is it lawful on the sabbath days to do good, or to do evil? to save life, or to destroy it?
target: Lalu Yesus berkata kepada mereka: "Aku bertanya kepada kamu: Manakah yang diperbolehkan pada hari Sabat, berbuat baik atau berbuat jahat, menyelamatkan nyawa orang atau membinasakannya?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses said unto them, Stand still, and I will hear what the LORD will command concerning you.
target: Lalu jawab Musa kepada mereka: "Tunggulah dahulu, aku hendak mendengar apa yang akan diperintahkan TUHAN mengenai kamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the soul that turneth after such as have familiar spirits, and after wizards, to go a whoring after them, I will even set my face against that soul, and will cut him off from among his people.
target: Orang yang berpaling kepada arwah atau kepada roh-roh peramal, yakni yang berzinah dengan bertanya kepada mereka, Aku sendiri akan menentang orang itu dan melenyapkan dia dari tengah-tengah bangsanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who can say, I have made my heart clean, I am pure from my sin?
target: Siapakah dapat berkata: "Aku telah membersihkan hatiku, aku tahir dari pada dosaku?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt rear up the tabernacle according to the fashion thereof which was shewed thee in the mount.
target: Kemudian haruslah kaudirikan Kemah Suci sesuai dengan rancangan yang telah ditunjukkan kepadamu di atas gunung itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he that is the high priest among his brethren, upon whose head the anointing oil was poured, and that is consecrated to put on the garments, shall not uncover his head, nor rend his clothes;
target: Imam yang terbesar di antara saudara-saudaranya, yang sudah diurapi dengan menuangkan minyak urapan di atas kepalanya dan yang ditahbiskan dengan mengenakan kepadanya segala pakaian kudus, janganlah membiarkan rambutnya terurai dan janganlah ia mencabik pakaiannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then I separated twelve of the chief of the priests, Sherebiah, Hashabiah, and ten of their brethren with them,
target: Lalu aku memilih dua belas orang pemuka imam, yakni Serebya dan Hasabya, dan bersama-sama mereka sepuluh orang dari antara saudara-saudara mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the hand of Midian prevailed against Israel: and because of the Midianites the children of Israel made them the dens which are in the mountains, and caves, and strong holds.
target: dan selama itu orang Midian berkuasa atas orang Israel. Karena takutnya kepada orang Midian itu, maka orang Israel membuat tempat-tempat perlindungan di pegunungan, yakni gua-gua dan kubu-kubu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I had fainted, unless I had believed to see the goodness of the LORD in the land of the living.
target: Sesungguhnya, aku percaya akan melihat kebaikan TUHAN di negeri orang-orang yang hidup!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore art thou red in thine apparel, and thy garments like him that treadeth in the winefat?
target: "Mengapakah pakaian-Mu semerah itu, dan baju-Mu seperti baju pengirik buah anggur?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he led them on safely, so that they feared not: but the sea overwhelmed their enemies.
target: dituntun-Nya mereka dengan tenteram, sehingga tidak gemetar, sedang musuh mereka dilingkupi laut;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.
target: Anak-anak Yonatan ialah Pelet dan Zaza. Itulah keturunan Yerahmeel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Or with princes that had gold, who filled their houses with silver:
target: atau bersama-sama pembesar-pembesar yang mempunyai emas, yang memenuhi rumahnya dengan perak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he brought Aaron's sons, and Moses put of the blood upon the tip of their right ear, and upon the thumbs of their right hands, and upon the great toes of their right feet: and Moses sprinkled the blood upon the altar round about.
target: Musa menyuruh anak-anak Harun mendekat, lalu membubuh sedikit dari darah itu pada cuping telinga kanan mereka, pada ibu jari tangan kanan dan pada ibu jari kaki kanan mereka, lalu Musa menyiramkan darah selebihnya pada mezbah sekelilingnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But whereunto shall I liken this generation? It is like unto children sitting in the markets, and calling unto their fellows,
target: Dengan apakah akan Kuumpamakan angkatan ini? Mereka itu seumpama anak-anak yang duduk di pasar dan berseru kepada teman-temannya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And out of one of them came forth a little horn, which waxed exceeding great, toward the south, and toward the east, and toward the pleasant land.
target: Maka dari salah satu tanduk itu muncul suatu tanduk kecil, yang menjadi sangat besar ke arah selatan, ke arah timur dan ke arah Tanah Permai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also when they shall be afraid of that which is high, and fears shall be in the way, and the almond tree shall flourish, and the grasshopper shall be a burden, and desire shall fail: because man goeth to his long home, and the mourners go about the streets:
target: juga orang menjadi takut tinggi, dan ketakutan ada di jalan, pohon badam berbunga, belalang menyeret dirinya dengan susah payah dan nafsu makan tak dapat dibangkitkan lagi — karena manusia pergi ke rumahnya yang kekal dan peratap-peratap berkeliaran di jalan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the city shall be accursed, even it, and all that are therein, to the LORD: only Rahab the harlot shall live, she and all that are with her in the house, because she hid the messengers that we sent.
target: Dan kota itu dengan segala isinya akan dikhususkan bagi TUHAN untuk dimusnahkan; hanya Rahab, perempuan sundal itu, akan tetap hidup, ia dengan semua orang yang bersama-sama dengan dia dalam rumah itu, karena ia telah menyembunyikan orang suruhan yang kita suruh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye shall offer these beside the burnt offering in the morning, which is for a continual burnt offering.
target: selain dari korban bakaran pagi yang termasuk korban bakaran yang tetap haruslah kamu mengolah semuanya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Micaiah said, If thou return at all in peace, the LORD hath not spoken by me. And he said, Hearken, O people, every one of you.
target: Tetapi jawab Mikha: "Jika benar-benar engkau pulang dengan selamat, tentulah TUHAN tidak berfirman dengan perantaraanku!" Lalu disambungnya: "Dengarlah, hai bangsa-bangsa sekalian!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Eshton begat Bethrapha, and Paseah, and Tehinnah the father of Irnahash. These are the men of Rechah.
target: dan Eston memperanakkan Bet-Rafa, Paseah dan Tehina, bapa Ir-Nahas. Itulah orang-orang Rekha.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For they covered the face of the whole earth, so that the land was darkened; and they did eat every herb of the land, and all the fruit of the trees which the hail had left: and there remained not any green thing in the trees, or in the herbs of the field, through all the land of Egypt.
target: Belalang menutupi seluruh permukaan bumi, sehingga negeri itu menjadi gelap olehnya; belalang memakan habis segala tumbuh-tumbuhan di tanah dan segala buah-buahan pada pohon-pohon yang ditinggalkan oleh hujan es itu, sehingga tidak ada tinggal lagi yang hijau pada pohon atau tumbuh-tumbuhan di padang di seluruh tanah Mesir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They compassed me about; yea, they compassed me about: but in the name of the LORD I will destroy them.
target: Mereka mengelilingi aku, ya mengelilingi aku — demi nama TUHAN, sesungguhnya aku pukul mereka mundur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Israel were fruitful, and increased abundantly, and multiplied, and waxed exceeding mighty; and the land was filled with them.
target: Orang-orang Israel beranak cucu dan tak terbilang jumlahnya; mereka bertambah banyak dan dengan dahsyat berlipat ganda, sehingga negeri itu dipenuhi mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the lords of the Philistines came up unto her, and said unto her, Entice him, and see wherein his great strength lieth, and by what means we may prevail against him, that we may bind him to afflict him; and we will give thee every one of us eleven hundred pieces of silver.
target: Lalu datanglah raja-raja kota orang Filistin kepada perempuan itu sambil berkata: "Cobalah bujuk dia untuk mengetahui karena apakah kekuatannya demikian besar, dan dengan apakah kami dapat mengalahkan dia dan mengikat dia untuk menundukkannya. Maka kami masing-masing akan memberikan seribu seratus uang perak kepadamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I determined this with myself, that I would not come again to you in heaviness.
target: Aku telah mengambil keputusan di dalam hatiku, bahwa aku tidak akan datang lagi kepadamu dalam dukacita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling;
target: Tetapi ada orang yang tidak sampai pada tujuan itu dan yang sesat dalam omongan yang sia-sia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover Jeremiah said unto all the people, and to all the women, Hear the word of the LORD, all Judah that are in the land of Egypt:
target: Kemudian berkatalah Yeremia kepada segenap rakyat dan kepada semua perempuan itu: "Dengarlah firman TUHAN, hai semua orang Yehuda yang ada di tanah Mesir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they took Joseph's coat, and killed a kid of the goats, and dipped the coat in the blood;
target: Kemudian mereka mengambil jubah Yusuf, dan menyembelih seekor kambing, lalu mencelupkan jubah itu ke dalam darahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To the end that the children of Israel may bring their sacrifices, which they offer in the open field, even that they may bring them unto the LORD, unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, unto the priest, and offer them for peace offerings unto the LORD.
target: Maksudnya supaya orang Israel membawa korban sembelihan mereka, yang biasa dipersembahkan mereka di padang, kepada TUHAN ke pintu Kemah Pertemuan dengan menyerahkannya kepada imam, untuk dipersembahkan kepada TUHAN sebagai korban keselamatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God heard their groaning, and God remembered his covenant with Abraham, with Isaac, and with Jacob.
target: Allah mendengar mereka mengerang, lalu Ia mengingat kepada perjanjian-Nya dengan Abraham, Ishak dan Yakub.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whereof I am made a minister, according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you, to fulfil the word of God;
target: Aku telah menjadi pelayan jemaat itu sesuai dengan tugas yang dipercayakan Allah kepadaku untuk meneruskan firman-Nya dengan sepenuhnya kepada kamu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he looked, and behold a well in the field, and, lo, there were three flocks of sheep lying by it; for out of that well they watered the flocks: and a great stone was upon the well's mouth.
target: Ketika ia memandang sekelilingnya, dilihatnya ada sebuah sumur di padang, dan ada tiga kumpulan kambing domba berbaring di dekatnya, sebab dari sumur itulah orang memberi minum kumpulan-kumpulan kambing domba itu. Adapun batu penutup sumur itu besar;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, Nay, father Abraham: but if one went unto them from the dead, they will repent.
target: Jawab orang itu: Tidak, Bapa Abraham, tetapi jika ada seorang yang datang dari antara orang mati kepada mereka, mereka akan bertobat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They shall die of grievous deaths; they shall not be lamented; neither shall they be buried; but they shall be as dung upon the face of the earth: and they shall be consumed by the sword, and by famine; and their carcases shall be meat for the fowls of heaven, and for the beasts of the earth.
target: Mereka akan mati karena penyakit-penyakit yang membawa maut; mereka tidak akan diratapi dan tidak akan dikuburkan; mereka akan menjadi pupuk di ladang; mereka akan habis oleh pedang dan kelaparan; mayat mereka akan menjadi makanan burung-burung di udara dan binatang-binatang di bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And satest upon a stately bed, and a table prepared before it, whereupon thou hast set mine incense and mine oil.
target: Engkau duduk di tempat tidur yang serba indah dan di hadapannya meja dengan hidangan yang disajikan; di atas tempat tidurmu itu kautaruh ukupan-Ku dan minyak-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they that have believing masters, let them not despise them, because they are brethren; but rather do them service, because they are faithful and beloved, partakers of the benefit. These things teach and exhort.
target: Jika tuan mereka seorang percaya, janganlah ia kurang disegani karena bersaudara dalam Kristus, melainkan hendaklah ia dilayani mereka dengan lebih baik lagi, karena tuan yang menerima berkat pelayanan mereka ialah saudara yang percaya dan yang kekasih. Ajarkanlah dan nasihatkanlah semuanya ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the time past of our life may suffice us to have wrought the will of the Gentiles, when we walked in lasciviousness, lusts, excess of wine, revellings, banquetings, and abominable idolatries:
target: Sebab telah cukup banyak waktu kamu pergunakan untuk melakukan kehendak orang-orang yang tidak mengenal Allah. Kamu telah hidup dalam rupa-rupa hawa nafsu, keinginan, kemabukan, pesta pora, perjamuan minum dan penyembahan berhala yang terlarang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of Pashur, a thousand two hundred forty and seven.
target: bani Pasyhur: seribu dua ratus empat puluh tujuh orang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A false witness shall perish: but the man that heareth speaketh constantly.
target: Saksi bohong akan binasa, tetapi orang yang mendengarkan akan tetap berbicara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: She that hath borne seven languisheth: she hath given up the ghost; her sun is gone down while it was yet day: she hath been ashamed and confounded: and the residue of them will I deliver to the sword before their enemies, saith the LORD.
target: Maka meranalah perempuan yang sudah tujuh kali melahirkan, nafasnya mengap-mengap, baginya matahari sudah terbenam selagi hari siang, ia menjadi malu dan tersipu-sipu. Sisa mereka akan Kuserahkan kepada pedang di depan musuh-musuh mereka, demikianlah firman TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Pilate asked him again, saying, Answerest thou nothing? behold how many things they witness against thee.
target: Pilatus bertanya pula kepada-Nya, katanya: "Tidakkah Engkau memberi jawab? Lihatlah betapa banyaknya tuduhan mereka terhadap Engkau!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said Samuel, Bring ye hither to me Agag the king of the Amalekites. And Agag came unto him delicately. And Agag said, Surely the bitterness of death is past.
target: Lalu berkatalah Samuel: "Bawa ke mari Agag, raja Amalek itu." Dengan gembira Agag pergi kepadanya, sebab pikirnya: "Sesungguhnya, kepahitan maut telah lewat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king said again unto Esther on the second day at the banquet of wine, What is thy petition, queen Esther? and it shall be granted thee: and what is thy request? and it shall be performed, even to the half of the kingdom.
target: Pada hari yang kedua itu, sementara minum anggur, bertanyalah pula raja kepada Ester: "Apakah permintaanmu, hai ratu Ester? Niscaya akan dikabulkan. Dan apakah keinginanmu? Sampai setengah kerajaan sekalipun akan dipenuhi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD is King for ever and ever: the heathen are perished out of his land.
target: TUHAN adalah Raja untuk seterusnya dan selama-lamanya. Bangsa-bangsa lenyap dari tanah-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Jehoiakim the king, with all his mighty men, and all the princes, heard his words, the king sought to put him to death: but when Urijah heard it, he was afraid, and fled, and went into Egypt;
target: Ketika raja Yoyakim, bersama-sama dengan segenap perwiranya dan semua pemuka, mendengar perkataan orang itu, maka raja pun mencari ikhtiar untuk membunuhnya. Mendengar hal itu maka takutlah Uria, lalu melarikan diri dan tiba di Mesir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall come to pass, that on the sixth day they shall prepare that which they bring in; and it shall be twice as much as they gather daily.
target: Dan pada hari yang keenam, apabila mereka memasak yang dibawa mereka pulang, maka yang dibawa itu akan terdapat dua kali lipat banyaknya dari apa yang dipungut mereka sehari-hari."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And truly, if they had been mindful of that country from whence they came out, they might have had opportunity to have returned.
target: Dan kalau sekiranya dalam hal itu mereka ingat akan tanah asal, yang telah mereka tinggalkan, maka mereka cukup mempunyai kesempatan untuk pulang ke situ.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Only take heed to thyself, and keep thy soul diligently, lest thou forget the things which thine eyes have seen, and lest they depart from thy heart all the days of thy life: but teach them thy sons, and thy sons' sons;
target: Tetapi waspadalah dan berhati-hatilah, supaya jangan engkau melupakan hal-hal yang dilihat oleh matamu sendiri itu, dan supaya jangan semuanya itu hilang dari ingatanmu seumur hidupmu. Beritahukanlah kepada anak-anakmu dan kepada cucu cicitmu semuanya itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A sword is upon the liars; and they shall dote: a sword is upon her mighty men; and they shall be dismayed.
target: Pedang menimpa tukang-tukang ramal, sehingga ternyata mereka bodoh! Pedang menimpa pahlawan-pahlawannya, sehingga mereka menjadi terkejut!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they returned, and prepared spices and ointments; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment.
target: Dan setelah pulang, mereka menyediakan rempah-rempah dan minyak mur. Dan pada hari Sabat mereka beristirahat menurut hukum Taurat,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished, they brought him to Jerusalem, to present him to the Lord;
target: Dan ketika genap waktu pentahiran, menurut hukum Taurat Musa, mereka membawa Dia ke Yerusalem untuk menyerahkan-Nya kepada Tuhan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison, whom they had desired; but he delivered Jesus to their will.
target: Dan ia melepaskan orang yang dimasukkan ke dalam penjara karena pemberontakan dan pembunuhan itu sesuai dengan tuntutan mereka, tetapi Yesus diserahkannya kepada mereka untuk diperlakukan semau-maunya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let them curse, but bless thou: when they arise, let them be ashamed; but let thy servant rejoice.
target: Biar mereka mengutuk, Engkau akan memberkati; biarlah lawan-lawanku mendapat malu, tetapi hamba-Mu ini kiranya bersukacita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wisdom is good with an inheritance: and by it there is profit to them that see the sun.
target: Hikmat adalah sama baiknya dengan warisan dan merupakan suatu keuntungan bagi orang-orang yang melihat matahari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And then shall that Wicked be revealed, whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth, and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming:
target: pada waktu itulah si pendurhaka baru akan menyatakan dirinya, tetapi Tuhan Yesus akan membunuhnya dengan nafas mulut-Nya dan akan memusnahkannya, kalau Ia datang kembali.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I know that there is no good in them, but for a man to rejoice, and to do good in his life.
target: Aku tahu bahwa untuk mereka tak ada yang lebih baik dari pada bersuka-suka dan menikmati kesenangan dalam hidup mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Came unto me, and stood, and said unto me, Brother Saul, receive thy sight. And the same hour I looked up upon him.
target: Ia datang berdiri di dekatku dan berkata: Saulus, saudaraku, bukalah matamu dan melihatlah! Dan seketika itu juga aku melihat kembali dan menatap dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But forasmuch as he had not to pay, his lord commanded him to be sold, and his wife, and children, and all that he had, and payment to be made.
target: Tetapi karena orang itu tidak mampu melunaskan hutangnya, raja itu memerintahkan supaya ia dijual beserta anak isterinya dan segala miliknya untuk pembayar hutangnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Honour thy father and thy mother: that thy days may be long upon the land which the LORD thy God giveth thee.
target: Hormatilah ayahmu dan ibumu, supaya lanjut umurmu di tanah yang diberikan TUHAN, Allahmu, kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord, nor of me his prisoner: but be thou partaker of the afflictions of the gospel according to the power of God;
target: Jadi janganlah malu bersaksi tentang Tuhan kita dan janganlah malu karena aku, seorang hukuman karena Dia, melainkan ikutlah menderita bagi Injil-Nya oleh kekuatan Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The Holy Ghost this signifying, that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest, while as the first tabernacle was yet standing:
target: Dengan ini Roh Kudus menyatakan, bahwa jalan ke tempat yang kudus itu belum terbuka, selama kemah yang pertama itu masih ada.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself. They said therefore unto him, Art not thou also one of his disciples? He denied it, and said, I am not.
target: Simon Petrus masih berdiri berdiang. Kata orang-orang di situ kepadanya: "Bukankah engkau juga seorang murid-Nya?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: What time she lifteth up herself on high, she scorneth the horse and his rider.
target: tetapi lupa, bahwa telur itu dapat terpijak kaki, dan diinjak-injak oleh binatang-binatang liar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD killeth, and maketh alive: he bringeth down to the grave, and bringeth up.
target: TUHAN mematikan dan menghidupkan, Ia menurunkan ke dalam dunia orang mati dan mengangkat dari sana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This is the word that the LORD hath spoken concerning him; The virgin the daughter of Zion hath despised thee, and laughed thee to scorn; the daughter of Jerusalem hath shaken her head at thee.
target: Inilah firman yang telah diucapkan TUHAN mengenai dia: Anak dara, yaitu puteri Sion, telah menghina engkau, telah mengolok-olokkan engkau; dan puteri Yerusalem telah geleng-geleng kepala di belakangmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he set the bread in order upon it before the LORD; as the LORD had commanded Moses.
target: Diletakkannyalah di atasnya roti sajian menurut susunannya, di hadapan TUHAN — seperti yang diperintahkan TUHAN kepada Musa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The word of the LORD that came to Joel the son of Pethuel.
target: Firman TUHAN yang datang kepada Yoël bin Petuel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he searched, and began at the eldest, and left at the youngest: and the cup was found in Benjamin's sack.
target: Dan kepala rumah itu memeriksanya dengan teliti; ia mulai dengan yang sulung sampai kepada yang bungsu; maka kedapatanlah piala itu dalam karung Benyamin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the spirit took me up, and brought me into the inner court; and, behold, the glory of the LORD filled the house.
target: Roh itu mengangkat aku dan membawa aku ke pelataran dalam, sungguh, Bait Suci itu penuh kemuliaan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the Lord GOD; Remove the diadem, and take off the crown: this shall not be the same: exalt him that is low, and abase him that is high.
target: beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Jauhkanlah serbanmu dan buangkanlah mahkotamu! Tiada yang tetap seperti keadaannya sekarang. Yang rendah harus ditinggikan, yang tinggi harus direndahkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David dwelt in the castle; therefore they called it the city of David.
target: Lalu Daud menetap di kubu pertahanan itu, sebab itu orang menamainya: Kota Daud.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Or saith he it altogether for our sakes? For our sakes, no doubt, this is written: that he that ploweth should plow in hope; and that he that thresheth in hope should be partaker of his hope.
target: Atau kitakah yang Ia maksudkan? Ya, untuk kitalah hal ini ditulis, yaitu pembajak harus membajak dalam pengharapan dan pengirik harus mengirik dalam pengharapan untuk memperoleh bagiannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And what man is there that hath betrothed a wife, and hath not taken her? let him go and return unto his house, lest he die in the battle, and another man take her.
target: Dan siapa telah bertunangan dengan seorang perempuan, tetapi belum mengawininya? Ia boleh pergi dan pulang ke rumahnya, supaya jangan ia mati dalam pertempuran dan orang lain yang mengawininya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she hasted, and emptied her pitcher into the trough, and ran again unto the well to draw water, and drew for all his camels.
target: Kemudian segeralah dituangnya air yang di buyungnya itu ke dalam palungan, lalu berlarilah ia sekali lagi ke sumur untuk menimba air dan ditimbanyalah untuk semua unta orang itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sons of Jacob came upon the slain, and spoiled the city, because they had defiled their sister.
target: Kemudian datanglah anak-anak Yakub merampasi orang-orang yang terbunuh itu, lalu menjarah kota itu, karena adik mereka telah dicemari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto me, Son of man, I send thee to the children of Israel, to a rebellious nation that hath rebelled against me: they and their fathers have transgressed against me, even unto this very day.
target: Firman-Nya kepadaku: "Hai anak manusia, Aku mengutus engkau kepada orang Israel, kepada bangsa pemberontak yang telah memberontak melawan Aku. Mereka dan nenek moyang mereka telah mendurhaka terhadap Aku sampai hari ini juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For through the anger of the LORD it came to pass in Jerusalem and Judah, until he had cast them out from his presence, that Zedekiah rebelled against the king of Babylon.
target: Sebab oleh karena murka TUHANlah terjadi hal itu terhadap Yerusalem dan Yehuda, yakni bahwa Ia sampai membuang mereka dari hadapan-Nya. Zedekia memberontak terhadap raja Babel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then we departed from the river of Ahava on the twelfth day of the first month, to go unto Jerusalem: and the hand of our God was upon us, and he delivered us from the hand of the enemy, and of such as lay in wait by the way.
target: Kemudian berangkatlah kami dari sungai Ahawa pergi ke Yerusalem pada tanggal dua belas bulan pertama untuk berjalan ke Yerusalem, dan tangan Allah kami melindungi kami dan menghindarkan kami dari tangan musuh dan penyamun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the south quarter was from the end of Kirjathjearim, and the border went out on the west, and went out to the well of waters of Nephtoah:
target: Sisi selatan mulai dari ujung Kiryat-Yearim, kemudian batas itu menuju ke barat, dan menuju pula ke mata air Me-Neftoah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD hath brought forth our righteousness: come, and let us declare in Zion the work of the LORD our God.
target: TUHAN telah membuat segala kebenaran kita menjadi nyata; marilah kita ceritakan di Sion perbuatan TUHAN, Allah kita!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He heweth him down cedars, and taketh the cypress and the oak, which he strengtheneth for himself among the trees of the forest: he planteth an ash, and the rain doth nourish it.
target: Mungkin ia menebang pohon-pohon aras atau ia memilih pohon saru atau pohon tarbantin, lalu membiarkannya tumbuh menjadi besar di antara pohon-pohon di hutan, atau ia menanam pohon salam, lalu hujan membuatnya besar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt make an altar of shittim wood, five cubits long, and five cubits broad; the altar shall be foursquare: and the height thereof shall be three cubits.
target: "Haruslah engkau membuat mezbah dari kayu penaga, lima hasta panjangnya dan lima hasta lebarnya, sehingga mezbah itu empat persegi, tetapi tiga hasta tingginya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then shalt thou prosper, if thou takest heed to fulfil the statutes and judgments which the LORD charged Moses with concerning Israel: be strong, and of good courage; dread not, nor be dismayed.
target: Maka engkau akan berhasil, jika engkau melakukan dengan setia ketetapan-ketetapan dan hukum-hukum yang diperintahkan TUHAN kepada Musa untuk orang Israel. Kuatkan dan teguhkanlah hatimu, janganlah takut dan janganlah tawar hati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And hast not suffered me to kiss my sons and my daughters? thou hast now done foolishly in so doing.
target: Lagipula engkau tidak memberikan aku kesempatan untuk mencium cucu-cucuku laki-laki dan anak-anakku perempuan. Memang bodoh perbuatanmu itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He built Eloth, and restored it to Judah, after that the king slept with his fathers.
target: Ia memperkuat Elot dan mengembalikannya kepada Yehuda, sesudah raja mendapat perhentian bersama-sama dengan nenek moyangnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: At that time the servants of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came up against Jerusalem, and the city was besieged.
target: Pada waktu itu majulah orang-orang Nebukadnezar, raja Babel, menyerang Yerusalem dan kota itu dikepung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the Amorites, and the Canaanites, and the Girgashites, and the Jebusites.
target: orang Amori, orang Kanaan, orang Girgasi dan orang Yebus itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt take the breast of the ram of Aaron's consecration, and wave it for a wave offering before the LORD: and it shall be thy part.
target: Selanjutnya haruslah kauambil dada dari domba jantan yang adalah bagi pentahbisan Harun dan kaupersembahkan sebagai persembahan unjukan di hadapan TUHAN, dan itulah bagian untukmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there shall be no more curse: but the throne of God and of the Lamb shall be in it; and his servants shall serve him:
