target: Maka tidak akan ada lagi laknat. Takhta Allah dan takhta Anak Domba akan ada di dalamnya dan hamba-hamba-Nya akan beribadah kepada-Nya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Maaseiah the son of Baruch, the son of Colhozeh, the son of Hazaiah, the son of Adaiah, the son of Joiarib, the son of Zechariah, the son of Shiloni.
target: dan Maaseya bin Barukh bin Kolhoze bin Hazaya bin Adaya bin Yoyarib bin Zakharia keturunan orang Syela.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
target: Berfirmanlah TUHAN kepada Musa:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And desired of him letters to Damascus to the synagogues, that if he found any of this way, whether they were men or women, he might bring them bound unto Jerusalem.
target: dan meminta surat kuasa dari padanya untuk dibawa kepada majelis-majelis Yahudi di Damsyik, supaya, jika ia menemukan laki-laki atau perempuan yang mengikuti Jalan Tuhan, ia menangkap mereka dan membawa mereka ke Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then shall thy light break forth as the morning, and thine health shall spring forth speedily: and thy righteousness shall go before thee; the glory of the LORD shall be thy reward.
target: Pada waktu itulah terangmu akan merekah seperti fajar dan lukamu akan pulih dengan segera; kebenaran menjadi barisan depanmu dan kemuliaan TUHAN barisan belakangmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For every house is builded by some man; but he that built all things is God.
target: Sebab setiap rumah dibangun oleh seorang ahli bangunan, tetapi ahli bangunan segala sesuatu ialah Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, Thou knowest that the kingdom was mine, and that all Israel set their faces on me, that I should reign: howbeit the kingdom is turned about, and is become my brother's: for it was his from the LORD.
target: Lalu katanya: "Engkau sendiri tahu bahwa akulah yang berhak atas kedudukan raja, dan bahwa seluruh Israel mengharapkan, supaya aku menjadi raja; tetapi sebaliknya kedudukan raja jatuh kepada adikku, sebab dari TUHANlah ia mendapatnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Pharaoh rose up in the night, he, and all his servants, and all the Egyptians; and there was a great cry in Egypt; for there was not a house where there was not one dead.
target: Lalu bangunlah Firaun pada malam itu, bersama semua pegawainya dan semua orang Mesir; dan kedengaranlah seruan yang hebat di Mesir, sebab tidak ada rumah yang tidak kematian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt bring the Levites before the LORD: and the children of Israel shall put their hands upon the Levites:
target: Apabila engkau telah menyuruh orang Lewi mendekat ke hadapan TUHAN, maka haruslah orang Israel meletakkan tangannya atas orang Lewi itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Mark well, O Job, hearken unto me: hold thy peace, and I will speak.
target: Perhatikanlah, hai Ayub, dengarkanlah aku, diamlah, akulah yang berbicara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his brethren by their families, when the genealogy of their generations was reckoned, were the chief, Jeiel, and Zechariah,
target: Saudara-saudaranya menurut kaum-kaumnya, seperti tercatat dalam silsilah menurut keturunan mereka, ialah Yeiel, kepala, lalu Zakharia,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will not drive them out from before thee in one year; lest the land become desolate, and the beast of the field multiply against thee.
target: Aku tidak akan menghalau mereka dari depanmu dalam satu tahun, supaya negeri itu jangan menjadi sepi, dan segala binatang hutan jangan bertambah banyak melebihi engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard, lest at any time we should let them slip.
target: Karena itu harus lebih teliti kita memperhatikan apa yang telah kita dengar, supaya kita jangan hanyut dibawa arus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the congregation made a covenant with the king in the house of God. And he said unto them, Behold, the king's son shall reign, as the LORD hath said of the sons of David.
target: Lalu seluruh jemaah itu mengikat perjanjian dengan raja di rumah Allah. Kata Yoyada kepada mereka: "Lihatlah, anak raja! Biarlah ia memerintah, seperti yang telah difirmankan TUHAN tentang anak-anak Daud!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Surely against me is he turned; he turneth his hand against me all the day.
target: Sesungguhnya, aku dipukul-Nya berulang-ulang dengan tangan-Nya sepanjang hari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers.
target: Jadi, penuhilah juga takaran nenek moyangmu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And again, whom should I serve? should I not serve in the presence of his son? as I have served in thy father's presence, so will I be in thy presence.
target: Lagipula, kepada siapakah aku memperhambakan diri? Bukankah kepada anaknya? Sebagaimana aku memperhambakan diri kepada ayahmu, demikianlah aku memperhambakan diri kepadamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To wit, Jerusalem, and the cities of Judah, and the kings thereof, and the princes thereof, to make them a desolation, an astonishment, an hissing, and a curse; as it is this day;
target: yakni kepada Yerusalem dan kota-kota Yehuda, beserta raja-rajanya dan pemuka-pemukanya, untuk membuat semuanya itu menjadi reruntuhan, ketandusan dan sasaran suitan dan kutuk seperti halnya pada hari ini;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But thou, when thou prayest, enter into thy closet, and when thou hast shut thy door, pray to thy Father which is in secret; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly.
target: Tetapi jika engkau berdoa, masuklah ke dalam kamarmu, tutuplah pintu dan berdoalah kepada Bapamu yang ada di tempat tersembunyi. Maka Bapamu yang melihat yang tersembunyi akan membalasnya kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yea, every pot in Jerusalem and in Judah shall be holiness unto the LORD of hosts: and all they that sacrifice shall come and take of them, and seethe therein: and in that day there shall be no more the Canaanite in the house of the LORD of hosts.
target: Maka segala kuali di Yerusalem dan di Yehuda akan menjadi kudus bagi TUHAN semesta alam; semua orang yang mempersembahkan korban akan datang mengambilnya dan memasak di dalamnya. Dan tidak akan ada lagi pedagang di rumah TUHAN semesta alam pada waktu itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: TEKEL; Thou art weighed in the balances, and art found wanting.
target: Tek'el: tuanku ditimbang dengan neraca dan didapati terlalu ringan;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he called for Moses and Aaron by night, and said, Rise up, and get you forth from among my people, both ye and the children of Israel; and go, serve the LORD, as ye have said.
target: Lalu pada malam itu dipanggilnyalah Musa dan Harun, katanya: "Bangunlah, keluarlah dari tengah-tengah bangsaku, baik kamu maupun orang Israel; pergilah, beribadahlah kepada TUHAN, seperti katamu itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when a man shall sanctify his house to be holy unto the LORD, then the priest shall estimate it, whether it be good or bad: as the priest shall estimate it, so shall it stand.
target: Apabila seorang menguduskan rumahnya sebagai persembahan kudus bagi TUHAN, maka imam harus menetapkan nilainya menurut baik atau buruknya, dan seperti nilai yang ditetapkan imam demikianlah harus dipegang teguh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she said, Drink, my lord: and she hasted, and let down her pitcher upon her hand, and gave him drink.
target: Jawabnya: "Minumlah, tuan," maka segeralah diturunkannya buyungnya itu ke tangannya, serta diberinya dia minum.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A several tenth deal unto one lamb, throughout the seven lambs;
target: sepersepuluh efa untuk setiap domba dari ketujuh ekor domba itu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They hunt our steps, that we cannot go in our streets: our end is near, our days are fulfilled; for our end is come.
target: Mereka mengintai langkah-langkah kami, sehingga kami tak dapat berjalan di lapangan-lapangan kami; akhir hidup kami mendekat, hari-hari kami sudah genap, ya, akhir hidup kami sudah tiba.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: One of themselves, even a prophet of their own, said, the Cretians are alway liars, evil beasts, slow bellies.
target: Seorang dari kalangan mereka, nabi mereka sendiri, pernah berkata: "Dasar orang Kreta pembohong, binatang buas, pelahap yang malas."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For there must be also heresies among you, that they which are approved may be made manifest among you.
target: Sebab di antara kamu harus ada perpecahan, supaya nyata nanti siapakah di antara kamu yang tahan uji.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And certain of them that stood there said unto them, What do ye, loosing the colt?
target: Dan beberapa orang yang ada di situ berkata kepada mereka: "Apa maksudnya kamu melepaskan keledai itu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the mingled people, and all the kings of the land of Uz, and all the kings of the land of the Philistines, and Ashkelon, and Azzah, and Ekron, and the remnant of Ashdod,
target: juga kepada semua orang campuran dari berbagai-bagai bangsa; kepada semua raja negeri Us; kepada semua raja negeri Filistin, yakni Askelon, Gaza, Ekron dan orang-orang yang masih tinggal hidup di Asdod;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But this people hath a revolting and a rebellious heart; they are revolted and gone.
target: Tetapi bangsa ini mempunyai hati yang selalu melawan dan memberontak; mereka telah menyimpang dan menghilang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD drave out from before us all the people, even the Amorites which dwelt in the land: therefore will we also serve the LORD; for he is our God.
target: TUHAN menghalau semua bangsa dan orang Amori, penduduk negeri ini, dari depan kita. Kami pun akan beribadah kepada TUHAN, sebab Dialah Allah kita."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the house, when it was in building, was built of stone made ready before it was brought thither: so that there was neither hammer nor axe nor any tool of iron heard in the house, while it was in building.
target: Pada waktu rumah itu didirikan, dipakailah batu-batu yang telah disiapkan di penggalian, sehingga tidak kedengaran palu atau kapak atau sesuatu perkakas besi pun selama pembangunan rumah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And patience, experience; and experience, hope:
target: dan ketekunan menimbulkan tahan uji dan tahan uji menimbulkan pengharapan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The Levites: the children of Jeshua and Kadmiel, of the children of Hodaviah, seventy and four.
target: Inilah orang-orang Lewi: bani Yesua dan Kadmiel, yakni bani Hodawya: tujuh puluh empat orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This is the thing that ye shall do; A third part of you entering on the sabbath, of the priests and of the Levites, shall be porters of the doors;
target: Inilah yang harus kamu lakukan: sepertiga dari kamu, yakni yang selesai bertugas pada hari Sabat, baik imam maupun orang Lewi, haruslah menjadi penunggu pintu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: His offering was one silver charger of the weight of an hundred and thirty shekels, one silver bowl of seventy shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary; both of them full of fine flour mingled with oil for a meat offering:
target: Persembahannya ialah satu pinggan perak, seratus tiga puluh syikal timbangannya, dan satu bokor penyiraman dari perak, tujuh puluh syikal beratnya, ditimbang menurut syikal kudus, keduanya berisi tepung yang terbaik, diolah dengan minyak, untuk korban sajian;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he saith unto them, Follow me, and I will make you fishers of men.
target: Yesus berkata kepada mereka: "Mari, ikutlah Aku, dan kamu akan Kujadikan penjala manusia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who hath sent out the wild ass free? or who hath loosed the bands of the wild ass?
target: Dapatkah engkau menghitung berapa lamanya sampai genap bulannya, dan mengetahui waktunya beranak?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the third angel poured out his vial upon the rivers and fountains of waters; and they became blood.
target: Dan malaikat yang ketiga menumpahkan cawannya atas sungai-sungai dan mata-mata air, dan semuanya menjadi darah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The remnant shall return, even the remnant of Jacob, unto the mighty God.
target: Suatu sisa akan kembali, sisa Yakub akan bertobat di hadapan Allah yang perkasa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then verily the first covenant had also ordinances of divine service, and a worldly sanctuary.
target: Memang perjanjian yang pertama juga mempunyai peraturan-peraturan untuk ibadah dan untuk tempat kudus buatan tangan manusia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Exalt ye the LORD our God, and worship at his footstool; for he is holy.
target: Tinggikanlah TUHAN, Allah kita, dan sujudlah menyembah kepada tumpuan kaki-Nya! Kuduslah Ia!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the LORD smote the Ethiopians before Asa, and before Judah; and the Ethiopians fled.
target: Dan TUHAN memukul kalah orang-orang Etiopia itu di hadapan Asa dan Yehuda. Orang-orang Etiopia itu lari,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jehoshaphat waxed great exceedingly; and he built in Judah castles, and cities of store.
target: Yosafat makin lama makin kuat, menjadi luar biasa kuat. Di Yehuda ia membangun benteng-benteng dan kota-kota perbekalan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The king's favour is toward a wise servant: but his wrath is against him that causeth shame.
target: Raja berkenan kepada hamba yang berakal budi, tetapi kemarahannya menimpa orang yang membuat malu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Remember these, O Jacob and Israel; for thou art my servant: I have formed thee; thou art my servant: O Israel, thou shalt not be forgotten of me.
target: Ingatlah semuanya ini, hai Yakub, sebab engkaulah hamba-Ku, hai Israel. Aku telah membentuk engkau, engkau adalah hamba-Ku; hai Israel, engkau tidak Kulupakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God Almighty give you mercy before the man, that he may send away your other brother, and Benjamin. If I be bereaved of my children, I am bereaved.
target: Allah Yang Mahakuasa kiranya membuat orang itu menaruh belas kasihan kepadamu, supaya ia membiarkan saudaramu yang lain itu beserta Benyamin kembali. Mengenai aku ini, jika terpaksa aku kehilangan anak-anakku, biarlah juga kehilangan!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the people waited for Zacharias, and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple.
target: Sementara itu orang banyak menanti-nantikan Zakharia. Mereka menjadi heran, bahwa ia begitu lama berada dalam Bait Suci.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will come upon him while he is weary and weak handed, and will make him afraid: and all the people that are with him shall flee; and I will smite the king only:
target: Aku akan mendatangi dia, selagi ia lesu dan lemah semangatnya, dan mengejutkan dia; seluruh rakyat yang ada bersama-sama dengan dia akan melarikan diri, maka aku dapat menewaskan raja sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven, that one of these little ones should perish.
target: Demikian juga Bapamu yang di sorga tidak menghendaki supaya seorang pun dari anak-anak ini hilang."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if the LORD make a new thing, and the earth open her mouth, and swallow them up, with all that appertain unto them, and they go down quick into the pit; then ye shall understand that these men have provoked the LORD.
target: Tetapi, jika TUHAN akan menjadikan sesuatu yang belum pernah terjadi, dan tanah mengangakan mulutnya dan menelan mereka beserta segala kepunyaan mereka, sehingga mereka hidup-hidup turun ke dunia orang mati, maka kamu akan tahu, bahwa orang-orang ini telah menista TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there was given me a reed like unto a rod: and the angel stood, saying, Rise, and measure the temple of God, and the altar, and them that worship therein.
target: Kemudian diberikanlah kepadaku sebatang buluh, seperti tongkat pengukur rupanya, dengan kata-kata yang berikut: "Bangunlah dan ukurlah Bait Suci Allah dan mezbah dan mereka yang beribadah di dalamnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of the Izharites; Shelomoth: of the sons of Shelomoth; Jahath.
target: dari orang Yizhar ialah Selomot; dari anak-anak Selomot ialah Yahat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the archers shot at king Josiah; and the king said to his servants, Have me away; for I am sore wounded.
target: Maka pemanah-pemanah menembaki raja Yosia, dan raja berseru kepada orang-orangnya: "Bawa aku dari sini, karena aku luka parah!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the flowers, and the lamps, and the tongs, made he of gold, and that perfect gold;
target: kembang-kembangnya, pelita-pelitanya dan sepit-sepitnya, dari emas, semuanya dari emas murni;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the lad was come to the place of the arrow which Jonathan had shot, Jonathan cried after the lad, and said, Is not the arrow beyond thee?
target: Ketika budak itu sampai ke tempat letaknya anak panah yang dilepaskan Yonatan itu, maka berserulah Yonatan dari belakang budak itu, katanya: "Bukankah anak panah itu lebih ke sana?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when all the Moabites heard that the kings were come up to fight against them, they gathered all that were able to put on armour, and upward, and stood in the border.
target: Ketika didengar seluruh orang Moab, bahwa ketiga raja itu telah maju memerangi mereka, maka dikerahkanlah semua orang yang masih sanggup menyandang pedang, bahkan orang-orang yang lebih tua juga, kemudian mereka ditempatkan di tepi perbatasan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There is a path which no fowl knoweth, and which the vulture's eye hath not seen:
target: Jalan ke sana tidak dikenal seekor burung buas pun, dan mata elang tidak melihatnya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus said unto him, Why callest thou me good? none is good, save one, that is, God.
target: Jawab Yesus: "Mengapa kaukatakan Aku baik? Tak seorang pun yang baik selain dari pada Allah saja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For we which live are always delivered unto death for Jesus' sake, that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our mortal flesh.
target: Sebab kami, yang masih hidup ini, terus-menerus diserahkan kepada maut karena Yesus, supaya juga hidup Yesus menjadi nyata di dalam tubuh kami yang fana ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And this will we do, if God permit.
target: Dan itulah yang akan kita perbuat, jika Allah mengizinkannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let as many servants as are under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honour, that the name of God and his doctrine be not blasphemed.
target: Semua orang yang menanggung beban perbudakan hendaknya menganggap tuan mereka layak mendapat segala penghormatan, agar nama Allah dan ajaran kita jangan dihujat orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Not for your sakes do I this, saith the Lord GOD, be it known unto you: be ashamed and confounded for your own ways, O house of Israel.
target: Bukan karena kamu Aku bertindak, demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH, ketahuilah itu. Merasa malulah kamu dan biarlah kamu dipermalukan karena kelakuanmu, hai kaum Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For mine eyes are upon all their ways: they are not hid from my face, neither is their iniquity hid from mine eyes.
target: Sebab Aku mengamat-amati segala tingkah langkah mereka; semuanya itu tidak tersembunyi dari pandangan-Ku, dan kesalahan mereka pun tidak terlindung di depan mata-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Buy the truth, and sell it not; also wisdom, and instruction, and understanding.
target: Belilah kebenaran dan jangan menjualnya; demikian juga dengan hikmat, didikan dan pengertian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For it came to pass, when the flame went up toward heaven from off the altar, that the angel of the LORD ascended in the flame of the altar. And Manoah and his wife looked on it, and fell on their faces to the ground.
target: Sedang nyala api itu naik ke langit dari mezbah, maka naiklah Malaikat TUHAN dalam nyala api mezbah itu. Ketika Manoah dan isterinya melihat hal ini, sujudlah mereka dengan mukanya sampai ke tanah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.
target: Tetapi kepada tiap-tiap orang dikaruniakan penyataan Roh untuk kepentingan bersama.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jacob journeyed to Succoth, and built him an house, and made booths for his cattle: therefore the name of the place is called Succoth.
target: Tetapi Yakub berangkat ke Sukot, lalu mendirikan rumah, dan untuk ternaknya dibuatnya gubuk-gubuk. Itulah sebabnya tempat itu dinamai Sukot.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then will I leave thee upon the land, I will cast thee forth upon the open field, and will cause all the fowls of the heaven to remain upon thee, and I will fill the beasts of the whole earth with thee.
target: Kuhempaskan engkau ke tanah, Kulemparkan engkau ke padang. Dan ke atasmu Kusuruh hinggap segala burung di udara, dengan dagingmu Kukenyangkan binatang-binatang seluruh bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Joshua let the people depart, every man unto his inheritance.
target: Sesudah itu Yosua melepas bangsa itu pergi, masing-masing ke milik pusakanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: She riseth also while it is yet night, and giveth meat to her household, and a portion to her maidens.
target: Ia bangun kalau masih malam, lalu menyediakan makanan untuk seisi rumahnya, dan membagi-bagikan tugas kepada pelayan-pelayannya perempuan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also they reported his good deeds before me, and uttered my words to him. And Tobiah sent letters to put me in fear.
target: Juga mereka sebut-sebut segala kebaikan Tobia di mukaku dan segala perkataanku terus dibeberkan kepadanya. Pula Tobia mengirim surat-surat untuk menakut-nakutkan aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, he shall come up as clouds, and his chariots shall be as a whirlwind: his horses are swifter than eagles. Woe unto us! for we are spoiled.
target: Lihat, ia naik seperti awan-awan, keretanya kencang seperti angin badai, kudanya lebih tangkas dari pada burung rajawali. Celakalah kita, sebab kita dibinasakan!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And afterward Joshua smote them, and slew them, and hanged them on five trees: and they were hanging upon the trees until the evening.
target: Sesudah itu Yosua membunuh raja-raja itu, dan menggantung mereka pada lima tiang, dan mereka tinggal tergantung pada tiang-tiang itu sampai matahari terbenam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Unto thee, O God, do we give thanks, unto thee do we give thanks: for that thy name is near thy wondrous works declare.
target: Untuk pemimpin biduan. Menurut lagu: Jangan memusnahkan. Mazmur Asaf. Nyanyian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed them up together with Korah, when that company died, what time the fire devoured two hundred and fifty men: and they became a sign.
target: tetapi bumi membuka mulutnya dan menelan mereka bersama-sama dengan Korah, ketika kumpulan itu mati, ketika kedua ratus lima puluh orang itu dimakan api, sehingga mereka menjadi peringatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And lest, when I come again, my God will humble me among you, and that I shall bewail many which have sinned already, and have not repented of the uncleanness and fornication and lasciviousness which they have committed.
target: Aku kuatir, bahwa apabila aku datang lagi, Allahku akan merendahkan aku di depan kamu, dan bahwa aku akan berdukacita terhadap banyak orang yang di masa yang lampau berbuat dosa dan belum lagi bertobat dari kecemaran, percabulan dan ketidaksopanan yang mereka lakukan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as David came to Ornan, Ornan looked and saw David, and went out of the threshingfloor, and bowed himself to David with his face to the ground.
target: Ketika Daud sampai kepada Ornan, maka Ornan mengangkat mukanya dan melihat Daud, lalu keluarlah ia dari tempat pengirikan, kemudian sujudlah ia kepada Daud dengan mukanya ke tanah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then arose Ezra, and made the chief priests, the Levites, and all Israel, to swear that they should do according to this word. And they sware.
target: Kemudian bangkitlah Ezra dan menyuruh para pemuka imam dan orang-orang Lewi dan segenap orang Israel bersumpah, bahwa mereka akan berbuat menurut perkataan itu, maka bersumpahlah mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Save thy people, and bless thine inheritance: feed them also, and lift them up for ever.
target: Selamatkanlah kiranya umat-Mu dan berkatilah milik-Mu sendiri, gembalakanlah mereka dan dukunglah mereka untuk selama-lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when she looked, behold, the king stood by a pillar, as the manner was, and the princes and the trumpeters by the king, and all the people of the land rejoiced, and blew with trumpets: and Athaliah rent her clothes, and cried, Treason, Treason.
target: Lalu dilihatnyalah raja berdiri dekat tiang menurut kebiasaan, sedang para pemimpin dengan para pemegang nafiri ada dekat raja. Dan seluruh rakyat negeri bersukaria sambil meniup nafiri. Maka Atalya mengoyakkan pakaiannya sambil berseru: "Khianat, khianat!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Blessed is the man that doeth this, and the son of man that layeth hold on it; that keepeth the sabbath from polluting it, and keepeth his hand from doing any evil.
target: Berbahagialah orang yang melakukannya, dan anak manusia yang berpegang kepadanya: yang memelihara hari Sabat dan tidak menajiskannya, dan yang menahan diri dari setiap perbuatan jahat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David sent to Joab, saying, Send me Uriah the Hittite. And Joab sent Uriah to David.
target: Lalu Daud menyuruh orang kepada Yoab mengatakan: "Suruhlah Uria, orang Het itu, datang kepadaku." Maka Yoab menyuruh Uria menghadap Daud.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he, as a rotten thing, consumeth, as a garment that is moth eaten.
target: Dan semuanya itu terhadap orang yang sudah rapuh seperti kayu lapuk, seperti kain yang dimakan gegat!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Conscience, I say, not thine own, but of the other: for why is my liberty judged of another man's conscience?
target: Yang aku maksudkan dengan keberatan-keberatan bukanlah keberatan-keberatan hati nuranimu sendiri, tetapi keberatan-keberatan hati nurani orang lain itu. Mungkin ada orang yang berkata: "Mengapa kebebasanku harus ditentukan oleh keberatan-keberatan hati nurani orang lain?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Daniel answered with counsel and wisdom to Arioch the captain of the king's guard, which was gone forth to slay the wise men of Babylon:
target: Lalu berkatalah Daniel dengan cerdik dan bijaksana kepada Ariokh, pemimpin pengawal raja yang telah pergi untuk membunuh orang-orang bijaksana di Babel itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said he unto me, The north chambers and the south chambers, which are before the separate place, they be holy chambers, where the priests that approach unto the LORD shall eat the most holy things: there shall they lay the most holy things, and the meat offering, and the sin offering, and the trespass offering; for the place is holy.
target: Lalu ia berkata kepadaku: "Bilik-bilik yang di utara dan bilik-bilik yang di selatan yang menghadap ke lapangan tertutup, itulah bilik-bilik kudus, di mana imam-imam, yang mendekat kepada TUHAN, memakan persembahan-persembahan maha kudus. Di sana mereka akan menaruh persembahan-persembahan maha kudus, korban sajian, korban penghapus dosa dan korban penebus salah, sebab tempat itu kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing, if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.
target: Tetapi perempuan akan diselamatkan karena melahirkan anak, asal ia bertekun dalam iman dan kasih dan pengudusan dengan segala kesederhanaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou, son of man, take thee a sharp knife, take thee a barber's razor, and cause it to pass upon thine head and upon thy beard: then take thee balances to weigh, and divide the hair.
target: Dan engkau, anak manusia, ambillah sebilah pedang yang tajam dan pakailah itu sebagai pisau cukur tukang pangkas; cukurlah rambutmu dan janggutmu dengan itu; lalu ambillah sebuah timbangan dan bagi-bagilah rambutmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It hath pleased them verily; and their debtors they are. For if the Gentiles have been made partakers of their spiritual things, their duty is also to minister unto them in carnal things.
target: Keputusan itu memang telah mereka ambil, tetapi itu adalah kewajiban mereka. Sebab, jika bangsa-bangsa lain telah beroleh bagian dalam harta rohani orang Yahudi, maka wajiblah juga bangsa-bangsa lain itu melayani orang Yahudi dengan harta duniawi mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Cursed be he that lieth with any manner of beast. And all the people shall say, Amen.
target: Terkutuklah orang yang tidur dengan binatang apa pun. Dan seluruh bangsa itu haruslah berkata: Amin!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Another parable put he forth unto them, saying, The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field:
target: Yesus membentangkan suatu perumpamaan lain lagi kepada mereka, kata-Nya: "Hal Kerajaan Sorga itu seumpama orang yang menaburkan benih yang baik di ladangnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will smite them with the pestilence, and disinherit them, and will make of thee a greater nation and mightier than they.
target: Aku akan memukul mereka dengan penyakit sampar dan melenyapkan mereka, tetapi engkau akan Kubuat menjadi bangsa yang lebih besar dan lebih kuat dari pada mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if the ministration of condemnation be glory, much more doth the ministration of righteousness exceed in glory.
target: Sebab, jika pelayanan yang memimpin kepada penghukuman itu mulia, betapa lebih mulianya lagi pelayanan yang memimpin kepada pembenaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And that he died for all, that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves, but unto him which died for them, and rose again.
target: Dan Kristus telah mati untuk semua orang, supaya mereka yang hidup, tidak lagi hidup untuk dirinya sendiri, tetapi untuk Dia, yang telah mati dan telah dibangkitkan untuk mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My flesh is clothed with worms and clods of dust; my skin is broken, and become loathsome.
target: Berenga dan abu menutupi tubuhku, kulitku menjadi keras, lalu pecah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the word of God grew and multiplied.
target: Maka firman Tuhan makin tersebar dan makin banyak didengar orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said Paul, I wist not, brethren, that he was the high priest: for it is written, Thou shalt not speak evil of the ruler of thy people.
target: Jawab Paulus: "Hai saudara-saudara, aku tidak tahu, bahwa ia adalah Imam Besar. Memang ada tertulis: Janganlah engkau berkata jahat tentang seorang pemimpin bangsamu!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of the sons of Manasseh: of Machir, the family of the Machirites: and Machir begat Gilead: of Gilead come the family of the Gileadites.
target: Bani Manasye ialah: dari Makhir kaum orang Makhir; dan Makhir beranakkan Gilead; dari Gilead kaum orang Gilead.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So teach us to number our days, that we may apply our hearts unto wisdom.
target: Ajarlah kami menghitung hari-hari kami sedemikian, hingga kami beroleh hati yang bijaksana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Forasmuch as I exalted thee out of the dust, and made thee prince over my people Israel; and thou hast walked in the way of Jeroboam, and hast made my people Israel to sin, to provoke me to anger with their sins;
target: "Oleh karena engkau telah Kutinggikan dari debu dan Kuangkat menjadi raja atas umat-Ku Israel, tetapi engkau telah hidup seperti Yerobeam dan telah menyuruh umat-Ku Israel berdosa, sehingga mereka menimbulkan sakit hati-Ku dengan dosa mereka,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore hold him not guiltless: for thou art a wise man, and knowest what thou oughtest to do unto him; but his hoar head bring thou down to the grave with blood.
target: Sekarang janganlah bebaskan dia dari hukuman, sebab engkau seorang yang bijaksana dan tahu apa yang harus kaulakukan kepadanya untuk membuat yang ubanan itu turun dengan berdarah ke dalam dunia orang mati."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also the pillars of brass that were in the house of the LORD, and the bases, and the brasen sea that was in the house of the LORD, the Chaldeans brake, and carried all the brass of them to Babylon.
target: Juga tiang-tiang tembaga yang ada di rumah TUHAN dan kereta penopang dan laut tembaga yang ada di rumah TUHAN dipecahkan oleh orang Kasdim dan seluruh tembaganya diangkut mereka ke Babel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For Paul had determined to sail by Ephesus, because he would not spend the time in Asia: for he hasted, if it were possible for him, to be at Jerusalem the day of Pentecost.
target: Paulus telah memutuskan untuk tidak singgah di Efesus, supaya jangan habis waktunya di Asia. Sebab ia buru-buru, agar jika mungkin, ia telah berada di Yerusalem pada hari raya Pentakosta.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whoso causeth the righteous to go astray in an evil way, he shall fall himself into his own pit: but the upright shall have good things in possession.
target: Siapa menyesatkan orang jujur ke jalan yang jahat akan jatuh ke dalam lobangnya sendiri, tetapi orang-orang yang tak bercela akan mewarisi kebahagiaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have seen thine adulteries, and thy neighings, the lewdness of thy whoredom, and thine abominations on the hills in the fields. Woe unto thee, O Jerusalem! wilt thou not be made clean? when shall it once be?
target: Zinahmu dan ringkikmu, persundalanmu yang mesum di atas bukit-bukit dan di padang-padang, Aku sudah melihat perbuatanmu yang keji itu. Celakalah engkau, hai Yerusalem, berapa lama lagi hingga engkau menjadi tahir?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said unto him, Who hath made man's mouth? or who maketh the dumb, or deaf, or the seeing, or the blind? have not I the LORD?
target: Tetapi TUHAN berfirman kepadanya: "Siapakah yang membuat lidah manusia, siapakah yang membuat orang bisu atau tuli, membuat orang melihat atau buta; bukankah Aku, yakni TUHAN?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whoredom and wine and new wine take away the heart.
target: Anggur dan air anggur menghilangkan daya pikir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Reuben heard it, and he delivered him out of their hands; and said, Let us not kill him.
target: Ketika Ruben mendengar hal ini, ia ingin melepaskan Yusuf dari tangan mereka, sebab itu katanya: "Janganlah kita bunuh dia!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O my soul, come not thou into their secret; unto their assembly, mine honour, be not thou united: for in their anger they slew a man, and in their selfwill they digged down a wall.
target: Janganlah kiranya jiwaku turut dalam permupakatan mereka, janganlah kiranya rohku bersatu dengan perkumpulan mereka, sebab dalam kemarahannya mereka telah membunuh orang dan dalam keangkaraannya mereka telah memotong urat keting lembu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The blessing of the LORD, it maketh rich, and he addeth no sorrow with it.
target: Berkat TUHANlah yang menjadikan kaya, susah payah tidak akan menambahinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then shalt thou be pleased with the sacrifices of righteousness, with burnt offering and whole burnt offering: then shall they offer bullocks upon thine altar.
target: Korban sembelihan kepada Allah ialah jiwa yang hancur; hati yang patah dan remuk tidak akan Kaupandang hina, ya Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses and unto Aaron, saying,
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Musa dan Harun:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: From Jordan eastward, all the land of Gilead, the Gadites, and the Reubenites, and the Manassites, from Aroer, which is by the river Arnon, even Gilead and Bashan.
target: di sebelah timur sungai Yordan dengan merebut seluruh tanah Gilead, tanah orang Gad, orang Ruben dan orang Manasye, mulai dari Aro"er yang di tepi sungai Arnon, baik Gilead maupun Basan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the king spared Mephibosheth, the son of Jonathan the son of Saul, because of the LORD's oath that was between them, between David and Jonathan the son of Saul.
target: Tetapi raja merasa sayang kepada Mefiboset bin Yonatan bin Saul, karena sumpah demi TUHAN ada di antara mereka, di antara Daud dan Yonatan bin Saul.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And a certain Jew named Apollos, born at Alexandria, an eloquent man, and mighty in the scriptures, came to Ephesus.
target: Sementara itu datanglah ke Efesus seorang Yahudi bernama Apolos, yang berasal dari Aleksandria. Ia seorang yang fasih berbicara dan sangat mahir dalam soal-soal Kitab Suci.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he left the oxen, and ran after Elijah, and said, Let me, I pray thee, kiss my father and my mother, and then I will follow thee. And he said unto him, Go back again: for what have I done to thee?
target: Lalu Elisa meninggalkan lembu itu dan berlari mengikuti Elia, katanya: "Biarkanlah aku mencium ayahku dan ibuku dahulu, lalu aku akan mengikuti engkau." Jawabnya kepadanya: "Baiklah, pulang dahulu, dan ingatlah apa yang telah kuperbuat kepadamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But and if she depart, let her remain unmarried or be reconciled to her husband: and let not the husband put away his wife.
target: Dan jikalau ia bercerai, ia harus tetap hidup tanpa suami atau berdamai dengan suaminya. Dan seorang suami tidak boleh menceraikan isterinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And before I had done speaking in mine heart, behold, Rebekah came forth with her pitcher on her shoulder; and she went down unto the well, and drew water: and I said unto her, Let me drink, I pray thee.
target: Belum lagi aku habis berkata dalam hatiku, Ribka telah datang membawa buyung di atas bahunya, dan turun ke mata air itu, lalu menimba air. Kataku kepadanya: Tolong berikan aku minum.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And mine eye shall not spare, neither will I have pity: I will recompense thee according to thy ways and thine abominations that are in the midst of thee; and ye shall know that I am the LORD that smiteth.
target: Aku tidak akan merasa sayang dan tidak akan kenal belas kasihan; selaras dengan tingkah lakumu akan Kubalaskan kepadamu dan perbuatan-perbuatanmu yang keji akan tertimpa atasmu. Maka kamu akan mengetahui, bahwa Aku, TUHANlah, yang memusnahkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be not among winebibbers; among riotous eaters of flesh:
target: Janganlah engkau ada di antara peminum anggur dan pelahap daging.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Er, Judah's firstborn, was wicked in the sight of the LORD; and the LORD slew him.
target: Tetapi Er, anak sulung Yehuda itu, adalah jahat di mata TUHAN, maka TUHAN membunuh dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the greater house he cieled with fir tree, which he overlaid with fine gold, and set thereon palm trees and chains.
target: Ruang besar dipapaninya dengan kayu sanobar. Kayu itu disaputnya dengan emas tua; kemudian dipasangnya pohon korma dan untaian rantai di atasnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Art thou greater than our father Jacob, which gave us the well, and drank thereof himself, and his children, and his cattle?
target: Adakah Engkau lebih besar dari pada bapa kami Yakub, yang memberikan sumur ini kepada kami dan yang telah minum sendiri dari dalamnya, ia serta anak-anaknya dan ternaknya?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the multitude rebuked them, because they should hold their peace: but they cried the more, saying, Have mercy on us, O Lord, thou son of David.
target: Tetapi orang banyak itu menegor mereka supaya mereka diam. Namun mereka makin keras berseru, katanya: "Tuhan, Anak Daud, kasihanilah kami!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the LORD is great, and greatly to be praised: he is to be feared above all gods.
target: Sebab TUHAN maha besar dan terpuji sangat, Ia lebih dahsyat dari pada segala allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye shall make you no idols nor graven image, neither rear you up a standing image, neither shall ye set up any image of stone in your land, to bow down unto it: for I am the LORD your God.
target: "Janganlah kamu membuat berhala bagimu, dan patung atau tugu berhala janganlah kamu dirikan bagimu; juga batu berukir janganlah kamu tempatkan di negerimu untuk sujud menyembah kepadanya, sebab Akulah TUHAN, Allahmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And let us arise, and go up to Bethel; and I will make there an altar unto God, who answered me in the day of my distress, and was with me in the way which I went.
target: Marilah kita bersiap dan pergi ke Betel; aku akan membuat mezbah di situ bagi Allah, yang telah menjawab aku pada masa kesesakanku dan yang telah menyertai aku di jalan yang kutempuh."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And took off their chariot wheels, that they drave them heavily: so that the Egyptians said, Let us flee from the face of Israel; for the LORD fighteth for them against the Egyptians.
target: Ia membuat roda keretanya berjalan miring dan maju dengan berat, sehingga orang Mesir berkata: "Marilah kita lari meninggalkan orang Israel, sebab TUHANlah yang berperang untuk mereka melawan Mesir."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And five bars for the boards of the other side of the tabernacle, and five bars for the boards of the tabernacle for the sides westward.
target: lima kayu lintang untuk papan-papan pada sisi yang kedua dari Kemah Suci, dan lima kayu lintang untuk papan-papan Kemah Suci yang merupakan sisi belakangnya, pada sebelah barat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass at the time of the offering of the evening sacrifice, that Elijah the prophet came near, and said, LORD God of Abraham, Isaac, and of Israel, let it be known this day that thou art God in Israel, and that I am thy servant, and that I have done all these things at thy word.
target: Kemudian pada waktu mempersembahkan korban petang, tampillah nabi Elia dan berkata: "Ya TUHAN, Allah Abraham, Ishak dan Israel, pada hari ini biarlah diketahui orang, bahwa Engkaulah Allah di tengah-tengah Israel dan bahwa aku ini hamba-Mu dan bahwa atas firman-Mulah aku melakukan segala perkara ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet shall he be brought to the grave, and shall remain in the tomb.
target: Dialah yang dibawa ke kuburan, dan jiratnya dirawat orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Mine heritage is unto me as a lion in the forest; it crieth out against me: therefore have I hated it.
target: Negeri milik-Ku sudah menjadi seperti singa di hutan bagi-Ku; ia mengeraskan suaranya menentang Aku, sebab itu Aku membencinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he cried, saying, Jesus, thou son of David, have mercy on me.
target: Lalu ia berseru: "Yesus, Anak Daud, kasihanilah aku!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the rest of the acts of Amon which he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
target: Selebihnya dari riwayat Amon, apa yang dilakukannya, bukankah semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Yehuda?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When ye have transgressed the covenant of the LORD your God, which he commanded you, and have gone and served other gods, and bowed yourselves to them; then shall the anger of the LORD be kindled against you, and ye shall perish quickly from off the good land which he hath given unto you.
target: apabila kamu melangkahi perjanjian, yang telah diperintahkan kepadamu oleh TUHAN, Allahmu, dan pergi beribadah kepada allah lain dan sujud menyembah kepada mereka. Maka murka TUHAN akan bangkit terhadap kamu, sehingga kamu segera binasa dari negeri yang baik, yang telah diberikan-Nya kepadamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the third row a ligure, an agate, and an amethyst.
target: jajar yang ketiga: permata ambar, akik, kecubung,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the Egyptians buried all their firstborn, which the LORD had smitten among them: upon their gods also the LORD executed judgments.
target: sementara orang Mesir sedang menguburkan orang-orang yang telah dibunuh TUHAN di antara mereka, yakni semua anak sulung; sebab TUHAN telah menjatuhkan hukuman-hukuman kepada para allah mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I have also given thee that which thou hast not asked, both riches, and honour: so that there shall not be any among the kings like unto thee all thy days.
target: Dan juga apa yang tidak kauminta Aku berikan kepadamu, baik kekayaan maupun kemuliaan, sehingga sepanjang umurmu takkan ada seorang pun seperti engkau di antara raja-raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt make it an oil of holy ointment, an ointment compound after the art of the apothecary: it shall be an holy anointing oil.
target: Haruslah kaubuat semuanya itu menjadi minyak urapan yang kudus, suatu campuran rempah-rempah yang dicampur dengan cermat seperti buatan seorang tukang campur rempah-rempah; itulah yang harus menjadi minyak urapan yang kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he entered into one of the ships, which was Simon's, and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land. And he sat down, and taught the people out of the ship.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My days are like a shadow that declineth; and I am withered like grass.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So she kept fast by the maidens of Boaz to glean unto the end of barley harvest and of wheat harvest; and dwelt with her mother in law.
target: Demikianlah Rut tetap dekat pada pengerja-pengerja perempuan Boas untuk memungut, sampai musim menuai jelai dan musim menuai gandum telah berakhir. Dan selama itu ia tinggal pada mertuanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But he said, Nay; lest while ye gather up the tares, ye root up also the wheat with them.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They shall call the people unto the mountain; there they shall offer sacrifices of righteousness: for they shall suck of the abundance of the seas, and of treasures hid in the sand.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In a moment shall they die, and the people shall be troubled at midnight, and pass away: and the mighty shall be taken away without hand.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And without the inner gate were the chambers of the singers in the inner court, which was at the side of the north gate; and their prospect was toward the south: one at the side of the east gate having the prospect toward the north.
target: Lalu dibawanya aku ke pelataran dalam, sungguh, di sana ada dua bilik, yaitu satu di samping pintu gerbang utara dan mukanya menghadap ke selatan, satu lagi di samping pintu gerbang selatan dan mukanya menghadap ke utara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In a dream, in a vision of the night, when deep sleep falleth upon men, in slumberings upon the bed;
target: Dalam mimpi, dalam penglihatan waktu malam, bila orang nyenyak tidur, bila berbaring di atas tempat tidur,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And said unto the king, Let the king live for ever: why should not my countenance be sad, when the city, the place of my fathers' sepulchres, lieth waste, and the gates thereof are consumed with fire?
target: Jawabku kepada raja: "Hiduplah raja untuk selamanya! Bagaimana mukaku tidak akan muram, kalau kota, tempat pekuburan nenek moyangku, telah menjadi reruntuhan dan pintu-pintu gerbangnya habis dimakan api?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And let them judge the people at all seasons: and it shall be, that every great matter they shall bring unto thee, but every small matter they shall judge: so shall it be easier for thyself, and they shall bear the burden with thee.
target: Dan sewaktu-waktu mereka harus mengadili di antara bangsa; maka segala perkara yang besar haruslah dihadapkan mereka kepadamu, tetapi segala perkara yang kecil diadili mereka sendiri; dengan demikian mereka meringankan pekerjaanmu, dan mereka bersama-sama dengan engkau turut menanggungnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if he that cometh preacheth another Jesus, whom we have not preached, or if ye receive another spirit, which ye have not received, or another gospel, which ye have not accepted, ye might well bear with him.
target: Sebab kamu sabar saja, jika ada seorang datang memberitakan Yesus yang lain dari pada yang telah kami beritakan, atau memberikan kepada kamu roh yang lain dari pada yang telah kamu terima atau Injil yang lain dari pada yang telah kamu terima.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the graves were opened; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose,
target: dan kuburan-kuburan terbuka dan banyak orang kudus yang telah meninggal bangkit.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Achish believed David, saying, He hath made his people Israel utterly to abhor him; therefore he shall be my servant for ever.
target: Tetapi Akhis mempercayai Daud, sebab pikirnya: "Tentulah ia telah membuat diri dibenci di antara orang Israel, bangsanya; ia akan menjadi hambaku sampai selamanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For they eat the bread of wickedness, and drink the wine of violence.
target: karena mereka makan roti kefasikan, dan minum anggur kelaliman.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But now is made manifest, and by the scriptures of the prophets, according to the commandment of the everlasting God, made known to all nations for the obedience of faith:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they did all eat, and were filled: and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full.
target: Dan mereka semuanya makan sampai kenyang. Kemudian orang mengumpulkan potongan-potongan roti yang sisa, dua belas bakul penuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thus saith the LORD unto the eunuchs that keep my sabbaths, and choose the things that please me, and take hold of my covenant;
target: Sebab beginilah firman TUHAN: "Kepada orang-orang kebiri yang memelihara hari-hari Sabat-Ku dan yang memilih apa yang Kukehendaki dan yang berpegang kepada perjanjian-Ku,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I was set up from everlasting, from the beginning, or ever the earth was.
target: Sudah pada zaman purbakala aku dibentuk, pada mula pertama, sebelum bumi ada.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Rebekah had a brother, and his name was Laban: and Laban ran out unto the man, unto the well.
target: Ribka mempunyai saudara laki-laki, namanya Laban. Laban berlari ke luar mendapatkan orang itu, ke mata air tadi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Karena perkataan raja dan para pembesarnya itu masuklah permaisuri ke dalam ruang perjamuan; berkatalah ia: "Ya raja, kekallah hidup tuanku! Janganlah pikiran-pikiran tuanku menggelisahkan tuanku dan janganlah menjadi pucat;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The way of man is froward and strange: but as for the pure, his work is right.
target: Berliku-liku jalan si penipu, tetapi orang yang jujur lurus perbuatannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But before all these, they shall lay their hands on you, and persecute you, delivering you up to the synagogues, and into prisons, being brought before kings and rulers for my name's sake.
target: Tetapi sebelum semuanya itu kamu akan ditangkap dan dianiaya; kamu akan diserahkan ke rumah-rumah ibadat dan penjara-penjara, dan kamu akan dihadapkan kepada raja-raja dan penguasa-penguasa oleh karena nama-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore they that were scattered abroad went every where preaching the word.
target: Mereka yang tersebar itu menjelajah seluruh negeri itu sambil memberitakan Injil.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The mighty God, even the LORD, hath spoken, and called the earth from the rising of the sun unto the going down thereof.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then I would know the truth of the fourth beast, which was diverse from all the others, exceeding dreadful, whose teeth were of iron, and his nails of brass; which devoured, brake in pieces, and stamped the residue with his feet;
target: Lalu aku ingin mendapat penjelasan tentang binatang yang keempat itu, yang berbeda dengan segala binatang yang lain, yang sangat menakutkan, dengan gigi besinya dan kuku tembaganya, yang melahap dan meremukkan dan menginjak-injak sisanya dengan kakinya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Tamar went to her brother Amnon's house; and he was laid down. And she took flour, and kneaded it, and made cakes in his sight, and did bake the cakes.
target: Maka Tamar pergi ke rumah Amnon, kakaknya, yang sedang berbaring-baring, lalu anak perempuan itu mengambil adonan, meremasnya dan membuat kue di depan matanya, kemudian dibakarnya kue itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if so be that he find it, verily I say unto you, he rejoiceth more of that sheep, than of the ninety and nine which went not astray.
target: Dan Aku berkata kepadamu: Sesungguhnya jika ia berhasil menemukannya, lebih besar kegembiraannya atas yang seekor itu dari pada atas yang kesembilan puluh sembilan ekor yang tidak sesat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As the fining pot for silver, and the furnace for gold; so is a man to his praise.
target: Kui untuk melebur perak dan perapian untuk melebur emas, dan orang dinilai menurut pujian yang diberikan kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the day of the LORD is near upon all the heathen: as thou hast done, it shall be done unto thee: thy reward shall return upon thine own head.
target: Sebab telah dekat hari TUHAN menimpa segala bangsa. Seperti yang engkau lakukan, demikianlah akan dilakukan kepadamu, perbuatanmu akan kembali menimpa kepalamu sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses brought forth the people out of the camp to meet with God; and they stood at the nether part of the mount.
target: Lalu Musa membawa bangsa itu keluar dari perkemahan untuk menjumpai Allah dan berdirilah mereka pada kaki gunung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when Moses went out unto the tabernacle, that all the people rose up, and stood every man at his tent door, and looked after Moses, until he was gone into the tabernacle.
target: Apabila Musa keluar pergi ke kemah itu, bangunlah seluruh bangsa itu dan berdirilah mereka, masing-masing di pintu kemahnya, dan mereka mengikuti Musa dengan matanya, sampai ia masuk ke dalam kemah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus said unto them, If ye were blind, ye should have no sin: but now ye say, We see; therefore your sin remaineth.
target: Jawab Yesus kepada mereka: "Sekiranya kamu buta, kamu tidak berdosa, tetapi karena kamu berkata: Kami melihat, maka tetaplah dosamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But on the morrow all the congregation of the children of Israel murmured against Moses and against Aaron, saying, Ye have killed the people of the LORD.
target: Tetapi pada keesokan harinya bersungut-sungutlah segenap umat Israel kepada Musa dan Harun, kata mereka: "Kamu telah membunuh umat TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there came also Nicodemus, which at the first came to Jesus by night, and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes, about an hundred pound weight.
target: Juga Nikodemus datang ke situ. Dialah yang mula-mula datang waktu malam kepada Yesus. Ia membawa campuran minyak mur dengan minyak gaharu, kira-kira lima puluh kati beratnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And my master made me swear, saying, Thou shalt not take a wife to my son of the daughters of the Canaanites, in whose land I dwell:
target: Tuanku itu telah mengambil sumpahku: Engkau tidak akan mengambil untuk anakku seorang isteri dari antara perempuan Kanaan, yang negerinya kudiami ini,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the eyes of the blind shall be opened, and the ears of the deaf shall be unstopped.
target: Pada waktu itu mata orang-orang buta akan dicelikkan, dan telinga orang-orang tuli akan dibuka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The oblation that ye shall offer unto the LORD shall be of five and twenty thousand in length, and of ten thousand in breadth.
target: Bagian persembahan khusus yang harus kamu khususkan bagi TUHAN, panjangnya dua puluh lima ribu hasta dan lebarnya dua puluh ribu hasta.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she said unto her, Is it a small matter that thou hast taken my husband? and wouldest thou take away my son's mandrakes also? And Rachel said, Therefore he shall lie with thee to night for thy son's mandrakes.
target: Jawab Lea kepadanya: "Apakah belum cukup bagimu mengambil suamiku? Sekarang pula mau mengambil lagi buah dudaim anakku?" Kata Rahel: "Kalau begitu biarlah ia tidur dengan engkau pada malam ini sebagai ganti buah dudaim anakmu itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he had a son, whose name was Saul, a choice young man, and a goodly: and there was not among the children of Israel a goodlier person than he: from his shoulders and upward he was higher than any of the people.
target: Orang ini ada anaknya laki-laki, namanya Saul, seorang muda yang elok rupanya; tidak ada seorang pun dari antara orang Israel yang lebih elok dari padanya: dari bahu ke atas ia lebih tinggi dari pada setiap orang sebangsanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Gilead is a city of them that work iniquity, and is polluted with blood.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet heard I the voice of his words: and when I heard the voice of his words, then was I in a deep sleep on my face, and my face toward the ground.

input: For he shall have judgment without mercy, that hath shewed no mercy; and mercy rejoiceth against judgment.

input: And the LORD gave Solomon wisdom, as he promised him: and there was peace between Hiram and Solomon; and they two made a league together.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then he said unto me, Lo, I have given thee cow's dung for man's dung, and thou shalt prepare thy bread therewith.
target: Lalu firman-Nya kepadaku: "Lihat, kalau begitu Aku mengizinkan engkau memakai kotoran lembu ganti kotoran manusia dan bakarlah rotimu di atasnya."

input: Whom hast thou reproached and blasphemed? and against whom hast thou exalted thy voice, and lifted up thine eyes on high? even against the Holy One of Israel.

input: The tenth captain for the tenth month was Maharai the Netophathite, of the Zarhites: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
target: Yang kesepuluh untuk bulan yang kesepuluh ialah Maharai, orang Netofa dari orang Zerah itu, dan dalam rombongannya ada dua puluh empat ribu orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When goods increase, they are increased that eat them: and what good is there to the owners thereof, saving the beholding of them with their eyes?
target: Enak tidurnya orang yang bekerja, baik ia makan sedikit maupun banyak; tetapi kekenyangan orang kaya sekali-kali tidak membiarkan dia tidur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the priest shall wave them with the bread of the firstfruits for a wave offering before the LORD, with the two lambs: they shall be holy to the LORD for the priest.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Though the root thereof wax old in the earth, and the stock thereof die in the ground;
target: Apabila akarnya menjadi tua di dalam tanah, dan tunggulnya mati di dalam debu,

input: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops.
target: Karena itu apa yang kamu katakan dalam gelap akan kedengaran dalam terang, dan apa yang kamu bisikkan ke telinga di dalam kamar akan diberitakan dari atas atap rumah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Bukan dari tangannya akan Kuambil seluruh kerajaan itu; Aku akan membiarkan dia tetap menjadi raja seumur hidupnya, oleh karena hamba-Ku Daud yang telah Kupilih dan yang tetap mengikuti segala perintah dan ketetapan-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Elimelech Naomi's husband died; and she was left, and her two sons.
target: Kemudian matilah Elimelekh, suami Naomi, sehingga perempuan itu tertinggal dengan kedua anaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they presented the burnt offering unto him, with the pieces thereof, and the head: and he burnt them upon the altar.
target: Juga diserahkan merekalah kepadanya korban bakaran itu menurut bagian-bagian tertentu beserta dengan kepalanya, lalu dibakarnya di atas mezbah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For as he thinketh in his heart, so is he: Eat and drink, saith he to thee; but his heart is not with thee.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as they came down from the mountain, Jesus charged them, saying, Tell the vision to no man, until the Son of man be risen again from the dead.
target: Pada waktu mereka turun dari gunung itu, Yesus berpesan kepada mereka: "Jangan kamu ceriterakan penglihatan itu kepada seorang pun sebelum Anak Manusia dibangkitkan dari antara orang mati."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But ye shall die like men, and fall like one of the princes.
target: Namun seperti manusia kamu akan mati dan seperti salah seorang pembesar kamu akan tewas."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because there is wrath, beware lest he take thee away with his stroke: then a great ransom cannot deliver thee.
target: janganlah panas hati membujuk engkau berolok-olok, janganlah besarnya tebusan menyesatkan engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Woe unto you, when all men shall speak well of you! for so did their fathers to the false prophets.
target: Celakalah kamu, jika semua orang memuji kamu; karena secara demikian juga nenek moyang mereka telah memperlakukan nabi-nabi palsu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And every man went unto his own house.
target: Lalu mereka pulang, masing-masing ke rumahnya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That the LORD thy God may shew us the way wherein we may walk, and the thing that we may do.
target: Semoga TUHAN, Allahmu, memberitahukan kepada kami jalan yang harus kami tempuh dan apa yang harus kami lakukan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For when ye offer your gifts, when ye make your sons to pass through the fire, ye pollute yourselves with all your idols, even unto this day: and shall I be enquired of by you, O house of Israel? As I live, saith the Lord GOD, I will not be enquired of by you.
target: Dalam membawa persembahan-persembahanmu, yaitu mempersembahkan anak-anakmu sebagai korban dalam api, kamu menajiskan dirimu dengan segala berhala-berhalamu sampai hari ini, apakah Aku masih mau kamu minta petunjuk dari pada-Ku, hai kaum Israel? Demi Aku yang hidup, demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH, Aku tidak mau lagi kamu minta petunjuk dari pada-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God blessed Noah and his sons, and said unto them, Be fruitful, and multiply, and replenish the earth.
target: Lalu Allah memberkati Nuh dan anak-anaknya serta berfirman kepada mereka: "Beranakcuculah dan bertambah banyaklah serta penuhilah bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king made silver to be in Jerusalem as stones, and cedars made he to be as the sycomore trees that are in the vale, for abundance.
target: Raja membuat banyaknya perak di Yerusalem sama seperti batu, dan banyaknya pohon kayu aras sama seperti pohon ara yang tumbuh di Daerah Bukit.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Hezekiah received the letter of the hand of the messengers, and read it: and Hezekiah went up into the house of the LORD, and spread it before the LORD.
target: Hizkia menerima surat itu dari tangan para utusan, lalu membacanya; kemudian pergilah ia ke rumah TUHAN dan membentangkan surat itu di hadapan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then I said, I have laboured in vain, I have spent my strength for nought, and in vain: yet surely my judgment is with the LORD, and my work with my God.
target: Tetapi aku berkata: "Aku telah bersusah-susah dengan percuma, dan telah menghabiskan kekuatanku dengan sia-sia dan tak berguna; namun, hakku terjamin pada TUHAN dan upahku pada Allahku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Barak said unto her, If thou wilt go with me, then I will go: but if thou wilt not go with me, then I will not go.
target: Jawab Barak kepada Debora: "Jika engkau turut maju aku pun maju, tetapi jika engkau tidak turut maju aku pun tidak maju."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
