target: Hati-hatilah, supaya jangan engkau mempersembahkan korban-korban bakaranmu di sembarang tempat yang kaulihat;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: Whosoever he be that doth rebel against thy commandment, and will not hearken unto thy words in all that thou commandest him, he shall be put to death: only be strong and of a good courage.

input: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God: but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: And Jacob their father said unto them, Me have ye bereaved of my children: Joseph is not, and Simeon is not, and ye will take Benjamin away: all these things are against me.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To do justice and judgment is more acceptable to the LORD than sacrifice.

input: And Paul, as his manner was, went in unto them, and three sabbath days reasoned with them out of the scriptures,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they took their daughters to be their wives, and gave their daughters to their sons, and served their gods.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jehoiakim gave the silver and the gold to Pharaoh; but he taxed the land to give the money according to the commandment of Pharaoh: he exacted the silver and the gold of the people of the land, of every one according to his taxation, to give it unto Pharaohnechoh.
target: Yoyakim memberi emas dan perak itu kepada Firaun, tetapi ia menarik pajak dari negeri supaya dapat memberi uang itu, sesuai dengan titah Firaun. Ia menagih emas dan perak itu dari rakyat negeri, dari setiap orang menurut jumlah ketetapan pajaknya, untuk memberikannya kepada Firaun Nekho.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Salah lived thirty years, and begat Eber:

input: And the Philistines put themselves in array against Israel: and when they joined battle, Israel was smitten before the Philistines: and they slew of the army in the field about four thousand men.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: The LORD hath done that which he had devised; he hath fulfilled his word that he had commanded in the days of old: he hath thrown down, and hath not pitied: and he hath caused thine enemy to rejoice over thee, he hath set up the horn of thine adversaries.
target: TUHAN telah menjalankan yang dirancangkan-Nya, Ia melaksanakan yang difirmankan-Nya, yang diperintahkan-Nya dahulu kala; Ia merusak tanpa belas kasihan, Ia menjadikan si seteru senang atas kamu, Ia meninggikan tanduk lawan-lawanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Nevertheless man being in honour abideth not: he is like the beasts that perish.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if the owner thereof be with it, he shall not make it good: if it be an hired thing, it came for his hire.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither is there any daysman betwixt us, that might lay his hand upon us both.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: After many days thou shalt be visited: in the latter years thou shalt come into the land that is brought back from the sword, and is gathered out of many people, against the mountains of Israel, which have been always waste: but it is brought forth out of the nations, and they shall dwell safely all of them.
target: Sesudah waktu yang lama sekali engkau akan mendapat perintah; pada hari yang terkemudian engkau akan datang di sebuah negeri yang dibangun kembali sesudah musnah karena perang, dan engkau menuju suatu bangsa yang dikumpul dari tengah-tengah banyak bangsa di atas gunung-gunung Israel yang telah lama menjadi reruntuhan. Bangsa ini telah dibawa ke luar dari tengah bangsa-bangsa dan mereka semuanya diam dengan aman tenteram.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And said unto them, Ye men of Israel, take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men.

input: Even such as he is able to get, the one for a sin offering, and the other for a burnt offering, with the meat offering: and the priest shall make an atonement for him that is to be cleansed before the LORD.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: And when he numbered them in Bezek, the children of Israel were three hundred thousand, and the men of Judah thirty thousand.

input: Speak unto Aaron, and to his sons, and unto all the children of Israel, and say unto them, Whatsoever he be of the house of Israel, or of the strangers in Israel, that will offer his oblation for all his vows, and for all his freewill offerings, which they will offer unto the LORD for a burnt offering;
target: "Berbicaralah kepada Harun serta anak-anaknya dan kepada semua orang Israel dan katakan kepada mereka: Siapa pun dari umat Israel dan dari orang asing di antara orang Israel yang mempersembahkan persembahannya, baik berupa sesuatu persembahan nazar maupun berupa sesuatu persembahan sukarela, yang hendak dipersembahkan mereka kepada TUHAN sebagai korban bakaran,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Upon my right hand rise the youth; they push away my feet, and they raise up against me the ways of their destruction.
target: Di sebelah kananku muncul gerombolan, dikaitnya kakiku, dan dirintisnya jalan kebinasaan terhadap aku;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the invisible things of him from the creation of the world are clearly seen, being understood by the things that are made, even his eternal power and Godhead; so that they are without excuse:
target: Sebab apa yang tidak nampak dari pada-Nya, yaitu kekuatan-Nya yang kekal dan keilahian-Nya, dapat nampak kepada pikiran dari karya-Nya sejak dunia diciptakan, sehingga mereka tidak dapat berdalih.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hadid, Zeboim, Neballat,
target: di Hadid, Zeboim dan Nebalat,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My heart is toward the governors of Israel, that offered themselves willingly among the people. Bless ye the LORD.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall come to pass in that day, that the prophets shall be ashamed every one of his vision, when he hath prophesied; neither shall they wear a rough garment to deceive:
target: Pada waktu itu para nabi masing-masing akan mendapat malu oleh karena penglihatannya sebagai nabi, dan tidak ada lagi dari mereka yang mengenakan jubah berbulu untuk berbohong;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the punishment of the iniquity of the daughter of my people is greater than the punishment of the sin of Sodom, that was overthrown as in a moment, and no hands stayed on her.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Even the weight for the candlesticks of gold, and for their lamps of gold, by weight for every candlestick, and for the lamps thereof: and for the candlesticks of silver by weight, both for the candlestick, and also for the lamps thereof, according to the use of every candlestick.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He hoped also that money should have been given him of Paul, that he might loose him: wherefore he sent for him the oftener, and communed with him.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For this cause the people also met him, for that they heard that he had done this miracle.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Fury is not in me: who would set the briers and thorns against me in battle? I would go through them, I would burn them together.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the servants and officers stood there, who had made a fire of coals; for it was cold: and they warmed themselves: and Peter stood with them, and warmed himself.
target: Sementara itu hamba-hamba dan penjaga-penjaga Bait Allah telah memasang api arang, sebab hawa dingin waktu itu, dan mereka berdiri berdiang di situ. Juga Petrus berdiri berdiang bersama-sama dengan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Musa:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the channels of the sea appeared, the foundations of the world were discovered, at the rebuking of the LORD, at the blast of the breath of his nostrils.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: menyisihlah dari jalan dan ambillah jalan lain, janganlah susahi kami dengan Yang Mahakudus, Allah Israel."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Tetapi apabila orang itu tidak ada kaumnya, kepada siapa dapat dibayar tebusan salah itu, maka tebusan salah yang harus dibayar itu menjadi kepunyaan TUHAN, dan adalah bagian imam, belum terhitung domba jantan pendamaian yang dipakai untuk mengadakan pendamaian bagi orang itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he went after the man of Israel into the tent, and thrust both of them through, the man of Israel, and the woman through her belly. So the plague was stayed from the children of Israel.
target: mengejar orang Israel itu sampai ke ruang tengah, dan menikam mereka berdua, yakni orang Israel dan perempuan itu, pada perutnya. Maka berhentilah tulah itu menimpa orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And after he had spent some time there, he departed, and went over all the country of Galatia and Phrygia in order, strengthening all the disciples.
target: Setelah beberapa hari lamanya ia tinggal di situ, ia berangkat pula, lalu menjelajahi seluruh tanah Galatia dan Frigia untuk meneguhkan hati semua murid.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the LORD shall judge his people, and repent himself for his servants, when he seeth that their power is gone, and there is none shut up, or left.
target: Sebab TUHAN akan memberi keadilan kepada umat-Nya, dan akan merasa sayang kepada hamba-hamba-Nya; apabila dilihat-Nya, bahwa kekuatan mereka sudah lenyap, dan baik hamba maupun orang merdeka sudah tiada.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Believest thou not that I am in the Father, and the Father in me? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself: but the Father that dwelleth in me, he doeth the works.
target: Tidak percayakah engkau, bahwa Aku di dalam Bapa dan Bapa di dalam Aku? Apa yang Aku katakan kepadamu, tidak Aku katakan dari diri-Ku sendiri, tetapi Bapa, yang diam di dalam Aku, Dialah yang melakukan pekerjaan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I thank God, whom I serve from my forefathers with pure conscience, that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in my prayers night and day;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there shall be no leavened bread seen with thee in all thy coast seven days; neither shall there any thing of the flesh, which thou sacrificedst the first day at even, remain all night until the morning.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For when we were yet without strength, in due time Christ died for the ungodly.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The king's wrath is as the roaring of a lion; but his favour is as dew upon the grass.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: "Apabila di tengah-tengahmu di salah satu tempatmu yang diberikan kepadamu oleh TUHAN, Allahmu, ada terdapat seorang laki-laki atau perempuan yang melakukan apa yang jahat di mata TUHAN, Allahmu, dengan melangkahi perjanjian-Nya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And said, Whose daughter art thou? tell me, I pray thee: is there room in thy father's house for us to lodge in?

input: Now the rest of the acts of Ahaz which he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For they that say such things declare plainly that they seek a country.
target: Sebab mereka yang berkata demikian menyatakan, bahwa mereka dengan rindu mencari suatu tanah air.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jehoshaphat the king of Judah returned to his house in peace to Jerusalem.
target: Yosafat, raja Yehuda, pulang dengan selamat ke istananya di Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Ia diusir dari tempat terang ke dalam kegelapan, dan ia dienyahkan dari dunia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And this is the number of the mighty men whom David had; Jashobeam, an Hachmonite, the chief of the captains: he lifted up his spear against three hundred slain by him at one time.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold my hands and my feet, that it is I myself: handle me, and see; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have.
target: Lihatlah tangan-Ku dan kaki-Ku: Aku sendirilah ini; rabalah Aku dan lihatlah, karena hantu tidak ada daging dan tulangnya, seperti yang kamu lihat ada pada-Ku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore they say unto God, Depart from us; for we desire not the knowledge of thy ways.
target: Tetapi kata mereka kepada Allah: Pergilah dari kami! Kami tidak suka mengetahui jalan-jalan-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And from under these chambers was the entry on the east side, as one goeth into them from the utter court.

input: A wound and dishonour shall he get; and his reproach shall not be wiped away.

input: And they brought up the ark, and the tabernacle of the congregation, and all the holy vessels that were in the tabernacle, these did the priests and the Levites bring up.
target: Mereka mengangkut tabut itu dan Kemah Pertemuan dan segala barang kudus yang ada dalam kemah itu; semuanya itu diangkut oleh imam-imam dan orang-orang Lewi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore hidest thou thy face, and forgettest our affliction and our oppression?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: The princes of Judah, and the princes of Jerusalem, the eunuchs, and the priests, and all the people of the land, which passed between the parts of the calf;
target: pemuka-pemuka Yehuda, pemuka-pemuka Yerusalem, pegawai-pegawai istana, imam-imam dan segenap rakyat negeri yang telah berjalan di antara belahan-belahan anak lembu jantan itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The just man walketh in his integrity: his children are blessed after him.
target: Orang benar yang bersih kelakuannya — berbahagialah keturunannya.

input: And while the flesh was yet between their teeth, ere it was chewed, the wrath of the LORD was kindled against the people, and the LORD smote the people with a very great plague.

input: Now the rest of the acts of Manasseh, and all that he did, and his sin that he sinned, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
target: Selebihnya dari riwayat Manasye, segala yang dilakukannya dan dosa-dosa yang diperbuatnya, bukankah semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Yehuda?

input: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees, when the kingdom of God should come, he answered them and said, The kingdom of God cometh not with observation:
target: Atas pertanyaan orang-orang Farisi, apabila Kerajaan Allah akan datang, Yesus menjawab, kata-Nya: "Kerajaan Allah datang tanpa tanda-tanda lahiriah,

input: And he said unto him, Lord, I am ready to go with thee, both into prison, and to death.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And send them to the king of Edom, and to the king of Moab, and to the king of the Ammonites, and to the king of Tyrus, and to the king of Zidon, by the hand of the messengers which come to Jerusalem unto Zedekiah king of Judah;
target: Kemudian kirimlah pesan kepada raja Edom, kepada raja Moab, kepada raja bani Amon, kepada raja Tirus dan kepada raja Sidon, dengan perantaraan utusan-utusan yang telah datang ke Yerusalem menghadap Zedekia, raja Yehuda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They meet with darkness in the day time, and grope in the noonday as in the night.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD sent Jerubbaal, and Bedan, and Jephthah, and Samuel, and delivered you out of the hand of your enemies on every side, and ye dwelled safe.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, Consider ye, and call for the mourning women, that they may come; and send for cunning women, that they may come:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Jada the brother of Shammai; Jether, and Jonathan: and Jether died without children.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sons of Amram; Aaron and Moses: and Aaron was separated, that he should sanctify the most holy things, he and his sons for ever, to burn incense before the LORD, to minister unto him, and to bless in his name for ever.
target: Anak-anak Amram ialah Harun dan Musa; Harun ditunjuk untuk mengurus apa yang maha kudus, dia dan keturunannya, sampai selama-lamanya, untuk membakar korban di hadapan TUHAN, untuk melayani Dia dan untuk memberi berkat demi nama-Nya, sampai selama-lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That he may establish thee to day for a people unto himself, and that he may be unto thee a God, as he hath said unto thee, and as he hath sworn unto thy fathers, to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: And these things hast thou hid in thine heart: I know that this is with thee.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the inhabitants of Jerusalem made Ahaziah his youngest son king in his stead: for the band of men that came with the Arabians to the camp had slain all the eldest. So Ahaziah the son of Jehoram king of Judah reigned.
target: Lalu penduduk Yerusalem mengangkat Ahazia, anaknya yang bungsu, menjadi raja menggantikan dia, karena semua anaknya yang lebih tua umurnya telah dibunuh oleh gerombolan yang datang ke tempat perkemahan bersama-sama orang-orang Arab. Dengan demikian Ahazia, anak Yoram raja Yehuda, menjadi raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord, and he shall lift you up.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Cainan lived after he begat Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begat sons and daughters:
target: Dan Kenan masih hidup delapan ratus empat puluh tahun, setelah ia memperanakkan Mahalaleel, dan ia memperanakkan anak-anak lelaki dan perempuan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Take heed in the plague of leprosy, that thou observe diligently, and do according to all that the priests the Levites shall teach you: as I commanded them, so ye shall observe to do.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joram turned his hands, and fled, and said to Ahaziah, There is treachery, O Ahaziah.
target: Segera Yoram berputar dan mau melarikan diri sambil berseru kepada Ahazia: "Itu tipu, Ahazia!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Saul disguised himself, and put on other raiment, and he went, and two men with him, and they came to the woman by night: and he said, I pray thee, divine unto me by the familiar spirit, and bring me him up, whom I shall name unto thee.
target: Lalu menyamarlah Saul, ia mengenakan pakaian lain dan pergilah ia dengan dua orang. Ketika mereka pada waktu malam sampai kepada perempuan itu, berkatalah Saul: "Cobalah engkau menenung bagiku dengan perantaraan arwah, dan panggillah supaya muncul kepadaku orang yang akan kusebut kepadamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all Israel heard say that Saul had smitten a garrison of the Philistines, and that Israel also was had in abomination with the Philistines. And the people were called together after Saul to Gilgal.
target: Demikianlah seluruh orang Israel mendengar kabar, bahwa Saul telah memukul kalah pasukan pendudukan orang Filistin dan dengan demikian orang Israel dibenci oleh orang Filistin. Kemudian dikerahkanlah rakyat itu untuk mengikuti Saul ke Gilgal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses returned unto the LORD, and said, LORD, wherefore hast thou so evil entreated this people? why is it that thou hast sent me?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then they came near, and spake before the king concerning the king's decree; Hast thou not signed a decree, that every man that shall ask a petition of any God or man within thirty days, save of thee, O king, shall be cast into the den of lions? The king answered and said, The thing is true, according to the law of the Medes and Persians, which altereth not.
target: Lalu orang-orang itu bergegas-gegas masuk dan mendapati Daniel sedang berdoa dan bermohon kepada Allahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as he said these things unto them, the scribes and the Pharisees began to urge him vehemently, and to provoke him to speak of many things:
target: Dan setelah Yesus berangkat dari tempat itu, ahli-ahli Taurat dan orang-orang Farisi terus-menerus mengintai dan membanjiri-Nya dengan rupa-rupa soal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I set my tabernacle among you: and my soul shall not abhor you.
target: Aku akan menempatkan Kemah Suci-Ku di tengah-tengahmu dan hati-Ku tidak akan muak melihat kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And beheld among the simple ones, I discerned among the youths, a young man void of understanding,
target: kulihat di antara yang tak berpengalaman, kudapati di antara anak-anak muda seorang teruna yang tidak berakal budi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And shewing mercy unto thousands of them that love me, and keep my commandments.
target: tetapi Aku menunjukkan kasih setia kepada beribu-ribu orang, yaitu mereka yang mengasihi Aku dan yang berpegang pada perintah-perintah-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt yet plant vines upon the mountains of Samaria: the planters shall plant, and shall eat them as common things.
target: Engkau akan membuat kebun anggur kembali di gunung-gunung Samaria; ya, orang-orang yang membuatnya akan memetik hasilnya pula.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Keep the sabbath day to sanctify it, as the LORD thy God hath commanded thee.
target: Tetaplah ingat dan kuduskanlah hari Sabat, seperti yang diperintahkan kepadamu oleh TUHAN, Allahmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD; If my covenant be not with day and night, and if I have not appointed the ordinances of heaven and earth;
target: Beginilah firman TUHAN: Jika Aku tidak menetapkan perjanjian-Ku dengan siang dan malam dan aturan langit dan bumi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And many nations shall pass by this city, and they shall say every man to his neighbour, Wherefore hath the LORD done thus unto this great city?
target: Dan apabila banyak bangsa melewati kota ini, maka mereka akan berkata seorang kepada yang lain: Mengapakah TUHAN melakukan seperti itu kepada kota yang besar ini?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A lion which is strongest among beasts, and turneth not away for any;
target: singa, yang terkuat di antara binatang, yang tidak mundur terhadap apa pun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in the twentieth year of Jeroboam king of Israel reigned Asa over Judah.
target: Dalam tahun kedua puluh zaman Yerobeam, raja Israel, Asa menjadi raja atas Yehuda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For then shalt thou lift up thy face without spot; yea, thou shalt be stedfast, and shalt not fear:
target: maka sesungguhnya, engkau dapat mengangkat mukamu tanpa cela, dan engkau akan berdiri teguh dan tidak akan takut,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To him that is afflicted pity should be shewed from his friend; but he forsaketh the fear of the Almighty.
target: Siapa menahan kasih sayang terhadap sesamanya, melalaikan takut akan Yang Mahakuasa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have heard many such things: miserable comforters are ye all.
target: "Hal seperti itu telah acap kali kudengar. Penghibur sialan kamu semua!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the LORD.
target: Singa-singa muda merana kelaparan, tetapi orang-orang yang mencari TUHAN, tidak kekurangan sesuatu pun yang baik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And a certain woman, which had an issue of blood twelve years,
target: Adalah di situ seorang perempuan yang sudah dua belas tahun lamanya menderita pendarahan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Exalt the LORD our God, and worship at his holy hill; for the LORD our God is holy.
target: Tinggikanlah TUHAN, Allah kita, dan sujudlah menyembah di hadapan gunung-Nya yang kudus! Sebab kuduslah TUHAN, Allah kita!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When thou shalt vow a vow unto the LORD thy God, thou shalt not slack to pay it: for the LORD thy God will surely require it of thee; and it would be sin in thee.
target: "Apabila engkau bernazar kepada TUHAN, Allahmu, janganlah engkau menunda-nunda memenuhinya, sebab tentulah TUHAN, Allahmu, akan menuntutnya dari padamu, sehingga hal itu menjadi dosa bagimu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Rejoice not when thine enemy falleth, and let not thine heart be glad when he stumbleth:
target: Jangan bersukacita kalau musuhmu jatuh, jangan hatimu beria-ria kalau ia terperosok,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And immediately he received his sight, and followed him, glorifying God: and all the people, when they saw it, gave praise unto God.
target: Dan seketika itu juga melihatlah ia, lalu mengikuti Dia sambil memuliakan Allah. Seluruh rakyat melihat hal itu dan memuji-muji Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt make a mercy seat of pure gold: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof.
target: Juga engkau harus membuat tutup pendamaian dari emas murni, dua setengah hasta panjangnya dan satu setengah hasta lebarnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For so it was, that the children of Israel had sinned against the LORD their God, which had brought them up out of the land of Egypt, from under the hand of Pharaoh king of Egypt, and had feared other gods,
target: Hal itu terjadi, karena orang Israel telah berdosa kepada TUHAN, Allah mereka, yang telah menuntun mereka dari tanah Mesir dari kekuasaan Firaun, raja Mesir, dan karena mereka telah menyembah allah lain,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Arise, O LORD, into thy rest; thou, and the ark of thy strength.
target: Bangunlah, ya TUHAN, dan pergilah ke tempat perhentian-Mu, Engkau serta tabut kekuatan-Mu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time, and in the world to come life everlasting.
target: akan menerima kembali lipat ganda pada masa ini juga, dan pada zaman yang akan datang ia akan menerima hidup yang kekal."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they thirsted not when he led them through the deserts: he caused the waters to flow out of the rock for them: he clave the rock also, and the waters gushed out.
target: Mereka tidak menderita haus, ketika Ia memimpin mereka melalui tempat-tempat yang tandus; Ia mengeluarkan air dari gunung batu bagi mereka; Ia membelah gunung batu, maka memancarlah air.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Is not this thy fear, thy confidence, thy hope, and the uprightness of thy ways?
target: Bukankah takutmu akan Allah yang menjadi sandaranmu, dan kesalehan hidupmu menjadi pengharapanmu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard carried away captive certain of the poor of the people, and the residue of the people that remained in the city, and those that fell away, that fell to the king of Babylon, and the rest of the multitude.
target: Sebagian dari orang-orang yang paling lemah dan sisa-sisa rakyat yang masih tinggal di kota itu dan pembelot-pembelot yang menyeberang ke pihak raja Babel dan sisa-sisa para pekerja tangan diangkut ke dalam pembuangan oleh Nebuzaradan, kepala pasukan pengawal itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thus saith the Lord GOD; How much more when I send my four sore judgments upon Jerusalem, the sword, and the famine, and the noisome beast, and the pestilence, to cut off from it man and beast?
target: Ya, beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Jauh lebih dari itu, kalau Aku mendatangkan keempat hukuman-Ku yang berat-berat, yaitu pedang, kelaparan, binatang buas dan sampar, atas Yerusalem untuk melenyapkan dari padanya manusia dan binatang!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Elijah took his mantle, and wrapped it together, and smote the waters, and they were divided hither and thither, so that they two went over on dry ground.
target: Lalu Elia mengambil jubahnya, digulungnya, dipukulkannya ke atas air itu, maka terbagilah air itu ke sebelah sini dan ke sebelah sana, sehingga menyeberanglah keduanya dengan berjalan di tanah yang kering.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD is righteous; for I have rebelled against his commandment: hear, I pray you, all people, and behold my sorrow: my virgins and my young men are gone into captivity.
target: "TUHANlah yang benar, karena aku telah memberontak terhadap firman-Nya; dengarlah hai segala bangsa, dan lihatlah kesedihanku; dara-daraku dan teruna-terunaku pergi sebagai tawanan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.
target: Karena itu marilah kita menghadap Allah dengan hati yang tulus ikhlas dan keyakinan iman yang teguh, oleh karena hati kita telah dibersihkan dari hati nurani yang jahat dan tubuh kita telah dibasuh dengan air yang murni.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also in the day of your gladness, and in your solemn days, and in the beginnings of your months, ye shall blow with the trumpets over your burnt offerings, and over the sacrifices of your peace offerings; that they may be to you for a memorial before your God: I am the LORD your God.
target: Juga pada hari-hari kamu bersukaria, pada perayaan-perayaanmu dan pada bulan-bulan barumu haruslah kamu meniup nafiri itu pada waktu mempersembahkan korban-korban bakaranmu dan korban-korban keselamatanmu; maksudnya supaya kamu diingat di hadapan Allahmu; Akulah TUHAN, Allahmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Receive my instruction, and not silver; and knowledge rather than choice gold.
target: Terimalah didikanku, lebih dari pada perak, dan pengetahuan lebih dari pada emas pilihan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If so be that being clothed we shall not be found naked.
target: sebab dengan demikian kita berpakaian dan tidak kedapatan telanjang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, when we come into the land, thou shalt bind this line of scarlet thread in the window which thou didst let us down by: and thou shalt bring thy father, and thy mother, and thy brethren, and all thy father's household, home unto thee.
target: sesungguhnya, apabila kami memasuki negeri ini, haruslah tali dari benang kirmizi ini kauikatkan pada jendela tempat engkau menurunkan kami, dan ayahmu serta ibumu, saudara-saudaramu serta seluruh kaum keluargamu kaukumpulkan di rumahmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore let him that speaketh in an unknown tongue pray that he may interpret.
target: Karena itu siapa yang berkata-kata dengan bahasa roh, ia harus berdoa, supaya kepadanya diberikan juga karunia untuk menafsirkannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha, which is, being interpreted, The place of a skull.
target: Mereka membawa Yesus ke tempat yang bernama Golgota, yang berarti: Tempat Tengkorak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Mine heart within me is broken because of the prophets; all my bones shake; I am like a drunken man, and like a man whom wine hath overcome, because of the LORD, and because of the words of his holiness.
target: Mengenai nabi-nabi. Hatiku hancur dalam dadaku, segala tulangku goyah. Keadaanku seperti orang mabuk, seperti laki-laki yang terlalu banyak minum anggur, oleh karena TUHAN dan oleh karena firman-Nya yang kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And though they found no cause of death in him, yet desired they Pilate that he should be slain.
target: Dan meskipun mereka tidak menemukan sesuatu yang dapat menjadi alasan untuk hukuman mati itu, namun mereka telah meminta kepada Pilatus supaya Ia dibunuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they left all the commandments of the LORD their God, and made them molten images, even two calves, and made a grove, and worshipped all the host of heaven, and served Baal.
target: Mereka telah meninggalkan segala perintah TUHAN, Allah mereka, dan telah membuat dua anak lembu tuangan; juga mereka membuat patung Asyera, sujud menyembah kepada segenap tentara langit dan beribadah kepada Baal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The lot causeth contentions to cease, and parteth between the mighty.
target: Undian mengakhiri pertengkaran, dan menyelesaikan persoalan antara orang-orang berkuasa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My heart is sore pained within me: and the terrors of death are fallen upon me.
target: karena teriakan musuh, karena aniaya orang fasik; sebab mereka menimpakan kemalangan kepadaku, dan dengan geramnya mereka memusuhi aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he will take your fields, and your vineyards, and your oliveyards, even the best of them, and give them to his servants.
target: Selanjutnya dari ladangmu, kebun anggurmu dan kebun zaitunmu akan diambilnya yang paling baik dan akan diberikannya kepada pegawai-pegawainya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now after this it came to pass, that David smote the Philistines, and subdued them, and took Gath and her towns out of the hand of the Philistines.
target: Sesudah itu Daud memukul kalah orang Filistin dan menundukkan mereka; lalu ia merebut Gat dan segala anak kotanya dari tangan orang Filistin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He shall enter peaceably even upon the fattest places of the province; and he shall do that which his fathers have not done, nor his fathers' fathers; he shall scatter among them the prey, and spoil, and riches: yea, and he shall forecast his devices against the strong holds, even for a time.
target: Dengan tak disangka-sangka ia akan memasuki daerah-daerah yang paling subur dari negeri itu, dan melakukan apa yang belum pernah dilakukan oleh para bapa dan nenek moyangnya, yakni menghamburkan rampasan dan jarahan dan harta di antara orang-orangnya; juga terhadap tempat-tempat yang berbenteng ia membuat siasat, tetapi hanya untuk sementara waktu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if I have boasted any thing to him of you, I am not ashamed; but as we spake all things to you in truth, even so our boasting, which I made before Titus, is found a truth.
target: Aku memegahkan kamu kepadanya, dan kamu tidak mengecewakan aku. Kami senantiasa mengatakan apa yang benar kepada kamu, demikian juga kemegahan kami di hadapan Titus sudah ternyata benar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the priest shall make an atonement for all the congregation of the children of Israel, and it shall be forgiven them; for it is ignorance: and they shall bring their offering, a sacrifice made by fire unto the LORD, and their sin offering before the LORD, for their ignorance:
target: Maka haruslah imam mengadakan pendamaian bagi segenap umat Israel, sehingga mereka beroleh pengampunan, sebab hal itu terjadi tidak dengan sengaja, dan karena mereka telah membawa persembahan-persembahan mereka sebagai korban api-apian bagi TUHAN, juga korban penghapus dosa mereka di hadapan TUHAN, karena hal yang tidak disengaja itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Rizpah the daughter of Aiah took sackcloth, and spread it for her upon the rock, from the beginning of harvest until water dropped upon them out of heaven, and suffered neither the birds of the air to rest on them by day, nor the beasts of the field by night.
target: Lalu Rizpa binti Aya mengambil kain karung, dan membentangkannya bagi dirinya di atas gunung batu, dari permulaan musim menuai sampai tercurah air dari langit ke atas mayat mereka; ia tidak membiarkan burung-burung di udara mendatangi mayat mereka pada siang hari, ataupun binatang-binatang di hutan pada malam hari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye hypocrites, ye can discern the face of the sky and of the earth; but how is it that ye do not discern this time?
target: Hai orang-orang munafik, rupa bumi dan langit kamu tahu menilainya, mengapakah kamu tidak dapat menilai zaman ini?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the prophet took up the carcase of the man of God, and laid it upon the ass, and brought it back: and the old prophet came to the city, to mourn and to bury him.
target: Nabi tua itu mengangkat mayat abdi Allah itu, menaruhnya ke atas keledai dan membawanya kembali ke kotanya sendiri untuk diratapi dan dikuburkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Look unto me, and be ye saved, all the ends of the earth: for I am God, and there is none else.
target: Berpalinglah kepada-Ku dan biarkanlah dirimu diselamatkan, hai ujung-ujung bumi! Sebab Akulah Allah dan tidak ada yang lain.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It is a night to be much observed unto the LORD for bringing them out from the land of Egypt: this is that night of the LORD to be observed of all the children of Israel in their generations.
target: Malam itulah malam berjaga-jaga bagi TUHAN, untuk membawa mereka keluar dari tanah Mesir. Dan itulah juga malam berjaga-jaga bagi semua orang Israel, turun-temurun, untuk kemuliaan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the LORD was with Joshua; and his fame was noised throughout all the country.
target: Dan TUHAN menyertai Yosua dan terdengarlah kabar tentang dia di seluruh negeri itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who is left among you that saw this house in her first glory? and how do ye see it now? is it not in your eyes in comparison of it as nothing?
target: "Katakanlah kepada Zerubabel bin Sealtiel, bupati Yehuda, dan kepada Yosua bin Yozadak, imam besar, dan kepada selebihnya dari bangsa itu, demikian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there stood up one of them named Agabus, and signified by the Spirit that there should be great dearth throughout all the world: which came to pass in the days of Claudius Caesar.
target: Seorang dari mereka yang bernama Agabus bangkit dan oleh kuasa Roh ia mengatakan, bahwa seluruh dunia akan ditimpa bahaya kelaparan yang besar. Hal itu terjadi juga pada zaman Klaudius.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will walk before the LORD in the land of the living.
target: Aku boleh berjalan di hadapan TUHAN, di negeri orang-orang hidup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye shall keep it up until the fourteenth day of the same month: and the whole assembly of the congregation of Israel shall kill it in the evening.
target: Kamu harus mengurungnya sampai hari yang keempat belas bulan ini; lalu seluruh jemaah Israel yang berkumpul, harus menyembelihnya pada waktu senja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He hath made the earth by his power, he hath established the world by his wisdom, and hath stretched out the heavens by his discretion.
target: TUHANlah yang menjadikan bumi dengan kekuatan-Nya, yang menegakkan dunia dengan kebijaksanaan-Nya, dan yang membentangkan langit dengan akal budi-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the LORD answered Job out of the whirlwind, and said,
target: Maka dari dalam badai TUHAN menjawab Ayub:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So I returned, and considered all the oppressions that are done under the sun: and behold the tears of such as were oppressed, and they had no comforter; and on the side of their oppressors there was power; but they had no comforter.
target: Lagi aku melihat segala penindasan yang terjadi di bawah matahari, dan lihatlah, air mata orang-orang yang ditindas dan tak ada yang menghibur mereka, karena di fihak orang-orang yang menindas ada kekuasaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces, took all the remnant of Judah, that were returned from all nations, whither they had been driven, to dwell in the land of Judah;
target: Lalu Yohanan bin Kareah dan semua perwira tentara itu mengumpulkan seluruh sisa Yehuda, yakni semua orang yang telah kembali dari antara segala bangsa, ke mana mereka telah berserak-serak, untuk menetap di tanah Yehuda,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And then he built chambers against all the house, five cubits high: and they rested on the house with timber of cedar.
target: Dan setelah ia mendirikan kamar tambahan itu pada rumah itu sekeliling, yakni setiap tingkat lima hasta tingginya, maka rumah itu ditutupinya dengan kayu aras.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Speak unto the children of Israel, and say unto them, When either man or woman shall separate themselves to vow a vow of a Nazarite, to separate themselves unto the LORD:
target: "Berbicaralah kepada orang Israel dan katakanlah kepada mereka: Apabila seseorang, laki-laki atau perempuan, mengucapkan nazar khusus, yakni nazar orang nazir, untuk mengkhususkan dirinya bagi TUHAN,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who bare record of the word of God, and of the testimony of Jesus Christ, and of all things that he saw.
target: Yohanes telah bersaksi tentang firman Allah dan tentang kesaksian yang diberikan oleh Yesus Kristus, yaitu segala sesuatu yang telah dilihatnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then spake the priests and the prophets unto the princes and to all the people, saying, This man is worthy to die; for he hath prophesied against this city, as ye have heard with your ears.
target: Kemudian berkatalah para imam dan para nabi itu kepada para pemuka dan kepada seluruh rakyat itu, katanya: "Orang ini patut mendapat hukuman mati, sebab ia telah bernubuat tentang kota ini, seperti yang kamu dengar dengan telingamu sendiri."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If ye had known me, ye should have known my Father also: and from henceforth ye know him, and have seen him.
target: Sekiranya kamu mengenal Aku, pasti kamu juga mengenal Bapa-Ku. Sekarang ini kamu mengenal Dia dan kamu telah melihat Dia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I have given you a land for which ye did not labour, and cities which ye built not, and ye dwell in them; of the vineyards and oliveyards which ye planted not do ye eat.
target: Demikianlah Kuberikan kepadamu negeri yang kamu peroleh tanpa bersusah-susah dan kota-kota yang tidak kamu dirikan, tetapi kamulah yang diam di dalamnya; juga kebun-kebun anggur dan kebun-kebun zaitun yang tidak kamu tanami, kamulah yang makan hasilnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: His troops come together, and raise up their way against me, and encamp round about my tabernacle.
target: Pasukan-Nya maju serentak, mereka merintangi jalan melawan aku, lalu mengepung kemahku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the priest shall bring her near, and set her before the LORD:
target: Maka haruslah imam menyuruh perempuan itu mendekat dan menghadapkannya kepada TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet he shall perish for ever like his own dung: they which have seen him shall say, Where is he?
target: namun seperti tahinya ia akan binasa untuk selama-lamanya; siapa yang pernah melihatnya, bertanya: Di mana dia?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Parmashta, and Arisai, and Aridai, and Vajezatha,
target: Parmasta, Arisai, Aridai dan Waizata,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the priest shall command that they take away the stones in which the plague is, and they shall cast them into an unclean place without the city:
target: maka imam harus memerintahkan supaya orang mengungkit batu-batu yang kena tanda itu dan membuangnya ke luar kota ke suatu tempat yang najis.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will hiss for them, and gather them; for I have redeemed them: and they shall increase as they have increased.
target: Aku akan bersiul memanggil mereka dan Aku akan mengumpulkan mereka, sebab Aku sudah membebaskan mereka, dan jumlah mereka menjadi banyak seperti dahulu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the king sent Jehudi to fetch the roll: and he took it out of Elishama the scribe's chamber. And Jehudi read it in the ears of the king, and in the ears of all the princes which stood beside the king.
target: Raja menyuruh Yehudi mengambil gulungan itu, lalu ia mengambilnya dari kamar panitera Elisama itu. Yehudi membacakannya kepada raja dan semua pemuka yang berdiri dekat raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he cut the ram into pieces; and Moses burnt the head, and the pieces, and the fat.
target: Domba itu dipotong-potong menurut bagian-bagian tertentu, lalu Musa membakar kepalanya dan bagian-bagiannya dan lemaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now we, brethren, as Isaac was, are the children of promise.
target: Dan kamu, saudara-saudara, kamu sama seperti Ishak adalah anak-anak janji.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he made bars of shittim wood; five for the boards of the one side of the tabernacle,
target: Dibuatlah juga kayu lintang dari kayu penaga: lima untuk papan-papan pada sisi yang satu dari Kemah Suci,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Seven days thou shalt eat unleavened bread, and in the seventh day shall be a feast to the LORD.
target: Makanlah roti yang tidak beragi tujuh hari lamanya dan pada hari yang ketujuh akan diadakan hari raya bagi TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither their silver nor their gold shall be able to deliver them in the day of the LORD's wrath; but the whole land shall be devoured by the fire of his jealousy: for he shall make even a speedy riddance of all them that dwell in the land.
target: Mereka tidak dapat diselamatkan oleh perak atau emas mereka pada hari kegemasan TUHAN, dan seluruh bumi akan dimakan habis oleh api cemburu-Nya; sebab kebinasaan, malah kebinasaan dahsyat diadakan-Nya terhadap segenap penduduk bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Is not my help in me? and is wisdom driven quite from me?
target: Bukankah tidak ada lagi pertolongan bagiku, dan keselamatan jauh dari padaku?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of the prophets said unto Elisha, Behold now, the place where we dwell with thee is too strait for us.
target: Pada suatu hari berkatalah rombongan nabi kepada Elisa: "Cobalah lihat, tempat tinggal kami di dekatmu ini adalah terlalu sesak bagi kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they bend their tongues like their bow for lies: but they are not valiant for the truth upon the earth; for they proceed from evil to evil, and they know not me, saith the LORD.
target: Mereka melenturkan lidahnya seperti busur; dusta dan bukan kebenaran merajalela dalam negeri; sungguh, mereka melangkah dari kejahatan kepada kejahatan, tetapi TUHAN tidaklah mereka kenal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he beheld them, and said, What is this then that is written, The stone which the builders rejected, the same is become the head of the corner?
target: Tetapi Yesus memandang mereka dan berkata: "Jika demikian apakah arti nas ini: Batu yang dibuang oleh tukang-tukang bangunan telah menjadi batu penjuru?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he measured the breadth of the entry of the gate, ten cubits; and the length of the gate, thirteen cubits.
target: Lalu ia mengukur lobang pintu gerbang itu: lebarnya sebelah dalam adalah sepuluh hasta, dan lebarnya sebelah luar tiga belas hasta.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I am against your pillows, wherewith ye there hunt the souls to make them fly, and I will tear them from your arms, and will let the souls go, even the souls that ye hunt to make them fly.
target: Oleh sebab itu beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Aku akan menentang tali-tali azimatmu, dengan mana kamu menangkap jiwa orang dan Aku akan mengoyakkannya dari tanganmu dan melepaskan seperti burung-burung, orang-orang yang kamu tangkap.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus shall they know that I the LORD their God am with them, and that they, even the house of Israel, are my people, saith the Lord GOD.
target: Dan mereka akan mengetahui bahwa Aku, TUHAN, Allah mereka, menyertai mereka dan mereka, kaum Israel, adalah umat-Ku, demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Jonah prayed unto the LORD his God out of the fish's belly,
target: Berdoalah Yunus kepada TUHAN, Allahnya, dari dalam perut ikan itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He slew of Edom in the valley of salt ten thousand, and took Selah by war, and called the name of it Joktheel unto this day.
target: Ia mengalahkan Edom di Lembah Asin, sepuluh ribu orang banyaknya, dan merebut Sela dalam peperangan itu, lalu dinamainyalah kota itu Yokteel; begitulah sampai hari ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Israel took their journey from Beeroth of the children of Jaakan to Mosera: there Aaron died, and there he was buried; and Eleazar his son ministered in the priest's office in his stead.
target: Maka orang Israel berangkat dari Beerot Bene-Yaakan ke Mosera; di sanalah Harun mati dan dikuburkan; lalu Eleazar, anaknya, menjadi imam menggantikan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will give thee the treasures of darkness, and hidden riches of secret places, that thou mayest know that I, the LORD, which call thee by thy name, am the God of Israel.
target: Aku akan memberikan kepadamu harta benda yang terpendam dan harta kekayaan yang tersembunyi, supaya engkau tahu, bahwa Akulah TUHAN, Allah Israel, yang memanggil engkau dengan namamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt therefore keep the commandments, and the statutes, and the judgments, which I command thee this day, to do them.
target: Jadi berpeganglah pada perintah, yakni ketetapan dan peraturan yang kusampaikan kepadamu pada hari ini untuk dilakukan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Marvel not, my brethren, if the world hate you.
target: Janganlah kamu heran, saudara-saudara, apabila dunia membenci kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye shall count unto you from the morrow after the sabbath, from the day that ye brought the sheaf of the wave offering; seven sabbaths shall be complete:
target: Kemudian kamu harus menghitung, mulai dari hari sesudah sabat itu, yaitu waktu kamu membawa berkas persembahan unjukan, harus ada genap tujuh minggu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Israel took all the women of Midian captives, and their little ones, and took the spoil of all their cattle, and all their flocks, and all their goods.
target: Kemudian Israel menawan perempuan-perempuan Midian dan anak-anak mereka; juga segala hewan, segala ternak dan segenap kekayaan mereka dijarah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord, A pair of turtledoves, or two young pigeons.
target: dan untuk mempersembahkan korban menurut apa yang difirmankan dalam hukum Tuhan, yaitu sepasang burung tekukur atau dua ekor anak burung merpati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If thou shalt hear say in one of thy cities, which the LORD thy God hath given thee to dwell there, saying,
target: Apabila di salah satu kota yang diberikan TUHAN, Allahmu, kepadamu untuk diam di sana, kaudengar orang berkata:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For they intended evil against thee: they imagined a mischievous device, which they are not able to perform.
target: Keturunan mereka akan Kaubinasakan dari muka bumi, dan anak cucu mereka dari antara anak-anak manusia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in the latter time of their kingdom, when the transgressors are come to the full, a king of fierce countenance, and understanding dark sentences, shall stand up.
target: Dan pada akhir kerajaan mereka, apabila orang-orang fasik telah penuh kejahatannya, maka akan muncul seorang raja dengan muka yang garang dan yang pandai menipu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Remember his marvellous works that he hath done, his wonders, and the judgments of his mouth;
target: Ingatlah perbuatan-perbuatan ajaib yang dilakukan-Nya, mujizat-mujizat-Nya dan penghukuman-penghukuman yang diucapkan-Nya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So we laboured in the work: and half of them held the spears from the rising of the morning till the stars appeared.
target: Demikianlah kami melakukan pekerjaan itu, sedang sebagian dari pada orang-orang memegang tombak dari merekahnya fajar sampai terbitnya bintang-bintang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jacob said, Sell me this day thy birthright.
target: Tetapi kata Yakub: "Juallah dahulu kepadaku hak kesulunganmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou lovest all devouring words, O thou deceitful tongue.
target: Engkau merancangkan penghancuran, lidahmu seperti pisau cukur yang diasah, hai engkau, penipu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he cried against the altar in the word of the LORD, and said, O altar, altar, thus saith the LORD; Behold, a child shall be born unto the house of David, Josiah by name; and upon thee shall he offer the priests of the high places that burn incense upon thee, and men's bones shall be burnt upon thee.
target: Lalu atas perintah TUHAN berserulah orang itu terhadap mezbah itu, katanya: "Hai mezbah, hai mezbah! Beginilah firman TUHAN: Bahwasanya seorang anak akan lahir pada keluarga Daud, Yosia namanya; ia akan menyembelih di atasmu imam-imam bukit pengorbanan yang membakar korban di atasmu, juga tulang-tulang manusia akan dibakar di atasmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye shall not eat any thing with the blood: neither shall ye use enchantment, nor observe times.
target: Janganlah kamu makan sesuatu yang darahnya masih ada. Janganlah kamu melakukan telaah atau ramalan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said Jeremiah unto them, Thus shall ye say to Zedekiah:
target: Kata Yeremia kepada mereka: "Beginilah kamu katakan kepada Zedekia:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hearken, O daughter, and consider, and incline thine ear; forget also thine own people, and thy father's house;
target: di antara mereka yang disayangi terdapat puteri-puteri raja, di sebelah kananmu berdiri permaisuri berpakaian emas dari Ofir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
target: janganlah takut, sebab Aku menyertai engkau, janganlah bimbang, sebab Aku ini Allahmu; Aku akan meneguhkan, bahkan akan menolong engkau; Aku akan memegang engkau dengan tangan kanan-Ku yang membawa kemenangan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the fourth angel poured out his vial upon the sun; and power was given unto him to scorch men with fire.
target: Dan malaikat yang keempat menumpahkan cawannya ke atas matahari, dan kepadanya diberi kuasa untuk menghanguskan manusia dengan api.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the rest of the acts of Azariah, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
target: Selebihnya dari riwayat Azarya, dan segala yang dilakukannya, bukankah semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Yehuda?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus saith unto him, Rise, take up thy bed, and walk.
target: Kata Yesus kepadanya: "Bangunlah, angkatlah tilammu dan berjalanlah."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she said unto him, There is no cause: this evil in sending me away is greater than the other that thou didst unto me. But he would not hearken unto her.
target: Lalu berkatalah gadis itu kepadanya: "Tidak kakakku, sebab menyuruh aku pergi adalah lebih jahat dari pada apa yang telah kaulakukan kepadaku tadi." Tetapi Amnon tidak mau mendengarkan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said Jesus to them again, Peace be unto you: as my Father hath sent me, even so send I you.
target: Maka kata Yesus sekali lagi: "Damai sejahtera bagi kamu! Sama seperti Bapa mengutus Aku, demikian juga sekarang Aku mengutus kamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In whom ye also trusted, after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise,
target: Di dalam Dia kamu juga — karena kamu telah mendengar firman kebenaran, yaitu Injil keselamatanmu — di dalam Dia kamu juga, ketika kamu percaya, dimeteraikan dengan Roh Kudus, yang dijanjikan-Nya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My transgression is sealed up in a bag, and thou sewest up mine iniquity.
target: pelanggaranku akan dimasukkan di dalam pundi-pundi yang dimeteraikan, dan kesalahanku akan Kaututup dengan lepa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses sent to spy out Jaazer, and they took the villages thereof, and drove out the Amorites that were there.
target: Setelah Musa menyuruh orang mengintai kota Yaezer, mereka merebut segala anak kota Yaezer dan menghalau orang-orang Amori yang ada di situ.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved; but he that believeth not shall be damned.
target: Siapa yang percaya dan dibaptis akan diselamatkan, tetapi siapa yang tidak percaya akan dihukum.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she? for seven had her to wife.
target: Bagaimana sekarang dengan perempuan itu, siapakah di antara orang-orang itu yang menjadi suaminya pada hari kebangkitan? Sebab ketujuhnya telah beristerikan dia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they called them, and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus.
target: Dan setelah keduanya disuruh masuk, mereka diperintahkan, supaya sama sekali jangan berbicara atau mengajar lagi dalam nama Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Israel joined himself unto Baalpeor: and the anger of the LORD was kindled against Israel.
target: Ketika Israel berpasangan dengan Baal-Peor, bangkitlah murka TUHAN terhadap Israel;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And after him Abdon the son of Hillel, a Pirathonite, judged Israel.
target: Sesudah dia, maka Abdon bin Hilel, orang Piraton, memerintah sebagai hakim atas orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They will not frame their doings to turn unto their God: for the spirit of whoredoms is in the midst of them, and they have not known the LORD.
target: Perbuatan-perbuatan mereka tidak mengizinkan mereka berbalik kepada Allah mereka, sebab roh perzinahan ada di antara mereka, dan mereka tidak mengenal TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he served Baal, and worshipped him, and provoked to anger the LORD God of Israel, according to all that his father had done.
target: Ia melakukan apa yang jahat di mata TUHAN dan hidup menurut kelakuan ayahnya dan ibunya dan Yerobeam bin Nebat, yang telah mengakibatkan orang Israel berdosa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe, that observe and do; but do not ye after their works: for they say, and do not.
target: Sebab itu turutilah dan lakukanlah segala sesuatu yang mereka ajarkan kepadamu, tetapi janganlah kamu turuti perbuatan-perbuatan mereka, karena mereka mengajarkannya tetapi tidak melakukannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men, as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit;
target: yang pada zaman angkatan-angkatan dahulu tidak diberitakan kepada anak-anak manusia, tetapi yang sekarang dinyatakan di dalam Roh kepada rasul-rasul dan nabi-nabi-Nya yang kudus,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.
target: Allahku akan memenuhi segala keperluanmu menurut kekayaan dan kemuliaan-Nya dalam Kristus Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Judah and Israel were many, as the sand which is by the sea in multitude, eating and drinking, and making merry.
target: Orang Yehuda dan orang Israel jumlahnya seperti pasir di tepi laut. Mereka makan dan minum serta bersukaria.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if the man be poor, thou shalt not sleep with his pledge:
target: Jika ia seorang miskin, janganlah engkau tidur dengan barang gadaiannya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Elijah answered and said unto them, If I be a man of God, let fire come down from heaven, and consume thee and thy fifty. And the fire of God came down from heaven, and consumed him and his fifty.
target: Tetapi Elia menjawab mereka: "Kalau benar aku abdi Allah, biarlah turun api dari langit memakan engkau habis dengan kelima puluh anak buahmu!" Maka turunlah api Allah dari langit memakan dia habis dengan kelima puluh anak buahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
target: Biarlah mereka bersyukur kepada TUHAN karena kasih setia-Nya, karena perbuatan-perbuatan-Nya yang ajaib terhadap anak-anak manusia,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But other fell into good ground, and brought forth fruit, some an hundredfold, some sixtyfold, some thirtyfold.
target: Dan sebagian jatuh di tanah yang baik lalu berbuah: ada yang seratus kali lipat, ada yang enam puluh kali lipat, ada yang tiga puluh kali lipat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;
target: Yismerai, Yizlia dan Yobab ialah anak-anak Elpaal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Where are the gods of Hamath, and of Arpad? where are the gods of Sepharvaim, Hena, and Ivah? have they delivered Samaria out of mine hand?
target: Di manakah para allah negeri Hamat dan Arpad? Di manakah para allah negeri Sefarwaim, Hena dan Iwa? Apakah mereka telah melepaskan Samaria dari tanganku?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For, behold, I have made thee this day a defenced city, and an iron pillar, and brasen walls against the whole land, against the kings of Judah, against the princes thereof, against the priests thereof, and against the people of the land.
target: Mengenai Aku, sesungguhnya pada hari ini Aku membuat engkau menjadi kota yang berkubu, menjadi tiang besi dan menjadi tembok tembaga melawan seluruh negeri ini, menentang raja-raja Yehuda dan pemuka-pemukanya, menentang para imamnya dan rakyat negeri ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death; and found none.
target: Imam-imam kepala, malah seluruh Mahkamah Agama mencari kesaksian terhadap Yesus supaya Ia dapat dihukum mati, tetapi mereka tidak memperolehnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The ancient and honourable, he is the head; and the prophet that teacheth lies, he is the tail.
target: Sebab orang-orang yang mengendalikan bangsa ini adalah penyesat, dan orang-orang yang dikendalikan mereka menjadi kacau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I did so as I was commanded: I brought forth my stuff by day, as stuff for captivity, and in the even I digged through the wall with mine hand; I brought it forth in the twilight, and I bare it upon my shoulder in their sight.
target: Lalu kulakukan seperti diperintahkan kepadaku: aku membawa pada siang hari barang-barang seperti barang-barang seorang buangan dan pada malam hari aku membuat dengan tanganku sebuah lobang di tembok, pada malam gelap aku keluar dan di hadapan mata mereka aku menaruh barang-barangku ke atas bahuku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Beareth all things, believeth all things, hopeth all things, endureth all things.
target: Ia menutupi segala sesuatu, percaya segala sesuatu, mengharapkan segala sesuatu, sabar menanggung segala sesuatu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he that beareth the carcase of them shall wash his clothes, and be unclean until the even: they are unclean unto you.
target: Dan siapa yang membawa bangkainya, haruslah mencuci pakaiannya dan ia menjadi najis sampai matahari terbenam. Haram semuanya itu bagimu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses and unto Aaron, saying,
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Musa dan Harun:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Do ye not know that they which minister about holy things live of the things of the temple? and they which wait at the altar are partakers with the altar?
target: Tidak tahukah kamu, bahwa mereka yang melayani dalam tempat kudus mendapat penghidupannya dari tempat kudus itu dan bahwa mereka yang melayani mezbah, mendapat bahagian mereka dari mezbah itu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Samson took hold of the two middle pillars upon which the house stood, and on which it was borne up, of the one with his right hand, and of the other with his left.
target: Kemudian Simson merangkul kedua tiang yang paling tengah, penyangga rumah itu, lalu bertopang kepada tiang yang satu dengan tangan kanannya dan kepada tiang yang lain dengan tangan kirinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So thou, O son of man, I have set thee a watchman unto the house of Israel; therefore thou shalt hear the word at my mouth, and warn them from me.
target: Dan engkau anak manusia, Aku menetapkan engkau menjadi penjaga bagi kaum Israel. Bilamana engkau mendengar sesuatu firman dari pada-Ku, peringatkanlah mereka demi nama-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David was displeased, because the LORD had made a breach upon Uzzah: and he called the name of the place Perezuzzah to this day.
target: Daud menjadi marah, karena TUHAN telah menyambar Uza demikian hebatnya; maka tempat itu disebut orang Peres-Uza sampai sekarang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let his children be fatherless, and his wife a widow.
target: Biarlah anak-anaknya menjadi yatim, dan isterinya menjadi janda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith; that ye, being rooted and grounded in love,
target: sehingga oleh imanmu Kristus diam di dalam hatimu dan kamu berakar serta berdasar di dalam kasih.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the man was above forty years old, on whom this miracle of healing was shewed.
target: Sebab orang yang disembuhkan oleh mujizat itu sudah lebih dari empat puluh tahun umurnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of the captivity kept the passover upon the fourteenth day of the first month.
target: Dan pada tanggal empat belas bulan pertama mereka yang pulang dari pembuangan merayakan Paskah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They have turned aside quickly out of the way which I commanded them: they have made them a molten calf, and have worshipped it, and have sacrificed thereunto, and said, These be thy gods, O Israel, which have brought thee up out of the land of Egypt.
target: Segera juga mereka menyimpang dari jalan yang Kuperintahkan kepada mereka; mereka telah membuat anak lembu tuangan, dan kepadanya mereka sujud menyembah dan mempersembahkan korban, sambil berkata: Hai Israel, inilah Allahmu yang telah menuntun engkau keluar dari tanah Mesir."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They have said, Come, and let us cut them off from being a nation; that the name of Israel may be no more in remembrance.
target: Mereka mengadakan permufakatan licik melawan umat-Mu, dan mereka berunding untuk melawan orang-orang yang Kaulindungi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet they seek me daily, and delight to know my ways, as a nation that did righteousness, and forsook not the ordinance of their God: they ask of me the ordinances of justice; they take delight in approaching to God.
target: Memang setiap hari mereka mencari Aku dan suka untuk mengenal segala jalan-Ku. Seperti bangsa yang melakukan yang benar dan yang tidak meninggalkan hukum Allahnya mereka menanyakan Aku tentang hukum-hukum yang benar, mereka suka mendekat menghadap Allah, tanyanya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Saul smote the Amalekites from Havilah until thou comest to Shur, that is over against Egypt.
target: Lalu Saul memukul kalah orang Amalek mulai dari Hawila sampai ke Syur, yang di sebelah timur Mesir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, What cities are these which thou hast given me, my brother? And he called them the land of Cabul unto this day.
target: Sebab itu ia berkata: "Macam apakah kota-kota yang telah kauberikan kepadaku ini, hai saudaraku?" Maka orang menyebutkannya tanah Kabul sampai hari ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Blessed is he that waiteth, and cometh to the thousand three hundred and five and thirty days.
target: Berbahagialah orang yang tetap menanti-nanti dan mencapai seribu tiga ratus tiga puluh lima hari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jezebel his wife said unto him, Dost thou now govern the kingdom of Israel? arise, and eat bread, and let thine heart be merry: I will give thee the vineyard of Naboth the Jezreelite.
target: Kata Izebel, isterinya, kepadanya: "Bukankah engkau sekarang yang memegang kuasa raja atas Israel? Bangunlah, makanlah dan biarlah hatimu gembira! Aku akan memberikan kepadamu kebun anggur Nabot, orang Yizreel itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which we have heard and known, and our fathers have told us.
target: Yang telah kami dengar dan kami ketahui, dan yang diceritakan kepada kami oleh nenek moyang kami,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joseph returned into Egypt, he, and his brethren, and all that went up with him to bury his father, after he had buried his father.
target: Setelah ayahnya dikuburkan, pulanglah Yusuf ke Mesir, dia dan saudara-saudaranya dan semua orang yang turut pergi ke sana bersama-sama dengan dia untuk menguburkan ayahnya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For was not Israel a derision unto thee? was he found among thieves? for since thou spakest of him, thou skippedst for joy.
target: Apakah bukan Israel tadinya yang menjadi tertawaan bagimu? Apakah dia terdapat di antara pencuri-pencuri, sehingga engkau menggeleng-gelengkan kepala, setiap kali engkau berbicara tentang dia?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And after that they had mocked him, they took the robe off from him, and put his own raiment on him, and led him away to crucify him.
target: Sesudah mengolok-olokkan Dia mereka menanggalkan jubah itu dari pada-Nya dan mengenakan pula pakaian-Nya kepada-Nya. Kemudian mereka membawa Dia ke luar untuk disalibkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost, and began to speak with other tongues, as the Spirit gave them utterance.
target: Maka penuhlah mereka dengan Roh Kudus, lalu mereka mulai berkata-kata dalam bahasa-bahasa lain, seperti yang diberikan oleh Roh itu kepada mereka untuk mengatakannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because they had not executed my judgments, but had despised my statutes, and had polluted my sabbaths, and their eyes were after their fathers' idols.
target: oleh karena mereka tidak melakukan peraturan-peraturan-Ku dan menolak ketetapan-ketetapan-Ku dan melanggar kekudusan hari-hari Sabat-Ku dan matanya selalu tertuju kepada berhala-berhala ayah-ayah mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For Jacob my servant's sake, and Israel mine elect, I have even called thee by thy name: I have surnamed thee, though thou hast not known me.
target: Oleh karena hamba-Ku Yakub dan Israel, pilihan-Ku, maka Aku memanggil engkau dengan namamu, menggelari engkau, sekalipun engkau tidak mengenal Aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Israel is a scattered sheep; the lions have driven him away: first the king of Assyria hath devoured him; and last this Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon hath broken his bones.
target: Israel adalah seperti domba yang dicerai-beraikan, dihalaukan oleh singa-singa. Mula-mula raja Asyur memakan dia, dan sekarang pada akhirnya Nebukadnezar, raja Babel, mengerumit tulang-tulangnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
