input: If fire break out, and catch in thorns, so that the stacks of corn, or the standing corn, or the field, be consumed therewith; he that kindled the fire shall surely make restitution.
target: Apabila ada api dinyalakan dan api itu menjilat semak duri, tetapi tumpukan gandum atau gandum yang belum dituai atau seluruh ladang itu ikut juga dimakan api, maka orang yang menyebabkan kebakaran itu harus membayar ganti kerugian sepenuhnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And other ten thousand left alive did the children of Judah carry away captive, and brought them unto the top of the rock, and cast them down from the top of the rock, that they all were broken in pieces.
target: Selain itu sepuluh ribu orang ditawan hidup-hidup oleh bani Yehuda dan dibawa ke suatu puncak bukit batu, lalu mereka dicampakkan dari puncak bukit batu itu, sehingga hancurlah mereka semua.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he made two cherubims of gold, beaten out of one piece made he them, on the two ends of the mercy seat;
target: Dibuatnyalah dua kerub dari emas, dari emas tempaan dibuatnya itu, pada kedua ujung tutup pendamaian itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in all matters of wisdom and understanding, that the king enquired of them, he found them ten times better than all the magicians and astrologers that were in all his realm.
target: Dalam tiap-tiap hal yang memerlukan kebijaksanaan dan pengertian, yang ditanyakan raja kepada mereka, didapatinya bahwa mereka sepuluh kali lebih cerdas dari pada semua orang berilmu dan semua ahli jampi di seluruh kerajaannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if it be any unclean beast, of which they do not offer a sacrifice unto the LORD, then he shall present the beast before the priest:
target: Jikalau itu barang seekor dari antara hewan haram yang tidak boleh dipersembahkan sebagai persembahan kepada TUHAN, maka hewan itu harus dihadapkannya kepada imam,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the four and twenty elders and the four beasts fell down and worshipped God that sat on the throne, saying, Amen; Alleluia.
target: Dan kedua puluh empat tua-tua dan keempat makhluk itu tersungkur dan menyembah Allah yang duduk di atas takhta itu, dan mereka berkata: "Amin, Haleluya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he carried away all Jerusalem, and all the princes, and all the mighty men of valour, even ten thousand captives, and all the craftsmen and smiths: none remained, save the poorest sort of the people of the land.
target: Ia mengangkut seluruh penduduk Yerusalem ke dalam pembuangan, semua panglima dan semua pahlawan yang gagah perkasa, sepuluh ribu orang tawanan, juga semua tukang dan pandai besi; tidak ada yang ditinggalkan kecuali orang-orang lemah dari rakyat negeri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And hath not eaten upon the mountains, neither hath lifted up his eyes to the idols of the house of Israel, neither hath defiled his neighbour's wife, neither hath come near to a menstruous woman,
target: dan ia tidak makan daging persembahan di atas gunung atau tidak melihat kepada berhala-berhala kaum Israel, tidak mencemari isteri sesamanya dan tidak menghampiri perempuan waktu bercemar kain,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whither the tribes go up, the tribes of the LORD, unto the testimony of Israel, to give thanks unto the name of the LORD.
target: ke mana suku-suku berziarah, yakni suku-suku TUHAN, untuk bersyukur kepada nama TUHAN sesuai dengan peraturan bagi Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover Manasseh shed innocent blood very much, till he had filled Jerusalem from one end to another; beside his sin wherewith he made Judah to sin, in doing that which was evil in the sight of the LORD.
target: Lagipula Manasye mencurahkan darah orang yang tidak bersalah sedemikian banyak, hingga dipenuhinya Yerusalem dari ujung ke ujung, belum termasuk dosa-dosanya yang mengakibatkan orang Yehuda berdosa pula dengan berbuat apa yang jahat di mata TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When saw we thee a stranger, and took thee in? or naked, and clothed thee?
target: Bilamanakah kami melihat Engkau sebagai orang asing, dan kami memberi Engkau tumpangan, atau telanjang dan kami memberi Engkau pakaian?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt consume all the people which the LORD thy God shall deliver thee; thine eye shall have no pity upon them: neither shalt thou serve their gods; for that will be a snare unto thee.
target: Engkau harus melenyapkan segala bangsa yang diserahkan kepadamu oleh TUHAN, Allahmu; janganlah engkau merasa sayang kepada mereka dan janganlah beribadah kepada allah mereka, sebab hal itu akan menjadi jerat bagimu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The spirit of a man will sustain his infirmity; but a wounded spirit who can bear?
target: Orang yang bersemangat dapat menanggung penderitaannya, tetapi siapa akan memulihkan semangat yang patah?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall be answered, Because they forsook the LORD God of their fathers, which brought them forth out of the land of Egypt, and laid hold on other gods, and worshipped them, and served them: therefore hath he brought all this evil upon them.
target: Maka orang akan berkata: Sebab mereka meninggalkan TUHAN, Allah nenek moyang mereka, yang membawa mereka keluar dari tanah Mesir, dan sebab mereka berpegang pada allah lain dan sujud menyembah kepadanya dan beribadah kepadanya. Itulah sebabnya Ia mendatangkan segala malapetaka ini ke atas mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God, who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit.
target: Tetapi Allahlah yang justru mempersiapkan kita untuk hal itu dan yang mengaruniakan Roh, kepada kita sebagai jaminan segala sesuatu yang telah disediakan bagi kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And of the Levites, Ahijah was over the treasures of the house of God, and over the treasures of the dedicated things.
target: Orang-orang Lewi, saudara-saudara sesuku mereka, yang mengawasi perbendaharaan rumah Allah dan yang mengawasi perbendaharaan barang-barang kudus;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they heard it, they were glad, and promised to give him money. And he sought how he might conveniently betray him.
target: Mereka sangat gembira waktu mendengarnya dan mereka berjanji akan memberikan uang kepadanya. Kemudian ia mencari kesempatan yang baik untuk menyerahkan Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she said unto him, I am the daughter of Bethuel the son of Milcah, which she bare unto Nahor.
target: Lalu jawabnya kepadanya: "Ayahku Betuel, anak Milka, yang melahirkannya bagi Nahor."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But there is forgiveness with thee, that thou mayest be feared.
target: Tetapi pada-Mu ada pengampunan, supaya Engkau ditakuti orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For ye say, Where is the house of the prince? and where are the dwelling places of the wicked?
target: Katamu: Di mana rumah penguasa? Di mana kemah tempat kediaman orang-orang fasik?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But thou shouldest not have looked on the day of thy brother in the day that he became a stranger; neither shouldest thou have rejoiced over the children of Judah in the day of their destruction; neither shouldest thou have spoken proudly in the day of distress.
target: Janganlah memandang rendah saudaramu, pada hari kemalangannya, dan janganlah bersukacita atas keturunan Yehuda pada hari kebinasaannya; dan janganlah membual pada hari kesusahannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then they cried unto the LORD in their trouble, and he delivered them out of their distresses.
target: Maka berseru-serulah mereka kepada TUHAN dalam kesesakan mereka, dan dilepaskan-Nya mereka dari kecemasan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These were dukes of the sons of Esau: the sons of Eliphaz the firstborn son of Esau; duke Teman, duke Omar, duke Zepho, duke Kenaz,
target: Inilah kepala-kepala kaum bani Esau: keturunan Elifas anak sulung Esau, ialah kepala kaum T'eman, kepala kaum Omar, kepala kaum Zefo, kepala kaum Kenas,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For these causes the Jews caught me in the temple, and went about to kill me.
target: Karena itulah orang-orang Yahudi menangkap aku di Bait Allah, dan mencoba membunuh aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Moses the servant of the LORD died there in the land of Moab, according to the word of the LORD.
target: Lalu matilah Musa, hamba TUHAN itu, di sana di tanah Moab, sesuai dengan firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they said one to another, Who hath done this thing? And when they enquired and asked, they said, Gideon the son of Joash hath done this thing.
target: Berkatalah mereka seorang kepada yang lain: "Siapakah yang melakukan hal itu?" Setelah diperiksa dan ditanya-tanya, maka kata orang: "Gideon bin Yoas, dialah yang melakukan hal itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: God layeth up his iniquity for his children: he rewardeth him, and he shall know it.
target: Bencana untuk dia disimpan Allah bagi anak-anaknya. Sebaiknya, orang itu sendiri diganjar Allah, supaya sadar;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And one of the elders saith unto me, Weep not: behold, the Lion of the tribe of Judah, the Root of David, hath prevailed to open the book, and to loose the seven seals thereof.
target: Lalu berkatalah seorang dari tua-tua itu kepadaku: "Jangan engkau menangis! Sesungguhnya, singa dari suku Yehuda, yaitu tunas Daud, telah menang, sehingga Ia dapat membuka gulungan kitab itu dan membuka ketujuh meterainya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So I answered and spake to the angel that talked with me, saying, What are these, my lord?
target: Lalu berbicaralah aku, kataku kepada malaikat yang berbicara dengan aku itu: "Apakah arti semuanya ini, tuanku?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The fifteenth to Jeremoth, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
target: undian yang kelima belas pada Yeremot, anak-anaknya dan saudara-saudaranya, dua belas orang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the battle increased that day: and the king was stayed up in his chariot against the Syrians, and died at even: and the blood ran out of the wound into the midst of the chariot.
target: Tetapi pertempuran itu bertambah seru pada hari itu, dan raja tetap ditopang berdiri di dalam kereta berhadapan dengan orang Aram itu, sampai ia mati pada waktu petang. Darahnya mengalir dari lukanya ke dalam palung kereta.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Blessed be God, which hath not turned away my prayer, nor his mercy from me.
target: Terpujilah Allah, yang tidak menolak doaku dan tidak menjauhkan kasih setia-Nya dari padaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will bring a sword upon you, that shall avenge the quarrel of my covenant: and when ye are gathered together within your cities, I will send the pestilence among you; and ye shall be delivered into the hand of the enemy.
target: dan Aku akan mendatangkan ke atasmu suatu pedang, yang akan melakukan pembalasan oleh karena perjanjian itu; bila kamu berkumpul kelak di kota-kotamu, maka Aku akan melepas penyakit sampar ke tengah-tengahmu dan kamu akan diserahkan ke dalam tangan musuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which also our fathers that came after brought in with Jesus into the possession of the Gentiles, whom God drave out before the face of our fathers, unto the days of David;
target: Kemah itu yang diterima nenek moyang kita dan yang dengan pimpinan Yosua dibawa masuk ke tanah ini, yaitu waktu tanah ini direbut dari bangsa-bangsa lain yang dihalau Allah dari depan nenek moyang kita; demikianlah sampai kepada zaman Daud.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And this rumour of him went forth throughout all Judaea, and throughout all the region round about.
target: Maka tersiarlah kabar tentang Yesus di seluruh Yudea dan di seluruh daerah sekitarnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For men verily swear by the greater: and an oath for confirmation is to them an end of all strife.
target: Sebab manusia bersumpah demi orang yang lebih tinggi, dan sumpah itu menjadi suatu pengokohan baginya, yang mengakhiri segala bantahan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joseph said unto Pharaoh, The dream of Pharaoh is one: God hath shewed Pharaoh what he is about to do.
target: Lalu kata Yusuf kepada Firaun: "Kedua mimpi tuanku Firaun itu sama. Allah telah memberitahukan kepada tuanku Firaun apa yang hendak dilakukan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.
target: Aku tidak menyebut kamu lagi hamba, sebab hamba tidak tahu, apa yang diperbuat oleh tuannya, tetapi Aku menyebut kamu sahabat, karena Aku telah memberitahukan kepada kamu segala sesuatu yang telah Kudengar dari Bapa-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple; and he healed them.
target: Maka datanglah orang-orang buta dan orang-orang timpang kepada-Nya dalam Bait Allah itu dan mereka disembuhkan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they kept the passover on the fourteenth day of the first month at even in the wilderness of Sinai: according to all that the LORD commanded Moses, so did the children of Israel.
target: Maka mereka merayakan Paskah pada bulan yang pertama, pada hari yang keempat belas bulan itu, pada waktu senja, di padang gurun Sinai; tepat seperti yang diperintahkan TUHAN kepada Musa, demikianlah dilakukan orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the centurion, willing to save Paul, kept them from their purpose; and commanded that they which could swim should cast themselves first into the sea, and get to land:
target: Tetapi perwira itu ingin menyelamatkan Paulus. Karena itu ia menggagalkan maksud mereka, dan memerintahkan, supaya orang-orang yang pandai berenang lebih dahulu terjun ke laut dan naik ke darat,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: We shall find all precious substance, we shall fill our houses with spoil:
target: kita akan mendapat pelbagai benda yang berharga, kita akan memenuhi rumah kita dengan barang rampasan;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he burnt the house of the LORD, and the king's house, and all the houses of Jerusalem, and every great man's house burnt he with fire.
target: Ia membakar rumah TUHAN, rumah raja dan semua rumah di Yerusalem; semua rumah orang-orang besar dibakarnya dengan api.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The grass withereth, the flower fadeth: but the word of our God shall stand for ever.
target: Rumput menjadi kering, bunga menjadi layu, tetapi firman Allah kita tetap untuk selama-lamanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These are the sons of Dan after their families: of Shuham, the family of the Shuhamites. These are the families of Dan after their families.
target: Inilah bani Dan, menurut kaum mereka: dari Suham kaum orang Suham. Itulah kaum-kaum Dan menurut kaum mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the stars of heaven shall fall, and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken.
target: dan bintang-bintang akan berjatuhan dari langit, dan kuasa-kuasa langit akan goncang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the priest shall take the lamb of the trespass offering, and the log of oil, and the priest shall wave them for a wave offering before the LORD:
target: Kemudian imam harus mengambil domba tebusan salah dan minyak yang satu log itu, lalu imam harus mempersembahkan semuanya sebagai persembahan unjukan di hadapan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto the people, Pass on, and compass the city, and let him that is armed pass on before the ark of the LORD.
target: Dan kepada bangsa itu dikatakannya: "Majulah, kelilingilah kota itu, dan orang-orang bersenjata harus berjalan di depan tabut TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thine habitation is in the midst of deceit; through deceit they refuse to know me, saith the LORD.
target: Penindasan ditimbuni penindasan, tipu ditimbuni tipu! Mereka enggan mengenal TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she yet again conceived, and bare a son; and called his name Shelah: and he was at Chezib, when she bare him.
target: Kemudian perempuan itu melahirkan seorang anak laki-laki sekali lagi, dan menamai anak itu Syela. Yehuda sedang berada di Kezib, ketika anak itu dilahirkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt make the horns of it upon the four corners thereof: his horns shall be of the same: and thou shalt overlay it with brass.
target: Haruslah engkau membuat tanduk-tanduknya pada keempat sudutnya; tanduk-tanduknya itu haruslah seiras dengan mezbah itu dan haruslah engkau menyalutnya dengan tembaga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It shall not seem hard unto thee, when thou sendest him away free from thee; for he hath been worth a double hired servant to thee, in serving thee six years: and the LORD thy God shall bless thee in all that thou doest.
target: Janganlah merasa susah, apabila engkau melepaskan dia sebagai orang merdeka, sebab enam tahun lamanya ia telah bekerja padamu dengan jasa dua kali upah seorang pekerja harian. Maka TUHAN, Allahmu, akan memberkati engkau dalam segala sesuatu yang kaukerjakan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But it came to pass at the time when Merab Saul's daughter should have been given to David, that she was given unto Adriel the Meholathite to wife.
target: Tetapi ketika tiba waktunya untuk memberikan Merab, anak Saul itu, kepada Daud, maka anak perempuan itu diberikan kepada Adriel, orang Mehola, menjadi isterinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he made the horns thereof on the four corners of it; the horns thereof were of the same: and he overlaid it with brass.
target: Dibuatnyalah tanduk-tanduknya pada keempat sudutnya; tanduk-tanduknya itu dibuat seiras dengan mezbah itu dan disalutnya dengan tembaga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD God of their fathers sent to them by his messengers, rising up betimes, and sending; because he had compassion on his people, and on his dwelling place:
target: Namun TUHAN, Allah nenek moyang mereka, berulang-ulang mengirim pesan melalui utusan-utusan-Nya, karena Ia sayang kepada umat-Nya dan tempat kediaman-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there was a very sore battle that day; and Abner was beaten, and the men of Israel, before the servants of David.
target: Pada hari itu pertempuran sangat hebat, dan Abner serta orang-orang Israel terpukul kalah oleh anak buah Daud.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which bringeth forth the chariot and horse, the army and the power; they shall lie down together, they shall not rise: they are extinct, they are quenched as tow.
target: yang telah menyuruh kereta dan kuda keluar untuk berperang, juga tentara dan orang gagah — mereka terbaring, tidak dapat bangkit, sudah mati, sudah padam sebagai sumbu —,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I beheld, and, lo, the fruitful place was a wilderness, and all the cities thereof were broken down at the presence of the LORD, and by his fierce anger.
target: Aku melihat, ternyata tanah subur sudah menjadi padang gurun, dan segala kotanya sudah runtuh di hadapan TUHAN, di hadapan murka-Nya yang menyala-nyala!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost, and prophesied, saying,
target: Dan Zakharia, ayahnya, penuh dengan Roh Kudus, lalu bernubuat, katanya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Nevertheless for David's sake did the LORD his God give him a lamp in Jerusalem, to set up his son after him, and to establish Jerusalem:
target: Tetapi oleh karena Daud maka TUHAN, Allahnya, memberikan keturunan kepadanya di Yerusalem dengan mengangkat anaknya menggantikan dia dan dengan membiarkan Yerusalem berdiri,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There was nothing in the ark save the two tables of stone, which Moses put there at Horeb, when the LORD made a covenant with the children of Israel, when they came out of the land of Egypt.
target: Dalam tabut itu tidak ada apa-apa selain dari kedua loh batu yang diletakkan Musa ke dalamnya di gunung Horeb, yakni loh-loh batu bertuliskan perjanjian yang diadakan TUHAN dengan orang Israel pada waktu perjalanan mereka keluar dari tanah Mesir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the transgressors shall be destroyed together: the end of the wicked shall be cut off.
target: tetapi pendurhaka-pendurhaka akan dibinasakan bersama-sama, dan masa depan orang-orang fasik akan dilenyapkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A golden bell and a pomegranate, a golden bell and a pomegranate, upon the hem of the robe round about.
target: sehingga satu giring-giring emas dan satu buah delima selalu berselang-seling, pada ujung gamis itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joab said to Amasa, Art thou in health, my brother? And Joab took Amasa by the beard with the right hand to kiss him.
target: Berkatalah Yoab kepada Amasa: "Engkau baik-baik, saudaraku?" Sementara itu tangan kanan Yoab memegang janggut Amasa untuk mencium dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thy faithfulness is unto all generations: thou hast established the earth, and it abideth.
target: Kesetiaan-Mu dari keturunan ke keturunan; Engkau menegakkan bumi, sehingga tetap ada.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Peter said unto him, Lord, why cannot I follow thee now? I will lay down my life for thy sake.
target: Kata Petrus kepada-Nya: "Tuhan, mengapa aku tidak dapat mengikuti Engkau sekarang? Aku akan memberikan nyawaku bagi-Mu!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David left his carriage in the hand of the keeper of the carriage, and ran into the army, and came and saluted his brethren.
target: Lalu Daud menurunkan barang-barangnya dan meninggalkannya di tangan penjaga barang-barang tentara. Berlari-larilah Daud ke tempat barisan; sesampai di sana, bertanyalah ia kepada kakak-kakaknya apakah mereka selamat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore should the heathen say, Where is their God? let him be known among the heathen in our sight by the revenging of the blood of thy servants which is shed.
target: Mengapa bangsa-bangsa lain boleh berkata: "Di mana Allah mereka?" Biarlah di hadapan kami bangsa-bangsa lain mengetahui pembalasan atas darah yang tertumpah dari hamba-hamba-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If ye endure chastening, God dealeth with you as with sons; for what son is he whom the father chasteneth not?
target: Jika kamu harus menanggung ganjaran; Allah memperlakukan kamu seperti anak. Di manakah terdapat anak yang tidak dihajar oleh ayahnya?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I may tell all my bones: they look and stare upon me.
target: Sebab anjing-anjing mengerumuni aku, gerombolan penjahat mengepung aku, mereka menusuk tangan dan kakiku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And you hath he quickened, who were dead in trespasses and sins;
target: Kamu dahulu sudah mati karena pelanggaran-pelanggaran dan dosa-dosamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God, which is in thee by the putting on of my hands.
target: Karena itulah kuperingatkan engkau untuk mengobarkan karunia Allah yang ada padamu oleh penumpangan tanganku atasmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he was an adversary to Israel all the days of Solomon, beside the mischief that Hadad did: and he abhorred Israel, and reigned over Syria.
target: Dialah yang menjadi lawan Israel sepanjang umur Salomo; ia mendatangkan malapetaka sama seperti Hadad. Ia muak akan orang Israel dan menjadi raja atas Aram.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the Philistines gathered themselves together to fight with Israel, thirty thousand chariots, and six thousand horsemen, and people as the sand which is on the sea shore in multitude: and they came up, and pitched in Michmash, eastward from Bethaven.
target: Adapun orang Filistin telah berkumpul untuk berperang melawan orang Israel. Dengan tiga ribu kereta, enam ribu orang pasukan berkuda dan pasukan berjalan kaki sebanyak pasir di tepi laut mereka bergerak maju dan berkemah di Mikhmas, di sebelah timur Bet-Awen.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet Jeroboam the son of Nebat, the servant of Solomon the son of David, is risen up, and hath rebelled against his lord.
target: Tetapi Yerobeam bin Nebat, hamba Salomo bin Daud, telah bangkit memberontak melawan tuannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jonadab said unto him, Lay thee down on thy bed, and make thyself sick: and when thy father cometh to see thee, say unto him, I pray thee, let my sister Tamar come, and give me meat, and dress the meat in my sight, that I may see it, and eat it at her hand.
target: Lalu berkatalah Yonadab kepadanya: "Berbaringlah di tempat tidurmu dan berbuat pura-pura sakit. Apabila ayahmu datang menengok engkau, maka haruslah engkau berkata kepadanya: Izinkanlah adikku Tamar datang memberi aku makan. Apabila ia menyediakan makanan di depan mataku, sehingga aku dapat melihatnya, maka aku akan memakannya dari tangannya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The king answered and said to Daniel, whose name was Belteshazzar, Art thou able to make known unto me the dream which I have seen, and the interpretation thereof?
target: Bertanyalah raja kepada Daniel yang namanya Beltsazar: "Sanggupkah engkau memberitahukan kepadaku mimpi yang telah kulihat itu dengan maknanya juga?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And these are the names of the sons of Levi according to their generations; Gershon, and Kohath, and Merari: and the years of the life of Levi were an hundred thirty and seven years.
target: Anak-anak Gerson: Libni dan Simei, menurut kaum mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thy wife shall be as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house: thy children like olive plants round about thy table.
target: Isterimu akan menjadi seperti pohon anggur yang subur di dalam rumahmu; anak-anakmu seperti tunas pohon zaitun sekeliling mejamu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the servants of Absalom did unto Amnon as Absalom had commanded. Then all the king's sons arose, and every man gat him up upon his mule, and fled.
target: Orang-orang Absalom memperlakukan Amnon seperti yang diperintahkan Absalom. Lalu bangunlah semua anak raja itu, mereka menaiki bagalnya masing-masing dan melarikan diri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But he perceived their craftiness, and said unto them, Why tempt ye me?
target: Tetapi Yesus mengetahui maksud mereka yang licik itu, lalu berkata kepada mereka:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they utterly destroyed all that was in the city, both man and woman, young and old, and ox, and sheep, and ass, with the edge of the sword.
target: Mereka menumpas dengan mata pedang segala sesuatu yang di dalam kota itu, baik laki-laki maupun perempuan, baik tua maupun muda, sampai kepada lembu, domba dan keledai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Nevertheless the hand of Ahikam the son of Shaphan was with Jeremiah, that they should not give him into the hand of the people to put him to death.
target: Tetapi Yeremia dilindungi oleh Ahikam bin Safan, sehingga ia tidak diserahkan ke dalam tangan rakyat untuk dibunuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hast also committed fornication with the Egyptians thy neighbours, great of flesh; and hast increased thy whoredoms, to provoke me to anger.
target: Engkau bersundal dengan orang Mesir, tetanggamu, si aurat besar itu, sehingga persundalanmu bertambah-tambah, yang menimbulkan sakit hati-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they said, Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement, and to put her away.
target: Jawab mereka: "Musa memberi izin untuk menceraikannya dengan membuat surat cerai."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD; I am returned unto Zion, and will dwell in the midst of Jerusalem: and Jerusalem shall be called a city of truth; and the mountain of the LORD of hosts the holy mountain.
target: Beginilah firman TUHAN: Aku akan kembali ke Sion dan akan diam di tengah-tengah Yerusalem. Yerusalem akan disebut Kota Setia, dan gunung TUHAN semesta alam akan disebut Gunung Kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore, if it seem good to the king, let there be search made in the king's treasure house, which is there at Babylon, whether it be so, that a decree was made of Cyrus the king to build this house of God at Jerusalem, and let the king send his pleasure to us concerning this matter.
target: Oleh sebab itu, jikalau dianggap baik oleh raja, maka hendaklah diadakan penyelidikan di dalam gedung perbendaharaan raja, di sana, di Babel, apakah pernah dikeluarkan perintah oleh raja Koresh untuk membangun kembali rumah Allah yang di Yerusalem itu. Kemudian keputusan raja tentang hal itu kiranya dikirimkan kepada kami."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And white robes were given unto every one of them; and it was said unto them, that they should rest yet for a little season, until their fellowservants also and their brethren, that should be killed as they were, should be fulfilled.
target: Dan kepada mereka masing-masing diberikan sehelai jubah putih, dan kepada mereka dikatakan, bahwa mereka harus beristirahat sedikit waktu lagi hingga genap jumlah kawan-kawan pelayan dan saudara-saudara mereka, yang akan dibunuh sama seperti mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And your covenant with death shall be disannulled, and your agreement with hell shall not stand; when the overflowing scourge shall pass through, then ye shall be trodden down by it.
target: Perjanjianmu dengan maut itu akan ditiadakan, dan persetujuanmu dengan dunia orang mati itu tidak akan tetap berlaku; apabila cemeti berdesik-desik dengan kerasnya, kamu akan hancur diinjak-injak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God created great whales, and every living creature that moveth, which the waters brought forth abundantly, after their kind, and every winged fowl after his kind: and God saw that it was good.
target: Maka Allah menciptakan binatang-binatang laut yang besar dan segala jenis makhluk hidup yang bergerak, yang berkeriapan dalam air, dan segala jenis burung yang bersayap. Allah melihat bahwa semuanya itu baik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My hands also will I lift up unto thy commandments, which I have loved; and I will meditate in thy statutes.
target: Aku menaikkan tanganku kepada perintah-perintah-Mu yang kucintai, dan aku hendak merenungkan ketetapan-ketetapan-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And desiring to be fed with the crumbs which fell from the rich man's table: moreover the dogs came and licked his sores.
target: dan ingin menghilangkan laparnya dengan apa yang jatuh dari meja orang kaya itu. Malahan anjing-anjing datang dan menjilat boroknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Jesus took him by the hand, and lifted him up; and he arose.
target: Tetapi Yesus memegang tangan anak itu dan membangunkannya, lalu ia bangkit sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Anah were these; Dishon, and Aholibamah the daughter of Anah.
target: Inilah anak-anak Ana: Disyon dan Oholibama anak perempuan Ana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the old man said, Peace be with thee; howsoever let all thy wants lie upon me; only lodge not in the street.
target: Lalu berkatalah orang tua itu: "Jangan kuatir! Segala yang engkau perlukan biarlah aku yang menanggung, tetapi janganlah engkau bermalam di tanah lapang kota ini."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Zebulun; Sered, and Elon, and Jahleel.
target: Anak-anak Zebulon ialah Sered, Elon dan Yahleel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall know that I am the LORD their God, that brought them forth out of the land of Egypt, that I may dwell among them: I am the LORD their God.
target: Maka mereka akan mengetahui, bahwa Akulah, TUHAN, Allah mereka, yang telah membawa mereka keluar dari tanah Mesir, supaya Aku diam di tengah-tengah mereka; Akulah TUHAN, Allah mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Unto me men gave ear, and waited, and kept silence at my counsel.
target: Kepadakulah orang mendengar sambil menanti, dengan diam mereka mendengarkan nasihatku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses took the blood, and sprinkled it on the people, and said, Behold the blood of the covenant, which the LORD hath made with you concerning all these words.
target: Kemudian Musa mengambil darah itu dan menyiramkannya pada bangsa itu serta berkata: "Inilah darah perjanjian yang diadakan TUHAN dengan kamu, berdasarkan segala firman ini."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A soft answer turneth away wrath: but grievous words stir up anger.
target: Jawaban yang lemah lembut meredakan kegeraman, tetapi perkataan yang pedas membangkitkan marah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He answered them, He that made me whole, the same said unto me, Take up thy bed, and walk.
target: Akan tetapi ia menjawab mereka: "Orang yang telah menyembuhkan aku, Dia yang mengatakan kepadaku: Angkatlah tilammu dan berjalanlah."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt stand abroad, and the man to whom thou dost lend shall bring out the pledge abroad unto thee.
target: Haruslah engkau tinggal berdiri di luar, dan orang yang kauberi pinjaman itu haruslah membawa gadai itu ke luar kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For all the day long have I been plagued, and chastened every morning.
target: Namun sepanjang hari aku kena tulah, dan kena hukum setiap pagi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They say unto the blind man again, What sayest thou of him, that he hath opened thine eyes? He said, He is a prophet.
target: Lalu kata mereka pula kepada orang buta itu: "Dan engkau, apakah katamu tentang Dia, karena Ia telah memelekkan matamu?" Jawabnya: "Ia adalah seorang nabi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the priest shall burn it upon the altar: it is the food of the offering made by fire unto the LORD.
target: Imam harus membakarnya di atas mezbah sebagai santapan berupa korban api-apian bagi TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If any of thine be driven out unto the outmost parts of heaven, from thence will the LORD thy God gather thee, and from thence will he fetch thee:
target: Sekalipun orang-orang yang terhalau dari padamu ada di ujung langit, dari sana pun TUHAN, Allahmu, akan mengumpulkan engkau kembali dan dari sana pun Ia akan mengambil engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt beat him with the rod, and shalt deliver his soul from hell.
target: Engkau memukulnya dengan rotan, tetapi engkau menyelamatkan nyawanya dari dunia orang mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall put his hand upon the head of the burnt offering; and it shall be accepted for him to make atonement for him.
target: Lalu ia harus meletakkan tangannya ke atas kepala korban bakaran itu, sehingga baginya persembahan itu diperkenan untuk mengadakan pendamaian baginya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore I pray you to take some meat: for this is for your health: for there shall not an hair fall from the head of any of you.
target: Karena itu aku menasihati kamu, supaya kamu makan dahulu. Hal itu perlu untuk keselamatanmu. Tidak seorang pun di antara kamu akan kehilangan sehelai pun dari rambut kepalanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And one washed the chariot in the pool of Samaria; and the dogs licked up his blood; and they washed his armour; according unto the word of the LORD which he spake.
target: Ketika kereta itu dicuci di tepi telaga Samaria, maka darah raja dijilat anjing, sedang perempuan-perempuan sundal mandi di tempat itu, sesuai dengan firman TUHAN yang telah diucapkan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Solomon told her all her questions: and there was nothing hid from Solomon which he told her not.
target: Dan Salomo menjawab segala pertanyaan ratu itu; bagi Salomo tidak ada yang tersembunyi, yang tidak dapat dijawabnya untuk ratu itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the Lord GOD unto these bones; Behold, I will cause breath to enter into you, and ye shall live:
target: Beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH kepada tulang-tulang ini: Aku memberi nafas hidup di dalammu, supaya kamu hidup kembali.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And on the eighth day he shall bring two turtles, or two young pigeons, to the priest, to the door of the tabernacle of the congregation:
target: Pada hari yang kedelapan haruslah ia membawa dua ekor burung tekukur atau dua ekor anak burung merpati kepada imam, ke pintu Kemah Pertemuan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But we were gentle among you, even as a nurse cherisheth her children:
target: Tetapi kami berlaku ramah di antara kamu, sama seperti seorang ibu mengasuh dan merawati anaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Take therefore no thought for the morrow: for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself. Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof.
target: Sebab itu janganlah kamu kuatir akan hari besok, karena hari besok mempunyai kesusahannya sendiri. Kesusahan sehari cukuplah untuk sehari."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will give the men that have transgressed my covenant, which have not performed the words of the covenant which they had made before me, when they cut the calf in twain, and passed between the parts thereof,
target: Dan Aku akan menyerahkan orang-orang, yang melanggar perjanjian-Ku dan yang tidak menepati isi perjanjian yang mereka ikat di hadapan-Ku, dengan memotong anak lembu jantan menjadi dua untuk berjalan di antara belahan-belahannya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And on the seventh day God ended his work which he had made; and he rested on the seventh day from all his work which he had made.
target: Ketika Allah pada hari ketujuh telah menyelesaikan pekerjaan yang dibuat-Nya itu, berhentilah Ia pada hari ketujuh dari segala pekerjaan yang telah dibuat-Nya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To morrow go ye down against them: behold, they come up by the cliff of Ziz; and ye shall find them at the end of the brook, before the wilderness of Jeruel.
target: Besok haruslah kamu turun menyerang mereka. Mereka akan mendaki pendakian Zis, dan kamu akan mendapati mereka di ujung lembah, di muka padang gurun Yeruel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he wrote a letter after this manner:
target: Dan ia menulis surat, yang isinya sebagai berikut:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Abraham said, Son, remember that thou in thy lifetime receivedst thy good things, and likewise Lazarus evil things: but now he is comforted, and thou art tormented.
target: Tetapi Abraham berkata: Anak, ingatlah, bahwa engkau telah menerima segala yang baik sewaktu hidupmu, sedangkan Lazarus segala yang buruk. Sekarang ia mendapat hiburan dan engkau sangat menderita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye shall observe to do therefore as the LORD your God hath commanded you: ye shall not turn aside to the right hand or to the left.
target: Maka lakukanlah semuanya itu dengan setia, seperti yang diperintahkan kepadamu oleh TUHAN, Allahmu. Janganlah menyimpang ke kanan atau ke kiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Blessed are they that keep his testimonies, and that seek him with the whole heart.
target: Berbahagialah orang-orang yang memegang peringatan-peringatan-Nya, yang mencari Dia dengan segenap hati,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the evening she went, and on the morrow she returned into the second house of the women, to the custody of Shaashgaz, the king's chamberlain, which kept the concubines: she came in unto the king no more, except the king delighted in her, and that she were called by name.
target: Pada waktu petang ia masuk dan pada waktu pagi ia kembali, tetapi sekali ini ke dalam balai perempuan yang kedua, di bawah pengawasan Saasgas, sida-sida raja, penjaga para gundik. Ia tidak diperkenankan masuk lagi menghadap raja, kecuali jikalau raja berkenan kepadanya dan ia dipanggil dengan disebutkan namanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the Lord GOD, It shall not stand, neither shall it come to pass.
target: maka beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Tidak akan sampai hal itu, dan tidak akan terjadi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth, and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth.
target: karena Tuhan menghajar orang yang dikasihi-Nya, dan Ia menyesah orang yang diakui-Nya sebagai anak."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because thine heart was tender, and thou hast humbled thyself before the LORD, when thou heardest what I spake against this place, and against the inhabitants thereof, that they should become a desolation and a curse, and hast rent thy clothes, and wept before me; I also have heard thee, saith the LORD.
target: oleh karena engkau sudah menyesal dan engkau merendahkan diri di hadapan TUHAN pada waktu engkau mendengar hukuman yang Kufirmankan terhadap tempat ini dan terhadap penduduknya, bahwa mereka akan mendahsyatkan dan menjadi kutuk, dan oleh karena engkau mengoyakkan pakaianmu dan menangis di hadapan-Ku, Aku pun telah mendengarnya, demikianlah firman TUHAN,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If thou wilt send our brother with us, we will go down and buy thee food:
target: Jika engkau mau membiarkan adik kami pergi bersama-sama dengan kami, maka kami mau pergi ke sana dan membeli bahan makanan bagimu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now, Lord, what wait I for? my hope is in thee.
target: Ia hanyalah bayangan yang berlalu! Ia hanya mempeributkan yang sia-sia dan menimbun, tetapi tidak tahu, siapa yang meraupnya nanti.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And of the sons of Bani; Meshullam, Malluch, and Adaiah, Jashub, and Sheal, and Ramoth.
target: Dari bani Bani: Mesulam, Malukh, Adaya, Yasub, Seal dan Yeramot.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The prince of the children of Joseph, for the tribe of the children of Manasseh, Hanniel the son of Ephod.
target: dari anak-anak Yusuf, yakni dari suku bani Manasye seorang pemimpin Haniel bin Efod;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, that when the army of the Chaldeans was broken up from Jerusalem for fear of Pharaoh's army,
target: Ketika tentara orang Kasdim itu telah angkat kaki dari Yerusalem oleh karena takut kepada tentara Firaun,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He removed the high places, and brake the images, and cut down the groves, and brake in pieces the brasen serpent that Moses had made: for unto those days the children of Israel did burn incense to it: and he called it Nehushtan.
target: Dialah yang menjauhkan bukit-bukit pengorbanan dan yang meremukkan tugu-tugu berhala dan yang menebang tiang-tiang berhala dan yang menghancurkan ular tembaga yang dibuat Musa, sebab sampai pada masa itu orang Israel memang masih membakar korban bagi ular itu yang namanya disebut Nehustan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of Shephatiah, three hundred seventy and two.
target: bani Sefaca: tiga ratus tujuh puluh dua orang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Him that dieth of Baasha in the city shall the dogs eat; and him that dieth of his in the fields shall the fowls of the air eat.
target: Siapa yang mati dari pada Baesa di kota, akan dimakan anjing dan yang mati dari padanya di padang akan dimakan burung yang di udara."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Only the LORD had a delight in thy fathers to love them, and he chose their seed after them, even you above all people, as it is this day.
target: tetapi hanya oleh nenek moyangmulah hati TUHAN terpikat sehingga Ia mengasihi mereka, dan keturunan merekalah, yakni kamu, yang dipilih-Nya dari segala bangsa, seperti sekarang ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore the Lord said, Forasmuch as this people draw near me with their mouth, and with their lips do honour me, but have removed their heart far from me, and their fear toward me is taught by the precept of men:
target: Dan Tuhan telah berfirman: "Oleh karena bangsa ini datang mendekat dengan mulutnya dan memuliakan Aku dengan bibirnya, padahal hatinya menjauh dari pada-Ku, dan ibadahnya kepada-Ku hanyalah perintah manusia yang dihafalkan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But when they came to Jesus, and saw that he was dead already, they brake not his legs:
target: tetapi ketika mereka sampai kepada Yesus dan melihat bahwa Ia telah mati, mereka tidak mematahkan kaki-Nya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He is despised and rejected of men; a man of sorrows, and acquainted with grief: and we hid as it were our faces from him; he was despised, and we esteemed him not.
target: Ia dihina dan dihindari orang, seorang yang penuh kesengsaraan dan yang biasa menderita kesakitan; ia sangat dihina, sehingga orang menutup mukanya terhadap dia dan bagi kita pun dia tidak masuk hitungan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David sent forth a third part of the people under the hand of Joab, and a third part under the hand of Abishai the son of Zeruiah, Joab's brother, and a third part under the hand of Ittai the Gittite. And the king said unto the people, I will surely go forth with you myself also.
target: Lalu Daud menyuruh tentara itu maju berperang, sepertiga di bawah perintah Yoab, sepertiga lagi di bawah perintah Abisai, anak Zeruya, adik Yoab, dan sepertiga lainnya di bawah perintah Itai, orang Gat itu. Lalu berkatalah raja kepada rakyat: "Aku juga akan maju berperang bersama-sama dengan kamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They were stoned, they were sawn asunder, were tempted, were slain with the sword: they wandered about in sheepskins and goatskins; being destitute, afflicted, tormented;
target: Mereka dilempari, digergaji, dibunuh dengan pedang; mereka mengembara dengan berpakaian kulit domba dan kulit kambing sambil menderita kekurangan, kesesakan dan siksaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, Take nothing for your journey, neither staves, nor scrip, neither bread, neither money; neither have two coats apiece.
target: kata-Nya kepada mereka: "Jangan membawa apa-apa dalam perjalanan, jangan membawa tongkat atau bekal, roti atau uang, atau dua helai baju.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he left them, and went out of the city into Bethany; and he lodged there.
target: Lalu Ia meninggalkan mereka dan pergi ke luar kota ke Betania dan bermalam di situ.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But they had heard only, That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed.
target: Mereka hanya mendengar, bahwa ia yang dahulu menganiaya mereka, sekarang memberitakan iman, yang pernah hendak dibinasakannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But withal prepare me also a lodging: for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you.
target: Dalam pada itu bersedialah juga memberi tumpangan kepadaku, karena aku harap oleh doamu aku akan dikembalikan kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Surely in the fire of my jealousy have I spoken against the residue of the heathen, and against all Idumea, which have appointed my land into their possession with the joy of all their heart, with despiteful minds, to cast it out for a prey.
target: oleh karena itu beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Aku pasti berfirman dalam api cemburuan-Ku melawan sisa bangsa-bangsa dan melawan seluruh Edom, yang menentukan tanah-Ku menjadi miliknya dengan segala rasa sukacita dan rasa penghinaan, sehingga tanah-Ku itu dimilikinya dan dapat habis dijarah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king of Ai they took alive, and brought him to Joshua.
target: Tetapi raja Ai ditangkap mereka hidup-hidup dan dihadapkan kepada Yosua.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abishua begat Bukki, and Bukki begat Uzzi,
target: Abisua memperanakkan Buki; Buki memperanakkan Uzi;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore have I poured out mine indignation upon them; I have consumed them with the fire of my wrath: their own way have I recompensed upon their heads, saith the Lord GOD.
target: Maka Aku mencurahkan geram-Ku atas mereka dan membinasakan mereka dengan api kemurkaan-Ku; kelakuan mereka Kutimpakan atas kepala mereka, demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When Jesus had thus said, he was troubled in spirit, and testified, and said, Verily, verily, I say unto you, that one of you shall betray me.
target: Setelah Yesus berkata demikian Ia sangat terharu, lalu bersaksi: "Aku berkata kepadamu, sesungguhnya seorang di antara kamu akan menyerahkan Aku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they lay themselves down upon clothes laid to pledge by every altar, and they drink the wine of the condemned in the house of their god.
target: mereka merebahkan diri di samping setiap mezbah di atas pakaian gadaian orang, dan minum anggur orang-orang yang kena denda di rumah Allah mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But as for us, the LORD is our God, and we have not forsaken him; and the priests, which minister unto the LORD, are the sons of Aaron, and the Levites wait upon their business:
target: Tetapi kami ini, TUHANlah Allah kami, dan kami tidak meninggalkan-Nya. Dan anak-anak Harunlah yang melayani TUHAN sebagai imam, sedang orang Lewi menunaikan tugasnya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To give subtilty to the simple, to the young man knowledge and discretion.
target: untuk memberikan kecerdasan kepada orang yang tak berpengalaman, dan pengetahuan serta kebijaksanaan kepada orang muda —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore she went forth out of the place where she was, and her two daughters in law with her; and they went on the way to return unto the land of Judah.
target: Maka berangkatlah ia dari tempat tinggalnya itu, bersama-sama dengan kedua menantunya. Ketika mereka sedang di jalan untuk pulang ke tanah Yehuda,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses spake unto all the congregation of the children of Israel, saying, This is the thing which the LORD commanded, saying,
target: Berkatalah Musa kepada segenap jemaah Israel: "Inilah firman yang diperintahkan TUHAN, bunyinya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Keep therefore and do them; for this is your wisdom and your understanding in the sight of the nations, which shall hear all these statutes, and say, Surely this great nation is a wise and understanding people.
target: Lakukanlah itu dengan setia, sebab itulah yang akan menjadi kebijaksanaanmu dan akal budimu di mata bangsa-bangsa yang pada waktu mendengar segala ketetapan ini akan berkata: Memang bangsa yang besar ini adalah umat yang bijaksana dan berakal budi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves, that we should not trust in ourselves, but in God which raiseth the dead:
target: Bahkan kami merasa, seolah-olah kami telah dijatuhi hukuman mati. Tetapi hal itu terjadi, supaya kami jangan menaruh kepercayaan pada diri kami sendiri, tetapi hanya kepada Allah yang membangkitkan orang-orang mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And her husband heard it, and held his peace at her, and disallowed her not: then all her vows shall stand, and every bond wherewith she bound her soul shall stand.
target: dan suaminya mendengarnya, tetapi tidak berkata apa-apa kepadanya dan tidak melarang dia, maka segala nazar perempuan itu akan tetap berlaku, dan setiap janji yang mengikat diri perempuan itu akan tetap berlaku juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And say, Thus saith the Lord GOD unto Jerusalem; Thy birth and thy nativity is of the land of Canaan; thy father was an Amorite, and thy mother an Hittite.
target: dan katakanlah: Beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH kepada Yerusalem: Asalmu dan kelahiranmu ialah dari tanah Kanaan; ayahmu ialah orang Amori dan ibumu orang Heti.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, that, when the sun went down, and it was dark, behold a smoking furnace, and a burning lamp that passed between those pieces.
target: Ketika matahari telah terbenam, dan hari menjadi gelap, maka kelihatanlah perapian yang berasap beserta suluh yang berapi lewat di antara potongan-potongan daging itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said, Shall I hide from Abraham that thing which I do;
target: Berpikirlah TUHAN: "Apakah Aku akan menyembunyikan kepada Abraham apa yang hendak Kulakukan ini?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then whosoever heareth the sound of the trumpet, and taketh not warning; if the sword come, and take him away, his blood shall be upon his own head.
target: kalau ada seorang yang memang mendengar suara sangkakala itu, tetapi ia tidak mau diperingatkan, sehingga sesudah pedang itu datang ia dihabiskan, darahnya tertimpa kepadanya sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yea, he magnified himself even to the prince of the host, and by him the daily sacrifice was taken away, and the place of the sanctuary was cast down.
target: Bahkan terhadap Panglima bala tentara itu pun ia membesarkan dirinya, dan dari pada-Nya diambilnya korban persembahan sehari-hari, dan tempat-Nya yang kudus dirobohkannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The baptism of John, was it from heaven, or of men? answer me.
target: Baptisan Yohanes itu, dari sorga atau dari manusia? Berikanlah Aku jawabnya!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will restore thy judges as at the first, and thy counsellors as at the beginning: afterward thou shalt be called, The city of righteousness, the faithful city.
target: Aku akan mengembalikan para hakimmu seperti dahulu, dan para penasihatmu seperti semula. Sesudah itu engkau akan disebutkan kota keadilan, kota yang setia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD appeared unto him the same night, and said, I am the God of Abraham thy father: fear not, for I am with thee, and will bless thee, and multiply thy seed for my servant Abraham's sake.
target: Lalu pada malam itu TUHAN menampakkan diri kepadanya serta berfirman: "Akulah Allah ayahmu Abraham; janganlah takut, sebab Aku menyertai engkau; Aku akan memberkati engkau dan membuat banyak keturunanmu karena Abraham, hamba-Ku itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that diligently seeketh good procureth favour: but he that seeketh mischief, it shall come unto him.
target: Siapa mengejar kebaikan, berusaha untuk dikenan orang, tetapi siapa mengejar kejahatan akan ditimpa kejahatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: See then that ye walk circumspectly, not as fools, but as wise,
target: Karena itu, perhatikanlah dengan saksama, bagaimana kamu hidup, janganlah seperti orang bebal, tetapi seperti orang arif,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I opened to my beloved; but my beloved had withdrawn himself, and was gone: my soul failed when he spake: I sought him, but I could not find him; I called him, but he gave me no answer.
target: Kekasihku kubukakan pintu, tetapi kekasihku sudah pergi, lenyap. Seperti pingsan aku ketika ia menghilang. Kucari dia, tetapi tak kutemui, kupanggil, tetapi tak disahutnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O lord God of my salvation, I have cried day and night before thee:
target: Nyanyian. Mazmur bani Korah. Untuk pemimpin biduan. Menurut lagu: Mahalat Leanot. Nyanyian pengajaran Heman, orang Ezrahi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they said unto him, Nay, my lord, but to buy food are thy servants come.
target: Tetapi jawab mereka: "Tidak tuanku! Hanyalah untuk membeli bahan makanan hamba-hambamu ini datang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when ye see the south wind blow, ye say, There will be heat; and it cometh to pass.
target: Dan apabila kamu melihat angin selatan bertiup, kamu berkata: Hari akan panas terik, dan hal itu memang terjadi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye answered me, and said, The thing which thou hast spoken is good for us to do.
target: Lalu kamu menjawab aku: Memang baik apa yang kauanjurkan untuk dilakukan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the houses of the villages which have no wall round about them shall be counted as the fields of the country: they may be redeemed, and they shall go out in the jubile.
target: Tetapi rumah-rumah di desa-desa yang tidak dikelilingi pagar tembok haruslah dianggap sama dengan ladang-ladang di negeri itu, atasnya harus ada hak menebus dan dalam tahun Yobel rumah itu harus bebas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore I said unto the children of Israel, No soul of you shall eat blood, neither shall any stranger that sojourneth among you eat blood.
target: Itulah sebabnya Aku berfirman kepada orang Israel: Seorang pun di antaramu janganlah makan darah. Demikian juga orang asing yang tinggal di tengah-tengahmu tidak boleh makan darah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the deputy, when he saw what was done, believed, being astonished at the doctrine of the Lord.
target: Melihat apa yang telah terjadi itu, percayalah gubernur itu; ia takjub oleh ajaran Tuhan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Else when thou shalt bless with the spirit, how shall he that occupieth the room of the unlearned say Amen at thy giving of thanks, seeing he understandeth not what thou sayest?
target: Sebab, jika engkau mengucap syukur dengan rohmu saja, bagaimanakah orang biasa yang hadir sebagai pendengar dapat mengatakan "amin" atas pengucapan syukurmu? Bukankah ia tidak tahu apa yang engkau katakan?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If I covered my transgressions as Adam, by hiding mine iniquity in my bosom:
target: Jikalau aku menutupi pelanggaranku seperti manusia dengan menyembunyikan kesalahanku dalam hatiku,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John.
target: Sebab semua nabi dan kitab Taurat bernubuat hingga tampilnya Yohanes

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus heard that they had cast him out; and when he had found him, he said unto him, Dost thou believe on the Son of God?
target: Yesus mendengar bahwa ia telah diusir ke luar oleh mereka. Kemudian Ia bertemu dengan dia dan berkata: "Percayakah engkau kepada Anak Manusia?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus shalt thou say unto him, The LORD saith thus; Behold, that which I have built will I break down, and that which I have planted I will pluck up, even this whole land.
target: maka beginilah firman TUHAN: Sesungguhnya, apa yang Kubangun akan Kuruntuhkan, dan apa yang Kutanam akan Kucabut, bahkan sekalipun seluruh negeri!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if she vowed in her husband's house, or bound her soul by a bond with an oath;
target: Jika seorang perempuan di rumah suaminya bernazar atau mengikat dirinya kepada suatu janji dengan bersumpah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When therefore Paul and Barnabas had no small dissension and disputation with them, they determined that Paul and Barnabas, and certain other of them, should go up to Jerusalem unto the apostles and elders about this question.
target: Tetapi Paulus dan Barnabas dengan keras melawan dan membantah pendapat mereka itu. Akhirnya ditetapkan, supaya Paulus dan Barnabas serta beberapa orang lain dari jemaat itu pergi kepada rasul-rasul dan penatua-penatua di Yerusalem untuk membicarakan soal itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors, and brought them forth, and said,
target: Tetapi waktu malam seorang malaikat Tuhan membuka pintu-pintu penjara itu dan membawa mereka ke luar, katanya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the mountains shall be molten under him, and the valleys shall be cleft, as wax before the fire, and as the waters that are poured down a steep place.
target: Luluhlah gunung-gunung di bawah kaki-Nya, dan lembah-lembah terbelah seperti lilin di depan api, seperti air tercurah di penurunan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Are thy days as the days of man? are thy years as man's days,
target: Apakah hari-hari-Mu seperti hari-hari manusia, tahun-tahun-Mu seperti hari-hari orang laki-laki,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Notwithstanding, if the land of your possession be unclean, then pass ye over unto the land of the possession of the LORD, wherein the LORD's tabernacle dwelleth, and take possession among us: but rebel not against the LORD, nor rebel against us, in building you an altar beside the altar of the LORD our God.
target: Akan tetapi, jika sekiranya tanah milikmu itu najis, marilah menyeberang ke tanah milik TUHAN, tempat kedudukan Kemah Suci TUHAN, dan menetaplah di tengah-tengah kami. Tetapi janganlah memberontak terhadap TUHAN dan janganlah memberontak terhadap kami, dengan mendirikan mezbah bagimu sendiri, selain dari mezbah TUHAN, Allah kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ornan turned back, and saw the angel; and his four sons with him hid themselves. Now Ornan was threshing wheat.
target: Ornan sedang mengirik gandum; ketika ia memalingkan diri, dilihatnyalah malaikat itu; keempat anaknya yang bersama-sama dengan dia menyembunyikan diri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the LORD hath chosen Jacob unto himself, and Israel for his peculiar treasure.
target: Sebab TUHAN telah memilih Yakub bagi-Nya, Israel menjadi milik kesayangan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: At the end of seven years let ye go every man his brother an Hebrew, which hath been sold unto thee; and when he hath served thee six years, thou shalt let him go free from thee: but your fathers hearkened not unto me, neither inclined their ear.
target: Pada akhir tujuh tahun haruslah kamu masing-masing melepaskan saudaranya bangsa Ibrani yang sudah menjual dirinya kepadamu; ia akan bekerja padamu enam tahun lamanya, kemudian haruslah engkau melepaskan dia sebagai orang merdeka. Tetapi nenek moyangmu tidak mendengarkan Aku dan tidak memperhatikan Aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then set it empty upon the coals thereof, that the brass of it may be hot, and may burn, and that the filthiness of it may be molten in it, that the scum of it may be consumed.
target: Letakkanlah periuk itu kosong di atas bara api, supaya itu dibakar dan tembaganya menjadi merah, sehingga kotorannya hancur di dalamnya dan karatnya hilang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said unto Aaron, Thou and thy sons and thy father's house with thee shall bear the iniquity of the sanctuary: and thou and thy sons with thee shall bear the iniquity of your priesthood.
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Harun: "Engkau ini dan anak-anakmu beserta seluruh sukumu haruslah menanggung akibat setiap kesalahan terhadap tempat kudus; sedang hanya engkau beserta anak-anakmulah yang harus menanggung akibat setiap kesalahan yang dilakukan dalam jabatanmu sebagai imam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: On the fourth day Elizur the son of Shedeur, prince of the children of Reuben, did offer:
target: Pada hari keempat: pemimpin bani Ruben, Elizur bin Syedeur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the fifth angel sounded, and I saw a star fall from heaven unto the earth: and to him was given the key of the bottomless pit.
target: Lalu malaikat yang kelima meniup sangkakalanya, dan aku melihat sebuah bintang yang jatuh dari langit ke atas bumi, dan kepadanya diberikan anak kunci lobang jurang maut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I know your manifold transgressions and your mighty sins: they afflict the just, they take a bribe, and they turn aside the poor in the gate from their right.
target: Sebab Aku tahu, bahwa perbuatanmu yang jahat banyak dan dosamu berjumlah besar, hai kamu yang menjadikan orang benar terjepit, yang menerima uang suap dan yang mengesampingkan orang miskin di pintu gerbang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred, and evil entreated our fathers, so that they cast out their young children, to the end they might not live.
target: Raja itu mempergunakan tipu daya terhadap bangsa kita dan menganiaya nenek moyang kita serta menyuruh membuang bayi mereka, supaya bangsa kita itu jangan berkembang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the Asherites dwelt among the Canaanites, the inhabitants of the land: for they did not drive them out.
target: sehingga orang Asyer itu diam di tengah-tengah orang Kanaan, penduduk asli di negeri itu, sebab orang-orang itu tidak dihalaunya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They say unto him, He will miserably destroy those wicked men, and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen, which shall render him the fruits in their seasons.
target: Kata mereka kepada-Nya: "Ia akan membinasakan orang-orang jahat itu dan kebun anggurnya akan disewakannya kepada penggarap-penggarap lain, yang akan menyerahkan hasilnya kepadanya pada waktunya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Arise, O LORD, disappoint him, cast him down: deliver my soul from the wicked, which is thy sword:
target: Bangunlah, TUHAN, hadapilah mereka, rebahkanlah mereka, luputkanlah aku dengan pedang-Mu dari pada orang fasik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters, and to please them well in all things; not answering again;
target: Hamba-hamba hendaklah taat kepada tuannya dalam segala hal dan berkenan kepada mereka, jangan membantah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the year of the jubile the field shall return unto him of whom it was bought, even to him to whom the possession of the land did belong.
target: Dalam tahun Yobel ladang itu harus dipulangkan kepada orang yang menjualnya kepadanya, yakni kepada orang yang mula-mula memiliki tanah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thy Maker is thine husband; the LORD of hosts is his name; and thy Redeemer the Holy One of Israel; The God of the whole earth shall he be called.
target: Sebab yang menjadi suamimu ialah Dia yang menjadikan engkau, TUHAN semesta alam nama-Nya; yang menjadi Penebusmu ialah Yang Mahakudus, Allah Israel, Ia disebut Allah seluruh bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then sat Solomon upon the throne of David his father; and his kingdom was established greatly.
target: Salomo duduk di atas takhta Daud, ayahnya, dan kerajaannya sangat kokoh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For in death there is no remembrance of thee: in the grave who shall give thee thanks?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: According to my earnest expectation and my hope, that in nothing I shall be ashamed, but that with all boldness, as always, so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body, whether it be by life, or by death.
target: Sebab yang sangat kurindukan dan kuharapkan ialah bahwa aku dalam segala hal tidak akan beroleh malu, melainkan seperti sediakala, demikian pun sekarang, Kristus dengan nyata dimuliakan di dalam tubuhku, baik oleh hidupku, maupun oleh matiku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For, lo, the days come, saith the LORD, that I will bring again the captivity of my people Israel and Judah, saith the LORD: and I will cause them to return to the land that I gave to their fathers, and they shall possess it.
target: Sebab, sesungguhnya, waktunya akan datang, demikianlah firman TUHAN, bahwa Aku akan memulihkan keadaan umat-Ku Israel dan Yehuda — firman TUHAN — dan Aku akan mengembalikan mereka ke negeri yang telah Kuberikan kepada nenek moyang mereka, dan mereka akan memilikinya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Where their worm dieth not, and the fire is not quenched.
target: di mana ulat-ulat bangkai tidak mati dan api tidak padam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joseph nourished his father, and his brethren, and all his father's household, with bread, according to their families.
target: Dan Yusuf memelihara ayahnya, saudara-saudaranya dan seisi rumah ayahnya dengan makanan, menurut jumlah anak-anak mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And at Ziklag, and at Mekonah, and in the villages thereof,
target: di Ziklag, di Mekhona dan segala anak kotanya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses numbered them according to the word of the LORD, as he was commanded.
target: Lalu Musa mencatat mereka sesuai dengan titah TUHAN, seperti yang diperintahkan kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore shall all hands be faint, and every man's heart shall melt:
target: Sebab itu semua tangan akan menjadi lemah lesu, setiap hati manusia akan menjadi tawar,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But they understood not this saying, and it was hid from them, that they perceived it not: and they feared to ask him of that saying.
target: Mereka tidak mengerti perkataan itu, sebab artinya tersembunyi bagi mereka, sehingga mereka tidak dapat memahaminya. Dan mereka tidak berani menanyakan arti perkataan itu kepada-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Philip findeth Nathanael, and saith unto him, We have found him, of whom Moses in the law, and the prophets, did write, Jesus of Nazareth, the son of Joseph.
target: Filipus bertemu dengan Natanael dan berkata kepadanya: "Kami telah menemukan Dia, yang disebut oleh Musa dalam kitab Taurat dan oleh para nabi, yaitu Yesus, anak Yusuf dari Nazaret."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall answer, Because they forsook the LORD their God, who brought forth their fathers out of the land of Egypt, and have taken hold upon other gods, and have worshipped them, and served them: therefore hath the LORD brought upon them all this evil.
target: Maka orang akan berkata: Sebab mereka meninggalkan TUHAN, Allah mereka, yang membawa nenek moyang mereka keluar dari tanah Mesir dan sebab mereka berpegang pada allah lain dan sujud menyembah kepadanya dan beribadah kepadanya. Itulah sebabnya TUHAN mendatangkan segala malapetaka ini ke atas mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she gave the king an hundred and twenty talents of gold, and of spices great abundance, and precious stones: neither was there any such spice as the queen of Sheba gave king Solomon.
target: Lalu diberikan kepada raja seratus dua puluh talenta emas, dan sangat banyak rempah-rempah dan batu permata yang mahal-mahal; tidak pernah lagi ada rempah-rempah seperti yang diberikan ratu negeri Syeba kepada raja Salomo itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Cursed be he that smiteth his neighbour secretly. And all the people shall say, Amen.
target: Terkutuklah orang yang membunuh sesamanya manusia dengan tersembunyi. Dan seluruh bangsa itu haruslah berkata: Amin!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he went from year to year in circuit to Bethel, and Gilgal, and Mizpeh, and judged Israel in all those places.
target: Dari tahun ke tahun ia berkeliling ke Betel, Gilgal dan Mizpa, dan memerintah atas orang Israel di segala tempat itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he took their king's crown from off his head, the weight whereof was a talent of gold with the precious stones: and it was set on David's head. And he brought forth the spoil of the city in great abundance.
target: Ia mengambil mahkota dari kepala raja mereka, beratnya setalenta emas, bertatahkan sebuah batu permata yang mahal dan itu dikenakan pada kepala Daud. Juga diangkutnya banyak sekali jarahan dari kota itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will send a fire on Magog, and among them that dwell carelessly in the isles: and they shall know that I am the LORD.
target: Aku mendatangkan api ke atas Magog dan ke atas orang-orang yang diam di daerah pesisir dengan aman tenteram, dan mereka akan mengetahui bahwa Akulah TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto the kinsman, Naomi, that is come again out of the country of Moab, selleth a parcel of land, which was our brother Elimelech's:
target: Lalu berkatalah ia kepada penebus itu: "Tanah milik kepunyaan saudara kita Elimelekh hendak dijual oleh Naomi, yang telah pulang dari daerah Moab.
