input: Then thou shalt cut off her hand, thine eye shall not pity her.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whereby, when ye read, ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ)
target: Apabila kamu membacanya, kamu dapat mengetahui dari padanya pengertianku akan rahasia Kristus,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Weep ye not for the dead, neither bemoan him: but weep sore for him that goeth away: for he shall return no more, nor see his native country.
target: Janganlah kamu menangisi orang mati dan janganlah turut berdukacita karena dia. Lebih baiklah kamu menangisi dia yang sudah pergi, sebab ia tidak akan kembali lagi, ia tidak lagi akan melihat tanah kelahirannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To wit, the prophets of Israel which prophesy concerning Jerusalem, and which see visions of peace for her, and there is no peace, saith the Lord GOD.
target: yaitu nabi-nabi Israel yang bernubuat tentang Yerusalem dan melihat baginya suatu penglihatan mengenai damai sejahtera, padahal sama sekali tidak ada damai sejahtera, demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Both male and female shall ye put out, without the camp shall ye put them; that they defile not their camps, in the midst whereof I dwell.
target: baik laki-laki maupun perempuan haruslah kausuruh pergi; ke luar tempat perkemahan haruslah mereka kausuruh pergi, supaya mereka jangan menajiskan tempat perkemahan di mana Aku diam di tengah-tengah mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Surely they shall not see the land which I sware unto their fathers, neither shall any of them that provoked me see it:
target: pastilah tidak akan melihat negeri yang Kujanjikan dengan bersumpah kepada nenek moyang mereka! Semua yang menista Aku ini tidak akan melihatnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If thou faint in the day of adversity, thy strength is small.
target: Jika engkau tawar hati pada masa kesesakan, kecillah kekuatanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For meat destroy not the work of God. All things indeed are pure; but it is evil for that man who eateth with offence.
target: Janganlah engkau merusakkan pekerjaan Allah oleh karena makanan! Segala sesuatu adalah suci, tetapi celakalah orang, jika oleh makanannya orang lain tersandung!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, bless ye the LORD, all ye servants of the LORD, which by night stand in the house of the LORD.
target: Nyanyian ziarah. Mari, pujilah TUHAN, hai semua hamba TUHAN, yang datang melayani di rumah TUHAN pada waktu malam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A wise king scattereth the wicked, and bringeth the wheel over them.
target: Raja yang bijak dapat mengenal orang-orang fasik, dan menggilas mereka berulang-ulang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all countries came into Egypt to Joseph for to buy corn; because that the famine was so sore in all lands.
target: Juga dari seluruh bumi datanglah orang ke Mesir untuk membeli gandum dari Yusuf, sebab hebat kelaparan itu di seluruh bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And men shall speak of the might of thy terrible acts: and I will declare thy greatness.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All thy commandments are faithful: they persecute me wrongfully; help thou me.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses brought Aaron and his sons, and washed them with water.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of the Amramites, and the Izharites, the Hebronites, and the Uzzielites:
target: Dari orang Amram, orang Yizhar, orang Hebron dan orang Uziel

target: dan dari para budak di bait Allah, yang diberikan Daud dan para pembesar untuk membantu pekerjaan orang-orang Lewi, dua ratus dua puluh orang, yang masing-masing ditunjuk dengan disebut namanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Since those days were, when one came to an heap of twenty measures, there were but ten: when one came to the pressfat for to draw out fifty vessels out of the press, there were but twenty.
target: "Maka sekarang, perhatikanlah mulai dari hari ini dan selanjutnya! Sebelum ditaruh orang batu demi batu untuk pembangunan bait TUHAN,

input: And it was told him by certain which said, Thy mother and thy brethren stand without, desiring to see thee.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sons also of Hezron, that were born unto him; Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And this is the law of the sacrifice of peace offerings, which he shall offer unto the LORD.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Aku berkata kepadamu: Sesungguhnya ketika engkau masih muda engkau mengikat pinggangmu sendiri dan engkau berjalan ke mana saja kaukehendaki, tetapi jika engkau sudah menjadi tua, engkau akan mengulurkan tanganmu dan orang lain akan mengikat engkau dan membawa engkau ke tempat yang tidak kaukehendaki."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He was twenty and five years old when he began to reign, and reigned twenty and nine years in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Jehoaddan of Jerusalem.
target: Ia berumur dua puluh lima tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja dan dua puluh sembilan tahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem. Nama ibunya ialah Yoadan, dari Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The Son of man shall send forth his angels, and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend, and them which do iniquity;
target: Anak Manusia akan menyuruh malaikat-malaikat-Nya dan mereka akan mengumpulkan segala sesuatu yang menyesatkan dan semua orang yang melakukan kejahatan dari dalam Kerajaan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if Abraham were justified by works, he hath whereof to glory; but not before God.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: Which is not another; but there be some that trouble you, and would pervert the gospel of Christ.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Why then is this people of Jerusalem slidden back by a perpetual backsliding? they hold fast deceit, they refuse to return.

input: Doth the hawk fly by thy wisdom, and stretch her wings toward the south?

input: And she said, Truth, Lord: yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters' table.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: tetapi siapa yang mau bermegah, baiklah bermegah karena yang berikut: bahwa ia memahami dan mengenal Aku, bahwa Akulah TUHAN yang menunjukkan kasih setia, keadilan dan kebenaran di bumi; sungguh, semuanya itu Kusukai, demikianlah firman TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as ye would that men should do to you, do ye also to them likewise.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Eli blessed Elkanah and his wife, and said, The LORD give thee seed of this woman for the loan which is lent to the LORD. And they went unto their own home.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He shall deliver the island of the innocent: and it is delivered by the pureness of thine hands.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD, and followed the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, which made Israel to sin; he departed not therefrom.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they answered, Thy servant our father is in good health, he is yet alive. And they bowed down their heads, and made obeisance.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And that ye may put difference between holy and unholy, and between unclean and clean;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When I say unto the wicked, Thou shalt surely die; and thou givest him not warning, nor speakest to warn the wicked from his wicked way, to save his life; the same wicked man shall die in his iniquity; but his blood will I require at thine hand.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And with thee will I break in pieces the horse and his rider; and with thee will I break in pieces the chariot and his rider;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For this child I prayed; and the LORD hath given me my petition which I asked of him:
target: Untuk mendapat anak inilah aku berdoa, dan TUHAN telah memberikan kepadaku, apa yang kuminta dari pada-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of Harim, three hundred and twenty.
target: bani Harim: tiga ratus dua puluh orang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: God setteth the solitary in families: he bringeth out those which are bound with chains: but the rebellious dwell in a dry land.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And king Solomon made a navy of ships in Eziongeber, which is beside Eloth, on the shore of the Red sea, in the land of Edom.
target: Raja Salomo membuat juga kapal-kapal di Ezion-Geber yang ada di dekat Elot, di tepi Laut Teberau, di tanah Edom.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the dove found no rest for the sole of her foot, and she returned unto him into the ark, for the waters were on the face of the whole earth: then he put forth his hand, and took her, and pulled her in unto him into the ark.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Give unto the LORD, ye kindreds of the people, give unto the LORD glory and strength.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If I have found favour in the sight of the king, and if it please the king to grant my petition, and to perform my request, let the king and Haman come to the banquet that I shall prepare for them, and I will do to morrow as the king hath said.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: Come now therefore, and I will send thee unto Pharaoh, that thou mayest bring forth my people the children of Israel out of Egypt.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And from Heshbon unto Ramathmizpeh, and Betonim; and from Mahanaim unto the border of Debir;

input: And the midwives said unto Pharaoh, Because the Hebrew women are not as the Egyptian women; for they are lively, and are delivered ere the midwives come in unto them.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will pass through all thy flock to day, removing from thence all the speckled and spotted cattle, and all the brown cattle among the sheep, and the spotted and speckled among the goats: and of such shall be my hire.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To whom our fathers would not obey, but thrust him from them, and in their hearts turned back again into Egypt,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Di situ Elam dan sekeliling kuburnya seluruh rakyatnya yang banyak; mereka semuanya mati terbunuh, rebah oleh pedang, yaitu yang tanpa disunat turun ke bumi yang paling bawah, yang dari pihaknya menimbulkan ketakutan di dunia orang-orang hidup. Mereka menanggung nodanya bersama orang-orang yang turun ke liang kubur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one: for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.
target: Dan apabila Aku telah pergi ke situ dan telah menyediakan tempat bagimu, Aku akan datang kembali dan membawa kamu ke tempat-Ku, supaya di tempat di mana Aku berada, kamu pun berada.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David said, What have I to do with you, ye sons of Zeruiah, that ye should this day be adversaries unto me? shall there any man be put to death this day in Israel? for do not I know that I am this day king over Israel?
target: Tetapi Daud berkata: "Apakah urusanku dengan kamu, hai anak-anak Zeruya, sehingga kamu pada hari ini menjadi lawanku? Masakan pada hari ini seorang dihukum mati di Israel! Sebab bukankah aku tahu, bahwa aku pada hari ini adalah raja atas Israel?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The fathers shall not be put to death for the children, neither shall the children be put to death for the fathers: every man shall be put to death for his own sin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Furthermore Elihu answered and said,
target: Maka berbicaralah Elihu:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore are my loins filled with pain: pangs have taken hold upon me, as the pangs of a woman that travaileth: I was bowed down at the hearing of it; I was dismayed at the seeing of it.
target: Sebab itu pinggangku amat sakit, sakit mulas menimpa aku seperti sakit mulas perempuan yang melahirkan; aku terbungkuk-bungkuk, tidak mendengar lagi, aku terkejut, tidak melihat lagi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And by the hands of the apostles were many signs and wonders wrought among the people; (and they were all with one accord in Solomon's porch.
target: Dan oleh rasul-rasul diadakan banyak tanda dan mujizat di antara orang banyak. Semua orang percaya selalu berkumpul di Serambi Salomo dalam persekutuan yang erat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Elioenai, and Jaakobah, and Jeshohaiah, and Asaiah, and Adiel, and Jesimiel, and Benaiah,
target: Elyo"enai, Yaakoba, Yesohaya, Asaya, Adiel, Yesimiel, Benaya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Consume them in wrath, consume them, that they may not be: and let them know that God ruleth in Jacob unto the ends of the earth. Selah.
target: Karena dosa mulut mereka adalah perkataan bibirnya, biarlah mereka tertangkap dalam kecongkakannya. Oleh karena sumpah serapah dan dusta yang mereka ceritakan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore thus saith the LORD concerning the prophets that prophesy in my name, and I sent them not, yet they say, Sword and famine shall not be in this land; By sword and famine shall those prophets be consumed.
target: Sebab itu beginilah firman TUHAN mengenai para nabi yang bernubuat demi nama-Ku, padahal Aku tidak mengutus mereka, dan yang berkata: Perang dan kelaparan tidak akan menimpa negeri ini —: Para nabi itu sendiri akan habis mati oleh perang dan kelaparan!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the men of Israel, beside Benjamin, were numbered four hundred thousand men that drew sword: all these were men of war.
target: Juga orang-orang Israel dihitung jumlahnya; dengan tidak termasuk suku Benyamin ada empat ratus ribu orang yang bersenjatakan pedang; semuanya itu prajurit.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will heap mischiefs upon them; I will spend mine arrows upon them.
target: Aku akan menimbun malapetaka ke atas mereka, seluruh anak panah-Ku akan Kutembakkan kepada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Say unto them, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I will take the stick of Joseph, which is in the hand of Ephraim, and the tribes of Israel his fellows, and will put them with him, even with the stick of Judah, and make them one stick, and they shall be one in mine hand.
target: katakanlah kepada mereka: Beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Aku mengambil papan Yusuf — yang dalam tangan Efraim — beserta suku-suku Israel yang bersekutu dengan dia dan menggabungkannya dengan papan Yehuda dan Aku akan menjadikan mereka satu papan, sehingga mereka menjadi satu dalam tangan-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Two and twenty years old was Ahaziah when he began to reign; and he reigned one year in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Athaliah, the daughter of Omri king of Israel.
target: Ia berumur dua puluh dua tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja dan setahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem. Nama ibunya ialah Atalya, cucu Omri raja Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus answering said unto him, It is said, Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God.
target: Yesus menjawabnya, kata-Nya: "Ada firman: Jangan engkau mencobai Tuhan, Allahmu!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My tongue also shall talk of thy righteousness all the day long: for they are confounded, for they are brought unto shame, that seek my hurt.
target: Lidahku juga menyebut-nyebut keadilan-Mu sepanjang hari, sebab akan mendapat malu dan tersipu-sipu orang-orang yang mengikhtiarkan celakaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Canst thou by searching find out God? canst thou find out the Almighty unto perfection?
target: Dapatkah engkau memahami hakekat Allah, menyelami batas-batas kekuasaan Yang Mahakuasa?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus they inclosed the Benjamites round about, and chased them, and trode them down with ease over against Gibeah toward the sunrising.
target: Mereka mengepung suku Benyamin itu, mengejarnya dengan tak henti-hentinya dan melandanya sampai di depan Gibea, di sebelah timur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will bring them, and they shall dwell in the midst of Jerusalem: and they shall be my people, and I will be their God, in truth and in righteousness.
target: dan Aku akan membawa mereka pulang, supaya mereka diam di tengah-tengah Yerusalem. Maka mereka akan menjadi umat-Ku dan Aku akan menjadi Allah mereka dalam kesetiaan dan kebenaran."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Israel were numbered, and were all present, and went against them: and the children of Israel pitched before them like two little flocks of kids; but the Syrians filled the country.
target: Orang Israel pun memeriksa barisannya dan setelah dibekali mereka berangkat menghadapi orang Aram. Orang Israel berkemah di hadapan mereka seperti dua kawanan kambing, sedang orang Aram telah datang membanjiri negeri itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore, brethren, covet to prophesy, and forbid not to speak with tongues.
target: Karena itu, saudara-saudaraku, usahakanlah dirimu untuk memperoleh karunia untuk bernubuat dan janganlah melarang orang yang berkata-kata dengan bahasa roh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The righteous shall inherit the land, and dwell therein for ever.
target: Orang-orang benar akan mewarisi negeri dan tinggal di sana senantiasa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The name of the LORD is a strong tower: the righteous runneth into it, and is safe.
target: Nama TUHAN adalah menara yang kuat, ke sanalah orang benar berlari dan ia menjadi selamat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And king Rehoboam consulted with the old men, that stood before Solomon his father while he yet lived, and said, How do ye advise that I may answer this people?
target: Sesudah itu Rehabeam meminta nasihat dari para tua-tua yang selama hidup Salomo mendampingi Salomo, ayahnya, katanya: "Apakah nasihatmu untuk menjawab rakyat itu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I say unto you, I will not any more eat thereof, until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God.
target: Sebab Aku berkata kepadamu: Aku tidak akan memakannya lagi sampai ia beroleh kegenapannya dalam Kerajaan Allah."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you, and ye need not that any man teach you: but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things, and is truth, and is no lie, and even as it hath taught you, ye shall abide in him.
target: Sebab di dalam diri kamu tetap ada pengurapan yang telah kamu terima dari pada-Nya. Karena itu tidak perlu kamu diajar oleh orang lain. Tetapi sebagaimana pengurapan-Nya mengajar kamu tentang segala sesuatu — dan pengajaran-Nya itu benar, tidak dusta — dan sebagaimana Ia dahulu telah mengajar kamu, demikianlah hendaknya kamu tetap tinggal di dalam Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he made the middle bar to shoot through the boards from the one end to the other.
target: Dibuat oranglah kayu lintang yang di tengah menjadi melintang terus di tengah-tengah papan-papan itu dari ujung ke ujung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That they were graven with an iron pen and lead in the rock for ever!
target: terpahat dengan besi pengukir dan timah pada gunung batu untuk selama-lamanya!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If he turn not, he will whet his sword; he hath bent his bow, and made it ready.
target: Allah adalah Hakim yang adil dan Allah yang murka setiap saat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the next sabbath day came almost the whole city together to hear the word of God.
target: Pada hari Sabat berikutnya datanglah hampir seluruh kota itu berkumpul untuk mendengar firman Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So shall the congregation of the people compass thee about: for their sakes therefore return thou on high.
target: Bangkitlah, TUHAN, dalam murka-Mu, berdirilah menghadapi geram orang-orang yang melawan aku, bangunlah untukku, ya Engkau yang telah memerintahkan penghakiman!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joash king of Israel sent to Amaziah king of Judah, saying, The thistle that was in Lebanon sent to the cedar that was in Lebanon, saying, Give thy daughter to my son to wife: and there passed by a wild beast that was in Lebanon, and trode down the thistle.
target: Tetapi Yoas, raja Israel, menyuruh orang kepada Amazia, raja Yehuda, mengatakan: "Onak yang di gunung Libanon mengirim pesan kepada pohon aras yang di gunung Libanon, bunyinya: Berikanlah anakmu perempuan kepada anakku laki-laki menjadi isterinya. Tetapi binatang-binatang hutan yang ada di gunung Libanon itu berjalan lewat dari sana, lalu menginjak onak itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto Jether his firstborn, Up, and slay them. But the youth drew not his sword: for he feared, because he was yet a youth.
target: Katanya kepada Yeter, anak sulungnya: "Bangunlah, bunuhlah mereka." Tetapi orang muda itu tidak menghunus pedangnya, karena ia takut, sebab ia masih muda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That your days may be multiplied, and the days of your children, in the land which the LORD sware unto your fathers to give them, as the days of heaven upon the earth.
target: supaya panjang umurmu dan umur anak-anakmu di tanah yang dijanjikan TUHAN dengan sumpah kepada nenek moyangmu untuk memberikannya kepada mereka, selama ada langit di atas bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Bow down thine ear to me; deliver me speedily: be thou my strong rock, for an house of defence to save me.
target: Pada-Mu, TUHAN, aku berlindung, janganlah sekali-kali aku mendapat malu. Luputkanlah aku oleh karena keadilan-Mu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will ascend above the heights of the clouds; I will be like the most High.
target: Aku hendak naik mengatasi ketinggian awan-awan, hendak menyamai Yang Mahatinggi!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The tabernacle, his tent, and his covering, his taches, and his boards, his bars, his pillars, and his sockets,
target: yakni Kemah Suci, atap kemahnya dan tudungnya, kaitannya, dan papannya, kayu lintangnya, tiangnya dan alasnya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Their bull gendereth, and faileth not; their cow calveth, and casteth not her calf.
target: Lembu jantan mereka memacek dan tidak gagal, lembu betina mereka beranak dan tidak keguguran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A wild ass used to the wilderness, that snuffeth up the wind at her pleasure; in her occasion who can turn her away? all they that seek her will not weary themselves; in her month they shall find her.
target: yang melepaskan diri lari ke padang gurun, karena ingin menghirup udara! Siapakah yang dapat menahan nafsunya untuk berjantan? Semua yang mencari dia, tidak usah berlelah, mereka akan menemukannya dalam musim berjantan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Saul cast a javelin at him to smite him: whereby Jonathan knew that it was determined of his father to slay David.
target: Lalu Saul melemparkan tombaknya kepada Yonatan untuk membunuhnya. Maka tahulah Yonatan, bahwa ayahnya telah mengambil keputusan untuk membunuh Daud.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations, but now is made manifest to his saints:
target: yaitu rahasia yang tersembunyi dari abad ke abad dan dari turunan ke turunan, tetapi yang sekarang dinyatakan kepada orang-orang kudus-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For we are made partakers of Christ, if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end;
target: Karena kita telah beroleh bagian di dalam Kristus, asal saja kita teguh berpegang sampai kepada akhirnya pada keyakinan iman kita yang semula.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall cut it into his pieces, with his head and his fat: and the priest shall lay them in order on the wood that is on the fire which is upon the altar:
target: Kemudian haruslah ia memotong-motongnya menurut bagian-bagian tertentu, dan bersama-sama kepalanya dan lemaknya diaturlah semuanya itu oleh imam di atas kayu yang sedang menyala di atas mezbah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For nothing is secret, that shall not be made manifest; neither any thing hid, that shall not be known and come abroad.
target: Sebab tidak ada sesuatu yang tersembunyi yang tidak akan dinyatakan, dan tidak ada sesuatu yang rahasia yang tidak akan diketahui dan diumumkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He shall also set his face to enter with the strength of his whole kingdom, and upright ones with him; thus shall he do: and he shall give him the daughter of women, corrupting her: but she shall not stand on his side, neither be for him.
target: Kemudian ia akan berusaha untuk menguasai seluruh kerajaan orang yang lain itu: ia akan mengadakan persetujuan dengan dia, dan seorang puterinya diberikannya kepadanya untuk menghancurkan kerajaan itu, tetapi maksudnya itu tidak akan berhasil dan tidak akan menguntungkannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there are gathered unto him vain men, the children of Belial, and have strengthened themselves against Rehoboam the son of Solomon, when Rehoboam was young and tenderhearted, and could not withstand them.
target: Petualang-petualang, orang-orang dursila, berhimpun padanya; mereka terlalu kuat bagi Rehabeam bin Salomo, yang masih muda dan belum teguh hati, dan yang tidak dapat mempertahankan diri terhadap mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they go forth into the utter court, even into the utter court to the people, they shall put off their garments wherein they ministered, and lay them in the holy chambers, and they shall put on other garments; and they shall not sanctify the people with their garments.
target: Dan waktu mereka keluar ke pelataran luar menjumpai umat TUHAN itu, mereka harus menanggalkan pakaian mereka yang mereka pakai dalam menyelenggarakan kebaktian dan menyimpannya dalam bilik-bilik kudus, kemudian mengenakan pakaian yang lain, supaya umat itu jangan menjadi kudus disebabkan kena kepada pakaian imam-imam itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, that in process of time, after the end of two years, his bowels fell out by reason of his sickness: so he died of sore diseases. And his people made no burning for him, like the burning of his fathers.
target: Beberapa waktu berselang, kira-kira sesudah lewat dua tahun, keluarlah ususnya karena penyakitnya itu, lalu ia mati dengan penderitaan yang hebat. Rakyatnya tidak menyalakan api baginya seperti yang diperbuat mereka bagi nenek moyangnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And moreover in time past, even when Saul was king, thou wast he that leddest out and broughtest in Israel: and the LORD thy God said unto thee, Thou shalt feed my people Israel, and thou shalt be ruler over my people Israel.
target: Telah lama, ketika Saul memerintah, engkaulah yang memimpin segala gerakan orang Israel. Dan TUHAN, Allahmu, telah berfirman kepadamu: Engkaulah yang harus menggembalakan umat-Ku Israel, dan engkaulah yang menjadi raja atas umat-Ku Israel."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also the breadth of the face of the house, and of the separate place toward the east, an hundred cubits.
target: begitu juga lebarnya muka Bait Suci bersama lapangan tertutup sebelah timur: seratus hasta.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I am ready to halt, and my sorrow is continually before me.
target: Pikirku: "Asal mereka jangan beria-ria karena aku, jangan membesarkan diri terhadap aku apabila kakiku goyah!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Six days shalt thou labour, and do all thy work:
target: enam hari lamanya engkau akan bekerja dan melakukan segala pekerjaanmu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they made two rings of gold, and put them on the two ends of the breastplate, upon the border of it, which was on the side of the ephod inward.
target: Dibuat merekalah dua gelang emas dan dibubuh pada kedua ujung tutup dada itu, pada pinggirnya yang sebelah dalam, yang berhadapan dengan baju efod.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The righteous shall flourish like the palm tree: he shall grow like a cedar in Lebanon.
target: mataku memandangi seteruku, telingaku mendengar perihal orang-orang jahat yang bangkit melawan aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ:
target: Tetapi rupaku tetap tidak dikenal oleh jemaat-jemaat Kristus di Yudea.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thine enemies roar in the midst of thy congregations; they set up their ensigns for signs.
target: Lawan-lawan-Mu mengaum di tempat pertemuan-Mu dan telah mendirikan panji-panji mereka sebagai tanda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And profited in the Jews' religion above many my equals in mine own nation, being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers.
target: Dan di dalam agama Yahudi aku jauh lebih maju dari banyak teman yang sebaya dengan aku di antara bangsaku, sebagai orang yang sangat rajin memelihara adat istiadat nenek moyangku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My lord asked his servants, saying, Have ye a father, or a brother?
target: Tuanku telah bertanya kepada hamba-hambanya ini: Masih adakah ayah atau saudara kamu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This day the LORD thy God hath commanded thee to do these statutes and judgments: thou shalt therefore keep and do them with all thine heart, and with all thy soul.
target: "Pada hari ini TUHAN, Allahmu, memerintahkan engkau melakukan ketetapan dan peraturan ini; lakukanlah semuanya itu dengan setia, dengan segenap hatimu dan segenap jiwamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These are the sons of Esau, who is Edom, and these are their dukes.
target: Itulah bani Esau, yakni Edom, dan itulah kepala-kepala kaum mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he taught them as one having authority, and not as the scribes.
target: sebab Ia mengajar mereka sebagai orang yang berkuasa, tidak seperti ahli-ahli Taurat mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abigail hasted, and arose and rode upon an ass, with five damsels of hers that went after her; and she went after the messengers of David, and became his wife.
target: Kemudian berkemaslah Abigail dengan segera; ia menunggang keledainya, dengan diiringi lima orang pelayan perempuan. Ia mengikuti suruhan Daud itu dan menjadi isteri Daud.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover he said unto me, Son of man, all my words that I shall speak unto thee receive in thine heart, and hear with thine ears.
target: Selanjutnya firman-Nya kepadaku: "Hai anak manusia, perhatikanlah segala perkataan-Ku yang akan Kufirmankan kepadamu dan berikanlah telingamu kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And one Ananias, a devout man according to the law, having a good report of all the Jews which dwelt there,
target: Di situ ada seorang bernama Ananias, seorang saleh yang menurut hukum Taurat dan terkenal baik di antara semua orang Yahudi yang ada di situ.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Forasmuch therefore as your treading is upon the poor, and ye take from him burdens of wheat: ye have built houses of hewn stone, but ye shall not dwell in them; ye have planted pleasant vineyards, but ye shall not drink wine of them.
target: Sebab itu, karena kamu menginjak-injak orang yang lemah dan mengambil pajak gandum dari padanya, — sekalipun kamu telah mendirikan rumah-rumah dari batu pahat, kamu tidak akan mendiaminya; sekalipun kamu telah membuat kebun anggur yang indah, kamu tidak akan minum anggurnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Gaal the son of Ebed said, Who is Abimelech, and who is Shechem, that we should serve him? is not he the son of Jerubbaal? and Zebul his officer? serve the men of Hamor the father of Shechem: for why should we serve him?
target: Berkatalah Gaal bin Ebed: "Siapa itu Abimelekh dan siapa kita orang Sikhem, maka kita menjadi hambanya? Bukankah anak Yerubaal dan Zebul, wakilnya, menjadi hamba orang-orang Hemor, ayah Sikhem, jadi mengapakah kita menjadi hambanya?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that dasheth in pieces is come up before thy face: keep the munition, watch the way, make thy loins strong, fortify thy power mightily.
target: Pembongkar maju terhadap engkau; adakan penjagaan di benteng, mengintailah di jalan, ikatlah pinggangmu teguh-teguh, kumpulkanlah segala kekuatan!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Gilead abode beyond Jordan: and why did Dan remain in ships? Asher continued on the sea shore, and abode in his breaches.
target: Orang Gilead tinggal diam di seberang sungai Yordan; dan suku Dan, mengapa mereka tinggal dekat kapal-kapal? Suku Asyer duduk di tepi pantai laut, tinggal diam di teluk-teluknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which were clothed with blue, captains and rulers, all of them desirable young men, horsemen riding upon horses.
target: berpakaian kain ungu tua, bupati-bupati dan penguasa-penguasa, semuanya pemuda yang ganteng, pasukan kuda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, That the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath.
target: Kata Yesus lagi kepada mereka: "Anak Manusia adalah Tuhan atas hari Sabat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Strength and honour are her clothing; and she shall rejoice in time to come.
target: Pakaiannya adalah kekuatan dan kemuliaan, ia tertawa tentang hari depan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He shall lean upon his house, but it shall not stand: he shall hold it fast, but it shall not endure.
target: Ia bersandar pada rumahnya, tetapi rumahnya itu tidak tetap tegak, ia menjadikannya tempat berpegang, tetapi rumah itu tidak tahan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover, because I have set my affection to the house of my God, I have of mine own proper good, of gold and silver, which I have given to the house of my God, over and above all that I have prepared for the holy house.
target: Lagipula oleh karena cintaku kepada rumah Allahku, maka sebagai tambahan pada segala yang telah kusediakan bagi rumah kudus, aku dengan ini memberikan kepada rumah Allahku dari emas dan perak kepunyaanku sendiri

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.
target: Anak-anak Nearya ialah Elyo"enai, Hizkia, dan Azrikam, tiga orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as they came out, they found a man of Cyrene, Simon by name: him they compelled to bear his cross.
target: Ketika mereka berjalan ke luar kota, mereka berjumpa dengan seorang dari Kirene yang bernama Simon. Orang itu mereka paksa untuk memikul salib Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the LORD had told Samuel in his ear a day before Saul came, saying,
target: Tetapi TUHAN telah menyatakan kepada Samuel, sehari sebelum kedatangan Saul, demikian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For there were many in Judah sworn unto him, because he was the son in law of Shechaniah the son of Arah; and his son Johanan had taken the daughter of Meshullam the son of Berechiah.
target: karena banyak orang di Yehuda mempunyai ikatan sumpah dengan dia, sebab ia adalah menantu Sekhanya bin Arah, sedang Yohanan, anaknya, mengambil anak Mesulam bin Berekhya sebagai isteri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover he made high places in the mountains of Judah and caused the inhabitants of Jerusalem to commit fornication, and compelled Judah thereto.
target: Lagipula ia membuat bukit-bukit pengorbanan di gunung-gunung Yehuda. Ia membujuk penduduk Yerusalem untuk berzinah dan ia menyesatkan Yehuda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The Levites: the children of Jeshua, of Kadmiel, and of the children of Hodevah, seventy and four.
target: Inilah orang-orang Lewi: bani Yesua, yakni bani Kadmiel dan bani Hodewa; tujuh puluh empat orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And this day shall be unto you for a memorial; and ye shall keep it a feast to the LORD throughout your generations; ye shall keep it a feast by an ordinance for ever.
target: Hari ini akan menjadi hari peringatan bagimu. Kamu harus merayakannya sebagai hari raya bagi TUHAN turun-temurun. Kamu harus merayakannya sebagai ketetapan untuk selamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Turn again, my daughters, go your way; for I am too old to have an husband. If I should say, I have hope, if I should have an husband also to night, and should also bear sons;
target: Pulanglah, anak-anakku, pergilah, sebab sudah terlalu tua aku untuk bersuami. Seandainya pikirku: Ada harapan bagiku, dan sekalipun malam ini aku bersuami, bahkan sekalipun aku masih melahirkan anak laki-laki,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The spirit of God hath made me, and the breath of the Almighty hath given me life.
target: Roh Allah telah membuat aku, dan nafas Yang Mahakuasa membuat aku hidup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the mean while his disciples prayed him, saying, Master, eat.
target: Sementara itu murid-murid-Nya mengajak Dia, katanya: "Rabi, makanlah."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If I forget thee, O Jerusalem, let my right hand forget her cunning.
target: Jika aku melupakan engkau, hai Yerusalem, biarlah menjadi kering tangan kananku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Where were white, green, and blue, hangings, fastened with cords of fine linen and purple to silver rings and pillars of marble: the beds were of gold and silver, upon a pavement of red, and blue, and white, and black, marble.
target: Di situ tirai-mirai dari pada kain lenan, mori halus dan kain ungu tua, yang terikat dengan tali lenan halus dan ungu muda bergantung pada tombol-tombol perak di tiang-tiang marmar putih, sedang katil emas dan perak ditempatkan di atas lantai pualam, marmar putih, gewang dan pelinggam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For so an entrance shall be ministered unto you abundantly into the everlasting kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ.
target: Dengan demikian kepada kamu akan dikaruniakan hak penuh untuk memasuki Kerajaan kekal, yaitu Kerajaan Tuhan dan Juruselamat kita, Yesus Kristus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let them wander up and down for meat, and grudge if they be not satisfied.
target: Pada waktu senja mereka datang kembali, mereka melolong seperti anjing dan mengelilingi kota.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD is my strength and song, and he is become my salvation: he is my God, and I will prepare him an habitation; my father's God, and I will exalt him.
target: TUHAN itu kekuatanku dan mazmurku, Ia telah menjadi keselamatanku. Ia Allahku, kupuji Dia, Ia Allah bapaku, kuluhurkan Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then cometh the end, when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God, even the Father; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power.
target: Kemudian tiba kesudahannya, yaitu bilamana Ia menyerahkan Kerajaan kepada Allah Bapa, sesudah Ia membinasakan segala pemerintahan, kekuasaan dan kekuatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore, O LORD our God, save us from his hand, that all the kingdoms of the earth may know that thou art the LORD, even thou only.
target: Maka sekarang, ya TUHAN, Allah kami, selamatkanlah kami dari tangannya, supaya segala kerajaan di bumi mengetahui, bahwa hanya Engkau sendirilah TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jeremiah said to Seraiah, When thou comest to Babylon, and shalt see, and shalt read all these words;
target: Kata Yeremia kepada Seraya: "Jika engkau tiba di Babel, maka ikhtiarkanlah, supaya engkau dapat membacakan segala perkataan ini,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Samuel said, What hast thou done? And Saul said, Because I saw that the people were scattered from me, and that thou camest not within the days appointed, and that the Philistines gathered themselves together at Michmash;
target: Tetapi kata Samuel: "Apa yang telah kauperbuat?" Jawab Saul: "Karena aku melihat rakyat itu berserak-serak meninggalkan aku dan engkau tidak datang pada waktu yang telah ditentukan, padahal orang Filistin telah berkumpul di Mikhmas,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, This kind can come forth by nothing, but by prayer and fasting.
target: Jawab-Nya kepada mereka: "Jenis ini tidak dapat diusir kecuali dengan berdoa."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have laid a snare for thee, and thou art also taken, O Babylon, and thou wast not aware: thou art found, and also caught, because thou hast striven against the LORD.
target: Aku memasang jerat bagimu, dan memang engkau terjebak, hai Babel, dengan tidak mengetahuinya. Engkau terdapat dan memang engkau tertangkap, sebab engkau telah menantang TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall pass through Judah; he shall overflow and go over, he shall reach even to the neck; and the stretching out of his wings shall fill the breadth of thy land, O Immanuel.
target: serta menerobos masuk ke Yehuda, ibarat banjir yang meluap-luap hingga sampai ke leher; dan sayap-sayapnya yang dikembangkan akan menutup seantero negerimu, ya Imanuel!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But we have dwelt in tents, and have obeyed, and done according to all that Jonadab our father commanded us.
target: melainkan kami diam di kemah-kemah dan taat melakukan tepat seperti yang diperintahkan kepada kami oleh Yonadab, bapa leluhur kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now in the eighteenth year of his reign, when he had purged the land, and the house, he sent Shaphan the son of Azaliah, and Maaseiah the governor of the city, and Joah the son of Joahaz the recorder, to repair the house of the LORD his God.
target: Pada tahun kedelapan belas dari pemerintahannya, setelah selesai mentahirkan negeri dan rumah TUHAN, ia menyuruh Safan bin Azalya, dan Maaseya, penguasa kota, serta Yoah bin Yoahas, bendahara negara, untuk memperbaiki rumah TUHAN, Allahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The word of the LORD came unto me again, saying,
target: Maka datanglah firman TUHAN kepadaku:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The great temptations which thine eyes have seen, the signs, and those great miracles:
target: cobaan-cobaan yang besar yang telah dilihat oleh matamu sendiri, tanda-tanda dan mujizat-mujizat yang besar itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the anger of the LORD was kindled against Uzza, and he smote him, because he put his hand to the ark: and there he died before God.
target: Maka bangkitlah murka TUHAN terhadap Uza, lalu Ia membunuh dia oleh karena Uza telah mengulurkan tangannya kepada tabut itu; ia mati di sana di hadapan Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Surely I would speak to the Almighty, and I desire to reason with God.
target: Tetapi aku, aku hendak berbicara dengan Yang Mahakuasa, aku ingin membela perkaraku di hadapan Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He maketh the barren woman to keep house, and to be a joyful mother of children. Praise ye the LORD.
target: Ia mendudukkan perempuan yang mandul di rumah sebagai ibu anak-anak, penuh sukacita. Haleluya!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Gad and the children of Reuben answered, saying, As the LORD hath said unto thy servants, so will we do.
target: Lalu bani Gad dan bani Ruben itu menjawab: "Apa yang difirmankan TUHAN kepada hamba-hambamu ini akan kami lakukan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When I say unto the wicked, O wicked man, thou shalt surely die; if thou dost not speak to warn the wicked from his way, that wicked man shall die in his iniquity; but his blood will I require at thine hand.
target: Kalau Aku berfirman kepada orang jahat: Hai orang jahat, engkau pasti mati! — dan engkau tidak berkata apa-apa untuk memperingatkan orang jahat itu supaya bertobat dari hidupnya, orang jahat itu akan mati dalam kesalahannya, tetapi Aku akan menuntut pertanggungan jawab atas nyawanya dari padamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the most proud shall stumble and fall, and none shall raise him up: and I will kindle a fire in his cities, and it shall devour all round about him.
target: Si kurang ajar itu akan tersandung jatuh dan tidak ada yang membangkitkan dia. Di kota-kotanya Aku akan menyalakan api yang akan menghanguskan segala apa yang di sekitarnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised in the city of our God, in the mountain of his holiness.
target: Nyanyian. Mazmur bani Korah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if a man smite the eye of his servant, or the eye of his maid, that it perish; he shall let him go free for his eye's sake.
target: Apabila seseorang memukul mata budaknya laki-laki atau mata budaknya perempuan dan merusakkannya, maka ia harus melepaskan budak itu sebagai orang merdeka pengganti kerusakan matanya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Take Aaron and Eleazar his son, and bring them up unto mount Hor:
target: Panggillah Harun dan Eleazar, anaknya, dan bawalah mereka naik ke gunung Hor;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not see thy brother's ox or his sheep go astray, and hide thyself from them: thou shalt in any case bring them again unto thy brother.
target: "Apabila engkau melihat, bahwa lembu atau domba saudaramu tersesat, janganlah engkau pura-pura tidak tahu; haruslah engkau benar-benar mengembalikannya kepada saudaramu itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then it shall be, if ought be committed by ignorance without the knowledge of the congregation, that all the congregation shall offer one young bullock for a burnt offering, for a sweet savour unto the LORD, with his meat offering, and his drink offering, according to the manner, and one kid of the goats for a sin offering.
target: dan apabila hal itu diperbuat di luar pengetahuan umat ini, tidak dengan sengaja, maka haruslah segenap umat mengolah seekor lembu jantan muda sebagai korban bakaran menjadi bau yang menyenangkan bagi TUHAN, serta dengan korban sajiannya dan korban curahannya, sesuai dengan peraturan; juga seekor kambing jantan sebagai korban penghapus dosa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Tell us, when shall these things be? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled?
target: "Katakanlah kepada kami, bilamanakah itu akan terjadi, dan apakah tandanya, kalau semuanya itu akan sampai kepada kesudahannya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then let our countenances be looked upon before thee, and the countenance of the children that eat of the portion of the king's meat: and as thou seest, deal with thy servants.
target: sesudah itu bandingkanlah perawakan kami dengan perawakan orang-orang muda yang makan dari santapan raja, kemudian perlakukanlah hamba-hambamu ini sesuai dengan pendapatmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When they stood, these stood; and when they were lifted up, these lifted up themselves also: for the spirit of the living creature was in them.
target: Kalau kerub-kerub itu berhenti, roda-roda itu berhenti, kalau kerub-kerub itu naik ke atas, roda-roda itu sama-sama naik dengan mereka; sebab roh makhluk-makhluk hidup itu ialah di dalam roda-roda itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The tender and delicate woman among you, which would not adventure to set the sole of her foot upon the ground for delicateness and tenderness, her eye shall be evil toward the husband of her bosom, and toward her son, and toward her daughter,
target: Perempuan yang lemah dan manja di antaramu, yang tidak pernah mencoba menjejakkan telapak kakinya ke tanah karena sifatnya yang manja dan lemah itu, akan kesal terhadap suaminya sendiri atau terhadap anaknya laki-laki atau anaknya perempuan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they were more than forty which had made this conspiracy.
target: Jumlah mereka yang mengadakan komplotan itu lebih dari pada empat puluh orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All they shall speak and say unto thee, Art thou also become weak as we? art thou become like unto us?
target: Sekaliannya mereka mulai berbicara dan berkata kepadamu: 'Engkau juga telah menjadi lemah seperti kami, sudah menjadi sama seperti kami!'

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: One that ruleth well his own house, having his children in subjection with all gravity;
target: seorang kepala keluarga yang baik, disegani dan dihormati oleh anak-anaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And unleavened bread, and cakes unleavened tempered with oil, and wafers unleavened anointed with oil: of wheaten flour shalt thou make them.
target: roti yang tidak beragi dan roti bundar yang tidak beragi, yang diolah dengan minyak, dan roti tipis yang tidak beragi, yang diolesi dengan minyak; dari tepung gandum yang terbaik haruslah kaubuat semuanya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I besought the LORD at that time, saying,
target: "Juga pada waktu itu aku mohon kasih karunia dari pada TUHAN, demikian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The women of my people have ye cast out from their pleasant houses; from their children have ye taken away my glory for ever.
target: Para isteri di antara umat-Ku kamu halau dari rumah kesayangannya, dari bayi-bayinya kamu mengambil untuk selama-lamanya, semarak yang telah Kuberikan kepada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thy servant my father said unto us, Ye know that my wife bare me two sons:
target: Kemudian berkatalah hambamu, ayahku, kepada kami: Kamu tahu, bahwa isteriku telah melahirkan dua orang anak bagiku;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when she is departed out of his house, she may go and be another man's wife.
target: dan jika perempuan itu keluar dari rumahnya dan pergi dari sana, lalu menjadi isteri orang lain,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the weight of the nails was fifty shekels of gold. And he overlaid the upper chambers with gold.
target: berat paku-paku lima puluh syikal emas. Juga kamar-kamar atas disaputnya dengan emas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Seek him that maketh the seven stars and Orion, and turneth the shadow of death into the morning, and maketh the day dark with night: that calleth for the waters of the sea, and poureth them out upon the face of the earth: The LORD is his name:
target: Dia yang telah membuat bintang kartika dan bintang belantik, yang mengubah kekelaman menjadi pagi dan yang membuat siang gelap seperti malam; Dia yang memanggil air laut dan mencurahkannya ke atas permukaan bumi — TUHAN itulah nama-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore shall evil come upon thee; thou shalt not know from whence it riseth: and mischief shall fall upon thee; thou shalt not be able to put it off: and desolation shall come upon thee suddenly, which thou shalt not know.
target: Tetapi malapetaka akan menimpa engkau, engkau tidak tahu mempergunakan jampimu terhadapnya; bencana akan jatuh atasmu, engkau tidak sanggup menampiknya dengan mempersembahkan korban; kebinasaan akan menimpa engkau dengan sekonyong-konyong, yang tidak terduga olehmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The cup of blessing which we bless, is it not the communion of the blood of Christ? The bread which we break, is it not the communion of the body of Christ?
target: Bukankah cawan pengucapan syukur, yang atasnya kita ucapkan syukur, adalah persekutuan dengan darah Kristus? Bukankah roti yang kita pecah-pecahkan adalah persekutuan dengan tubuh Kristus?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David said unto Michal, It was before the LORD, which chose me before thy father, and before all his house, to appoint me ruler over the people of the LORD, over Israel: therefore will I play before the LORD.
target: Tetapi berkatalah Daud kepada Mikhal: "Di hadapan TUHAN, yang telah memilih aku dengan menyisihkan ayahmu dan segenap keluarganya untuk menunjuk aku menjadi raja atas umat TUHAN, yakni atas Israel, — di hadapan TUHAN aku menari-nari,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then they came to Zerubbabel, and to the chief of the fathers, and said unto them, Let us build with you: for we seek your God, as ye do; and we do sacrifice unto him since the days of Esarhaddon king of Assur, which brought us up hither.
target: maka mereka mendekati Zerubabel serta para kepala kaum keluarga dan berkata kepada mereka: "Biarlah kami turut membangun bersama-sama dengan kamu, karena kami pun berbakti kepada Allahmu sama seperti kamu; lagipula kami selalu mempersembahkan korban kepada-Nya sejak zaman Esar-Hadon, raja Asyur, yang memindahkan kami ke mari."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Every one that passeth among them that are numbered, from twenty years old and above, shall give an offering unto the LORD.
target: Setiap orang yang akan termasuk orang-orang yang terdaftar itu, yang berumur dua puluh tahun ke atas, haruslah mempersembahkan persembahan khusus itu kepada TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, as he sat at meat with them, he took bread, and blessed it, and brake, and gave to them.
target: Waktu Ia duduk makan dengan mereka, Ia mengambil roti, mengucap berkat, lalu memecah-mecahkannya dan memberikannya kepada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And by knowledge shall the chambers be filled with all precious and pleasant riches.
target: dan dengan pengertian kamar-kamar diisi dengan bermacam-macam harta benda yang berharga dan menarik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But draw near hither, ye sons of the sorceress, the seed of the adulterer and the whore.
target: Tetapi kamu, mendekatlah kamu ke mari, hai anak-anak dari perempuan-perempuan sihir, hai keturunan orang yang berzinah dan perempuan sundal!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Nevertheless, if thou warn the wicked of his way to turn from it; if he do not turn from his way, he shall die in his iniquity; but thou hast delivered thy soul.
target: Tetapi jikalau engkau memperingatkan orang jahat itu supaya ia bertobat dari hidupnya, tetapi ia tidak mau bertobat, ia akan mati dalam kesalahannya, tetapi engkau telah menyelamatkan nyawamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: What profit hath a man of all his labour which he taketh under the sun?
target: Apakah gunanya manusia berusaha dengan jerih payah di bawah matahari?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer, and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,
target: karena aku tahu, bahwa kesudahan semuanya ini ialah keselamatanku oleh doamu dan pertolongan Roh Yesus Kristus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Arise, lift up the lad, and hold him in thine hand; for I will make him a great nation.
target: Bangunlah, angkatlah anak itu, dan bimbinglah dia, sebab Aku akan membuat dia menjadi bangsa yang besar."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But thou shalt remember that thou wast a bondman in Egypt, and the LORD thy God redeemed thee thence: therefore I command thee to do this thing.
target: Haruslah kauingat, bahwa engkau pun dahulu budak di Mesir dan engkau ditebus TUHAN, Allahmu, dari sana; itulah sebabnya aku memerintahkan engkau melakukan hal ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses said unto the children of Gad and to the children of Reuben, Shall your brethren go to war, and shall ye sit here?
target: Jawab Musa kepada bani Gad dan bani Ruben itu: "Masakan saudara-saudaramu pergi berperang dan kamu tinggal di sini?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Enoch also, the seventh from Adam, prophesied of these, saying, Behold, the Lord cometh with ten thousands of his saints,
target: Juga tentang mereka Henokh, keturunan ketujuh dari Adam, telah bernubuat, katanya: "Sesungguhnya Tuhan datang dengan beribu-ribu orang kudus-Nya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For yet a little while, and he that shall come will come, and will not tarry.
target: "Sebab sedikit, bahkan sangat sedikit waktu lagi, dan Ia yang akan datang, sudah akan ada, tanpa menangguhkan kedatangan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then he is gracious unto him, and saith, Deliver him from going down to the pit: I have found a ransom.
target: maka Ia akan mengasihaninya dengan berfirman: Lepaskan dia, supaya jangan ia turun ke liang kubur; uang tebusan telah Kuperoleh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, as he had made an end of speaking all these words, that the ground clave asunder that was under them:
target: Baru saja ia selesai mengucapkan segala perkataan itu, maka terbelahlah tanah yang di bawah mereka,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore, behold, the cry of the children of Israel is come unto me: and I have also seen the oppression wherewith the Egyptians oppress them.
target: Sekarang seruan orang Israel telah sampai kepada-Ku; juga telah Kulihat, betapa kerasnya orang Mesir menindas mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Meraioth begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,
target: Merayot memperanakkan Amarya; Amarya memperanakkan Ahitub;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he hath put all things under his feet. But when he saith all things are put under him, it is manifest that he is excepted, which did put all things under him.
target: Sebab segala sesuatu telah ditaklukkan-Nya di bawah kaki-Nya. Tetapi kalau dikatakan, bahwa "segala sesuatu telah ditaklukkan", maka teranglah, bahwa Ia sendiri yang telah menaklukkan segala sesuatu di bawah kaki Kristus itu tidak termasuk di dalamnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Saying, I am Alpha and Omega, the first and the last: and, What thou seest, write in a book, and send it unto the seven churches which are in Asia; unto Ephesus, and unto Smyrna, and unto Pergamos, and unto Thyatira, and unto Sardis, and unto Philadelphia, and unto Laodicea.
target: katanya: "Apa yang engkau lihat, tuliskanlah di dalam sebuah kitab dan kirimkanlah kepada ketujuh jemaat ini: ke Efesus, ke Smirna, ke Pergamus, ke Tiatira, ke Sardis, ke Filadelfia dan ke Laodikia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thou, LORD, art high above all the earth: thou art exalted far above all gods.
target: Sebab Engkaulah, ya TUHAN, Yang Mahatinggi di atas seluruh bumi, Engkau sangat dimuliakan di atas segala allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if the priest buy any soul with his money, he shall eat of it, and he that is born in his house: they shall eat of his meat.
target: Tetapi apabila seseorang telah dibeli oleh imam dengan uangnya menjadi budak beliannya, maka orang itu boleh turut memakannya, demikian juga mereka yang lahir di rumahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The king of Dor in the coast of Dor, one; the king of the nations of Gilgal, one;
target: raja negeri Dor di tanah bukit Dor, satu; raja negeri Goyim di Galilea, satu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men, beside women and children.
target: Yang ikut makan kira-kira lima ribu laki-laki, tidak termasuk perempuan dan anak-anak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The word of the LORD came again unto me, saying,

Jadi tidaklah mungkin anak-anak kamu di kemudian hari berkata kepada anak-anak kami: Kamu tidak mempunyai bagian pada TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O LORD, are not thine eyes upon the truth? thou hast stricken them, but they have not grieved; thou hast consumed them, but they have refused to receive correction: they have made their faces harder than a rock; they have refused to return.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Dan perkataan Samuel sampai ke seluruh Israel. Orang Israel maju berperang melawan orang Filistin dan berkemah dekat Eben-Haezer, sedang orang Filistin berkemah di Afek.

target: Tetapi telah kudengar tentang engkau, bahwa engkau dapat memberikan makna dan dapat menguraikan kekusutan.
