en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore hath the LORD recompensed me according to my righteousness, according to the cleanness of my hands in his eyesight.
target: aku berlaku tidak bercela di hadapan-Nya, dan menjaga diri terhadap kesalahan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh; but he of the freewoman was by promise.
target: Tetapi anak dari perempuan yang menjadi hambanya itu diperanakkan menurut daging dan anak dari perempuan yang merdeka itu oleh karena janji.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And old shoes and clouted upon their feet, and old garments upon them; and all the bread of their provision was dry and mouldy.
target: dan kasut yang buruk-buruk dan ditambal untuk dikenakan pada kaki mereka dan pakaian yang buruk-buruk untuk dikenakan oleh mereka, sedang segala roti bekal mereka telah kering, tinggal remah-remah belaka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Until the LORD have given your brethren rest, as he hath given you, and they also have possessed the land which the LORD your God giveth them: then ye shall return unto the land of your possession, and enjoy it, which Moses the LORD's servant gave you on this side Jordan toward the sunrising.
target: sampai TUHAN mengaruniakan keamanan kepada saudara-saudaramu seperti kepada kamu juga, dan mereka juga menduduki negeri yang akan diberikan kepada mereka oleh TUHAN, Allahmu. Kemudian bolehlah kamu pulang kembali ke negerimu sendiri dan menduduki negeri yang diberikan Musa, hamba TUHAN itu, kepadamu di seberang sungai Yordan, di sebelah matahari terbit."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt make unto it a border of an hand breadth round about, and thou shalt make a golden crown to the border thereof round about.
target: Haruslah engkau membuat sekelilingnya jalur pinggir yang setapak tangan lebarnya dan kaubuatlah bingkai emas sekeliling jalur pinggirnya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass after this, that the king of the children of Ammon died, and Hanun his son reigned in his stead.
target: Sesudah itu matilah raja bani Amon; dan Hanun, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.
target: dan kamu akan mengetahui kebenaran, dan kebenaran itu akan memerdekakan kamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Destroy, O Lord, and divide their tongues: for I have seen violence and strife in the city.
target: Aku akan segera mencari tempat perlindungan terhadap angin ribut dan badai."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Being enriched in every thing to all bountifulness, which causeth through us thanksgiving to God.
target: kamu akan diperkaya dalam segala macam kemurahan hati, yang membangkitkan syukur kepada Allah oleh karena kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Shall I not in that day, saith the LORD, even destroy the wise men out of Edom, and understanding out of the mount of Esau?
target: Bukankah pada waktu itu, demikianlah firman TUHAN, Aku akan melenyapkan orang-orang bijaksana dari Edom, dan pengertian dari pegunungan Esau?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter, Art not thou also one of this man's disciples? He saith, I am not.
target: Maka kata hamba perempuan penjaga pintu kepada Petrus: "Bukankah engkau juga murid orang itu?" Jawab Petrus: "Bukan!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they answered the angel of the LORD that stood among the myrtle trees, and said, We have walked to and fro through the earth, and, behold, all the earth sitteth still, and is at rest.
target: Berbicaralah mereka kepada Malaikat TUHAN yang berdiri di antara pohon-pohon murad itu, katanya: Kami telah menjelajahi bumi, dan sesungguhnya seluruh bumi itu tenang dan aman.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he saith unto them, Whosoever shall put away his wife, and marry another, committeth adultery against her.
target: Lalu kata-Nya kepada mereka: "Barangsiapa menceraikan isterinya lalu kawin dengan perempuan lain, ia hidup dalam perzinahan terhadap isterinya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Children's children are the crown of old men; and the glory of children are their fathers.
target: Mahkota orang-orang tua adalah anak cucu dan kehormatan anak-anak ialah nenek moyang mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jacob said, O God of my father Abraham, and God of my father Isaac, the LORD which saidst unto me, Return unto thy country, and to thy kindred, and I will deal well with thee:
target: Kemudian berkatalah Yakub: "Ya Allah nenekku Abraham dan Allah ayahku Ishak, ya TUHAN, yang telah berfirman kepadaku: Pulanglah ke negerimu serta kepada sanak saudaramu dan Aku akan berbuat baik kepadamu —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And this is the manner of the release: Every creditor that lendeth ought unto his neighbour shall release it; he shall not exact it of his neighbour, or of his brother; because it is called the LORD's release.
target: Inilah cara penghapusan itu: setiap orang yang berpiutang harus menghapuskan apa yang dipinjamkannya kepada sesamanya; janganlah ia menagih dari sesamanya atau saudaranya, karena telah dimaklumkan penghapusan hutang demi TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Shemaiah the son of Nethaneel the scribe, one of the Levites, wrote them before the king, and the princes, and Zadok the priest, and Ahimelech the son of Abiathar, and before the chief of the fathers of the priests and Levites: one principal household being taken for Eleazar, and one taken for Ithamar.
target: Dan Semaya bin Netaneel, panitera itu, seorang Lewi, menulis nama mereka di depan raja, di depan pembesar-pembesar, imam Zadok, Ahimelekh bin Abyatar dan di depan kepala-kepala puak para imam dan orang Lewi; setiap kali satu puak diambil dari Eleazar, dan demikian pula satu puak dari Itamar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And come to the king, and speak on this manner unto him. So Joab put the words in her mouth.
target: Kemudian masuklah menghadap raja dan berbicaralah kepadanya seperti ini" — lalu Yoab menaruh perkataannya ke dalam mulut perempuan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And king Ahaz cut off the borders of the bases, and removed the laver from off them; and took down the sea from off the brasen oxen that were under it, and put it upon the pavement of stones.
target: Sesudah itu raja Ahas memotong papan penutup kereta penopang dan menyingkirkan bejana pembasuhan dari atasnya, juga "laut" itu diturunkannya dari atas lembu tembaga yang mendukungnya dan ditaruhnya di atas alas batu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All the saints salute you, chiefly they that are of Caesar's household.
target: Salam kepadamu dari segala orang kudus, khususnya dari mereka yang di istana Kaisar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And we said unto my lord, The lad cannot leave his father: for if he should leave his father, his father would die.
target: Tetapi jawab kami kepada tuanku: Anak itu tidak dapat meninggalkan ayahnya, sebab jika ia meninggalkan ayahnya, tentulah ayah ini mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And unto the Jews I became as a Jew, that I might gain the Jews; to them that are under the law, as under the law, that I might gain them that are under the law;
target: Demikianlah bagi orang Yahudi aku menjadi seperti orang Yahudi, supaya aku memenangkan orang-orang Yahudi. Bagi orang-orang yang hidup di bawah hukum Taurat aku menjadi seperti orang yang hidup di bawah hukum Taurat, sekalipun aku sendiri tidak hidup di bawah hukum Taurat, supaya aku dapat memenangkan mereka yang hidup di bawah hukum Taurat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said the princes and all the people unto the priests and to the prophets; This man is not worthy to die: for he hath spoken to us in the name of the LORD our God.
target: Lalu berkatalah para pemuka dan seluruh rakyat itu kepada imam-imam dan nabi-nabi itu: "Orang ini tidak patut mendapat hukuman mati, sebab ia telah berbicara kepada kita demi nama TUHAN, Allah kita."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Nethaneel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,
target: Netaneel, anak yang keempat, Radai, anak yang kelima,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the next unto him was Carshena, Shethar, Admatha, Tarshish, Meres, Marsena, and Memucan, the seven princes of Persia and Media, which saw the king's face, and which sat the first in the kingdom;)
target: adapun yang terdekat kepada baginda ialah Karsena, Setar, Admata, Tarsis, Meres, Marsena dan Memukan, ketujuh pembesar Persia dan Media, yang boleh memandang wajah raja dan yang mempunyai kedudukan yang tinggi di dalam kerajaan —, tanya raja:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of Adin, four hundred fifty and four.
target: bani Adin: empat ratus lima puluh empat orang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of Elam, a thousand two hundred fifty and four.
target: bani Elam: seribu dua ratus lima puluh empat orang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore, behold, I am against the prophets, saith the LORD, that steal my words every one from his neighbour.
target: Sebab itu, sesungguhnya, Aku akan menjadi lawan para nabi, demikianlah firman TUHAN, yang mencuri firman-Ku masing-masing dari temannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the LORD brought Judah low because of Ahaz king of Israel; for he made Judah naked, and transgressed sore against the LORD.
target: Demikianlah TUHAN merendahkan Yehuda oleh karena Ahas, raja Israel itu, membiarkan kebiadaban berlaku di Yehuda dan berubah setia kepada TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But woe unto you, Pharisees! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs, and pass over judgment and the love of God: these ought ye to have done, and not to leave the other undone.
target: Tetapi celakalah kamu, hai orang-orang Farisi, sebab kamu membayar persepuluhan dari selasih, inggu dan segala jenis sayuran, tetapi kamu mengabaikan keadilan dan kasih Allah. Yang satu harus dilakukan dan yang lain jangan diabaikan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In that day shall there be a great mourning in Jerusalem, as the mourning of Hadadrimmon in the valley of Megiddon.
target: Pada waktu itu ratapan di Yerusalem akan sama besarnya dengan ratapan atas Hadad-Rimon di lembah Megido.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Teach us what we shall say unto him; for we cannot order our speech by reason of darkness.
target: Beritahukanlah kepada kami apa yang harus kami katakan kepada-Nya: tak ada yang dapat kami paparkan oleh karena kegelapan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Arise, cry out in the night: in the beginning of the watches pour out thine heart like water before the face of the LORD: lift up thy hands toward him for the life of thy young children, that faint for hunger in the top of every street.
target: Bangunlah, mengeranglah pada malam hari, pada permulaan giliran jaga malam; curahkanlah isi hatimu bagaikan air di hadapan Tuhan, angkatlah tanganmu kepada-Nya demi hidup anak-anakmu, yang jatuh pingsan karena lapar di ujung-ujung jalan!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And turneth toward the sunrising to Bethdagon, and reacheth to Zebulun, and to the valley of Jiphthahel toward the north side of Bethemek, and Neiel, and goeth out to Cabul on the left hand,
target: kemudian berbalik ke arah matahari terbit, ke Bet-Dagon; menyinggung daerah Zebulon dan lembah Yiftah-El di sebelah utara, Bet-Emek dan Nehiel, dan menuju ke Kabul di sebelah utara,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Saul's son had two men that were captains of bands: the name of the one was Baanah, and the name of the other Rechab, the sons of Rimmon a Beerothite, of the children of Benjamin: (for Beeroth also was reckoned to Benjamin.
target: Anak Saul mempunyai dua orang sebagai kepala gerombolan, yang satu bernama Baana dan yang kedua bernama Rekhab, keduanya anak Rimon, orang Benyamin dari Beerot. — Sebab Beerot pun terhitung daerah Benyamin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there appeared another wonder in heaven; and behold a great red dragon, having seven heads and ten horns, and seven crowns upon his heads.
target: Maka tampaklah suatu tanda yang lain di langit; dan lihatlah, seekor naga merah padam yang besar, berkepala tujuh dan bertanduk sepuluh, dan di atas kepalanya ada tujuh mahkota.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law, but by the faith of Jesus Christ, even we have believed in Jesus Christ, that we might be justified by the faith of Christ, and not by the works of the law: for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified.
target: Kamu tahu, bahwa tidak seorang pun yang dibenarkan oleh karena melakukan hukum Taurat, tetapi hanya oleh karena iman dalam Kristus Yesus. Sebab itu kami pun telah percaya kepada Kristus Yesus, supaya kami dibenarkan oleh karena iman dalam Kristus dan bukan oleh karena melakukan hukum Taurat. Sebab: "tidak ada seorang pun yang dibenarkan" oleh karena melakukan hukum Taurat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Every moving thing that liveth shall be meat for you; even as the green herb have I given you all things.
target: Segala yang bergerak, yang hidup, akan menjadi makananmu. Aku telah memberikan semuanya itu kepadamu seperti juga tumbuh-tumbuhan hijau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet thou in thy manifold mercies forsookest them not in the wilderness: the pillar of the cloud departed not from them by day, to lead them in the way; neither the pillar of fire by night, to shew them light, and the way wherein they should go.
target: Engkau tidak meninggalkan mereka di padang gurun karena kasih sayang-Mu yang besar. Tiang awan tidak berpindah dari atas mereka pada siang hari untuk memimpin mereka pada perjalanan, begitu juga tiang api pada malam hari untuk menerangi jalan yang mereka lalui.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They have set her a bed in the midst of the slain with all her multitude: her graves are round about him: all of them uncircumcised, slain by the sword: though their terror was caused in the land of the living, yet have they borne their shame with them that go down to the pit: he is put in the midst of them that be slain.
target: Di tengah orang-orang yang mati terbunuh disediakan tempat tidur baginya dengan seluruh rakyatnya yang banyak sekeliling kuburnya; mereka semuanya orang-orang yang tidak disunat, mati terbunuh oleh pedang. Oleh sebab ketakutan terhadap mereka sudah ditimbulkan di dunia orang-orang hidup, dan mereka menanggung nodanya bersama orang-orang yang turun ke liang kubur; mereka ditempatkan di tengah orang-orang yang mati terbunuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when Rehoboam had established the kingdom, and had strengthened himself, he forsook the law of the LORD, and all Israel with him.
target: Rehabeam beserta seluruh Israel meninggalkan hukum TUHAN, ketika kerajaannya menjadi kokoh dan kekuasaannya menjadi teguh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also unto Shemaiah his son were sons born, that ruled throughout the house of their father: for they were mighty men of valour.
target: Bagi Semaya, anak Obed-Edom itu, lahir anak-anak. Mereka memegang pemerintahan di antara puak mereka, sebab mereka itu adalah pahlawan-pahlawan yang gagah perkasa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Again he said unto her, Stand in the door of the tent, and it shall be, when any man doth come and enquire of thee, and say, Is there any man here? that thou shalt say, No.
target: Lagi katanya kepada perempuan itu: "Berdirilah di depan pintu kemah dan apabila ada orang datang dan bertanya kepadamu: Ada orang di sini?, maka jawablah: Tidak ada."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they took him, and brought him unto Areopagus, saying, May we know what this new doctrine, whereof thou speakest, is?
target: Lalu mereka membawanya menghadap sidang Areopagus dan mengatakan: "Bolehkah kami tahu ajaran baru mana yang kauajarkan ini?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also I spake to the priests and to all this people, saying, Thus saith the LORD; Hearken not to the words of your prophets that prophesy unto you, saying, Behold, the vessels of the LORD's house shall now shortly be brought again from Babylon: for they prophesy a lie unto you.
target: Juga kepada imam-imam dan kepada seluruh rakyat itu aku berbicara, kataku: "Beginilah firman TUHAN: Janganlah dengarkan perkataan nabi-nabimu yang bernubuat kepadamu: Sesungguhnya, perkakas-perkakas rumah TUHAN tidak berapa lama lagi akan dibawa kembali dari Babel! Sebab mereka bernubuat palsu kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And every one that was in distress, and every one that was in debt, and every one that was discontented, gathered themselves unto him; and he became a captain over them: and there were with him about four hundred men.
target: Berhimpunlah juga kepadanya setiap orang yang dalam kesukaran, setiap orang yang dikejar-kejar tukang piutang, setiap orang yang sakit hati, maka ia menjadi pemimpin mereka. Bersama-sama dengan dia ada kira-kira empat ratus orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus shall ye speak to Hezekiah king of Judah, saying, Let not thy God, in whom thou trustest, deceive thee, saying, Jerusalem shall not be given into the hand of the king of Assyria.
target: "Beginilah harus kamu katakan kepada Hizkia, raja Yehuda: Janganlah Allahmu yang kaupercayai itu memperdayakan engkau dengan menjanjikan: Yerusalem tidak akan diserahkan ke tangan raja Asyur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: His head and his hairs were white like wool, as white as snow; and his eyes were as a flame of fire;
target: Kepala dan rambut-Nya putih bagaikan bulu yang putih metah, dan mata-Nya bagaikan nyala api.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Shall a trumpet be blown in the city, and the people not be afraid? shall there be evil in a city, and the LORD hath not done it?
target: Adakah sangkakala ditiup di suatu kota, dan orang-orang tidak gemetar? Adakah terjadi malapetaka di suatu kota, dan TUHAN tidak melakukannya?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All those that were numbered of the Levites, whom Moses and Aaron and the chief of Israel numbered, after their families, and after the house of their fathers,
target: Semua orang Lewi yang dicatat oleh Musa dan Harun dengan para pemimpin Israel menurut kaum-kaum yang ada dalam puak-puak mereka,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore thus saith the LORD of hosts, Behold, I will punish them: the young men shall die by the sword; their sons and their daughters shall die by famine:
target: Sebab itu beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam: "Sesungguhnya, Aku akan menghukum mereka: pemuda-pemuda mereka akan mati oleh pedang, anak-anak mereka yang laki-laki dan perempuan akan habis mati kelaparan;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And next him were Eden, and Miniamin, and Jeshua, and Shemaiah, Amariah, and Shecaniah, in the cities of the priests, in their set office, to give to their brethren by courses, as well to the great as to the small:
target: Di kota-kota imam ia dibantu dengan setia oleh Eden, Minyamin, Yesua, Semaya, Amarya dan Sekhanya dalam pembagian itu kepada saudara-saudara mereka menurut rombongan, kepada orang dewasa dan anak-anak,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O LORD, why hast thou made us to err from thy ways, and hardened our heart from thy fear? Return for thy servants' sake, the tribes of thine inheritance.
target: Ya TUHAN, mengapa Engkau biarkan kami sesat dari jalan-Mu, dan mengapa Engkau tegarkan hati kami, sehingga tidak takut kepada-Mu? Kembalilah oleh karena hamba-hamba-Mu, oleh karena suku-suku milik kepunyaan-Mu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Give, and it shall be given unto you; good measure, pressed down, and shaken together, and running over, shall men give into your bosom. For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again.
target: Berilah dan kamu akan diberi: suatu takaran yang baik, yang dipadatkan, yang digoncang dan yang tumpah ke luar akan dicurahkan ke dalam ribaanmu. Sebab ukuran yang kamu pakai untuk mengukur, akan diukurkan kepadamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Consider how I love thy precepts: quicken me, O LORD, according to thy lovingkindness.
target: Lihatlah, betapa aku mencintai titah-titah-Mu! Ya TUHAN, hidupkanlah aku sesuai dengan kasih setia-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But know this, that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come, he would have watched, and would not have suffered his house to be broken up.
target: Tetapi ketahuilah ini: Jika tuan rumah tahu pada waktu mana pada malam hari pencuri akan datang, sudahlah pasti ia berjaga-jaga, dan tidak akan membiarkan rumahnya dibongkar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: With thy wisdom and with thine understanding thou hast gotten thee riches, and hast gotten gold and silver into thy treasures:
target: Dengan hikmatmu dan pengertianmu engkau memperoleh kekayaan. Emas dan perak kaukumpulkan dalam perbendaharaanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And we took all his cities at that time, there was not a city which we took not from them, threescore cities, all the region of Argob, the kingdom of Og in Bashan.
target: Pada waktu itu kita merebut segala kotanya; tidak ada kota yang tidak kita rampas dari pada mereka: enam puluh kota, seluruh wilayah Argob, kerajaan Og di Basan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But thou shalt die in peace: and with the burnings of thy fathers, the former kings which were before thee, so shall they burn odours for thee; and they will lament thee, saying, Ah lord! for I have pronounced the word, saith the LORD.
target: Engkau akan mati dengan damai. Dan sebagaimana dinyalakan api untuk menghormati bapa-bapa leluhurmu, raja-raja dahulu, yang hidup sebelum engkau, demikianlah orang akan menyalakan api untuk menghormati engkau, dan akan meratapi engkau dengan berkata: Aduhai, tuan! Sungguh, Akulah yang mengucapkan firman ini, demikianlah firman TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Rezin king of Syria and Pekah son of Remaliah king of Israel came up to Jerusalem to war: and they besieged Ahaz, but could not overcome him.
target: Pada waktu itu majulah Rezin, raja Aram, dan Pekah bin Remalya, raja Israel, untuk memerangi Yerusalem. Dan mereka mengepung Ahas, tetapi mereka tidak dapat mengalahkan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as David and his men went by the way, Shimei went along on the hill's side over against him, and cursed as he went, and threw stones at him, and cast dust.
target: Demikianlah Daud melanjutkan perjalanannya dengan orang-orangnya, sedang Simei berjalan terus di lereng gunung bertentangan dengan dia dan sambil berjalan ia mengutuk, melemparinya dengan batu dan menimbulkan debu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the rest of the acts of Jehoshaphat, and his might that he shewed, and how he warred, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
target: Dan Yosafat hidup dalam damai dengan raja Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That the slayer might flee thither, which should kill his neighbour unawares, and hated him not in times past; and that fleeing unto one of these cities he might live:
target: supaya orang yang membunuh sesamanya manusia dengan tidak sengaja dan dengan tidak memusuhinya lebih dahulu, dapat melarikan diri ke sana, sehingga ia, apabila melarikan diri ke salah satu kota itu, dapat tetap hidup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith; and the fifth, Shephatiah the son of Abital;
target: yang keempat ialah Adonia, anak dari Hagit; yang kelima ialah Sefaca, anak Abital;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The ninth captain for the ninth month was Abiezer the Anetothite, of the Benjamites: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
target: Yang kesembilan untuk bulan yang kesembilan ialah Abiezer, orang Anatot itu, dari bani Benyamin, dan dalam rombongannya ada dua puluh empat ribu orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they made a calf in those days, and offered sacrifice unto the idol, and rejoiced in the works of their own hands.
target: Lalu pada waktu itu mereka membuat sebuah anak lembu dan mempersembahkan persembahan kepada berhala itu dan mereka bersukacita tentang apa yang dibuat sendiri oleh mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For none of us liveth to himself, and no man dieth to himself.
target: Sebab tidak ada seorang pun di antara kita yang hidup untuk dirinya sendiri, dan tidak ada seorang pun yang mati untuk dirinya sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And of Jezebel also spake the LORD, saying, The dogs shall eat Jezebel by the wall of Jezreel.
target: Juga mengenai Izebel TUHAN telah berfirman: Anjing akan memakan Izebel di tembok luar Yizreel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As I live, saith the Lord GOD, surely with a mighty hand, and with a stretched out arm, and with fury poured out, will I rule over you:
target: Demi Aku yang hidup, demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH, Aku akan memerintah kamu dengan tangan yang kuat dan lengan yang teracung dan amarah yang tercurah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping.
target: supaya kalau ia tiba-tiba datang jangan kamu didapatinya sedang tidur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: His remembrance shall perish from the earth, and he shall have no name in the street.
target: Ingatan kepadanya lenyap dari bumi, namanya tidak lagi disebut di lorong-lorong.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A time to kill, and a time to heal; a time to break down, and a time to build up;
target: ada waktu untuk membunuh, ada waktu untuk menyembuhkan; ada waktu untuk merombak, ada waktu untuk membangun;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they that dwell upon the earth shall rejoice over them, and make merry, and shall send gifts one to another; because these two prophets tormented them that dwelt on the earth.
target: Dan mereka yang diam di atas bumi bergembira dan bersukacita atas mereka itu dan berpesta dan saling mengirim hadiah, karena kedua nabi itu telah merupakan siksaan bagi semua orang yang diam di atas bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, a son shall be born to thee, who shall be a man of rest; and I will give him rest from all his enemies round about: for his name shall be Solomon, and I will give peace and quietness unto Israel in his days.
target: Sesungguhnya, seorang anak laki-laki akan lahir bagimu; ia akan menjadi seorang yang dikaruniai keamanan. Aku akan mengaruniakan keamanan kepadanya dari segala musuhnya di sekeliling. Ia akan bernama Salomo; sejahtera dan sentosa akan Kuberikan atas Israel pada zamannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the land shall be his possession in Israel: and my princes shall no more oppress my people; and the rest of the land shall they give to the house of Israel according to their tribes.
target: Itulah yang menjadi miliknya di tanah Israel. Dan raja-raja Israel tidak lagi akan menindas umat-Ku; mereka akan menyerahkan negeri itu kepada kaum Israel menurut suku-suku mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the inhabitants of the earth are reputed as nothing: and he doeth according to his will in the army of heaven, and among the inhabitants of the earth: and none can stay his hand, or say unto him, What doest thou?
target: Semua penduduk bumi dianggap remeh; Ia berbuat menurut kehendak-Nya terhadap bala tentara langit dan penduduk bumi; dan tidak ada seorang pun yang dapat menolak tangan-Nya dengan berkata kepada-Nya: "Apa yang Kaubuat?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The beginning of the word of the LORD by Hosea. And the LORD said to Hosea, Go, take unto thee a wife of whoredoms and children of whoredoms: for the land hath committed great whoredom, departing from the LORD.
target: Ketika TUHAN mulai berbicara dengan perantaraan Hosea, berfirmanlah Ia kepada Hosea: "Pergilah, kawinilah seorang perempuan sundal dan peranakkanlah anak-anak sundal, karena negeri ini bersundal hebat dengan membelakangi TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither said they, Where is the LORD that brought us up out of the land of Egypt, that led us through the wilderness, through a land of deserts and of pits, through a land of drought, and of the shadow of death, through a land that no man passed through, and where no man dwelt?
target: Dan mereka tidak lagi bertanya: Di manakah TUHAN, yang menuntun kita keluar dari tanah Mesir; yang memimpin kita di padang gurun, di tanah yang tandus dan yang lekak-lekuk, di tanah yang sangat kering dan gelap, di tanah yang tidak dilintasi orang dan yang tidak didiami manusia?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For this is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many for the remission of sins.
target: Sebab inilah darah-Ku, darah perjanjian, yang ditumpahkan bagi banyak orang untuk pengampunan dosa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The woman then left her waterpot, and went her way into the city, and saith to the men,
target: Maka perempuan itu meninggalkan tempayannya di situ lalu pergi ke kota dan berkata kepada orang-orang yang di situ:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Aaron returned unto Moses unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation: and the plague was stayed.
target: Ketika Harun kembali kepada Musa di depan pintu Kemah Pertemuan, tulah itu telah berhenti.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Aaron brought the blood unto him: and he dipped his finger in the blood, and put it upon the horns of the altar, and poured out the blood at the bottom of the altar:
target: Anak-anak Harun menyampaikan darah lembu itu kepadanya, dan Harun mencelupkan jarinya ke dalam darah itu dan membubuhnya pada tanduk-tanduk mezbah. Darah selebihnya dituangkannya pada bagian bawah mezbah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be glad then, ye children of Zion, and rejoice in the LORD your God: for he hath given you the former rain moderately, and he will cause to come down for you the rain, the former rain, and the latter rain in the first month.
target: Hai bani Sion, bersorak-soraklah dan bersukacitalah karena TUHAN, Allahmu! Sebab telah diberikan-Nya kepadamu hujan pada awal musim dengan adilnya, dan diturunkan-Nya kepadamu hujan, hujan pada awal dan hujan pada akhir musim seperti dahulu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Gad came to David, and said unto him, Thus saith the LORD, Choose thee
target: Kemudian datanglah Gad kepada Daud, lalu berkatalah ia kepadanya: "Beginilah firman TUHAN: Haruslah engkau memilih:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Trust ye not in a friend, put ye not confidence in a guide: keep the doors of thy mouth from her that lieth in thy bosom.
target: Janganlah percaya kepada teman, janganlah mengandalkan diri kepada kawan! Jagalah pintu mulutmu terhadap perempuan yang berbaring di pangkuanmu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Nebuchadnezzar spake, and said, Blessed be the God of Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego, who hath sent his angel, and delivered his servants that trusted in him, and have changed the king's word, and yielded their bodies, that they might not serve nor worship any god, except their own God.
target: Berkatalah Nebukadnezar: "Terpujilah Allahnya Sadrakh, Mesakh dan Abednego! Ia telah mengutus malaikat-Nya dan melepaskan hamba-hamba-Nya, yang telah menaruh percaya kepada-Nya, dan melanggar titah raja, dan yang menyerahkan tubuh mereka, karena mereka tidak mau memuja dan menyembah allah mana pun kecuali Allah mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye mountains, that ye skipped like rams; and ye little hills, like lambs?
target: hai gunung-gunung, sehingga kamu melompat-lompat seperti domba jantan, hai bukit-bukit, sehingga kamu seperti anak domba?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then lifted I up mine eyes, and saw, and behold four horns.
target: Aku melayangkan mataku dan melihat: tampak empat tanduk.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And be ready in the morning, and come up in the morning unto mount Sinai, and present thyself there to me in the top of the mount.
target: Bersiaplah menjelang pagi dan naiklah pada waktu pagi ke atas gunung Sinai; berdirilah di sana menghadap Aku di puncak gunung itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Lord, hear my voice: let thine ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications.
target: Tuhan, dengarkanlah suaraku! Biarlah telinga-Mu menaruh perhatian kepada suara permohonanku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he took thereof in his hands, and went on eating, and came to his father and mother, and he gave them, and they did eat: but he told not them that he had taken the honey out of the carcase of the lion.
target: Dikeruknya madu itu ke dalam tangannya dan sambil memakannya ia berjalan terus, kemudian pergilah ia kepada ayahnya dan ibunya, dan memberikannya juga kepada mereka, lalu mereka memakannya. Tetapi tidak diceriterakannya kepada mereka, bahwa madu itu dikeruknya dari kerangka singa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And of every living thing of all flesh, two of every sort shalt thou bring into the ark, to keep them alive with thee; they shall be male and female.
target: Dan dari segala yang hidup, dari segala makhluk, dari semuanya haruslah engkau bawa satu pasang ke dalam bahtera itu, supaya terpelihara hidupnya bersama-sama dengan engkau; jantan dan betina harus kaubawa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he made the ephod of gold, blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen.
target: Dibuatnyalah baju efod dari emas, kain ungu tua dan kain ungu muda, kain kirmizi dan lenan halus yang dipintal benangnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The voice of the LORD shaketh the wilderness; the LORD shaketh the wilderness of Kadesh.
target: Suara TUHAN membuat padang gurun gemetar, TUHAN membuat padang gurun Kadesh gemetar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there shalt thou build an altar unto the LORD thy God, an altar of stones: thou shalt not lift up any iron tool upon them.
target: Juga haruslah kaudirikan di sana mezbah bagi TUHAN, Allahmu, suatu mezbah dari batu yang tidak boleh kauolah dengan perkakas besi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Saul sent messengers to take David: and when they saw the company of the prophets prophesying, and Samuel standing as appointed over them, the Spirit of God was upon the messengers of Saul, and they also prophesied.
target: maka Saul mengirim orang-orang suruhan untuk mengambil Daud. Tetapi orang-orang ini melihat sekumpulan nabi kepenuhan, dengan dikepalai oleh Samuel. Dan Roh Allah hinggap pada orang-orang suruhan Saul, sehingga mereka pun kepenuhan seperti nabi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Samuel said unto all Israel, Behold, I have hearkened unto your voice in all that ye said unto me, and have made a king over you.
target: Berkatalah Samuel kepada seluruh orang Israel: "Telah kudengarkan segala permintaanmu yang kamu sampaikan kepadaku, dan seorang raja telah kuangkat atasmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there came of all people to hear the wisdom of Solomon, from all kings of the earth, which had heard of his wisdom.
target: Maka datanglah orang dari segala bangsa mendengarkan hikmat Salomo, dan ia menerima upeti dari semua raja-raja di bumi, yang telah mendengar tentang hikmatnya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses told it unto Aaron, and to his sons, and unto all the children of Israel.
target: Demikianlah Musa menyampaikan firman itu kepada Harun serta anak-anaknya dan kepada semua orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he had broken down the altars and the groves, and had beaten the graven images into powder, and cut down all the idols throughout all the land of Israel, he returned to Jerusalem.
target: ia merobohkan segala mezbah dan tiang berhala, meremukkan segala patung pahatan serta menghancurluluhkannya, dan menghancurkan semua pedupaan di seluruh tanah Israel. Sesudah itu ia kembali ke Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they brought unto Solomon horses out of Egypt, and out of all lands.
target: Kuda untuk Salomo didatangkan dari Misraim dan dari segala negeri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his servants carried him in a chariot dead from Megiddo, and brought him to Jerusalem, and buried him in his own sepulchre. And the people of the land took Jehoahaz the son of Josiah, and anointed him, and made him king in his father's stead.
target: Pegawai-pegawainya mengangkut mayatnya dengan kereta dari Megido dan membawanya ke Yerusalem, kemudian mereka menguburkannya dalam kuburnya sendiri. Maka rakyat negeri itu menjemput Yoahas, anak Yosia, mengurapi dia dan mengangkat dia menjadi raja menggantikan ayahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt put oil upon it, and lay frankincense thereon: it is a meat offering.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.
target: Karena kita ini buatan Allah, diciptakan dalam Kristus Yesus untuk melakukan pekerjaan baik, yang dipersiapkan Allah sebelumnya. Ia mau, supaya kita hidup di dalamnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will bring the third part through the fire, and will refine them as silver is refined, and will try them as gold is tried: they shall call on my name, and I will hear them: I will say, It is my people: and they shall say, The LORD is my God.
target: Aku akan menaruh yang sepertiga itu dalam api dan akan memurnikan mereka seperti orang memurnikan perak. Aku akan menguji mereka, seperti orang menguji emas. Mereka akan memanggil nama-Ku, dan Aku akan menjawab mereka. Aku akan berkata: Mereka adalah umat-Ku, dan mereka akan menjawab: TUHAN adalah Allahku!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of the children of Manasseh, by their generations, after their families, by the house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from twenty years old and upward, all that were able to go forth to war;
target: Dan ketika silsilah bani Manasye disusun menurut kaum-kaum yang ada dalam suku mereka, maka dicatatlah nama orang-orang yang berumur dua puluh tahun ke atas, semua orang yang sanggup berperang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass after these things, that God did tempt Abraham, and said unto him, Abraham: and he said, Behold, here I am.
target: Setelah semuanya itu Allah mencoba Abraham. Ia berfirman kepadanya: "Abraham," lalu sahutnya: "Ya, Tuhan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Foolishness is bound in the heart of a child; but the rod of correction shall drive it far from him.
target: Kebodohan melekat pada hati orang muda, tetapi tongkat didikan akan mengusir itu dari padanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I speak to your shame. Is it so, that there is not a wise man among you? no, not one that shall be able to judge between his brethren?
target: Hal ini kukatakan untuk memalukan kamu. Tidak adakah seorang di antara kamu yang berhikmat, yang dapat mengurus perkara-perkara dari saudara-saudaranya?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers: but the sheep did not hear them.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Dan Aku berkata kepadamu: Mulai sekarang kamu tidak akan melihat Aku lagi, hingga kamu berkata: Diberkatilah Dia yang datang dalam nama Tuhan!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Speak unto the children of Israel, and bid them that they make them fringes in the borders of their garments throughout their generations, and that they put upon the fringe of the borders a ribband of blue:
target: "Berbicaralah kepada orang Israel dan katakanlah kepada mereka, bahwa mereka harus membuat jumbai-jumbai pada punca baju mereka, turun-temurun, dan dalam jumbai-jumbai punca itu haruslah dibubuh benang ungu kebiru-biruan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They are not humbled even unto this day, neither have they feared, nor walked in my law, nor in my statutes, that I set before you and before your fathers.
target: Mereka tidak remuk hati sampai kepada hari ini, mereka tidak takut dan tidak mengikuti Taurat-Ku dan ketetapan-Ku yang telah Kuberikan kepadamu dan kepada nenek moyangmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Jacob answered Shechem and Hamor his father deceitfully, and said, because he had defiled Dinah their sister:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation.
target: Karena dengan hati orang percaya dan dibenarkan, dan dengan mulut orang mengaku dan diselamatkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Take the rod, and gather thou the assembly together, thou, and Aaron thy brother, and speak ye unto the rock before their eyes; and it shall give forth his water, and thou shalt bring forth to them water out of the rock: so thou shalt give the congregation and their beasts drink.
target: "Ambillah tongkatmu itu dan engkau dan Harun, kakakmu, harus menyuruh umat itu berkumpul; katakanlah di depan mata mereka kepada bukit batu itu supaya diberi airnya; demikianlah engkau mengeluarkan air dari bukit batu itu bagi mereka dan memberi minum umat itu serta ternaknya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So they went up, and searched the land from the wilderness of Zin unto Rehob, as men come to Hamath.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The words of the Preacher, the son of David, king in Jerusalem.
target: Inilah perkataan Pengkhotbah, anak Daud, raja di Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the young man deferred not to do the thing, because he had delight in Jacob's daughter: and he was more honourable than all the house of his father.
target: Dan orang muda itu tidak bertangguh melakukannya, sebab ia suka kepada anak Yakub, lagipula ia seorang yang paling dihormati di antara seluruh kaum keluarganya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And to love him with all the heart, and with all the understanding, and with all the soul, and with all the strength, and to love his neighbour as himself, is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices.
target: Memang mengasihi Dia dengan segenap hati dan dengan segenap pengertian dan dengan segenap kekuatan, dan juga mengasihi sesama manusia seperti diri sendiri adalah jauh lebih utama dari pada semua korban bakaran dan korban sembelihan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And your children shall wander in the wilderness forty years, and bear your whoredoms, until your carcases be wasted in the wilderness.
target: dan anak-anakmu akan mengembara sebagai penggembala di padang gurun empat puluh tahun lamanya dan akan menanggung akibat ketidaksetiaan, sampai bangkai-bangkaimu habis di padang gurun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he that biddeth him God speed is partaker of his evil deeds.
target: Sebab barangsiapa memberi salam kepadanya, ia mendapat bagian dalam perbuatannya yang jahat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A fool also is full of words: a man cannot tell what shall be; and what shall be after him, who can tell him?
target: Orang yang bodoh banyak bicaranya, meskipun orang tidak tahu apa yang akan terjadi, dan siapakah yang akan mengatakan kepadanya apa yang akan terjadi sesudah dia?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony; and they loved not their lives unto the death.
target: Dan mereka mengalahkan dia oleh darah Anak Domba, dan oleh perkataan kesaksian mereka. Karena mereka tidak mengasihi nyawa mereka sampai ke dalam maut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O satisfy us early with thy mercy; that we may rejoice and be glad all our days.
target: Kenyangkanlah kami di waktu pagi dengan kasih setia-Mu, supaya kami bersorak-sorai dan bersukacita semasa hari-hari kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Solomon loved the LORD, walking in the statutes of David his father: only he sacrificed and burnt incense in high places.
target: Dan Salomo menunjukkan kasihnya kepada TUHAN dengan hidup menurut ketetapan-ketetapan Daud, ayahnya; hanya, ia masih mempersembahkan korban sembelihan dan ukupan di bukit-bukit pengorbanan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, Lodge here this night, and I will bring you word again, as the LORD shall speak unto me: and the princes of Moab abode with Balaam.
target: Lalu berkatalah Bileam kepada mereka: "Bermalamlah di sini pada malam ini, maka aku akan memberi jawab kepadamu, sesuai dengan apa yang akan difirmankan TUHAN kepadaku." Maka tinggallah pemuka-pemuka Moab itu pada Bileam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let the LORD, the God of the spirits of all flesh, set a man over the congregation,
target: "Biarlah TUHAN, Allah dari roh segala makhluk, mengangkat atas umat ini seorang

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,
target: kepala kaum Kenas, kepala kaum T'eman, kepala kaum Mibzar,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Others mocking said, These men are full of new wine.
target: Tetapi orang lain menyindir: "Mereka sedang mabuk oleh anggur manis."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if ye enquire any thing concerning other matters, it shall be determined in a lawful assembly.
target: Dan jika ada sesuatu yang lain yang kamu kehendaki, baiklah kehendakmu itu diselesaikan dalam sidang rakyat yang sah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Sekeliling ruangan itu dipakukan gantungan-gantungan yang panjangnya setapak tangan, dan di atas meja-meja itu diletakkan daging korban.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Better is little with the fear of the LORD than great treasure and trouble therewith.
target: Lebih baik sedikit barang dengan disertai takut akan TUHAN dari pada banyak harta dengan disertai kecemasan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren; and Joseph's kindred was made known unto Pharaoh.
target: pada kunjungan mereka yang kedua Yusuf memperkenalkan dirinya kepada saudara-saudaranya, lalu ketahuanlah asal usul Yusuf kepada Firaun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: One kid of the goats for a sin offering:
target: seekor kambing jantan untuk korban penghapus dosa;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For all that do these things are an abomination unto the LORD: and because of these abominations the LORD thy God doth drive them out from before thee.
target: Sebab setiap orang yang melakukan hal-hal ini adalah kekejian bagi TUHAN, dan oleh karena kekejian-kekejian inilah TUHAN, Allahmu, menghalau mereka dari hadapanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, Rebekah is before thee, take her, and go, and let her be thy master's son's wife, as the LORD hath spoken.
target: Lihat, Ribka ada di depanmu, bawalah dia dan pergilah, supaya ia menjadi isteri anak tuanmu, seperti yang difirmankan TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He shall pour the water out of his buckets, and his seed shall be in many waters, and his king shall be higher than Agag, and his kingdom shall be exalted.
target: Air mengalir dari timbanya, dan benihnya mendapat air banyak-banyak. Rajanya akan naik tinggi melebihi Agag, dan kerajaannya akan dimuliakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Musa:
