input: And Naomi had a kinsman of her husband's, a mighty man of wealth, of the family of Elimelech; and his name was Boaz.
target: Naomi itu mempunyai seorang sanak dari pihak suaminya, seorang yang kaya raya dari kaum Elimelekh, namanya Boas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Men shall buy fields for money, and subscribe evidences, and seal them, and take witnesses in the land of Benjamin, and in the places about Jerusalem, and in the cities of Judah, and in the cities of the mountains, and in the cities of the valley, and in the cities of the south: for I will cause their captivity to return, saith the LORD.
target: Orang akan membeli ladang-ladang dengan perak, menulis surat pembelian, memeteraikannya dan memanggil saksi-saksi di daerah Benyamin, di sekitar Yerusalem, di kota-kota Yehuda, di kota-kota Pegunungan, di kota-kota Daerah Bukit dan di kota-kota Tanah Negeb. Sebab Aku akan memulihkan keadaan mereka, demikianlah firman TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which when the brethren knew, they brought him down to Caesarea, and sent him forth to Tarsus.
target: Akan tetapi setelah hal itu diketahui oleh saudara-saudara anggota jemaat, mereka membawa dia ke Kaisarea dan dari situ membantu dia ke Tarsus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All these are the beginning of sorrows.
target: Akan tetapi semuanya itu barulah permulaan penderitaan menjelang zaman baru.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ezra the priest brought the law before the congregation both of men and women, and all that could hear with understanding, upon the first day of the seventh month.
target: maka serentak berkumpullah seluruh rakyat di halaman di depan pintu gerbang Air. Mereka meminta kepada Ezra, ahli kitab itu, supaya ia membawa kitab Taurat Musa, yakni kitab hukum yang diberikan TUHAN kepada Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They would none of my counsel: they despised all my reproof.
target: tidak mau menerima nasihatku, tetapi menolak segala teguranku,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In that day shall five cities in the land of Egypt speak the language of Canaan, and swear to the LORD of hosts; one shall be called, The city of destruction.
target: Pada waktu itu akan ada lima kota di tanah Mesir yang berbicara bahasa Kanaan dan yang bersumpah demi TUHAN semesta alam. Satu di antaranya akan disebutkan Ir-Heres.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abraham was old, and well stricken in age: and the LORD had blessed Abraham in all things.
target: Adapun Abraham telah tua dan lanjut umurnya, serta diberkati TUHAN dalam segala hal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if, while we seek to be justified by Christ, we ourselves also are found sinners, is therefore Christ the minister of sin? God forbid.
target: Tetapi jika kami sendiri, sementara kami berusaha untuk dibenarkan dalam Kristus ternyata adalah orang-orang berdosa, apakah hal itu berarti, bahwa Kristus adalah pelayan dosa? Sekali-kali tidak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the remnant of the oil that is in the priest's hand he shall pour upon the head of him that is to be cleansed: and the priest shall make an atonement for him before the LORD.
target: Dan apa yang tinggal dari minyak itu haruslah dibubuhnya pada kepala orang yang akan ditahirkan. Dengan demikian imam mengadakan pendamaian bagi orang itu di hadapan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The burden of Moab. Because in the night Ar of Moab is laid waste, and brought to silence; because in the night Kir of Moab is laid waste, and brought to silence;
target: Ucapan ilahi tentang Moab. Sungguh, dalam suatu malam Ar-Moab sudah dirusakkan, dibinasakan; sungguh, dalam suatu malam Kir-Moab sudah dirusakkan, dibinasakan!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The clouds poured out water: the skies sent out a sound: thine arrows also went abroad.
target: Air telah melihat Engkau, ya Allah, air telah melihat Engkau, lalu menjadi gentar, bahkan samudera raya gemetar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt prepare a meat offering for it every morning, the sixth part of an ephah, and the third part of an hin of oil, to temper with the fine flour; a meat offering continually by a perpetual ordinance unto the LORD.
target: Di samping itu setiap pagi ia harus mempersembahkan korban sajian seperenam efa tepung dengan minyak sepertiga hin untuk mencampur tepung yang terbaik itu; itulah korban sajian bagi TUHAN, dan ketetapan itu tetap selama-lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And we said unto my lord, We have a father, an old man, and a child of his old age, a little one; and his brother is dead, and he alone is left of his mother, and his father loveth him.
target: Dan kami menjawab tuanku: Kami masih mempunyai ayah yang tua dan masih ada anaknya yang muda, yang lahir pada masa tuanya; kakaknya telah mati, hanya dia sendirilah yang tinggal dari mereka yang seibu, sebab itu ayahnya sangat mengasihi dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which doeth great things past finding out; yea, and wonders without number.
target: yang melakukan perbuatan-perbuatan besar yang tidak terduga, dan keajaiban-keajaiban yang tidak terbilang banyaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also day by day, from the first day unto the last day, he read in the book of the law of God. And they kept the feast seven days; and on the eighth day was a solemn assembly, according unto the manner.
target: Seluruh jemaah yang pulang dari pembuangan itu membuat pondok-pondok dan tinggal di situ. Memang sejak zaman Yosua bin Nun sampai hari itu orang Israel tidak pernah berbuat demikian. Maka diadakanlah pesta ria yang amat besar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Heaviness in the heart of man maketh it stoop: but a good word maketh it glad.
target: Kekuatiran dalam hati membungkukkan orang, tetapi perkataan yang baik menggembirakan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Shephatiah the son of Mattan, and Gedaliah the son of Pashur, and Jucal the son of Shelemiah, and Pashur the son of Malchiah, heard the words that Jeremiah had spoken unto all the people, saying,
target: Tetapi Sefaca bin Matan, Gedalya bin Pasyhur, Yukhal bin Selemya dan Pasyhur bin Malkia mendengar perkataan yang tidak henti-henti diucapkan oleh Yeremia kepada segenap orang banyak itu:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He shall fly away as a dream, and shall not be found: yea, he shall be chased away as a vision of the night.
target: Bagaikan impian ia melayang hilang, tak berbekas, lenyap bagaikan penglihatan waktu malam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let seven men of his sons be delivered unto us, and we will hang them up unto the LORD in Gibeah of Saul, whom the LORD did choose. And the king said, I will give them.
target: biarlah diserahkan tujuh orang anaknya laki-laki kepada kami, supaya kami menggantung mereka di hadapan TUHAN di Gibeon, di bukit TUHAN." Lalu berkatalah raja: "Aku akan menyerahkan mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hast broken Rahab in pieces, as one that is slain; thou hast scattered thine enemies with thy strong arm.
target: Engkaulah yang memerintah kecongkakan laut, pada waktu naik gelombang-gelombangnya, Engkau juga yang meredakannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And seven priests bearing seven trumpets of rams' horns before the ark of the LORD went on continually, and blew with the trumpets: and the armed men went before them; but the rereward came after the ark of the LORD, the priests going on, and blowing with the trumpets.
target: Maka berjalanlah juga ketujuh orang imam, yang membawa ketujuh sangkakala tanduk domba itu di depan tabut TUHAN, sambil berjalan mereka meniup sangkakala, sedang orang-orang bersenjata berjalan di depan mereka dan barisan penutup mengikut tabut TUHAN, sementara sangkakala terus-menerus ditiup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he made curtains of goats' hair for the tent over the tabernacle: eleven curtains he made them.
target: Dibuatlah tenda-tenda dari bulu kambing menjadi atap kemah yang menudungi Kemah Suci, sebelas tenda dibuat orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O my threshing, and the corn of my floor: that which I have heard of the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, have I declared unto you.
target: Hai bangsaku yang telah dipijak-pijak dan diinjak-injak! Apa yang kudengar dari TUHAN semesta alam, Allah Israel, telah kuberitahukan kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who hath heard such a thing? who hath seen such things? Shall the earth be made to bring forth in one day? or shall a nation be born at once? for as soon as Zion travailed, she brought forth her children.
target: Siapakah yang telah mendengar hal yang seperti itu, siapakah yang telah melihat hal yang demikian? Masakan suatu negeri diperanakkan dalam satu hari, atau suatu bangsa dilahirkan dalam satu kali? Namun baru saja menggeliat sakit, Sion sudah melahirkan anak-anaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when ye shall come into the land, and shall have planted all manner of trees for food, then ye shall count the fruit thereof as uncircumcised: three years shall it be as uncircumcised unto you: it shall not be eaten of.
target: Apabila kamu sudah masuk ke negeri itu dan menanam bermacam-macam pohon buah-buahan, janganlah kamu memetik buahnya selama tiga tahun dan jangan memakannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Come against her from the utmost border, open her storehouses: cast her up as heaps, and destroy her utterly: let nothing of her be left.
target: Marilah mendatanginya dari segala jurusan, bukalah lumbung-lumbungnya, onggokkanlah isinya bertimbun-timbun dan tumpaslah itu, janganlah ada tinggal sisanya!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And of Dan he said, Dan is a lion's whelp: he shall leap from Bashan.
target: Tentang Dan ia berkata: "Adapun Dan ialah anak singa yang melompat keluar dari Basan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be thou diligent to know the state of thy flocks, and look well to thy herds.
target: Kenallah baik-baik keadaan kambing dombamu, perhatikanlah kawanan hewanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Judah acknowledged them, and said, She hath been more righteous than I; because that I gave her not to Shelah my son. And he knew her again no more.
target: Yehuda memeriksa barang-barang itu, lalu berkata: "Bukan aku, tetapi perempuan itulah yang benar, karena memang aku tidak memberikan dia kepada Syela, anakku." Dan ia tidak bersetubuh lagi dengan perempuan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will bring upon that land all my words which I have pronounced against it, even all that is written in this book, which Jeremiah hath prophesied against all the nations.
target: Aku akan menimpakan kepada negeri ini segala apa yang Kufirmankan tentang dia, yaitu segala apa yang tertulis dalam kitab ini seperti yang telah dinubuatkan Yeremia tentang segala bangsa itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his sisters, are they not all with us? Whence then hath this man all these things?
target: Dan bukankah saudara-saudara-Nya perempuan semuanya ada bersama kita? Jadi dari mana diperoleh-Nya semuanya itu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The nakedness of thy father's wife's daughter, begotten of thy father, she is thy sister, thou shalt not uncover her nakedness.
target: Mengenai aurat anak perempuan dari seorang isteri ayahmu, yang lahir pada ayahmu sendiri, janganlah kausingkapkan auratnya, karena ia saudaramu perempuan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him.
target: Dan banyak lagi hujat yang diucapkan mereka kepada-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they went out at noon. But Benhadad was drinking himself drunk in the pavilions, he and the kings, the thirty and two kings that helped him.
target: Lalu mereka maju menyerang pada waktu tengah hari, sementara Benhadad minum-minum sampai mabuk di pondoknya, bersama dengan ketiga puluh dua raja yang membantunya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols? for ye are the temple of the living God; as God hath said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.
target: Apakah hubungan bait Allah dengan berhala? Karena kita adalah bait dari Allah yang hidup menurut firman Allah ini: "Aku akan diam bersama-sama dengan mereka dan hidup di tengah-tengah mereka, dan Aku akan menjadi Allah mereka, dan mereka akan menjadi umat-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Elisha died, and they buried him. And the bands of the Moabites invaded the land at the coming in of the year.
target: Sesudah itu matilah Elisa, lalu ia dikuburkan. Adapun gerombolan Moab sering memasuki negeri itu pada pergantian tahun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou turnest man to destruction; and sayest, Return, ye children of men.
target: Engkau mengembalikan manusia kepada debu, dan berkata: "Kembalilah, hai anak-anak manusia!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For wickedness burneth as the fire: it shall devour the briers and thorns, and shall kindle in the thickets of the forest, and they shall mount up like the lifting up of smoke.
target: Oleh karena murka TUHAN semesta alam, terbakarlah tanah itu, dan bangsa itu menjadi makanan api; seorang pun tidak mengasihani saudaranya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ahimaaz begat Azariah, and Azariah begat Johanan,
target: Ahimaas memperanakkan Azarya; Azarya memperanakkan Yohanan;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Will he esteem thy riches? no, not gold, nor all the forces of strength.
target: Dapatkah teriakanmu meluputkan engkau dari kesesakan, ataukah seluruh kekuatan jerih payahmu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom, and talk of thy power;
target: Mereka akan mengumumkan kemuliaan kerajaan-Mu, dan akan membicarakan keperkasaan-Mu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said his sister to Pharaoh's daughter, Shall I go and call to thee a nurse of the Hebrew women, that she may nurse the child for thee?
target: Lalu bertanyalah kakak anak itu kepada puteri Firaun: "Akan kupanggilkah bagi tuan puteri seorang inang penyusu dari perempuan Ibrani untuk menyusukan bayi itu bagi tuan puteri?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: With whom the kings of the earth have committed fornication, and the inhabitants of the earth have been made drunk with the wine of her fornication.
target: Dengan dia raja-raja di bumi telah berbuat cabul, dan penghuni-penghuni bumi telah mabuk oleh anggur percabulannya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which shaketh the earth out of her place, and the pillars thereof tremble.
target: yang menggeserkan bumi dari tempatnya, sehingga tiangnya bergoyang-goyang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Again, thou shalt say to the children of Israel, Whosoever he be of the children of Israel, or of the strangers that sojourn in Israel, that giveth any of his seed unto Molech; he shall surely be put to death: the people of the land shall stone him with stones.
target: "Engkau harus berkata kepada orang Israel: Setiap orang, baik dari antara orang Israel maupun dari antara orang asing yang tinggal di tengah-tengah orang Israel, yang menyerahkan seorang dari anak-anaknya kepada Molokh, pastilah ia dihukum mati, yakni rakyat negeri harus melontari dia dengan batu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the people saw that Moses delayed to come down out of the mount, the people gathered themselves together unto Aaron, and said unto him, Up, make us gods, which shall go before us; for as for this Moses, the man that brought us up out of the land of Egypt, we wot not what is become of him.
target: Ketika bangsa itu melihat, bahwa Musa mengundur-undurkan turun dari gunung itu, maka berkumpullah mereka mengerumuni Harun dan berkata kepadanya: "Mari, buatlah untuk kami allah, yang akan berjalan di depan kami sebab Musa ini, orang yang telah memimpin kami keluar dari tanah Mesir — kami tidak tahu apa yang telah terjadi dengan dia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels, intruding into those things which he hath not seen, vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind,
target: Janganlah kamu biarkan kemenanganmu digagalkan oleh orang yang pura-pura merendahkan diri dan beribadah kepada malaikat, serta berkanjang pada penglihatan-penglihatan dan tanpa alasan membesar-besarkan diri oleh pikirannya yang duniawi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will also break in pieces with thee the shepherd and his flock; and with thee will I break in pieces the husbandman and his yoke of oxen; and with thee will I break in pieces captains and rulers.
target: dengan engkau Aku menghancurkan gembala dan kawanan dombanya, dengan engkau Aku menghancurkan petani dan lembu pembajaknya, dengan engkau Aku menghancurkan bupati-bupati dan pembesar-pembesar!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the wicked shall perish, and the enemies of the LORD shall be as the fat of lambs: they shall consume; into smoke shall they consume away.
target: Sesungguhnya, orang-orang fasik akan binasa; musuh TUHAN seperti keindahan padang rumput: mereka habis lenyap, habis lenyap bagaikan asap.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee, and began to be sorrowful and very heavy.
target: Dan Ia membawa Petrus dan kedua anak Zebedeus serta-Nya. Maka mulailah Ia merasa sedih dan gentar,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he that doubteth is damned if he eat, because he eateth not of faith: for whatsoever is not of faith is sin.
target: Tetapi barangsiapa yang bimbang, kalau ia makan, ia telah dihukum, karena ia tidak melakukannya berdasarkan iman. Dan segala sesuatu yang tidak berdasarkan iman, adalah dosa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who are they among all the gods of the countries, that have delivered their country out of mine hand, that the LORD should deliver Jerusalem out of mine hand?
target: Siapakah di antara semua allah negeri-negeri yang telah melepaskan negeri mereka dari tanganku, sehingga TUHAN sanggup melepaskan Yerusalem dari tanganku?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation.
target: Dan rahmat-Nya turun-temurun atas orang yang takut akan Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David said unto God, Is it not I that commanded the people to be numbered? even I it is that have sinned and done evil indeed; but as for these sheep, what have they done? let thine hand, I pray thee, O LORD my God, be on me, and on my father's house; but not on thy people, that they should be plagued.
target: Dan berkatalah Daud kepada Allah: "Bukankah aku ini yang menyuruh menghitung rakyat dan aku sendirilah yang telah berdosa dan yang melakukan kejahatan, tetapi domba-domba ini, apakah yang dilakukan mereka? Ya TUHAN, Allahku, biarlah kiranya tangan-Mu menimpa aku dan kaum keluargaku, tetapi janganlah tulah menimpa umat-Mu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he brought him to Jesus. And when Jesus beheld him, he said, Thou art Simon the son of Jona: thou shalt be called Cephas, which is by interpretation, A stone.
target: Ia membawanya kepada Yesus. Yesus memandang dia dan berkata: "Engkau Simon, anak Yohanes, engkau akan dinamakan Kefas (artinya: Petrus)."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the waters shall fail from the sea, and the river shall be wasted and dried up.
target: Air dari sungai Nil akan habis, dan sungai itu akan menjadi tohor dan kering,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.
target: Dan sekarang aku minta kepadamu, Ibu — bukan seolah-olah aku menuliskan perintah baru bagimu, tetapi menurut perintah yang sudah ada pada kita dari mulanya — supaya kita saling mengasihi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They search out iniquities; they accomplish a diligent search: both the inward thought of every one of them, and the heart, is deep.
target: Mereka berpegang teguh pada maksud yang jahat, mereka membicarakan hendak memasang perangkap dengan sembunyi; kata mereka: "Siapa yang melihatnya?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore all the princes sent Jehudi the son of Nethaniah, the son of Shelemiah, the son of Cushi, unto Baruch, saying, Take in thine hand the roll wherein thou hast read in the ears of the people, and come. So Baruch the son of Neriah took the roll in his hand, and came unto them.
target: Kemudian para pemimpin itu menyuruh Yehudi bin Netanya bin Selemya bin Kusyi kepada Barukh mengatakan: "Bawalah gulungan yang telah kaubacakan kepada orang banyak itu dan datanglah ke mari!" Maka Barukh bin Neria membawa gulungan itu dan datang kepada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then ye shall sacrifice one kid of the goats for a sin offering, and two lambs of the first year for a sacrifice of peace offerings.
target: Kemudian kamu harus mempersembahkan seekor kambing jantan sebagai korban penghapus dosa, dan dua ekor domba yang berumur setahun sebagai korban keselamatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Depart from me, all ye workers of iniquity; for the LORD hath heard the voice of my weeping.
target: Mataku mengidap karena sakit hati, rabun karena semua lawanku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto him, Go in peace. So he departed from him a little way.
target: Maka berkatalah Elisa kepadanya: "Pergilah dengan selamat!" Setelah Naaman berjalan tidak berapa jauh dari padanya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will freely sacrifice unto thee: I will praise thy name, O LORD; for it is good.
target: Sesungguhnya, Allah adalah penolongku; Tuhanlah yang menopang aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there sat a certain man at Lystra, impotent in his feet, being a cripple from his mother's womb, who never had walked:
target: Di Listra ada seorang yang duduk saja, karena lemah kakinya dan lumpuh sejak ia dilahirkan dan belum pernah dapat berjalan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then shall he bring it to the priest, and the priest shall take his handful of it, even a memorial thereof, and burn it on the altar, according to the offerings made by fire unto the LORD: it is a sin offering.
target: Lalu haruslah itu dibawanya kepada imam dan imam itu haruslah mengambil dari padanya segenggam sebagai bagian ingat-ingatannya, lalu membakarnya di atas mezbah di atas segala korban api-apian TUHAN; itulah korban penghapus dosa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thus saith the Lord GOD; The city that went out by a thousand shall leave an hundred, and that which went forth by an hundred shall leave ten, to the house of Israel.
target: Sebab beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH kepada kaum Israel: "Kota yang maju berperang dengan seribu orang, dari padanya akan tersisa seratus orang, dan yang maju berperang dengan seratus orang, dari padanya akan tersisa sepuluh orang."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The conies are but a feeble folk, yet make they their houses in the rocks;
target: pelanduk, bangsa yang lemah, tetapi yang membuat rumahnya di bukit batu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Phinehas, the son of Eleazar, the son of Aaron, stood before it in those days,) saying, Shall I yet again go out to battle against the children of Benjamin my brother, or shall I cease? And the LORD said, Go up; for to morrow I will deliver them into thine hand.
target: dan Pinehas bin Eleazar bin Harun menjadi imam Allah pada waktu itu — kata mereka: "Haruskah kami maju sekali lagi untuk berperang melawan bani Benyamin, saudara kami itu, atau haruskah kami hentikan itu?" Jawab TUHAN: "Majulah, sebab besok Aku akan menyerahkan mereka ke dalam tanganmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the people of the land slew all them that had conspired against king Amon; and the people of the land made Josiah his son king in his stead.
target: Tetapi rakyat negeri itu membunuh semua orang yang mengadakan persepakatan melawan raja Amon; dan rakyat negeri itu mengangkat Yosia, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The small and great are there; and the servant is free from his master.
target: Di sana orang kecil dan orang besar sama, dan budak bebas dari pada tuannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they said, There is no hope: but we will walk after our own devices, and we will every one do the imagination of his evil heart.
target: Tetapi mereka berkata: Tidak ada gunanya! Sebab kami hendak berkelakuan mengikuti rencana kami sendiri dan masing-masing hendak bertindak mengikuti kedegilan hatinya yang jahat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My soul hath long dwelt with him that hateth peace.
target: Cukup lama aku tinggal bersama-sama dengan orang-orang yang membenci perdamaian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner, whomsoever they desired.
target: Telah menjadi kebiasaan untuk membebaskan satu orang hukuman pada tiap-tiap hari raya itu menurut permintaan orang banyak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Unto whom David said, If thou passest on with me, then thou shalt be a burden unto me:
target: Berkatalah Daud kepadanya: "Jika engkau turut dengan aku, maka engkau menjadi beban kepadaku nanti,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And by the border of Ephraim, from the east side even unto the west side, a portion for Reuben.
target: Berbatasan dengan wilayah Efraim, dari perbatasan sebelah timur sampai perbatasan sebelah barat, terdapat bagian Ruben.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD, after the abominations of the heathen, whom the LORD cast out before the children of Israel.
target: Ia melakukan apa yang jahat di mata TUHAN, sesuai dengan perbuatan keji bangsa-bangsa yang telah dihalau TUHAN dari depan orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I say, Did not Israel know? First Moses saith, I will provoke you to jealousy by them that are no people, and by a foolish nation I will anger you.
target: Tetapi aku bertanya: Adakah Israel menanggapnya? Pertama-tama Musa berkata: "Aku menjadikan kamu cemburu terhadap orang-orang yang bukan umat dan membangkitkan amarahmu terhadap bangsa yang bebal."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Gad dwelt over against them, in the land of Bashan unto Salcah:
target: Bani Gad diam berbatasan dengan mereka di tanah Basan sampai Salkha.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Deliver thyself as a roe from the hand of the hunter, and as a bird from the hand of the fowler.
target: lepaskanlah dirimu seperti kijang dari pada tangkapan, seperti burung dari pada tangan pemikat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all Naphtali, and the land of Ephraim, and Manasseh, and all the land of Judah, unto the utmost sea,
target: seluruh Naftali, tanah Efraim dan Manasye, seluruh tanah Yehuda sampai laut sebelah barat,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For verily I say unto you, That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see, and have not seen them; and to hear those things which ye hear, and have not heard them.
target: Sebab Aku berkata kepadamu: Sesungguhnya banyak nabi dan orang benar ingin melihat apa yang kamu lihat, tetapi tidak melihatnya, dan ingin mendengar apa yang kamu dengar, tetapi tidak mendengarnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All thy works shall praise thee, O LORD; and thy saints shall bless thee.
target: Segala yang Kaujadikan itu akan bersyukur kepada-Mu, ya TUHAN, dan orang-orang yang Kaukasihi akan memuji Engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: At Tehaphnehes also the day shall be darkened, when I shall break there the yokes of Egypt: and the pomp of her strength shall cease in her: as for her, a cloud shall cover her, and her daughters shall go into captivity.
target: Di Tahpanhes hari akan menjadi gelap pada saat Aku mematahkan kekuasaan Mesir di sana dan kecongkakannya, yang ditimbulkan kekuatannya, berakhir. Kota itu akan ditutupi oleh awan dan anak-anaknya perempuan akan diangkut tertawan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king appointed the lord on whose hand he leaned to have the charge of the gate: and the people trode upon him in the gate, and he died, as the man of God had said, who spake when the king came down to him.
target: Adapun raja telah menempatkan perwira yang menjadi ajudannya itu mengawasi pintu gerbang, tetapi rakyat menginjak-injak dia di pintu gerbang, lalu ia mati sesuai dengan perkataan abdi Allah yang mengatakannya pada waktu raja datang mendapatkan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Pharaoh was wroth with his servants, and put me in ward in the captain of the guard's house, both me and the chief baker:
target: Waktu itu tuanku Firaun murka kepada pegawai-pegawainya, dan menahan aku dalam rumah pengawal istana, beserta dengan kepala juru roti.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A proud look, a lying tongue, and hands that shed innocent blood,
target: mata sombong, lidah dusta, tangan yang menumpahkan darah orang yang tidak bersalah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And hath made us kings and priests unto God and his Father; to him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.
target: dan yang telah membuat kita menjadi suatu kerajaan, menjadi imam-imam bagi Allah, Bapa-Nya, — bagi Dialah kemuliaan dan kuasa sampai selama-lamanya. Amin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Are they not on the other side Jordan, by the way where the sun goeth down, in the land of the Canaanites, which dwell in the champaign over against Gilgal, beside the plains of Moreh?
target: Bukankah keduanya terletak di sebelah barat sungai Yordan, di belakang jalan raya sebelah matahari terbenam, di negeri orang Kanaan yang diam di Araba-Yordan, di tentangan Gilgal dekat pohon-pohon tarbantin di More?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass in the fourth year of king Hezekiah, which was the seventh year of Hoshea son of Elah king of Israel, that Shalmaneser king of Assyria came up against Samaria, and besieged it.
target: Dalam tahun keempat zaman raja Hizkia — itulah tahun ketujuh zaman Hosea bin Ela, raja Israel — majulah Salmaneser, raja Asyur, menyerang Samaria dan mengepungnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of the sons of Beriah: of Heber, the family of the Heberites: of Malchiel, the family of the Malchielites.
target: Mengenai bani Beria: dari Heber kaum orang Heber dan dari Malkiel kaum orang Malkiel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I say unto you, That unto every one which hath shall be given; and from him that hath not, even that he hath shall be taken away from him.
target: Jawabnya: Aku berkata kepadamu: Setiap orang yang mempunyai, kepadanya akan diberi, tetapi siapa yang tidak mempunyai, dari padanya akan diambil, juga apa yang ada padanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The fierce anger of the LORD shall not return, until he hath done it, and until he have performed the intents of his heart: in the latter days ye shall consider it.
target: Murka TUHAN yang menyala-nyala itu tidak akan surut sampai Ia telah melaksanakan dan mewujudkan apa yang dirancang-Nya dalam hati-Nya; pada hari-hari yang terakhir kamu akan mengerti hal itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt remember all the way which the LORD thy God led thee these forty years in the wilderness, to humble thee, and to prove thee, to know what was in thine heart, whether thou wouldest keep his commandments, or no.
target: Ingatlah kepada seluruh perjalanan yang kaulakukan atas kehendak TUHAN, Allahmu, di padang gurun selama empat puluh tahun ini dengan maksud merendahkan hatimu dan mencobai engkau untuk mengetahui apa yang ada dalam hatimu, yakni, apakah engkau berpegang pada perintah-Nya atau tidak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she dwelt under the palm tree of Deborah between Ramah and Bethel in mount Ephraim: and the children of Israel came up to her for judgment.
target: Ia biasa duduk di bawah pohon korma Debora antara Rama dan Betel di pegunungan Efraim, dan orang Israel menghadap dia untuk berhakim kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that oppresseth the poor to increase his riches, and he that giveth to the rich, shall surely come to want.
target: Orang yang menindas orang lemah untuk menguntungkan diri atau memberi hadiah kepada orang kaya, hanya merugikan diri saja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; Behold, I will send upon them the sword, the famine, and the pestilence, and will make them like vile figs, that cannot be eaten, they are so evil.
target: Beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam: Sesungguhnya, Aku akan mengirim pedang, kelaparan dan penyakit sampar ke antara mereka, dan Aku akan membuat mereka seperti buah ara yang busuk dan demikian jeleknya, sehingga tidak dapat dimakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And daily in the temple, and in every house, they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ.
target: Dan setiap hari mereka melanjutkan pengajaran mereka di Bait Allah dan di rumah-rumah orang dan memberitakan Injil tentang Yesus yang adalah Mesias.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which was the son of Mathusala, which was the son of Enoch, which was the son of Jared, which was the son of Maleleel, which was the son of Cainan,
target: anak Metusalah, anak Henokh, anak Yared, anak Mahalaleel, anak Kenan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the king of Babylon stood at the parting of the way, at the head of the two ways, to use divination: he made his arrows bright, he consulted with images, he looked in the liver.
target: Sebab raja Babel berdiri pada persimpangan jalan itu, pada awal kedua jalan itu untuk melakukan tenungan; ia mengocok panah, meminta petunjuk dari terafim dan menilik hati binatang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the morning it flourisheth, and groweth up; in the evening it is cut down, and withereth.
target: di waktu pagi berkembang dan bertumbuh, di waktu petang lisut dan layu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the children of Israel and the children of Levi shall bring the offering of the corn, of the new wine, and the oil, unto the chambers, where are the vessels of the sanctuary, and the priests that minister, and the porters, and the singers: and we will not forsake the house of our God.
target: Karena orang Israel dan orang Lewi harus membawa persembahan khusus dari pada gandum, anggur dan minyak ke bilik-bilik itu. Di situ ada perkakas-perkakas tempat kudus, pula para imam yang menyelenggarakan kebaktian, para penunggu pintu gerbang dan para penyanyi. Kami tidak akan membiarkan rumah Allah kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I know, that even now, whatsoever thou wilt ask of God, God will give it thee.
target: Tetapi sekarang pun aku tahu, bahwa Allah akan memberikan kepada-Mu segala sesuatu yang Engkau minta kepada-Nya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as it is fit in the Lord.
target: Hai isteri-isteri, tunduklah kepada suamimu, sebagaimana seharusnya di dalam Tuhan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not offer the blood of my sacrifice with leavened bread; neither shall the fat of my sacrifice remain until the morning.
target: Janganlah kaupersembahkan darah korban sembelihan yang kepada-Ku beserta sesuatu yang beragi, dan janganlah lemak korban hari raya-Ku bermalam sampai pagi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Know ye not, brethren, (for I speak to them that know the law,) how that the law hath dominion over a man as long as he liveth?
target: Apakah kamu tidak tahu, saudara-saudara, — sebab aku berbicara kepada mereka yang mengetahui hukum — bahwa hukum berkuasa atas seseorang selama orang itu hidup?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Arise, go to Padanaram, to the house of Bethuel thy mother's father; and take thee a wife from thence of the daughers of Laban thy mother's brother.
target: Bersiaplah, pergilah ke Padan-Aram, ke rumah Betuel, ayah ibumu, dan ambillah dari situ seorang isteri dari anak-anak Laban, saudara ibumu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when Ahab heard those words, that he rent his clothes, and put sackcloth upon his flesh, and fasted, and lay in sackcloth, and went softly.
target: Segera sesudah Ahab mendengar perkataan itu, ia mengoyakkan pakaiannya, mengenakan kain kabung pada tubuhnya dan berpuasa. Bahkan ia tidur dengan memakai kain kabung, dan berjalan dengan langkah lamban.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, the former things are come to pass, and new things do I declare: before they spring forth I tell you of them.
target: Nubuat-nubuat yang dahulu sekarang sudah menjadi kenyataan, hal-hal yang baru hendak Kuberitahukan. Sebelum hal-hal itu muncul, Aku mengabarkannya kepadamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It is like a grain of mustard seed, which, when it is sown in the earth, is less than all the seeds that be in the earth:
target: Hal Kerajaan itu seumpama biji sesawi yang ditaburkan di tanah. Memang biji itu yang paling kecil dari pada segala jenis benih yang ada di bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Gehazi, the servant of Elisha the man of God, said, Behold, my master hath spared Naaman this Syrian, in not receiving at his hands that which he brought: but, as the LORD liveth, I will run after him, and take somewhat of him.
target: berpikirlah Gehazi, bujang Elisa, abdi Allah: "Sesungguhnya tuanku terlalu menyegani Naaman, orang Aram ini, dengan tidak menerima persembahan yang dibawanya. Demi TUHAN yang hidup, sesungguhnya aku akan berlari mengejar dia dan akan menerima sesuatu dari padanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I trust that ye shall know that we are not reprobates.
target: Tetapi aku harap, bahwa kamu tahu, bahwa bukan kami yang tidak tahan uji.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses said unto the people, Fear ye not, stand still, and see the salvation of the LORD, which he will shew to you to day: for the Egyptians whom ye have seen to day, ye shall see them again no more for ever.
target: Tetapi berkatalah Musa kepada bangsa itu: "Janganlah takut, berdirilah tetap dan lihatlah keselamatan dari TUHAN, yang akan diberikan-Nya hari ini kepadamu; sebab orang Mesir yang kamu lihat hari ini, tidak akan kamu lihat lagi untuk selama-lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A foolish woman is clamorous: she is simple, and knoweth nothing.
target: Perempuan bebal cerewet, sangat tidak berpengalaman ia, dan tidak tahu malu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thus saith the Lord GOD; I will even deal with thee as thou hast done, which hast despised the oath in breaking the covenant.
target: Sebab beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Aku akan melakukan kepadamu seperti engkau lakukan, yaitu engkau memandang ringan kepada sumpah dengan mengingkari perjanjian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That the daughters of Israel went yearly to lament the daughter of Jephthah the Gileadite four days in a year.
target: bahwa dari tahun ke tahun anak-anak perempuan orang Israel selama empat hari setahun meratapi anak perempuan Yefta, orang Gilead itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I am one that bear witness of myself, and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me.
target: Akulah yang bersaksi tentang diri-Ku sendiri, dan juga Bapa, yang mengutus Aku, bersaksi tentang Aku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the king of Israel and Jehoshaphat the king of Judah went up to Ramothgilead.
target: Sesudah itu majulah raja Israel dengan Yosafat, raja Yehuda, ke Ramot-Gilead.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king of Babylon made Mattaniah his father's brother king in his stead, and changed his name to Zedekiah.
target: Kemudian raja Babel mengangkat Matanya, paman Yoyakhin, menjadi raja menggantikan dia dan menukar namanya menjadi Zedekia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the priest shall take from the meat offering a memorial thereof, and shall burn it upon the altar: it is an offering made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD.
target: Kemudian imam harus mengkhususkan dari korban sajian itu bagian ingat-ingatannya lalu membakarnya di atas mezbah sebagai korban api-apian yang baunya menyenangkan bagi TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said he, Lo, I come to do thy will, O God. He taketh away the first, that he may establish the second.
target: Dan kemudian kata-Nya: "Sungguh, Aku datang untuk melakukan kehendak-Mu." Yang pertama Ia hapuskan, supaya menegakkan yang kedua.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if ye do good to them which do good to you, what thank have ye? for sinners also do even the same.
target: Sebab jikalau kamu berbuat baik kepada orang yang berbuat baik kepada kamu, apakah jasamu? Orang-orang berdosa pun berbuat demikian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A gift is as a precious stone in the eyes of him that hath it: whithersoever it turneth, it prospereth.
target: Hadiah suapan adalah seperti mestika di mata yang memberinya, ke mana juga ia memalingkan muka, ia beruntung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So David slept with his fathers, and was buried in the city of David.
target: Kemudian Daud mendapat perhentian bersama-sama nenek moyangnya, dan ia dikuburkan di kota Daud.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which was the son of Matthat, which was the son of Levi, which was the son of Melchi, which was the son of Janna, which was the son of Joseph,
target: anak Matat, anak Lewi, anak Malkhi, anak Yanai, anak Yusuf,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He sent a man before them, even Joseph, who was sold for a servant:
target: diutus-Nyalah seorang mendahului mereka: Yusuf, yang dijual menjadi budak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And some fell among thorns; and the thorns sprung up, and choked them:
target: Sebagian lagi jatuh di tengah semak duri, lalu makin besarlah semak itu dan menghimpitnya sampai mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thy waste and thy desolate places, and the land of thy destruction, shall even now be too narrow by reason of the inhabitants, and they that swallowed thee up shall be far away.
target: Sebab tempat-tempatmu yang tandus dan sunyi sepi dan negerimu yang dirombak, sungguh, sekarang terlalu sempit untuk sekian banyak pendudukmu dan orang-orang yang mau menelan engkau akan menjauh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Dedan, and Tema, and Buz, and all that are in the utmost corners,
target: kepada Dedan, Tema, Bus dan kepada orang-orang yang berpotong tepi rambutnya berkeliling;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: With kings and counsellors of the earth, which build desolate places for themselves;
target: bersama-sama raja-raja dan penasihat-penasihat di bumi, yang mendirikan kembali reruntuhan bagi dirinya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will make thee a terror, and thou shalt be no more: though thou be sought for, yet shalt thou never be found again, saith the Lord GOD.
target: Aku menentukan bagimu akhir hidupmu yang mendahsyatkan dan engkau tidak terjumpa lagi. Engkau dicari orang, tetapi tidak ditemui lagi untuk selama-lamanya, demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Examine me, O LORD, and prove me; try my reins and my heart.
target: Ujilah aku, ya TUHAN, dan cobalah aku; selidikilah batinku dan hatiku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The way of the wicked is an abomination unto the LORD: but he loveth him that followeth after righteousness.
target: Jalan orang fasik adalah kekejian bagi TUHAN, tetapi siapa mengejar kebenaran, dikasihi-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jacob blessed Pharaoh, and went out from before Pharaoh.
target: Lalu Yakub memohonkan berkat bagi Firaun, sesudah itu keluarlah ia dari depan Firaun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt make loops of blue upon the edge of the one curtain from the selvedge in the coupling; and likewise shalt thou make in the uttermost edge of another curtain, in the coupling of the second.
target: Pada rangkapan yang pertama, di tepi satu tenda yang di ujung, haruslah engkau membuat sosok-sosok kain ungu tua dan demikian juga di tepi satu tenda yang paling ujung pada rangkapan yang kedua.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A GOOD name is rather to be chosen than great riches, and loving favour rather than silver and gold.
target: Nama baik lebih berharga dari pada kekayaan besar, dikasihi orang lebih baik dari pada perak dan emas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Many shall be purified, and made white, and tried; but the wicked shall do wickedly: and none of the wicked shall understand; but the wise shall understand.
target: Banyak orang akan disucikan dan dimurnikan dan diuji, tetapi orang-orang fasik akan berlaku fasik; tidak seorang pun dari orang fasik itu akan memahaminya, tetapi orang-orang bijaksana akan memahaminya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Happy is that people, that is in such a case: yea, happy is that people, whose God is the LORD.
target: Berbahagialah bangsa yang demikian keadaannya! Berbahagialah bangsa yang Allahnya ialah TUHAN!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD hath appeared of old unto me, saying, Yea, I have loved thee with an everlasting love: therefore with lovingkindness have I drawn thee.
target: Dari jauh TUHAN menampakkan diri kepadanya: Aku mengasihi engkau dengan kasih yang kekal, sebab itu Aku melanjutkan kasih setia-Ku kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For so is the will of God, that with well doing ye may put to silence the ignorance of foolish men:
target: Sebab inilah kehendak Allah, yaitu supaya dengan berbuat baik kamu membungkamkan kepicikan orang-orang yang bodoh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.
target: Enam orang lahir bagi dia di Hebron, di mana ia memerintah tujuh tahun enam bulan lamanya; dan tiga puluh tiga tahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if thou utter this our business, then we will be quit of thine oath which thou hast made us to swear.
target: Tetapi jika engkau mengabarkan perkara kami ini, maka bebaslah kami dari sumpah kepadamu itu, yang telah kausuruh kami ikrarkan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thy issue, which thou begettest after them, shall be thine, and shall be called after the name of their brethren in their inheritance.
target: Dan keturunanmu yang kauperoleh sesudah mereka, engkaulah yang empunya, tetapi dalam pembagian warisan nama mereka akan disebutkan berdasarkan nama kedua saudaranya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O my people, remember now what Balak king of Moab consulted, and what Balaam the son of Beor answered him from Shittim unto Gilgal; that ye may know the righteousness of the LORD.
target: Umat-Ku, baiklah ingat apa yang dirancangkan oleh Balak, raja Moab, dan apa yang dijawab kepadanya oleh Bileam bin Beor dan apa yang telah terjadi dari Sitim sampai ke Gilgal, supaya engkau mengakui perbuatan-perbuatan keadilan dari TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Jesus was come into Peter's house, he saw his wife's mother laid, and sick of a fever.
target: Setibanya di rumah Petrus, Yesus pun melihat ibu mertua Petrus terbaring karena sakit demam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

Segala pohon-pohon yang di taman Allah tiada yang dapat disamakan dengan dia mengenai keelokannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To bind their kings with chains, and their nobles with fetters of iron;
target: untuk membelenggu raja-raja mereka dengan rantai, dan orang-orang mereka yang mulia dengan tali-tali besi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Notwithstanding the children rebelled against me: they walked not in my statutes, neither kept my judgments to do them, which if a man do, he shall even live in them; they polluted my sabbaths: then I said, I would pour out my fury upon them, to accomplish my anger against them in the wilderness.
target: Tetapi anak-anak mereka memberontak terhadap Aku, mereka tidak hidup menurut ketetapan-ketetapan-Ku dan tidak melakukan peraturan-peraturan-Ku dengan setia, sedang manusia yang melakukannya, akan hidup; mereka juga melanggar kekudusan hari-hari Sabat-Ku. Maka Aku bermaksud mencurahkan amarah-Ku ke atas mereka untuk melampiaskan murka-Ku kepadanya di padang gurun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the thing was good in the eyes of Pharaoh, and in the eyes of all his servants.
target: Usul itu dipandang baik oleh Firaun dan oleh semua pegawainya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sons of Leah; Reuben, Jacob's firstborn, and Simeon, and Levi, and Judah, and Issachar, and Zebulun:
target: Anak-anak Lea ialah Ruben, anak sulung Yakub, kemudian Simeon, Lewi, Yehuda, Isakhar dan Zebulon.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye shall eat it in the holy place, because it is thy due, and thy sons' due, of the sacrifices of the LORD made by fire: for so I am commanded.
target: Haruslah kamu memakannya di suatu tempat yang kudus, karena itulah ketetapan bagimu dan anak-anakmu dari segala korban api-apian TUHAN, sebab demikianlah diperintahkan kepadaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, My son shall not go down with you; for his brother is dead, and he is left alone: if mischief befall him by the way in the which ye go, then shall ye bring down my gray hairs with sorrow to the grave.
target: Tetapi jawabnya: "Anakku itu tidak akan pergi ke sana bersama-sama dengan kamu, sebab kakaknya telah mati dan hanya dialah yang tinggal; jika dia ditimpa kecelakaan di jalan yang akan kamu tempuh, maka tentulah kamu akan menyebabkan aku yang ubanan ini turun ke dunia orang mati karena dukacita."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The north and the south thou hast created them: Tabor and Hermon shall rejoice in thy name.
target: Punya-Mulah langit, punya-Mulah juga bumi, dunia serta isinya Engkaulah yang mendasarkannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of Gad; Eliasaph the son of Deuel.
target: dari suku Gad: Elyasaf bin Rehuel;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And judgment is turned away backward, and justice standeth afar off: for truth is fallen in the street, and equity cannot enter.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And with these sayings scarce restrained they the people, that they had not done sacrifice unto them.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if he be not able to bring two turtledoves, or two young pigeons, then he that sinned shall bring for his offering the tenth part of an ephah of fine flour for a sin offering; he shall put no oil upon it, neither shall he put any frankincense thereon: for it is a sin offering.
target: Tetapi jikalau ia tidak mampu menyediakan dua ekor burung tekukur atau dua ekor anak burung merpati, maka haruslah ia membawa sebagai persembahannya karena dosanya itu sepersepuluh efa tepung yang terbaik menjadi korban penghapus dosa. Tidak boleh ditaruhnya minyak dan dibubuhnya kemenyan di atasnya, karena itulah korban penghapus dosa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Amon was two and twenty years old when he began to reign, and reigned two years in Jerusalem.
target: Amon berumur dua puluh dua tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja dan dua tahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I looked, and, behold, ye had sinned against the LORD your God, and had made you a molten calf: ye had turned aside quickly out of the way which the LORD had commanded you.
target: Lalu aku menyaksikan, bahwa sesungguhnya kamu telah berbuat dosa terhadap TUHAN, Allahmu: kamu telah membuat suatu anak lembu tuangan, kamu telah segera menyimpang dari jalan yang diperintahkan TUHAN kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said Joshua, Open the mouth of the cave, and bring out those five kings unto me out of the cave.
target: Kemudian berkatalah Yosua: "Bukalah mulut gua dan keluarkanlah kelima raja itu dari dalam dan bawa kepadaku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And many brought gifts unto the LORD to Jerusalem, and presents to Hezekiah king of Judah: so that he was magnified in the sight of all nations from thenceforth.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he took the cup, and gave thanks, and gave it to them, saying, Drink ye all of it;
target: Sesudah itu Ia mengambil cawan, mengucap syukur lalu memberikannya kepada mereka dan berkata: "Minumlah, kamu semua, dari cawan ini.

input: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan, being burdened: not for that we would be unclothed, but clothed upon, that mortality might be swallowed up of life.
target: Sebab selama masih diam di dalam kemah ini, kita mengeluh oleh beratnya tekanan, karena kita mau mengenakan pakaian yang baru itu tanpa menanggalkan yang lama, supaya yang fana itu ditelan oleh hidup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And some of the chief of the fathers gave unto the work. The Tirshatha gave to the treasure a thousand drams of gold, fifty basons, five hundred and thirty priests' garments.
target: Sebagian dari kepala kaum keluarga memberi sumbangan untuk pekerjaan itu, sedang kepala daerah memberi sumbangan untuk perbendaharaan seribu dirham emas, lima puluh buah bokor penyiraman, dan lima ratus tiga puluh helai kemeja imam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now it came to pass in the thirtieth year, in the fourth month, in the fifth day of the month, as I was among the captives by the river of Chebar, that the heavens were opened, and I saw visions of God.
target: Pada tahun ketiga puluh, dalam bulan yang keempat, pada tanggal lima bulan itu, ketika aku bersama-sama dengan para buangan berada di tepi sungai Kebar, terbukalah langit dan aku melihat penglihatan-penglihatan tentang Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt set the table without the vail, and the candlestick over against the table on the side of the tabernacle toward the south: and thou shalt put the table on the north side.
target: Meja itu haruslah kautaruh di depan tabir itu, dan kandil itu berhadapan dengan meja itu pada sisi selatan dari Kemah Suci, dan meja itu haruslah kautempatkan pada sisi utara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I have not spoken of myself; but the Father which sent me, he gave me a commandment, what I should say, and what I should speak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There have been mighty kings also over Jerusalem, which have ruled over all countries beyond the river; and toll, tribute, and custom, was paid unto them.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the swan, and the pelican, and the gier eagle,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And tookest thy broidered garments, and coveredst them: and thou hast set mine oil and mine incense before them.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Methuselah lived after he begat Lamech seven hundred eighty and two years, and begat sons and daughters:

input: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,

input: Then did they spit in his face, and buffeted him; and others smote him with the palms of their hands,

input: Then answered Eliphaz the Temanite, and said,
target: Maka Elifas, orang T'eman, menjawab:

target: Ketika Ruben pada musim menuai gandum pergi berjalan-jalan, didapatinyalah di padang buah dudaim, lalu dibawanya kepada Lea, ibunya. Kata Rahel kepada Lea: "Berilah aku beberapa buah dudaim yang didapat oleh anakmu itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there came out of the smoke locusts upon the earth: and unto them was given power, as the scorpions of the earth have power.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And blessed is he, whosoever shall not be offended in me.
target: Dan berbahagialah orang yang tidak menjadi kecewa dan menolak Aku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when we heard these things, both we, and they of that place, besought him not to go up to Jerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the graven images thereof shall be beaten to pieces, and all the hires thereof shall be burned with the fire, and all the idols thereof will I lay desolate: for she gathered it of the hire of an harlot, and they shall return to the hire of an harlot.
target: Segala patungnya akan diremukkan, segala upah sundalnya akan dibakar, dan segala berhalanya akan Kuhancurkan; sebab dari upah sundal dikumpulkan semuanya itu, dan akan kembali menjadi upah sundal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee, cut them off, and cast them from thee: it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed, rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire.
target: Jika tanganmu atau kakimu menyesatkan engkau, penggallah dan buanglah itu, karena lebih baik bagimu masuk ke dalam hidup dengan tangan kudung atau timpang dari pada dengan utuh kedua tangan dan kedua kakimu dicampakkan ke dalam api kekal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the Philistines heard the noise of the shout, they said, What meaneth the noise of this great shout in the camp of the Hebrews? And they understood that the ark of the LORD was come into the camp.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And these are the sons of Reuel; Nahath, and Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah: these were the sons of Bashemath Esau's wife.

target: Sesudah itu berkatalah Yeremia kepada Zedekia: "Beginilah firman TUHAN, Allah semesta alam, Allah Israel: Jika engkau keluar menyerahkan diri kepada para perwira raja Babel, maka nyawamu akan terpelihara, dan kota ini tidak akan dihanguskan dengan api; engkau dengan keluargamu akan hidup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if they will not pass over with you armed, they shall have possessions among you in the land of Canaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, and Timotheus our brother,
target: Dari Paulus, rasul Kristus Yesus, oleh kehendak Allah, dan Timotius saudara kita,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they spake unto Moses, saying, The people bring much more than enough for the service of the work, which the LORD commanded to make.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I hate vain thoughts: but thy law do I love.

input: For rebellion is as the sin of witchcraft, and stubbornness is as iniquity and idolatry. Because thou hast rejected the word of the LORD, he hath also rejected thee from being king.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Know now that God hath overthrown me, and hath compassed me with his net.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate, Write not, The King of the Jews; but that he said, I am King of the Jews.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moses and Aaron among his priests, and Samuel among them that call upon his name; they called upon the LORD, and he answered them.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet will I bring again the captivity of Moab in the latter days, saith the LORD. Thus far is the judgment of Moab.

input: And all Judah stood before the LORD, with their little ones, their wives, and their children.
target: Sementara itu seluruh Yehuda berdiri di hadapan TUHAN, juga segenap keluarga mereka dengan isteri dan anak-anak mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David went thence to Mizpeh of Moab: and he said unto the king of Moab, Let my father and my mother, I pray thee, come forth, and be with you, till I know what God will do for me.
target: Dari sana Daud pergi ke Mizpa di Moab dan berkata kepada raja negeri Moab: "Izinkanlah ayahku dan ibuku tinggal padamu, sampai aku tahu, apa yang dilakukan Allah kepadaku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of the captivity did so. And Ezra the priest, with certain chief of the fathers, after the house of their fathers, and all of them by their names, were separated, and sat down in the first day of the tenth month to examine the matter.
target: Tetapi mereka yang pulang dari pembuangan melakukannya. Maka imam Ezra memilih beberapa orang, kepala-kepala kaum keluarga, masing-masing untuk kaum keluarganya, semuanya dengan namanya disebut. Pada hari pertama bulan kesepuluh mereka bersidang untuk menyelidiki perkara itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The son of Dekar, in Makaz, and in Shaalbim, and Bethshemesh, and Elonbethhanan:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And straightway all the people, when they beheld him, were greatly amazed, and running to him saluted him.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The steps of his strength shall be straitened, and his own counsel shall cast him down.
target: Langkahnya yang kuat terhambat, dan pertimbangannya sendiri menjatuhkan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,

input: Moreover thou shalt make the tabernacle with ten curtains of fine twined linen, and blue, and purple, and scarlet: with cherubims of cunning work shalt thou make them.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, as they fled from before Israel, and were in the going down to Bethhoron, that the LORD cast down great stones from heaven upon them unto Azekah, and they died: they were more which died with hailstones than they whom the children of Israel slew with the sword.
target: Sedang mereka melarikan diri di depan orang Israel dan baru di lereng Bet-Horon, maka TUHAN melempari mereka dengan batu-batu besar dari langit, sampai ke Azeka, sehingga mereka mati. Yang mati kena hujan batu itu ada lebih banyak dari yang dibunuh oleh orang Israel dengan pedang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But they shall sit every man under his vine and under his fig tree; and none shall make them afraid: for the mouth of the LORD of hosts hath spoken it.
target: Tetapi mereka masing-masing akan duduk di bawah pohon anggurnya dan di bawah pohon aranya dengan tidak ada yang mengejutkan, sebab mulut TUHAN semesta alam yang mengatakannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And hast not shut me up into the hand of the enemy: thou hast set my feet in a large room.
target: Aku akan bersorak-sorak dan bersukacita karena kasih setia-Mu, sebab Engkau telah menilik sengsaraku, telah memperhatikan kesesakan jiwaku,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And your eyes shall see, and ye shall say, The LORD will be magnified from the border of Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And after they had tarried there a space, they were let go in peace from the brethren unto the apostles.

input: For Demas hath forsaken me, having loved this present world, and is departed unto Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, Titus unto Dalmatia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, Verily I say unto you, That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven.
target: Yesus berkata kepada murid-murid-Nya: "Aku berkata kepadamu, sesungguhnya sukar sekali bagi seorang kaya untuk masuk ke dalam Kerajaan Sorga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Hai Sion, pembawa kabar baik, naiklah ke atas gunung yang tinggi! Hai Yerusalem, pembawa kabar baik, nyaringkanlah suaramu kuat-kuat, nyaringkanlah suaramu, jangan takut! Katakanlah kepada kota-kota Yehuda: "Lihat, itu Allahmu!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

Dalam segala hal aku menjaga diriku, supaya jangan menjadi beban bagi kamu, dan aku akan tetap berbuat demikian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Command the children of Israel, that they bring unto thee pure oil olive beaten for the light, to cause the lamps to burn continually.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Nevertheless we, according to his promise, look for new heavens and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Shall I not visit for these things? saith the LORD: and shall not my soul be avenged on such a nation as this?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now Jonathan and Ahimaaz stayed by Enrogel; for they might not be seen to come into the city: and a wench went and told them; and they went and told king David.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: We have sinned with our fathers, we have committed iniquity, we have done wickedly.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye shall eat neither bread, nor parched corn, nor green ears, until the selfsame day that ye have brought an offering unto your God: it shall be a statute for ever throughout your generations in all your dwellings.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him, and took unto him his wife:

input: And the king answered and said unto the man of God, Intreat now the face of the LORD thy God, and pray for me, that my hand may be restored me again. And the man of God besought the LORD, and the king's hand was restored him again, and became as it was before.
target: Lalu berbicaralah raja dan berkata kepada abdi Allah itu: "Mohonkanlah belas kasihan TUHAN, Allahmu, dan berdoalah untukku, supaya tanganku dapat kembali." Dan abdi Allah itu memohonkan belas kasihan TUHAN, maka tangan raja itu dapat kembali dan menjadi seperti semula.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Moses went down unto the people, and spake unto them.

input: And Hilkiah, and they that the king had appointed, went to Huldah the prophetess, the wife of Shallum the son of Tikvath, the son of Hasrah, keeper of the wardrobe; (now she dwelt in Jerusalem in the college:) and they spake to her to that effect.

Mereka berbicara kepadanya sebagaimana yang diperintahkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: Yea, I will cause men to walk upon you, even my people Israel; and they shall possess thee, and thou shalt be their inheritance, and thou shalt no more henceforth bereave them of men.

input: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him, saying, Of a truth thou art the Son of God.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But ye shall offer a burnt offering, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD: one bullock, one ram, seven lambs of the first year without blemish:
target: Pada waktu itu haruslah kamu mempersembahkan sebagai korban bakaran, sebagai korban api-apian yang baunya menyenangkan bagi TUHAN: seekor lembu jantan, seekor domba jantan, tujuh ekor domba berumur setahun yang tidak bercela,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the asses were thirty thousand and five hundred; of which the LORD'S tribute was threescore and one.
target: keledai-keledai tiga puluh ribu lima ratus ekor, jadi upetinya bagi TUHAN ada enam puluh satu ekor;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Azariah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, the ruler of the house of God;
target: Azarya bin Hilkia bin Mesulam bin Zadok bin Merayot bin Ahitub, pemuka rumah Allah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Manoah arose, and went after his wife, and came to the man, and said unto him, Art thou the man that spakest unto the woman? And he said, I am.
target: Lalu bangunlah Manoah dan mengikuti isterinya. Setelah sampai kepada orang itu, berkatalah ia kepadanya: "Engkaukah orang yang telah berbicara kepada perempuan ini?" Jawabnya: "Benar!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I made a covenant with mine eyes; why then should I think upon a maid?
target: "Aku telah menetapkan syarat bagi mataku, masakan aku memperhatikan anak dara?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if he be not able to bring a lamb, then he shall bring for his trespass, which he hath committed, two turtledoves, or two young pigeons, unto the LORD; one for a sin offering, and the other for a burnt offering.
target: Tetapi jikalau ia tidak mampu untuk menyediakan kambing atau domba, maka sebagai tebusan salah karena dosa yang telah diperbuatnya itu, haruslah ia mempersembahkan kepada TUHAN dua ekor burung tekukur atau dua ekor anak burung merpati, yang seekor menjadi korban penghapus dosa dan yang seekor lagi menjadi korban bakaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And these are the years of the life of Ishmael, an hundred and thirty and seven years: and he gave up the ghost and died; and was gathered unto his people.
target: Umur Ismael ialah seratus tiga puluh tujuh tahun. Sesudah itu ia meninggal. Ia mati dan dikumpulkan kepada kaum leluhurnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Should he reason with unprofitable talk? or with speeches wherewith he can do no good?
target: Apakah ia menegur dengan percakapan yang tidak berguna, dan dengan perkataan yang tidak berfaedah?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I know that thou canst do every thing, and that no thought can be withholden from thee.
target: "Aku tahu, bahwa Engkau sanggup melakukan segala sesuatu, dan tidak ada rencana-Mu yang gagal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He turneth the wilderness into a standing water, and dry ground into watersprings.
target: Dibuat-Nya padang gurun menjadi kolam air, dan tanah kering menjadi pancaran-pancaran air.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they called Barnabas, Jupiter; and Paul, Mercurius, because he was the chief speaker.
target: Barnabas mereka sebut Zeus dan Paulus mereka sebut Hermes, karena ia yang berbicara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, God is great, and we know him not, neither can the number of his years be searched out.
target: Sesungguhnya, Allah itu besar, tidak tercapai oleh pengetahuan kita, jumlah tahun-Nya tidak dapat diselidiki.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The king of Makkedah, one; the king of Bethel, one;
target: raja negeri Makeda, satu; raja negeri Betel, satu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of the children of Joseph, namely, of the children of Ephraim, by their generations, after their families, by the house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from twenty years old and upward, all that were able to go forth to war;
target: Mengenai keturunan Yusuf: Ketika silsilah bani Efraim disusun menurut kaum-kaum yang ada dalam suku mereka, maka dicatatlah nama orang-orang yang berumur dua puluh tahun ke atas, semua orang yang sanggup berperang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Hamor and Shechem his son came unto the gate of their city, and communed with the men of their city, saying,
target: Lalu pergilah Hemor dan Sikhem, anaknya itu, ke pintu gerbang kota mereka dan mereka berbicara kepada penduduk kota itu:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover all the vessels, which king Ahaz in his reign did cast away in his transgression, have we prepared and sanctified, and, behold, they are before the altar of the LORD.
