target: Dan segala perkakas, yang dibuang raja Ahas, ketika ia berubah setia pada masa pemerintahannya, telah kami sediakan dan kami kuduskan. Sekarang semuanya itu ada di depan mezbah TUHAN!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt truly tithe all the increase of thy seed, that the field bringeth forth year by year.
target: "Haruslah engkau benar-benar mempersembahkan sepersepuluh dari seluruh hasil benih yang tumbuh di ladangmu, tahun demi tahun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king of Israel went to his house heavy and displeased, and came to Samaria.
target: Lalu raja Israel pergi ke istananya dengan kesal hati dan gusar, maka sampailah ia di Samaria.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But thou art he that took me out of the womb: thou didst make me hope when I was upon my mother's breasts.
target: "Ia menyerah kepada TUHAN; biarlah Dia yang meluputkannya, biarlah Dia yang melepaskannya! Bukankah Dia berkenan kepadanya?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Madmenah is removed; the inhabitants of Gebim gather themselves to flee.
target: Penghuni Madmena lari jauh-jauh, penduduk Gebim pergi mengungsi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ezra the scribe stood upon a pulpit of wood, which they had made for the purpose; and beside him stood Mattithiah, and Shema, and Anaiah, and Urijah, and Hilkiah, and Maaseiah, on his right hand; and on his left hand, Pedaiah, and Mishael, and Malchiah, and Hashum, and Hashbadana, Zechariah, and Meshullam.
target: Ia membacakan beberapa bagian dari pada kitab itu di halaman di depan pintu gerbang Air dari pagi sampai tengah hari di hadapan laki-laki dan perempuan dan semua orang yang dapat mengerti. Dengan penuh perhatian seluruh umat mendengarkan pembacaan kitab Taurat itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will make thy name to be remembered in all generations: therefore shall the people praise thee for ever and ever.
target: Para bapa leluhurmu hendaknya diganti oleh anak-anakmu nanti; engkau akan mengangkat mereka menjadi pembesar di seluruh bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For John the Baptist came neither eating bread nor drinking wine; and ye say, He hath a devil.
target: Karena Yohanes Pembaptis datang, ia tidak makan roti dan tidak minum anggur, dan kamu berkata: Ia kerasukan setan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And yet they would not hearken unto their judges, but they went a whoring after other gods, and bowed themselves unto them: they turned quickly out of the way which their fathers walked in, obeying the commandments of the LORD; but they did not so.
target: Tetapi juga para hakim itu tidak mereka hiraukan, karena mereka berzinah dengan mengikuti allah lain dan sujud menyembah kepadanya. Mereka segera menyimpang dari jalan yang ditempuh oleh nenek moyangnya yang mendengarkan perintah TUHAN; mereka melakukan yang tidak patut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Helez the Paltite, Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite,
target: Heles, orang Palti; Ira anak Ikesh orang Tekoa;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Baalath, and all the store cities that Solomon had, and all the chariot cities, and the cities of the horsemen, and all that Solomon desired to build in Jerusalem, and in Lebanon, and throughout all the land of his dominion.
target: dan juga Baalat, dan segala kota perbekalan kepunyaan Salomo, segala kota tempat kereta, kota-kota tempat orang berkuda dan apa saja yang Salomo ingin mendirikannya di Yerusalem, atau di gunung Libanon, atau di segenap negeri kekuasaannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the border shall go down to Jordan, and the goings out of it shall be at the salt sea: this shall be your land with the coasts thereof round about.
target: Lalu batas itu turun ke sungai Yordan dan berakhir di Laut Asin. Itulah negerimu menurut batas-batasnya sekeliling."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will shew wonders in heaven above, and signs in the earth beneath; blood, and fire, and vapour of smoke:
target: Dan Aku akan mengadakan mujizat-mujizat di atas, di langit dan tanda-tanda di bawah, di bumi: darah dan api dan gumpalan-gumpalan asap.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Give them according to their deeds, and according to the wickedness of their endeavours: give them after the work of their hands; render to them their desert.
target: Ganjarilah mereka menurut perbuatan mereka dan menurut kelakuan mereka yang jahat; ganjarilah mereka setimpal dengan perbuatan tangan mereka, balaslah kepada mereka apa yang mereka lakukan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Bless them that curse you, and pray for them which despitefully use you.
target: mintalah berkat bagi orang yang mengutuk kamu; berdoalah bagi orang yang mencaci kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: She openeth her mouth with wisdom; and in her tongue is the law of kindness.
target: Ia membuka mulutnya dengan hikmat, pengajaran yang lemah lembut ada di lidahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Regard not them that have familiar spirits, neither seek after wizards, to be defiled by them: I am the LORD your God.
target: Janganlah kamu berpaling kepada arwah atau kepada roh-roh peramal; janganlah kamu mencari mereka dan dengan demikian menjadi najis karena mereka; Akulah TUHAN, Allahmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the coast of Og king of Bashan, which was of the remnant of the giants, that dwelt at Ashtaroth and at Edrei,
target: Selanjutnya daerah Og, raja Basan, seorang dari sisa-sisa orang Refaim. Raja ini diam di Asytarot dan di Edrei,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: An angry man stirreth up strife, and a furious man aboundeth in transgression.
target: Si pemarah menimbulkan pertengkaran, dan orang yang lekas gusar, banyak pelanggarannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And for the wood offering, at times appointed, and for the firstfruits. Remember me, O my God, for good.
target: pula kutetapkan suatu cara untuk menyediakan kayu api pada waktu-waktu tertentu dan untuk hasil-hasil yang pertama. Ya Allahku, ingatlah kepadaku, demi kesejahteraanku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they found among the inhabitants of Jabeshgilead four hundred young virgins, that had known no man by lying with any male: and they brought them unto the camp to Shiloh, which is in the land of Canaan.
target: Mereka menjumpai di antara penduduk Yabesh-Gilead empat ratus orang anak gadis, perawan yang belum pernah tidur dengan orang laki-laki, lalu gadis-gadis itu dibawa mereka ke perkemahan di Silo, di tanah Kanaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If thou shalt keep all these commandments to do them, which I command thee this day, to love the LORD thy God, and to walk ever in his ways; then shalt thou add three cities more for thee, beside these three:
target: — apabila engkau melakukan dengan setia perintah ini, yang kusampaikan kepadamu pada hari ini, dengan mengasihi TUHAN, Allahmu, dan dengan senantiasa hidup menurut jalan yang ditunjukkan-Nya — maka haruslah engkau menambah tiga kota lagi kepada yang tiga itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth, and length, and depth, and height;
target: Aku berdoa, supaya kamu bersama-sama dengan segala orang kudus dapat memahami, betapa lebarnya dan panjangnya dan tingginya dan dalamnya kasih Kristus,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph, of the house of David; and the virgin's name was Mary.
target: kepada seorang perawan yang bertunangan dengan seorang bernama Yusuf dari keluarga Daud; nama perawan itu Maria.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jotham slept with his fathers, and they buried him in the city of David: and Ahaz his son reigned in his stead.
target: Kemudian Yotam mendapat perhentian bersama-sama nenek moyangnya, dan ia dikuburkan di kota Daud. Maka Ahas, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Though he heap up silver as the dust, and prepare raiment as the clay;
target: Jikalau ia menimbun uang seperti debu banyaknya, dan menumpuk pakaian seperti tanah liat,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Their camels, four hundred thirty and five; their asses, six thousand seven hundred and twenty.
target: empat ratus tiga puluh lima ekor unta, dan enam ribu tujuh ratus dua puluh ekor keledai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And saith unto them, My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death: tarry ye here, and watch.
target: lalu kata-Nya kepada mereka: "Hati-Ku sangat sedih, seperti mau mati rasanya. Tinggallah di sini dan berjaga-jagalah."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Doubtless thou art our father, though Abraham be ignorant of us, and Israel acknowledge us not: thou, O LORD, art our father, our redeemer; thy name is from everlasting.
target: Bukankah Engkau Bapa kami? Sungguh, Abraham tidak tahu apa-apa tentang kami, dan Israel tidak mengenal kami. Ya TUHAN, Engkau sendiri Bapa kami; nama-Mu ialah "Penebus kami" sejak dahulu kala.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they saw him afar off, even before he came near unto them, they conspired against him to slay him.
target: Dari jauh ia telah kelihatan kepada mereka. Tetapi sebelum ia dekat pada mereka, mereka telah bermufakat mencari daya upaya untuk membunuhnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hate the evil, and love the good, and establish judgment in the gate: it may be that the LORD God of hosts will be gracious unto the remnant of Joseph.
target: Bencilah yang jahat dan cintailah yang baik; dan tegakkanlah keadilan di pintu gerbang; mungkin TUHAN, Allah semesta alam, akan mengasihani sisa-sisa keturunan Yusuf.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said they to him again, What did he to thee? how opened he thine eyes?
target: Kata mereka kepadanya: "Apakah yang diperbuat-Nya padamu? Bagaimana Ia memelekkan matamu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will raise me up a faithful priest, that shall do according to that which is in mine heart and in my mind: and I will build him a sure house; and he shall walk before mine anointed for ever.
target: Dan Aku akan mengangkat bagi-Ku seorang imam kepercayaan, yang berlaku sesuai dengan hati-Ku dan jiwa-Ku, dan Aku akan membangunkan baginya keturunan yang teguh setia, sehingga ia selalu hidup di hadapan orang yang Kuurapi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let them be desolate for a reward of their shame that say unto me, Aha, aha.
target: Biarlah mendapat malu dan tersipu-sipu mereka semua yang ingin mencabut nyawaku; biarlah mundur dan kena noda mereka yang mengingini kecelakaanku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Woe is me, that I sojourn in Mesech, that I dwell in the tents of Kedar!
target: Celakalah aku, karena harus tinggal sebagai orang asing di Mesekh, karena harus diam di antara kemah-kemah Kedar!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said to Aaron, Go into the wilderness to meet Moses. And he went, and met him in the mount of God, and kissed him.
target: Berfirmanlah TUHAN kepada Harun: "Pergilah ke padang gurun menjumpai Musa." Ia pergi dan bertemu dengan dia di gunung Allah, lalu menciumnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he hath brought thee near to him, and all thy brethren the sons of Levi with thee: and seek ye the priesthood also?
target: dan bahwa engkau diperbolehkan mendekat bersama-sama dengan semua saudaramu bani Lewi? Dan sekarang mau pula kamu menuntut pangkat imam lagi?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The son of Tahath, the son of Assir, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah,
target: bin Tahat bin Asir bin Ebyasaf bin Korah

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There went up a smoke out of his nostrils, and fire out of his mouth devoured: coals were kindled by it.
target: Asap membubung dari hidung-Nya, api menjilat keluar dari mulut-Nya, bara menyala keluar dari pada-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said unto Moses, Speak unto Aaron thy brother, that he come not at all times into the holy place within the vail before the mercy seat, which is upon the ark; that he die not: for I will appear in the cloud upon the mercy seat.
target: Firman TUHAN kepadanya: "Katakanlah kepada Harun, kakakmu, supaya ia jangan sembarang waktu masuk ke dalam tempat kudus di belakang tabir, ke depan tutup pendamaian yang di atas tabut supaya jangan ia mati; karena Aku menampakkan diri dalam awan di atas tutup pendamaian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not commit adultery.
target: Jangan berzinah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, I stand by the well of water; and it shall come to pass, that when the virgin cometh forth to draw water, and I say to her, Give me, I pray thee, a little water of thy pitcher to drink;
target: Di sini aku berdiri di dekat mata air ini; kiranya terjadi begini: Apabila seorang gadis datang ke luar untuk menimba air dan aku berkata kepadanya: Tolong berikan aku minum air sedikit dari buyungmu itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And for the leprosy of a garment, and of a house,
target: tentang kusta pada pakaian dan rumah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Hazor, Hadattah, and Kerioth, and Hezron, which is Hazor,
target: Hazor-Hadata, Keriot-Hezron, itulah Hazor;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Are they not all ministering spirits, sent forth to minister for them who shall be heirs of salvation?
target: Bukankah mereka semua adalah roh-roh yang melayani, yang diutus untuk melayani mereka yang harus memperoleh keselamatan?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore come, let me, I pray thee, give thee counsel, that thou mayest save thine own life, and the life of thy son Solomon.
target: Karena itu, baiklah kuberi nasihat kepadamu, supaya engkau dapat menyelamatkan nyawamu dan nyawa anakmu Salomo.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD, thy redeemer, and he that formed thee from the womb, I am the LORD that maketh all things; that stretcheth forth the heavens alone; that spreadeth abroad the earth by myself;
target: Beginilah firman TUHAN, Penebusmu, yang membentuk engkau sejak dari kandungan; "Akulah TUHAN, yang menjadikan segala sesuatu, yang seorang diri membentangkan langit, yang menghamparkan bumi — siapakah yang mendampingi Aku? —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And on the morrow when he departed, he took out two pence, and gave them to the host, and said unto him, Take care of him; and whatsoever thou spendest more, when I come again, I will repay thee.
target: Keesokan harinya ia menyerahkan dua dinar kepada pemilik penginapan itu, katanya: Rawatlah dia dan jika kaubelanjakan lebih dari ini, aku akan menggantinya, waktu aku kembali.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Above when he said, Sacrifice and offering and burnt offerings and offering for sin thou wouldest not, neither hadst pleasure therein; which are offered by the law;
target: Di atas Ia berkata: "Korban dan persembahan, korban bakaran dan korban penghapus dosa tidak Engkau kehendaki dan Engkau tidak berkenan kepadanya" — meskipun dipersembahkan menurut hukum Taurat —.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But king Solomon loved many strange women, together with the daughter of Pharaoh, women of the Moabites, Ammonites, Edomites, Zidonians, and Hittites:
target: Adapun raja Salomo mencintai banyak perempuan asing. Di samping anak Firaun ia mencintai perempuan-perempuan Moab, Amon, Edom, Sidon dan Het,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said the Jews, Forty and six years was this temple in building, and wilt thou rear it up in three days?
target: Lalu kata orang Yahudi kepada-Nya: "Empat puluh enam tahun orang mendirikan Bait Allah ini dan Engkau dapat membangunnya dalam tiga hari?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But he knew their thoughts, and said to the man which had the withered hand, Rise up, and stand forth in the midst. And he arose and stood forth.
target: Tetapi Ia mengetahui pikiran mereka, lalu berkata kepada orang yang mati tangannya itu: "Bangunlah dan berdirilah di tengah!" Maka bangunlah orang itu dan berdiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Furthermore he made the court of the priests, and the great court, and doors for the court, and overlaid the doors of them with brass.
target: Ia membuat juga pelataran para imam, halaman besar dan pintu-pintu halaman itu; pintu-pintu itu dilapisinya dengan tembaga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Athaliah the mother of Ahaziah saw that her son was dead, she arose and destroyed all the seed royal.
target: Ketika Atalya, ibu Ahazia, melihat bahwa anaknya sudah mati, maka bangkitlah ia membinasakan semua keturunan raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So also Christ glorified not himself to be made an high priest; but he that said unto him, Thou art my Son, to day have I begotten thee.
target: Demikian pula Kristus tidak memuliakan diri-Nya sendiri dengan menjadi Imam Besar, tetapi dimuliakan oleh Dia yang berfirman kepada-Nya: "Anak-Ku Engkau! Engkau telah Kuperanakkan pada hari ini",

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she came to Jerusalem with a very great train, with camels that bare spices, and very much gold, and precious stones: and when she was come to Solomon, she communed with him of all that was in her heart.
target: Ia datang ke Yerusalem dengan pasukan pengiring yang sangat besar, dengan unta-unta yang membawa rempah-rempah, sangat banyak emas dan batu permata yang mahal-mahal. Setelah ia sampai kepada Salomo, dikatakannyalah segala yang ada dalam hatinya kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There shall nothing cast their young, nor be barren, in thy land: the number of thy days I will fulfil.
target: Tidak akan ada di negerimu perempuan yang keguguran atau mandul. Aku akan menggenapkan tahun umurmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then came the word of the LORD of hosts unto me, saying,
target: Maka datanglah firman TUHAN semesta alam kepadaku, bunyinya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he did that which was right in the sight of the LORD, but not with a perfect heart.
target: Ia melakukan apa yang benar di mata TUHAN, hanya tidak dengan segenap hati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when he saw her, that he rent his clothes, and said, Alas, my daughter! thou hast brought me very low, and thou art one of them that trouble me: for I have opened my mouth unto the LORD, and I cannot go back.
target: Demi dilihatnya dia, dikoyakkannyalah bajunya, sambil berkata: "Ah, anakku, engkau membuat hatiku hancur luluh dan engkaulah yang mencelakakan aku; aku telah membuka mulutku bernazar kepada TUHAN, dan tidak dapat aku mundur."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Joseph came home, they brought him the present which was in their hand into the house, and bowed themselves to him to the earth.
target: Ketika Yusuf telah pulang, mereka membawa persembahan yang ada pada mereka itu kepada Yusuf di dalam rumah, lalu sujud kepadanya sampai ke tanah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All these had taken strange wives: and some of them had wives by whom they had children.
target: Mereka sekalian mengambil sebagai isteri perempuan asing; maka mereka menyuruh pergi isteri-isteri itu dengan anak-anaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Unto Shem also, the father of all the children of Eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were children born.
target: Lahirlah juga anak-anak bagi Sem, bapa semua anak Eber serta abang Yafet.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he must needs go through Samaria.
target: Ia harus melintasi daerah Samaria.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So they shall make their own tongue to fall upon themselves: all that see them shall flee away.
target: Tetapi Allah menembak mereka dengan panah; sekonyong-konyong mereka terluka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will offer unto thee burnt sacrifices of fatlings, with the incense of rams; I will offer bullocks with goats. Selah.
target: Korban-korban bakaran dari binatang gemuk akan kupersembahkan kepada-Mu, dengan asap korban dari domba-domba jantan; aku akan menyediakan lembu-lembu dan kambing-kambing jantan. S e l a

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I will put hooks in thy jaws, and I will cause the fish of thy rivers to stick unto thy scales, and I will bring thee up out of the midst of thy rivers, and all the fish of thy rivers shall stick unto thy scales.
target: Aku akan mengenakan kelikir pada rahangmu dan membuat ikan dari anak-anak sungaimu berlekatan pada sisikmu. Aku akan mengangkat engkau dari tengah anak-anak sungaimu dengan segala ikannya yang berlekatan pada sisikmu

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But with whom was he grieved forty years? was it not with them that had sinned, whose carcases fell in the wilderness?
target: Dan siapakah yang Ia murkai empat puluh tahun lamanya? Bukankah mereka yang berbuat dosa dan yang mayatnya bergelimpangan di padang gurun?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He leadeth counsellors away spoiled, and maketh the judges fools.
target: Dia yang menggiring menteri dengan telanjang, dan para hakim dibodohkan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Naked, and ye clothed me: I was sick, and ye visited me: I was in prison, and ye came unto me.
target: ketika Aku telanjang, kamu memberi Aku pakaian; ketika Aku sakit, kamu melawat Aku; ketika Aku di dalam penjara, kamu mengunjungi Aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because thou servedst not the LORD thy God with joyfulness, and with gladness of heart, for the abundance of all things;
target: "Karena engkau tidak mau menjadi hamba kepada TUHAN, Allahmu, dengan sukacita dan gembira hati walaupun kelimpahan akan segala-galanya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A fool uttereth all his mind: but a wise man keepeth it in till afterwards.
target: Orang bebal melampiaskan seluruh amarahnya, tetapi orang bijak akhirnya meredakannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Javan, Tubal, and Meshech, they were thy merchants: they traded the persons of men and vessels of brass in thy market.
target: Yawan, Tubal dan Mesekh berdagang dengan engkau; mereka menukarkan budak-budak, barang-barang tembaga ganti barang-barang daganganmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I will sing of thy power; yea, I will sing aloud of thy mercy in the morning: for thou hast been my defence and refuge in the day of my trouble.
target: Mereka mengembara mencari makan; apabila mereka tidak kenyang, maka mereka mengaum.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These are the families of Judah according to those that were numbered of them, threescore and sixteen thousand and five hundred.
target: Itulah kaum-kaum Yehuda, dan orang-orang yang dicatat dari mereka berjumlah tujuh puluh enam ribu lima ratus orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now I have this day declared it to you; but ye have not obeyed the voice of the LORD your God, nor any thing for the which he hath sent me unto you.
target: Tetapi, sekalipun aku memberitahukannya kepadamu pada hari ini, kamu tidak mendengarkan suara TUHAN, Allahmu, yaitu tidak menuruti segala sesuatu yang disuruh-Nya kusampaikan kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet many years didst thou forbear them, and testifiedst against them by thy spirit in thy prophets: yet would they not give ear: therefore gavest thou them into the hand of the people of the lands.
target: Namun bertahun-tahun lamanya Engkau melanjutkan sabar-Mu terhadap mereka. Dengan Roh-Mu Engkau memperingatkan mereka, yakni dengan perantaraan para nabi-Mu, tetapi mereka tidak menghiraukannya, sehingga Engkau menyerahkan mereka ke tangan bangsa-bangsa segala negeri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In his days shall the righteous flourish; and abundance of peace so long as the moon endureth.
target: Kiranya keadilan berkembang dalam zamannya dan damai sejahtera berlimpah, sampai tidak ada lagi bulan!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither repented they of their murders, nor of their sorceries, nor of their fornication, nor of their thefts.
target: dan mereka tidak bertobat dari pada pembunuhan, sihir, percabulan dan pencurian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the rest of the acts of Jeroboam, how he warred, and how he reigned, behold, they are written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel.
target: Selebihnya dari riwayat Yerobeam, bagaimana ia berperang dan bagaimana ia memerintah, sesungguhnya semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They have moved me to jealousy with that which is not God; they have provoked me to anger with their vanities: and I will move them to jealousy with those which are not a people; I will provoke them to anger with a foolish nation.
target: Mereka membangkitkan cemburu-Ku dengan yang bukan Allah, mereka menimbulkan sakit hati-Ku dengan berhala mereka. Sebab itu Aku akan membangkitkan cemburu mereka dengan yang bukan umat, dan akan menyakiti hati mereka dengan bangsa yang bebal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he that let go the goat for the scapegoat shall wash his clothes, and bathe his flesh in water, and afterward come into the camp.
target: Maka orang yang melepaskan kambing jantan bagi Azazel itu harus mencuci pakaiannya, membasuh tubuhnya dengan air dan sesudah itu barulah boleh masuk ke perkemahan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ, he sent two of his disciples,
target: Di dalam penjara Yohanes mendengar tentang pekerjaan Kristus,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: From mount Hor ye shall point out your border unto the entrance of Hamath; and the goings forth of the border shall be to Zedad:
target: dari gunung Hor harus kamu buat tanda batas ke jalan yang menuju ke Hamat, lalu batas itu mencapai Zedad.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall come to pass after the end of seventy years, that the LORD will visit Tyre, and she shall turn to her hire, and shall commit fornication with all the kingdoms of the world upon the face of the earth.
target: Dan sesudah lewat tujuh puluh tahun, TUHAN akan memperhatikan Tirus, sehingga ia kembali mendapat upah sundalnya, dan ia akan bersundal dengan segala kerajaan yang ada di muka bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus answered them, Is it not written in your law, I said, Ye are gods?
target: Kata Yesus kepada mereka: "Tidakkah ada tertulis dalam kitab Taurat kamu: Aku telah berfirman: Kamu adalah allah?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass in the eleventh year, in the first month, in the seventh day of the month, that the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
target: Pada tahun kesebelas, dalam bulan pertama, pada tanggal tujuh bulan itu, datanglah firman TUHAN kepadaku:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Set thee up waymarks, make thee high heaps: set thine heart toward the highway, even the way which thou wentest: turn again, O virgin of Israel, turn again to these thy cities.
target: Dirikanlah bagimu rambu-rambu jalan, pasanglah bagimu tanda-tanda jalan; perhatikanlah jalan raya baik-baik, yakni jalan yang telah kautempuh! Kembalilah, hai anak dara Israel, kembalilah ke kota-kotamu ini!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thou art my lamp, O LORD: and the LORD will lighten my darkness.
target: Karena Engkaulah pelitaku, ya TUHAN, dan TUHAN menyinari kegelapanku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hast given a banner to them that fear thee, that it may be displayed because of the truth. Selah.
target: Engkau telah menggoncangkan bumi dan membelahnya; perbaikilah retak-retaknya, sebab bumi telah goyang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then were the king's scribes called at that time in the third month, that is, the month Sivan, on the three and twentieth day thereof; and it was written according to all that Mordecai commanded unto the Jews, and to the lieutenants, and the deputies and rulers of the provinces which are from India unto Ethiopia, an hundred twenty and seven provinces, unto every province according to the writing thereof, and unto every people after their language, and to the Jews according to their writing, and according to their language.
target: Pada waktu itu juga dipanggillah para panitera raja, dalam bulan yang ketiga — yakni bulan Siwan — pada tanggal dua puluh tiga, dan sesuai dengan segala yang diperintahkan Mordekhai ditulislah surat kepada orang Yahudi, dan kepada para wakil pemerintah, para bupati dan para pembesar daerah, dari India sampai ke Etiopia, seratus dua puluh tujuh daerah, kepada tiap-tiap daerah menurut tulisannya dan kepada tiap-tiap bangsa menurut bahasanya, dan juga kepada orang Yahudi menurut tulisan dan bahasanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Take also the sum of the sons of Gershon, throughout the houses of their fathers, by their families;
target: "Hitunglah juga jumlah bani Gerson menurut puak dan kaum-kaum mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: After this shall he turn his face unto the isles, and shall take many: but a prince for his own behalf shall cause the reproach offered by him to cease; without his own reproach he shall cause it to turn upon him.
target: Lalu ia akan memalingkan mukanya ke tanah-tanah pesisir dan banyak yang direbutnya; tetapi seorang panglima akan menghentikan penghinaannya itu, bahkan akan mengembalikan penghinaan itu kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And immediately he rose up before them, and took up that whereon he lay, and departed to his own house, glorifying God.
target: Dan seketika itu juga bangunlah ia, di depan mereka, lalu mengangkat tempat tidurnya dan pulang ke rumahnya sambil memuliakan Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But without a parable spake he not unto them: and when they were alone, he expounded all things to his disciples.
target: dan tanpa perumpamaan Ia tidak berkata-kata kepada mereka, tetapi kepada murid-murid-Nya Ia menguraikan segala sesuatu secara tersendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall come to pass, when I bring a cloud over the earth, that the bow shall be seen in the cloud:
target: Apabila kemudian Kudatangkan awan di atas bumi dan busur itu tampak di awan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou makest us a byword among the heathen, a shaking of the head among the people.
target: Engkau membuat kami menjadi cela bagi tetangga-tetangga kami, menjadi olok-olok dan cemooh bagi orang-orang sekeliling kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When Jethro, the priest of Midian, Moses' father in law, heard of all that God had done for Moses, and for Israel his people, and that the LORD had brought Israel out of Egypt;
target: Kedengaranlah kepada Yitro, imam di Midian, mertua Musa, segala yang dilakukan Allah kepada Musa dan kepada Israel, umat-Nya, yakni bahwa TUHAN telah membawa orang Israel keluar dari Mesir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Destruction upon destruction is cried; for the whole land is spoiled: suddenly are my tents spoiled, and my curtains in a moment.
target: Kehancuran demi kehancuran dikabarkan, seluruh negeri dirusakkan; kemahku dirusakkan dengan tiba-tiba, tendaku dalam sekejap mata.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I am the LORD thy God, that divided the sea, whose waves roared: The LORD of hosts is his name.
target: Sebab Akulah TUHAN, Allahmu, yang mengharubirukan laut, sehingga gelombang-gelombangnya ribut, — TUHAN semesta alam nama-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He moveth his tail like a cedar: the sinews of his stones are wrapped together.
target: Tumbuhan-tumbuhan teratai menaungi dia dengan bayang-bayangnya, pohon-pohon gandarusa mengelilinginya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And hast brought forth thy people Israel out of the land of Egypt with signs, and with wonders, and with a strong hand, and with a stretched out arm, and with great terror;
target: Engkau telah membawa umat-Mu Israel keluar dari tanah Mesir dengan tanda-tanda dan mujizat-mujizat, dengan tangan yang kuat dan lengan yang teracung dan dengan kedahsyatan yang besar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But when they shall lead you, and deliver you up, take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak, neither do ye premeditate: but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour, that speak ye: for it is not ye that speak, but the Holy Ghost.
target: Dan jika kamu digiring dan diserahkan, janganlah kamu kuatir akan apa yang harus kamu katakan, tetapi katakanlah apa yang dikaruniakan kepadamu pada saat itu juga, sebab bukan kamu yang berkata-kata, melainkan Roh Kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore sent he thither horses, and chariots, and a great host: and they came by night, and compassed the city about.
target: Maka dikirimnyalah ke sana kuda serta kereta dan tentara yang besar. Sampailah mereka pada waktu malam, lalu mengepung kota itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He therefore that despiseth, despiseth not man, but God, who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit.
target: Karena itu siapa yang menolak ini bukanlah menolak manusia, melainkan menolak Allah yang telah memberikan juga Roh-Nya yang kudus kepada kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of this man's seed hath God according to his promise raised unto Israel a Saviour, Jesus:
target: Dan dari keturunannyalah, sesuai dengan yang telah dijanjikan-Nya, Allah telah membangkitkan Juruselamat bagi orang Israel, yaitu Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men, but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity.
target: Demikian jugalah kamu, di sebelah luar kamu tampaknya benar di mata orang, tetapi di sebelah dalam kamu penuh kemunafikan dan kedurjanaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Righteousness keepeth him that is upright in the way: but wickedness overthroweth the sinner.
target: Kebenaran menjaga orang yang saleh jalannya, tetapi kefasikan mencelakakan orang berdosa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In God will I praise his word: in the LORD will I praise his word.
target: Maka musuhku akan mundur pada waktu aku berseru; aku yakin, bahwa Allah memihak kepadaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abijah pursued after Jeroboam, and took cities from him, Bethel with the towns thereof, and Jeshanah with the towns thereof, and Ephraim with the towns thereof.
target: Abia mengejar Yerobeam dan merebut dari padanya beberapa kota, yakni Betel dengan segala anak kotanya, Yesana dengan segala anak kotanya dan Efron dengan segala anak kotanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the people went their way to eat, and to drink, and to send portions, and to make great mirth, because they had understood the words that were declared unto them.
target: Juga orang-orang Lewi menyuruh semua orang itu supaya diam dengan kata-kata: "Tenanglah! Hari ini adalah kudus. Jangan kamu bersusah hati!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus.
target: Kamu tahu juga petunjuk-petunjuk mana yang telah kami berikan kepadamu atas nama Tuhan Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said the trees unto the vine, Come thou, and reign over us.
target: Lalu kata pohon-pohon itu kepada pohon anggur: Marilah, jadilah raja atas kami!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Their camels, four hundred thirty and five: six thousand seven hundred and twenty asses.
target: empat ratus tiga puluh lima ekor unta dan enam ribu tujuh ratus dua puluh ekor keledai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They draw nigh that follow after mischief: they are far from thy law.
target: Mendekat orang-orang yang mengejar aku dengan maksud jahat, mereka menjauh dari Taurat-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now to him that is of power to stablish you according to my gospel, and the preaching of Jesus Christ, according to the revelation of the mystery, which was kept secret since the world began,
target: Bagi Dia, yang berkuasa menguatkan kamu, — menurut Injil yang kumasyhurkan dan pemberitaan tentang Yesus Kristus, sesuai dengan pernyataan rahasia, yang didiamkan berabad-abad lamanya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the half, which was the portion of them that went out to war, was in number three hundred thousand and seven and thirty thousand and five hundred sheep:
target: Yang setengah yang menjadi bagian orang-orang yang telah keluar berperang itu jumlahnya tiga ratus tiga puluh tujuh ribu lima ratus ekor kambing domba,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They shall call the nobles thereof to the kingdom, but none shall be there, and all her princes shall be nothing.
target: Jin-jin akan diam di dalamnya, dan para pemukanya akan tidak ada lagi; tidak ada lagi di sana yang dimaklumkan sebagai raja, dan semua pemimpinnya sudah lenyap.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Son of man, eat thy bread with quaking, and drink thy water with trembling and with carefulness;
target: "Hai anak manusia, makanlah makananmu dengan gemetar dan minumlah air dengan menggigil dan dengan hati yang cemas,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joseph made haste; for his bowels did yearn upon his brother: and he sought where to weep; and he entered into his chamber, and wept there.
target: Lalu segeralah Yusuf pergi dari situ, sebab hatinya sangat terharu merindukan adiknya itu, dan dicarinyalah tempat untuk menangis; ia masuk ke dalam kamar, lalu menangis di situ.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there arose a great storm of wind, and the waves beat into the ship, so that it was now full.
target: Lalu mengamuklah taufan yang sangat dahsyat dan ombak menyembur masuk ke dalam perahu, sehingga perahu itu mulai penuh dengan air.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have cut off the nations: their towers are desolate; I made their streets waste, that none passeth by: their cities are destroyed, so that there is no man, that there is none inhabitant.
target: "Aku telah melenyapkan bangsa-bangsa; menara-menara penjuru mereka telah musnah. Aku telah merusakkan jalan-jalannya, sehingga tidak ada orang yang lewat. Kota-kota mereka telah ditanduskan, sehingga tidak ada orang dan tidak ada penduduk.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling.
target: malapetaka tidak akan menimpa kamu, dan tulah tidak akan mendekat kepada kemahmu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And, behold, here cometh a chariot of men, with a couple of horsemen. And he answered and said, Babylon is fallen, is fallen; and all the graven images of her gods he hath broken unto the ground.
target: Lihat, itu sudah datang sepasukan orang, pasang-pasangan orang berkuda! Lalu berserulah ia, katanya: "Sudah jatuh, sudah jatuh Babel, dan segala patung berhalanya telah diremukkan dan bertaburan di tanah."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore Hanun took David's servants, and shaved them, and cut off their garments in the midst hard by their buttocks, and sent them away.
target: Lalu Hanun menyuruh menangkap pegawai-pegawai Daud itu, disuruhnya mencukur mereka dan memotong pakaian mereka pada bagian tengah sampai pangkal paha mereka, kemudian dilepasnya mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But they shall fly upon the shoulders of the Philistines toward the west; they shall spoil them of the east together: they shall lay their hand upon Edom and Moab; and the children of Ammon shall obey them.
target: Tetapi mereka akan terbang ke barat, ke atas lereng gunung Filistin, bersama-sama mereka akan menjarah bani Timur; mereka akan merampas Edom dan Moab, dan orang Amon akan patuh kepada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the spirit came upon Amasai, who was chief of the captains, and he said, Thine are we, David, and on thy side, thou son of Jesse: peace, peace be unto thee, and peace be to thine helpers; for thy God helpeth thee. Then David received them, and made them captains of the band.
target: Lalu Roh menguasai Amasai, kepala ketiga puluh orang itu: Kami ini bagimu, hai Daud, dan pada pihakmu, hai anak Isai! Sejahtera, sejahtera bagimu dan sejahtera bagi penolongmu, sebab yang menolong engkau ialah Allahmu! Kemudian Daud menyambut mereka dan mengangkat mereka menjadi kepala pasukan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Girded with girdles upon their loins, exceeding in dyed attire upon their heads, all of them princes to look to, after the manner of the Babylonians of Chaldea, the land of their nativity:
target: pinggangnya diikat dengan ikat pinggang, kepalanya memakai serban yang berjuntai, semuanya kelihatan seperti perwira, yang menyerupai orang Babel dari Kasdim, tanah kelahiran mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have written unto you, fathers, because ye have known him that is from the beginning. I have written unto you, young men, because ye are strong, and the word of God abideth in you, and ye have overcome the wicked one.
target: Aku menulis kepada kamu, hai anak-anak, karena kamu mengenal Bapa. Aku menulis kepada kamu, hai bapa-bapa, karena kamu mengenal Dia, yang ada dari mulanya. Aku menulis kepada kamu, hai orang-orang muda, karena kamu kuat dan firman Allah diam di dalam kamu dan kamu telah mengalahkan yang jahat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A wonderful and horrible thing is committed in the land;
target: Kedahsyatan dan kengerian terjadi di negeri ini:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the king Nebuchadnezzar fell upon his face, and worshipped Daniel, and commanded that they should offer an oblation and sweet odours unto him.
target: Lalu sujudlah raja Nebukadnezar serta menyembah Daniel; juga dititahkannya mempersembahkan korban dan bau-bauan kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said Saul to his servant, Well said; come, let us go. So they went unto the city where the man of God was.
target: Kemudian berkatalah Saul kepada bujangnya itu: "Pikiranmu itu baik. Mari kita pergi." Maka pergilah mereka ke kota, ke tempat abdi Allah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ehud came unto him; and he was sitting in a summer parlour, which he had for himself alone. And Ehud said, I have a message from God unto thee. And he arose out of his seat.
target: Lalu Ehud masuk mendapatkan dia, sedang ia duduk sendirian di kamar atas di rumah peranginannya. Berkatalah Ehud: "Ada firman Allah yang kubawa untuk tuanku." Lalu bangunlah ia berdiri dari tempat duduknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Go now to the flock, and fetch me from thence two good kids of the goats; and I will make them savoury meat for thy father, such as he loveth:
target: Pergilah ke tempat kambing domba kita, ambillah dari sana dua anak kambing yang baik, maka aku akan mengolahnya menjadi makanan yang enak bagi ayahmu, seperti yang digemarinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant: save me for thy mercies' sake.
target: Masa hidupku ada dalam tangan-Mu, lepaskanlah aku dari tangan musuh-musuhku dan orang-orang yang mengejar aku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if there be in the bald head, or bald forehead, a white reddish sore; it is a leprosy sprung up in his bald head, or his bald forehead.
target: Tetapi apabila pada kepala yang botak itu, sebelah atas atau sebelah depan, ada penyakit yang putih kemerah-merahan, maka penyakit kustalah yang timbul pada bagian kepala yang botak itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These are the countries which Moses did distribute for inheritance in the plains of Moab, on the other side Jordan, by Jericho, eastward.
target: Itulah semuanya yang dibagikan Musa sebagai milik pusaka di dataran Moab di sebelah timur sungai Yordan dekat Yerikho.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the man out of whom the devils were departed besought him that he might be with him: but Jesus sent him away, saying,
target: Dan orang yang telah ditinggalkan setan-setan itu meminta supaya ia diperkenankan menyertai-Nya. Tetapi Yesus menyuruh dia pergi, kata-Nya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When thou shalt besiege a city a long time, in making war against it to take it, thou shalt not destroy the trees thereof by forcing an axe against them: for thou mayest eat of them, and thou shalt not cut them down (for the tree of the field is man's life) to employ them in the siege:
target: Apabila dalam memerangi suatu kota, engkau lama mengepungnya untuk direbut, maka tidak boleh engkau merusakkan pohon-pohon sekelilingnya dengan mengayunkan kapak kepadanya; buahnya boleh kaumakan, tetapi batangnya janganlah kautebang; sebab, pohon yang di padang itu bukan manusia, jadi tidak patut ikut kaukepung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let there be none to extend mercy unto him: neither let there be any to favour his fatherless children.
target: Janganlah ada orang yang tetap menunjukkan kasihnya kepadanya, dan janganlah ada orang yang sayang kepada anak-anaknya yang menjadi yatim.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if a man walk in the night, he stumbleth, because there is no light in him.
target: Tetapi jikalau seorang berjalan pada malam hari, kakinya terantuk, karena terang tidak ada di dalam dirinya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Love ye therefore the stranger: for ye were strangers in the land of Egypt.
target: Sebab itu haruslah kamu menunjukkan kasihmu kepada orang asing, sebab kamu pun dahulu adalah orang asing di tanah Mesir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have long time holden my peace; I have been still, and refrained myself: now will I cry like a travailing woman; I will destroy and devour at once.
target: Aku membisu dari sejak dahulu kala, Aku berdiam diri, Aku menahan hati-Ku; sekarang Aku mau mengerang seperti perempuan yang melahirkan, Aku mau mengah-mengah dan megap-megap.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And our hope of you is stedfast, knowing, that as ye are partakers of the sufferings, so shall ye be also of the consolation.
target: Dan pengharapan kami akan kamu adalah teguh, karena kami tahu, bahwa sama seperti kamu turut mengambil bagian dalam kesengsaraan kami, kamu juga turut mengambil bagian dalam penghiburan kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore being a prophet, and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him, that of the fruit of his loins, according to the flesh, he would raise up Christ to sit on his throne;
target: Tetapi ia adalah seorang nabi dan ia tahu, bahwa Allah telah berjanji kepadanya dengan mengangkat sumpah, bahwa Ia akan mendudukkan seorang dari keturunan Daud sendiri di atas takhtanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Judah, thou art he whom thy brethren shall praise: thy hand shall be in the neck of thine enemies; thy father's children shall bow down before thee.
target: Yehuda, engkau akan dipuji oleh saudara-saudaramu, tanganmu akan menekan tengkuk musuhmu, kepadamu akan sujud anak-anak ayahmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Bela were ard and Naaman: of Ard, the family of the Ardites: and of Naaman, the family of the Naamites.
target: Dan anak-anak Bela ialah Ared dan Naaman; dari Ared kaum orang Ared dan dari Naaman kaum orang Naaman.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the spirit took me up, and I heard behind me a voice of a great rushing, saying, Blessed be the glory of the LORD from his place.
target: Maka Roh itu mengangkat aku, dan aku mendengar di belakangku suatu suara gemuruh yang besar, tatkala kemuliaan Allah naik ke atas dari tempatnya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye shall compass the city, all ye men of war, and go round about the city once. Thus shalt thou do six days.
target: Haruslah kamu mengelilingi kota itu, yakni semua prajurit harus mengedari kota itu sekali saja; demikianlah harus engkau perbuat enam hari lamanya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they set on for him by himself, and for them by themselves, and for the Egyptians, which did eat with him, by themselves: because the Egyptians might not eat bread with the Hebrews; for that is an abomination unto the Egyptians.
target: Lalu dihidangkanlah makanan, bagi Yusuf tersendiri, bagi saudara-saudaranya tersendiri dan bagi orang-orang Mesir yang bersama-sama makan dengan mereka itu tersendiri; sebab orang Mesir tidak boleh makan bersama-sama dengan orang Ibrani, karena hal itu suatu kekejian bagi orang Mesir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The same hour was the thing fulfilled upon Nebuchadnezzar: and he was driven from men, and did eat grass as oxen, and his body was wet with the dew of heaven, till his hairs were grown like eagles' feathers, and his nails like birds' claws.
target: Pada saat itu juga terlaksanalah perkataan itu atas Nebukadnezar, dan ia dihalau dari antara manusia dan makan rumput seperti lembu, dan tubuhnya basah oleh embun dari langit, sampai rambutnya menjadi panjang seperti bulu burung rajawali dan kukunya seperti kuku burung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Bunni, Azgad, Bebai,
target: Buni, Azgad, Bebai,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he spake a parable unto them, Can the blind lead the blind? shall they not both fall into the ditch?
target: Yesus mengatakan pula suatu perumpamaan kepada mereka: "Dapatkah orang buta menuntun orang buta? Bukankah keduanya akan jatuh ke dalam lobang?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let people serve thee, and nations bow down to thee: be lord over thy brethren, and let thy mother's sons bow down to thee: cursed be every one that curseth thee, and blessed be he that blesseth thee.
target: Bangsa-bangsa akan takluk kepadamu, dan suku-suku bangsa akan sujud kepadamu; jadilah tuan atas saudara-saudaramu, dan anak-anak ibumu akan sujud kepadamu. Siapa yang mengutuk engkau, terkutuklah ia, dan siapa yang memberkati engkau, diberkatilah ia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In those days, and in that time, saith the LORD, the iniquity of Israel shall be sought for, and there shall be none; and the sins of Judah, and they shall not be found: for I will pardon them whom I reserve.
target: Pada waktu itu dan pada masa itu, demikianlah firman TUHAN, orang akan mencari kesalahan Israel, tetapi tidak didapatnya, dan dosa Yehuda, tetapi tidak ada ditemukannya, sebab Aku akan mengampuni orang-orang yang Kubiarkan tinggal hidup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when we had sailed slowly many days, and scarce were come over against Cnidus, the wind not suffering us, we sailed under Crete, over against Salmone;
target: Selama beberapa hari berlayar, kami hampir-hampir tidak maju dan dengan susah payah kami mendekati Knidus. Karena angin tetap tidak baik, kami menyusur pantai Kreta melewati tanjung Salmone.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he said, Surely they are my people, children that will not lie: so he was their Saviour.
target: Bukankah Ia berfirman: "Sungguh, merekalah umat-Ku, anak-anak yang tidak akan berlaku curang," maka Ia menjadi Juruselamat mereka

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For my sighing cometh before I eat, and my roarings are poured out like the waters.
target: Karena ganti rotiku adalah keluh kesahku, dan keluhanku tercurah seperti air.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I said, Oh that I had wings like a dove! for then would I fly away, and be at rest.
target: Aku dirundung takut dan gentar, perasaan seram meliputi aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So David and his men went to Keilah, and fought with the Philistines, and brought away their cattle, and smote them with a great slaughter. So David saved the inhabitants of Keilah.
target: Kemudian pergilah Daud dengan orang-orangnya ke Kehila; ia berperang melawan orang Filistin itu, dihalaunya ternak mereka dan ditimbulkannya kekalahan besar di antara mereka. Demikianlah Daud menyelamatkan penduduk Kehila.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David assembled all the princes of Israel, the princes of the tribes, and the captains of the companies that ministered to the king by course, and the captains over the thousands, and captains over the hundreds, and the stewards over all the substance and possession of the king, and of his sons, with the officers, and with the mighty men, and with all the valiant men, unto Jerusalem.
target: Daud mengumpulkan di Yerusalem segala pembesar Israel, yakni para kepala suku, para pemimpin rombongan orang-orang yang melayani raja, para kepala pasukan seribu dan kepala pasukan seratus, serta para kepala harta benda dan ternak kepunyaan raja dan anak-anaknya; bersama-sama mereka juga para pegawai istana dan para perwira dan semua pahlawan yang gagah perkasa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine shewing uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity,
target: dan jadikanlah dirimu sendiri suatu teladan dalam berbuat baik. Hendaklah engkau jujur dan bersungguh-sungguh dalam pengajaranmu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So David stayed his servants with these words, and suffered them not to rise against Saul. But Saul rose up out of the cave, and went on his way.
target: lalu berkatalah ia kepada orang-orangnya: "Dijauhkan TUHANlah kiranya dari padaku untuk melakukan hal yang demikian kepada tuanku, kepada orang yang diurapi TUHAN, yakni menjamah dia, sebab dialah orang yang diurapi TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Take the sum of the people, from twenty years old and upward; as the LORD commanded Moses and the children of Israel, which went forth out of the land of Egypt.
target: "Hitunglah jumlah semua orang yang berumur dua puluh tahun ke atas!" — seperti yang diperintahkan TUHAN kepada Musa. Inilah orang Israel yang telah keluar dari tanah Mesir:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the cedar of the house within was carved with knops and open flowers: all was cedar; there was no stone seen.
target: Kayu aras sebelah dalam rumah itu berukirkan buah labu dan bunga mengembang; semuanya ditutupi kayu aras, tidak ada batu kelihatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass the third day after that I was delivered, that this woman was delivered also: and we were together; there was no stranger with us in the house, save we two in the house.
target: Kemudian pada hari ketiga sesudah aku, perempuan ini pun melahirkan anak; kami sendirian, tidak ada orang luar bersama-sama kami dalam rumah, hanya kami berdua saja dalam rumah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,
target: Dan supaya Ia menjadikan mata hatimu terang, agar kamu mengerti pengharapan apakah yang terkandung dalam panggilan-Nya: betapa kayanya kemuliaan bagian yang ditentukan-Nya bagi orang-orang kudus,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hear this, ye old men, and give ear, all ye inhabitants of the land. Hath this been in your days, or even in the days of your fathers?
target: Dengarlah ini, hai para tua-tua, pasanglah telinga, hai seluruh penduduk negeri! Pernahkah terjadi seperti ini dalam zamanmu, atau dalam zaman nenek moyangmu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I was like a lamb or an ox that is brought to the slaughter; and I knew not that they had devised devices against me, saying, Let us destroy the tree with the fruit thereof, and let us cut him off from the land of the living, that his name may be no more remembered.
target: Tetapi aku dulu seperti anak domba jinak yang dibawa untuk disembelih, aku tidak tahu bahwa mereka mengadakan persepakatan jahat terhadap aku: "Marilah kita binasakan pohon ini dengan buah-buahnya! Marilah kita melenyapkannya dari negeri orang-orang yang hidup, sehingga namanya tidak diingat orang lagi!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the time that Jehu reigned over Israel in Samaria was twenty and eight years.
target: Adapun lamanya Yehu menjadi raja atas Israel di Samaria adalah dua puluh delapan tahun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, Let us take our journey, and let us go, and I will go before thee.
target: Kata Esau: "Baiklah kita berangkat berjalan terus; aku akan menyertai engkau."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hast with thine arm redeemed thy people, the sons of Jacob and Joseph. Selah.
target: Engkaulah Allah yang melakukan keajaiban; Engkau telah menyatakan kuasa-Mu di antara bangsa-bangsa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the LORD hath made Jordan a border between us and you, ye children of Reuben and children of Gad; ye have no part in the LORD: so shall your children make our children cease from fearing the LORD.
target: Bukankah TUHAN telah menentukan sungai Yordan sebagai batas antara kami dan kamu, hai orang bani Ruben dan bani Gad! Kamu tidak mempunyai bagian akan TUHAN. Demikianlah mungkin anak-anak kamu membuat anak-anak kami berhenti dari pada takut akan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of Delaiah, the children of Tobiah, the children of Nekoda, six hundred fifty and two.
target: bani Delaya, bani Tobia, bani Nekoda, enam ratus lima puluh dua orang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If it be possible, as much as lieth in you, live peaceably with all men.
target: Sedapat-dapatnya, kalau hal itu bergantung padamu, hiduplah dalam perdamaian dengan semua orang!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory;
target: Sebab penderitaan ringan yang sekarang ini, mengerjakan bagi kami kemuliaan kekal yang melebihi segala-galanya, jauh lebih besar dari pada penderitaan kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Many are my persecutors and mine enemies; yet do I not decline from thy testimonies.
target: Pengejar dan lawanku banyak, tetapi aku tidak menyimpang dari peringatan-peringatan-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then shall the man bring his wife unto the priest, and he shall bring her offering for her, the tenth part of an ephah of barley meal; he shall pour no oil upon it, nor put frankincense thereon; for it is an offering of jealousy, an offering of memorial, bringing iniquity to remembrance.
target: maka haruslah orang itu membawa isterinya kepada imam. Dan orang itu harus membawa persembahan karena perempuan itu sebanyak sepersepuluh efa tepung jelai, yang ke atasnya tidak dituangkannya minyak dan yang tidak dibubuhinya kemenyan, karena korban itu ialah korban sajian cemburuan, suatu korban peringatan yang mengingatkan kepada kedurjanaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the dove came in to him in the evening; and, lo, in her mouth was an olive leaf pluckt off: so Noah knew that the waters were abated from off the earth.
target: menjelang waktu senja pulanglah burung merpati itu mendapatkan Nuh, dan pada paruhnya dibawanya sehelai daun zaitun yang segar. Dari situlah diketahui Nuh, bahwa air itu telah berkurang dari atas bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus will I execute judgments in Egypt: and they shall know that I am the LORD.
target: Dan Aku akan menjatuhkan hukuman atas Mesir dan mereka akan mengetahui bahwa Akulah TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For when David was up in the morning, the word of the LORD came unto the prophet Gad, David's seer, saying,
target: Setelah Daud bangun dari pada waktu pagi, datanglah firman TUHAN kepada nabi Gad, pelihat Daud, demikian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there came an angel of the LORD, and sat under an oak which was in Ophrah, that pertained unto Joash the Abiezrite: and his son Gideon threshed wheat by the winepress, to hide it from the Midianites.
target: Kemudian datanglah Malaikat TUHAN dan duduk di bawah pohon tarbantin di Ofra, kepunyaan Yoas, orang Abiezer itu, sedang Gideon, anaknya, mengirik gandum dalam tempat pemerasan anggur agar tersembunyi bagi orang Midian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: How long shall this be in the heart of the prophets that prophesy lies? yea, they are prophets of the deceit of their own heart;
target: Sampai bilamana hal itu ada dalam hati para nabi yang bernubuat palsu dan yang menubuatkan tipu rekaan hatinya sendiri,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there are also many other things which Jesus did, the which, if they should be written every one, I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written. Amen.
target: Masih banyak hal-hal lain lagi yang diperbuat oleh Yesus, tetapi jikalau semuanya itu harus dituliskan satu per satu, maka agaknya dunia ini tidak dapat memuat semua kitab yang harus ditulis itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And, behold, a woman in the city, which was a sinner, when she knew that Jesus sat at meat in the Pharisee's house, brought an alabaster box of ointment,
target: Di kota itu ada seorang perempuan yang terkenal sebagai seorang berdosa. Ketika perempuan itu mendengar, bahwa Yesus sedang makan di rumah orang Farisi itu, datanglah ia membawa sebuah buli-buli pualam berisi minyak wangi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jephthah came to Mizpeh unto his house, and, behold, his daughter came out to meet him with timbrels and with dances: and she was his only child; beside her he had neither son nor daughter.
target: Ketika Yefta pulang ke Mizpa ke rumahnya, tampaklah anaknya perempuan keluar menyongsong dia dengan memukul rebana serta menari-nari. Dialah anaknya yang tunggal; selain dari dia tidak ada anaknya laki-laki atau perempuan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hearken unto me, my people; and give ear unto me, O my nation: for a law shall proceed from me, and I will make my judgment to rest for a light of the people.
target: Perhatikanlah suara-Ku, hai bangsa-bangsa, dan pasanglah telinga kepada-Ku, hai suku-suku bangsa! Sebab pengajaran akan keluar dari pada-Ku dan hukum-Ku sebagai terang untuk bangsa-bangsa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will walk at liberty: for I seek thy precepts.
target: Aku hendak hidup dalam kelegaan, sebab aku mencari titah-titah-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king said unto Cushi, Is the young man Absalom safe? And Cushi answered, The enemies of my lord the king, and all that rise against thee to do thee hurt, be as that young man is.
target: Tetapi bertanyalah raja kepada orang Etiopia itu: "Selamatkah Absalom, orang muda itu?" Jawab orang Etiopia itu: "Biarlah seperti orang muda itu musuh tuanku raja dan semua orang yang bangkit menentang tuanku untuk berbuat jahat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Saul sent to Jesse, saying, Let David, I pray thee, stand before me; for he hath found favour in my sight.
target: Sebab itu Saul menyuruh orang kepada Isai mengatakan: "Biarkanlah Daud tetap menjadi pelayanku, sebab aku suka kepadanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He took his brother by the heel in the womb, and by his strength he had power with God:
target: TUHAN mempunyai perbantahan dengan Yehuda, Ia akan menghukum Yakub sesuai dengan tingkah lakunya, dan akan memberi balasan kepadanya sesuai dengan perbuatan-perbuatannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore thus saith the LORD; Ask ye now among the heathen, who hath heard such things: the virgin of Israel hath done a very horrible thing.
target: Sebab itu beginilah firman TUHAN: "Cobalah tanyakan di kalangan bangsa-bangsa: siapakah yang telah mendengar hal seperti ini? Anak dara Israel telah melakukan hal-hal yang sangat ngeri!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because they have not hearkened to my words, saith the LORD, which I sent unto them by my servants the prophets, rising up early and sending them; but ye would not hear, saith the LORD.
target: sebagai ganjaran bahwa mereka tidak mendengarkan perkataan-Ku, demikianlah firman TUHAN, yang telah Kusampaikan kepada mereka terus-menerus dengan perantaraan hamba-hamba-Ku, yakni para nabi; tetapi kamu tidak mendengarkannya, demikianlah firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Every purpose is established by counsel: and with good advice make war.
target: Rancangan terlaksana oleh pertimbangan, sebab itu berperanglah dengan siasat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither shall any priest drink wine, when they enter into the inner court.
target: Imam-imam tidak boleh minum anggur, kalau mereka hendak masuk dalam pelataran dalam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: After the doings of the land of Egypt, wherein ye dwelt, shall ye not do: and after the doings of the land of Canaan, whither I bring you, shall ye not do: neither shall ye walk in their ordinances.
target: Janganlah kamu berbuat seperti yang diperbuat orang di tanah Mesir, di mana kamu diam dahulu; juga janganlah kamu berbuat seperti yang diperbuat orang di tanah Kanaan, ke mana Aku membawa kamu; janganlah kamu hidup menurut kebiasaan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Moses heard the people weep throughout their families, every man in the door of his tent: and the anger of the LORD was kindled greatly; Moses also was displeased.
target: Ketika Musa mendengar bangsa itu, yaitu orang-orang dari setiap kaum, menangis di depan pintu kemahnya, bangkitlah murka TUHAN dengan sangat, dan hal itu dipandang jahat oleh Musa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall offer of it all the fat thereof; the rump, and the fat that covereth the inwards,
target: Segala lemak dari korban itu haruslah dipersembahkan, yakni ekornya yang berlemak dan lemak yang menutupi isi perut,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: About forty thousand prepared for war passed over before the LORD unto battle, to the plains of Jericho.
target: Kira-kira empat puluh ribu orang yang siap untuk berperang menyeberang di hadapan TUHAN ke dataran Yerikho untuk berperang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For they speak not peace: but they devise deceitful matters against them that are quiet in the land.
target: Karena mereka tidak membicarakan damai, dan terhadap orang-orang yang rukun di negeri mereka merancangkan penipuan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither shall he stand that handleth the bow; and he that is swift of foot shall not deliver himself: neither shall he that rideth the horse deliver himself.
target: Pemegang panah tidak dapat bertahan, orang yang cepat kaki tidak akan terluput dan penunggang kuda tidak dapat meluputkan diri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And led him away to Annas first; for he was father in law to Caiaphas, which was the high priest that same year.
target: Lalu mereka membawa-Nya mula-mula kepada Hanas, karena Hanas adalah mertua Kayafas, yang pada tahun itu menjadi Imam Besar;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I, as a deaf man, heard not; and I was as a dumb man that openeth not his mouth.
target: Orang-orang yang ingin mencabut nyawaku memasang jerat, orang-orang yang mengikhtiarkan celakaku, memikirkan kehancuran dan merancangkan tipu daya sepanjang hari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted.
target: Dan barangsiapa meninggikan diri, ia akan direndahkan dan barangsiapa merendahkan diri, ia akan ditinggikan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These are the sons of Benjamin after their families: and they that were numbered of them were forty and five thousand and six hundred.
target: Itulah bani Benyamin menurut kaum mereka, dan orang-orang yang dicatat dari mereka berjumlah empat puluh lima ribu enam ratus orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias; and on this wise shewed he himself.
target: Kemudian Yesus menampakkan diri lagi kepada murid-murid-Nya di pantai danau Tiberias dan Ia menampakkan diri sebagai berikut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Evil men understand not judgment: but they that seek the LORD understand all things.
target: Orang yang jahat tidak mengerti keadilan, tetapi orang yang mencari TUHAN mengerti segala sesuatu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses after the death of the two sons of Aaron, when they offered before the LORD, and died;
target: Sesudah kedua anak Harun mati, yang terjadi pada waktu mereka mendekat ke hadapan TUHAN, berfirmanlah TUHAN kepada Musa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And so did he in the cities of Manasseh, and Ephraim, and Simeon, even unto Naphtali, with their mattocks round about.
target: Juga di kota-kota Manasye, Efraim dan Simeon, sampai di kota-kota Naftali, yang di mana-mana telah menjadi reruntuhan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet the LORD would not destroy Judah for David his servant's sake, as he promised him to give him alway a light, and to his children.
target: Namun demikian, TUHAN tidak mau memusnahkan Yehuda oleh karena Daud, hamba-Nya, sesuai dengan yang dijanjikan-Nya kepada Daud, bahwa Ia hendak memberikan keturunan kepadanya dan kepada anak-anaknya untuk selama-lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For in him we live, and move, and have our being; as certain also of your own poets have said, For we are also his offspring.
target: Sebab di dalam Dia kita hidup, kita bergerak, kita ada, seperti yang telah juga dikatakan oleh pujangga-pujanggamu: Sebab kita ini dari keturunan Allah juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the second lot came forth to Simeon, even for the tribe of the children of Simeon according to their families: and their inheritance was within the inheritance of the children of Judah.
target: Undian yang kedua pun keluarlah bagi suku Simeon, untuk suku bani Simeon menurut kaum-kaum mereka. Milik pusaka mereka ada di tengah-tengah milik pusaka bani Yehuda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now when the apostles which were at Jerusalem heard that Samaria had received the word of God, they sent unto them Peter and John:
target: Ketika rasul-rasul di Yerusalem mendengar, bahwa tanah Samaria telah menerima firman Allah, mereka mengutus Petrus dan Yohanes ke situ.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And for the villages, with their fields, some of the children of Judah dwelt at Kirjatharba, and in the villages thereof, and at Dibon, and in the villages thereof, and at Jekabzeel, and in the villages thereof,
target: Tentang tempat-tempat kediaman di daerah perladangan, sebagian dari bani Yehuda tinggal di Kiryat-Arba dan segala anak kotanya, di Dibon dan segala anak kotanya dan di Yekabzeel dan desa-desanya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In famine he shall redeem thee from death: and in war from the power of the sword.
target: Pada masa kelaparan engkau dibebaskan-Nya dari maut, dan pada masa perang dari kuasa pedang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I said unto my master, Peradventure the woman will not follow me.
target: Jawabku kepada tuanku itu: Mungkin perempuan itu tidak mau mengikut aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which say, It is not near; let us build houses: this city is the caldron, and we be the flesh.
target: yang mengatakan: Bukankah belum lama berselang rumah-rumah kita dibangun kembali? Kota inilah periuk dan kita dagingnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the men turned their faces from thence, and went toward Sodom: but Abraham stood yet before the LORD.
target: Lalu berpalinglah orang-orang itu dari situ dan berjalan ke Sodom, tetapi Abraham masih tetap berdiri di hadapan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all Israel from Dan even to Beersheba knew that Samuel was established to be a prophet of the LORD.
target: Maka tahulah seluruh Israel dari Dan sampai Bersyeba, bahwa kepada Samuel telah dipercayakan jabatan nabi TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who knowing the judgment of God, that they which commit such things are worthy of death, not only do the same, but have pleasure in them that do them.
target: Sebab walaupun mereka mengetahui tuntutan-tuntutan hukum Allah, yaitu bahwa setiap orang yang melakukan hal-hal demikian, patut dihukum mati, mereka bukan saja melakukannya sendiri, tetapi mereka juga setuju dengan mereka yang melakukannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because of thine indignation and thy wrath: for thou hast lifted me up, and cast me down.
target: Sebab aku makan abu seperti roti, dan mencampur minumanku dengan tangisan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
