input: And he said unto Balak, Stand here by thy burnt offering, while I meet the LORD yonder.
target: Kemudian berkatalah ia kepada Balak: "Berdirilah di sini di samping korban bakaranmu, sedang aku hendak bertemu dengan TUHAN di situ."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If I should count them, they are more in number than the sand: when I awake, I am still with thee.
target: Jika aku mau menghitungnya, itu lebih banyak dari pada pasir. Apabila aku berhenti, masih saja aku bersama-sama Engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Every man according as he purposeth in his heart, so let him give; not grudgingly, or of necessity: for God loveth a cheerful giver.
target: Hendaklah masing-masing memberikan menurut kerelaan hatinya, jangan dengan sedih hati atau karena paksaan, sebab Allah mengasihi orang yang memberi dengan sukacita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But they shall not go in to see when the holy things are covered, lest they die.
target: Tetapi janganlah orang Kehat masuk ke dalam untuk melihat barang-barang kudus itu walau sesaat pun, nanti mereka mati."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass after these things, that it was told Abraham, saying, Behold, Milcah, she hath also born children unto thy brother Nahor;
target: Sesudah itu Abraham mendapat kabar: "Juga Milka telah melahirkan anak-anak lelaki bagi Nahor, saudaramu:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In those days also saw I Jews that had married wives of Ashdod, of Ammon, and of Moab:
target: Pada masa itu juga kulihat bahwa beberapa orang Yahudi memperisteri perempuan-perempuan Asdod, perempuan-perempuan Amon atau perempuan-perempuan Moab.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they asked him, saying, Master, we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly, neither acceptest thou the person of any, but teachest the way of God truly:
target: Orang-orang itu mengajukan pertanyaan ini kepada-Nya: "Guru, kami tahu, bahwa segala perkataan dan pengajaran-Mu benar dan Engkau tidak mencari muka, melainkan dengan jujur mengajar jalan Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; The fast of the fourth month, and the fast of the fifth, and the fast of the seventh, and the fast of the tenth, shall be to the house of Judah joy and gladness, and cheerful feasts; therefore love the truth and peace.
target: "Beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam: Waktu puasa dalam bulan yang keempat, dalam bulan yang kelima, dalam bulan yang ketujuh dan dalam bulan yang kesepuluh akan menjadi kegirangan dan sukacita dan menjadi waktu-waktu perayaan yang menggembirakan bagi kaum Yehuda. Maka cintailah kebenaran dan damai!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be merciful, O LORD, unto thy people Israel, whom thou hast redeemed, and lay not innocent blood unto thy people of Israel's charge. And the blood shall be forgiven them.
target: Adakanlah pendamaian bagi umat-Mu Israel yang telah Kautebus itu, TUHAN, dan janganlah timpakan darah orang yang tidak bersalah ke tengah-tengah umat-Mu Israel. Maka karena darah itu telah diadakan pendamaian bagi mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But it shall be, when evening cometh on, he shall wash himself with water: and when the sun is down, he shall come into the camp again.
target: Kemudian menjelang senja haruslah ia mandi dengan air, dan pada waktu matahari terbenam, ia boleh masuk kembali ke dalam perkemahan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And also I have withholden the rain from you, when there were yet three months to the harvest: and I caused it to rain upon one city, and caused it not to rain upon another city: one piece was rained upon, and the piece whereupon it rained not withered.
target: "Aku pun telah menahan hujan dari padamu, ketika tiga bulan lagi sebelum panen; Aku menurunkan hujan ke atas kota yang satu dan tidak menurunkan hujan ke atas kota yang lain; ladang yang satu kehujanan, dan ladang, yang tidak kena hujan, menjadi kering;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt also decree a thing, and it shall be established unto thee: and the light shall shine upon thy ways.
target: Apabila engkau memutuskan berbuat sesuatu, maka akan tercapai maksudmu, dan cahaya terang menyinari jalan-jalanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the kine took the straight way to the way of Bethshemesh, and went along the highway, lowing as they went, and turned not aside to the right hand or to the left; and the lords of the Philistines went after them unto the border of Bethshemesh.
target: Lembu-lembu itu langsung mengikuti jalan yang ke Bet-Semes; melalui satu jalan raya, sambil menguak dengan tidak menyimpang ke kanan atau ke kiri, sedang raja-raja kota orang Filistin itu berjalan di belakangnya sampai ke daerah Bet-Semes.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.
target: Perhatikanlah, supaya jangan ada orang yang membalas jahat dengan jahat, tetapi usahakanlah senantiasa yang baik, terhadap kamu masing-masing dan terhadap semua orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galilaeans, whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices.
target: Pada waktu itu datanglah kepada Yesus beberapa orang membawa kabar tentang orang-orang Galilea, yang darahnya dicampurkan Pilatus dengan darah korban yang mereka persembahkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Haman said moreover, Yea, Esther the queen did let no man come in with the king unto the banquet that she had prepared but myself; and to morrow am I invited unto her also with the king.
target: Lagi kata Haman: "Tambahan pula tiada seorang pun diminta oleh Ester, sang ratu, untuk datang bersama-sama dengan raja ke perjamuan yang diadakannya, kecuali aku; dan untuk besok pun aku diundangnya bersama-sama dengan raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed.
target: Tetapi sekalipun kami atau seorang malaikat dari sorga yang memberitakan kepada kamu suatu injil yang berbeda dengan Injil yang telah kami beritakan kepadamu, terkutuklah dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hast made void the covenant of thy servant: thou hast profaned his crown by casting it to the ground.
target: Tetapi Engkau sendiri menolak dan membuang, menjadi gemas kepada orang yang Kauurapi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if ye do not forgive, neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses.
target: Tetapi jika kamu tidak mengampuni, maka Bapamu yang di sorga juga tidak akan mengampuni kesalahan-kesalahanmu.]

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The mighty men of Babylon have forborn to fight, they have remained in their holds: their might hath failed; they became as women: they have burned her dwellingplaces; her bars are broken.
target: Pahlawan-pahlawan Babel telah berhenti berperang, mereka tinggal duduk di kubu-kubu pertahanan, kegagahberanian mereka sudah lenyap, mereka sudah menjadi seperti perempuan. Tempat-tempat tinggalnya sudah terbakar, palang-palang pintunya sudah patah!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he spake to his sons, saying, Saddle me the ass. And they saddled him.
target: Lalu berbicaralah ia kepada anak-anaknya: "Pelanailah keledai bagiku." Dan mereka memelanainya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And these are the children of Dishon; Hemdan, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
target: Inilah anak-anak Disyon: Hemdan, Esyban, Yitran dan Keran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt put in the breastplate of judgment the Urim and the Thummim; and they shall be upon Aaron's heart, when he goeth in before the LORD: and Aaron shall bear the judgment of the children of Israel upon his heart before the LORD continually.
target: Dan di dalam tutup dada pernyataan keputusan itu haruslah kautaruh Urim dan Tumim; haruslah itu di atas jantung Harun, apabila ia masuk menghadap TUHAN, dan Harun harus tetap membawa keputusan bagi orang Israel di atas jantungnya, di hadapan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Cometh this blessedness then upon the circumcision only, or upon the uncircumcision also? for we say that faith was reckoned to Abraham for righteousness.
target: Adakah ucapan bahagia ini hanya berlaku bagi orang bersunat saja atau juga bagi orang tak bersunat? Sebab telah kami katakan, bahwa kepada Abraham iman diperhitungkan sebagai kebenaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
target: "Pergilah menghadap, katakanlah kepada Firaun, raja Mesir, bahwa ia harus membiarkan orang Israel pergi dari negerinya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the men of Israel gathered themselves together out of Naphtali, and out of Asher, and out of all Manasseh, and pursued after the Midianites.
target: Kemudian dikerahkanlah orang-orang Israel dari suku Naftali dan dari suku Asyer dan dari segenap suku Manasye, lalu mereka mengejar orang Midian itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: On that day they read in the book of Moses in the audience of the people; and therein was found written, that the Ammonite and the Moabite should not come into the congregation of God for ever;
target: Pada masa itu bagian-bagian dari pada kitab Musa dibacakan dengan didengar oleh rakyat. Didapati tertulis dalam kitab itu, bahwa orang Amon dan orang Moab tidak boleh masuk jemaah Allah untuk selamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of the tribe of Asher, Sethur the son of Michael.
target: dari suku Asyer: Setur bin Mikhael;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But and if ye suffer for righteousness' sake, happy are ye: and be not afraid of their terror, neither be troubled;
target: Tetapi sekalipun kamu harus menderita juga karena kebenaran, kamu akan berbahagia. Sebab itu janganlah kamu takuti apa yang mereka takuti dan janganlah gentar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: His eyes shall be red with wine, and his teeth white with milk.
target: Matanya akan merah karena anggur dan giginya akan putih karena susu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if the casting away of them be the reconciling of the world, what shall the receiving of them be, but life from the dead?
target: Sebab jika penolakan mereka berarti perdamaian bagi dunia, dapatkah penerimaan mereka mempunyai arti lain dari pada hidup dari antara orang mati?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then after that saith he to his disciples, Let us go into Judaea again.
target: tetapi sesudah itu Ia berkata kepada murid-murid-Nya: "Mari kita kembali lagi ke Yudea."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the resurrection therefore, when they shall rise, whose wife shall she be of them? for the seven had her to wife.
target: Pada hari kebangkitan, bilamana mereka bangkit, siapakah yang menjadi suami perempuan itu? Sebab ketujuhnya telah beristerikan dia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth.
target: Saudaraku yang kekasih, aku berdoa, semoga engkau baik-baik dan sehat-sehat saja dalam segala sesuatu, sama seperti jiwamu baik-baik saja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That the LORD sent a prophet unto the children of Israel, which said unto them, Thus saith the LORD God of Israel, I brought you up from Egypt, and brought you forth out of the house of bondage;
target: maka TUHAN mengutus seorang nabi kepada orang Israel, yang berkata kepada mereka: "Beginilah firman TUHAN, Allah Israel: Akulah yang menuntun kamu keluar dari Mesir dan yang membawa kamu keluar dari rumah perbudakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: By faith the harlot Rahab perished not with them that believed not, when she had received the spies with peace.
target: Karena iman maka Rahab, perempuan sundal itu, tidak turut binasa bersama-sama dengan orang-orang durhaka, karena ia telah menyambut pengintai-pengintai itu dengan baik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To him that made great lights: for his mercy endureth for ever:
target: Kepada Dia yang menjadikan benda-benda penerang yang besar; bahwasanya untuk selama-lamanya kasih setia-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which was the son of Simeon, which was the son of Juda, which was the son of Joseph, which was the son of Jonan, which was the son of Eliakim,
target: anak Simeon, anak Yehuda, anak Yusuf, anak Yonam, anak Elyakim,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Him that dieth of Ahab in the city the dogs shall eat; and him that dieth in the field shall the fowls of the air eat.
target: Siapa dari keluarga Ahab yang mati di kota akan dimakan anjing dan yang mati di padang akan dimakan burung di udara."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For these nations, which thou shalt possess, hearkened unto observers of times, and unto diviners: but as for thee, the LORD thy God hath not suffered thee so to do.
target: Sebab bangsa-bangsa yang daerahnya akan kaududuki ini mendengarkan kepada peramal atau petenung, tetapi engkau ini tidak diizinkan TUHAN, Allahmu, melakukan yang demikian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Jesus called them to him, and saith unto them, Ye know that they which are accounted to rule over the Gentiles exercise lordship over them; and their great ones exercise authority upon them.
target: Tetapi Yesus memanggil mereka lalu berkata: "Kamu tahu, bahwa mereka yang disebut pemerintah bangsa-bangsa memerintah rakyatnya dengan tangan besi, dan pembesar-pembesarnya menjalankan kuasanya dengan keras atas mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That they may fear thee, to walk in thy ways, so long as they live in the land which thou gavest unto our fathers.
target: supaya mereka takut akan Engkau dan mengikuti segala jalan yang Engkau tunjukkan selama mereka hidup di atas tanah yang telah Kauberikan kepada nenek moyang kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore the LORD said unto Solomon, Forasmuch as this is done of thee, and thou hast not kept my covenant and my statutes, which I have commanded thee, I will surely rend the kingdom from thee, and will give it to thy servant.
target: Lalu berfirmanlah TUHAN kepada Salomo: "Oleh karena begitu kelakuanmu, yakni engkau tidak berpegang pada perjanjian dan segala ketetapan-Ku yang telah Kuperintahkan kepadamu, maka sesungguhnya Aku akan mengoyakkan kerajaan itu dari padamu dan akan memberikannya kepada hambamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD looked down from heaven upon the children of men, to see if there were any that did understand, and seek God.
target: TUHAN memandang ke bawah dari sorga kepada anak-anak manusia untuk melihat, apakah ada yang berakal budi dan yang mencari Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now when the copy of king Artaxerxes' letter was read before Rehum, and Shimshai the scribe, and their companions, they went up in haste to Jerusalem unto the Jews, and made them to cease by force and power.
target: Maka setelah salinan surat raja Artahsasta dibacakan kepada Rehum, dan Simsai, panitera, serta rekan-rekan mereka, berangkatlah mereka dengan segera ke Yerusalem mendapatkan orang-orang Yahudi, dan dengan kekerasan mereka memaksa orang-orang itu menghentikan pekerjaan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Rejoice the soul of thy servant: for unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.
target: Buatlah jiwa hamba-Mu bersukacita, sebab kepada-Mulah, ya Tuhan, kuangkat jiwaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, All is well. My master hath sent me, saying, Behold, even now there be come to me from mount Ephraim two young men of the sons of the prophets: give them, I pray thee, a talent of silver, and two changes of garments.
target: Jawabnya: "Selamat! Tuanku Elisa menyuruh aku mengatakan: Baru saja datang kepadaku dua orang muda dari pegunungan Efraim dari antara rombongan nabi. Baiklah berikan kepada mereka setalenta perak dan dua potong pakaian."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the elders of that city shall take that man and chastise him;
target: Maka haruslah para tua-tua kota itu mengambil laki-laki itu, menghajar dia,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Naboth said to Ahab, The LORD forbid it me, that I should give the inheritance of my fathers unto thee.
target: Jawab Nabot kepada Ahab: "Kiranya TUHAN menghindarkan aku dari pada memberikan milik pusaka nenek moyangku kepadamu!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He was five and twenty years old when he began to reign, and reigned sixteen years in Jerusalem.
target: Ia berumur dua puluh lima tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja dan enam belas tahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now if ye be ready that at what time ye hear the sound of the cornet, flute, harp, sackbut, psaltery, and dulcimer, and all kinds of musick, ye fall down and worship the image which I have made; well: but if ye worship not, ye shall be cast the same hour into the midst of a burning fiery furnace; and who is that God that shall deliver you out of my hands?
target: Sekarang, jika kamu bersedia, demi kamu mendengar bunyi sangkakala, seruling, kecapi, rebab, gambus, serdam dan berbagai-bagai jenis bunyi-bunyian, sujudlah menyembah patung yang kubuat itu! Tetapi jika kamu tidak menyembah, kamu akan dicampakkan seketika itu juga ke dalam perapian yang menyala-nyala. Dan dewa manakah yang dapat melepaskan kamu dari dalam tanganku?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Parshandatha, and Dalphon, and Aspatha,
target: Juga Parsandata, Dalfon, Aspata,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because strait is the gate, and narrow is the way, which leadeth unto life, and few there be that find it.
target: karena sesaklah pintu dan sempitlah jalan yang menuju kepada kehidupan, dan sedikit orang yang mendapatinya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The appearance of the wheels and their work was like unto the colour of a beryl: and they four had one likeness: and their appearance and their work was as it were a wheel in the middle of a wheel.
target: Rupa roda-roda itu seperti kilauan permata pirus dan keempatnya adalah serupa; buatannya seolah-olah roda yang satu di tengah-tengah yang lain.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the right shoulder shall ye give unto the priest for an heave offering of the sacrifices of your peace offerings.
target: Paha kanannya harus kamu serahkan kepada imam sebagai persembahan khusus dari segala korban keselamatanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Shall not his excellency make you afraid? and his dread fall upon you?
target: Apakah kebesaran-Nya tidak akan mengejutkan kamu dan ketakutan kepada-Nya menimpa kamu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sons of Ezer; Bilhan, and Zavan, and Jakan. The sons of Dishan; Uz, and Aran.
target: Anak-anak Ezer ialah Bilhan, Zaawan dan Yaakan. Anak-anak Disyan ialah Us dan Aran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Art thou bound unto a wife? seek not to be loosed. Art thou loosed from a wife? seek not a wife.
target: Adakah engkau terikat pada seorang perempuan? Janganlah engkau mengusahakan perceraian! Adakah engkau tidak terikat pada seorang perempuan? Janganlah engkau mencari seorang!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if ye turn again unto the LORD, your brethren and your children shall find compassion before them that lead them captive, so that they shall come again into this land: for the LORD your God is gracious and merciful, and will not turn away his face from you, if ye return unto him.
target: Karena bilamana kamu kembali kepada TUHAN, maka saudara-saudaramu dan anak-anakmu akan mendapat belas kasihan dari orang-orang yang menawan mereka, sehingga mereka kembali ke negeri ini. Sebab TUHAN, Allahmu, pengasih dan penyayang: Ia tidak akan memalingkan wajah-Nya dari pada kamu, bilamana kamu kembali kepada-Nya!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And every one had four faces: the first face was the face of a cherub, and the second face was the face of a man, and the third the face of a lion, and the fourth the face of an eagle.
target: Masing-masing mempunyai empat muka: muka yang pertama ialah muka kerub, yang kedua ialah muka manusia, yang ketiga ialah muka singa dan yang keempat ialah muka rajawali.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Gideon went up by the way of them that dwelt in tents on the east of Nobah and Jogbehah, and smote the host; for the host was secure.
target: Gideon maju melalui jalan orang-orang yang diam di dalam kemah di sebelah timur Nobah dan Yogbeha, lalu memukul kalah tentara itu, ketika tentara itu menyangka dirinya aman.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you, that ye both do and will do the things which we command you.
target: Dan kami percaya dalam Tuhan, bahwa apa yang kami pesankan kepadamu, kamu lakukan dan akan kamu lakukan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If there be among you any man, that is not clean by reason of uncleanness that chanceth him by night, then shall he go abroad out of the camp, he shall not come within the camp:
target: Apabila ada di antaramu seorang laki-laki yang tidak tahir disebabkan oleh sesuatu yang terjadi atasnya pada malam hari, maka haruslah ia pergi ke luar perkemahan, janganlah ia masuk ke dalam perkemahan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And hath not oppressed any, but hath restored to the debtor his pledge, hath spoiled none by violence, hath given his bread to the hungry, and hath covered the naked with a garment;
target: tidak menindas orang lain, ia mengembalikan gadaian orang, tidak merampas apa-apa, memberi makan orang lapar, memberi pakaian kepada orang telanjang,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it was told Saul that David was fled to Gath: and he sought no more again for him.
target: Setelah diberitahukan kepada Saul, bahwa Daud telah melarikan diri ke Gat, ia tidak lagi mencarinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Pilate saith unto them, What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ? They all say unto him, Let him be crucified.
target: Kata Pilatus kepada mereka: "Jika begitu, apakah yang harus kuperbuat dengan Yesus, yang disebut Kristus?" Mereka semua berseru: "Ia harus disalibkan!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said they all, Art thou then the Son of God? And he said unto them, Ye say that I am.
target: Kata mereka semua: "Kalau begitu, Engkau ini Anak Allah?" Jawab Yesus: "Kamu sendiri mengatakan, bahwa Akulah Anak Allah."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David fled from Naioth in Ramah, and came and said before Jonathan, What have I done? what is mine iniquity? and what is my sin before thy father, that he seeketh my life?
target: Maka larilah Daud dari Nayot, dekat Rama; sampailah ia kepada Yonatan, lalu berkata: "Apakah yang telah kuperbuat? Apakah kesalahanku dan apakah dosaku terhadap ayahmu, sehingga ia ingin mencabut nyawaku?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That the LORD called Samuel: and he answered, Here am I.
target: Lalu TUHAN memanggil: "Samuel! Samuel!", dan ia menjawab: "Ya, bapa."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The burden of the word of the LORD to Israel by Malachi.
target: Ucapan ilahi. Firman TUHAN kepada Israel dengan perantaraan Maleakhi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I am become a stranger unto my brethren, and an alien unto my mother's children.
target: Sebab oleh karena Engkaulah aku menanggung cela, noda meliputi mukaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Rabshakeh returned, and found the king of Assyria warring against Libnah: for he had heard that he was departed from Lachish.
target: Ketika juru minuman agung pulang, didapatinyalah raja Asyur berperang melawan Libna; sebab sudah didengarnya bahwa raja telah berangkat dari Lakhis.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus the heavens and the earth were finished, and all the host of them.
target: Demikianlah diselesaikan langit dan bumi dan segala isinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Solomon assembled the elders of Israel, and all the heads of the tribes, the chief of the fathers of the children of Israel, unto king Solomon in Jerusalem, that they might bring up the ark of the covenant of the LORD out of the city of David, which is Zion.
target: Pada waktu itu raja Salomo menyuruh para tua-tua Israel dan semua kepala suku, yakni para pemimpin puak orang Israel, berkumpul di hadapannya di Yerusalem, untuk mengangkut tabut perjanjian TUHAN dari kota Daud, yaitu Sion.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall pluck away his crop with his feathers, and cast it beside the altar on the east part, by the place of the ashes:
target: Temboloknya serta dengan bulunya haruslah disisihkan dan dibuang ke samping mezbah sebelah timur, ke tempat abu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Egypt shall be a desolation, and Edom shall be a desolate wilderness, for the violence against the children of Judah, because they have shed innocent blood in their land.
target: Mesir akan menjadi sunyi sepi, dan Edom akan menjadi padang gurun tandus, oleh sebab kekerasan terhadap keturunan Yehuda, oleh karena mereka telah menumpahkan darah orang yang tak bersalah di tanahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let her not be as one dead, of whom the flesh is half consumed when he cometh out of his mother's womb.
target: Janganlah kiranya dibiarkan dia sebagai anak gugur, yang pada waktu keluar dari kandungan ibunya sudah setengah busuk dagingnya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For what glory is it, if, when ye be buffeted for your faults, ye shall take it patiently? but if, when ye do well, and suffer for it, ye take it patiently, this is acceptable with God.
target: Sebab dapatkah disebut pujian, jika kamu menderita pukulan karena kamu berbuat dosa? Tetapi jika kamu berbuat baik dan karena itu kamu harus menderita, maka itu adalah kasih karunia pada Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the border of the children of Ephraim according to their families was thus: even the border of their inheritance on the east side was Atarothaddar, unto Bethhoron the upper;
target: Daerah bani Efraim menurut kaum-kaum mereka ialah demikian: batas milik pusaka mereka ke timur ialah Atarot-Adar sampai Bet-Horon Hulu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye were now turned, and had done right in my sight, in proclaiming liberty every man to his neighbour; and ye had made a covenant before me in the house which is called by my name:
target: Hari ini kamu telah bertobat dan melakukan apa yang benar di mata-Ku karena setiap orang memaklumkan pembebasan kepada saudaranya, dan kamu telah mengikat perjanjian di hadapan-Ku di rumah yang atasnya nama-Ku diserukan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;
target: Mikhael, Yispa dan Yoha ialah anak-anak Beria.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If a man sin against his neighbour, and an oath be laid upon him to make him swear, and the oath come before thine altar in this house;
target: Jika seseorang telah berdosa kepada temannya, lalu diwajibkan mengangkat sumpah dengan mengutuk dirinya, dan ia datang bersumpah ke depan mezbah-Mu di dalam rumah ini,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That the sons of God saw the daughters of men that they were fair; and they took them wives of all which they chose.
target: maka anak-anak Allah melihat, bahwa anak-anak perempuan manusia itu cantik-cantik, lalu mereka mengambil isteri dari antara perempuan-perempuan itu, siapa saja yang disukai mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the natural man receiveth not the things of the Spirit of God: for they are foolishness unto him: neither can he know them, because they are spiritually discerned.
target: Tetapi manusia duniawi tidak menerima apa yang berasal dari Roh Allah, karena hal itu baginya adalah suatu kebodohan; dan ia tidak dapat memahaminya, sebab hal itu hanya dapat dinilai secara rohani.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jobab died, and Husham of the land of Temani reigned in his stead.
target: Setelah Yobab mati, Husyam, dari negeri orang T'eman, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore, when I came, was there no man? when I called, was there none to answer? Is my hand shortened at all, that it cannot redeem? or have I no power to deliver? behold, at my rebuke I dry up the sea, I make the rivers a wilderness: their fish stinketh, because there is no water, and dieth for thirst.
target: Mengapa ketika Aku datang tidak ada orang, dan ketika Aku memanggil tidak ada yang menjawab? Mungkinkah tangan-Ku terlalu pendek untuk membebaskan atau tidak adakah kekuatan pada-Ku untuk melepaskan? Sesungguhnya, dengan hardik-Ku Aku mengeringkan laut, Aku membuat sungai-sungai menjadi padang gurun; ikan-ikannya berbau amis karena tidak ada air dan mati kehausan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now consider how great this man was, unto whom even the patriarch Abraham gave the tenth of the spoils.
target: Camkanlah betapa besarnya orang itu, yang kepadanya Abraham, bapa leluhur kita, memberikan sepersepuluh dari segala rampasan yang paling baik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press, they uncovered the roof where he was: and when they had broken it up, they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay.
target: Tetapi mereka tidak dapat membawanya kepada-Nya karena orang banyak itu, lalu mereka membuka atap yang di atas-Nya; sesudah terbuka mereka menurunkan tilam, tempat orang lumpuh itu terbaring.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let the righteous smite me; it shall be a kindness: and let him reprove me; it shall be an excellent oil, which shall not break my head: for yet my prayer also shall be in their calamities.
target: Biarlah orang benar memalu dan menghukum aku, itulah kasih; tetapi janganlah minyak orang fasik menghiasi kepalaku! Sungguh aku terus berdoa menentang kejahatan-kejahatan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make not provision for the flesh, to fulfil the lusts thereof.
target: Tetapi kenakanlah Tuhan Yesus Kristus sebagai perlengkapan senjata terang dan janganlah merawat tubuhmu untuk memuaskan keinginannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Rejoice with them that do rejoice, and weep with them that weep.
target: Bersukacitalah dengan orang yang bersukacita, dan menangislah dengan orang yang menangis!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Peter, fastening his eyes upon him with John, said, Look on us.
target: Mereka menatap dia dan Petrus berkata: "Lihatlah kepada kami."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the people were amazed, and said, Is not this the son of David?
target: Maka takjublah sekalian orang banyak itu, katanya: "Ia ini agaknya Anak Daud."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Felix heard these things, having more perfect knowledge of that way, he deferred them, and said, When Lysias the chief captain shall come down, I will know the uttermost of your matter.
target: Tetapi Feliks yang tahu benar-benar akan Jalan Tuhan, menangguhkan perkara mereka, katanya: "Setibanya kepala pasukan Lisias di sini, aku akan mengambil keputusan dalam perkaramu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jacob dwelt in the land wherein his father was a stranger, in the land of Canaan.
target: Adapun Yakub, ia diam di negeri penumpangan ayahnya, yakni di tanah Kanaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they saw the God of Israel: and there was under his feet as it were a paved work of a sapphire stone, and as it were the body of heaven in his clearness.
target: Lalu mereka melihat Allah Israel; kaki-Nya berjejak pada sesuatu yang buatannya seperti lantai dari batu nilam dan yang terangnya seperti langit yang cerah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, Thus saith the LORD God of Israel, Put every man his sword by his side, and go in and out from gate to gate throughout the camp, and slay every man his brother, and every man his companion, and every man his neighbour.
target: Berkatalah ia kepada mereka: "Beginilah firman TUHAN, Allah Israel: Baiklah kamu masing-masing mengikatkan pedangnya pada pinggangnya dan berjalanlah kian ke mari melalui perkemahan itu dari pintu gerbang ke pintu gerbang, dan biarlah masing-masing membunuh saudaranya dan temannya dan tetangganya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then all the princes of the sea shall come down from their thrones, and lay away their robes, and put off their broidered garments: they shall clothe themselves with trembling; they shall sit upon the ground, and shall tremble at every moment, and be astonished at thee.
target: Semua pemuka bangsa-bangsa yang di tepi lautan akan turun takhta dan menjauhkan jubah-jubah kerajaannya dan menanggalkan pakaiannya yang berwarna-warna. Mereka akan diliputi kegentaran dan akan duduk di tanah; mereka akan gentar senantiasa dan kaget melihat engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Can a woman forget her sucking child, that she should not have compassion on the son of her womb? yea, they may forget, yet will I not forget thee.
target: Dapatkah seorang perempuan melupakan bayinya, sehingga ia tidak menyayangi anak dari kandungannya? Sekalipun dia melupakannya, Aku tidak akan melupakan engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt make the staves of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold.
target: Haruslah kaubuat kayu pengusung itu dari kayu penaga dan kausalutlah dengan emas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hast neither part nor lot in this matter: for thy heart is not right in the sight of God.
target: Tidak ada bagian atau hakmu dalam perkara ini, sebab hatimu tidak lurus di hadapan Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he did that which was evil in the eyes of the LORD, according to all that Jehoiakim had done.
target: Ia melakukan apa yang jahat di mata TUHAN tepat seperti yang telah dilakukan Yoyakim.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And did all eat the same spiritual meat;
target: Mereka semua makan makanan rohani yang sama

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I have kept the ways of the LORD, and have not wickedly departed from my God.
target: TUHAN memperlakukan aku sesuai dengan kebenaranku, Ia membalas kepadaku sesuai dengan kesucian tanganku,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD bringeth the counsel of the heathen to nought: he maketh the devices of the people of none effect.
target: TUHAN menggagalkan rencana bangsa-bangsa; Ia meniadakan rancangan suku-suku bangsa;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But when the Comforter is come, whom I will send unto you from the Father, even the Spirit of truth, which proceedeth from the Father, he shall testify of me:
target: Jikalau Penghibur yang akan Kuutus dari Bapa datang, yaitu Roh Kebenaran yang keluar dari Bapa, Ia akan bersaksi tentang Aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore our elders and all the inhabitants of our country spake to us, saying, Take victuals with you for the journey, and go to meet them, and say unto them, We are your servants: therefore now make ye a league with us.
target: Sebab itu para tua-tua kami dan seluruh penduduk negeri kami berkata kepada kami, demikian: Bawalah bekal untuk di jalan dan pergilah menemui mereka dan berkatalah kepada mereka: Kami ini hamba-hambamu, maka sekarang ikatlah perjanjian dengan kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And at that time were some appointed over the chambers for the treasures, for the offerings, for the firstfruits, and for the tithes, to gather into them out of the fields of the cities the portions of the law for the priests and Levites: for Judah rejoiced for the priests and for the Levites that waited.
target: Pada masa itu beberapa orang diangkat untuk mengawasi bilik-bilik perbendaharaan, bilik-bilik untuk persembahan khusus, untuk hasil pertama dan untuk persembahan persepuluhan, supaya sumbangan yang menurut hukum menjadi bagian para imam dan orang-orang Lewi dikumpulkan di bilik-bilik itu sesuai dengan ladang setiap kota. Sebab Yehuda bersukacita karena para imam dan orang-orang Lewi yang bertugas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abimelech rose up, and all the people that were with him, by night, and they laid wait against Shechem in four companies.
target: Sebab itu berangkatlah Abimelekh pada waktu malam beserta segala rakyat yang bersama-sama dengan dia, lalu mereka mengadakan penghadangan dalam empat pasukan untuk melawan Sikhem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: We have heard with our ears, O God, our fathers have told us, what work thou didst in their days, in the times of old.
target: Untuk pemimpin biduan. Dari bani Korah. Nyanyian pengajaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But she had brought them up to the roof of the house, and hid them with the stalks of flax, which she had laid in order upon the roof.
target: Tetapi perempuan itu telah menyuruh keduanya naik ke sotoh rumah dan menyembunyikan mereka di bawah timbunan batang rami, yang ditebarkan di atas sotoh itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Why saidst thou, She is my sister? so I might have taken her to me to wife: now therefore behold thy wife, take her, and go thy way.
target: Mengapa engkau katakan: dia adikku, sehingga aku mengambilnya menjadi isteriku? Sekarang, inilah isterimu, ambillah dan pergilah!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Howl, ye shepherds, and cry; and wallow yourselves in the ashes, ye principal of the flock: for the days of your slaughter and of your dispersions are accomplished; and ye shall fall like a pleasant vessel.
target: Mengeluh dan berteriaklah, hai para gembala! Berguling-gulinglah dalam debu, hai pemimpin-pemimpin kawanan kambing domba! Sebab sudah genap waktunya kamu akan disembelih, dan kamu akan rebah seperti domba jantan pilihan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I will set mine eyes upon them for good, and I will bring them again to this land: and I will build them, and not pull them down; and I will plant them, and not pluck them up.
target: Maka Aku akan mengarahkan mata-Ku kepada mereka untuk kebaikan mereka, dan Aku akan membawa mereka kembali ke negeri ini. Aku akan membangun mereka, bukan meruntuhkannya; Aku akan menanam, bukan mencabutnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And levy a tribute unto the LORD of the men of war which went out to battle: one soul of five hundred, both of the persons, and of the beeves, and of the asses, and of the sheep:
target: Dan engkau harus mengkhususkan upeti bagi TUHAN dari para prajurit yang keluar bertempur itu, yakni satu dari setiap lima ratus, baik dari manusia, baik dari lembu, dari keledai dan dari kambing domba;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: See therefore, and take knowledge of all the lurking places where he hideth himself, and come ye again to me with the certainty, and I will go with you: and it shall come to pass, if he be in the land, that I will search him out throughout all the thousands of Judah.
target: Berusahalah mengetahui segala tempat persembunyiannya. Kemudian datanglah kembali kepadaku dengan kabar yang pasti; dan aku akan pergi bersama-sama dengan kamu. Sesungguhnya, jika ia ada di dalam negeri, maka aku akan meneliti dia di antara segala ribuan orang Yehuda."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all their villages that were round about the same cities, unto Baal. These were their habitations, and their genealogy.
target: juga segala desanya yang di sekitar perkampungan-perkampungan itu sampai ke Baal. Itulah tempat-tempat kediaman mereka dan mereka mempunyai silsilahnya sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: (The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them;) he was of Arimathaea, a city of the Jews: who also himself waited for the kingdom of God.
target: Ia tidak setuju dengan putusan dan tindakan Majelis itu. Ia berasal dari Arimatea, sebuah kota Yahudi dan ia menanti-nantikan Kerajaan Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and the sons of David were chief about the king.
target: Benaya bin Yoyada menjadi panglima orang Kreti dan orang Pleti; dan anak-anak Daud adalah orang-orang utama yang diperbantukan kepada raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O LORD God of hosts, hear my prayer: give ear, O God of Jacob. Selah.
target: Mereka berjalan makin lama makin kuat, hendak menghadap Allah di Sion.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said the LORD unto me, What seest thou, Jeremiah? And I said, Figs; the good figs, very good; and the evil, very evil, that cannot be eaten, they are so evil.
target: Lalu berfirmanlah TUHAN kepadaku: "Apakah yang kaulihat, hai Yeremia?" Maka jawabku: "Buah ara! Buah ara yang baik itu sangat baik, dan buah ara yang jelek, yang tak dapat dimakan karena jeleknya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then ye shall come up after him, that he may come and sit upon my throne; for he shall be king in my stead: and I have appointed him to be ruler over Israel and over Judah.
target: Sesudah itu kamu berjalan pulang dengan mengiring dia; lalu ia akan masuk dan duduk di atas takhtaku, sebab dialah yang harus naik takhta menggantikan aku, dan dialah yang kutunjuk menjadi raja atas Israel dan Yehuda."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who then is a faithful and wise servant, whom his lord hath made ruler over his household, to give them meat in due season?
target: "Siapakah hamba yang setia dan bijaksana, yang diangkat oleh tuannya atas orang-orangnya untuk memberikan mereka makanan pada waktunya?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he led them forth by the right way, that they might go to a city of habitation.
target: Dibawa-Nya mereka menempuh jalan yang lurus, sehingga sampai ke kota tempat kediaman orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall be, if the wicked man be worthy to be beaten, that the judge shall cause him to lie down, and to be beaten before his face, according to his fault, by a certain number.
target: maka jika orang yang bersalah itu layak dipukul, haruslah hakim menyuruh dia meniarap dan menyuruh orang memukuli dia di depannya dengan sejumlah dera setimpal dengan kesalahannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: How many are the days of thy servant? when wilt thou execute judgment on them that persecute me?
target: Berapa lagi hari-hari hamba-Mu ini? Bilakah Engkau menghukum orang-orang yang mengejar aku?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As for the oblation of the firstfruits, ye shall offer them unto the LORD: but they shall not be burnt on the altar for a sweet savour.
target: Tetapi sebagai persembahan dari hasil pertama boleh kamu mempersembahkannya kepada TUHAN, hanya janganlah dibawa ke atas mezbah menjadi bau yang menyenangkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore we receiving a kingdom which cannot be moved, let us have grace, whereby we may serve God acceptably with reverence and godly fear:
target: Jadi, karena kita menerima kerajaan yang tidak tergoncangkan, marilah kita mengucap syukur dan beribadah kepada Allah menurut cara yang berkenan kepada-Nya, dengan hormat dan takut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Son of man, prophesy against the prophets of Israel that prophesy, and say thou unto them that prophesy out of their own hearts, Hear ye the word of the LORD;
target: "Hai anak manusia, bernubuatlah melawan nabi-nabi Israel, bernubuatlah dan katakanlah kepada mereka yang bernubuat sesuka hatinya saja: Dengarlah firman TUHAN!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joseph dwelt in Egypt, he, and his father's house: and Joseph lived an hundred and ten years.
target: Adapun Yusuf, ia tetap tinggal di Mesir beserta kaum keluarganya; dan Yusuf hidup seratus sepuluh tahun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Take away the dross from the silver, and there shall come forth a vessel for the finer.
target: Sisihkanlah sanga dari perak, maka keluarlah benda yang indah bagi pandai emas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if a man come presumptuously upon his neighbour, to slay him with guile; thou shalt take him from mine altar, that he may die.
target: Tetapi apabila seseorang berlaku angkara terhadap sesamanya, hingga ia membunuhnya dengan tipu daya, maka engkau harus mengambil orang itu dari mezbah-Ku, supaya ia mati dibunuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,
target: Yakim, Zikhri, Zabdi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Achish answered and said to David, I know that thou art good in my sight, as an angel of God: notwithstanding the princes of the Philistines have said, He shall not go up with us to the battle.
target: Lalu Akhis menjawab Daud: "Aku tahu, engkau ini memang kusukai seperti utusan Allah. Hanya, para panglima orang Filistin telah berkata: Ia tidak boleh pergi berperang bersama-sama dengan kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then take the box of oil, and pour it on his head, and say, Thus saith the LORD, I have anointed thee king over Israel. Then open the door, and flee, and tarry not.
target: Kemudian ambillah buli-buli berisi minyak itu, lalu tuangkan isinya ke atas kepalanya dan katakan: Beginilah firman TUHAN: Telah Kuurapi engkau menjadi raja atas Israel! Sesudah itu bukalah pintu, larilah dan jangan berlambat-lambat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Deliver my soul, O LORD, from lying lips, and from a deceitful tongue.
target: "Ya TUHAN, lepaskanlah aku dari pada bibir dusta, dari pada lidah penipu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the children of Israel walked in all the sins of Jeroboam which he did; they departed not from them;
target: Demikianlah orang Israel hidup menurut segala dosa yang telah dilakukan Yerobeam; mereka tidak menjauhinya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in the reign of Ahasuerus, in the beginning of his reign, wrote they unto him an accusation against the inhabitants of Judah and Jerusalem.
target: Pada zaman pemerintahan Ahasyweros, pada permulaan pemerintahannya, mereka menulis surat tuduhan terhadap orang-orang yang telah menetap di Yehuda dan di Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: At that day shall a man look to his Maker, and his eyes shall have respect to the Holy One of Israel.
target: Pada waktu itu manusia akan memandang kepada Dia yang menjadikannya, dan matanya akan melihat kepada Yang Mahakudus, Allah Israel;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The humble shall see this, and be glad: and your heart shall live that seek God.
target: pada pemandangan Allah itu lebih baik dari pada sapi jantan, dari pada lembu jantan yang bertanduk dan berkuku belah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall scourge him, and put him to death: and the third day he shall rise again.
target: dan mereka menyesah dan membunuh Dia, dan pada hari ketiga Ia akan bangkit."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his offering was one silver charger, the weight thereof was an hundred and thirty shekels, one silver bowl of seventy shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary; both of them were full of fine flour mingled with oil for a meat offering:
target: Persembahannya ialah satu pinggan perak, seratus tiga puluh syikal timbangannya, dan satu bokor penyiraman dari perak tujuh puluh syikal beratnya, ditimbang menurut syikal kudus, keduanya berisi tepung yang terbaik, diolah dengan minyak, untuk korban sajian;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD shall fight for you, and ye shall hold your peace.
target: TUHAN akan berperang untuk kamu, dan kamu akan diam saja."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It is time for thee, LORD, to work: for they have made void thy law.
target: Waktu untuk bertindak telah tiba bagi TUHAN; mereka telah merombak Taurat-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the man brought the men into Joseph's house, and gave them water, and they washed their feet; and he gave their asses provender.
target: Setelah orang itu membawa mereka ke dalam rumah Yusuf, diberikannyalah air, supaya mereka membasuh kaki; juga keledai mereka diberinya makan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O ye seed of Israel his servant, ye children of Jacob, his chosen ones.
target: hai anak cucu Israel, hamba-Nya, hai anak-anak Yakub, orang-orang pilihan-Nya!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Marvel not at this: for the hour is coming, in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice,
target: Janganlah kamu heran akan hal itu, sebab saatnya akan tiba, bahwa semua orang yang di dalam kuburan akan mendengar suara-Nya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I give you good doctrine, forsake ye not my law.
target: karena aku memberikan ilmu yang baik kepadamu; janganlah meninggalkan petunjukku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there went up with him both chariots and horsemen: and it was a very great company.
target: Baik kereta maupun orang-orang berkuda turut pergi ke sana bersama-sama dengan dia, sehingga iring-iringan itu sangat besar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let us go up against Judah, and vex it, and let us make a breach therein for us, and set a king in the midst of it, even the son of Tabeal:
target: Marilah kita maju menyerang Yehuda dan menakut-nakutinya serta merebutnya, kemudian mengangkat anak Tabeel sebagai raja di tengah-tengahnya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sons of Benjamin after their families: of Bela, the family of the Belaites: of Ashbel, the family of the Ashbelites: of Ahiram, the family of the Ahiramites:
target: Bani Benyamin, menurut kaum mereka, ialah: dari Bela kaum orang Bela; dari Asybel kaum orang Asybel; dari Ahiram kaum orang Ahiram;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now Jesus loved Martha, and her sister, and Lazarus.
target: Yesus memang mengasihi Marta dan kakaknya dan Lazarus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He shutteth his eyes to devise froward things: moving his lips he bringeth evil to pass.
target: Siapa memejamkan matanya, merencanakan tipu muslihat; siapa mengatupkan bibirnya, sudah melakukan kejahatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And after they were brought to Babylon, Jechonias begat Salathiel; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel;
target: Sesudah pembuangan ke Babel, Yekhonya memperanakkan Sealtiel, Sealtiel memperanakkan Zerubabel,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The bricks are fallen down, but we will build with hewn stones: the sycomores are cut down, but we will change them into cedars.
target: Maka TUHAN membangkitkan para panglima Rezin melawan mereka, dan menggerakkan musuh-musuh mereka:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Gird up thy loins now like a man: I will demand of thee, and declare thou unto me.
target: Amat-amatilah setiap orang yang congkak, tundukkanlah dia, dan hancurkanlah orang-orang fasik di tempatnya!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And her merchandise and her hire shall be holiness to the LORD: it shall not be treasured nor laid up; for her merchandise shall be for them that dwell before the LORD, to eat sufficiently, and for durable clothing.
target: Labanya dan upah sundalnya akan kudus bagi TUHAN, tidak akan ditahan atau disimpan, tetapi dengan labanya itu akan disediakan makanan yang cukup dan pakaian yang indah bagi orang-orang yang diam di hadapan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These are the families of Manasseh, and those that were numbered of them, fifty and two thousand and seven hundred.
target: Itulah kaum-kaum Manasye, dan orang-orang yang dicatat dari mereka berjumlah lima puluh dua ribu tujuh ratus orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Praise him upon the loud cymbals: praise him upon the high sounding cymbals.
target: Pujilah Dia dengan ceracap yang berdenting, pujilah Dia dengan ceracap yang berdentang!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The wicked man travaileth with pain all his days, and the number of years is hidden to the oppressor.
target: Orang fasik menggeletar sepanjang hidupnya, demikian juga orang lalim selama tahun-tahun yang disediakan baginya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if he give a gift of his inheritance to one of his servants, then it shall be his to the year of liberty; after it shall return to the prince: but his inheritance shall be his sons' for them.
target: Kalau ia memberikan pemberian dari milik pusakanya kepada salah seorang hambanya, maka itu menjadi kepunyaannya sampai tahun kebebasan, lalu harus kembali kepada raja itu; hanya anak-anak raja itu boleh mewarisi milik pusakanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For this shall the earth mourn, and the heavens above be black; because I have spoken it, I have purposed it, and will not repent, neither will I turn back from it.
target: Karena hal ini bumi akan berkabung, dan langit di atas akan menjadi gelap, sebab Aku telah mengatakannya, Aku telah merancangnya, Aku tidak akan menyesalinya dan tidak akan mundur dari pada itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And her prophets have daubed them with untempered morter, seeing vanity, and divining lies unto them, saying, Thus saith the Lord GOD, when the LORD hath not spoken.
target: Dan nabi-nabinya mengoles mereka dengan kapur dengan melihat penglihatan yang menipu dan memberi tenungan bohong bagi mereka; nabi-nabi itu berkata: Beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH! — tetapi TUHAN tidak berfirman.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing, but that rather a tumult was made, he took water, and washed his hands before the multitude, saying, I am innocent of the blood of this just person: see ye to it.
target: Ketika Pilatus melihat bahwa segala usaha akan sia-sia, malah sudah mulai timbul kekacauan, ia mengambil air dan membasuh tangannya di hadapan orang banyak dan berkata: "Aku tidak bersalah terhadap darah orang ini; itu urusan kamu sendiri!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said Jesus unto them plainly, Lazarus is dead.
target: Karena itu Yesus berkata dengan terus terang: "Lazarus sudah mati;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in the days of Joiakim were priests, the chief of the fathers: of Seraiah, Meraiah; of Jeremiah, Hananiah;
target: Pada zaman Yoyakim yang menjadi imam adalah kepala-kepala kaum keluarga ini: Meraya, dari kaum keluarga Seraya, Hananya dari kaum keluarga Yeremia,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall be eight boards, and their sockets of silver, sixteen sockets; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under another board.
target: Jadi harus ada delapan papan dengan alas peraknya: enam belas alas; dua alas di bawah satu papan dan seterusnya dua alas di bawah setiap papan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now when Solomon had made an end of praying, the fire came down from heaven, and consumed the burnt offering and the sacrifices; and the glory of the LORD filled the house.
target: Setelah Salomo mengakhiri doanya, api pun turun dari langit memakan habis korban bakaran dan korban-korban sembelihan itu, dan kemuliaan TUHAN memenuhi rumah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore I went about to cause my heart to despair of all the labour which I took under the sun.
target: Dengan demikian aku mulai putus asa terhadap segala usaha yang kulakukan dengan jerih payah di bawah matahari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus went up into a mountain, and there he sat with his disciples.
target: Dan Yesus naik ke atas gunung dan duduk di situ dengan murid-murid-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Israel enquired of the LORD, (for the ark of the covenant of God was there in those days,
target: Dan orang-orang Israel bertanya kepada TUHAN — pada waktu itu ada di sana tabut perjanjian Allah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But neither he, nor his servants, nor the people of the land, did hearken unto the words of the LORD, which he spake by the prophet Jeremiah.
target: Tetapi baik ia, baik pegawai-pegawainya maupun rakyat negeri itu, tidak mendengarkan firman yang disampaikan TUHAN dengan perantaraan nabi Yeremia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I polluted them in their own gifts, in that they caused to pass through the fire all that openeth the womb, that I might make them desolate, to the end that they might know that I am the LORD.
target: Aku membiarkan mereka menjadi najis dengan persembahan-persembahan mereka, dalam hal mereka mempersembahkan sebagai korban dalam api semua yang terdahulu lahir dari kandungan, supaya Kubuat mereka tertegun, agar mereka mengetahui bahwa Akulah TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They prevented me in the day of my calamity: but the LORD was my stay.
target: Mereka menghadang aku pada hari sialku, tetapi TUHAN adalah sandaran bagiku;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said I unto them, Cast ye away every man the abominations of his eyes, and defile not yourselves with the idols of Egypt: I am the LORD your God.
target: Dan Aku berkata kepada mereka: Biarlah setiap orang membuangkan dewa-dewanya yang menjijikkan, ke mana ia selalu melihat dan janganlah menajiskan dirimu dengan berhala-berhala Mesir; Akulah TUHAN, Allahmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit, because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God.
target: Dan Allah yang menyelidiki hati nurani, mengetahui maksud Roh itu, yaitu bahwa Ia, sesuai dengan kehendak Allah, berdoa untuk orang-orang kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The voice of the LORD is upon the waters: the God of glory thundereth: the LORD is upon many waters.
target: Suara TUHAN di atas air, Allah yang mulia mengguntur, TUHAN di atas air yang besar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the whole multitude of them arose, and led him unto Pilate.
target: Lalu bangkitlah seluruh sidang itu dan Yesus dibawa menghadap Pilatus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners, they said unto his disciples, How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners?
target: Pada waktu ahli-ahli Taurat dari golongan Farisi melihat, bahwa Ia makan dengan pemungut cukai dan orang berdosa itu, berkatalah mereka kepada murid-murid-Nya: "Mengapa Ia makan bersama-sama dengan pemungut cukai dan orang berdosa?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Magpiash, Meshullam, Hezir,
target: Magpias, Mesulam, Hezir,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But ye are they that forsake the LORD, that forget my holy mountain, that prepare a table for that troop, and that furnish the drink offering unto that number.
target: Tetapi kamu yang telah meninggalkan TUHAN, yang telah melupakan gunung-Ku yang kudus, yang menyajikan hidangan bagi dewa Gad, dan yang menyuguhkan anggur bercampur rempah bagi dewa Meni:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they had no child, because that Elisabeth was barren, and they both were now well stricken in years.
target: Tetapi mereka tidak mempunyai anak, sebab Elisabet mandul dan keduanya telah lanjut umurnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let them praise the name of the LORD: for his name alone is excellent; his glory is above the earth and heaven.
target: Biarlah semuanya memuji-muji TUHAN, sebab hanya nama-Nya saja yang tinggi luhur, keagungan-Nya mengatasi bumi dan langit.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For this cause the king was angry and very furious, and commanded to destroy all the wise men of Babylon.
target: Maka raja menjadi sangat geram dan murka karena hal itu, lalu dititahkannyalah untuk melenyapkan semua orang bijaksana di Babel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For godly sorrow worketh repentance to salvation not to be repented of: but the sorrow of the world worketh death.
target: Sebab dukacita menurut kehendak Allah menghasilkan pertobatan yang membawa keselamatan dan yang tidak akan disesalkan, tetapi dukacita yang dari dunia ini menghasilkan kematian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And king Solomon passed all the kings of the earth in riches and wisdom.
target: Raja Salomo melebihi semua raja di bumi dalam hal kekayaan dan hikmat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the Levites were numbered from the age of thirty years and upward: and their number by their polls, man by man, was thirty and eight thousand.
target: Lalu dihitunglah orang-orang Lewi, yang berumur tiga puluh tahun ke atas, dan jumlah orang-orang mereka, dihitung satu demi satu, ada tiga puluh delapan ribu orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, I will send you Elijah the prophet before the coming of the great and dreadful day of the LORD:
target: Sesungguhnya Aku akan mengutus nabi Elia kepadamu menjelang datangnya hari TUHAN yang besar dan dahsyat itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when Moses held up his hand, that Israel prevailed: and when he let down his hand, Amalek prevailed.
target: Dan terjadilah, apabila Musa mengangkat tangannya, lebih kuatlah Israel, tetapi apabila ia menurunkan tangannya, lebih kuatlah Amalek.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He delivered me from my strong enemy, and from them which hated me: for they were too strong for me.
target: Ia menjangkau dari tempat tinggi, mengambil aku, menarik aku dari banjir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in the days of Saul they made war with the Hagarites, who fell by their hand: and they dwelt in their tents throughout all the east land of Gilead.
target: Di zaman Saul mereka melakukan perang melawan orang Hagri; setelah orang-orang ini jatuh ke dalam tangan mereka, maka mereka diam di kemah-kemah orang-orang itu di seluruh sisi timur Gilead.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now I praise you, brethren, that ye remember me in all things, and keep the ordinances, as I delivered them to you.
target: Aku harus memuji kamu, sebab dalam segala sesuatu kamu tetap mengingat akan aku dan teguh berpegang pada ajaran yang kuteruskan kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have been young, and now am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.
target: Dahulu aku muda, sekarang telah menjadi tua, tetapi tidak pernah kulihat orang benar ditinggalkan, atau anak cucunya meminta-minta roti;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, while Saul talked unto the priest, that the noise that was in the host of the Philistines went on and increased: and Saul said unto the priest, Withdraw thine hand.
target: Tetapi sedang Saul berbicara kepada imam itu, maka kian lama kian bertambahlah keributan di perkemahan orang Filistin, sehingga Saul berkata pula kepada imam itu: "Biarlah!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel, (for he was the firstborn; but forasmuch as he defiled his father's bed, his birthright was given unto the sons of Joseph the son of Israel: and the genealogy is not to be reckoned after the birthright.
target: Anak-anak Ruben, anak sulung Israel. Dialah anak sulung, tetapi karena ia telah melanggar kesucian petiduran ayahnya, maka hak kesulungannya diberikan kepada keturunan dari Yusuf, anak Israel juga, sekalipun tidak tercatat dalam silsilah sebagai anak sulung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And again he sent a third: and they wounded him also, and cast him out.
target: Selanjutnya ia menyuruh hamba yang ketiga, tetapi orang itu juga dilukai oleh mereka, lalu dilemparkan ke luar kebun itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Sheva was scribe: and Zadok and Abiathar were the priests:
target: Seya menjadi panitera negara; Zadok dan Abyatar menjadi imam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The dead praise not the LORD, neither any that go down into silence.
target: Bukan orang-orang mati akan memuji-muji TUHAN, dan bukan semua orang yang turun ke tempat sunyi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now for a long season Israel hath been without the true God, and without a teaching priest, and without law.
target: Lama sekali Israel tanpa Allah yang benar, tanpa ajaran dari pada imam dan tanpa hukum.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A little one shall become a thousand, and a small one a strong nation: I the LORD will hasten it in his time.
target: Yang paling kecil akan menjadi kaum yang besar, dan yang paling lemah akan menjadi bangsa yang kuat; Aku, TUHAN, akan melaksanakannya dengan segera pada waktunya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree, and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus.
target: Karena mereka yang melayani dengan baik beroleh kedudukan yang baik sehingga dalam iman kepada Kristus Yesus mereka dapat bersaksi dengan leluasa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David said unto Abiathar, I knew it that day, when Doeg the Edomite was there, that he would surely tell Saul: I have occasioned the death of all the persons of thy father's house.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And afterward, saith the LORD, I will deliver Zedekiah king of Judah, and his servants, and the people, and such as are left in this city from the pestilence, from the sword, and from the famine, into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, and into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of those that seek their life: and he shall smite them with the edge of the sword; he shall not spare them, neither have pity, nor have mercy.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The God of my rock; in him will I trust: he is my shield, and the horn of my salvation, my high tower, and my refuge, my saviour; thou savest me from violence.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said unto Moses, Whosoever hath sinned against me, him will I blot out of my book.
