en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also thou shalt not oppress a stranger: for ye know the heart of a stranger, seeing ye were strangers in the land of Egypt.
target: Orang asing janganlah kamu tekan, karena kamu sendiri telah mengenal keadaan jiwa orang asing, sebab kamu pun dahulu adalah orang asing di tanah Mesir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the rulers brought onyx stones, and stones to be set, for the ephod, and for the breastplate;
target: Pemimpin-pemimpin membawa permata krisopras dan permata tatahan untuk baju efod dan untuk tutup dada,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: His eyes are as the eyes of doves by the rivers of waters, washed with milk, and fitly set.
target: Matanya bagaikan merpati pada batang air, bermandi dalam susu, duduk pada kolam yang penuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the Philistines gathered together all their armies to Aphek: and the Israelites pitched by a fountain which is in Jezreel.
target: Orang Filistin mengumpulkan segala tentara mereka ke Afek, sedang orang Israel berkemah dekat mata air yang di Yizreel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou leddest thy people like a flock by the hand of Moses and Aaron.
target: Melalui laut jalan-Mu dan lorong-Mu melalui muka air yang luas, tetapi jejak-Mu tidak kelihatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king said to him, How many times shall I adjure thee that thou say nothing but the truth to me in the name of the LORD?
target: Tetapi raja berkata kepadanya: "Sampai berapa kali aku menyuruh engkau bersumpah, supaya engkau mengatakan kepadaku tidak lain dari kebenaran?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Looking for and hasting unto the coming of the day of God, wherein the heavens being on fire shall be dissolved, and the elements shall melt with fervent heat?
target: yaitu kamu yang menantikan dan mempercepat kedatangan hari Allah. Pada hari itu langit akan binasa dalam api dan unsur-unsur dunia akan hancur karena nyalanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if a woman approach unto any beast, and lie down thereto, thou shalt kill the woman, and the beast: they shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them.
target: Bila seorang perempuan menghampiri binatang apa pun untuk berkelamin, haruslah kaubunuh perempuan dan binatang itu; mereka pasti dihukum mati dan darah mereka tertimpa kepada mereka sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne, and lay them on men's shoulders; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers.
target: Mereka mengikat beban-beban berat, lalu meletakkannya di atas bahu orang, tetapi mereka sendiri tidak mau menyentuhnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he received them at their hand, and fashioned it with a graving tool, after he had made it a molten calf: and they said, These be thy gods, O Israel, which brought thee up out of the land of Egypt.
target: Diterimanyalah itu dari tangan mereka, dibentuknya dengan pahat, dan dibuatnyalah dari padanya anak lembu tuangan. Kemudian berkatalah mereka: "Hai Israel, inilah Allahmu, yang telah menuntun engkau keluar dari tanah Mesir!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Counsel in the heart of man is like deep water; but a man of understanding will draw it out.
target: Rancangan di dalam hati manusia itu seperti air yang dalam, tetapi orang yang pandai tahu menimbanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The wind shall eat up all thy pastors, and thy lovers shall go into captivity: surely then shalt thou be ashamed and confounded for all thy wickedness.
target: Semua orang yang menggembalakan kamu akan dihalau angin ribut, dan para kekasihmu akan diangkut tertawan. Pada waktu itu engkau akan menjadi malu dan bernoda dari sebab segala kejahatanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Mercy unto you, and peace, and love, be multiplied.
target: Rahmat, damai sejahtera dan kasih kiranya melimpahi kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And these were the heads of the house of their fathers, even Epher, and Ishi, and Eliel, and Azriel, and Jeremiah, and Hodaviah, and Jahdiel, mighty men of valour, famous men, and heads of the house of their fathers.
target: Inilah para kepala puak-puak mereka: Hefer, Yisei, Eliel, Azriel, Yeremia, Hodawya dan Yahdiel, orang-orang pahlawan yang gagah perkasa, orang-orang yang kenamaan, para kepala puak-puak mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard left of the poor of the people, which had nothing, in the land of Judah, and gave them vineyards and fields at the same time.
target: Tetapi sebagian dari rakyat, yakni orang-orang miskin yang tidak mempunyai apa-apa, ditinggalkan di tanah Yehuda oleh Nebuzaradan, kepala pasukan pengawal. Pada waktu itu juga diberikannyalah kebun-kebun anggur dan ladang-ladang kepada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore I will yet plead with you, saith the LORD, and with your children's children will I plead.
target: Sebab itu Aku akan berbantah lagi dengan kamu, demikianlah firman TUHAN, dan dengan anak cucumu Aku akan berbantah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if I live in the flesh, this is the fruit of my labour: yet what I shall choose I wot not.
target: Tetapi jika aku harus hidup di dunia ini, itu berarti bagiku bekerja memberi buah. Jadi mana yang harus kupilih, aku tidak tahu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who will bring me into the strong city? who will lead me into Edom?
target: Moab ialah tempat pembasuhan-Ku, kepada Edom Aku melemparkan kasut-Ku, dan karena Filistea Aku bersorak-sorai."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I am my beloved's, and my beloved is mine: he feedeth among the lilies.
target: Aku kepunyaan kekasihku, dan kepunyaanku kekasihku, yang menggembalakan domba di tengah-tengah bunga bakung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All things are lawful unto me, but all things are not expedient: all things are lawful for me, but I will not be brought under the power of any.
target: Segala sesuatu halal bagiku, tetapi bukan semuanya berguna. Segala sesuatu halal bagiku, tetapi aku tidak membiarkan diriku diperhamba oleh suatu apa pun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jonathan said to the young man that bare his armour, Come, and let us go over unto the garrison of these uncircumcised: it may be that the LORD will work for us: for there is no restraint to the LORD to save by many or by few.
target: Berkatalah Yonatan kepada bujang pembawa senjatanya itu: "Mari kita menyeberang ke dekat pasukan pengawal orang-orang yang tidak bersunat ini. Mungkin TUHAN akan bertindak untuk kita, sebab bagi TUHAN tidak sukar untuk menolong, baik dengan banyak orang maupun dengan sedikit orang."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thy word is true from the beginning: and every one of thy righteous judgments endureth for ever.
target: Dasar firman-Mu adalah kebenaran dan segala hukum-hukum-Mu yang adil adalah untuk selama-lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Noah lived after the flood three hundred and fifty years.
target: Nuh masih hidup tiga ratus lima puluh tahun sesudah air bah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Howbeit they did not hearken, but they did after their former manner.
target: Tetapi mereka tidak mau mendengarkan, melainkan mereka berbuat sesuai dengan adat mereka yang dahulu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But my mercy shall not depart away from him, as I took it from Saul, whom I put away before thee.
target: Tetapi kasih setia-Ku tidak akan hilang dari padanya, seperti yang Kuhilangkan dari pada Saul, yang telah Kujauhkan dari hadapanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus answered, Are there not twelve hours in the day? If any man walk in the day, he stumbleth not, because he seeth the light of this world.
target: Jawab Yesus: "Bukankah ada dua belas jam dalam satu hari? Siapa yang berjalan pada siang hari, kakinya tidak terantuk, karena ia melihat terang dunia ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion.
target: Semua orang yang membenci Sion akan mendapat malu dan akan mundur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Three bowls made after the fashion of almonds in one branch, a knop and a flower; and three bowls made like almonds in another branch, a knop and a flower: so throughout the six branches going out of the candlestick.
target: Tiga kelopak yang berupa bunga badam pada cabang yang satu — dengan tombol dan kembangnya — dan tiga kelopak yang serupa pada cabang yang lain — dengan tombol dan kembangnya —; demikian juga dibuat keenam cabang yang timbul dari kandil itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: How thy garments are warm, when he quieteth the earth by the south wind?
target: hai engkau, yang pakaiannya menjadi panas, jika bumi terdiam karena panasnya angin selatan?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the angel answered and said unto her, The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee, and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee: therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God.
target: Jawab malaikat itu kepadanya: "Roh Kudus akan turun atasmu dan kuasa Allah Yang Mahatinggi akan menaungi engkau; sebab itu anak yang akan kaulahirkan itu akan disebut kudus, Anak Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt put some of thine honour upon him, that all the congregation of the children of Israel may be obedient.
target: dan berilah dia sebagian dari kewibawaanmu, supaya segenap umat Israel mendengarkan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They that fear thee will be glad when they see me; because I have hoped in thy word.
target: Orang-orang yang takut kepada-Mu melihat aku dan bersukacita, sebab aku berharap kepada firman-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This thou knowest, that all they which are in Asia be turned away from me; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes.
target: Engkau tahu bahwa semua mereka yang di daerah Asia Kecil berpaling dari padaku; termasuk Figelus dan Hermogenes.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he cometh home, he calleth together his friends and neighbours, saying unto them, Rejoice with me; for I have found my sheep which was lost.
target: dan setibanya di rumah ia memanggil sahabat-sahabat dan tetangga-tetangganya serta berkata kepada mereka: Bersukacitalah bersama-sama dengan aku, sebab dombaku yang hilang itu telah kutemukan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany, where Lazarus was, which had been dead, whom he raised from the dead.
target: Enam hari sebelum Paskah Yesus datang ke Betania, tempat tinggal Lazarus yang dibangkitkan Yesus dari antara orang mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall destroy the walls of Tyrus, and break down her towers: I will also scrape her dust from her, and make her like the top of a rock.
target: Mereka akan memusnahkan tembok-tembok Tirus dan meruntuhkan menara-menaranya, debu tanahnya akan Kubuang sampai bersih dari padanya dan akan Kujadikan dia gunung batu yang gundul.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Their tongue is as an arrow shot out; it speaketh deceit: one speaketh peaceably to his neighbour with his mouth, but in heart he layeth his wait.
target: Lidah mereka adalah anak panah yang membunuh, perkataan dari mulutnya adalah tipu; mereka berbicara damai dengan temannya, tetapi dalam hatinya mereka merancang pengadangan terhadapnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: On that day the LORD magnified Joshua in the sight of all Israel; and they feared him, as they feared Moses, all the days of his life.
target: Pada waktu itulah TUHAN membesarkan nama Yosua di mata seluruh orang Israel, sehingga mereka takut kepadanya, seperti mereka takut kepada Musa seumur hidupnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And next unto them repaired Jedaiah the son of Harumaph, even over against his house. And next unto him repaired Hattush the son of Hashabniah.
target: Berdekatan dengan dia Yedaya bin Harumaf mengadakan perbaikan, tepat di depan rumahnya, dan berdekatan dengan dia Hatus bin Hasabneya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover he called for a famine upon the land: he brake the whole staff of bread.
target: Ketika Ia mendatangkan kelaparan ke atas negeri itu, dan menghancurkan seluruh persediaan makanan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the voice answered me again from heaven, What God hath cleansed, that call not thou common.
target: Akan tetapi untuk kedua kalinya suara dari sorga berkata kepadaku: Apa yang dinyatakan halal oleh Allah, tidak boleh engkau nyatakan haram!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost.
target: Sebab Anak Manusia datang untuk mencari dan menyelamatkan yang hilang."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Much food is in the tillage of the poor: but there is that is destroyed for want of judgment.
target: Huma orang miskin menghasilkan banyak makanan, tetapi ada yang lenyap karena tidak ada keadilan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Enoch walked with God: and he was not; for God took him.
target: Dan Henokh hidup bergaul dengan Allah, lalu ia tidak ada lagi, sebab ia telah diangkat oleh Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany, at the mount called the mount of Olives, he sent two of his disciples,
target: Ketika Ia telah dekat Betfage dan Betania, yang terletak di gunung yang bernama Bukit Zaitun, Yesus menyuruh dua orang murid-Nya

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I wisdom dwell with prudence, and find out knowledge of witty inventions.
target: Aku, hikmat, tinggal bersama-sama dengan kecerdasan, dan aku mendapat pengetahuan dan kebijaksanaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of fowls also of the air by sevens, the male and the female; to keep seed alive upon the face of all the earth.
target: juga dari burung-burung di udara tujuh pasang, jantan dan betina, supaya terpelihara hidup keturunannya di seluruh bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will cast abominable filth upon thee, and make thee vile, and will set thee as a gazingstock.
target: Aku akan melemparkan barang keji ke atasmu, akan menghina engkau dan akan membuat engkau menjadi tontonan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then asked they him, What man is that which said unto thee, Take up thy bed, and walk?
target: Mereka bertanya kepadanya: "Siapakah orang itu yang berkata kepadamu: Angkatlah tilammu dan berjalanlah?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when inquisition was made of the matter, it was found out; therefore they were both hanged on a tree: and it was written in the book of the chronicles before the king.
target: Perkara itu diperiksa dan ternyata benar, maka kedua orang itu disulakan pada tiang. Dan peristiwa itu dituliskan di dalam kitab sejarah, di hadapan raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Speak not evil one of another, brethren. He that speaketh evil of his brother, and judgeth his brother, speaketh evil of the law, and judgeth the law: but if thou judge the law, thou art not a doer of the law, but a judge.
target: Saudara-saudaraku, janganlah kamu saling memfitnah! Barangsiapa memfitnah saudaranya atau menghakiminya, ia mencela hukum dan menghakiminya; dan jika engkau menghakimi hukum, maka engkau bukanlah penurut hukum, tetapi hakimnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The voice of the LORD maketh the hinds to calve, and discovereth the forests: and in his temple doth every one speak of his glory.
target: Suara TUHAN membuat beranak rusa betina yang mengandung, bahkan, hutan digundulinya; dan di dalam bait-Nya setiap orang berseru: "Hormat!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And then if any man shall say to you, Lo, here is Christ; or, lo, he is there; believe him not:
target: Pada waktu itu jika orang berkata kepada kamu: Lihat, Mesias ada di sini, atau: Lihat, Mesias ada di sana, jangan kamu percaya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now Sarai Abram's wife bare him no children: and she had an handmaid, an Egyptian, whose name was Hagar.
target: Adapun Sarai, isteri Abram itu, tidak beranak. Ia mempunyai seorang hamba perempuan, orang Mesir, Hagar namanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of the tribe of Ephraim, Oshea the son of Nun.
target: dari suku Efraim: Hosea bin Nun;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sacrifice of the wicked is an abomination to the LORD: but the prayer of the upright is his delight.
target: Korban orang fasik adalah kekejian bagi TUHAN, tetapi doa orang jujur dikenan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD; If ye can break my covenant of the day, and my covenant of the night, and that there should not be day and night in their season;
target: "Beginilah firman TUHAN: Jika kamu dapat mengingkari perjanjian-Ku dengan siang dan perjanjian-Ku dengan malam, sehingga siang dan malam tidak datang lagi pada waktunya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For they have not served thee in their kingdom, and in thy great goodness that thou gavest them, and in the large and fat land which thou gavest before them, neither turned they from their wicked works.
target: Dalam kedudukan sebagai raja mereka tidak mau beribadah kepada-Mu, walaupun Engkau telah mengaruniakan kepada mereka banyak kebaikan dan telah menyediakan bagi mereka tanah yang luas dan subur. Mereka tidak berbalik dari perbuatan-perbuatan mereka yang jahat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: We have an altar, whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle.
target: Kita mempunyai suatu mezbah dan orang-orang yang melayani kemah tidak boleh makan dari apa yang di dalamnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they said, The God of the Hebrews hath met with us: let us go, we pray thee, three days' journey into the desert, and sacrifice unto the LORD our God; lest he fall upon us with pestilence, or with the sword.
target: Lalu kata mereka: "Allah orang Ibrani telah menemui kami; izinkanlah kiranya kami pergi ke padang gurun tiga hari perjalanan jauhnya, untuk mempersembahkan korban kepada TUHAN, Allah kami, supaya jangan nanti mendatangkan kepada kami penyakit sampar atau pedang."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will sanctify the tabernacle of the congregation, and the altar: I will sanctify also both Aaron and his sons, to minister to me in the priest's office.
target: Aku akan menguduskan Kemah Pertemuan dan mezbah itu, lalu Harun dan anak-anaknya akan Kukuduskan supaya mereka memegang jabatan imam bagi-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the name of the man was Elimelech, and the name of his wife Naomi, and the name of his two sons Mahlon and Chilion, Ephrathites of Bethlehemjudah. And they came into the country of Moab, and continued there.
target: Nama orang itu ialah Elimelekh, nama isterinya Naomi dan nama kedua anaknya Mahlon dan Kilyon, semuanya orang-orang Efrata dari Betlehem-Yehuda; dan setelah sampai ke daerah Moab, diamlah mereka di sana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: By night on my bed I sought him whom my soul loveth: I sought him, but I found him not.
target: Di atas ranjangku pada malam hari kucari jantung hatiku. Kucari, tetapi tak kutemui dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For ye had compassion of me in my bonds, and took joyfully the spoiling of your goods, knowing in yourselves that ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance.
target: Memang kamu telah turut mengambil bagian dalam penderitaan orang-orang hukuman dan ketika harta kamu dirampas, kamu menerima hal itu dengan sukacita, sebab kamu tahu, bahwa kamu memiliki harta yang lebih baik dan yang lebih menetap sifatnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For your obedience is come abroad unto all men. I am glad therefore on your behalf: but yet I would have you wise unto that which is good, and simple concerning evil.
target: Kabar tentang ketaatanmu telah terdengar oleh semua orang. Sebab itu aku bersukacita tentang kamu. Tetapi aku ingin supaya kamu bijaksana terhadap apa yang baik, dan bersih terhadap apa yang jahat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, God is mine helper: the Lord is with them that uphold my soul.
target: Ya Allah, dengarkanlah doaku, berilah telinga kepada ucapan mulutku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath.
target: Pada suatu kali Yesus sedang mengajar dalam salah satu rumah ibadat pada hari Sabat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And said unto them, Ye shall not bring in the captives hither: for whereas we have offended against the LORD already, ye intend to add more to our sins and to our trespass: for our trespass is great, and there is fierce wrath against Israel.
target: dan berkata kepada mereka: "Jangan bawa tawanan-tawanan itu ke mari, sebab maksudmu itu menjadikan kita bersalah terhadap TUHAN dan menambah dosa dan kesalahan kita! Sudah cukup besar kesalahan kita, dan murka yang menyala-nyala telah menimpa Israel."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Only Jonathan the son of Asahel and Jahaziah the son of Tikvah were employed about this matter: and Meshullam and Shabbethai the Levite helped them.
target: Hanya Yonatan bin Asael, dan Yahzeya bin Tikwa, berdiri menentang perkara itu, disokong oleh Mesulam dan Sabetai, orang Lewi itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as some spake of the temple, how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts, he said,
target: Ketika beberapa orang berbicara tentang Bait Allah dan mengagumi bangunan itu yang dihiasi dengan batu yang indah-indah dan dengan berbagai-bagai barang persembahan, berkatalah Yesus:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass the second day after he had slain Gedaliah, and no man knew it,
target: Esok harinya sesudah ia membunuh Gedalya — ketika itu belum ada yang tahu —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Dan set up the graven image: and Jonathan, the son of Gershom, the son of Manasseh, he and his sons were priests to the tribe of Dan until the day of the captivity of the land.
target: Bani Dan menegakkan bagi mereka sendiri patung pahatan itu, lalu Yonatan bin Gersom bin Musa bersama-sama dengan anak-anaknya menjadi imam bagi suku Dan, sampai penduduk negeri itu diangkut sebagai orang buangan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abraham was an hundred years old, when his son Isaac was born unto him.
target: Adapun Abraham berumur seratus tahun, ketika Ishak, anaknya, lahir baginya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I suppose therefore that this is good for the present distress, I say, that it is good for a man so to be.
target: Aku berpendapat, bahwa, mengingat waktu darurat sekarang, adalah baik bagi manusia untuk tetap dalam keadaannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Micaiah said, As the LORD liveth, even what my God saith, that will I speak.
target: Tetapi Mikha menjawab: "Demi TUHAN yang hidup, sesungguhnya, apa yang akan difirmankan Allahku, itulah yang akan kukatakan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: House and riches are the inheritance of fathers: and a prudent wife is from the LORD.
target: Rumah dan harta adalah warisan nenek moyang, tetapi isteri yang berakal budi adalah karunia TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abram said to the king of Sodom, I have lift up mine hand unto the LORD, the most high God, the possessor of heaven and earth,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Again the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
target: Lalu datanglah firman TUHAN kepadaku:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the angel answered and said unto me, These are the four spirits of the heavens, which go forth from standing before the LORD of all the earth.
target: Berbicaralah malaikat itu kepadaku: "Semuanya ini keluar ke arah keempat mata angin, sesudah mereka menghadap kepada Tuhan seluruh bumi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The wicked, through the pride of his countenance, will not seek after God: God is not in all his thoughts.
target: Kata orang fasik itu dengan batang hidungnya ke atas: "Allah tidak akan menuntut! Tidak ada Allah!", itulah seluruh pikirannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In thoughts from the visions of the night, when deep sleep falleth on men,
target: waktu bermenung oleh sebab khayal malam, ketika tidur nyenyak menghinggapi orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God said, Let the earth bring forth the living creature after his kind, cattle, and creeping thing, and beast of the earth after his kind: and it was so.
target: Berfirmanlah Allah: "Hendaklah bumi mengeluarkan segala jenis makhluk yang hidup, ternak dan binatang melata dan segala jenis binatang liar." Dan jadilah demikian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For we can do nothing against the truth, but for the truth.
target: Karena kami tidak dapat berbuat apa-apa melawan kebenaran; yang dapat kami perbuat ialah untuk kebenaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For they persecute him whom thou hast smitten; and they talk to the grief of those whom thou hast wounded.
target: Biarlah perkemahan mereka menjadi sunyi, dan biarlah kemah-kemah mereka tidak ada penghuninya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let my sentence come forth from thy presence; let thine eyes behold the things that are equal.
target: Dari pada-Mulah kiranya datang penghakiman: mata-Mu kiranya melihat apa yang benar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if ye shall despise my statutes, or if your soul abhor my judgments, so that ye will not do all my commandments, but that ye break my covenant:
target: jikalau kamu menolak ketetapan-Ku dan hatimu muak mendengar peraturan-Ku, sehingga kamu tidak melakukan segala perintah-Ku dan kamu mengingkari perjanjian-Ku,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It shall come to pass, when he seeth that the lad is not with us, that he will die: and thy servants shall bring down the gray hairs of thy servant our father with sorrow to the grave.
target: tentulah akan terjadi, apabila dilihatnya anak itu tidak ada, bahwa ia akan mati, dan hamba-hambamu ini akan menyebabkan hambamu, ayah kami yang ubanan itu, turun ke dunia orang mati karena dukacita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I will send a fire upon Teman, which shall devour the palaces of Bozrah.
target: Aku akan melepas api ke dalam T'eman, sehingga puri Bozra dimakan habis."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Gomer; Ashchenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.
target: Keturunan Gomer ialah Askenas, Difat dan Togarma.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore the abundance they have gotten, and that which they have laid up, shall they carry away to the brook of the willows.
target: Sebab itu segala harta yang mereka tumpuk dan segala yang mereka simpan mereka bawa ke seberang sungai Haarabim.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord, that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep.
target: Ini kami katakan kepadamu dengan firman Tuhan: kita yang hidup, yang masih tinggal sampai kedatangan Tuhan, sekali-kali tidak akan mendahului mereka yang telah meninggal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They were amazed, they answered no more: they left off speaking.
target: Mereka bingung, mereka tidak dapat memberi sanggahan lagi, mereka tidak dapat berbicara lagi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore the word of the LORD came to Jeremiah from the LORD, saying,
target: Lalu datanglah firman TUHAN kepada Yeremia, bunyinya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ephraim said, Yet I am become rich, I have found me out substance: in all my labours they shall find none iniquity in me that were sin.
target: Sama seperti Kanaan, dengan neraca palsu di tangannya, dan suka memeras,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Mine eye affecteth mine heart because of all the daughters of my city.
target: Mataku terasa pedih oleh sebab keadaan puteri-puteri kotaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall bring his trespass offering unto the LORD, a ram without blemish out of the flock, with thy estimation, for a trespass offering, unto the priest:
target: Sebagai korban penebus salahnya haruslah ia mempersembahkan kepada TUHAN seekor domba jantan yang tidak bercela dari kambing domba, yang sudah dinilai, menjadi korban penebus salah, dengan menyerahkannya kepada imam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass in the ninth year of his reign, in the tenth month, in the tenth day of the month, that Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon came, he and all his army, against Jerusalem, and pitched against it, and built forts against it round about.
target: Maka pada tahun kesembilan dari pemerintahannya, dalam bulan yang kesepuluh, pada tanggal sepuluh bulan itu, datanglah Nebukadnezar, raja Babel, dengan segala tentaranya menyerang Yerusalem. Berkemahlah mereka mengepungnya dan didirikan merekalah tembok pengepungan sekelilingnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David was afraid of the LORD that day, and said, How shall the ark of the LORD come to me?
target: Pada waktu itu Daud menjadi takut kepada TUHAN, lalu katanya: "Bagaimana tabut TUHAN itu dapat sampai kepadaku?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the woman went unto all the people in her wisdom. And they cut off the head of Sheba the son of Bichri, and cast it out to Joab. And he blew a trumpet, and they retired from the city, every man to his tent. And Joab returned to Jerusalem unto the king.
target: Kemudian masuklah pula perempuan itu dan berbicara kepada seluruh rakyat dengan bijaksana; sesudah itu mereka memenggal kepala Seba bin Bikri dan melemparkannya kepada Yoab. Yoab meniup sangkakala, lalu berserak-seraklah mereka meninggalkan kota itu, masing-masing ke tempatnya. Maka pulanglah Yoab ke Yerusalem kepada raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, that when the gates of Jerusalem began to be dark before the sabbath, I commanded that the gates should be shut, and charged that they should not be opened till after the sabbath: and some of my servants set I at the gates, that there should no burden be brought in on the sabbath day.
target: Kalau sudah remang-remang di pintu-pintu gerbang Yerusalem menjelang hari Sabat, kusuruh tutup pintu-pintu dan kuperintahkan supaya jangan dibuka sampai lewat hari Sabat. Dan aku tempatkan beberapa orang dari anak buahku di pintu-pintu gerbang, supaya tidak ada muatan yang masuk pada hari Sabat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thy plants are an orchard of pomegranates, with pleasant fruits; camphire, with spikenard,
target: Tunas-tunasmu merupakan kebun pohon-pohon delima dengan buah-buahnya yang lezat, bunga pacar dan narwastu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they worshipped the dragon which gave power unto the beast: and they worshipped the beast, saying, Who is like unto the beast? who is able to make war with him?
target: Dan mereka menyembah naga itu, karena ia memberikan kekuasaan kepada binatang itu. Dan mereka menyembah binatang itu, sambil berkata: "Siapakah yang sama seperti binatang ini? Dan siapakah yang dapat berperang melawan dia?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints, and to be admired in all them that believe (because our testimony among you was believed) in that day.
target: apabila Ia datang pada hari itu untuk dimuliakan di antara orang-orang kudus-Nya dan untuk dikagumi oleh semua orang yang percaya, sebab kesaksian yang kami bawa kepadamu telah kamu percayai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Sing unto the LORD, O ye saints of his, and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
target: TUHAN, Engkau mengangkat aku dari dunia orang mati, Engkau menghidupkan aku di antara mereka yang turun ke liang kubur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So David fled, and escaped, and came to Samuel to Ramah, and told him all that Saul had done to him. And he and Samuel went and dwelt in Naioth.
target: Setelah Daud melarikan diri dan luput, sampailah ia kepada Samuel di Rama dan memberitahukan kepadanya segala yang dilakukan Saul kepadanya. Kemudian pergilah ia bersama-sama dengan Samuel dan tinggallah mereka di Nayot.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king said, Bring me a sword. And they brought a sword before the king.
target: Sesudah itu raja berkata: "Ambilkan aku pedang," lalu dibawalah pedang ke depan raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments: and his commandments are not grievous.
target: Sebab inilah kasih kepada Allah, yaitu, bahwa kita menuruti perintah-perintah-Nya. Perintah-perintah-Nya itu tidak berat,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I said unto the fools, Deal not foolishly: and to the wicked, Lift not up the horn:
target: Bumi hancur dan semua penduduknya; tetapi Akulah yang mengokohkan tiang-tiangnya." S e l a

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So do God to Abner, and more also, except, as the LORD hath sworn to David, even so I do to him;
target: Kiranya Allah menghukum Abner, bahkan lebih lagi dari pada itu, jika tidak kulakukan kepada Daud seperti yang dijanjikan TUHAN dengan bersumpah kepadanya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, I will make thee a new sharp threshing instrument having teeth: thou shalt thresh the mountains, and beat them small, and shalt make the hills as chaff.
target: Sesungguhnya, Aku membuat engkau menjadi papan pengirik yang tajam dan baru, dengan gigi dua jajar; engkau akan mengirik gunung-gunung dan menghancurkannya, dan bukit-bukit pun akan kaubuat seperti sekam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: She put her hand to the nail, and her right hand to the workmen's hammer; and with the hammer she smote Sisera, she smote off his head, when she had pierced and stricken through his temples.
target: Tangannya diulurkannya mengambil patok, tangan kanannya mengambil tukul tukang, ditukulnya Sisera, dihancurkannya kepalanya, diremukkan dan ditembusnya pelipisnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So is this great and wide sea, wherein are things creeping innumerable, both small and great beasts.
target: Lihatlah laut itu, besar dan luas wilayahnya, di situ bergerak, tidak terbilang banyaknya, binatang-binatang yang kecil dan besar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Zadok the priest, and Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and Nathan the prophet, and Shimei, and Rei, and the mighty men which belonged to David, were not with Adonijah.
target: Tetapi imam Zadok dan Benaya bin Yoyada dan nabi Natan dan Simei dan Rei dan para pahlawan Daud tidak memihak kepada Adonia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: One young bullock, one ram, one lamb of the first year, for a burnt offering:
target: seekor lembu jantan muda, seekor domba jantan dan seekor domba berumur setahun, untuk korban bakaran;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, as if it had been a light thing for him to walk in the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, that he took to wife Jezebel the daughter of Ethbaal king of the Zidonians, and went and served Baal, and worshipped him.
target: Seakan-akan belum cukup ia hidup dalam dosa-dosa Yerobeam bin Nebat, maka ia mengambil pula Izebel, anak Etbaal, raja orang Sidon, menjadi isterinya, sehingga ia pergi beribadah kepada Baal dan sujud menyembah kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD shall bless thee out of Zion: and thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.
target: Kiranya TUHAN memberkati engkau dari Sion, supaya engkau melihat kebahagiaan Yerusalem seumur hidupmu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not abhor an Edomite; for he is thy brother: thou shalt not abhor an Egyptian; because thou wast a stranger in his land.
target: Janganlah engkau menganggap keji orang Edom, sebab dia saudaramu. Janganlah engkau menganggap keji orang Mesir, sebab engkau pun dahulu adalah orang asing di negerinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These are the three sons of Noah: and of them was the whole earth overspread.
target: Yang tiga inilah anak-anak Nuh, dan dari mereka inilah tersebar penduduk seluruh bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which forsaketh the guide of her youth, and forgetteth the covenant of her God.
target: yang meninggalkan teman hidup masa mudanya dan melupakan perjanjian Allahnya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king took off his ring, which he had taken from Haman, and gave it unto Mordecai. And Esther set Mordecai over the house of Haman.
target: Maka raja mencabut cincin meterai yang diambil dari pada Haman, lalu diserahkannya kepada Mordekhai; dan Mordekhai diangkat oleh Ester menjadi kuasa atas harta milik Haman.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king commanded, and they brought those men which had accused Daniel, and they cast them into the den of lions, them, their children, and their wives; and the lions had the mastery of them, and brake all their bones in pieces or ever they came at the bottom of the den.
target: Lalu sangat sukacitalah raja dan ia memberi perintah, supaya Daniel ditarik dari dalam gua itu. Maka ditariklah Daniel dari dalam gua itu, dan tidak terdapat luka apa-apa padanya, karena ia percaya kepada Allahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the children of Judah have done evil in my sight, saith the LORD: they have set their abominations in the house which is called by my name, to pollute it.
target: Sungguh, orang Yehuda telah melakukan apa yang jahat di mata-Ku, demikianlah firman TUHAN, telah menempatkan dewa-dewa mereka yang menjijikkan di rumah yang atasnya nama-Ku diserukan ini untuk menajiskannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For Israel slideth back as a backsliding heifer: now the LORD will feed them as a lamb in a large place.
target: Sebab Israel degil seperti lembu yang degil, masakan sekarang TUHAN menggembalakan mereka, seperti domba di tanah lapang?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the Lord GOD; This is Jerusalem: I have set it in the midst of the nations and countries that are round about her.
target: Beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Inilah Yerusalem! Di tengah-tengah bangsa-bangsa Kutempatkan dia dan sekelilingnya ada negeri-negeri mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore, I pray thee, let thy servant abide instead of the lad a bondman to my lord; and let the lad go up with his brethren.
target: Oleh sebab itu, baiklah hambamu ini tinggal menjadi budak tuanku menggantikan anak itu, dan biarlah anak itu pulang bersama-sama dengan saudara-saudaranya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt make the breastplate of judgment with cunning work; after the work of the ephod thou shalt make it; of gold, of blue, and of purple, and of scarlet, and of fine twined linen, shalt thou make it.
target: Haruslah engkau membuat tutup dada pernyataan keputusan: buatan seorang ahli. Buatannya sama dengan baju efod, demikianlah harus engkau membuatnya, yakni dari emas, kain ungu tua, kain ungu muda, kain kirmizi dan lenan halus yang dipintal benangnya haruslah engkau membuatnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And shall cut him asunder, and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
target: dan akan membunuh dia dan membuat dia senasib dengan orang-orang munafik. Di sanalah akan terdapat ratapan dan kertakan gigi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And on the eighth day he shall take two he lambs without blemish, and one ewe lamb of the first year without blemish, and three tenth deals of fine flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, and one log of oil.
target: Pada hari yang kedelapan ia harus mengambil dua ekor domba jantan yang tidak bercela dan seekor domba betina berumur setahun yang tidak bercela dan tiga persepuluh efa tepung yang terbaik diolah dengan minyak sebagai korban sajian, serta satu log minyak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Answer not a fool according to his folly, lest thou also be like unto him.
target: Jangan menjawab orang bebal menurut kebodohannya, supaya jangan engkau sendiri menjadi sama dengan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: (For that righteous man dwelling among them, in seeing and hearing, vexed his righteous soul from day to day with their unlawful deeds;)
target: sebab orang benar ini tinggal di tengah-tengah mereka dan setiap hari melihat dan mendengar perbuatan-perbuatan mereka yang jahat itu, sehingga jiwanya yang benar itu tersiksa —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And though they hide themselves in the top of Carmel, I will search and take them out thence; and though they be hid from my sight in the bottom of the sea, thence will I command the serpent, and he shall bite them:
target: Sekalipun mereka bersembunyi di puncak gunung Karmel, Aku akan mengusut dan mengambil mereka dari sana; sekalipun mereka menyembunyikan diri terhadap mata-Ku di dasar laut, Aku akan memerintahkan ular untuk memagut mereka di sana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let Israel rejoice in him that made him: let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.
target: Biarlah Israel bersukacita atas Yang menjadikannya, biarlah bani Sion bersorak-sorak atas raja mereka!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said unto him, Peace be unto thee; fear not: thou shalt not die.
target: Tetapi berfirmanlah TUHAN kepadanya: "Selamatlah engkau! Jangan takut, engkau tidak akan mati."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: One board had two tenons, equally distant one from another: thus did he make for all the boards of the tabernacle.
target: Tiap-tiap papan ada dua pasaknya yang disengkang satu sama lain; demikianlah diperbuat dengan segala papan Kemah Suci.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the king, when he heard these words, was sore displeased with himself, and set his heart on Daniel to deliver him: and he laboured till the going down of the sun to deliver him.
target: Lalu kata mereka kepada raja: "Daniel, salah seorang buangan dari Yehuda, tidak mengindahkan tuanku, ya raja, dan tidak mengindahkan larangan yang tuanku keluarkan, tetapi tiga kali sehari ia mengucapkan doanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the remnant that is escaped of the house of Judah shall again take root downward, and bear fruit upward:
target: Dan orang-orang yang terluput di antara kaum Yehuda, yaitu orang-orang yang masih tertinggal, akan berakar pula ke bawah dan menghasilkan buah ke atas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now thanks be unto God, which always causeth us to triumph in Christ, and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place.
target: Tetapi syukur bagi Allah, yang dalam Kristus selalu membawa kami di jalan kemenangan-Nya. Dengan perantaraan kami Ia menyebarkan keharuman pengenalan akan Dia di mana-mana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass after this, that Absalom prepared him chariots and horses, and fifty men to run before him.
target: Sesudah itu Absalom menyediakan baginya sebuah kereta serta kuda dan lima puluh orang yang berlari di depannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And sent his servant at supper time to say to them that were bidden, Come; for all things are now ready.
target: Menjelang perjamuan itu dimulai, ia menyuruh hambanya mengatakan kepada para undangan: Marilah, sebab segala sesuatu sudah siap.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word,
target: untuk menguduskannya, sesudah Ia menyucikannya dengan memandikannya dengan air dan firman,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Benjamin gathered themselves together after Abner, and became one troop, and stood on the top of an hill.
target: berhimpunlah bani Benyamin di belakang Abner menjadi satu gabungan dan bersiap-siap di puncak sebuah bukit.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of Gershom; Libni his son, Jahath his son, Zimmah his son,
target: dari pada Gerson ialah Libni, anaknya, dan anak orang ini ialah Yahat, dan anak orang ini ialah Zima,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The whole congregation together was forty and two thousand three hundred and threescore,
target: Seluruh jemaah itu bersama-sama ada empat puluh dua ribu tiga ratus enam puluh orang,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The father shall be divided against the son, and the son against the father; the mother against the daughter, and the daughter against the mother; the mother in law against her daughter in law, and the daughter in law against her mother in law.
target: Mereka akan saling bertentangan, ayah melawan anaknya laki-laki dan anak laki-laki melawan ayahnya, ibu melawan anaknya perempuan, dan anak perempuan melawan ibunya, ibu mertua melawan menantunya perempuan dan menantu perempuan melawan ibu mertuanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the Syrians saw that they were put to the worse before Israel, they sent messengers, and drew forth the Syrians that were beyond the river: and Shophach the captain of the host of Hadarezer went before them.
target: Ketika orang Aram melihat, bahwa mereka telah terpukul kalah oleh orang Israel, maka mereka mengirim utusan-utusan dan menyuruh orang Aram yang di seberang sungai Efrat maju berperang di bawah pimpinan Sofakh, panglima tentara Hadadezer.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said, Because the cry of Sodom and Gomorrah is great, and because their sin is very grievous;
target: Sesudah itu berfirmanlah TUHAN: "Sesungguhnya banyak keluh kesah orang tentang Sodom dan Gomora dan sesungguhnya sangat berat dosanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall reckon with him that bought him from the year that he was sold to him unto the year of jubile: and the price of his sale shall be according unto the number of years, according to the time of an hired servant shall it be with him.
target: Bersama-sama dengan si pembelinya ia harus membuat perhitungan, mulai dari tahun ia menyerahkan dirinya kepada orang itu sampai kepada tahun Yobel, dan harga penjualan dirinya haruslah ditentukan menurut jumlah tahun-tahun itu; masa ia tinggal pada orang itu haruslah dihitung seperti masa kerja orang upahan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ahab told Jezebel all that Elijah had done, and withal how he had slain all the prophets with the sword.
target: Ketika Ahab memberitahukan kepada Izebel segala yang dilakukan Elia dan perihal Elia membunuh semua nabi itu dengan pedang,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Duke Magdiel, duke Iram: these be the dukes of Edom, according to their habitations in the land of their possession: he is Esau the father of the Edomites.
target: kepala kaum Magdiel dan kepala kaum Iram; itulah kepala-kepala kaum Edom, menurut tempat kediaman mereka di tanah milik mereka; Edom ialah Esau, bapa orang Edom.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said Jehu to Bidkar his captain, Take up, and cast him in the portion of the field of Naboth the Jezreelite: for remember how that, when I and thou rode together after Ahab his father, the LORD laid this burden upon him;
target: Kemudian berkatalah Yehu kepada Bidkar, perwiranya: "Angkat dan lemparkanlah mayatnya ke kebun Nabot, orang Yizreel itu, sebab ketahuilah, bahwa pada waktu aku dan engkau berdampingan menunggang kuda mengikuti Ahab, ayahnya, maka TUHAN telah mengucapkan terhadap dia hukuman ini:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The words of the wise are as goads, and as nails fastened by the masters of assemblies, which are given from one shepherd.
target: Kata-kata orang berhikmat seperti kusa dan kumpulan-kumpulannya seperti paku-paku yang tertancap, diberikan oleh satu gembala.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the magicians could not stand before Moses because of the boils; for the boil was upon the magicians, and upon all the Egyptians.
target: sehingga ahli-ahli itu tidak dapat tetap berdiri di depan Musa, karena barah-barah itu; sebab ahli-ahli itu pun juga kena barah sama seperti semua orang Mesir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It pleased Darius to set over the kingdom an hundred and twenty princes, which should be over the whole kingdom;
target: Darius, orang Media, menerima pemerintahan ketika ia berumur enam puluh dua tahun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To receive the instruction of wisdom, justice, and judgment, and equity;
target: untuk menerima didikan yang menjadikan pandai, serta kebenaran, keadilan dan kejujuran,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For this gird you with sackcloth, lament and howl: for the fierce anger of the LORD is not turned back from us.
target: Oleh karena itu lilitkanlah kain kabung, menangis dan merataplah; sebab murka TUHAN yang menyala-nyala tidak surut dari pada kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jonathan, Saul's son, had a son that was lame of his feet. He was five years old when the tidings came of Saul and Jonathan out of Jezreel, and his nurse took him up, and fled: and it came to pass, as she made haste to flee, that he fell, and became lame. And his name was Mephibosheth.
target: Yonatan, anak Saul, mempunyai seorang anak laki-laki, yang cacat kakinya. Ia berumur lima tahun, ketika datang kabar tentang Saul dan Yonatan dari Yizreel. Inang pengasuhnya mengangkat dia pada waktu itu, lalu lari, tetapi karena terburu-buru larinya, anak itu jatuh dan menjadi timpang. Ia bernama Mefiboset.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Make ye mention to the nations; behold, publish against Jerusalem, that watchers come from a far country, and give out their voice against the cities of Judah.
target: Peringatkanlah kepada bangsa-bangsa: Sungguh ia datang! Kabarkanlah di Yerusalem: "Pengepung datang dari negeri yang jauh, memperdengarkan suaranya terhadap kota-kota Yehuda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Simeon; Jemuel, and Jamin, and Ohad, and Jachin, and Zohar, and Shaul the son of a Canaanitish woman.
target: Anak-anak Simeon ialah Yemuel, Yamin, Ohad, Yakhin dan Zohar serta Saul, anak seorang perempuan Kanaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And whosoever shall not receive you, nor hear you, when ye depart thence, shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them. Verily I say unto you, It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment, than for that city.
target: Dan kalau ada suatu tempat yang tidak mau menerima kamu dan kalau mereka tidak mau mendengarkan kamu, keluarlah dari situ dan kebaskanlah debu yang di kakimu sebagai peringatan bagi mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, while they were in the way, that tidings came to David, saying, Absalom hath slain all the king's sons, and there is not one of them left.
target: Mereka masih di tengah jalan, ketika kabar sampai kepada Daud, demikian: "Absalom telah membunuh semua anak raja, tidak ada seorang pun dari mereka yang lolos."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Where their worm dieth not, and the fire is not quenched.
target: di tempat itu ulatnya tidak akan mati, dan apinya tidak akan padam.]

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the sin of their mouth and the words of their lips let them even be taken in their pride: and for cursing and lying which they speak.
target: Janganlah membunuh mereka, supaya bangsaku tidak lupa, halaulah mereka kian ke mari dengan kuasa-Mu, dan jatuhkanlah mereka, ya Tuhan, perisai kami!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will take the remnant of Judah, that have set their faces to go into the land of Egypt to sojourn there, and they shall all be consumed, and fall in the land of Egypt; they shall even be consumed by the sword and by the famine: they shall die, from the least even unto the greatest, by the sword and by the famine: and they shall be an execration, and an astonishment, and a curse, and a reproach.
target: Aku mau mencabut sisa Yehuda yang berniat hendak pergi ke tanah Mesir untuk tinggal sebagai orang asing di sana; mereka semuanya akan habis mati di tanah Mesir; mereka akan rebah mati karena pedang dan akan habis mati karena kelaparan, dari yang kecil sampai kepada yang besar; mereka akan mati karena pedang dan karena kelaparan dan mereka akan menjadi kutuk, kengerian, kutukan dan aib.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the LORD is our defence; and the Holy One of Israel is our king.
target: Sebab Engkaulah kemuliaan kekuatan mereka, dan karena Engkau berkenan, tanduk kami meninggi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David prepared iron in abundance for the nails for the doors of the gates, and for the joinings; and brass in abundance without weight;
target: Selanjutnya Daud menyediakan sangat banyak besi untuk paku-paku bagi daun pintu gerbang dan bagi tupai-tupai, juga sangat banyak tembaga yang tidak tertimbang beratnya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there went over a ferry boat to carry over the king's household, and to do what he thought good. And Shimei the son of Gera fell down before the king, as he was come over Jordan;
target: lalu menyeberang dari tempat penyeberangan untuk menyeberangkan keluarga raja dan untuk melakukan apa yang dipandangnya baik. Maka Simei bin Gera sujud di depan raja, ketika raja hendak menyeberangi sungai Yordan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he cast four rings for the four ends of the grate of brass, to be places for the staves.
target: Dituangnyalah empat gelang pada keempat ujung kisi-kisi tembaga itu, yakni tempat memasukkan kayu pengusung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And that food shall be for store to the land against the seven years of famine, which shall be in the land of Egypt; that the land perish not through the famine.
target: Demikianlah segala bahan makanan itu menjadi persediaan untuk negeri ini dalam ketujuh tahun kelaparan yang akan terjadi di tanah Mesir, supaya negeri ini jangan binasa karena kelaparan itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Sing unto him, sing psalms unto him, talk ye of all his wondrous works.
target: Bernyanyilah bagi-Nya, bermazmurlah bagi-Nya, percakapkanlah segala perbuatan-Nya yang ajaib!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There was a certain man in Caesarea called Cornelius, a centurion of the band called the Italian band,
target: Di Kaisarea ada seorang yang bernama Kornelius, seorang perwira pasukan yang disebut pasukan Italia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he made two rings of gold for it under the crown thereof, by the two corners of it, upon the two sides thereof, to be places for the staves to bear it withal.
target: Dibuatnyalah dua gelang emas untuk mezbah itu di bawah bingkainya, pada kedua rusuknya, pada kedua bidang sisinya, sebagai tempat memasukkan kayu pengusung, supaya dengan itu mezbah dapat diangkut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will say to my soul, Soul, thou hast much goods laid up for many years; take thine ease, eat, drink, and be merry.
target: Sesudah itu aku akan berkata kepada jiwaku: Jiwaku, ada padamu banyak barang, tertimbun untuk bertahun-tahun lamanya; beristirahatlah, makanlah, minumlah dan bersenang-senanglah!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore let it please thee to bless the house of thy servant, that it may be before thee for ever: for thou blessest, O LORD, and it shall be blessed for ever.
target: Kiranya Engkau sekarang berkenan memberkati keluarga hamba-Mu ini, supaya tetap ada di hadapan-Mu untuk selama-lamanya. Sebab apa yang Engkau berkati, ya TUHAN, diberkati untuk selama-lamanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They are brought down and fallen: but we are risen, and stand upright.
target: Orang ini memegahkan kereta dan orang itu memegahkan kuda, tetapi kita bermegah dalam nama TUHAN, Allah kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that despised Moses' law died without mercy under two or three witnesses:
target: Jika ada orang yang menolak hukum Musa, ia dihukum mati tanpa belas kasihan atas keterangan dua atau tiga orang saksi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And a certain man saw it, and told Joab, and said, Behold, I saw Absalom hanged in an oak.
target: Seseorang melihatnya, lalu memberitahu Yoab, katanya: "Aku melihat Absalom tergantung pada pohon tarbantin."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: David therefore himself calleth him Lord; and whence is he then his son? And the common people heard him gladly.
target: Daud sendiri menyebut Dia Tuannya, bagaimana mungkin Ia anaknya pula?" Orang banyak yang besar jumlahnya mendengarkan Dia dengan penuh minat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, before he had done speaking, that, behold, Rebekah came out, who was born to Bethuel, son of Milcah, the wife of Nahor, Abraham's brother, with her pitcher upon her shoulder.
target: Sebelum ia selesai berkata, maka datanglah Ribka, yang lahir bagi Betuel, anak laki-laki Milka, isteri Nahor, saudara Abraham; buyungnya dibawanya di atas bahunya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For we would not, brethren, have you ignorant of our trouble which came to us in Asia, that we were pressed out of measure, above strength, insomuch that we despaired even of life:
target: Sebab kami mau, saudara-saudara, supaya kamu tahu akan penderitaan yang kami alami di Asia Kecil. Beban yang ditanggungkan atas kami adalah begitu besar dan begitu berat, sehingga kami telah putus asa juga akan hidup kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I called upon the LORD in distress: the LORD answered me, and set me in a large place.
target: Dalam kesesakan aku telah berseru kepada TUHAN. TUHAN telah menjawab aku dengan memberi kelegaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I beseech thee for my son Onesimus, whom I have begotten in my bonds:
target: mengajukan permintaan kepadamu mengenai anakku yang kudapat selagi aku dalam penjara, yakni Onesimus

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall eat up thine harvest, and thy bread, which thy sons and thy daughters should eat: they shall eat up thy flocks and thine herds: they shall eat up thy vines and thy fig trees: they shall impoverish thy fenced cities, wherein thou trustedst, with the sword.
target: Mereka akan memakan habis hasil tuaianmu dan makananmu, akan memakan habis anak-anakmu lelaki dan perempuan, akan memakan habis kambing dombamu dan lembu sapimu, akan memakan habis pohon anggurmu dan pohon aramu, akan menghancurkan dengan pedang kota-kotamu yang berkubu, yang kauandalkan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then sent Joseph, and called his father Jacob to him, and all his kindred, threescore and fifteen souls.
target: Kemudian Yusuf menyuruh menjemput Yakub, ayahnya, dan semua sanak saudaranya, tujuh puluh lima jiwa banyaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jeremiah commanded Baruch, saying, I am shut up; I cannot go into the house of the LORD:
target: Pada suatu kali Yeremia memberi perintah kepada Barukh: "Aku ini berhalangan, tidak dapat pergi ke rumah TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will gather them that are sorrowful for the solemn assembly, who are of thee, to whom the reproach of it was a burden.
target: seperti pada hari pertemuan raya." "Aku akan mengangkat malapetaka dari padamu, sehingga oleh karenanya engkau tidak lagi menanggung cela.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He causeth the grass to grow for the cattle, and herb for the service of man: that he may bring forth food out of the earth;
target: Engkau yang menumbuhkan rumput bagi hewan dan tumbuh-tumbuhan untuk diusahakan manusia, yang mengeluarkan makanan dari dalam tanah

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The west side also shall be the great sea from the border, till a man come over against Hamath. This is the west side.
target: Di sebelah barat laut besar merupakan perbatasan sampai tempat jalan masuk ke Hamat. Itulah sebelah barat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Through faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the word of God, so that things which are seen were not made of things which do appear.
target: Karena iman kita mengerti, bahwa alam semesta telah dijadikan oleh firman Allah, sehingga apa yang kita lihat telah terjadi dari apa yang tidak dapat kita lihat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if a man live many years, and rejoice in them all; yet let him remember the days of darkness; for they shall be many. All that cometh is vanity.
target: oleh sebab itu jikalau orang panjang umurnya, biarlah ia bersukacita di dalamnya, tetapi hendaklah ia ingat akan hari-hari yang gelap, karena banyak jumlahnya. Segala sesuatu yang datang adalah kesia-siaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If those ordinances depart from before me, saith the LORD, then the seed of Israel also shall cease from being a nation before me for ever.
target: "Sesungguhnya, seperti ketetapan-ketetapan ini tidak akan beralih dari hadapan-Ku, demikianlah firman TUHAN, demikianlah keturunan Israel juga tidak akan berhenti menjadi bangsa di hadapan-Ku untuk sepanjang waktu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they could not answer him again to these things.
target: Mereka tidak sanggup membantah-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The heads thereof judge for reward, and the priests thereof teach for hire, and the prophets thereof divine for money: yet will they lean upon the LORD, and say, Is not the LORD among us? none evil can come upon us.
target: Para kepalanya memutuskan hukum karena suap, dan para imamnya memberi pengajaran karena bayaran, para nabinya menenung karena uang, padahal mereka bersandar kepada TUHAN dengan berkata: "Bukankah TUHAN ada di tengah-tengah kita! Tidak akan datang malapetaka menimpa kita!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his brightness was as the light; he had horns coming out of his hand: and there was the hiding of his power.
target: Ada kilauan seperti cahaya, sinar cahaya dari sisi-Nya dan di situlah terselubung kekuatan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: On the east three gates; on the north three gates; on the south three gates; and on the west three gates.
target: Di sebelah timur terdapat tiga pintu gerbang dan di sebelah utara tiga pintu gerbang dan di sebelah selatan tiga pintu gerbang dan di sebelah barat tiga pintu gerbang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will judge thee, as women that break wedlock and shed blood are judged; and I will give thee blood in fury and jealousy.
target: Aku akan menghakimi engkau seperti orang menghakimi perempuan-perempuan yang berzinah dan yang menumpahkan darah dan Aku akan melampiaskan atasmu murka dan cemburuan-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD did according to the word of Moses; and the frogs died out of the houses, out of the villages, and out of the fields.
target: Dan TUHAN melakukan seperti yang dikatakan Musa, sehingga katak-katak itu mati lenyap dari rumah, dari halaman dan dari ladang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Or have found that which was lost, and lieth concerning it, and sweareth falsely; in any of all these that a man doeth, sinning therein:
target: atau bila ia menemui barang hilang, dan memungkirinya, dan ia bersumpah dusta — dalam perkara apa pun yang diperbuat seseorang, sehingga ia berdosa —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A righteous man hateth lying: but a wicked man is loathsome, and cometh to shame.
target: Orang benar benci kepada dusta, tetapi orang fasik memalukan dan memburukkan diri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I had pity for mine holy name, which the house of Israel had profaned among the heathen, whither they went.
target: Aku merasa sakit hati karena nama-Ku yang kudus yang dinajiskan oleh kaum Israel di tengah bangsa-bangsa, di mana mereka datang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ornan said unto David, Take it to thee, and let my lord the king do that which is good in his eyes: lo, I give thee the oxen also for burnt offerings, and the threshing instruments for wood, and the wheat for the meat offering; I give it all.
target: Jawab Ornan kepada Daud: "Ambillah, dan baiklah tuanku raja melakukan apa yang dipandangnya baik. Lihatlah, aku berikan lembu ini untuk korban bakaran dan eretan-eretan pengirik ini untuk kayu bakar dan gandum untuk korban sajian, semuanya itu kuberikan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when money failed in the land of Egypt, and in the land of Canaan, all the Egyptians came unto Joseph, and said, Give us bread: for why should we die in thy presence? for the money faileth.
target: Setelah habis uang di tanah Mesir dan di tanah Kanaan, datanglah semua orang Mesir menghadap Yusuf serta berkata: "Berilah makanan kepada kami! Mengapa kami harus mati di depanmu? Sebab tidak ada lagi uang."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Boast not thyself of to morrow; for thou knowest not what a day may bring forth.
target: Janganlah memuji diri karena esok hari, karena engkau tidak tahu apa yang akan terjadi hari itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus God hath taken away the cattle of your father, and given them to me.
target: Demikianlah Allah mengambil ternak ayahmu dan memberikannya kepadaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, Blessed be the LORD God of my master Abraham, who hath not left destitute my master of his mercy and his truth: I being in the way, the LORD led me to the house of my master's brethren.
target: serta berkata: "Terpujilah TUHAN, Allah tuanku Abraham, yang tidak menarik kembali kasih-Nya dan setia-Nya dari tuanku itu; dan TUHAN telah menuntun aku di jalan ke rumah saudara-saudara tuanku ini!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But wilt thou know, O vain man, that faith without works is dead?
target: Hai manusia yang bebal, maukah engkau mengakui sekarang, bahwa iman tanpa perbuatan adalah iman yang kosong?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ, so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing.
target: Karena itu sebagaimana jemaat tunduk kepada Kristus, demikian jugalah isteri kepada suami dalam segala sesuatu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Because thou hast forgotten me, and cast me behind thy back, therefore bear thou also thy lewdness and thy whoredoms.
target: Oleh sebab itu, beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Oleh karena engkau melupakan Aku dan membelakangi Aku, sekarang tanggung sendirilah kemesumanmu dan persundalanmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And over the course of the second month was Dodai an Ahohite, and of his course was Mikloth also the ruler: in his course likewise were twenty and four thousand.
target: Yang mengepalai rombongan bulan yang kedua ialah Dodai, orang Ahohi, sedang pemimpin rombongannya yang berjumlah dua puluh empat ribu orang, adalah Miklot.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For Pharaoh king of Egypt had gone up, and taken Gezer, and burnt it with fire, and slain the Canaanites that dwelt in the city, and given it for a present unto his daughter, Solomon's wife.
target: — Sebab Firaun, raja Mesir, telah maju berperang dan merebut Gezer, lalu membakarnya dan membunuh orang-orang Kanaan yang diam di kota itu. Kemudian diberikannya kota itu sebagai hadiah kawin kepada anaknya, isteri Salomo,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Esther the queen, the daughter of Abihail, and Mordecai the Jew, wrote with all authority, to confirm this second letter of Purim.
target: Lalu Ester, sang ratu, anak Abihail, menulis surat, bersama-sama dengan Mordekhai, orang Yahudi itu; surat yang kedua tentang hari raya Purim ini dituliskannya dengan segala ketegasan untuk menguatkannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, Cast the net on the right side of the ship, and ye shall find. They cast therefore, and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes.
target: Maka kata Yesus kepada mereka: "Tebarkanlah jalamu di sebelah kanan perahu, maka akan kamu peroleh." Lalu mereka menebarkannya dan mereka tidak dapat menariknya lagi karena banyaknya ikan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They are turned back to the iniquities of their forefathers, which refused to hear my words; and they went after other gods to serve them: the house of Israel and the house of Judah have broken my covenant which I made with their fathers.
target: Mereka sudah jatuh kembali kepada kesalahan nenek moyang mereka yang dahulu telah menolak mendengarkan firman-Ku. Mereka mengikuti allah lain dan beribadah kepadanya. Kaum Israel dan kaum Yehuda telah mengingkari perjanjian-Ku yang telah Kuikat dengan nenek moyang mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he brought the people's offering, and took the goat, which was the sin offering for the people, and slew it, and offered it for sin, as the first.
target: Sesudah itu dibawanya persembahan bangsa ke mezbah; diambilnyalah kambing jantan yang akan menjadi korban penghapus dosa yang bagi bangsa itu, lalu disembelihnya dan dipersembahkannya sebagai korban penghapus dosa seperti yang pertama.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The son of Ethan, the son of Zimmah, the son of Shimei,
target: bin Etan bin Zima bin Simei

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He judged the cause of the poor and needy; then it was well with him: was not this to know me? saith the LORD.
target: serta mengadili perkara orang sengsara dan orang miskin dengan adil. Bukankah itu namanya mengenal Aku? demikianlah firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So they came into the land of Egypt: for they obeyed not the voice of the LORD: thus came they even to Tahpanhes.
target: Lalu mereka pergi ke tanah Mesir, sebab mereka tidak mau mendengarkan suara TUHAN. Maka sampailah mereka di Tahpanhes.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the three and twentieth year of Nebuchadrezzar Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard carried away captive of the Jews seven hundred forty and five persons: all the persons were four thousand and six hundred.
target: dalam tahun kedua puluh tiga zaman Nebukadnezar, diangkut ke dalam pembuangan oleh Nebuzaradan, kepala pasukan pengawal, tujuh ratus empat puluh lima jiwa orang Yehuda; seluruhnya berjumlah empat ribu enam ratus jiwa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I John saw these things, and heard them. And when I had heard and seen, I fell down to worship before the feet of the angel which shewed me these things.
target: Dan aku, Yohanes, akulah yang telah mendengar dan melihat semuanya itu. Dan setelah aku mendengar dan melihatnya, aku tersungkur di depan kaki malaikat, yang telah menunjukkan semuanya itu kepadaku, untuk menyembahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also in Horeb ye provoked the LORD to wrath, so that the LORD was angry with you to have destroyed you.
target: Di Horeb kamu sudah membuat TUHAN gusar, bahkan TUHAN begitu murka kepadamu, hingga Ia mau memunahkan kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said David to the Philistine, Thou comest to me with a sword, and with a spear, and with a shield: but I come to thee in the name of the LORD of hosts, the God of the armies of Israel, whom thou hast defied.
target: Tetapi Daud berkata kepada orang Filistin itu: "Engkau mendatangi aku dengan pedang dan tombak dan lembing, tetapi aku mendatangi engkau dengan nama TUHAN semesta alam, Allah segala barisan Israel yang kautantang itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It is joy to the just to do judgment: but destruction shall be to the workers of iniquity.
target: Melakukan keadilan adalah kesukaan bagi orang benar, tetapi menakutkan orang yang berbuat jahat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, What pledge shall I give thee? And she said, Thy signet, and thy bracelets, and thy staff that is in thine hand. And he gave it her, and came in unto her, and she conceived by him.
target: Tanyanya: "Apakah tanggungan yang harus kuberikan kepadamu?" Jawab perempuan itu: "Cap meteraimu serta kalungmu dan tongkat yang ada di tanganmu itu." Lalu diberikannyalah semuanya itu kepadanya, maka ia menghampirinya. Perempuan itu mengandung dari padanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
