input: These are that Aaron and Moses, to whom the LORD said, Bring out the children of Israel from the land of Egypt according to their armies.
target: Merekalah yang berbicara kepada Firaun, raja Mesir, supaya mereka membawa orang Israel keluar dari Mesir. Itulah Musa dan Harun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He rained flesh also upon them as dust, and feathered fowls like as the sand of the sea:
target: Ia menurunkan kepada mereka hujan daging seperti debu banyaknya, dan hujan burung-burung bersayap seperti pasir laut;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians, and was mighty in words and in deeds.
target: Dan Musa dididik dalam segala hikmat orang Mesir, dan ia berkuasa dalam perkataan dan perbuatannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses said, I will now turn aside, and see this great sight, why the bush is not burnt.
target: Musa berkata: "Baiklah aku menyimpang ke sana untuk memeriksa penglihatan yang hebat itu. Mengapakah tidak terbakar semak duri itu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A wise man's heart is at his right hand; but a fool's heart at his left.
target: Hati orang berhikmat menuju ke kanan, tetapi hati orang bodoh ke kiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hypocrite, first cast out the beam out of thine own eye; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast out the mote out of thy brother's eye.
target: Hai orang munafik, keluarkanlah dahulu balok dari matamu, maka engkau akan melihat dengan jelas untuk mengeluarkan selumbar itu dari mata saudaramu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said he, What have they seen in thine house? And Hezekiah answered, All that is in mine house have they seen: there is nothing among my treasures that I have not shewed them.
target: Lalu tanyanya lagi: "Apakah yang telah dilihat mereka di istanamu?" Jawab Hizkia: "Semua yang ada di istanaku telah mereka lihat. Tidak ada barang yang tidak kuperlihatkan kepada mereka di perbendaharaanku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As for our redeemer, the LORD of hosts is his name, the Holy One of Israel.
target: kata Penebus kami, TUHAN semesta alam nama-Nya, Yang Mahakudus, Allah Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who comforteth us in all our tribulation, that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble, by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God.
target: yang menghibur kami dalam segala penderitaan kami, sehingga kami sanggup menghibur mereka, yang berada dalam bermacam-macam penderitaan dengan penghiburan yang kami terima sendiri dari Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And take every man his censer, and put incense in them, and bring ye before the LORD every man his censer, two hundred and fifty censers; thou also, and Aaron, each of you his censer.
target: Baiklah kamu masing-masing membawa perbaraannya membubuh ukupan di atasnya, lalu kamu mempersembahkan masing-masing perbaraannya ke hadapan TUHAN, dua ratus lima puluh perbaraan; juga engkau ini dan Harun masing-masing harus membawa perbaraannya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then came there unto him all his brethren, and all his sisters, and all they that had been of his acquaintance before, and did eat bread with him in his house: and they bemoaned him, and comforted him over all the evil that the LORD had brought upon him: every man also gave him a piece of money, and every one an earring of gold.
target: Kemudian datanglah kepadanya semua saudaranya laki-laki dan perempuan dan semua kenalannya yang lama, dan makan bersama-sama dengan dia di rumahnya. Mereka menyatakan turut berdukacita dan menghibur dia oleh karena segala malapetaka yang telah ditimpakan TUHAN kepadanya, dan mereka masing-masing memberi dia uang satu kesita dan sebuah cincin emas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there was a young man out of Bethlehemjudah of the family of Judah, who was a Levite, and he sojourned there.
target: Maka ada seorang muda dari Betlehem-Yehuda, dari kaum Yehuda; ia seorang Lewi dan tinggal di sana sebagai pendatang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Abner came to David to Hebron, and twenty men with him. And David made Abner and the men that were with him a feast.
target: Ketika Abner datang kepada Daud di Hebron bersama-sama dua puluh orang, maka Daud mengadakan perjamuan bagi Abner dan orang-orang yang menyertainya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, the ark of the covenant of the LORD of all the earth passeth over before you into Jordan.
target: sesungguhnya, tabut perjanjian Tuhan semesta bumi berjalan menyeberang di depan kamu, masuk ke sungai Yordan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A day of darkness and of gloominess, a day of clouds and of thick darkness, as the morning spread upon the mountains: a great people and a strong; there hath not been ever the like, neither shall be any more after it, even to the years of many generations.
target: suatu hari gelap gulita dan kelam kabut, suatu hari berawan dan kelam pekat; seperti fajar di atas gunung-gunung terbentang suatu bangsa yang banyak dan kuat, yang serupa itu tidak pernah ada sejak purbakala, dan tidak akan ada lagi sesudah itu turun-temurun, pada masa yang akan datang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They also that render evil for good are mine adversaries; because I follow the thing that good is.
target: Orang-orang yang memusuhi aku besar jumlahnya, banyaklah orang-orang yang membenci aku tanpa sebab;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have digged, and drunk water; and with the sole of my feet have I dried up all the rivers of the besieged places.
target: Aku ini telah menggali air dan telah minum air; aku telah mengeringkan dengan telapak kakiku segala sungai di Mesir!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The heart of her husband doth safely trust in her, so that he shall have no need of spoil.
target: Hati suaminya percaya kepadanya, suaminya tidak akan kekurangan keuntungan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Korah gathered all the congregation against them unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation: and the glory of the LORD appeared unto all the congregation.
target: Ketika Korah mengumpulkan segenap umat itu melawan mereka berdua di depan pintu Kemah Pertemuan, tampaklah kemuliaan TUHAN kepada segenap umat itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore, my beloved brethren, be ye stedfast, unmoveable, always abounding in the work of the Lord, forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord.
target: Karena itu, saudara-saudaraku yang kekasih, berdirilah teguh, jangan goyah, dan giatlah selalu dalam pekerjaan Tuhan! Sebab kamu tahu, bahwa dalam persekutuan dengan Tuhan jerih payahmu tidak sia-sia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Feed thy people with thy rod, the flock of thine heritage, which dwell solitarily in the wood, in the midst of Carmel: let them feed in Bashan and Gilead, as in the days of old.
target: Gembalakanlah umat-Mu dengan tongkat-Mu, kambing domba milik-Mu sendiri, yang terpencil mendiami rimba di tengah-tengah kebun buah-buahan. Biarlah mereka makan rumput di Basan dan di Gilead seperti pada zaman dahulu kala.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither shall he go in to any dead body, nor defile himself for his father, or for his mother;
target: Janganlah ia dekat kepada semua mayat, bahkan janganlah ia menajiskan diri dengan mayat ayahnya atau ibunya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They shall not make baldness upon their head, neither shall they shave off the corner of their beard, nor make any cuttings in their flesh.
target: Janganlah mereka menggundul sebagian kepalanya, dan janganlah mereka mencukur tepi janggutnya, dan janganlah mereka menggoresi kulit tubuhnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus answering said, A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho, and fell among thieves, which stripped him of his raiment, and wounded him, and departed, leaving him half dead.
target: Jawab Yesus: "Adalah seorang yang turun dari Yerusalem ke Yerikho; ia jatuh ke tangan penyamun-penyamun yang bukan saja merampoknya habis-habisan, tetapi yang juga memukulnya dan yang sesudah itu pergi meninggalkannya setengah mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.
target: Demikianlah kita ketahui, bahwa kita tetap berada di dalam Allah dan Dia di dalam kita: Ia telah mengaruniakan kita mendapat bagian dalam Roh-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the brass of the offering was seventy talents, and two thousand and four hundred shekels.
target: Tembaga dari persembahan unjukan itu ada tujuh puluh talenta dan dua ribu empat ratus syikal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thus are the secrets of his heart made manifest; and so falling down on his face he will worship God, and report that God is in you of a truth.
target: segala rahasia yang terkandung di dalam hatinya akan menjadi nyata, sehingga ia akan sujud menyembah Allah dan mengaku: "Sungguh, Allah ada di tengah-tengah kamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I say unto you, Whosoever shall put away his wife, except it be for fornication, and shall marry another, committeth adultery: and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery.
target: Tetapi Aku berkata kepadamu: Barangsiapa menceraikan isterinya, kecuali karena zinah, lalu kawin dengan perempuan lain, ia berbuat zinah."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when Hushai the Archite, David's friend, was come unto Absalom, that Hushai said unto Absalom, God save the king, God save the king.
target: Ketika Husai, orang Arki, sahabat Daud itu, sampai kepada Absalom, berkatalah Husai kepada Absalom: "Hiduplah raja! Hiduplah raja!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it grieved me sore: therefore I cast forth all the household stuff to Tobiah out of the chamber.
target: Aku menjadi sangat kesal, lalu kulempar semua perabot rumah Tobia ke luar bilik itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said unto Satan, Hast thou considered my servant Job, that there is none like him in the earth, a perfect and an upright man, one that feareth God, and escheweth evil?
target: Lalu bertanyalah TUHAN kepada Iblis: "Apakah engkau memperhatikan hamba-Ku Ayub? Sebab tiada seorang pun di bumi seperti dia, yang demikian saleh dan jujur, yang takut akan Allah dan menjauhi kejahatan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My dove, my undefiled is but one; she is the only one of her mother, she is the choice one of her that bare her. The daughters saw her, and blessed her; yea, the queens and the concubines, and they praised her.
target: Tetapi dialah satu-satunya merpatiku, idam-idamanku, satu-satunya anak ibunya, anak kesayangan bagi yang melahirkannya; puteri-puteri melihatnya dan menyebutnya bahagia, permaisuri-permaisuri dan selir-selir memujinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: With the work of an engraver in stone, like the engravings of a signet, shalt thou engrave the two stones with the names of the children of Israel: thou shalt make them to be set in ouches of gold.
target: Seperti buatan seorang pengasah permata, diukirkan seperti meterai, demikianlah harus kauukirkan pada kedua permata itu nama para anak Israel; dililit dengan ikat emas harus kaubuat permata itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth, when ye shall see Abraham, and Isaac, and Jacob, and all the prophets, in the kingdom of God, and you yourselves thrust out.
target: Di sanalah akan terdapat ratap dan kertak gigi, apabila kamu akan melihat Abraham dan Ishak dan Yakub dan semua nabi di dalam Kerajaan Allah, tetapi kamu sendiri dicampakkan ke luar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, Thou shalt not go through. And Edom came out against him with much people, and with a strong hand.
target: Tetapi jawab mereka: "Tidak boleh kamu lalu." Maka keluarlah orang Edom menghadapi mereka dengan banyak rakyatnya dan dengan tentara yang kuat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But as for the children of Israel that dwelt in the cities of Judah, Rehoboam reigned over them.
target: sehingga Rehabeam menjadi raja hanya atas orang Israel yang diam di kota-kota Yehuda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Mercy and truth preserve the king: and his throne is upholden by mercy.
target: Kasih dan setia melindungi raja, dan dengan kasih ia menopang takhtanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
target: Lalu datanglah firman TUHAN kepadaku:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I made an ark of shittim wood, and hewed two tables of stone like unto the first, and went up into the mount, having the two tables in mine hand.
target: Maka aku membuat sebuah tabut dari kayu penaga dan memahat dua loh batu yang serupa dengan yang mula-mula; kemudian aku mendaki gunung dengan kedua loh itu di tanganku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall be, when the LORD thy God shall have brought thee into the land which he sware unto thy fathers, to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob, to give thee great and goodly cities, which thou buildedst not,
target: Maka apabila TUHAN, Allahmu, telah membawa engkau masuk ke negeri yang dijanjikan-Nya dengan sumpah kepada nenek moyangmu, yakni Abraham, Ishak dan Yakub, untuk memberikannya kepadamu — kota-kota yang besar dan baik, yang tidak kaudirikan;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the doors shall be shut in the streets, when the sound of the grinding is low, and he shall rise up at the voice of the bird, and all the daughters of musick shall be brought low;
target: dan pintu-pintu di tepi jalan tertutup, dan bunyi penggilingan menjadi lemah, dan suara menjadi seperti kicauan burung, dan semua penyanyi perempuan tunduk,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of Hagab, the children of Shalmai, the children of Hanan,
target: bani Hagab, bani Samlai, bani Hanan;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.
target: Karena sekarang kita melihat dalam cermin suatu gambaran yang samar-samar, tetapi nanti kita akan melihat muka dengan muka. Sekarang aku hanya mengenal dengan tidak sempurna, tetapi nanti aku akan mengenal dengan sempurna, seperti aku sendiri dikenal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore thus saith the LORD; Behold, against this family do I devise an evil, from which ye shall not remove your necks; neither shall ye go haughtily: for this time is evil.
target: Sebab itu beginilah firman TUHAN: Sesungguhnya, Aku merancang malapetaka terhadap kaum ini, dan kamu tidak dapat menghindarkan lehermu dari padanya; kamu tidak dapat lagi berjalan angkuh, sebab waktu itu adalah waktu yang mencelakakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For by thy words thou shalt be justified, and by thy words thou shalt be condemned.
target: Karena menurut ucapanmu engkau akan dibenarkan, dan menurut ucapanmu pula engkau akan dihukum."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Is it a small thing that thou hast brought us up out of a land that floweth with milk and honey, to kill us in the wilderness, except thou make thyself altogether a prince over us?
target: Belum cukupkah, bahwa engkau memimpin kami keluar dari suatu negeri yang berlimpah-limpah susu dan madunya untuk membiarkan kami mati di padang gurun, sehingga masih juga engkau menjadikan dirimu tuan atas kami?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The proverbs of Solomon the son of David, king of Israel;
target: Amsal-amsal Salomo bin Daud, raja Israel,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the seventh angel sounded; and there were great voices in heaven, saying, The kingdoms of this world are become the kingdoms of our Lord, and of his Christ; and he shall reign for ever and ever.
target: Lalu malaikat yang ketujuh meniup sangkakalanya, dan terdengarlah suara-suara nyaring di dalam sorga, katanya: "Pemerintahan atas dunia dipegang oleh Tuhan kita dan Dia yang diurapi-Nya, dan Ia akan memerintah sebagai raja sampai selama-lamanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Doth God pervert judgment? or doth the Almighty pervert justice?
target: Masakan Allah membengkokkan keadilan? Masakan Yang Mahakuasa membengkokkan kebenaran?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But one thing is needful: and Mary hath chosen that good part, which shall not be taken away from her.
target: tetapi hanya satu saja yang perlu: Maria telah memilih bagian yang terbaik, yang tidak akan diambil dari padanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I cried unto thee, O LORD: I said, Thou art my refuge and my portion in the land of the living.
target: Pandanglah ke kanan dan lihatlah, tidak ada seorang pun yang menghiraukan aku; tempat pelarian bagiku telah hilang, tidak ada seorang pun yang mencari aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he that reapeth receiveth wages, and gathereth fruit unto life eternal: that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together.
target: Sekarang juga penuai telah menerima upahnya dan ia mengumpulkan buah untuk hidup yang kekal, sehingga penabur dan penuai sama-sama bersukacita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But they held their peace, and answered him not a word: for the king's commandment was, saying, Answer him not.
target: Tetapi orang berdiam diri dan tidak menjawab dia sepatah kata pun, sebab ada perintah raja, bunyinya: "Jangan kamu menjawab dia!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when I passed by thee, and saw thee polluted in thine own blood, I said unto thee when thou wast in thy blood, Live; yea, I said unto thee when thou wast in thy blood, Live.
target: Maka Aku lalu dari situ dan Kulihat engkau menendang-nendang dengan kakimu sambil berlumuran darah dan Aku berkata kepadamu dalam keadaan berlumuran darah itu: Engkau harus hidup

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Daniel spake and said, I saw in my vision by night, and, behold, the four winds of the heaven strove upon the great sea.
target: Berkatalah Daniel, demikian: "Pada malam hari aku mendapat penglihatan, tampak keempat angin dari langit mengguncangkan laut besar,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they were the more fierce, saying, He stirreth up the people, teaching throughout all Jewry, beginning from Galilee to this place.
target: Tetapi mereka makin kuat mendesak, katanya: "Ia menghasut rakyat dengan ajaran-Nya di seluruh Yudea, Ia mulai di Galilea dan sudah sampai ke sini."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his deeds, first and last, behold, they are written in the book of the kings of Israel and Judah.
target: yakni, riwayatnya dari awal sampai akhir, sesungguhnya semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab raja-raja Israel dan Yehuda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when Jabin king of Hazor had heard those things, that he sent to Jobab king of Madon, and to the king of Shimron, and to the king of Achshaph,
target: Setelah hal itu terdengar kepada Yabin, raja Hazor, diutusnyalah orang kepada Yobab, raja Madon, dan kepada raja negeri Simron, kepada raja negeri Akhsaf,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light;
target: Tetapi kamulah bangsa yang terpilih, imamat yang rajani, bangsa yang kudus, umat kepunyaan Allah sendiri, supaya kamu memberitakan perbuatan-perbuatan yang besar dari Dia, yang telah memanggil kamu keluar dari kegelapan kepada terang-Nya yang ajaib:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And four hundred pomegranates for the two networks, even two rows of pomegranates for one network, to cover the two bowls of the chapiters that were upon the pillars;
target: keempat ratus buah delima untuk kedua jala-jala itu, dua jajar buah delima untuk satu jala-jala guna menutupi kedua bulatan ganja yang di atas tiang itu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Rejoice over her, thou heaven, and ye holy apostles and prophets; for God hath avenged you on her.
target: Bersukacitalah atas dia, hai sorga, dan kamu, hai orang-orang kudus, rasul-rasul dan nabi-nabi, karena Allah telah menjatuhkan hukuman atas dia karena kamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his host, and those that were numbered thereof, were fifty and seven thousand and four hundred.
target: Pasukannya terdiri dari lima puluh tujuh ribu empat ratus orang yang dicatat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And so, after he had patiently endured, he obtained the promise.
target: Abraham menanti dengan sabar dan dengan demikian ia memperoleh apa yang dijanjikan kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Solomon had threescore and ten thousand that bare burdens, and fourscore thousand hewers in the mountains;
target: Lagipula Salomo mempunyai tujuh puluh ribu kuli dan delapan puluh ribu tukang pahat di pegunungan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They that dwell in the wilderness shall bow before him; and his enemies shall lick the dust.
target: Kiranya penghuni padang belantara berlutut di depannya, dan musuh-musuhnya menjilat debu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Ahab slept with his fathers; and Ahaziah his son reigned in his stead.
target: Demikianlah Ahab mendapat perhentian bersama-sama dengan nenek moyangnya. Maka Ahazia, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who can number the clouds in wisdom? or who can stay the bottles of heaven,
target: Siapa dapat menghitung awan dengan hikmat, dan siapa dapat mencurahkan tempayan-tempayan langit,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Pride goeth before destruction, and an haughty spirit before a fall.
target: Kecongkakan mendahului kehancuran, dan tinggi hati mendahului kejatuhan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Asahel pursued after Abner; and in going he turned not to the right hand nor to the left from following Abner.
target: Asael mengejar Abner dan tidak menyimpang ke kanan atau ke kiri dalam membuntutinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Is it nothing to you, all ye that pass by? behold, and see if there be any sorrow like unto my sorrow, which is done unto me, wherewith the LORD hath afflicted me in the day of his fierce anger.
target: Acuh tak acuhkah kamu sekalian yang berlalu? Pandanglah dan lihatlah, apakah ada kesedihan seperti kesedihan yang ditimpakan TUHAN kepadaku, untuk membuat aku merana tatkala murka-Nya menyala-nyala!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Beware of false prophets, which come to you in sheep's clothing, but inwardly they are ravening wolves.
target: "Waspadalah terhadap nabi-nabi palsu yang datang kepadamu dengan menyamar seperti domba, tetapi sesungguhnya mereka adalah serigala yang buas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For which cause also I have been much hindered from coming to you.
target: Itulah sebabnya aku selalu terhalang untuk mengunjungi kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the name of the LORD; praise him, O ye servants of the LORD.
target: Haleluya! Pujilah nama TUHAN, pujilah, hai hamba-hamba TUHAN,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, Nay, but to see the nakedness of the land ye are come.
target: Tetapi ia berkata kepada mereka: "Tidak! Kamu datang untuk melihat-lihat di mana negeri ini tidak dijaga."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have refrained my feet from every evil way, that I might keep thy word.
target: Terhadap segala jalan kejahatan aku menahan kakiku, supaya aku berpegang pada firman-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they waited for me as for the rain; and they opened their mouth wide as for the latter rain.
target: Orang menantikan aku seperti menantikan hujan, dan menadahkan mulutnya seperti menadah hujan pada akhir musim.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not have in thy bag divers weights, a great and a small.
target: "Janganlah ada di dalam pundi-pundimu dua macam batu timbangan, yang besar dan yang kecil.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them that stood by, Take from him the pound, and give it to him that hath ten pounds.
target: Lalu katanya kepada orang-orang yang berdiri di situ: Ambillah mina yang satu itu dari padanya dan berikanlah kepada orang yang mempunyai sepuluh mina itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if the avenger of blood pursue after him, then they shall not deliver the slayer up into his hand; because he smote his neighbour unwittingly, and hated him not beforetime.
target: Apabila penuntut tebusan darah itu mengejar dia, pembunuh itu tidak akan diserahkan mereka ke dalam tangannya, sebab ia telah membunuh sesamanya manusia dengan tidak ada niat lebih dahulu, dan dengan tidak menaruh benci kepadanya lebih dahulu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the prince in the midst of them, when they go in, shall go in; and when they go forth, shall go forth.
target: Mengenai raja itu, ia akan masuk bersama-sama mereka dan keluar bersama-sama mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He chose David also his servant, and took him from the sheepfolds:
target: dipilih-Nya Daud, hamba-Nya, diambil-Nya dia dari antara kandang-kandang kambing domba;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea, and they of Jerusalem, and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan, confessing their sins.
target: Lalu datanglah kepadanya orang-orang dari seluruh daerah Yudea dan semua penduduk Yerusalem, dan sambil mengaku dosanya mereka dibaptis di sungai Yordan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall take a censer full of burning coals of fire from off the altar before the LORD, and his hands full of sweet incense beaten small, and bring it within the vail:
target: Dan ia harus mengambil perbaraan berisi penuh bara api dari atas mezbah yang di hadapan TUHAN, serta serangkup penuh ukupan dari wangi-wangian yang digiling sampai halus, lalu membawanya masuk ke belakang tabir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they removed from Makheloth, and encamped at Tahath.
target: Mereka berangkat dari Makhelot, lalu berkemah di Tahat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the cave that is in the field of Machpelah, which is before Mamre, in the land of Canaan, which Abraham bought with the field of Ephron the Hittite for a possession of a buryingplace.
target: dalam gua yang di ladang Makhpela di sebelah timur Mamre di tanah Kanaan, ladang yang telah dibeli Abraham dari Efron, orang Het itu, untuk menjadi kuburan milik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He heard the sound of the trumpet, and took not warning; his blood shall be upon him. But he that taketh warning shall deliver his soul.
target: Ia mendengar suara sangkakala, tetapi ia tidak mau diperingatkan, darahnya tertimpa kepadanya sendiri. Kalau ia mau diperingatkan, ia menyelamatkan nyawanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the firstling of a cow, or the firstling of a sheep, or the firstling of a goat, thou shalt not redeem; they are holy: thou shalt sprinkle their blood upon the altar, and shalt burn their fat for an offering made by fire, for a sweet savour unto the LORD.
target: Tetapi anak sulung lembu, domba atau kambing janganlah kautebus; semuanya itu kudus; darahnya haruslah kausiramkan pada mezbah dan lemaknya kaubakar sebagai korban api-apian menjadi bau yang menyenangkan bagi TUHAN;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When I shall bring thee down with them that descend into the pit, with the people of old time, and shall set thee in the low parts of the earth, in places desolate of old, with them that go down to the pit, that thou be not inhabited; and I shall set glory in the land of the living;
target: maka Aku akan menurunkan engkau, supaya engkau bersama-sama di sana dengan orang-orang yang turun ke liang kubur, kepada bangsa dahulu kala, dan Aku akan membuat engkau tinggal di bumi yang paling bawah seperti reruntuhan dahulu kala, bersama dengan orang-orang yang turun ke liang kubur, supaya engkau jangan lagi didiami orang, dan jangan tampil lagi di negeri orang-orang hidup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And we came to Jerusalem, and abode there three days.
target: Maka tibalah kami di Yerusalem. Sesudah kami tinggal di sana selama tiga hari,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there was war between Asa and Baasha king of Israel all their days.
target: Dan ada perang antara Asa dan Baesa, raja Israel, sepanjang umur mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All the king's servants, and the people of the king's provinces, do know, that whosoever, whether man or women, shall come unto the king into the inner court, who is not called, there is one law of his to put him to death, except such to whom the king shall hold out the golden sceptre, that he may live: but I have not been called to come in unto the king these thirty days.
target: "Semua pegawai raja serta penduduk daerah-daerah kerajaan mengetahui bahwa bagi setiap laki-laki atau perempuan, yang menghadap raja di pelataran dalam dengan tiada dipanggil, hanya berlaku satu undang-undang, yakni hukuman mati. Hanya orang yang kepadanya raja mengulurkan tongkat emas, yang akan tetap hidup. Dan aku selama tiga puluh hari ini tidak dipanggil menghadap raja."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O Lord, thou art my God; I will exalt thee, I will praise thy name; for thou hast done wonderful things; thy counsels of old are faithfulness and truth.
target: Ya TUHAN, Engkaulah Allahku; aku mau meninggikan Engkau, mau menyanyikan syukur bagi nama-Mu; sebab dengan kesetiaan yang teguh Engkau telah melaksanakan rancangan-Mu yang ajaib yang telah ada sejak dahulu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For we must needs die, and are as water spilt on the ground, which cannot be gathered up again; neither doth God respect any person: yet doth he devise means, that his banished be not expelled from him.
target: Sebab kita pasti mati, kita seperti air yang tercurah ke bumi, yang tidak terkumpulkan. Tetapi Allah tidak mengambil nyawa orang, melainkan Ia merancang supaya seorang yang terbuang jangan tinggal terbuang dari pada-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly, he said unto him, Thou art not far from the kingdom of God. And no man after that durst ask him any question.
target: Yesus melihat, bagaimana bijaksananya jawab orang itu, dan Ia berkata kepadanya: "Engkau tidak jauh dari Kerajaan Allah!" Dan seorang pun tidak berani lagi menanyakan sesuatu kepada Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thy word is very pure: therefore thy servant loveth it.
target: Janji-Mu sangat teruji, dan hamba-Mu mencintainya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the arches thereof were toward the outward court; and palm trees were upon the posts thereof, on this side, and on that side: and the going up to it had eight steps.
target: Balai gerbangnya adalah sebelah pelataran luar dan pada tiang-tiang temboknya terukir gambar pohon-pohon korma, sebelah sini dan sebelah sana, dan tangganya ke atas ada delapan tingkat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God came to Laban the Syrian in a dream by night, and said unto him, Take heed that thou speak not to Jacob either good or bad.
target: Pada waktu malam datanglah Allah dalam suatu mimpi kepada Laban, orang Aram itu, serta berfirman kepadanya: "Jagalah baik-baik, supaya engkau jangan mengatai Yakub dengan sepatah kata pun."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If a false witness rise up against any man to testify against him that which is wrong;
target: Apabila seorang saksi jahat menggugat seseorang untuk menuduh dia mengenai suatu pelanggaran,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They part my garments among them, and cast lots upon my vesture.
target: Segala tulangku dapat kuhitung; mereka menonton, mereka memandangi aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Judgments are prepared for scorners, and stripes for the back of fools.
target: Hukuman bagi si pencemooh tersedia dan pukulan bagi punggung orang bebal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The wicked are overthrown, and are not: but the house of the righteous shall stand.
target: Orang fasik dijatuhkan sehingga mereka tidak ada lagi, tetapi rumah orang benar berdiri tetap.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whoso robbeth his father or his mother, and saith, It is no transgression; the same is the companion of a destroyer.
target: Siapa merampasi ayah dan ibunya dan menyangka bahwa itu bukan suatu pelanggaran, ia sendiri adalah kawan si perusak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But God be thanked, that ye were the servants of sin, but ye have obeyed from the heart that form of doctrine which was delivered you.
target: Tetapi syukurlah kepada Allah! Dahulu memang kamu hamba dosa, tetapi sekarang kamu dengan segenap hati telah mentaati pengajaran yang telah diteruskan kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he rose up from prayer, and was come to his disciples, he found them sleeping for sorrow,
target: Lalu Ia bangkit dari doa-Nya dan kembali kepada murid-murid-Nya, tetapi Ia mendapati mereka sedang tidur karena dukacita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be not carried about with divers and strange doctrines. For it is a good thing that the heart be established with grace; not with meats, which have not profited them that have been occupied therein.
target: Janganlah kamu disesatkan oleh berbagai-bagai ajaran asing. Sebab yang baik ialah, bahwa hati kamu diperkuat dengan kasih karunia dan bukan dengan pelbagai makanan yang tidak memberi faedah kepada mereka yang menuruti aturan-aturan makanan macam itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if there be no interpreter, let him keep silence in the church; and let him speak to himself, and to God.
target: Jika tidak ada orang yang dapat menafsirkannya, hendaklah mereka berdiam diri dalam pertemuan Jemaat dan hanya boleh berkata-kata kepada dirinya sendiri dan kepada Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee, which is the sea of Tiberias.
target: Sesudah itu Yesus berangkat ke seberang danau Galilea, yaitu danau Tiberias.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That made the world as a wilderness, and destroyed the cities thereof; that opened not the house of his prisoners?
target: yang telah membuat dunia seperti padang gurun, dan menghancurkan kota-kotanya, yang tidak melepaskan orang-orangnya yang terkurung pulang ke rumah?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he that betrayed him had given them a token, saying, Whomsoever I shall kiss, that same is he; take him, and lead him away safely.
target: Orang yang menyerahkan Dia telah memberitahukan tanda ini kepada mereka: "Orang yang akan kucium, itulah Dia, tangkaplah Dia dan bawalah Dia dengan selamat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This is the generation of them that seek him, that seek thy face, O Jacob. Selah.
target: Itulah angkatan orang-orang yang menanyakan Dia, yang mencari wajah-Mu, ya Allah Yakub." S e l a

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I said unto them, If ye think good, give me my price; and if not, forbear. So they weighed for my price thirty pieces of silver.
target: Lalu aku berkata kepada mereka: "Jika itu kamu anggap baik, berikanlah upahku, dan jika tidak, biarkanlah!" Maka mereka membayar upahku dengan menimbang tiga puluh uang perak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And upon a set day Herod, arrayed in royal apparel, sat upon his throne, and made an oration unto them.
target: Dan pada suatu hari yang ditentukan, Herodes mengenakan pakaian kerajaan, lalu duduk di atas takhta dan berpidato kepada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore they sacrifice unto their net, and burn incense unto their drag; because by them their portion is fat, and their meat plenteous.
target: Itulah sebabnya dipersembahkannya korban untuk pukatnya dan dibakarnya korban untuk payangnya; sebab oleh karena alat-alat itu pendapatannya mewah dan rezekinya berlimpah-limpah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Deep calleth unto deep at the noise of thy waterspouts: all thy waves and thy billows are gone over me.
target: Jiwaku tertekan dalam diriku, sebab itu aku teringat kepada-Mu dari tanah sungai Yordan dan pegunungan Hermon, dari gunung Mizar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Isaiah said, Take a lump of figs. And they took and laid it on the boil, and he recovered.
target: Kemudian berkatalah Yesaya: "Ambillah sebuah kue ara!" Lalu orang mengambilnya dan ditaruh pada barah itu, maka sembuhlah ia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Go, and gather the elders of Israel together, and say unto them, The LORD God of your fathers, the God of Abraham, of Isaac, and of Jacob, appeared unto me, saying, I have surely visited you, and seen that which is done to you in Egypt:
target: Pergilah, kumpulkanlah para tua-tua Israel dan katakanlah kepada mereka: TUHAN, Allah nenek moyangmu, Allah Abraham, Ishak dan Yakub, telah menampakkan diri kepadaku, serta berfirman: Aku sudah mengindahkan kamu, juga apa yang dilakukan kepadamu di Mesir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of the sin offering, and slay the sin offering in the place of the burnt offering.
target: Lalu haruslah ia meletakkan tangannya ke atas kepala korban penghapus dosa dan menyembelih korban itu di tempat korban bakaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he had made a scourge of small cords, he drove them all out of the temple, and the sheep, and the oxen; and poured out the changers' money, and overthrew the tables;
target: Ia membuat cambuk dari tali lalu mengusir mereka semua dari Bait Suci dengan semua kambing domba dan lembu mereka; uang penukar-penukar dihamburkan-Nya ke tanah dan meja-meja mereka dibalikkan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He pursued them, and passed safely; even by the way that he had not gone with his feet.
target: Ia mengejar mereka dan dengan selamat ia melalui jalan yang belum pernah diinjak kakinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they burnt the house of God, and brake down the wall of Jerusalem, and burnt all the palaces thereof with fire, and destroyed all the goodly vessels thereof.
target: Mereka membakar rumah Allah, merobohkan tembok Yerusalem dan membakar segala puri dalam kota itu dengan api, sehingga musnahlah segala perabotannya yang indah-indah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Jehosheba, the daughter of king Joram, sister of Ahaziah, took Joash the son of Ahaziah, and stole him from among the king's sons which were slain; and they hid him, even him and his nurse, in the bedchamber from Athaliah, so that he was not slain.
target: Tetapi Yoseba, anak perempuan raja Yoram, saudara perempuan Ahazia, mengambil Yoas bin Ahazia, menculik dia dari tengah-tengah anak-anak raja yang hendak dibunuh itu, memasukkan dia dengan inang penyusunya ke dalam gudang tempat tidur, dan menyembunyikan dia terhadap Atalya, sehingga dia tidak dibunuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD shall reign for ever and ever.
target: TUHAN memerintah kekal selama-lamanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he had dominion over all the region on this side the river, from Tiphsah even to Azzah, over all the kings on this side the river: and he had peace on all sides round about him.
target: sebab ia berkuasa atas seluruh tanah di sebelah sini sungai Efrat, mulai dari Tifsah sampai ke Gaza, dan atas semua raja di sebelah sini sungai Efrat; ia dikaruniai damai di seluruh negerinya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he answered and said unto them, I tell you that, if these should hold their peace, the stones would immediately cry out.
target: Jawab-Nya: "Aku berkata kepadamu: Jika mereka ini diam, maka batu ini akan berteriak."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of Hilkiah, Hashabiah; of Jedaiah, Nethaneel.
target: Hasabya dari kaum keluarga Hilkia dan Netaneel dari kaum keluarga Yedaya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that feared the word of the LORD among the servants of Pharaoh made his servants and his cattle flee into the houses:
target: Maka siapa di antara para pegawai Firaun yang takut kepada firman TUHAN, menyuruh hamba-hambanya serta ternaknya lari ke rumah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They are all hot as an oven, and have devoured their judges; all their kings are fallen: there is none among them that calleth unto me.
target: Mereka semua sudah panas seperti dapur perapian, dan memakan habis para hakim mereka. Semua raja mereka sudah tewas, tidak ada seorang di antara mereka yang berseru kepada-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wealth maketh many friends; but the poor is separated from his neighbour.
target: Kekayaan menambah banyak sahabat, tetapi orang miskin ditinggalkan sahabatnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Your country is desolate, your cities are burned with fire: your land, strangers devour it in your presence, and it is desolate, as overthrown by strangers.
target: Negerimu menjadi sunyi sepi, kota-kotamu habis terbakar; di depan matamu orang-orang asing memakan hasil dari tanahmu. Sunyi sepi negeri itu seolah-olah ditunggangbalikkan orang asing.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of Benjamin; Abidan the son of Gideoni.
target: dari suku Benyamin: Abidan bin Gideoni;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Gibeon, and Ramah, and Beeroth,
target: Gibeon, Rama, Beerot,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sabbath of the land shall be meat for you; for thee, and for thy servant, and for thy maid, and for thy hired servant, and for thy stranger that sojourneth with thee.
target: Hasil tanah selama sabat itu haruslah menjadi makanan bagimu, yakni bagimu sendiri, bagi budakmu laki-laki, bagi budakmu perempuan, bagi orang upahan dan bagi orang asing di antaramu, yang semuanya tinggal padamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hast made the earth to tremble; thou hast broken it: heal the breaches thereof; for it shaketh.
target: ketika ia memerangi orang Aram-Mesopotamia dan orang Aram-Zoba, dan ketika Yoab pada waktu pulang telah memukul kalah dua belas ribu orang Edom di Lembah Asin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Abram said unto Sarai, Behold, thy maid is in thine hand; do to her as it pleaseth thee. And when Sarai dealt hardly with her, she fled from her face.
target: Kata Abram kepada Sarai: "Hambamu itu di bawah kekuasaanmu; perbuatlah kepadanya apa yang kaupandang baik." Lalu Sarai menindas Hagar, sehingga ia lari meninggalkannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He sent divers sorts of flies among them, which devoured them; and frogs, which destroyed them.
target: Ia melepaskan kepada mereka lalat pikat yang memakan mereka, dan katak-katak yang memusnahkan mereka;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Do ye indeed speak righteousness, O congregation? do ye judge uprightly, O ye sons of men?
target: Untuk pemimpin biduan. Menurut lagu: Jangan memusnahkan. Miktam dari Daud.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Moses hands were heavy; and they took a stone, and put it under him, and he sat thereon; and Aaron and Hur stayed up his hands, the one on the one side, and the other on the other side; and his hands were steady until the going down of the sun.
target: Maka penatlah tangan Musa, sebab itu mereka mengambil sebuah batu, diletakkanlah di bawahnya, supaya ia duduk di atasnya; Harun dan Hur menopang kedua belah tangannya, seorang di sisi yang satu, seorang di sisi yang lain, sehingga tangannya tidak bergerak sampai matahari terbenam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And on the sabbath day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, and the drink offering thereof:
target: "Pada hari Sabat: dua ekor domba berumur setahun yang tidak bercela, dan dua persepuluh efa tepung yang terbaik sebagai korban sajian, diolah dengan minyak, serta dengan korban curahannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My beloved is like a roe or a young hart: behold, he standeth behind our wall, he looketh forth at the windows, shewing himself through the lattice.
target: Kekasihku serupa kijang, atau anak rusa. Lihatlah, ia berdiri di balik dinding kita, sambil menengok-nengok melalui tingkap-tingkap dan melihat dari kisi-kisi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD gave the people favour in the sight of the Egyptians. Moreover the man Moses was very great in the land of Egypt, in the sight of Pharaoh's servants, and in the sight of the people.
target: Lalu TUHAN membuat orang Mesir bermurah hati terhadap bangsa itu; lagipula Musa adalah seorang yang sangat terpandang di tanah Mesir, di mata pegawai-pegawai Firaun dan di mata rakyat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Uriah the Hittite: thirty and seven in all.
target: Uria, orang Het, semuanya tiga puluh tujuh orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as they departed from Jericho, a great multitude followed him.
target: Dan ketika Yesus dan murid-murid-Nya keluar dari Yerikho, orang banyak berbondong-bondong mengikuti Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And another of his disciples said unto him, Lord, suffer me first to go and bury my father.
target: Seorang lain, yaitu salah seorang murid-Nya, berkata kepada-Nya: "Tuhan, izinkanlah aku pergi dahulu menguburkan ayahku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD delivered them into the hand of Israel, who smote them, and chased them unto great Zidon, and unto Misrephothmaim, and unto the valley of Mizpeh eastward; and they smote them, until they left them none remaining.
target: Dan TUHAN menyerahkan mereka kepada orang Israel. Mereka dikalahkan dan dikejar sampai Sidon-Besar dan sampai Misrefot-Maim, dan sampai lembah Mizpa yang di sebelah timur. Demikianlah mereka dihancurkan, sehingga tidak seorang pun dari mereka yang dibiarkan lolos.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And king Arad the Canaanite, which dwelt in the south in the land of Canaan, heard of the coming of the children of Israel.
target: Pada waktu itu raja negeri Arad, orang Kanaan itu, yang tinggal di Tanah Negeb di tanah Kanaan, mendengar kabar tentang kedatangan orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: She saith unto him, Yea, Lord: I believe that thou art the Christ, the Son of God, which should come into the world.
target: Jawab Marta: "Ya, Tuhan, aku percaya, bahwa Engkaulah Mesias, Anak Allah, Dia yang akan datang ke dalam dunia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his servants came near, and spake unto him, and said, My father, if the prophet had bid thee do some great thing, wouldest thou not have done it? how much rather then, when he saith to thee, Wash, and be clean?
target: Tetapi pegawai-pegawainya datang mendekat serta berkata kepadanya: "Bapak, seandainya nabi itu menyuruh perkara yang sukar kepadamu, bukankah bapak akan melakukannya? Apalagi sekarang, ia hanya berkata kepadamu: Mandilah dan engkau akan menjadi tahir."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There the righteous might dispute with him; so should I be delivered for ever from my judge.
target: Orang jujurlah yang akan membela diri di hadapan-Nya, dan aku akan bebas dari Hakimku untuk selama-lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I gathered them together to the river that runneth to Ahava; and there abode we in tents three days: and I viewed the people, and the priests, and found there none of the sons of Levi.
target: Aku menghimpunkan mereka dekat sungai yang mengalir ke Ahawa dan di sana kami berkemah tiga hari lamanya. Ketika kuselidiki mereka, ternyata ada orang-orang Israel awam dan imam-imam, tetapi tidak kudapati di antara mereka orang-orang dari bani Lewi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses said unto Aaron, and unto Eleazar and unto Ithamar, his sons, Uncover not your heads, neither rend your clothes; lest ye die, and lest wrath come upon all the people: but let your brethren, the whole house of Israel, bewail the burning which the LORD hath kindled.
target: Kemudian berkatalah Musa kepada Harun dan kepada Eleazar dan Itamar, anak-anak Harun: "Janganlah kamu berkabung dan janganlah kamu berdukacita, supaya jangan kamu mati dan jangan TUHAN memurkai segenap umat ini, tetapi saudara-saudaramu, yaitu seluruh bangsa Israel, merekalah yang harus menangis karena api yang dinyalakan TUHAN itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So concerning them Moses commanded Eleazar the priest, and Joshua the son of Nun, and the chief fathers of the tribes of the children of Israel:
target: Lalu Musa memberi perintah mengenai mereka kepada imam Eleazar dan kepada Yosua bin Nun, dan kepada kepala-kepala puak dari suku-suku Israel,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And again, Praise the Lord, all ye Gentiles; and laud him, all ye people.
target: Dan lagi: "Pujilah Tuhan, hai kamu semua bangsa-bangsa, dan biarlah segala suku bangsa memuji Dia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore, O Aholibah, thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I will raise up thy lovers against thee, from whom thy mind is alienated, and I will bring them against thee on every side;
target: Oleh sebab itu, hai Oholiba, beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH, memang engkau sudah menjauhkan dirimu dari kekasih-kekasihmu, tetapi sungguh, Aku akan menyuruh mereka bergerak melawan engkau; Aku akan membawa mereka melawan engkau dari sekitarmu:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now therefore hear the word of the LORD, ye remnant of Judah; Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; If ye wholly set your faces to enter into Egypt, and go to sojourn there;
target: maka dengarkanlah sekarang firman Allah, hai sisa Yehuda: Beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam, Allah Israel: Jika kamu sungguh-sungguh berniat hendak pergi ke Mesir, dan memang kamu pergi dan tinggal sebagai orang asing di sana,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then she fell on her face, and bowed herself to the ground, and said unto him, Why have I found grace in thine eyes, that thou shouldest take knowledge of me, seeing I am a stranger?
target: Lalu sujudlah Rut menyembah dengan mukanya sampai ke tanah dan berkata kepadanya: "Mengapakah aku mendapat belas kasihan dari padamu, sehingga tuan memperhatikan aku, padahal aku ini seorang asing?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his men that were with him did David bring up, every man with his household: and they dwelt in the cities of Hebron.
target: Juga Daud membawa serta orang-orangnya yang mengiringinya masing-masing dengan rumah tangganya, dan menetaplah mereka di kota-kota Hebron.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as he lay and slept under a juniper tree, behold, then an angel touched him, and said unto him, Arise and eat.
target: Sesudah itu ia berbaring dan tidur di bawah pohon arar itu. Tetapi tiba-tiba seorang malaikat menyentuh dia serta berkata kepadanya: "Bangunlah, makanlah!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not plow with an ox and an ass together.
target: Janganlah engkau membajak dengan lembu dan keledai bersama-sama.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Their land brought forth frogs in abundance, in the chambers of their kings.
target: Katak-katak berkeriapan di negeri mereka, bahkan di kamar-kamar raja mereka;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Solomon sought therefore to kill Jeroboam. And Jeroboam arose, and fled into Egypt, unto Shishak king of Egypt, and was in Egypt until the death of Solomon.
target: Lalu Salomo berikhtiar membunuh Yerobeam, tetapi Yerobeam bangkit dan melarikan diri ke Mesir, kepada Sisak, raja Mesir, dan di Mesirlah ia tinggal sampai Salomo mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There is no man that hath power over the spirit to retain the spirit; neither hath he power in the day of death: and there is no discharge in that war; neither shall wickedness deliver those that are given to it.
target: Tiada seorang pun berkuasa menahan angin dan tiada seorang pun berkuasa atas hari kematian. Tak ada istirahat dalam peperangan, dan kefasikan tidak melepaskan orang yang melakukannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Zadok the priest, and Nathan the prophet, and Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and the Cherethites, and the Pelethites, went down, and caused Solomon to ride upon king David's mule, and brought him to Gihon.
target: Lalu pergilah imam Zadok, nabi Natan dan Benaya bin Yoyada, dengan orang Kreti dan orang Pleti, mereka menaikkan Salomo ke atas bagal betina raja Daud dan membawanya ke Gihon.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the beasts go into dens, and remain in their places.
target: Maka binatang liar masuk ke dalam tempat persembunyiannya dan tinggal dalam sarangnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yea, though they have hired among the nations, now will I gather them, and they shall sorrow a little for the burden of the king of princes.
target: Sekalipun mereka membagi-bagi hadiah itu di antara bangsa-bangsa, sekarang ini Aku akan mengumpulkan mereka, dan sebentar lagi mereka akan berhenti mengurapi raja dan para pemuka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus said, Make the men sit down. Now there was much grass in the place. So the men sat down, in number about five thousand.
target: Kata Yesus: "Suruhlah orang-orang itu duduk." Adapun di tempat itu banyak rumput. Maka duduklah orang-orang itu, kira-kira lima ribu laki-laki banyaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if ye refuse and rebel, ye shall be devoured with the sword: for the mouth of the LORD hath spoken it.
target: Tetapi jika kamu melawan dan memberontak, maka kamu akan dimakan oleh pedang." Sungguh, TUHAN yang mengucapkannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That they all may be one; as thou, Father, art in me, and I in thee, that they also may be one in us: that the world may believe that thou hast sent me.
target: supaya mereka semua menjadi satu, sama seperti Engkau, ya Bapa, di dalam Aku dan Aku di dalam Engkau, agar mereka juga di dalam Kita, supaya dunia percaya, bahwa Engkaulah yang telah mengutus Aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye shall tell my father of all my glory in Egypt, and of all that ye have seen; and ye shall haste and bring down my father hither.
target: Sebab itu ceritakanlah kepada bapa segala kemuliaanku di negeri Mesir ini, dan segala yang telah kamu lihat, kemudian segeralah bawa bapa ke mari."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto him, Man, who made me a judge or a divider over you?
target: Tetapi Yesus berkata kepadanya: "Saudara, siapakah yang telah mengangkat Aku menjadi hakim atau pengantara atas kamu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And hath raised us up together, and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus:
target: dan di dalam Kristus Yesus Ia telah membangkitkan kita juga dan memberikan tempat bersama-sama dengan Dia di sorga,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore said he, Take it up to thee. And he put out his hand, and took it.
target: Lalu katanya: "Ambillah." Orang itu mengulurkan tangannya dan mengambilnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So ye in like manner, when ye shall see these things come to pass, know that it is nigh, even at the doors.
target: Demikian juga, jika kamu lihat hal-hal itu terjadi, ketahuilah bahwa waktunya sudah dekat, sudah di ambang pintu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said unto Moses, Write thou these words: for after the tenor of these words I have made a covenant with thee and with Israel.
target: Berfirmanlah TUHAN kepada Musa: "Tuliskanlah segala firman ini, sebab berdasarkan firman ini telah Kuadakan perjanjian dengan engkau dan dengan Israel."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: What thing shall I take to witness for thee? what thing shall I liken to thee, O daughter of Jerusalem? what shall I equal to thee, that I may comfort thee, O virgin daughter of Zion? for thy breach is great like the sea: who can heal thee?
target: Apa yang dapat kunyatakan kepadamu, dengan apa aku dapat menyamakan engkau, ya puteri Yerusalem? Dengan apa aku dapat membandingkan engkau untuk dihibur, ya dara, puteri Sion? Karena luas bagaikan laut reruntuhanmu; siapa yang akan memulihkan engkau?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made he him;
target: Inilah daftar keturunan Adam. Pada waktu manusia itu diciptakan oleh Allah, dibuat-Nyalah dia menurut rupa Allah;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it is yet far more evident: for that after the similitude of Melchisedec there ariseth another priest,
target: Dan hal itu jauh lebih nyata lagi, jikalau ditetapkan seorang imam lain menurut cara Melkisedek,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king said unto his servants, Know ye not that there is a prince and a great man fallen this day in Israel?
target: Kemudian berkatalah raja kepada para pegawainya: "Tidak tahukah kamu, bahwa pada hari ini gugur seorang pemimpin, seorang besar, di Israel?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All the males among the children of Aaron shall eat of it. It shall be a statute for ever in your generations concerning the offerings of the LORD made by fire: every one that toucheth them shall be holy.
target: Setiap laki-laki di antara anak-anak Harun haruslah memakannya; itulah suatu ketetapan untuk selamanya bagi kamu turun-temurun; itulah bagianmu dari segala korban api-apian TUHAN. Setiap orang yang kena kepada korban-korban itu menjadi kudus."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because the sons of Jonadab the son of Rechab have performed the commandment of their father, which he commanded them; but this people hath not hearkened unto me:
target: Sungguh, keturunan Yonadab bin Rekhab menepati perintah yang diberikan bapa leluhurnya kepada mereka, tetapi bangsa ini tidak mau mendengarkan Aku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Know ye not, that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey, his servants ye are to whom ye obey; whether of sin unto death, or of obedience unto righteousness?
target: Apakah kamu tidak tahu, bahwa apabila kamu menyerahkan dirimu kepada seseorang sebagai hamba untuk mentaatinya, kamu adalah hamba orang itu, yang harus kamu taati, baik dalam dosa yang memimpin kamu kepada kematian, maupun dalam ketaatan yang memimpin kamu kepada kebenaran?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord:
target: sesuai dengan maksud abadi, yang telah dilaksanakan-Nya dalam Kristus Yesus, Tuhan kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus went forth, and saw a great multitude, and was moved with compassion toward them, and he healed their sick.
target: Ketika Yesus mendarat, Ia melihat orang banyak yang besar jumlahnya, maka tergeraklah hati-Nya oleh belas kasihan kepada mereka dan Ia menyembuhkan mereka yang sakit.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Zacharias saw him, he was troubled, and fear fell upon him.
target: Melihat hal itu ia terkejut dan menjadi takut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment: and it was early; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall, lest they should be defiled; but that they might eat the passover.
target: Maka mereka membawa Yesus dari Kayafas ke gedung pengadilan. Ketika itu hari masih pagi. Mereka sendiri tidak masuk ke gedung pengadilan itu, supaya jangan menajiskan diri, sebab mereka hendak makan Paskah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt put pure frankincense upon each row, that it may be on the bread for a memorial, even an offering made by fire unto the LORD.
target: Engkau harus membubuh kemenyan tulen di atas tiap-tiap susun; kemenyan itulah yang harus menjadi bagian ingat-ingatan roti itu, yakni suatu korban api-apian bagi TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Zedekiah the son of Chenaanah went near, and smote Micaiah on the cheek, and said, Which way went the Spirit of the LORD from me to speak unto thee?
target: Sesudah itu tampillah Zedekia bin Kenaana, ditamparnyalah pipi Mikha serta berkata: "Mana boleh Roh TUHAN pindah dari padaku untuk berbicara kepadamu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The word that the LORD spake to Jeremiah the prophet, how Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon should come and smite the land of Egypt.
target: Firman yang disampaikan TUHAN kepada nabi Yeremia tentang datangnya Nebukadnezar, raja Babel, untuk memukul kalah tanah Mesir:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: His legs of iron, his feet part of iron and part of clay.
target: sedang pahanya dari besi dengan kakinya sebagian dari besi dan sebagian lagi dari tanah liat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Is it time for you, O ye, to dwell in your cieled houses, and this house lie waste?
target: "Apakah sudah tiba waktunya bagi kamu untuk mendiami rumah-rumahmu yang dipapani dengan baik, sedang Rumah ini tetap menjadi reruntuhan?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if the bright spot stay in his place, and spread not, it is a burning boil; and the priest shall pronounce him clean.
target: Tetapi jikalau panau itu masih tetap dan tidak meluas, maka itu bekas barah, dan imam harus menyatakan orang itu tahir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Remember thy congregation, which thou hast purchased of old; the rod of thine inheritance, which thou hast redeemed; this mount Zion, wherein thou hast dwelt.
target: Ingatlah akan umat-Mu yang telah Kauperoleh pada zaman purbakala, yang Kautebus menjadi bangsa milik-Mu sendiri! Ingatlah akan gunung Sion yang Engkau diami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And that Jacob obeyed his father and his mother, and was gone to Padanaram;
target: dan bahwa Yakub mendengarkan perkataan ayah dan ibunya, dan pergi ke Padan-Aram,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So kill the passover, and sanctify yourselves, and prepare your brethren, that they may do according to the word of the LORD by the hand of Moses.
target: Sembelihlah domba Paskah, kuduskanlah dirimu, dan adakanlah persiapan bagi saudara-saudaramu, supaya dilakukan apa yang difirmankan TUHAN dengan perantaraan Musa."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will put enmity between thee and the woman, and between thy seed and her seed; it shall bruise thy head, and thou shalt bruise his heel.
target: Aku akan mengadakan permusuhan antara engkau dan perempuan ini, antara keturunanmu dan keturunannya; keturunannya akan meremukkan kepalamu, dan engkau akan meremukkan tumitnya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the third year of Cyrus king of Persia a thing was revealed unto Daniel, whose name was called Belteshazzar; and the thing was true, but the time appointed was long: and he understood the thing, and had understanding of the vision.
target: Pada tahun ketiga pemerintahan Koresh, raja orang Persia, suatu firman dinyatakan kepada Daniel yang diberi nama Beltsazar; firman itu benar dan mengenai kesusahan yang besar. Maka dicamkannyalah firman itu dan diperhatikannyalah penglihatan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My defence is of God, which saveth the upright in heart.
target: Biarlah berakhir kejahatan orang fasik, tetapi teguhkanlah orang yang benar, Engkau, yang menguji hati dan batin orang, ya Allah yang adil.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As for Elkanah: the sons of Elkanah; Zophai his son, and Nahath his son,
target: dan anak orang ini ialah Elkana, dan anak orang ini ialah Zofai, dan anak orang ini ialah Nahat,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Over the first course for the first month was Jashobeam the son of Zabdiel: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
target: Yang mengepalai rombongan pertama untuk bulan pertama ialah Yasobam bin Zabdiel dan dalam rombongannya ada dua puluh empat ribu orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They are like unto children sitting in the marketplace, and calling one to another, and saying, We have piped unto you, and ye have not danced; we have mourned to you, and ye have not wept.
target: Mereka itu seumpama anak-anak yang duduk di pasar dan yang saling menyerukan: Kami meniup seruling bagimu, tetapi kamu tidak menari, kami menyanyikan kidung duka, tetapi kamu tidak menangis.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But he answered and said, Every plant, which my heavenly Father hath not planted, shall be rooted up.
target: Jawab Yesus: "Setiap tanaman yang tidak ditanam oleh Bapa-Ku yang di sorga akan dicabut dengan akar-akarnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which the clouds do drop and distil upon man abundantly.
target: yang dicurahkan oleh mendung, dan disiramkan ke atas banyak manusia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And, behold, the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom; and the earth did quake, and the rocks rent;
target: Dan lihatlah, tabir Bait Suci terbelah dua dari atas sampai ke bawah dan terjadilah gempa bumi, dan bukit-bukit batu terbelah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he looked on him, he was afraid, and said, What is it, Lord? And he said unto him, Thy prayers and thine alms are come up for a memorial before God.
target: Ia menatap malaikat itu dan dengan takut ia berkata: "Ada apa, Tuhan?" Jawab malaikat itu: "Semua doamu dan sedekahmu telah naik ke hadirat Allah dan Allah mengingat engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Zedekiah the king sware secretly unto Jeremiah, saying, As the LORD liveth, that made us this soul, I will not put thee to death, neither will I give thee into the hand of these men that seek thy life.
target: Lalu bersumpahlah raja Zedekia dengan diam-diam kepada Yeremia, katanya: "Demi TUHAN yang hidup yang telah memberi nyawa ini kepada kita, aku tidak akan membunuh engkau dan tidak akan menyerahkan engkau ke dalam tangan orang-orang yang berusaha mencabut nyawamu itu!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Take therefore the talent from him, and give it unto him which hath ten talents.
target: Sebab itu ambillah talenta itu dari padanya dan berikanlah kepada orang yang mempunyai sepuluh talenta itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he brought into the house of God the things that his father had dedicated, and that he himself had dedicated, silver, and gold, and vessels.
target: Ia membawa persembahan-persembahan kudus ayahnya dan persembahan-persembahan kudusnya sendiri ke rumah Allah, yakni emas dan perak serta barang-barang lain.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: We have given the hand to the Egyptians, and to the Assyrians, to be satisfied with bread.
target: Kami mengulurkan tangan kepada Mesir, dan kepada Asyur untuk menjadi kenyang dengan roti.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abimelech the son of Jerubbaal went to Shechem unto his mother's brethren, and communed with them, and with all the family of the house of his mother's father, saying,
target: Adapun Abimelekh bin Yerubaal pergi ke Sikhem kepada saudara-saudara ibunya dan berkata kepada mereka dan kepada seluruh kaum dari pihak keluarga ibunya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Zadok the priest, and his brethren the priests, before the tabernacle of the LORD in the high place that was at Gibeon,
target: Tetapi Zadok, imam itu, dan saudara-saudara sepuaknya, para imam, ditinggalkannya di hadapan Kemah Suci TUHAN di bukit pengorbanan yang di Gibeon,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I tell you, Nay: but, except ye repent, ye shall all likewise perish.
target: Tidak! kata-Ku kepadamu. Tetapi jikalau kamu tidak bertobat, kamu semua akan binasa atas cara demikian."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hear me now therefore, O ye children, and depart not from the words of my mouth.
target: Sebab itu, hai anak-anak, dengarkanlah aku, janganlah kamu menyimpang dari pada perkataan mulutku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the seventh month, in the fifteenth day of the month, shall he do the like in the feast of the seven days, according to the sin offering, according to the burnt offering, and according to the meat offering, and according to the oil.
target: Pada bulan ketujuh, pada tanggal lima belas bulan itu, yaitu pada hari raya, ia harus mengolah seperti ini selama tujuh hari: korban penghapus dosa, korban bakaran, korban sajian dan minyak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD; If heaven above can be measured, and the foundations of the earth searched out beneath, I will also cast off all the seed of Israel for all that they have done, saith the LORD.
target: Beginilah firman TUHAN: Sesungguhnya, seperti langit di atas tidak terukur dan dasar-dasar bumi di bawah tidak terselidiki, demikianlah juga Aku tidak akan menolak segala keturunan Israel, karena segala apa yang dilakukan mereka, demikianlah firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And my people are bent to backsliding from me: though they called them to the most High, none at all would exalt him.
target: Umat-Ku betah dalam membelakangi Aku; mereka memanggil kepada Baal dan berhenti meninggikan nama-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For every one of the house of Israel, or of the stranger that sojourneth in Israel, which separateth himself from me, and setteth up his idols in his heart, and putteth the stumblingblock of his iniquity before his face, and cometh to a prophet to enquire of him concerning me; I the LORD will answer him by myself:
target: Karena setiap orang, baik dari kaum Israel maupun dari orang-orang asing yang tinggal di tengah-tengah Israel, yang menyimpang dari pada-Ku dan menjunjung berhala-berhalanya dalam hatinya dan menempatkan di hadapannya batu sandungan, yang menjatuhkannya ke dalam kesalahan, lalu datang menemui nabi untuk meminta petunjuk dari pada-Ku baginya — Aku, TUHAN sendiri akan menjawab dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And, behold, there arose a great tempest in the sea, insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves: but he was asleep.
target: Sekonyong-konyong mengamuklah angin ribut di danau itu, sehingga perahu itu ditimbus gelombang, tetapi Yesus tidur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jonathan Saul's son arose, and went to David into the wood, and strengthened his hand in God.
target: maka bersiaplah Yonatan, anak Saul, lalu pergi kepada Daud di Koresa. Ia menguatkan kepercayaan Daud kepada Allah

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For though I be free from all men, yet have I made myself servant unto all, that I might gain the more.
target: Sungguhpun aku bebas terhadap semua orang, aku menjadikan diriku hamba dari semua orang, supaya aku boleh memenangkan sebanyak mungkin orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the law was given by Moses, but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ.
target: sebab hukum Taurat diberikan oleh Musa, tetapi kasih karunia dan kebenaran datang oleh Yesus Kristus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jacob went out from Beersheba, and went toward Haran.
target: Maka Yakub berangkat dari Bersyeba dan pergi ke Haran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the plain on this side Jordan eastward, even unto the sea of the plain, under the springs of Pisgah.
target: serta seluruh dataran di seberang sungai Yordan, di sebelah timur, sampai Laut Araba, di kaki lereng gunung Pisga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the king of Assyria came up throughout all the land, and went up to Samaria, and besieged it three years.
target: Kemudian majulah raja Asyur menjelajah seluruh negeri itu, ia menyerang Samaria dan mengepungnya tiga tahun lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they slew of Moab at that time about ten thousand men, all lusty, and all men of valour; and there escaped not a man.
target: Pada waktu itu mereka menewaskan kira-kira sepuluh ribu orang dari Moab, semuanya orang yang tegap dan tangkas, seorang pun tidak ada yang lolos.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then will I remember my covenant with Jacob, and also my covenant with Isaac, and also my covenant with Abraham will I remember; and I will remember the land.
