target: maka Aku akan mengingat perjanjian-Ku dengan Yakub; juga perjanjian dengan Ishak dan perjanjian-Ku dengan Abraham pun akan Kuingat dan negeri itu akan Kuingat juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there shall arise after them seven years of famine; and all the plenty shall be forgotten in the land of Egypt; and the famine shall consume the land;
target: Kemudian akan timbul tujuh tahun kelaparan; maka akan dilupakan segala kelimpahan itu di tanah Mesir, karena kelaparan itu menguruskeringkan negeri ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Where there is no vision, the people perish: but he that keepeth the law, happy is he.
target: Bila tidak ada wahyu, menjadi liarlah rakyat. Berbahagialah orang yang berpegang pada hukum.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Elkanah went to Ramah to his house. And the child did minister unto the LORD before Eli the priest.
target: Lalu pulanglah Elkana ke Rama tetapi anak itu menjadi pelayan TUHAN di bawah pengawasan imam Eli.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither did we eat any man's bread for nought; but wrought with labour and travail night and day, that we might not be chargeable to any of you:
target: dan tidak makan roti orang dengan percuma, tetapi kami berusaha dan berjerih payah siang malam, supaya jangan menjadi beban bagi siapa pun di antara kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When he is about to fill his belly, God shall cast the fury of his wrath upon him, and shall rain it upon him while he is eating.
target: Untuk mengisi perutnya, Allah melepaskan ke atasnya murka-Nya yang menyala-nyala, dan menghujankan itu kepadanya sebagai makanannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the men pursued after them the way to Jordan unto the fords: and as soon as they which pursued after them were gone out, they shut the gate.
target: Maka pergilah orang-orang itu, mengejar mereka ke arah sungai Yordan, ke tempat-tempat penyeberangan, dan ditutuplah pintu gerbang, segera sesudah pengejar-pengejar itu keluar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And a mitre of fine linen, and goodly bonnets of fine linen, and linen breeches of fine twined linen,
target: serban dari lenan halus, destar yang indah dari lenan halus, celana lenan dari lenan halus yang dipintal benangnya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: No man that warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of this life; that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a soldier.
target: Seorang prajurit yang sedang berjuang tidak memusingkan dirinya dengan soal-soal penghidupannya, supaya dengan demikian ia berkenan kepada komandannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Every man's work shall be made manifest: for the day shall declare it, because it shall be revealed by fire; and the fire shall try every man's work of what sort it is.
target: sekali kelak pekerjaan masing-masing orang akan nampak. Karena hari Tuhan akan menyatakannya, sebab ia akan nampak dengan api dan bagaimana pekerjaan masing-masing orang akan diuji oleh api itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if ye shall still do wickedly, ye shall be consumed, both ye and your king.
target: Tetapi jika kamu terus berbuat jahat, maka kamu akan dilenyapkan, baik kamu maupun rajamu itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the rulers of the provinces, and the lieutenants, and the deputies, and officers of the king, helped the Jews; because the fear of Mordecai fell upon them.
target: Dan semua pembesar daerah dan wakil pemerintahan dan bupati serta pejabat kerajaan menyokong orang Yahudi, karena ketakutan kepada Mordekhai telah menimpa mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be thou instructed, O Jerusalem, lest my soul depart from thee; lest I make thee desolate, a land not inhabited.
target: Terimalah penghajaran, hai Yerusalem, supaya Aku jangan menarik diri dari padamu, supaya Aku jangan membuat engkau sunyi sepi, menjadi negeri yang tidak berpenduduk!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither shall they defile themselves any more with their idols, nor with their detestable things, nor with any of their transgressions: but I will save them out of all their dwellingplaces, wherein they have sinned, and will cleanse them: so shall they be my people, and I will be their God.
target: Mereka tidak lagi menajiskan dirinya dengan berhala-berhalanya atau dewa-dewa mereka yang menjijikkan atau dengan semua pelanggaran mereka. Tetapi Aku akan melepaskan mereka dari segala penyelewengan mereka, dengan mana mereka berbuat dosa, dan mentahirkan mereka, sehingga mereka akan menjadi umat-Ku dan Aku akan menjadi Allahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I heard, but I understood not: then said I, O my Lord, what shall be the end of these things?
target: Adapun aku, memang kudengar hal itu, tetapi tidak memahaminya, lalu kutanya: "Tuanku, apakah akhir segala hal ini?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore go to, proclaim in the ears of the people, saying, Whosoever is fearful and afraid, let him return and depart early from mount Gilead. And there returned of the people twenty and two thousand; and there remained ten thousand.
target: Maka sekarang, serukanlah kepada rakyat itu, demikian: Siapa yang takut dan gentar, biarlah ia pulang, enyah dari pegunungan Gilead." Lalu pulanglah dua puluh dua ribu orang dari rakyat itu dan tinggallah sepuluh ribu orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the seed of Israel separated themselves from all strangers, and stood and confessed their sins, and the iniquities of their fathers.
target: Keturunan orang Israel memisahkan diri dari semua orang asing, lalu berdiri di tempatnya dan mengaku dosa mereka dan kesalahan nenek moyang mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Samuel saw Saul, the LORD said unto him, Behold the man whom I spake to thee of! this same shall reign over my people.
target: Ketika Samuel melihat Saul, maka berfirmanlah TUHAN kepadanya: "Inilah orang yang Kusebutkan kepadamu itu; orang ini akan memegang tampuk pemerintahan atas umat-Ku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The king answered and said to the Chaldeans, The thing is gone from me: if ye will not make known unto me the dream, with the interpretation thereof, ye shall be cut in pieces, and your houses shall be made a dunghill.
target: Tetapi raja menjawab para Kasdim itu: "Aku telah mengambil keputusan, yakni jika kamu tidak memberitahukan kepadaku mimpi itu dengan maknanya, maka kamu akan dipenggal-penggal dan rumah-rumahmu akan dirobohkan menjadi timbunan puing;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the four beasts said, Amen. And the four and twenty elders fell down and worshipped him that liveth for ever and ever.
target: Dan keempat makhluk itu berkata: "Amin". Dan tua-tua itu jatuh tersungkur dan menyembah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition; but of them that believe to the saving of the soul.
target: Tetapi kita bukanlah orang-orang yang mengundurkan diri dan binasa, tetapi orang-orang yang percaya dan yang beroleh hidup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will dwell among the children of Israel, and will not forsake my people Israel.
target: yakni bahwa Aku akan diam di tengah-tengah orang Israel dan tidak hendak meninggalkan umat-Ku Israel."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who shall declare his way to his face? and who shall repay him what he hath done?
target: Siapa yang akan langsung menggugat kelakuannya, dan mengganjar perbuatannya?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will praise thee: for thou hast heard me, and art become my salvation.
target: Aku bersyukur kepada-Mu, sebab Engkau telah menjawab aku dan telah menjadi keselamatanku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if thine eye offend thee, pluck it out: it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye, than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire:
target: Dan jika matamu menyesatkan engkau, cungkillah, karena lebih baik engkau masuk ke dalam Kerajaan Allah dengan bermata satu dari pada dengan bermata dua dicampakkan ke dalam neraka,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were thirty and five thousand and four hundred.
target: Pasukannya terdiri dari tiga puluh lima ribu empat ratus orang yang dicatat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Why standest thou afar off, O LORD? why hidest thou thyself in times of trouble?
target: Mengapa Engkau berdiri jauh-jauh, ya TUHAN, dan menyembunyikan diri-Mu dalam waktu-waktu kesesakan?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When a prophet speaketh in the name of the LORD, if the thing follow not, nor come to pass, that is the thing which the LORD hath not spoken, but the prophet hath spoken it presumptuously: thou shalt not be afraid of him.
target: apabila seorang nabi berkata demi nama TUHAN dan perkataannya itu tidak terjadi dan tidak sampai, maka itulah perkataan yang tidak difirmankan TUHAN; dengan terlalu berani nabi itu telah mengatakannya, maka janganlah gentar kepadanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All sheep and oxen, yea, and the beasts of the field;
target: Engkau membuat dia berkuasa atas buatan tangan-Mu; segala-galanya telah Kauletakkan di bawah kakinya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Meddle not with them; for I will not give you of their land, no, not so much as a foot breadth; because I have given mount Seir unto Esau for a possession.
target: janganlah menyerang mereka, sebab Aku tidak akan memberikan kepadamu setapak kaki dari negeri mereka, karena kepada Esau telah Kuberikan pegunungan Seir menjadi miliknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Flee fornication. Every sin that a man doeth is without the body; but he that committeth fornication sinneth against his own body.
target: Jauhkanlah dirimu dari percabulan! Setiap dosa lain yang dilakukan manusia, terjadi di luar dirinya. Tetapi orang yang melakukan percabulan berdosa terhadap dirinya sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thine eye shall not pity; but life shall go for life, eye for eye, tooth for tooth, hand for hand, foot for foot.
target: Janganlah engkau merasa sayang kepadanya, sebab berlaku: nyawa ganti nyawa, mata ganti mata, gigi ganti gigi, tangan ganti tangan, kaki ganti kaki."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the pillars of the court round about, and their sockets, and their pins, and their cords.
target: juga tiang pelataran sekelilingnya, alas, patok dan talinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now all this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying,
target: Hal itu terjadi supaya genaplah yang difirmankan Tuhan oleh nabi:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall not profane the holy things of the children of Israel, which they offer unto the LORD;
target: Janganlah para imam melanggar kekudusan persembahan-persembahan kudus orang Israel yang telah dikhususkan bagi TUHAN,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which the LORD commanded Moses in mount Sinai, in the day that he commanded the children of Israel to offer their oblations unto the LORD, in the wilderness of Sinai.
target: yang diperintahkan TUHAN kepada Musa di atas gunung Sinai pada hari TUHAN memerintahkan kepada orang Israel mempersembahkan persembahan mereka kepada TUHAN di padang gurun Sinai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Shallum begat Hilkiah, and Hilkiah begat Azariah,
target: Salum memperanakkan Hilkia; Hilkia memperanakkan Azarya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O let not the oppressed return ashamed: let the poor and needy praise thy name.
target: Janganlah biarkan orang yang terinjak-injak kembali dengan kena noda. Biarlah orang sengsara dan orang miskin memuji-muji nama-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When they have a matter, they come unto me; and I judge between one and another, and I do make them know the statutes of God, and his laws.
target: Apabila ada perkara di antara mereka, maka mereka datang kepadaku dan aku mengadili antara yang seorang dan yang lain; lagipula aku memberitahukan kepada mereka ketetapan-ketetapan dan keputusan-keputusan Allah."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of the sons also of Bebai; Jehohanan, Hananiah, Zabbai, and Athlai.
target: Dari bani Bebai: Yohanan, Hananya, Zabai dan Altai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I think myself happy, king Agrippa, because I shall answer for myself this day before thee touching all the things whereof I am accused of the Jews:
target: "Ya raja Agripa, aku merasa berbahagia, karena pada hari ini aku diperkenankan untuk memberi pertanggungan jawab di hadapanmu terhadap segala tuduhan yang diajukan orang-orang Yahudi terhadap diriku,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will be glad and rejoice in thee: I will sing praise to thy name, O thou most High.
target: Aku mau bersyukur kepada TUHAN dengan segenap hatiku, aku mau menceritakan segala perbuatan-Mu yang ajaib;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thy fathers went down into Egypt with threescore and ten persons; and now the LORD thy God hath made thee as the stars of heaven for multitude.
target: Dengan tujuh puluh orang nenek moyangmu pergi ke Mesir, tetapi sekarang ini TUHAN, Allahmu, telah membuat engkau banyak seperti bintang-bintang di langit."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: No man can serve two masters: for either he will hate the one, and love the other; or else he will hold to the one, and despise the other. Ye cannot serve God and mammon.
target: Tak seorang pun dapat mengabdi kepada dua tuan. Karena jika demikian, ia akan membenci yang seorang dan mengasihi yang lain, atau ia akan setia kepada yang seorang dan tidak mengindahkan yang lain. Kamu tidak dapat mengabdi kepada Allah dan kepada Mamon."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt also consider in thine heart, that, as a man chasteneth his son, so the LORD thy God chasteneth thee.
target: Maka haruslah engkau insaf, bahwa TUHAN, Allahmu, mengajari engkau seperti seseorang mengajari anaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Surely in vain the net is spread in the sight of any bird.
target: Sebab percumalah jaring dibentangkan di depan mata segala yang bersayap,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he that gathereth the ashes of the heifer shall wash his clothes, and be unclean until the even: and it shall be unto the children of Israel, and unto the stranger that sojourneth among them, for a statute for ever.
target: Dan orang yang mengumpulkan abu lembu itu haruslah mencuci pakaiannya, dan ia najis sampai matahari terbenam. Itulah suatu ketetapan untuk selama-lamanya bagi orang Israel dan bagi orang asing yang tinggal di tengah-tengahmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who is like unto thee, O LORD, among the gods? who is like thee, glorious in holiness, fearful in praises, doing wonders?
target: Siapakah yang seperti Engkau, di antara para allah, ya TUHAN; siapakah seperti Engkau, mulia karena kekudusan-Mu, menakutkan karena perbuatan-Mu yang masyhur, Engkau pembuat keajaiban?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Take his garment that is surety for a stranger, and take a pledge of him for a strange woman.
target: Ambillah pakaian orang yang menanggung orang lain, dan tahanlah dia sebagai sandera ganti orang asing.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, all his fellows shall be ashamed: and the workmen, they are of men: let them all be gathered together, let them stand up; yet they shall fear, and they shall be ashamed together.
target: Sesungguhnya, semua pengikutnya akan mendapat malu, dan tukang-tukangnya adalah manusia belaka. Biarlah mereka semua berkumpul dan bangkit berdiri! Mereka akan gentar dan mendapat malu bersama-sama.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But, O LORD of hosts, that judgest righteously, that triest the reins and the heart, let me see thy vengeance on them: for unto thee have I revealed my cause.
target: Tetapi, TUHAN semesta alam, yang menghakimi dengan adil, yang menguji batin dan hati, biarlah aku melihat pembalasan-Mu terhadap mereka, sebab kepada-Mulah kuserahkan perkaraku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They have ears, but they hear not; neither is there any breath in their mouths.
target: mempunyai telinga, tetapi tidak dapat mendengar, juga nafas tidak ada dalam mulut mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done: and there is no respect of persons.
target: Barangsiapa berbuat kesalahan, ia akan menanggung kesalahannya itu, karena Tuhan tidak memandang orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Boaz took Ruth, and she was his wife: and when he went in unto her, the LORD gave her conception, and she bare a son.
target: Lalu Boas mengambil Rut dan perempuan itu menjadi isterinya dan dihampirinyalah dia. Maka atas karunia TUHAN perempuan itu mengandung, lalu melahirkan seorang anak laki-laki.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king of Egypt spake to the Hebrew midwives, of which the name of the one was Shiphrah, and the name of the other Puah:
target: Raja Mesir juga memerintahkan kepada bidan-bidan yang menolong perempuan Ibrani, seorang bernama Sifra dan yang lain bernama Pua, katanya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.
target: Sebab itu ambillah seluruh perlengkapan senjata Allah, supaya kamu dapat mengadakan perlawanan pada hari yang jahat itu dan tetap berdiri, sesudah kamu menyelesaikan segala sesuatu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.
target: sebelum itu dari Husim ia telah mendapat anak, yakni Abitub dan Elpaal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the temple was filled with smoke from the glory of God, and from his power; and no man was able to enter into the temple, till the seven plagues of the seven angels were fulfilled.
target: Dan Bait Suci itu dipenuhi asap karena kemuliaan Allah dan karena kuasa-Nya, dan seorang pun tidak dapat memasuki Bait Suci itu, sebelum berakhir ketujuh malapetaka dari ketujuh malaikat itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Israel said to Samuel, Cease not to cry unto the LORD our God for us, that he will save us out of the hand of the Philistines.
target: Lalu kata orang Israel kepada Samuel: "Janganlah berhenti berseru bagi kami kepada TUHAN, Allah kita, supaya Ia menyelamatkan kami dari tangan orang Filistin itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith thy Lord the LORD, and thy God that pleadeth the cause of his people, Behold, I have taken out of thine hand the cup of trembling, even the dregs of the cup of my fury; thou shalt no more drink it again:
target: Beginilah firman Tuhanmu, TUHAN, Allahmu yang memperjuangkan perkara umat-Nya: "Sesungguhnya, Aku mengambil dari tanganmu piala dengan isinya yang memusingkan, dan isi cangkir kehangatan murka-Ku tidak akan kauminum lagi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there was also a strife among them, which of them should be accounted the greatest.
target: Terjadilah juga pertengkaran di antara murid-murid Yesus, siapakah yang dapat dianggap terbesar di antara mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in this confidence I was minded to come unto you before, that ye might have a second benefit;
target: Berdasarkan keyakinan ini aku pernah merencanakan untuk mengunjungi kamu dahulu, supaya kamu boleh menerima kasih karunia untuk kedua kalinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not muzzle the ox when he treadeth out the corn.
target: Janganlah engkau memberangus mulut lembu yang sedang mengirik."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ought ye not to know that the LORD God of Israel gave the kingdom over Israel to David for ever, even to him and to his sons by a covenant of salt?
target: Tidakkah kamu tahu, bahwa TUHAN Allah Israel telah memberikan kuasa kerajaan atas Israel kepada Daud dan anak-anaknya untuk selama-lamanya dengan suatu perjanjian garam?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Israel came near against the children of Benjamin the second day.
target: Tetapi ketika orang-orang Israel pada hari kedua sampai di dekat bani Benyamin,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And a certain man was there, which had an infirmity thirty and eight years.
target: Di situ ada seorang yang sudah tiga puluh delapan tahun lamanya sakit.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore came I forth to meet thee, diligently to seek thy face, and I have found thee.
target: Itulah sebabnya aku keluar menyongsong engkau, untuk mencari engkau dan sekarang kudapatkan engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him, Sir, didst not thou sow good seed in thy field? from whence then hath it tares?
target: Maka datanglah hamba-hamba tuan ladang itu kepadanya dan berkata: Tuan, bukankah benih baik, yang tuan taburkan di ladang tuan? Dari manakah lalang itu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.
target: dan ampunilah kami akan kesalahan kami, seperti kami juga mengampuni orang yang bersalah kepada kami;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And, ye masters, do the same things unto them, forbearing threatening: knowing that your Master also is in heaven; neither is there respect of persons with him.
target: Dan kamu tuan-tuan, perbuatlah demikian juga terhadap mereka dan jauhkanlah ancaman. Ingatlah, bahwa Tuhan mereka dan Tuhan kamu ada di sorga dan Ia tidak memandang muka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Did ever people hear the voice of God speaking out of the midst of the fire, as thou hast heard, and live?
target: Pernahkah suatu bangsa mendengar suara ilahi, yang berbicara dari tengah-tengah api, seperti yang kaudengar dan tetap hidup?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he spread abroad the tent over the tabernacle, and put the covering of the tent above upon it; as the LORD commanded Moses.
target: Dikembangkannyalah atap kemah yang menudungi Kemah Suci dan diletakkannyalah tudung kemah di atasnya — seperti yang diperintahkan TUHAN kepada Musa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the sons of Issachar were, Tola, and Puah, Jashub, and Shimrom, four.
target: Anak-anak Isakhar ialah Tola dan Pua, Yasub dan Simron, empat orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will set no wicked thing before mine eyes: I hate the work of them that turn aside; it shall not cleave to me.
target: Tiada kutaruh di depan mataku perkara dursila; perbuatan murtad aku benci, itu takkan melekat padaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he blessed Joseph, and said, God, before whom my fathers Abraham and Isaac did walk, the God which fed me all my life long unto this day,
target: Sesudah itu diberkatinyalah Yusuf, katanya: "Nenekku dan ayahku, Abraham dan Ishak, telah hidup di hadapan Allah; Allah itu, sebagai Allah yang telah menjadi gembalaku selama hidupku sampai sekarang,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And not for that nation only, but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad.
target: dan bukan untuk bangsa itu saja, tetapi juga untuk mengumpulkan dan mempersatukan anak-anak Allah yang tercerai-berai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore glorify ye the LORD in the fires, even the name of the LORD God of Israel in the isles of the sea.
target: "Sebab itu permuliakanlah TUHAN di negeri-negeri timur, nama TUHAN, Allah Israel, di tanah-tanah pesisir laut!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Jesus answered and said unto her, O woman, great is thy faith: be it unto thee even as thou wilt. And her daughter was made whole from that very hour.
target: Maka Yesus menjawab dan berkata kepadanya: "Hai ibu, besar imanmu, maka jadilah kepadamu seperti yang kaukehendaki." Dan seketika itu juga anaknya sembuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the captain of the guard took Seraiah the chief priest, and Zephaniah the second priest, and the three keepers of the door:
target: Lalu kepala pasukan pengawal itu menangkap Seraya, imam kepala, dan Zefanya, imam tingkat dua dan ketiga orang penjaga pintu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will bring them out from the people, and gather them from the countries, and will bring them to their own land, and feed them upon the mountains of Israel by the rivers, and in all the inhabited places of the country.
target: Aku akan membawa mereka keluar dari tengah bangsa-bangsa dan mengumpulkan mereka dari negeri-negeri dan membawa mereka ke tanahnya; Aku akan menggembalakan mereka di atas gunung-gunung Israel, di alur-alur sungainya dan di semua tempat kediaman orang di tanah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Why withdrawest thou thy hand, even thy right hand? pluck it out of thy bosom.
target: Mengapa Engkau menarik kembali tangan-Mu, menaruh tangan kanan-Mu di dada?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: By terrible things in righteousness wilt thou answer us, O God of our salvation; who art the confidence of all the ends of the earth, and of them that are afar off upon the sea:
target: Berbahagialah orang yang Engkau pilih dan yang Engkau suruh mendekat untuk diam di pelataran-Mu! Kiranya kami menjadi kenyang dengan segala yang baik di rumah-Mu, di bait-Mu yang kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That men may know that thou, whose name alone is JEHOVAH, art the most high over all the earth.
target: Biarlah mereka mendapat malu dan terkejut selama-lamanya; biarlah mereka tersipu-sipu dan binasa,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Though hand join in hand, the wicked shall not be unpunished: but the seed of the righteous shall be delivered.
target: Sungguh, orang jahat tidak akan luput dari hukuman, tetapi keturunan orang benar akan diselamatkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, Go, and tell this people, Hear ye indeed, but understand not; and see ye indeed, but perceive not.
target: Kemudian firman-Nya: "Pergilah, dan katakanlah kepada bangsa ini: Dengarlah sungguh-sungguh, tetapi mengerti: jangan! Lihatlah sungguh-sungguh, tetapi menanggap: jangan!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Israel shall be saved in the LORD with an everlasting salvation: ye shall not be ashamed nor confounded world without end.
target: Sedangkan Israel diselamatkan oleh TUHAN dengan keselamatan yang selama-lamanya; kamu tidak akan mendapat malu dan tidak akan kena noda sampai selamanya dan seterusnya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Baldness is come upon Gaza; Ashkelon is cut off with the remnant of their valley: how long wilt thou cut thyself?
target: Gaza telah menjadi gundul, Askelon telah menjadi bungkam; hai Asdod, sisa orang Enak, berapa lama lagi engkau menoreh-noreh diri?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses said unto his father in law, Because the people come unto me to enquire of God:
target: Kata Musa kepada mertuanya itu: "Sebab bangsa ini datang kepadaku untuk menanyakan petunjuk Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.
target: Berjaga-jagalah! Berdirilah dengan teguh dalam iman! Bersikaplah sebagai laki-laki! Dan tetap kuat!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: She shall give to thine head an ornament of grace: a crown of glory shall she deliver to thee.
target: Ia akan mengenakan karangan bunga yang indah di kepalamu, mahkota yang indah akan dikaruniakannya kepadamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he gave her his hand, and lifted her up, and when he had called the saints and widows, presented her alive.
target: Petrus memegang tangannya dan membantu dia berdiri. Kemudian ia memanggil orang-orang kudus beserta janda-janda, lalu menunjukkan kepada mereka, bahwa perempuan itu hidup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Brethren, I beseech you, be as I am; for I am as ye are: ye have not injured me at all.
target: Aku minta kepadamu, saudara-saudara, jadilah sama seperti aku, sebab aku pun telah menjadi sama seperti kamu. Belum pernah kualami sesuatu yang tidak baik dari padamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Solomon said, If he will shew himself a worthy man, there shall not an hair of him fall to the earth: but if wickedness shall be found in him, he shall die.
target: Lalu kata Salomo: "Jika ia berlaku sebagai kesatria, maka sehelai rambut pun dari kepalanya tidak akan jatuh ke bumi, tetapi jika ternyata ia bermaksud jahat, haruslah ia dibunuh."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If thou meet thine enemy's ox or his ass going astray, thou shalt surely bring it back to him again.
target: Apabila engkau melihat lembu musuhmu atau keledainya yang sesat, maka segeralah kaukembalikan binatang itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if any provide not for his own, and specially for those of his own house, he hath denied the faith, and is worse than an infidel.
target: Tetapi jika ada seorang yang tidak memeliharakan sanak saudaranya, apalagi seisi rumahnya, orang itu murtad dan lebih buruk dari orang yang tidak beriman.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the LORD said unto me, Out of the north an evil shall break forth upon all the inhabitants of the land.
target: Lalu firman TUHAN kepadaku: "Dari utara akan mengamuk malapetaka menimpa segala penduduk negeri ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Elioenai were, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.
target: Anak-anak Elyo"enai ialah Hodawya, Elyasib, Pelaya, Akub, Yohanan, Delaya dan Anani, tujuh orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Miriam was shut out from the camp seven days: and the people journeyed not till Miriam was brought in again.
target: Jadi dikucilkanlah Miryam ke luar tempat perkemahan tujuh hari lamanya, dan bangsa itu tidak berangkat sebelum Miryam diterima kembali.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus.
target: Selanjutnya janganlah ada orang yang menyusahkan aku, karena pada tubuhku ada tanda-tanda milik Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ, that with quietness they work, and eat their own bread.
target: Orang-orang yang demikian kami peringati dan nasihati dalam Tuhan Yesus Kristus, supaya mereka tetap tenang melakukan pekerjaannya dan dengan demikian makan makanannya sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the LORD shall smite Israel, as a reed is shaken in the water, and he shall root up Israel out of this good land, which he gave to their fathers, and shall scatter them beyond the river, because they have made their groves, provoking the LORD to anger.
target: Kemudian TUHAN akan menghajar orang Israel, sehingga tergoyah-goyah seperti gelagah di air dan Ia akan menyentakkan mereka dari pada tanah yang baik ini yang telah diberikan-Nya kepada nenek moyang mereka; Ia akan menyerakkan mereka ke seberang sungai Efrat sana, oleh karena mereka telah membuat tiang-tiang berhala mereka dan dengan demikian menyakiti hati TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But unto you that fear my name shall the Sun of righteousness arise with healing in his wings; and ye shall go forth, and grow up as calves of the stall.
target: Tetapi kamu yang takut akan nama-Ku, bagimu akan terbit surya kebenaran dengan kesembuhan pada sayapnya. Kamu akan keluar dan berjingkrak-jingkrak seperti anak lembu lepas kandang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God called the dry land Earth; and the gathering together of the waters called he Seas: and God saw that it was good.
target: Lalu Allah menamai yang kering itu darat, dan kumpulan air itu dinamai-Nya laut. Allah melihat bahwa semuanya itu baik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To execute vengeance upon the heathen, and punishments upon the people;
target: untuk melakukan pembalasan terhadap bangsa-bangsa, penyiksaan-penyiksaan terhadap suku-suku bangsa,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Remember, I beseech thee, the word that thou commandedst thy servant Moses, saying, If ye transgress, I will scatter you abroad among the nations:
target: Ingatlah akan firman yang Kaupesan kepada Musa, hamba-Mu itu, yakni: Bila kamu berubah setia, kamu akan Kucerai-beraikan di antara bangsa-bangsa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of Jericho, three hundred forty and five.
target: orang-orang Yerikho: tiga ratus empat puluh lima orang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the king commanded Jerahmeel the son of Hammelech, and Seraiah the son of Azriel, and Shelemiah the son of Abdeel, to take Baruch the scribe and Jeremiah the prophet: but the LORD hid them.
target: Bahkan raja memerintahkan pangeran Yerahmeel, Seraya bin Azriel dan Selemya bin Abdeel untuk menangkap juru tulis Barukh dan nabi Yeremia, tetapi TUHAN menyembunyikan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus answered them, saying, The hour is come, that the Son of man should be glorified.
target: Tetapi Yesus menjawab mereka, kata-Nya: "Telah tiba saatnya Anak Manusia dimuliakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
target: Kata Petrus kepada Yesus: "Rabi, betapa bahagianya kami berada di tempat ini. Baiklah kami dirikan tiga kemah, satu untuk Engkau, satu untuk Musa dan satu untuk Elia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye call me Master and Lord: and ye say well; for so I am.
target: Kamu menyebut Aku Guru dan Tuhan, dan katamu itu tepat, sebab memang Akulah Guru dan Tuhan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But me, even me thy servant, and Zadok the priest, and Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and thy servant Solomon, hath he not called.
target: Tetapi hambamu ini, dan imam Zadok dan Benaya bin Yoyada dan hambamu Salomo tidak diundangnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he gave some, apostles; and some, prophets; and some, evangelists; and some, pastors and teachers;
target: Dan Ialah yang memberikan baik rasul-rasul maupun nabi-nabi, baik pemberita-pemberita Injil maupun gembala-gembala dan pengajar-pengajar,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They shall be left together unto the fowls of the mountains, and to the beasts of the earth: and the fowls shall summer upon them, and all the beasts of the earth shall winter upon them.
target: Semuanya itu akan ditinggalkan bertumpuk-tumpuk bagi burung-burung buas di pegunungan, dan bagi binatang-binatang di hutan. Pada musim panas burung-burung buas akan bermukim di situ dan segala binatang hutan pada musim dingin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Saying, I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood. And they said, What is that to us? see thou to that.
target: dan berkata: "Aku telah berdosa karena menyerahkan darah orang yang tak bersalah." Tetapi jawab mereka: "Apa urusan kami dengan itu? Itu urusanmu sendiri!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Him therefore I hope to send presently, so soon as I shall see how it will go with me.
target: Dialah yang kuharap untuk kukirimkan dengan segera, sesudah jelas bagiku bagaimana jalannya perkaraku;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But in the seventh year shall be a sabbath of rest unto the land, a sabbath for the LORD: thou shalt neither sow thy field, nor prune thy vineyard.
target: tetapi pada tahun yang ketujuh haruslah ada bagi tanah itu suatu sabat, masa perhentian penuh, suatu sabat bagi TUHAN. Ladangmu janganlah kautaburi dan kebun anggurmu janganlah kaurantingi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For pass over the isles of Chittim, and see; and send unto Kedar, and consider diligently, and see if there be such a thing.
target: Menyeberang sajalah ke tanah pesisir orang Kitim dan lihatlah; suruhlah orang ke Kedar dan perhatikanlah dengan sungguh-sungguh! Lihatlah apakah ada terjadi yang seperti ini:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There was a man in the land of Uz, whose name was Job; and that man was perfect and upright, and one that feared God, and eschewed evil.
target: Ada seorang laki-laki di tanah Us bernama Ayub; orang itu saleh dan jujur; ia takut akan Allah dan menjauhi kejahatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David took the head of the Philistine, and brought it to Jerusalem; but he put his armour in his tent.
target: Dan Daud mengambil kepala orang Filistin yang dipancungnya itu dan membawanya ke Yerusalem, tetapi senjata-senjata orang itu ditaruhnya dalam kemahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD taketh pleasure in them that fear him, in those that hope in his mercy.
target: TUHAN senang kepada orang-orang yang takut akan Dia, kepada orang-orang yang berharap akan kasih setia-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jehoshaphat reigned over Judah: he was thirty and five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned twenty and five years in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Azubah the daughter of Shilhi.
target: Yosafat memerintah atas Yehuda. Ia berumur tiga puluh lima tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja dan dua puluh lima tahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem. Nama ibunya ialah Azuba, anak Silhi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If thou wilt return, O Israel, saith the LORD, return unto me: and if thou wilt put away thine abominations out of my sight, then shalt thou not remove.
target: "Jika engkau mau kembali, hai Israel, demikianlah firman TUHAN, kembalilah engkau kepada-Ku; dan jika engkau mau menjauhkan dewa-dewamu yang menjijikkan, tidak usahlah engkau melarikan diri dari hadapan-Ku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he testifieth, Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec.
target: Sebab tentang Dia diberi kesaksian: "Engkau adalah Imam untuk selama-lamanya, menurut peraturan Melkisedek."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said I, I will not feed you: that that dieth, let it die; and that that is to be cut off, let it be cut off; and let the rest eat every one the flesh of another.
target: Lalu aku berkata: "Aku tidak mau lagi menggembalakan kamu; yang hendak mati, biarlah mati; yang hendak lenyap, biarlah lenyap, dan yang masih tinggal itu, biarlah masing-masing memakan daging temannya!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there are diversities of operations, but it is the same God which worketh all in all.
target: Dan ada berbagai-bagai perbuatan ajaib, tetapi Allah adalah satu yang mengerjakan semuanya dalam semua orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Even him, whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders,
target: Kedatangan si pendurhaka itu adalah pekerjaan Iblis, dan akan disertai rupa-rupa perbuatan ajaib, tanda-tanda dan mujizat-mujizat palsu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In weariness and painfulness, in watchings often, in hunger and thirst, in fastings often, in cold and nakedness.
target: Aku banyak berjerih lelah dan bekerja berat; kerap kali aku tidak tidur; aku lapar dan dahaga; kerap kali aku berpuasa, kedinginan dan tanpa pakaian,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: At the time appointed he shall return, and come toward the south; but it shall not be as the former, or as the latter.
target: Pada waktu yang ditetapkan ia akan memasuki pula negeri Selatan, tetapi kali yang kedua ini tidak akan sama dengan yang pertama,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the angel of the LORD said unto Elijah, Go down with him: be not afraid of him. And he arose, and went down with him unto the king.
target: Maka berfirmanlah Malaikat TUHAN kepada Elia: "Turunlah bersama-sama dia, janganlah takut kepadanya!" Lalu bangunlah Elia dan turun bersama-sama dia menghadap raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And how I kept back nothing that was profitable unto you, but have shewed you, and have taught you publicly, and from house to house,
target: Sungguhpun demikian aku tidak pernah melalaikan apa yang berguna bagi kamu. Semua kuberitakan dan kuajarkan kepada kamu, baik di muka umum maupun dalam perkumpulan-perkumpulan di rumah kamu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And their king shall go into captivity, he and his princes together, saith the LORD.
target: dan raja mereka harus pergi sebagai orang buangan, ia bersama-sama dengan pembesar-pembesarnya," firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For what portion of God is there from above? and what inheritance of the Almighty from on high?
target: Karena bagian apakah yang ditentukan Allah dari atas, milik pusaka apakah yang ditetapkan Yang Mahakuasa dari tempat yang tinggi?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There is that maketh himself rich, yet hath nothing: there is that maketh himself poor, yet hath great riches.
target: Ada orang yang berlagak kaya, tetapi tidak mempunyai apa-apa, ada pula yang berpura-pura miskin, tetapi hartanya banyak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.
target: Dengan demikian aku dapat menyatakannya, sebagaimana seharusnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When Ephraim spake trembling, he exalted himself in Israel; but when he offended in Baal, he died.
target: Apabila Efraim berbicara, gemetarlah orang; ia diangkat-angkat di Israel, tetapi ia bersalah dengan menyembah Baal, sehingga matilah ia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore, behold, I will this once cause them to know, I will cause them to know mine hand and my might; and they shall know that my name is The LORD.
target: "Sebab itu, ketahuilah, Aku mau memberitahukan kepada mereka, sekali ini Aku akan memberitahukan kepada mereka kekuasaan-Ku dan keperkasaan-Ku, supaya mereka tahu, bahwa nama-Ku TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou knowest the commandments, Do not commit adultery, Do not kill, Do not steal, Do not bear false witness, Defraud not, Honour thy father and mother.
target: Engkau tentu mengetahui segala perintah Allah: Jangan membunuh, jangan berzinah, jangan mencuri, jangan mengucapkan saksi dusta, jangan mengurangi hak orang, hormatilah ayahmu dan ibumu!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But that it spread no further among the people, let us straitly threaten them, that they speak henceforth to no man in this name.
target: Tetapi supaya hal itu jangan makin luas tersiar di antara orang banyak, baiklah kita mengancam dan melarang mereka, supaya mereka jangan berbicara lagi dengan siapa pun dalam nama itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now, behold, the LORD hath kept me alive, as he said, these forty and five years, even since the LORD spake this word unto Moses, while the children of Israel wandered in the wilderness: and now, lo, I am this day fourscore and five years old.
target: Jadi sekarang, sesungguhnya TUHAN telah memelihara hidupku, seperti yang dijanjikan-Nya. Kini sudah empat puluh lima tahun lamanya, sejak diucapkan TUHAN firman itu kepada Musa, dan selama itu orang Israel mengembara di padang gurun. Jadi sekarang, telah berumur delapan puluh lima tahun aku hari ini;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which shew the work of the law written in their hearts, their conscience also bearing witness, and their thoughts the mean while accusing or else excusing one another;)
target: Sebab dengan itu mereka menunjukkan, bahwa isi hukum Taurat ada tertulis di dalam hati mereka dan suara hati mereka turut bersaksi dan pikiran mereka saling menuduh atau saling membela.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Saul answered, God do so and more also: for thou shalt surely die, Jonathan.
target: Kata Saul: "Beginilah kiranya Allah menghukum aku, bahkan lebih lagi dari pada itu. Sesungguhnya, Yonatan, engkau harus mati."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The vessels also that are given thee for the service of the house of thy God, those deliver thou before the God of Jerusalem.
target: Hanya perlengkapan-perlengkapan yang diserahkan kepadamu untuk ibadah di rumah Allahmu, sampaikanlah itu ke hadapan Allah di Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But though he had done so many miracles before them, yet they believed not on him:
target: Dan meskipun Yesus mengadakan begitu banyak mujizat di depan mata mereka, namun mereka tidak percaya kepada-Nya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Israel wept for Moses in the plains of Moab thirty days: so the days of weeping and mourning for Moses were ended.
target: Orang Israel menangisi Musa di dataran Moab tiga puluh hari lamanya. Maka berakhirlah hari-hari tangis perkabungan karena Musa itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if the plague come again, and break out in the house, after that he hath taken away the stones, and after he hath scraped the house, and after it is plaistered;
target: Tetapi jikalau tanda itu timbul lagi di dalam rumah itu, sesudah batu-batunya diungkit dan sesudah rumah itu dikikis, bahkan sesudah dilepa lagi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when Moses came down from mount Sinai with the two tables of testimony in Moses' hand, when he came down from the mount, that Moses wist not that the skin of his face shone while he talked with him.
target: Ketika Musa turun dari gunung Sinai — kedua loh hukum Allah ada di tangan Musa ketika ia turun dari gunung itu — tidaklah ia tahu, bahwa kulit mukanya bercahaya oleh karena ia telah berbicara dengan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Hezekiah appointed the courses of the priests and the Levites after their courses, every man according to his service, the priests and Levites for burnt offerings and for peace offerings, to minister, and to give thanks, and to praise in the gates of the tents of the LORD.
target: Hizkia menetapkan rombongan para imam dan orang-orang Lewi, rombongan demi rombongan, masing-masing menurut tugas jabatannya sebagai imam atau sebagai orang Lewi, untuk mempersembahkan korban bakaran dan korban keselamatan, untuk mengucap syukur dan menyanyikan puji-pujian dan untuk melayani di pintu-pintu gerbang di tempat perkemahan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Lie not one to another, seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds;
target: Jangan lagi kamu saling mendustai, karena kamu telah menanggalkan manusia lama serta kelakuannya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That in every thing ye are enriched by him, in all utterance, and in all knowledge;
target: Sebab di dalam Dia kamu telah menjadi kaya dalam segala hal: dalam segala macam perkataan dan segala macam pengetahuan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will open my mouth in a parable: I will utter dark sayings of old:
target: Aku mau membuka mulut mengatakan amsal, aku mau mengucapkan teka-teki dari zaman purbakala.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David said to Saul, Let no man's heart fail because of him; thy servant will go and fight with this Philistine.
target: Berkatalah Daud kepada Saul: "Janganlah seseorang menjadi tawar hati karena dia; hambamu ini akan pergi melawan orang Filistin itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD the King of Israel, and his redeemer the LORD of hosts; I am the first, and I am the last; and beside me there is no God.
target: Beginilah firman TUHAN, Raja dan Penebus Israel, TUHAN semesta alam: "Akulah yang terdahulu dan Akulah yang terkemudian; tidak ada Allah selain dari pada-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And seek the peace of the city whither I have caused you to be carried away captives, and pray unto the LORD for it: for in the peace thereof shall ye have peace.
target: Usahakanlah kesejahteraan kota ke mana kamu Aku buang, dan berdoalah untuk kota itu kepada TUHAN, sebab kesejahteraannya adalah kesejahteraanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the carcases of this people shall be meat for the fowls of the heaven, and for the beasts of the earth; and none shall fray them away.
target: bahkan mayat bangsa ini akan menjadi makanan burung-burung di udara serta binatang-binatang di bumi dengan tidak ada yang mengganggunya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For David, after he had served his own generation by the will of God, fell on sleep, and was laid unto his fathers, and saw corruption:
target: Sebab Daud melakukan kehendak Allah pada zamannya, lalu ia mangkat dan dibaringkan di samping nenek moyangnya, dan ia memang diserahkan kepada kebinasaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore Saul removed him from him, and made him his captain over a thousand; and he went out and came in before the people.
target: Sebab itu Saul menjauhkan Daud dari dekatnya dan mengangkat dia menjadi kepala pasukan seribu, sehingga ia berada di depan dalam segala gerakan tentara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he was numbered with us, and had obtained part of this ministry.
target: Dahulu ia termasuk bilangan kami dan mengambil bagian di dalam pelayanan ini."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sin of Judah is written with a pen of iron, and with the point of a diamond: it is graven upon the table of their heart, and upon the horns of your altars;
target: "Dosa Yehuda telah tertulis dengan pena besi, yang matanya dari intan, terukir pada loh hati mereka dan pada tanduk-tanduk mezbah mereka

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of Ezra, Meshullam; of Amariah, Jehohanan;
target: Mesulam dari kaum keluarga Ezra, Yohanan dari kaum keluarga Amarya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Fear ye not me? saith the LORD: will ye not tremble at my presence, which have placed the sand for the bound of the sea by a perpetual decree, that it cannot pass it: and though the waves thereof toss themselves, yet can they not prevail; though they roar, yet can they not pass over it?
target: Masakan kamu tidak takut kepada-Ku, demikianlah firman TUHAN, kamu tidak gemetar terhadap Aku? Bukankah Aku yang membuat pantai pasir sebagai perbatasan bagi laut, sebagai perhinggaan tetap yang tidak dapat dilampauinya? Biarpun ia bergelora, ia tidak sanggup, biarpun gelombang-gelombangnya ribut, mereka tidak dapat melampauinya!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Paul had laid his hands upon them, the Holy Ghost came on them; and they spake with tongues, and prophesied.
target: Dan ketika Paulus menumpangkan tangan di atas mereka, turunlah Roh Kudus ke atas mereka, dan mulailah mereka berkata-kata dalam bahasa roh dan bernubuat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Instead of the thorn shall come up the fir tree, and instead of the brier shall come up the myrtle tree: and it shall be to the LORD for a name, for an everlasting sign that shall not be cut off.
target: Sebagai ganti semak duri akan tumbuh pohon sanobar, dan sebagai ganti kecubung akan tumbuh pohon murad, dan itu akan terjadi sebagai kemasyhuran bagi TUHAN, sebagai tanda abadi yang tidak akan lenyap.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thine age shall be clearer than the noonday: thou shalt shine forth, thou shalt be as the morning.
target: Kehidupanmu akan menjadi lebih cemerlang dari pada siang hari, kegelapan akan menjadi terang seperti pagi hari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Kings' daughters were among thy honourable women: upon thy right hand did stand the queen in gold of Ophir.
target: Segala pakaianmu berbau mur, gaharu dan cendana; dari istana gading permainan kecapi menyukakan engkau;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all flesh died that moved upon the earth, both of fowl, and of cattle, and of beast, and of every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth, and every man:
target: Lalu mati binasalah segala yang hidup, yang bergerak di bumi, burung-burung, ternak dan binatang liar dan segala binatang merayap, yang berkeriapan di bumi, serta semua manusia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will forsake the remnant of mine inheritance, and deliver them into the hand of their enemies; and they shall become a prey and a spoil to all their enemies;
target: Aku akan membuangkan sisa milik pusaka-Ku dan akan menyerahkan mereka ke dalam tangan musuh-musuh mereka, sehingga mereka menjadi jarahan dan menjadi rampasan bagi semua musuh mereka,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Michal took an image, and laid it in the bed, and put a pillow of goats' hair for his bolster, and covered it with a cloth.
target: Sesudah itu Mikhal mengambil terafim dan menaruhnya di tempat tidur; ditaruhnya sehelai tenunan bulu kambing di bagian kepala dan ditutupinya dengan selimut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They say unto him, Master, this woman was taken in adultery, in the very act.
target: lalu berkata kepada Yesus: "Rabi, perempuan ini tertangkap basah ketika ia sedang berbuat zinah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet if any man suffer as a Christian, let him not be ashamed; but let him glorify God on this behalf.
target: Tetapi, jika ia menderita sebagai orang Kristen, maka janganlah ia malu, melainkan hendaklah ia memuliakan Allah dalam nama Kristus itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Stir up thyself, and awake to my judgment, even unto my cause, my God and my Lord.
target: Terjagalah dan bangunlah membela hakku, membela perkaraku, ya Allahku dan Tuhanku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jacob heard that he had defiled Dinah his daughter: now his sons were with his cattle in the field: and Jacob held his peace until they were come.
target: Kedengaranlah kepada Yakub, bahwa Sikhem mencemari Dina. Tetapi anak-anaknya ada di padang menjaga ternaknya, jadi Yakub mendiamkan soal itu sampai mereka pulang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Job answered the LORD, and said,
target: Apakah engkau hendak meniadakan pengadilan-Ku, mempersalahkan Aku supaya engkau dapat membenarkan dirimu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter, enquire who in it is worthy; and there abide till ye go thence.
target: Apabila kamu masuk kota atau desa, carilah di situ seorang yang layak dan tinggallah padanya sampai kamu berangkat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Sixteen years old was he when he began to reign, and he reigned two and fifty years in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Jecholiah of Jerusalem.
target: Ia berumur enam belas tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja dan lima puluh dua tahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem. Nama ibunya ialah Yekholya, dari Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they were all amazed, and were in doubt, saying one to another, What meaneth this?
target: Mereka semuanya tercengang-cengang dan sangat termangu-mangu sambil berkata seorang kepada yang lain: "Apakah artinya ini?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye sent unto John, and he bare witness unto the truth.
target: Kamu telah mengirim utusan kepada Yohanes dan ia telah bersaksi tentang kebenaran;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And many more believed because of his own word;
target: Dan lebih banyak lagi orang yang menjadi percaya karena perkataan-Nya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And one of Joab's men stood by him, and said, He that favoureth Joab, and he that is for David, let him go after Joab.
target: Dan seorang dari orang-orang Yoab tinggal berdiri di dekat mayat itu, sambil berkata: "Siapa yang suka kepada Yoab dan siapa yang memihak kepada Daud, baiklah mengikuti Yoab!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD hath sworn in truth unto David; he will not turn from it; Of the fruit of thy body will I set upon thy throne.
target: TUHAN telah menyatakan sumpah setia kepada Daud, Ia tidak akan memungkirinya: "Seorang anak kandungmu akan Kududukkan di atas takhtamu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou art my God, and I will praise thee: thou art my God, I will exalt thee.
target: Allahku Engkau, aku hendak bersyukur kepada-Mu, Allahku, aku hendak meninggikan Engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Joseph's brethren saw that their father was dead, they said, Joseph will peradventure hate us, and will certainly requite us all the evil which we did unto him.
target: Ketika saudara-saudara Yusuf melihat, bahwa ayah mereka telah mati, berkatalah mereka: "Boleh jadi Yusuf akan mendendam kita dan membalaskan sepenuhnya kepada kita segala kejahatan yang telah kita lakukan kepadanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus answered and said unto them, I also will ask you one thing, which if ye tell me, I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things.
target: Jawab Yesus kepada mereka: "Aku juga akan mengajukan satu pertanyaan kepadamu dan jikalau kamu memberi jawabnya kepada-Ku, Aku akan mengatakan juga kepadamu dengan kuasa manakah Aku melakukan hal-hal itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So David and all the house of Israel brought up the ark of the LORD with shouting, and with the sound of the trumpet.
target: Daud dan seluruh orang Israel mengangkut tabut TUHAN itu dengan diiringi sorak dan bunyi sangkakala.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the golden altar, and the anointing oil, and the sweet incense, and the hanging for the tabernacle door,
target: mezbah dari emas, minyak urapan, ukupan dari wangi-wangian, tirai pintu kemah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
