target: Maka apabila tuan kebun anggur itu datang, apakah yang akan dilakukannya dengan penggarap-penggarap itu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For at the window of my house I looked through my casement,
target: Karena ketika suatu waktu aku melihat-lihat, dari kisi-kisiku, dari jendela rumahku,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They have mouths, but they speak not: eyes have they, but they see not:
target: mempunyai mulut, tetapi tidak dapat berkata-kata, mempunyai mata, tetapi tidak dapat melihat,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The great temptations which thine eyes saw, and the signs, and the wonders, and the mighty hand, and the stretched out arm, whereby the LORD thy God brought thee out: so shall the LORD thy God do unto all the people of whom thou art afraid.
target: yakni cobaan-cobaan besar, yang kaulihat dengan matamu sendiri, tanda-tanda dan mujizat-mujizat, tangan yang kuat dan lengan yang teracung, yang dipakai TUHAN, Allahmu, untuk membawa engkau keluar. Demikianlah juga akan dilakukan TUHAN, Allahmu, terhadap segala bangsa yang engkau takuti.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the brethren immediately sent away Paul and Silas by night unto Berea: who coming thither went into the synagogue of the Jews.
target: Tetapi pada malam itu juga segera saudara-saudara di situ menyuruh Paulus dan Silas berangkat ke Berea. Setibanya di situ pergilah mereka ke rumah ibadat orang Yahudi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Judah took a wife for Er his firstborn, whose name was Tamar.
target: Sesudah itu Yehuda mengambil bagi Er, anak sulungnya, seorang isteri, yang bernama Tamar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For which of you, intending to build a tower, sitteth not down first, and counteth the cost, whether he have sufficient to finish it?
target: Sebab siapakah di antara kamu yang kalau mau mendirikan sebuah menara tidak duduk dahulu membuat anggaran biayanya, kalau-kalau cukup uangnya untuk menyelesaikan pekerjaan itu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the man would not tarry that night, but he rose up and departed, and came over against Jebus, which is Jerusalem; and there were with him two asses saddled, his concubine also was with him.
target: Tetapi orang itu tidak mau tinggal bermalam; ia berkemas, lalu pergi. Demikian sampailah ia di daerah yang berhadapan dengan Yebus — itulah Yerusalem —; bersama-sama dengan dia ada sepasang keledai yang berpelana dan gundiknya juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But go your way, tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee: there shall ye see him, as he said unto you.
target: Tetapi sekarang pergilah, katakanlah kepada murid-murid-Nya dan kepada Petrus: Ia mendahului kamu ke Galilea; di sana kamu akan melihat Dia, seperti yang sudah dikatakan-Nya kepada kamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then will we give our daughters unto you, and we will take your daughters to us, and we will dwell with you, and we will become one people.
target: barulah kami akan memberikan gadis-gadis kami kepada kamu dan mengambil gadis-gadis kamu; maka kami akan tinggal padamu, dan kita akan menjadi satu bangsa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I rejoiced greatly that I found of thy children walking in truth, as we have received a commandment from the Father.
target: Aku sangat bersukacita, bahwa aku mendapati, bahwa separuh dari anak-anakmu hidup dalam kebenaran sesuai dengan perintah yang telah kita terima dari Bapa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesse said unto David his son, Take now for thy brethren an ephah of this parched corn, and these ten loaves, and run to the camp of thy brethren;
target: Isai berkata kepada Daud, anaknya: "Ambillah untuk kakak-kakakmu bertih gandum ini seefa dan roti yang sepuluh ini; bawalah cepat-cepat ke perkemahan, kepada kakak-kakakmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall come to pass, if they will diligently learn the ways of my people, to swear by my name, The LORD liveth; as they taught my people to swear by Baal; then shall they be built in the midst of my people.
target: Dan jika mereka sungguh-sungguh belajar cara hidup umat-Ku sehingga bersumpah demi nama-Ku: Demi TUHAN yang hidup, seperti tadinya mereka mengajar umat-Ku untuk bersumpah demi Baal, maka mereka akan dibangun di tengah-tengah umat-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And their brethren, which were in their villages, were to come after seven days from time to time with them.
target: Dan saudara-saudara mereka yang tinggal di desa-desa mereka, pada waktu-waktu tertentu harus masuk selama tujuh hari untuk bekerja bersama-sama mereka,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That all men should honour the Son, even as they honour the Father. He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him.
target: supaya semua orang menghormati Anak sama seperti mereka menghormati Bapa. Barangsiapa tidak menghormati Anak, ia juga tidak menghormati Bapa, yang mengutus Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Hiram king of Tyre sent his servants unto Solomon; for he had heard that they had anointed him king in the room of his father: for Hiram was ever a lover of David.
target: Hiram, raja Tirus, mengutus pegawai-pegawainya kepada Salomo, karena didengarnya, bahwa Salomo telah diurapi menjadi raja menggantikan ayahnya, sebab Hiram senantiasa bersahabat dengan Daud.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: (Touch not; taste not; handle not;
target: jangan jamah ini, jangan kecap itu, jangan sentuh ini;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt come unto the priests the Levites, and unto the judge that shall be in those days, and enquire; and they shall shew thee the sentence of judgment:
target: haruslah engkau pergi kepada imam-imam orang Lewi dan kepada hakim yang ada pada waktu itu, dan meminta putusan. Mereka akan memberitahukan kepadamu keputusan hakim.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he pressed upon them greatly; and they turned in unto him, and entered into his house; and he made them a feast, and did bake unleavened bread, and they did eat.
target: Tetapi karena ia sangat mendesak mereka, singgahlah mereka dan masuk ke dalam rumahnya, kemudian ia menyediakan hidangan bagi mereka, ia membakar roti yang tidak beragi, lalu mereka makan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have seen the wicked in great power, and spreading himself like a green bay tree.
target: Aku melihat seorang fasik yang gagah sombong, yang tumbuh mekar seperti pohon aras Libanon;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Nebuchadnezzar in his rage and fury commanded to bring Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego. Then they brought these men before the king.
target: Sesudah itu Nebukadnezar memerintahkan dalam marahnya dan geramnya untuk membawa Sadrakh, Mesakh dan Abednego menghadap. Setelah orang-orang itu dibawa menghadap raja,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that soweth iniquity shall reap vanity: and the rod of his anger shall fail.
target: Orang yang menabur kecurangan akan menuai bencana, dan tongkat amarahnya akan habis binasa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For which I am an ambassador in bonds: that therein I may speak boldly, as I ought to speak.
target: yang kulayani sebagai utusan yang dipenjarakan. Berdoalah supaya dengan keberanian aku menyatakannya, sebagaimana seharusnya aku berbicara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Saul fell straightway all along on the earth, and was sore afraid, because of the words of Samuel: and there was no strength in him; for he had eaten no bread all the day, nor all the night.
target: Pada saat itu juga rebahlah Saul memanjang ke tanah sebab ia sangat ketakutan oleh karena perkataan Samuel itu. Juga tidak ada lagi kekuatannya, karena sehari semalam itu ia tidak makan apa-apa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Gideon the son of Joash returned from battle before the sun was up,
target: Kemudian kembalilah Gideon bin Yoas dari peperangan dengan melalui pendakian Heres;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall go into the holes of the rocks, and into the caves of the earth, for fear of the LORD, and for the glory of his majesty, when he ariseth to shake terribly the earth.
target: Maka orang akan masuk ke dalam gua-gua di gunung batu dan ke dalam liang-liang di tanah terhadap kedahsyatan TUHAN dan terhadap semarak kemegahan-Nya, pada waktu Ia bangkit menakut-nakuti bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joshua said unto the people, Ye are witnesses against yourselves that ye have chosen you the LORD, to serve him. And they said, We are witnesses.
target: Kemudian berkatalah Yosua kepada bangsa itu: "Kamulah saksi terhadap kamu sendiri, bahwa kamu telah memilih TUHAN untuk beribadah kepada-Nya." Jawab mereka: "Kamilah saksi!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The neighbours therefore, and they which before had seen him that he was blind, said, Is not this he that sat and begged?
target: Tetapi tetangga-tetangganya dan mereka, yang dahulu mengenalnya sebagai pengemis, berkata: "Bukankah dia ini, yang selalu mengemis?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither be ye idolaters, as were some of them; as it is written, The people sat down to eat and drink, and rose up to play.
target: dan supaya jangan kita menjadi penyembah-penyembah berhala, sama seperti beberapa orang dari mereka, seperti ada tertulis: "Maka duduklah bangsa itu untuk makan dan minum; kemudian bangunlah mereka dan bersukaria."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Every sabbath he shall set it in order before the LORD continually, being taken from the children of Israel by an everlasting covenant.
target: Setiap hari Sabat ia harus tetap mengaturnya di hadapan TUHAN; itulah dari pihak orang Israel suatu kewajiban perjanjian untuk selama-lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God wrought special miracles by the hands of Paul:
target: Oleh Paulus Allah mengadakan mujizat-mujizat yang luar biasa,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There was a little city, and few men within it; and there came a great king against it, and besieged it, and built great bulwarks against it:
target: ada sebuah kota yang kecil, penduduknya tidak seberapa; seorang raja yang agung menyerang, mengepungnya dan mendirikan tembok-tembok pengepungan yang besar terhadapnya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He was unto me as a bear lying in wait, and as a lion in secret places.
target: Laksana beruang Ia menghadang aku, laksana singa dalam tempat persembunyian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then shalt thou kill the ram, and take of his blood, and put it upon the tip of the right ear of Aaron, and upon the tip of the right ear of his sons, and upon the thumb of their right hand, and upon the great toe of their right foot, and sprinkle the blood upon the altar round about.
target: Haruslah kausembelih domba jantan itu, kauambillah sedikit dari darahnya dan kaububuh pada cuping telinga kanan Harun dan pada cuping telinga kanan anak-anaknya, pada ibu jari tangan kanan dan pada ibu jari kaki kanan mereka, dan darah selebihnya kausiramkanlah pada mezbah sekelilingnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And stood at his feet behind him weeping, and began to wash his feet with tears, and did wipe them with the hairs of her head, and kissed his feet, and anointed them with the ointment.
target: Sambil menangis ia pergi berdiri di belakang Yesus dekat kaki-Nya, lalu membasahi kaki-Nya itu dengan air matanya dan menyekanya dengan rambutnya, kemudian ia mencium kaki-Nya dan meminyakinya dengan minyak wangi itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whether is easier, to say, Thy sins be forgiven thee; or to say, Rise up and walk?
target: Manakah lebih mudah, mengatakan: Dosamu sudah diampuni, atau mengatakan: Bangunlah, dan berjalanlah?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This he said, not that he cared for the poor; but because he was a thief, and had the bag, and bare what was put therein.
target: Hal itu dikatakannya bukan karena ia memperhatikan nasib orang-orang miskin, melainkan karena ia adalah seorang pencuri; ia sering mengambil uang yang disimpan dalam kas yang dipegangnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the high priest rent his clothes, saying, He hath spoken blasphemy; what further need have we of witnesses? behold, now ye have heard his blasphemy.
target: Maka Imam Besar itu mengoyakkan pakaiannya dan berkata: "Ia menghujat Allah. Untuk apa kita perlu saksi lagi? Sekarang telah kamu dengar hujat-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then were the people of Israel divided into two parts: half of the people followed Tibni the son of Ginath, to make him king; and half followed Omri.
target: Pada waktu itu bangsa Israel terbagi dua. Sebagian dari bangsa itu mengikuti Tibni bin Ginat, dan bermaksud mengangkat dia menjadi raja, dan sebagian lagi mengikuti Omri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Forbidding to marry, and commanding to abstain from meats, which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth.
target: Mereka itu melarang orang kawin, melarang orang makan makanan yang diciptakan Allah supaya dengan pengucapan syukur dimakan oleh orang yang percaya dan yang telah mengenal kebenaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the anger of the LORD was kindled against this land, to bring upon it all the curses that are written in this book:
target: Itulah sebabnya murka TUHAN bangkit terhadap negeri ini, sehingga didatangkan ke atasnya segala kutuk yang tertulis dalam kitab ini:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they took strong cities, and a fat land, and possessed houses full of all goods, wells digged, vineyards, and oliveyards, and fruit trees in abundance: so they did eat, and were filled, and became fat, and delighted themselves in thy great goodness.
target: Mereka merebut kota-kota yang berkubu dan tanah yang subur. Mereka merampas rumah-rumah yang penuh berisi berbagai-bagai barang baik, tempat-tempat air pahatan, kebun-kebun anggur dan kebun-kebun zaitun dan pohon-pohon buah-buahan dalam jumlah yang sangat banyak. Mereka makan dan menjadi kenyang dan gemuk. Mereka hidup mewah karena kebaikan-Mu yang besar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Until the time that his word came: the word of the LORD tried him.
target: sampai saat firman-Nya sudah genap, dan janji TUHAN membenarkannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For how can the servant of this my lord talk with this my lord? for as for me, straightway there remained no strength in me, neither is there breath left in me.
target: Masakan aku, hamba tuanku ini dapat berbicara dengan tuanku! Bukankah tidak ada lagi kekuatan padaku dan tidak ada lagi nafas padaku?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if ye do this thing indeed, then shall there enter in by the gates of this house kings sitting upon the throne of David, riding in chariots and on horses, he, and his servants, and his people.
target: Sebab jika kamu sungguh-sungguh melakukan semuanya itu, maka melalui pintu-pintu gerbang istana ini akan berarak masuk raja-raja yang akan duduk di atas takhta Daud dengan mengendarai kereta dan kuda: mereka itu, pegawai-pegawainya dan rakyatnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if a stranger shall sojourn among you, and will keep the passover unto the LORD; according to the ordinance of the passover, and according to the manner thereof, so shall he do: ye shall have one ordinance, both for the stranger, and for him that was born in the land.
target: Apabila seorang asing yang telah menetap padamu hendak merayakan Paskah bagi TUHAN, maka haruslah ia merayakannya menurut segala ketetapan dan peraturan Paskah. Satu ketetapan harus berlaku bagi kamu, baik bagi orang asing maupun bagi orang Israel asli."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in the seventh year Jehoiada strengthened himself, and took the captains of hundreds, Azariah the son of Jeroham, and Ishmael the son of Jehohanan, and Azariah the son of Obed, and Maaseiah the son of Adaiah, and Elishaphat the son of Zichri, into covenant with him.
target: Tetapi dalam tahun ketujuh Yoyada memberanikan diri dan ia mengadakan persepakatan dengan para kepala pasukan seratus, yakni: Azarya bin Yeroham, Ismael bin Yohanan, Azarya bin Obed. Maaseya bin Adaya, dan Elisafat bin Zikhri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Flee, save your lives, and be like the heath in the wilderness.
target: Larilah, selamatkanlah nyawamu: jadilah seperti keledai liar di padang gurun!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest's palace, and went in, and sat with the servants, to see the end.
target: Dan Petrus mengikuti Dia dari jauh sampai ke halaman Imam Besar, dan setelah masuk ke dalam, ia duduk di antara pengawal-pengawal untuk melihat kesudahan perkara itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And their eyes were opened, and they knew him; and he vanished out of their sight.
target: Ketika itu terbukalah mata mereka dan mereka pun mengenal Dia, tetapi Ia lenyap dari tengah-tengah mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Hilkiah answered and said to Shaphan the scribe, I have found the book of the law in the house of the LORD. And Hilkiah delivered the book to Shaphan.
target: Maka berkatalah Hilkia kepada Safan, panitera negara itu: "Aku telah menemukan kitab Taurat di rumah TUHAN!" Lalu Hilkia memberikan kitab itu kepada Safan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as Jesus passed by, he saw a man which was blind from his birth.
target: Waktu Yesus sedang lewat, Ia melihat seorang yang buta sejak lahirnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Arise; for this matter belongeth unto thee: we also will be with thee: be of good courage, and do it.
target: Bangkitlah, karena hal itu adalah tugasmu. Kami akan mendampingi engkau. Kuatkanlah hatimu, dan bertindaklah!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they departed from Iim, and pitched in Dibongad.
target: Mereka berangkat dari reruntuhan itu, lalu berkemah di Dibon-Gad.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But this I say, brethren, the time is short: it remaineth, that both they that have wives be as though they had none;
target: Saudara-saudara, inilah yang kumaksudkan, yaitu: waktu telah singkat! Karena itu dalam waktu yang masih sisa ini orang-orang yang beristeri harus berlaku seolah-olah mereka tidak beristeri;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the seventh month, in the one and twentieth day of the month, came the word of the LORD by the prophet Haggai, saying,
target: pada hari yang kedua puluh empat dalam bulan yang keenam. Pada tahun yang kedua zaman raja Darius,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he was come, the Jews which came down from Jerusalem stood round about, and laid many and grievous complaints against Paul, which they could not prove.
target: Sesudah Paulus tiba di situ, semua orang Yahudi yang datang dari Yerusalem berdiri mengelilinginya dan mereka mengemukakan banyak tuduhan berat terhadap dia yang tidak dapat mereka buktikan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the people spake against God, and against Moses, Wherefore have ye brought us up out of Egypt to die in the wilderness? for there is no bread, neither is there any water; and our soul loatheth this light bread.
target: Lalu mereka berkata-kata melawan Allah dan Musa: "Mengapa kamu memimpin kami keluar dari Mesir? Supaya kami mati di padang gurun ini? Sebab di sini tidak ada roti dan tidak ada air, dan akan makanan hambar ini kami telah muak."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet: praise him with the psaltery and harp.
target: Pujilah Dia dengan tiupan sangkakala, pujilah Dia dengan gambus dan kecapi!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God.
target: Sebab mereka lebih suka akan kehormatan manusia dari pada kehormatan Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joshua the son of Nun, the servant of the LORD, died, being an hundred and ten years old.
target: Dan Yosua bin Nun, hamba TUHAN itu, mati pada umur seratus sepuluh tahun;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of a woman and her daughter, neither shalt thou take her son's daughter, or her daughter's daughter, to uncover her nakedness; for they are her near kinswomen: it is wickedness.
target: Janganlah kausingkapkan aurat seorang perempuan dan anaknya perempuan. Janganlah kauambil anak perempuan dari anaknya laki-laki atau dari anaknya perempuan untuk menyingkapkan auratnya, karena mereka adalah kerabatmu; itulah perbuatan mesum.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he laid his hands on her: and immediately she was made straight, and glorified God.
target: Lalu Ia meletakkan tangan-Nya atas perempuan itu, dan seketika itu juga berdirilah perempuan itu, dan memuliakan Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the multitudes that went before, and that followed, cried, saying, Hosanna to the son of David: Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord; Hosanna in the highest.
target: Dan orang banyak yang berjalan di depan Yesus dan yang mengikuti-Nya dari belakang berseru, katanya: "Hosana bagi Anak Daud, diberkatilah Dia yang datang dalam nama Tuhan, hosana di tempat yang mahatinggi!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet, saying,
target: supaya genaplah firman yang disampaikan oleh nabi Yesaya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD hath opened his armoury, and hath brought forth the weapons of his indignation: for this is the work of the Lord GOD of hosts in the land of the Chaldeans.
target: TUHAN telah membuka tempat perlengkapan-Nya dan mengeluarkan senjata-senjata geram-Nya, sebab ada pekerjaan bagi Tuhan ALLAH semesta alam di negeri orang-orang Kasdim:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He answered and said unto them, Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites, as it is written, This people honoureth me with their lips, but their heart is far from me.
target: Jawab-Nya kepada mereka: "Benarlah nubuat Yesaya tentang kamu, hai orang-orang munafik! Sebab ada tertulis: Bangsa ini memuliakan Aku dengan bibirnya, padahal hatinya jauh dari pada-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For whosoever hath, to him shall be given, and he shall have more abundance: but whosoever hath not, from him shall be taken away even that he hath.
target: Karena siapa yang mempunyai, kepadanya akan diberi, sehingga ia berkelimpahan; tetapi siapa yang tidak mempunyai, apa pun juga yang ada padanya akan diambil dari padanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The Jews therefore, because it was the preparation, that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day, (for that sabbath day was an high day,) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken, and that they might be taken away.
target: Karena hari itu hari persiapan dan supaya pada hari Sabat mayat-mayat itu tidak tinggal tergantung pada kayu salib — sebab Sabat itu adalah hari yang besar — maka datanglah orang-orang Yahudi kepada Pilatus dan meminta kepadanya supaya kaki orang-orang itu dipatahkan dan mayat-mayatnya diturunkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me: and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me.
target: Barangsiapa mengasihi bapa atau ibunya lebih dari pada-Ku, ia tidak layak bagi-Ku; dan barangsiapa mengasihi anaknya laki-laki atau perempuan lebih dari pada-Ku, ia tidak layak bagi-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the woman arose, and did after the saying of the man of God: and she went with her household, and sojourned in the land of the Philistines seven years.
target: Lalu berkemaslah perempuan itu dan dilakukannyalah seperti perkataan abdi Allah itu. Ia pergi bersama-sama dengan keluarganya, lalu tinggal menetap sebagai pendatang di negeri orang Filistin tujuh tahun lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the priest shall command that one of the birds be killed in an earthen vessel over running water:
target: Imam harus memerintahkan supaya burung yang seekor disembelih di atas belanga tanah berisi air mengalir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall not take of thee a stone for a corner, nor a stone for foundations; but thou shalt be desolate for ever, saith the LORD.
target: Orang tidak akan mengambil batu penjuru atau batu dasar dari padamu, tetapi engkau akan menjadi tempat tandus yang kekal, demikianlah firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But every man's servant that is bought for money, when thou hast circumcised him, then shall he eat thereof.
target: Seorang budak belian barulah boleh memakannya, setelah engkau menyunat dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He hath taken a bag of money with him, and will come home at the day appointed.
target: sekantong uang dibawanya, ia baru pulang menjelang bulan purnama."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore shall her young men fall in the streets, and all her men of war shall be cut off in that day, saith the LORD.
target: Sebab itu teruna-terunanya akan rebah di tanah-tanah lapangnya, dan semua prajuritnya akan menjadi bungkam pada waktu itu, demikianlah firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And of the Shilonites; Asaiah the firstborn, and his sons.
target: Dan dari orang Syela ialah Asaya, anak yang sulung, dengan anak-anaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So it came to pass, when the king's commandment and his decree was heard, and when many maidens were gathered together unto Shushan the palace, to the custody of Hegai, that Esther was brought also unto the king's house, to the custody of Hegai, keeper of the women.
target: Setelah titah dan undang-undang raja tersiar dan banyak gadis dikumpulkan di dalam benteng Susan, di bawah pengawasan Hegai, maka Ester pun dibawa masuk ke dalam istana raja, di bawah pengawasan Hegai, penjaga para perempuan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: By this therefore shall the iniquity of Jacob be purged; and this is all the fruit to take away his sin; when he maketh all the stones of the altar as chalkstones that are beaten in sunder, the groves and images shall not stand up.
target: Maka beginilah akan dihapuskan kesalahan Yakub dan inilah buahnya kalau ia menjauhkan dosanya: ia akan membuat segala batu mezbah seperti batu-batu kapur yang dipecah-pecahkan, sehingga tiada lagi tiang-tiang berhala dan pedupaan-pedupaan yang tinggal berdiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For many shall come in my name, saying, I am Christ; and shall deceive many.
target: Sebab banyak orang akan datang dengan memakai nama-Ku dan berkata: Akulah Mesias, dan mereka akan menyesatkan banyak orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Not because I desire a gift: but I desire fruit that may abound to your account.
target: Tetapi yang kuutamakan bukanlah pemberian itu, melainkan buahnya, yang makin memperbesar keuntunganmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And, lo, it was all grown over with thorns, and nettles had covered the face thereof, and the stone wall thereof was broken down.
target: Lihatlah, semua itu ditumbuhi onak, tanahnya tertutup dengan jeruju, dan temboknya sudah roboh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: (For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal, but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds;)
target: karena senjata kami dalam perjuangan bukanlah senjata duniawi, melainkan senjata yang diperlengkapi dengan kuasa Allah, yang sanggup untuk meruntuhkan benteng-benteng.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the angel of the LORD called unto him out of heaven, and said, Abraham, Abraham: and he said, Here am I.
target: Tetapi berserulah Malaikat TUHAN dari langit kepadanya: "Abraham, Abraham." Sahutnya: "Ya, Tuhan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Lebanon is not sufficient to burn, nor the beasts thereof sufficient for a burnt offering.
target: Libanon tidak mencukupi bagi kayu api dan margasatwanya tidak mencukupi bagi korban bakaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then straightway they departed from him which should have examined him: and the chief captain also was afraid, after he knew that he was a Roman, and because he had bound him.
target: Maka mereka yang harus menyesah dia, segera mundur; dan kepala pasukan itu juga takut, setelah ia tahu, bahwa Paulus, yang ia suruh ikat itu, adalah orang Rum.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ner begat Kish; and Kish begat Saul; and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchishua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal.
target: Ner memperanakkan Kish; Kish memperanakkan Saul; Saul memperanakkan Yonatan, Malkisua, Abinadab dan Esybaal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he taught his disciples, and said unto them, The Son of man is delivered into the hands of men, and they shall kill him; and after that he is killed, he shall rise the third day.
target: sebab Ia sedang mengajar murid-murid-Nya. Ia berkata kepada mereka: "Anak Manusia akan diserahkan ke dalam tangan manusia, dan mereka akan membunuh Dia, dan tiga hari sesudah Ia dibunuh Ia akan bangkit."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They shall run like mighty men; they shall climb the wall like men of war; and they shall march every one on his ways, and they shall not break their ranks:
target: Seperti pahlawan mereka berlari, seperti prajurit mereka naik tembok; dan mereka masing-masing berjalan terus dengan tidak membelok dari jalannya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let me alone, that I may destroy them, and blot out their name from under heaven: and I will make of thee a nation mightier and greater than they.
target: Biarkanlah Aku, maka Aku akan memunahkan mereka dan menghapuskan nama mereka dari kolong langit; tetapi dari padamu akan Kubuat suatu bangsa yang lebih berkuasa dan lebih banyak dari pada bangsa ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For this my son was dead, and is alive again; he was lost, and is found. And they began to be merry.
target: Sebab anakku ini telah mati dan menjadi hidup kembali, ia telah hilang dan didapat kembali. Maka mulailah mereka bersukaria.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Knowest thou it, because thou wast then born? or because the number of thy days is great?
target: Tentu engkau mengenalnya, karena ketika itu engkau telah lahir, dan jumlah hari-harimu telah banyak!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He brought them forth also with silver and gold: and there was not one feeble person among their tribes.
target: Dituntun-Nya mereka keluar membawa perak dan emas, dan di antara suku-suku mereka tidak ada yang tergelincir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But he was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed.
target: Tetapi dia tertikam oleh karena pemberontakan kita, dia diremukkan oleh karena kejahatan kita; ganjaran yang mendatangkan keselamatan bagi kita ditimpakan kepadanya, dan oleh bilur-bilurnya kita menjadi sembuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD appointed a set time, saying, To morrow the LORD shall do this thing in the land.
target: Selanjutnya TUHAN menentukan waktunya, firman-Nya: "Besoklah TUHAN akan melakukan hal itu di negeri ini."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not kill.
target: Jangan membunuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Surely oppression maketh a wise man mad; and a gift destroyeth the heart.
target: Sungguh, pemerasan membodohkan orang berhikmat, dan uang suap merusakkan hati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In journeyings often, in perils of waters, in perils of robbers, in perils by mine own countrymen, in perils by the heathen, in perils in the city, in perils in the wilderness, in perils in the sea, in perils among false brethren;
target: Dalam perjalananku aku sering diancam bahaya banjir dan bahaya penyamun, bahaya dari pihak orang-orang Yahudi dan dari pihak orang-orang bukan Yahudi; bahaya di kota, bahaya di padang gurun, bahaya di tengah laut, dan bahaya dari pihak saudara-saudara palsu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now in the twenty and fourth day of this month the children of Israel were assembled with fasting, and with sackclothes, and earth upon them.
target: Pada hari yang kedua puluh empat bulan itu berkumpullah orang Israel dan berpuasa dengan mengenakan kain kabung dan dengan tanah di kepala.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the king of the south shall come into his kingdom, and shall return into his own land.
target: Kemudian raja ini akan memasuki kerajaan raja negeri Selatan, tetapi kemudian pulang ke negerinya sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the father of circumcision to them who are not of the circumcision only, but who also walk in the steps of that faith of our father Abraham, which he had being yet uncircumcised.
target: dan juga menjadi bapa orang-orang bersunat, yaitu mereka yang bukan hanya bersunat, tetapi juga mengikuti jejak iman Abraham, bapa leluhur kita, pada masa ia belum disunat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Esteeming the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures in Egypt: for he had respect unto the recompence of the reward.
target: Ia menganggap penghinaan karena Kristus sebagai kekayaan yang lebih besar dari pada semua harta Mesir, sebab pandangannya ia arahkan kepada upah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses said unto Korah, Hear, I pray you, ye sons of Levi:
target: Lalu berkatalah Musa kepada Korah: "Cobalah dengar, hai orang-orang Lewi!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jethro, Moses' father in law, came with his sons and his wife unto Moses into the wilderness, where he encamped at the mount of God:
target: Ketika Yitro, mertua Musa, beserta anak-anak dan isteri Musa sampai kepadanya di padang gurun, tempat ia berkemah dekat gunung Allah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the city was besieged unto the eleventh year of king Zedekiah.
target: Demikianlah kota itu terkepung sampai tahun yang kesebelas zaman raja Zedekia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joshua made him sharp knives, and circumcised the children of Israel at the hill of the foreskins.
target: Lalu Yosua membuat pisau dari batu dan disunatnyalah orang Israel itu di Bukit Kulit Khatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they had brought them, they set them before the council: and the high priest asked them,
target: Mereka membawa keduanya dan menghadapkan mereka kepada Mahkamah Agama. Imam Besar mulai menanyai mereka,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof: let the fields rejoice, and all that is therein.
target: Biarlah gemuruh laut serta isinya, biarlah beria-ria padang dan segala yang di atasnya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Sharon shall be a fold of flocks, and the valley of Achor a place for the herds to lie down in, for my people that have sought me.
target: Saron akan menjadi padang rumput bagi kambing domba, dan lembah Akhor menjadi tempat pembaringan bagi lembu sapi, untuk umat-Ku yang mencari Aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye who turn judgment to wormwood, and leave off righteousness in the earth,
target: Hai kamu yang mengubah keadilan menjadi ipuh dan yang mengempaskan kebenaran ke tanah!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there ye shall eat before the LORD your God, and ye shall rejoice in all that ye put your hand unto, ye and your households, wherein the LORD thy God hath blessed thee.
target: Di sanalah kamu makan di hadapan TUHAN, Allahmu, dan bersukaria, kamu dan seisi rumahmu, karena dalam segala usahamu engkau diberkati oleh TUHAN, Allahmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For every beast of the forest is mine, and the cattle upon a thousand hills.
target: sebab punya-Kulah segala binatang hutan, dan beribu-ribu hewan di gunung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all that have not fins and scales in the seas, and in the rivers, of all that move in the waters, and of any living thing which is in the waters, they shall be an abomination unto you:
target: Tetapi segala yang tidak bersirip atau bersisik di dalam lautan dan di dalam sungai, dari segala yang berkeriapan di dalam air dan dari segala makhluk hidup yang ada di dalam air, semuanya itu kejijikan bagimu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The bloodthirsty hate the upright: but the just seek his soul.
target: Orang yang haus akan darah membenci orang saleh, tetapi orang yang jujur mencari keselamatannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it was so, that, after they had carried it about, the hand of the LORD was against the city with a very great destruction: and he smote the men of the city, both small and great, and they had emerods in their secret parts.
target: Tetapi setelah mereka memindahkannya, maka tangan TUHAN mendatangkan kegemparan yang sangat besar atas kota itu; Ia menghajar orang-orang kota itu, anak-anak dan orang dewasa, sehingga timbul borok-borok pada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And say, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I am against thee, O Zidon; and I will be glorified in the midst of thee: and they shall know that I am the LORD, when I shall have executed judgments in her, and shall be sanctified in her.
target: dan katakanlah: Beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Lihat, Aku menjadi lawanmu, hai Sidon, dan Aku menyatakan kemuliaan-Ku di tengah-tengahmu. Dan mereka akan mengetahui bahwa Akulah TUHAN, pada saat Aku menjatuhkan hukuman atasnya dan menunjukkan kekudusan-Ku terhadap dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So again have I thought in these days to do well unto Jerusalem and to the house of Judah: fear ye not.
target: maka pada waktu ini Aku kembali bermaksud berbuat baik kepada Yerusalem dan kepada kaum Yehuda. Janganlah takut!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And no sin offering, whereof any of the blood is brought into the tabernacle of the congregation to reconcile withal in the holy place, shall be eaten: it shall be burnt in the fire.
target: Tetapi setiap korban penghapus dosa, yang dari darahnya dibawa sebagian ke dalam Kemah Pertemuan untuk mengadakan pendamaian di dalam tempat kudus, janganlah dimakan, melainkan dibakar habis dengan api."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As the valleys are they spread forth, as gardens by the river's side, as the trees of lign aloes which the LORD hath planted, and as cedar trees beside the waters.
target: Sebagai lembah yang membentang semuanya; sebagai taman di tepi sungai; sebagai pohon gaharu yang ditanam TUHAN; sebagai pohon aras di tepi air.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Saul said, They have brought them from the Amalekites: for the people spared the best of the sheep and of the oxen, to sacrifice unto the LORD thy God; and the rest we have utterly destroyed.
target: Jawab Saul: "Semuanya itu dibawa dari pada orang Amalek, sebab rakyat menyelamatkan kambing domba dan lembu-lembu yang terbaik dengan maksud untuk mempersembahkan korban kepada TUHAN, Allahmu; tetapi selebihnya telah kami tumpas."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Jesus sent the multitude away, and went into the house: and his disciples came unto him, saying, Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field.
target: Maka Yesus pun meninggalkan orang banyak itu, lalu pulang. Murid-murid-Nya datang dan berkata kepada-Nya: "Jelaskanlah kepada kami perumpamaan tentang lalang di ladang itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O thou enemy, destructions are come to a perpetual end: and thou hast destroyed cities; their memorial is perished with them.
target: Engkau telah menghardik bangsa-bangsa, telah membinasakan orang-orang fasik; nama mereka telah Kauhapuskan untuk seterusnya dan selama-lamanya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Shall not the land tremble for this, and every one mourn that dwelleth therein? and it shall rise up wholly as a flood; and it shall be cast out and drowned, as by the flood of Egypt.
target: Tidakkah akan gemetar bumi karena hal itu, sehingga setiap penduduknya berkabung? Tidakkah itu seluruhnya akan naik seperti sungai Nil, diombang-ambingkan dan surut seperti sungai Mesir?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And on the morrow, when Agrippa was come, and Bernice, with great pomp, and was entered into the place of hearing, with the chief captains, and principal men of the city, at Festus' commandment Paul was brought forth.
target: Pada keesokan harinya datanglah Agripa dan Bernike dengan segala kebesaran dan sesudah mereka masuk ruang pengadilan bersama-sama dengan kepala-kepala pasukan dan orang-orang yang terkemuka dari kota itu, Festus memberi perintah, supaya Paulus dihadapkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And at that time shall Michael stand up, the great prince which standeth for the children of thy people: and there shall be a time of trouble, such as never was since there was a nation even to that same time: and at that time thy people shall be delivered, every one that shall be found written in the book.
target: "Pada waktu itu juga akan muncul Mikhael, pemimpin besar itu, yang akan mendampingi anak-anak bangsamu; dan akan ada suatu waktu kesesakan yang besar, seperti yang belum pernah terjadi sejak ada bangsa-bangsa sampai pada waktu itu. Tetapi pada waktu itu bangsamu akan terluput, yakni barangsiapa yang didapati namanya tertulis dalam Kitab itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These things write I unto thee, hoping to come unto thee shortly:
target: Semuanya itu kutuliskan kepadamu, walaupun kuharap segera dapat mengunjungi engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she said unto her servants, Go on before me; behold, I come after you. But she told not her husband Nabal.
target: lalu berkata kepada bujang-bujangnya: "Berjalanlah mendahului aku; aku segera menyusul kamu." Tetapi Nabal, suaminya, tidaklah diberitahunya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said Jesus unto them, When ye have lifted up the Son of man, then shall ye know that I am he, and that I do nothing of myself; but as my Father hath taught me, I speak these things.
target: Maka kata Yesus: "Apabila kamu telah meninggikan Anak Manusia, barulah kamu tahu, bahwa Akulah Dia, dan bahwa Aku tidak berbuat apa-apa dari diri-Ku sendiri, tetapi Aku berbicara tentang hal-hal, sebagaimana diajarkan Bapa kepada-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To God only wise, be glory through Jesus Christ for ever. Amen.
target: bagi Dia, satu-satunya Allah yang penuh hikmat, oleh Yesus Kristus: segala kemuliaan sampai selama-lamanya! Amin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself, lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds.
target: Ingatlah selalu akan Dia, yang tekun menanggung bantahan yang sehebat itu terhadap diri-Nya dari pihak orang-orang berdosa, supaya jangan kamu menjadi lemah dan putus asa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And for these ye shall be unclean: whosoever toucheth the carcase of them shall be unclean until the even.
target: Semua yang berikut akan menajiskan kamu — setiap orang yang kena kepada bangkainya, menjadi najis sampai matahari terbenam,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Servants have ruled over us: there is none that doth deliver us out of their hand.
target: Pelayan-pelayan memerintah atas kami; yang melepaskan kami dari tangan mereka tak ada.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God, and saying,
target: Dan tiba-tiba tampaklah bersama-sama dengan malaikat itu sejumlah besar bala tentara sorga yang memuji Allah, katanya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies? who can forgive sins but God only?
target: "Mengapa orang ini berkata begitu? Ia menghujat Allah. Siapa yang dapat mengampuni dosa selain dari pada Allah sendiri?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.
target: Tetapi kamu, saudara-saudara, kamu tidak hidup di dalam kegelapan, sehingga hari itu tiba-tiba mendatangi kamu seperti pencuri,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the law it is written, With men of other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people; and yet for all that will they not hear me, saith the Lord.
target: Dalam hukum Taurat ada tertulis: "Oleh orang-orang yang mempunyai bahasa lain dan oleh mulut orang-orang asing Aku akan berbicara kepada bangsa ini, namun demikian mereka tidak akan mendengarkan Aku, firman Tuhan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Musa:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Elijah took the child, and brought him down out of the chamber into the house, and delivered him unto his mother: and Elijah said, See, thy son liveth.
target: Elia mengambil anak itu; ia membawanya turun dari kamar atas ke dalam rumah dan memberikannya kepada ibunya. Kata Elia: "Ini anakmu, ia sudah hidup!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the king answered and said, Give her the living child, and in no wise slay it: she is the mother thereof.
target: Tetapi raja menjawab, katanya: "Berikanlah kepadanya bayi yang hidup itu, jangan sekali-kali membunuh dia; dia itulah ibunya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: What shall be given unto thee? or what shall be done unto thee, thou false tongue?
target: Apakah yang diberikan kepadamu dan apakah yang ditambahkan kepadamu, hai lidah penipu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the Beerothites fled to Gittaim, and were sojourners there until this day.)
target: Orang Beerot sudah melarikan diri ke Gitaim dan menjadi pendatang di sana sampai sekarang. —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then these men were bound in their coats, their hosen, and their hats, and their other garments, and were cast into the midst of the burning fiery furnace.
target: Lalu diikatlah ketiga orang itu, dengan jubah, celana, topi dan pakaian-pakaian mereka yang lain, dan dicampakkan ke dalam perapian yang menyala-nyala.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people.
target: akan membayar nazarku kepada TUHAN di depan seluruh umat-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And give unto Solomon my son a perfect heart, to keep thy commandments, thy testimonies, and thy statutes, and to do all these things, and to build the palace, for the which I have made provision.
target: Dan kepada Salomo, anakku, berikanlah hati yang tulus sehingga ia berpegang pada segala perintah-Mu dan peringatan-Mu dan ketetapan-Mu, melakukan segala-galanya dan mendirikan bait yang persiapannya telah kulakukan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Pilate answered, What I have written I have written.
target: Jawab Pilatus: "Apa yang kutulis, tetap tertulis."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Every male among the priests shall eat thereof: it shall be eaten in the holy place: it is most holy.
target: Setiap laki-laki di antara para imam haruslah memakannya; haruslah itu dimakan di suatu tempat yang kudus; itulah bagian maha kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD of hosts hath sworn, saying, Surely as I have thought, so shall it come to pass; and as I have purposed, so shall it stand:
target: TUHAN semesta alam telah bersumpah, firman-Nya: "Sesungguhnya seperti yang Kumaksud, demikianlah akan terjadi, dan seperti yang Kurancang, demikianlah akan terlaksana:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have surely heard Ephraim bemoaning himself thus; Thou hast chastised me, and I was chastised, as a bullock unaccustomed to the yoke: turn thou me, and I shall be turned; for thou art the LORD my God.
target: Telah Kudengar sungguh-sungguh Efraim meratap: Engkau telah menghajar aku, dan aku telah menerima hajaran, seperti anak lembu yang tidak terlatih. Bawalah aku kembali, supaya aku berbalik, sebab Engkaulah TUHAN, Allahku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the priests killed them, and they made reconciliation with their blood upon the altar, to make an atonement for all Israel: for the king commanded that the burnt offering and the sin offering should be made for all Israel.
target: Dan para imam menyembelihnya dan mempersembahkan darahnya di atas mezbah sebagai korban penghapus dosa untuk mengadakan pendamaian bagi seluruh Israel. Sebab raja telah memerintahkan untuk mempersembahkan korban bakaran dan korban penghapus dosa itu bagi seluruh Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I heard a voice from heaven saying unto me, Write, Blessed are the dead which die in the Lord from henceforth: Yea, saith the Spirit, that they may rest from their labours; and their works do follow them.
target: Dan aku mendengar suara dari sorga berkata: Tuliskan: "Berbahagialah orang-orang mati yang mati dalam Tuhan, sejak sekarang ini." "Sungguh," kata Roh, "supaya mereka boleh beristirahat dari jerih lelah mereka, karena segala perbuatan mereka menyertai mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thy word's sake, and according to thine own heart, hast thou done all these great things, to make thy servant know them.
target: Oleh karena firman-Mu dan menurut hati-Mu Engkau telah melakukan segala perkara yang besar ini dengan memberitahukannya kepada hamba-Mu ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp, bearing his reproach.
target: Karena itu marilah kita pergi kepada-Nya di luar perkemahan dan menanggung kehinaan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto him, Son, thou art ever with me, and all that I have is thine.
target: Kata ayahnya kepadanya: Anakku, engkau selalu bersama-sama dengan aku, dan segala kepunyaanku adalah kepunyaanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they said, Thou hast saved our lives: let us find grace in the sight of my lord, and we will be Pharaoh's servants.
target: Lalu berkatalah mereka: "Engkau telah memelihara hidup kami; asal kiranya kami mendapat kasih tuanku, biarlah kami menjadi hamba kepada Firaun."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses stretched forth his hand toward heaven; and there was a thick darkness in all the land of Egypt three days:
target: Lalu Musa mengulurkan tangannya ke langit dan datanglah gelap gulita di seluruh tanah Mesir selama tiga hari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Poratha, and Adalia, and Aridatha,
target: Porata, Adalya, Aridata,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, I will put a fleece of wool in the floor; and if the dew be on the fleece only, and it be dry upon all the earth beside, then shall I know that thou wilt save Israel by mine hand, as thou hast said.
target: maka aku membentangkan guntingan bulu domba di tempat pengirikan; apabila hanya di atas guntingan bulu itu ada embun, tetapi seluruh tanah di situ tinggal kering, maka tahulah aku, bahwa Engkau mau menyelamatkan orang Israel dengan perantaraanku, seperti yang Kaufirmankan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he spake to his disciples, that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude, lest they should throng him.
target: Ia menyuruh murid-murid-Nya menyediakan sebuah perahu bagi-Nya karena orang banyak itu, supaya mereka jangan sampai menghimpit-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law; but desire to have you circumcised, that they may glory in your flesh.
target: Sebab mereka yang menyunatkan dirinya pun, tidak memelihara hukum Taurat. Tetapi mereka menghendaki, supaya kamu menyunatkan diri, agar mereka dapat bermegah atas keadaanmu yang lahiriah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And at Bethuel, and at Hormah, and at Ziklag,
target: Betuel, Horma, Ziklag,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then my anger shall be kindled against them in that day, and I will forsake them, and I will hide my face from them, and they shall be devoured, and many evils and troubles shall befall them; so that they will say in that day, Are not these evils come upon us, because our God is not among us?
target: Pada waktu itu murka-Ku akan bernyala-nyala terhadap mereka, Aku akan meninggalkan mereka dan menyembunyikan wajah-Ku terhadap mereka, sehingga mereka termakan habis dan banyak kali ditimpa malapetaka serta kesusahan. Maka pada waktu itu mereka akan berkata: Bukankah malapetaka itu menimpa kita, oleh sebab Allah kita tidak ada di tengah-tengah kita?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The crown of pride, the drunkards of Ephraim, shall be trodden under feet:
target: Mahkota kemegahan pemabuk-pemabuk Efraim itu akan diinjak-injak dengan kaki,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.
target: Sesungguhnya keselamatan dari pada-Nya dekat pada orang-orang yang takut akan Dia, sehingga kemuliaan diam di negeri kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the young men that were brought up with him spake unto him, saying, Thus shalt thou answer the people that spake unto thee, saying, Thy father made our yoke heavy, but make thou it somewhat lighter for us; thus shalt thou say unto them, My little finger shall be thicker than my father's loins.
target: Lalu orang-orang muda yang sebaya dengan dia itu berkata: "Beginilah harus kaukatakan kepada rakyat yang telah berkata kepadamu: Ayahmu telah memberatkan tanggungan kami, tetapi engkau ini, berilah keringanan kepada kami — beginilah harus kaukatakan kepada mereka: Kelingkingku lebih besar dari pada pinggang ayahku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And say unto them, Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; Behold, I will send and take Nebuchadrezzar the king of Babylon, my servant, and will set his throne upon these stones that I have hid; and he shall spread his royal pavilion over them.
target: lalu katakanlah kepada mereka: Beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam, Allah Israel: Sesungguhnya, Aku mengutus orang untuk menjemput Nebukadnezar, raja Babel, hamba-Ku itu, supaya ia mendirikan takhtanya di atas batu-batu yang telah Kusuruh sembunyikan ini, dan membentangkan permadani kebesarannya di atasnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he clave to the LORD, and departed not from following him, but kept his commandments, which the LORD commanded Moses.
target: Ia berpaut kepada TUHAN, tidak menyimpang dari pada mengikuti Dia dan ia berpegang pada perintah-perintah TUHAN yang telah diperintahkan-Nya kepada Musa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yea, thou heardest not; yea, thou knewest not; yea, from that time that thine ear was not opened: for I knew that thou wouldest deal very treacherously, and wast called a transgressor from the womb.
target: Engkau tidak mendengarnya ataupun mengetahuinya, juga telingamu tidak terbuka dari sejak dahulu; tetapi Aku telah mengetahui, bahwa engkau berbuat khianat sekeji-kejinya, dan bahwa orang menyebutkan engkau: pemberontak sejak dari kandungan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Verily I say unto you, Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world, there shall also this, that this woman hath done, be told for a memorial of her.
target: Aku berkata kepadamu: Sesungguhnya di mana saja Injil ini diberitakan di seluruh dunia, apa yang dilakukannya ini akan disebut juga untuk mengingat dia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But thanks be to God, which put the same earnest care into the heart of Titus for you.
target: Syukur kepada Allah, yang oleh karena kamu mengaruniakan kesungguhan yang demikian juga dalam hati Titus untuk membantu kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joseph answered and said, This is the interpretation thereof: The three baskets are three days:
target: Yusuf menjawab: "Beginilah arti mimpi itu: ketiga bakul itu artinya tiga hari;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom: but the friend of the bridegroom, which standeth and heareth him, rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom's voice: this my joy therefore is fulfilled.
target: Yang empunya mempelai perempuan, ialah mempelai laki-laki; tetapi sahabat mempelai laki-laki, yang berdiri dekat dia dan yang mendengarkannya, sangat bersukacita mendengar suara mempelai laki-laki itu. Itulah sukacitaku, dan sekarang sukacitaku itu penuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Og the king of Bashan: for his mercy endureth for ever:
target: Dan Og, raja negeri Basan; bahwasanya untuk selama-lamanya kasih setia-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, afore Isaiah was gone out into the middle court, that the word of the LORD came to him, saying,
target: Tetapi Yesaya belum lagi keluar dari pelataran tengah, tiba-tiba datanglah firman TUHAN kepadanya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall offer thereof his offering, even an offering made by fire unto the LORD; the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards,
target: Kemudian dari kambing itu ia harus mempersembahkan lemak yang menyelubungi isi perut, dan segala lemak yang melekat pada isi perut itu sebagai persembahannya berupa korban api-apian bagi TUHAN,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And carry these ten cheeses unto the captain of their thousand, and look how thy brethren fare, and take their pledge.
