en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These going before tarried for us at Troas.
target: Mereka itu berangkat lebih dahulu dan menantikan kami di Troas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then they said to Jeremiah, The LORD be a true and faithful witness between us, if we do not even according to all things for the which the LORD thy God shall send thee to us.
target: Berkatalah mereka kepada Yeremia: "Biarlah TUHAN menjadi saksi yang benar dan yang dapat dipercaya terhadap kami, jika kami tidak berbuat menurut segala firman yang disuruh TUHAN, Allahmu, kausampaikan kepada kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The beauty of Israel is slain upon thy high places: how are the mighty fallen!
target: Kepermaianmu, hai Israel, mati terbunuh di bukit-bukitmu! Betapa gugur para pahlawan!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall drink, and be moved, and be mad, because of the sword that I will send among them.
target: supaya mereka minum, menjadi terhuyung-huyung dan bingung karena pedang yang hendak Kukirimkan ke antaranya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Lift ye up a banner upon the high mountain, exalt the voice unto them, shake the hand, that they may go into the gates of the nobles.
target: Naikkanlah panji-panji di atas gunung yang gundul, berserulah terhadap mereka dengan suara nyaring; lambaikanlah tangan supaya mereka masuk ke pintu-pintu gerbang para bangsawan!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, the hire of the labourers who have reaped down your fields, which is of you kept back by fraud, crieth: and the cries of them which have reaped are entered into the ears of the Lord of sabaoth.
target: Sesungguhnya telah terdengar teriakan besar, karena upah yang kamu tahan dari buruh yang telah menuai hasil ladangmu, dan telah sampai ke telinga Tuhan semesta alam keluhan mereka yang menyabit panenmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And for the precious things of the earth and fulness thereof, and for the good will of him that dwelt in the bush: let the blessing come upon the head of Joseph, and upon the top of the head of him that was separated from his brethren.
target: dan dengan yang terbaik dari bumi serta segala isinya; dengan perkenanan Dia yang diam dalam semak duri. Biarlah itu semuanya turun ke atas kepala Yusuf, ke atas batu kepala orang yang teristimewa di antara saudara-saudaranya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But he, willing to justify himself, said unto Jesus, And who is my neighbour?
target: Tetapi untuk membenarkan dirinya orang itu berkata kepada Yesus: "Dan siapakah sesamaku manusia?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But they hearkened not, nor inclined their ear to turn from their wickedness, to burn no incense unto other gods.
target: Tetapi mereka tidak mau mendengarkan dan tidak mau memperhatikan supaya berbalik dari kejahatan mereka dan tidak membakar korban lagi kepada allah lain.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: By faith the walls of Jericho fell down, after they were compassed about seven days.
target: Karena iman maka runtuhlah tembok-tembok Yerikho, setelah kota itu dikelilingi tujuh hari lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: His seed also will I make to endure for ever, and his throne as the days of heaven.
target: Aku akan memelihara kasih setia-Ku bagi dia untuk selama-lamanya, dan perjanjian-Ku teguh bagi dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life.
target: tetapi barangsiapa minum air yang akan Kuberikan kepadanya, ia tidak akan haus untuk selama-lamanya. Sebaliknya air yang akan Kuberikan kepadanya, akan menjadi mata air di dalam dirinya, yang terus-menerus memancar sampai kepada hidup yang kekal."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he put the altar of burnt offering by the door of the tabernacle of the tent of the congregation, and offered upon it the burnt offering and the meat offering; as the LORD commanded Moses.
target: Mezbah korban bakaran ditempatkannyalah di depan pintu Kemah Suci, yakni Kemah Pertemuan itu, dan dipersembahkannyalah di atasnya korban bakaran dan korban sajian — seperti yang diperintahkan TUHAN kepada Musa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And this they did, not as we hoped, but first gave their own selves to the Lord, and unto us by the will of God.
target: Mereka memberikan lebih banyak dari pada yang kami harapkan. Mereka memberikan diri mereka, pertama-tama kepada Allah, kemudian oleh karena kehendak Allah juga kepada kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Eleazar the priest said unto the men of war which went to the battle, This is the ordinance of the law which the LORD commanded Moses;
target: Lalu berkatalah imam Eleazar kepada para prajurit, yang telah pergi bertempur itu: "Inilah ketetapan hukum yang diperintahkan TUHAN kepada Musa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joseph commanded his servants the physicians to embalm his father: and the physicians embalmed Israel.
target: Dan Yusuf memerintahkan kepada tabib-tabib, yaitu hamba-hambanya, untuk merempah-rempahi mayat ayahnya; maka tabib-tabib itu merempah-rempahi mayat Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they took every man his censer, and put fire in them, and laid incense thereon, and stood in the door of the tabernacle of the congregation with Moses and Aaron.
target: Maka mereka masing-masing membawa perbaraannya, membubuh api ke dalamnya, menaruh ukupan di atasnya, lalu berdirilah mereka di depan pintu Kemah Pertemuan, juga Musa dan Harun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And that they should publish and proclaim in all their cities, and in Jerusalem, saying, Go forth unto the mount, and fetch olive branches, and pine branches, and myrtle branches, and palm branches, and branches of thick trees, to make booths, as it is written.
target: Maka didapatinya tertulis dalam hukum yang diberikan TUHAN dengan perantaraan Musa, bahwa orang Israel harus tinggal dalam pondok-pondok pada hari raya bulan yang ketujuh,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Understand therefore this day, that the LORD thy God is he which goeth over before thee; as a consuming fire he shall destroy them, and he shall bring them down before thy face: so shalt thou drive them out, and destroy them quickly, as the LORD hath said unto thee.
target: Maka ketahuilah pada hari ini, bahwa TUHAN, Allahmu, Dialah yang berjalan di depanmu laksana api yang menghanguskan; Dia akan memunahkan mereka dan Dia akan menundukkan mereka di hadapanmu. Demikianlah engkau akan menghalau dan membinasakan mereka dengan segera, seperti yang dijanjikan kepadamu oleh TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My times are in thy hand: deliver me from the hand of mine enemies, and from them that persecute me.
target: Tetapi aku, kepada-Mu aku percaya, ya TUHAN, aku berkata: "Engkaulah Allahku!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the bowls, and the snuffers, and the basons, and the spoons, and the censers of pure gold; and the hinges of gold, both for the doors of the inner house, the most holy place, and for the doors of the house, to wit, of the temple.
target: pasu-pasunya, pisau-pisaunya, bokor-bokor penyiramannya, cawan-cawannya dan perbaraan-perbaraannya, dari emas murni; engsel-engsel untuk pintu ruang dalam, yakni tempat maha kudus, dan engsel-engsel untuk pintu ruang besar Bait Suci, dari emas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The copy of the writing for a commandment to be given in every province was published unto all people, and that the Jews should be ready against that day to avenge themselves on their enemies.
target: Salinan pesan tertulis itu harus diundangkan di tiap-tiap daerah, lalu diumumkan kepada segala bangsa, dan orang Yahudi harus bersiap-siap untuk hari itu akan melakukan pembalasan kepada musuhnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Beside those things that are without, that which cometh upon me daily, the care of all the churches.
target: dan, dengan tidak menyebut banyak hal lain lagi, urusanku sehari-hari, yaitu untuk memelihara semua jemaat-jemaat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Elijah said unto Ahab, Get thee up, eat and drink; for there is a sound of abundance of rain.
target: Kemudian berkatalah Elia kepada Ahab: "Pergilah, makanlah dan minumlah, sebab bunyi derau hujan sudah kedengaran."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For as the earth bringeth forth her bud, and as the garden causeth the things that are sown in it to spring forth; so the Lord GOD will cause righteousness and praise to spring forth before all the nations.
target: Sebab seperti bumi memancarkan tumbuh-tumbuhan, dan seperti kebun menumbuhkan benih yang ditaburkan, demikianlah Tuhan ALLAH akan menumbuhkan kebenaran dan puji-pujian di depan semua bangsa-bangsa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And a certain scribe came, and said unto him, Master, I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest.
target: Lalu datanglah seorang ahli Taurat dan berkata kepada-Nya: "Guru, aku akan mengikut Engkau, ke mana saja Engkau pergi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of Bezai, three hundred twenty and four.
target: bani Bezai: tiga ratus dua puluh empat orang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now, O ye priests, this commandment is for you.
target: Maka sekarang, kepada kamulah tertuju perintah ini, hai para imam!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if the son of peace be there, your peace shall rest upon it: if not, it shall turn to you again.
target: Dan jikalau di situ ada orang yang layak menerima damai sejahtera, maka salammu itu akan tinggal atasnya. Tetapi jika tidak, salammu itu kembali kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I Daniel was grieved in my spirit in the midst of my body, and the visions of my head troubled me.
target: Maka aku, Daniel, terharu karena hal itu, dan penglihatan-penglihatan yang kulihat itu menggelisahkan aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jehoiada was the leader of the Aaronites, and with him were three thousand and seven hundred;
target: ditambah dengan Yoyada, pemimpin kaum Harun dan bersama-sama dia ada tiga ribu tujuh ratus orang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My root was spread out by the waters, and the dew lay all night upon my branch.
target: Akarku mencapai air, dan embun bermalam di atas ranting-rantingku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as he spake, a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him: and he went in, and sat down to meat.
target: Ketika Yesus selesai mengajar, seorang Farisi mengundang Dia untuk makan di rumahnya. Maka masuklah Ia ke rumah itu, lalu duduk makan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But, O LORD of hosts, that triest the righteous, and seest the reins and the heart, let me see thy vengeance on them: for unto thee have I opened my cause.
target: Ya TUHAN semesta alam, yang menguji orang benar, yang melihat batin dan hati, biarlah aku melihat pembalasan-Mu terhadap mereka, sebab kepada-Mulah kuserahkan perkaraku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if any man will hurt them, fire proceedeth out of their mouth, and devoureth their enemies: and if any man will hurt them, he must in this manner be killed.
target: Dan jikalau ada orang yang hendak menyakiti mereka, keluarlah api dari mulut mereka menghanguskan semua musuh mereka. Dan jikalau ada orang yang hendak menyakiti mereka, maka orang itu harus mati secara itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Israel that were present at Jerusalem kept the feast of unleavened bread seven days with great gladness: and the Levites and the priests praised the LORD day by day, singing with loud instruments unto the LORD.
target: Tujuh hari lamanya orang Israel yang berada di Yerusalem merayakan hari raya Roti Tidak Beragi dengan kesukaan yang besar, sedang orang-orang Lewi dan para imam setiap hari menyanyikan puji-pujian bagi TUHAN dengan sekuat tenaga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And out of them shall proceed thanksgiving and the voice of them that make merry: and I will multiply them, and they shall not be few; I will also glorify them, and they shall not be small.
target: Nyanyian syukur akan terdengar dari antara mereka, juga suara orang yang bersukaria. Aku akan membuat mereka banyak dan mereka tidak akan berkurang lagi; Aku akan membuat mereka dipermuliakan dan mereka tidak akan dihina lagi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Art thou not from everlasting, O LORD my God, mine Holy One? we shall not die. O LORD, thou hast ordained them for judgment; and, O mighty God, thou hast established them for correction.
target: Bukankah Engkau, ya TUHAN, dari dahulu Allahku, Yang Mahakudus? Tidak akan mati kami. Ya TUHAN, telah Kautetapkan dia untuk menghukumkan; ya Gunung Batu, telah Kautentukan dia untuk menyiksa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: At the brightness that was before him his thick clouds passed, hail stones and coals of fire.
target: Ia membuat kegelapan di sekeliling-Nya menjadi persembunyian-Nya, ya, menjadi pondok-Nya: air hujan yang gelap, awan yang tebal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither did Zebulun drive out the inhabitants of Kitron, nor the inhabitants of Nahalol; but the Canaanites dwelt among them, and became tributaries.
target: Suku Zebulon tidak menghalau penduduk Kitron dan penduduk Nahalol, sehingga orang Kanaan itu tetap diam di tengah-tengah mereka, walaupun sebagai orang rodi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when his master heard the words of his wife, which she spake unto him, saying, After this manner did thy servant to me; that his wrath was kindled.
target: Baru saja didengar oleh tuannya perkataan yang diceritakan isterinya kepadanya: begini begitulah aku diperlakukan oleh hambamu itu, maka bangkitlah amarahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he laid his carcase in his own grave; and they mourned over him, saying, Alas, my brother!
target: Mayat orang itu dikuburkannya di dalam kuburnya sendiri, maka diratapilah dia: "Wahai, saudaraku!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if God spared not the natural branches, take heed lest he also spare not thee.
target: Sebab kalau Allah tidak menyayangkan cabang-cabang asli, Ia juga tidak akan menyayangkan kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they were departed, behold, the angel of the Lord appeareth to Joseph in a dream, saying, Arise, and take the young child and his mother, and flee into Egypt, and be thou there until I bring thee word: for Herod will seek the young child to destroy him.
target: Setelah orang-orang majus itu berangkat, nampaklah malaikat Tuhan kepada Yusuf dalam mimpi dan berkata: "Bangunlah, ambillah Anak itu serta ibu-Nya, larilah ke Mesir dan tinggallah di sana sampai Aku berfirman kepadamu, karena Herodes akan mencari Anak itu untuk membunuh Dia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sun was darkened, and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst.
target: sebab matahari tidak bersinar. Dan tabir Bait Suci terbelah dua.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will destroy her vines and her fig trees, whereof she hath said, These are my rewards that my lovers have given me: and I will make them a forest, and the beasts of the field shall eat them.
target: Dan Aku akan menghukum dia karena hari-hari ketika dia membakar korban untuk para Baal, berhias dengan anting-antingnya dan kalungnya, dan mengikuti para kekasihnya dan melupakan Aku," demikianlah firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A man shall be commended according to his wisdom: but he that is of a perverse heart shall be despised.
target: Setiap orang dipuji seimbang dengan akal budinya, tetapi orang yang serong hatinya, akan dihina.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither did Ephraim drive out the Canaanites that dwelt in Gezer; but the Canaanites dwelt in Gezer among them.
target: Suku Efraim pun tidak menghalau orang Kanaan yang diam di Gezer, sehingga orang Kanaan itu tetap diam di tengah-tengah mereka di Gezer.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the morning therefore ye shall be brought according to your tribes: and it shall be, that the tribe which the LORD taketh shall come according to the families thereof; and the family which the LORD shall take shall come by households; and the household which the LORD shall take shall come man by man.
target: Besok pagi kamu harus tampil ke muka suku demi suku dan suku yang ditunjuk oleh TUHAN harus tampil ke muka kaum demi kaum, dan kaum yang ditunjuk oleh TUHAN harus tampil ke muka keluarga demi keluarga dan keluarga yang ditunjuk oleh TUHAN harus tampil ke muka seorang demi seorang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, this day thine eyes have seen how that the LORD had delivered thee to day into mine hand in the cave: and some bade me kill thee: but mine eye spared thee; and I said, I will not put forth mine hand against my lord; for he is the LORD's anointed.
target: Lalu berkatalah Daud kepada Saul: "Mengapa engkau mendengarkan perkataan orang-orang yang mengatakan: Sesungguhnya Daud mengikhtiarkan celakamu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire, and it sat upon each of them.
target: dan tampaklah kepada mereka lidah-lidah seperti nyala api yang bertebaran dan hinggap pada mereka masing-masing.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Where is boasting then? It is excluded. By what law? of works? Nay: but by the law of faith.
target: Jika demikian, apakah dasarnya untuk bermegah? Tidak ada! Berdasarkan apa? Berdasarkan perbuatan? Tidak, melainkan berdasarkan iman!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I went down to the bottoms of the mountains; the earth with her bars was about me for ever: yet hast thou brought up my life from corruption, O LORD my God.
target: di dasar gunung-gunung. Aku tenggelam ke dasar bumi; pintunya terpalang di belakangku untuk selama-lamanya. Ketika itulah Engkau naikkan nyawaku dari dalam liang kubur, ya TUHAN, Allahku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she made haste, and let down her pitcher from her shoulder, and said, Drink, and I will give thy camels drink also: so I drank, and she made the camels drink also.
target: Segeralah ia menurunkan buyung itu dari atas bahunya serta berkata: Minumlah, dan unta-untamu juga akan kuberi minum. Lalu aku minum, dan unta-unta itu juga diberinya minum.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Heshbon, and all her cities that are in the plain; Dibon, and Bamothbaal, and Bethbaalmeon,
target: Hesybon dan segala kotanya, yang di dataran tinggi, yakni Dibon, Bamot-Baal, Bet-Baal-Meon,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as Josiah turned himself, he spied the sepulchres that were there in the mount, and sent, and took the bones out of the sepulchres, and burned them upon the altar, and polluted it, according to the word of the LORD which the man of God proclaimed, who proclaimed these words.
target: Dan ketika Yosia berpaling, dilihatnyalah kuburan-kuburan yang ada di gunung di sana, lalu menyuruh orang mengambil tulang-tulang dari kuburan-kuburan itu, membakarnya di atas mezbah dan menajiskannya, sesuai dengan firman TUHAN yang telah diserukan oleh abdi Allah yang telah menyerukan hal-hal ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let a bear robbed of her whelps meet a man, rather than a fool in his folly.
target: Lebih baik berjumpa dengan beruang betina yang kehilangan anak, dari pada dengan orang bebal dengan kebodohannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the seven angels which had the seven trumpets prepared themselves to sound.
target: Dan ketujuh malaikat yang memegang ketujuh sangkakala itu bersiap-siap untuk meniup sangkakala.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But take heed to yourselves: for they shall deliver you up to councils; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten: and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them.
target: Tetapi kamu ini, hati-hatilah! Kamu akan diserahkan kepada majelis agama dan kamu akan dipukul di rumah ibadat dan kamu akan dihadapkan ke muka penguasa-penguasa dan raja-raja karena Aku, sebagai kesaksian bagi mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I say unto you which hear, Love your enemies, do good to them which hate you,
target: "Tetapi kepada kamu, yang mendengarkan Aku, Aku berkata: Kasihilah musuhmu, berbuatlah baik kepada orang yang membenci kamu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there was war between Rehoboam and Jeroboam all their days.
target: Dan terus-menerus perang ada antara Rehabeam dan Yerobeam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the LORD our God, he it is that brought us up and our fathers out of the land of Egypt, from the house of bondage, and which did those great signs in our sight, and preserved us in all the way wherein we went, and among all the people through whom we passed:
target: Sebab TUHAN, Allah kita, Dialah yang telah menuntun kita dan nenek moyang kita dari tanah Mesir, dari rumah perbudakan, dan yang telah melakukan tanda-tanda mujizat yang besar ini di depan mata kita sendiri, dan yang telah melindungi kita sepanjang jalan yang kita tempuh, dan di antara semua bangsa yang kita lalui,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David commanded his young men, and they slew them, and cut off their hands and their feet, and hanged them up over the pool in Hebron. But they took the head of Ishbosheth, and buried it in the sepulchre of Abner in Hebron.
target: Sesudah itu Daud memberi perintah kepada anak buahnya untuk membunuh mereka; tangan dan kaki mereka dipotong, kemudian mayat mereka digantung di tepi telaga di Hebron. Tetapi kepala Isyboset diambil dan dikuburkan di dalam kubur Abner di Hebron.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But God said unto me, Thou shalt not build an house for my name, because thou hast been a man of war, and hast shed blood.
target: Tetapi Allah telah berfirman kepadaku: Engkau tidak akan mendirikan rumah bagi nama-Ku, sebab engkau ini seorang prajurit dan telah menumpahkan darah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And say, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I am against thee, O Gog, the chief prince of Meshech and Tubal:
target: dan katakanlah: Beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Lihat, Aku akan menjadi lawanmu, hai Gog raja agung negeri Mesekh dan Tubal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Shall not all these take up a parable against him, and a taunting proverb against him, and say, Woe to him that increaseth that which is not his! how long? and to him that ladeth himself with thick clay!
target: Bukankah sekalian itu akan melontarkan peribahasa mengatai dia, dan nyanyian olok-olok serta sindiran ini: Celakalah orang yang menggaruk bagi dirinya apa yang bukan miliknya — berapa lama lagi? — dan yang memuati dirinya dengan barang gadaian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will feed them in a good pasture, and upon the high mountains of Israel shall their fold be: there shall they lie in a good fold, and in a fat pasture shall they feed upon the mountains of Israel.
target: Di padang rumput yang baik akan Kugembalakan mereka dan di atas gunung-gunung Israel yang tinggi di situlah tempat penggembalaannya; di sana di tempat penggembalaan yang baik mereka akan berbaring dan rumput yang subur menjadi makanannya di atas gunung-gunung Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel, saying, If a man die, and have no son, then ye shall cause his inheritance to pass unto his daughter.
target: Dan kepada orang Israel engkau harus berkata: Apabila seseorang mati dengan tidak mempunyai anak laki-laki, maka haruslah kamu memindahkan hak atas milik pusakanya kepada anaknya yang perempuan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Huram sent him by the hands of his servants ships, and servants that had knowledge of the sea; and they went with the servants of Solomon to Ophir, and took thence four hundred and fifty talents of gold, and brought them to king Solomon.
target: Dengan perantaraan anak buahnya Huram mengirim kapal-kapal kepadanya dan anak buah yang tahu tentang laut. Bersama-sama anak buah Salomo mereka sampai ke Ofir dan dari sana mereka mengambil empat ratus lima puluh talenta emas, yang mereka bawa kepada raja Salomo.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I commanded Joshua at that time, saying, Thine eyes have seen all that the LORD your God hath done unto these two kings: so shall the LORD do unto all the kingdoms whither thou passest.
target: Dan kepada Yosua kuperintahkan pada waktu itu, demikian: Matamu sendirilah yang melihat segala yang dilakukan TUHAN, Allahmu, terhadap kedua raja itu. Demikianlah akan dilakukan TUHAN terhadap segala kerajaan, ke mana engkau pergi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Asahel the brother of Joab was one of the thirty; Elhanan the son of Dodo of Bethlehem,
target: Asael, saudara Yoab, ada di antara ketiga puluh orang itu; selanjutnya Elhanan bin Dodo, dari Betlehem;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There were also that said, We have borrowed money for the king's tribute, and that upon our lands and vineyards.
target: Juga ada yang berteriak: "Kami harus meminjam uang untuk membayar pajak yang dikenakan raja atas ladang dan kebun anggur kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if we hope for that we see not, then do we with patience wait for it.
target: Tetapi jika kita mengharapkan apa yang tidak kita lihat, kita menantikannya dengan tekun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye shall teach them your children, speaking of them when thou sittest in thine house, and when thou walkest by the way, when thou liest down, and when thou risest up.
target: Kamu harus mengajarkannya kepada anak-anakmu dengan membicarakannya, apabila engkau duduk di rumahmu dan apabila engkau sedang dalam perjalanan, apabila engkau berbaring dan apabila engkau bangun;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all ye lands.
target: Mazmur untuk korban syukur. Bersorak-soraklah bagi TUHAN, hai seluruh bumi!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Cursed be he that perverteth the judgment of the stranger, fatherless, and widow. And all the people shall say, Amen.
target: Terkutuklah orang yang memperkosa hak orang asing, anak yatim dan janda. Dan seluruh bangsa itu haruslah berkata: Amin!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As smoke is driven away, so drive them away: as wax melteth before the fire, so let the wicked perish at the presence of God.
target: Allah bangkit, maka terseraklah musuh-musuh-Nya, orang-orang yang membenci Dia melarikan diri dari hadapan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The length of one curtain shall be eight and twenty cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: and every one of the curtains shall have one measure.
target: Panjang tiap-tiap tenda haruslah dua puluh delapan hasta dan lebar tiap-tiap tenda empat hasta: segala tenda itu harus sama ukurannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he spake unto Ephron in the audience of the people of the land, saying, But if thou wilt give it, I pray thee, hear me: I will give thee money for the field; take it of me, and I will bury my dead there.
target: serta berkata kepada Efron dengan didengar oleh mereka: "Sesungguhnya, jika engkau suka, dengarkanlah aku: aku membayar harga ladang itu; terimalah itu dari padaku, supaya aku dapat menguburkan isteriku yang mati itu di sana."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he set the cherubims within the inner house: and they stretched forth the wings of the cherubims, so that the wing of the one touched the one wall, and the wing of the other cherub touched the other wall; and their wings touched one another in the midst of the house.
target: Maka ditaruhnyalah kerub-kerub itu di tengah-tengah ruang yang di sebelah dalam sekali; kerub-kerub itu mengembangkan sayapnya, sehingga kerub yang satu menyentuh dinding dengan sayapnya dan kerub yang kedua menyentuh dinding yang lain, sedang sayap-sayap yang arah ke tengah rumah itu bersentuhan ujungnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And behold joy and gladness, slaying oxen, and killing sheep, eating flesh, and drinking wine: let us eat and drink; for to morrow we shall die.
target: tetapi lihat, di tengah-tengah mereka ada kegirangan dan sukacita, membantai lembu dan menyembelih domba, makan daging dan minum anggur, sambil berseru: "Marilah kita makan dan minum, sebab besok kita mati!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They gather themselves together, they hide themselves, they mark my steps, when they wait for my soul.
target: Sepanjang hari mereka mengacaukan perkaraku; mereka senantiasa bermaksud jahat terhadap aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass on a certain day, as he was teaching, that there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting by, which were come out of every town of Galilee, and Judaea, and Jerusalem: and the power of the Lord was present to heal them.
target: Pada suatu hari ketika Yesus mengajar, ada beberapa orang Farisi dan ahli Taurat duduk mendengarkan-Nya. Mereka datang dari semua desa di Galilea dan Yudea dan dari Yerusalem. Kuasa Tuhan menyertai Dia, sehingga Ia dapat menyembuhkan orang sakit.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But as for you, turn you, and take your journey into the wilderness by the way of the Red sea.
target: Tetapi kamu ini, baliklah, berangkatlah ke padang gurun, ke arah Laut Teberau."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Blessed are the undefiled in the way, who walk in the law of the LORD.
target: Berbahagialah orang-orang yang hidupnya tidak bercela, yang hidup menurut Taurat TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall make the ephod of gold, of blue, and of purple, of scarlet, and fine twined linen, with cunning work.
target: Baju efod itu harus dibuat mereka dari emas, kain ungu tua dan kain ungu muda, kain kirmizi dan lenan halus yang dipintal benangnya: buatan seorang ahli.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My mouth shall speak of wisdom; and the meditation of my heart shall be of understanding.
target: baik yang hina maupun yang mulia, baik yang kaya maupun yang miskin bersama-sama!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Only the cattle and the spoil of that city Israel took for a prey unto themselves, according unto the word of the LORD which he commanded Joshua.
target: Hanya ternak dan barang-barang kota itu dijarah oleh orang Israel, sesuai dengan firman TUHAN, yang diperintahkan-Nya kepada Yosua.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Fathers, provoke not your children to anger, lest they be discouraged.
target: Hai bapa-bapa, janganlah sakiti hati anakmu, supaya jangan tawar hatinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wisdom and knowledge is granted unto thee; and I will give thee riches, and wealth, and honour, such as none of the kings have had that have been before thee, neither shall there any after thee have the like.
target: maka kebijaksanaan dan pengertian itu diberikan kepadamu; selain itu Aku berikan kepadamu kekayaan, harta benda dan kemuliaan, sebagaimana belum pernah ada pada raja-raja sebelum engkau dan tidak akan ada pada raja-raja sesudah engkau."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the men of Israel rose up out of their place, and put themselves in array at Baaltamar: and the liers in wait of Israel came forth out of their places, even out of the meadows of Gibeah.
target: Jadi orang Israel bangun dari tempatnya dan mengatur barisannya di Baal-Tamar, sedang orang Israel yang menghadang itu tiba-tiba keluar dari tempatnya, yakni tempat terbuka dekat Geba,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let the proud be ashamed; for they dealt perversely with me without a cause: but I will meditate in thy precepts.
target: Biarlah orang-orang yang kurang ajar mendapat malu, karena mereka berlaku bengkok terhadap aku tanpa alasan; tetapi aku akan merenungkan titah-titah-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Benjamin went out against the people, and were drawn away from the city; and they began to smite of the people, and kill, as at other times, in the highways, of which one goeth up to the house of God, and the other to Gibeah in the field, about thirty men of Israel.
target: Maka majulah bani Benyamin menyerbu laskar itu; mereka terpancing dari kota, dan seperti yang sudah-sudah, mereka mulai menyerang laskar itu pada kedua jalan raya — yang satu menuju ke Betel, dan yang lain ke Gibea melalui padang — sehingga terbunuh beberapa orang, kira-kira tiga puluh orang di antara orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Zilpah Leah's maid bare Jacob a second son.
target: Dan Zilpa, budak perempuan Lea, melahirkan anak laki-laki yang kedua bagi Yakub.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses was content to dwell with the man: and he gave Moses Zipporah his daughter.
target: Musa bersedia tinggal di rumah itu, lalu diberikan Rehuellah Zipora, anaknya, kepada Musa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the king came in to see the guests, he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment:
target: Ketika raja itu masuk untuk bertemu dengan tamu-tamu itu, ia melihat seorang yang tidak berpakaian pesta.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The porters: the children of Shallum, the children of Ater, the children of Talmon, the children of Akkub, the children of Hatita, the children of Shobai, an hundred thirty and eight.
target: Inilah para penunggu pintu gerbang: bani Salum, bani Ater, bani Talmon, bani Akub, bani Hatita, bani Sobai: seratus tiga puluh delapan orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore I caused them to go forth out of the land of Egypt, and brought them into the wilderness.
target: Aku membawa mereka keluar dari tanah Mesir dan menuntun mereka ke padang gurun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A seed shall serve him; it shall be accounted to the Lord for a generation.
target: Ya, kepada-Nya akan sujud menyembah semua orang sombong di bumi, di hadapan-Nya akan berlutut semua orang yang turun ke dalam debu, dan orang yang tidak dapat menyambung hidup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When they desired him to tarry longer time with them, he consented not;
target: Mereka minta kepadanya untuk tinggal lebih lama di situ, tetapi ia tidak mengabulkannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moab is destroyed; her little ones have caused a cry to be heard.
target: Moab telah hancur lebur! kedengaran orang berteriak sampai ke Zoar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.
target: Kami juga menasihati kamu, saudara-saudara, tegorlah mereka yang hidup dengan tidak tertib, hiburlah mereka yang tawar hati, belalah mereka yang lemah, sabarlah terhadap semua orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David sent messengers unto the men of Jabeshgilead, and said unto them, Blessed be ye of the LORD, that ye have shewed this kindness unto your lord, even unto Saul, and have buried him.
target: maka Daud mengirim orang kepada orang-orang Yabesh-Gilead dengan pesan: "Diberkatilah kamu oleh TUHAN, karena kamu telah menunjukkan kasihmu kepada tuanmu, Saul, dengan menguburkannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as Peter was coming in, Cornelius met him, and fell down at his feet, and worshipped him.
target: Ketika Petrus masuk, datanglah Kornelius menyambutnya, dan sambil tersungkur di depan kakinya, ia menyembah Petrus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also their love, and their hatred, and their envy, is now perished; neither have they any more a portion for ever in any thing that is done under the sun.
target: Baik kasih mereka, maupun kebencian dan kecemburuan mereka sudah lama hilang, dan untuk selama-lamanya tak ada lagi bahagian mereka dalam segala sesuatu yang terjadi di bawah matahari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All the words of my mouth are in righteousness; there is nothing froward or perverse in them.
target: Segala perkataan mulutku adalah adil, tidak ada yang belat-belit atau serong.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have longed for thy salvation, O LORD; and thy law is my delight.
target: Aku rindu kepada keselamatan dari pada-Mu, ya TUHAN, dan Taurat-Mu menjadi kesukaanku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Out of the south cometh the whirlwind: and cold out of the north.
target: Taufan keluar dari dalam perbendaharaan, dan hawa dingin dari sebelah utara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou take of their daughters unto thy sons, and their daughters go a whoring after their gods, and make thy sons go a whoring after their gods.
target: Apabila engkau mengambil anak-anak perempuan mereka menjadi isteri anak-anakmu dan anak-anak perempuan itu akan berzinah dengan mengikuti allah mereka, maka mereka akan membujuk juga anak-anakmu laki-laki untuk berzinah dengan mengikuti allah mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they straightway left their nets, and followed him.
target: Lalu mereka pun segera meninggalkan jalanya dan mengikuti Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To fulfil the word of the LORD by the mouth of Jeremiah, until the land had enjoyed her sabbaths: for as long as she lay desolate she kept sabbath, to fulfil threescore and ten years.
target: Dengan demikian genaplah firman TUHAN yang diucapkan Yeremia, sampai tanah itu pulih dari akibat dilalaikannya tahun-tahun sabatnya, karena tanah itu tandus selama menjalani sabat, hingga genaplah tujuh puluh tahun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him, and to every seed his own body.
target: Tetapi Allah memberikan kepadanya suatu tubuh, seperti yang dikehendaki-Nya: Ia memberikan kepada tiap-tiap biji tubuhnya sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Sing unto God, sing praises to his name: extol him that rideth upon the heavens by his name JAH, and rejoice before him.
target: Tetapi orang-orang benar bersukacita, mereka beria-ria di hadapan Allah, bergembira dan bersukacita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jehoiakim was twenty and five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned eleven years in Jerusalem: and he did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD his God.
target: Yoyakim berumur dua puluh lima tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja dan sebelas tahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem. Ia melakukan apa yang jahat di mata TUHAN, Allahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will scatter the Egyptians among the nations, and will disperse them through the countries.
target: Aku akan menyerakkan orang Mesir di antara bangsa-bangsa dan menghamburkan mereka ke semua negeri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he came thither unto a cave, and lodged there; and, behold, the word of the LORD came to him, and he said unto him, What doest thou here, Elijah?
target: Di sana masuklah ia ke dalam sebuah gua dan bermalam di situ. Maka firman TUHAN datang kepadanya, demikian: "Apakah kerjamu di sini, hai Elia?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you, and ye in him, according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.
target: sehingga nama Yesus, Tuhan kita, dimuliakan di dalam kamu dan kamu di dalam Dia, menurut kasih karunia Allah kita dan Tuhan Yesus Kristus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou also, son of man, take thee a tile, and lay it before thee, and pourtray upon it the city, even Jerusalem:
target: "Engkau, anak manusia, ambillah sebuah batu bata, letakkan di hadapanmu dan ukirlah di atasnya sebuah kota, yaitu Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses, and Aaron, and all the congregation of the children of Israel, did to the Levites according unto all that the LORD commanded Moses concerning the Levites, so did the children of Israel unto them.
target: Lalu Musa, Harun dan segenap umat Israel melakukan yang demikian kepada orang Lewi; tepat seperti yang diperintahkan TUHAN kepada Musa mengenai orang Lewi, demikianlah dilakukan orang Israel kepada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if she be cleansed of her issue, then she shall number to herself seven days, and after that she shall be clean.
target: Tetapi jikalau perempuan itu sudah tahir dari lelehannya, ia harus menghitung tujuh hari lagi, sesudah itu barulah ia menjadi tahir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The young men of Aven and of Pibeseth shall fall by the sword: and these cities shall go into captivity.
target: Teruna-teruna On dan Pi-Beset akan mati rebah oleh pedang dan perempuan-perempuan akan diangkut tertawan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He rebuked the Red sea also, and it was dried up: so he led them through the depths, as through the wilderness.
target: Dihardik-Nya Laut Teberau, sehingga kering, dibawa-Nya mereka berjalan melalui samudera raya seperti melalui padang gurun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore.
target: Aku hendak bersyukur kepada-Mu, ya Tuhan, Allahku, dengan segenap hatiku, dan memuliakan nama-Mu untuk selama-lamanya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses and unto Aaron, saying,
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Musa dan Harun:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I say therefore to the unmarried and widows, it is good for them if they abide even as I.
target: Tetapi kepada orang-orang yang tidak kawin dan kepada janda-janda aku anjurkan, supaya baiklah mereka tinggal dalam keadaan seperti aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore hear ye the counsel of the LORD, that he hath taken against Babylon; and his purposes, that he hath purposed against the land of the Chaldeans: Surely the least of the flock shall draw them out: surely he shall make their habitation desolate with them.
target: Sebab itu dengarlah putusan yang telah diambil TUHAN terhadap Babel dan rancangan-rancangan yang telah dibuat-Nya terhadap negeri orang-orang Kasdim: Bahwa sesungguhnya, yang paling lemah pun di antara kawanan domba akan diseret. Bahwa sesungguhnya, padang rumput mereka sendiri akan merasa ngeri terhadap mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they did bind the breastplate by his rings unto the rings of the ephod with a lace of blue, that it might be above the curious girdle of the ephod, and that the breastplate might not be loosed from the ephod; as the LORD commanded Moses.
target: Kemudian diikatkan merekalah tutup dada itu dengan gelangnya kepada gelang baju efod dengan memakai tali ungu tua, sehingga tetap di atas sabuk baju efod, dan tutup dada itu tidak dapat bergeser dari baju efod — seperti yang diperintahkan TUHAN kepada Musa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The noise thereof sheweth concerning it, the cattle also concerning the vapour.
target: Pekik perang-Nya memberitakan kedatangan-Nya, kalau dengan murka Ia berjuang melawan kecurangan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For who hath despised the day of small things? for they shall rejoice, and shall see the plummet in the hand of Zerubbabel with those seven; they are the eyes of the LORD, which run to and fro through the whole earth.
target: Sebab siapa yang memandang hina hari peristiwa-peristiwa yang kecil, mereka akan bersukaria melihat batu pilihan di tangan Zerubabel. Yang tujuh ini adalah mata TUHAN, yang menjelajah seluruh bumi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I considered the horns, and, behold, there came up among them another little horn, before whom there were three of the first horns plucked up by the roots: and, behold, in this horn were eyes like the eyes of man, and a mouth speaking great things.
target: Sementara aku memperhatikan tanduk-tanduk itu, tampak tumbuh di antaranya suatu tanduk lain yang kecil, sehingga tiga dari tanduk-tanduk yang dahulu itu tercabut; dan pada tanduk itu tampak ada mata seperti mata manusia dan mulut yang menyombong.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace.
target: Demikian juga pada waktu ini ada tinggal suatu sisa, menurut pilihan kasih karunia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is;
target: Mazmur Daud, ketika ia ada di padang gurun Yehuda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But thou shalt surely kill him; thine hand shall be first upon him to put him to death, and afterwards the hand of all the people.
target: tetapi bunuhlah dia! Pertama-tama tanganmu sendirilah yang bergerak untuk membunuh dia, kemudian seluruh rakyat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And being made perfect, he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him;
target: dan sesudah Ia mencapai kesempurnaan-Nya, Ia menjadi pokok keselamatan yang abadi bagi semua orang yang taat kepada-Nya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They have not known nor understood: for he hath shut their eyes, that they cannot see; and their hearts, that they cannot understand.
target: Orang seperti itu tidak mengetahui apa-apa dan tidak mengerti apa-apa, sebab matanya melekat tertutup, sehingga tidak dapat melihat, dan hatinya tertutup juga, sehingga tidak dapat memahami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And for a sacrifice of peace offerings, two oxen, five rams, five he goats, five lambs of the first year: this was the offering of Elizur the son of Shedeur.
target: dan untuk korban keselamatan dua ekor lembu, lima ekor domba jantan, lima ekor kambing jantan dan lima ekor domba berumur setahun. Itulah persembahan Elizur bin Syedeur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The mountains shall bring peace to the people, and the little hills, by righteousness.
target: Kiranya gunung-gunung membawa damai sejahtera bagi bangsa, dan bukit-bukit membawa kebenaran!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that walketh uprightly, and worketh righteousness, and speaketh the truth in his heart.
target: Yaitu dia yang berlaku tidak bercela, yang melakukan apa yang adil dan yang mengatakan kebenaran dengan segenap hatinya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Judge not, that ye be not judged.
target: "Jangan kamu menghakimi, supaya kamu tidak dihakimi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Know therefore this day, and consider it in thine heart, that the LORD he is God in heaven above, and upon the earth beneath: there is none else.
target: Sebab itu ketahuilah pada hari ini dan camkanlah, bahwa TUHANlah Allah yang di langit di atas dan di bumi di bawah, tidak ada yang lain.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they went out quickly, and fled from the sepulchre; for they trembled and were amazed: neither said they any thing to any man; for they were afraid.
target: Lalu mereka keluar dan lari meninggalkan kubur itu, sebab gentar dan dahsyat menimpa mereka. Mereka tidak mengatakan apa-apa kepada siapa pun juga karena takut. Dengan singkat mereka sampaikan semua pesan itu kepada Petrus dan teman-temannya. Sesudah itu Yesus sendiri dengan perantaraan murid-murid-Nya memberitakan dari Timur ke Barat berita yang kudus dan tak terbinasakan tentang keselamatan yang kekal itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The Philistines also came and spread themselves in the valley of Rephaim.
target: Ketika orang Filistin itu datang dan memencar di lembah Refaim,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover the LORD thy God will send the hornet among them, until they that are left, and hide themselves from thee, be destroyed.
target: Lagipula TUHAN, Allahmu, akan melepaskan tabuhan menyerbu mereka, sampai habis binasa orang-orang yang masih tinggal dan yang menyembunyikan diri terhadap engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Melchizedek king of Salem brought forth bread and wine: and he was the priest of the most high God.
target: Melkisedek, raja Salem, membawa roti dan anggur; ia seorang imam Allah Yang Mahatinggi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And with them he sent Levites, even Shemaiah, and Nethaniah, and Zebadiah, and Asahel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehonathan, and Adonijah, and Tobijah, and Tobadonijah, Levites; and with them Elishama and Jehoram, priests.
target: Bersama-sama mereka turut juga beberapa orang Lewi, yakni Semaya, Netanya, Zebaja, Asael, Semiramot, Yonatan, Adonia, Tobia dan Tob-Adonia disertai imam-imam Elisama dan Yoram.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And offered at the dedication of this house of God an hundred bullocks, two hundred rams, four hundred lambs; and for a sin offering for all Israel, twelve he goats, according to the number of the tribes of Israel.
target: Untuk pentahbisan rumah Allah ini mereka mempersembahkan lembu jantan seratus ekor, domba jantan dua ratus ekor dan anak domba empat ratus ekor; juga kambing jantan sebagai korban penghapus dosa bagi seluruh orang Israel dua belas ekor, menurut bilangan suku Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren, that that disciple should not die: yet Jesus said not unto him, He shall not die; but, If I will that he tarry till I come, what is that to thee?
target: Maka tersebarlah kabar di antara saudara-saudara itu, bahwa murid itu tidak akan mati. Tetapi Yesus tidak mengatakan kepada Petrus, bahwa murid itu tidak akan mati, melainkan: "Jikalau Aku menghendaki supaya ia tinggal hidup sampai Aku datang, itu bukan urusanmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Are the consolations of God small with thee? is there any secret thing with thee?
target: Kurangkah artinya bagimu penghiburan Allah, dan perkataan yang dengan lemah lembut ditujukan kepadamu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Even every one that is called by my name: for I have created him for my glory, I have formed him; yea, I have made him.
target: semua orang yang disebutkan dengan nama-Ku yang Kuciptakan untuk kemuliaan-Ku, yang Kubentuk dan yang juga Kujadikan!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the armed men went before the priests that blew with the trumpets, and the rereward came after the ark, the priests going on, and blowing with the trumpets.
target: Dan orang-orang bersenjata berjalan di depan para imam yang meniup sangkakala dan barisan penutup mengikut tabut itu, sedang sangkakala terus-menerus ditiup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Naaman came with his horses and with his chariot, and stood at the door of the house of Elisha.
target: Kemudian datanglah Naaman dengan kudanya dan keretanya, lalu berhenti di depan pintu rumah Elisa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore let us make a covenant with our God to put away all the wives, and such as are born of them, according to the counsel of my lord, and of those that tremble at the commandment of our God; and let it be done according to the law.
target: Marilah kita sekarang mengikat perjanjian dengan Allah kita, bahwa kita akan mengusir semua perempuan itu dengan anak-anak yang dilahirkan mereka, menurut nasihat tuan dan orang-orang yang gemetar karena perintah Allah kita. Dan biarlah orang bertindak menurut hukum Taurat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if our heart condemn us, God is greater than our heart, and knoweth all things.
target: sebab jika kita dituduh olehnya, Allah adalah lebih besar dari pada hati kita serta mengetahui segala sesuatu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of Solomon's servants: the children of Sotai, the children of Sophereth, the children of Peruda,
target: Inilah keturunan para hamba Salomo: bani Sotai, bani Soferet, bani Peruda;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, the blood of it was not brought in within the holy place: ye should indeed have eaten it in the holy place, as I commanded.
target: Lihat, darahnya itu tidak dibawa masuk ke dalam tempat kudus; bukankah seharusnya kamu memakannya di tempat kudus, seperti yang telah kuperintahkan?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now Jericho was straitly shut up because of the children of Israel: none went out, and none came in.
target: Dalam pada itu Yerikho telah menutup pintu gerbangnya; telah tertutup kota itu karena orang Israel; tidak ada orang keluar atau masuk.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.
target: dan berlari-lari kepada tujuan untuk memperoleh hadiah, yaitu panggilan sorgawi dari Allah dalam Kristus Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that overcometh shall inherit all things; and I will be his God, and he shall be my son.
target: Barangsiapa menang, ia akan memperoleh semuanya ini, dan Aku akan menjadi Allahnya dan ia akan menjadi anak-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death, and the father the child: and the children shall rise up against their parents, and cause them to be put to death.
target: Orang akan menyerahkan saudaranya untuk dibunuh, demikian juga seorang ayah akan anaknya. Dan anak-anak akan memberontak terhadap orang tuanya dan akan membunuh mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The writing of Hezekiah king of Judah, when he had been sick, and was recovered of his sickness:
target: Karangan Hizkia, raja Yehuda, sesudah ia sakit dan sembuh dari penyakitnya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sons of Joel; Shemaiah his son, Gog his son, Shimei his son,
target: Keturunan Yoël ialah Semaya, anaknya; anak orang ini ialah Gog, anak orang ini ialah Simei;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For all the people and all Israel understood that day that it was not of the king to slay Abner the son of Ner.
target: Maka tahulah seluruh rakyat dan seluruh Israel pada hari itu, bahwa pembunuhan Abner bin Ner bukanlah rancangan raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who art thou, O great mountain? before Zerubbabel thou shalt become a plain: and he shall bring forth the headstone thereof with shoutings, crying, Grace, grace unto it.
target: Siapakah engkau, gunung yang besar? Di depan Zerubabel engkau menjadi tanah rata. Ia akan mengangkat batu utama, sedang orang bersorak: Bagus! Bagus sekali batu itu!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Likewise, I say unto you, there is joy in the presence of the angels of God over one sinner that repenteth.
target: Aku berkata kepadamu: Demikian juga akan ada sukacita pada malaikat-malaikat Allah karena satu orang berdosa yang bertobat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, Go forth, and stand upon the mount before the LORD. And, behold, the LORD passed by, and a great and strong wind rent the mountains, and brake in pieces the rocks before the LORD; but the LORD was not in the wind: and after the wind an earthquake; but the LORD was not in the earthquake:
target: Lalu firman-Nya: "Keluarlah dan berdiri di atas gunung itu di hadapan TUHAN!" Maka TUHAN lalu! Angin besar dan kuat, yang membelah gunung-gunung dan memecahkan bukit-bukit batu, mendahului TUHAN. Tetapi tidak ada TUHAN dalam angin itu. Dan sesudah angin itu datanglah gempa. Tetapi tidak ada TUHAN dalam gempa itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All her people sigh, they seek bread; they have given their pleasant things for meat to relieve the soul: see, O LORD, and consider; for I am become vile.
target: Berkeluh kesah seluruh penduduknya, sedang mereka mencari roti; harta benda mereka berikan ganti makanan, untuk menyambung hidupnya. "Lihatlah, ya TUHAN, pandanglah, betapa hina aku ini!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whilst their children remember their altars and their groves by the green trees upon the high hills.
target: sebagai peringatan terhadap mereka! — Mezbah-mezbah mereka dan tiang-tiang berhala mereka memang ada di samping pohon yang rimbun di atas bukit yang tinggi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I heard as it were the voice of a great multitude, and as the voice of many waters, and as the voice of mighty thunderings, saying, Alleluia: for the Lord God omnipotent reigneth.
target: Lalu aku mendengar seperti suara himpunan besar orang banyak, seperti desau air bah dan seperti deru guruh yang hebat, katanya: "Haleluya! Karena Tuhan, Allah kita, Yang Mahakuasa, telah menjadi raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they that weep, as though they wept not; and they that rejoice, as though they rejoiced not; and they that buy, as though they possessed not;
target: dan orang-orang yang menangis seolah-olah tidak menangis; dan orang-orang yang bergembira seolah-olah tidak bergembira; dan orang-orang yang membeli seolah-olah tidak memiliki apa yang mereka beli;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I taught Ephraim also to go, taking them by their arms; but they knew not that I healed them.
target: Padahal Akulah yang mengajar Efraim berjalan dan mengangkat mereka di tangan-Ku, tetapi mereka tidak mau insaf, bahwa Aku menyembuhkan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that loveth his life shall lose it; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal.
target: Barangsiapa mencintai nyawanya, ia akan kehilangan nyawanya, tetapi barangsiapa tidak mencintai nyawanya di dunia ini, ia akan memeliharanya untuk hidup yang kekal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus they gave to the children of Aaron the priest Hebron with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Libnah with her suburbs,
target: Kepada anak-anak imam Harun, diberikan mereka Hebron, kota perlindungan untuk pembunuh, dan tanah-tanah penggembalaan kota itu, Libna dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ahithophel said unto Absalom, Go in unto thy father's concubines, which he hath left to keep the house; and all Israel shall hear that thou art abhorred of thy father: then shall the hands of all that are with thee be strong.
target: Lalu jawab Ahitofel kepada Absalom: "Hampirilah gundik-gundik ayahmu yang ditinggalkannya untuk menunggui istana. Apabila seluruh Israel mendengar, bahwa engkau telah membuat dirimu dibenci oleh ayahmu, maka segala orang yang menyertai engkau, akan dikuatkan hatinya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God said, Let us make man in our image, after our likeness: and let them have dominion over the fish of the sea, and over the fowl of the air, and over the cattle, and over all the earth, and over every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth.
target: Berfirmanlah Allah: "Baiklah Kita menjadikan manusia menurut gambar dan rupa Kita, supaya mereka berkuasa atas ikan-ikan di laut dan burung-burung di udara dan atas ternak dan atas seluruh bumi dan atas segala binatang melata yang merayap di bumi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ought not this woman, being a daughter of Abraham, whom Satan hath bound, lo, these eighteen years, be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day?
target: Bukankah perempuan ini, yang sudah delapan belas tahun diikat oleh Iblis, harus dilepaskan dari ikatannya itu, karena ia adalah keturunan Abraham?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All that pass by the way spoil him: he is a reproach to his neighbours.
target: melanda segala temboknya, membuat kubu-kubunya menjadi reruntuhan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will make of thee a great nation, and I will bless thee, and make thy name great; and thou shalt be a blessing:
target: Aku akan membuat engkau menjadi bangsa yang besar, dan memberkati engkau serta membuat namamu masyhur; dan engkau akan menjadi berkat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will meditate in thy precepts, and have respect unto thy ways.
target: Aku hendak merenungkan titah-titah-Mu dan mengamat-amati jalan-jalan-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the fat of the sin offering shall he burn upon the altar.
target: Kemudian ia harus membakar lemak korban penghapus dosa di atas mezbah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all Israel shall mourn for him, and bury him: for he only of Jeroboam shall come to the grave, because in him there is found some good thing toward the LORD God of Israel in the house of Jeroboam.
target: Seluruh Israel akan meratapi dia dan menguburkan dia, sebab hanya dialah dari pada keluarga Yerobeam yang akan mendapat kubur, sebab di antara keluarga Yerobeam hanya padanyalah terdapat sesuatu yang baik di mata TUHAN, Allah Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when the children of Israel cried unto the LORD because of the Midianites,
target: Ketika orang Israel berseru kepada TUHAN karena orang Midian itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if our gospel be hid, it is hid to them that are lost:
target: Jika Injil yang kami beritakan masih tertutup juga, maka ia tertutup untuk mereka, yang akan binasa,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The God of Abraham, and of Isaac, and of Jacob, the God of our fathers, hath glorified his Son Jesus; whom ye delivered up, and denied him in the presence of Pilate, when he was determined to let him go.
target: Allah Abraham, Ishak dan Yakub, Allah nenek moyang kita telah memuliakan Hamba-Nya, yaitu Yesus yang kamu serahkan dan tolak di depan Pilatus, walaupun Pilatus berpendapat, bahwa Ia harus dilepaskan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But when Jesus saw it, he was much displeased, and said unto them, Suffer the little children to come unto me, and forbid them not: for of such is the kingdom of God.
target: Ketika Yesus melihat hal itu, Ia marah dan berkata kepada mereka: "Biarkan anak-anak itu datang kepada-Ku, jangan menghalang-halangi mereka, sebab orang-orang yang seperti itulah yang empunya Kerajaan Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be not afraid of the king of Babylon, of whom ye are afraid; be not afraid of him, saith the LORD: for I am with you to save you, and to deliver you from his hand.
target: Janganlah takut kepada raja Babel yang kamu takuti itu. Janganlah takut kepadanya, demikianlah firman TUHAN, sebab Aku menyertai kamu untuk menyelamatkan kamu dan untuk melepaskan kamu dari tangannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Cast thy bread upon the waters: for thou shalt find it after many days.
target: Lemparkanlah rotimu ke air, maka engkau akan mendapatnya kembali lama setelah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they clothed him with purple, and platted a crown of thorns, and put it about his head,
target: Mereka mengenakan jubah ungu kepada-Nya, menganyam sebuah mahkota duri dan menaruhnya di atas kepala-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they said unto Joshua, We are thy servants. And Joshua said unto them, Who are ye? and from whence come ye?
target: Lalu kata mereka kepada Yosua: "Kami ini hamba-hambamu." Tanya Yosua: "Siapakah kamu ini dan dari manakah kamu datang?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he sent letters into all the king's provinces, into every province according to the writing thereof, and to every people after their language, that every man should bear rule in his own house, and that it should be published according to the language of every people.
target: Dikirimkanlah oleh baginda surat-surat ke segenap daerah kerajaan, tiap-tiap daerah menurut tulisannya dan tiap-tiap bangsa menurut bahasanya, bunyinya: "Setiap laki-laki harus menjadi kepala dalam rumah tangganya dan berbicara menurut bahasa bangsanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Kerioth is taken, and the strong holds are surprised, and the mighty men's hearts in Moab at that day shall be as the heart of a woman in her pangs.
target: Kota-kota direbut, kubu-kubu pertahanan dirampas. Hati para pahlawan Moab pada waktu itu akan seperti hati perempuan yang sakit beranak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the twenty and sixth year of Asa king of Judah began Elah the son of Baasha to reign over Israel in Tirzah, two years.
target: Dalam tahun kedua puluh enam zaman Asa, raja Yehuda, Ela, anak Baesa, menjadi raja atas Israel di Tirza. Ia memerintah dua tahun lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall fall one upon another, as it were before a sword, when none pursueth: and ye shall have no power to stand before your enemies.
target: Dan mereka akan jatuh tersandung seorang kepada seorang seolah-olah hendak menjauhi pedang, sungguhpun yang mengejar tidak ada, dan kamu tidak akan dapat bertahan di hadapan musuh-musuhmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hast also given me the shield of thy salvation: and thy gentleness hath made me great.
target: Juga Kauberikan kepadaku perisai keselamatan-Mu, dan kebaikan-Mu telah membuat aku besar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To them that are without law, as without law, (being not without law to God, but under the law to Christ,) that I might gain them that are without law.
target: Bagi orang-orang yang tidak hidup di bawah hukum Taurat aku menjadi seperti orang yang tidak hidup di bawah hukum Taurat, sekalipun aku tidak hidup di luar hukum Allah, karena aku hidup di bawah hukum Kristus, supaya aku dapat memenangkan mereka yang tidak hidup di bawah hukum Taurat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he shall stand up, his kingdom shall be broken, and shall be divided toward the four winds of heaven; and not to his posterity, nor according to his dominion which he ruled: for his kingdom shall be plucked up, even for others beside those.
target: Tetapi baru saja ia muncul, maka kerajaannya akan pecah dan terbagi-bagi menurut keempat mata angin dari langit, jatuh bukan kepada keturunannya, dan tanpa kekuasaan seperti yang dipunyainya; sebab kerajaannya akan runtuh dan menjadi milik orang-orang yang lain dari pada orang-orang ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Absalom, whom we anointed over us, is dead in battle. Now therefore why speak ye not a word of bringing the king back?
target: tetapi Absalom yang telah kita urapi untuk memerintah kita, sudah mati dalam pertempuran. Maka sekarang, mengapa kamu berdiam diri dengan tidak membawa raja kembali?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore should the heathen say, Where is now their God?
target: Mengapa bangsa-bangsa akan berkata: "Di mana Allah mereka?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O LORD, to thee will I cry: for the fire hath devoured the pastures of the wilderness, and the flame hath burned all the trees of the field.
target: Kepada-Mu, ya TUHAN, aku berseru, sebab api telah memakan habis tanah gembalaan di padang gurun, dan nyala api telah menghanguskan segala pohon di padang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let his heart be changed from man's, and let a beast's heart be given unto him; and let seven times pass over him.
target: Biarlah hati manusianya berubah dan diberikan kepadanya hati binatang. Demikianlah berlaku atasnya sampai tujuh masa berlalu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all things are of God, who hath reconciled us to himself by Jesus Christ, and hath given to us the ministry of reconciliation;
target: Dan semuanya ini dari Allah, yang dengan perantaraan Kristus telah mendamaikan kita dengan diri-Nya dan yang telah mempercayakan pelayanan pendamaian itu kepada kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses spake unto the LORD, saying,
target: Lalu berkatalah Musa kepada TUHAN:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will make thy tongue cleave to the roof of thy mouth, that thou shalt be dumb, and shalt not be to them a reprover: for they are a rebellious house.
target: Dan Aku akan membuat lidahmu melekat pada langit-langitmu, sehingga engkau menjadi bisu dan tidak akan menempelak mereka, sebab mereka adalah kaum pemberontak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Not to all the people, but unto witnesses chosen before God, even to us, who did eat and drink with him after he rose from the dead.
target: bukan kepada seluruh bangsa, tetapi kepada saksi-saksi, yang sebelumnya telah ditunjuk oleh Allah, yaitu kepada kami yang telah makan dan minum bersama-sama dengan Dia, setelah Ia bangkit dari antara orang mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass in the mean while, that the heaven was black with clouds and wind, and there was a great rain. And Ahab rode, and went to Jezreel.
target: Maka dalam sekejap mata langit menjadi kelam oleh awan badai, lalu turunlah hujan yang lebat. Ahab naik kereta lalu pergi ke Yizreel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the glory of the LORD went up from the midst of the city, and stood upon the mountain which is on the east side of the city.
target: Lalu kemuliaan TUHAN naik ke atas dari tengah-tengah kota dan hinggap di atas gunung yang di sebelah timur kota.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jehozadak went into captivity, when the LORD carried away Judah and Jerusalem by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar.
target: Yozadak turut diangkut ketika TUHAN membiarkan orang Yehuda dan Yerusalem diangkut ke dalam pembuangan oleh Nebukadnezar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Bezer, and Hod, and Shamma, and Shilshah, and Ithran, and Beera.
target: Bezer, Hod, Sama, Silsa, Yitran dan Beera.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet the children of thy people say, The way of the Lord is not equal: but as for them, their way is not equal.
target: Tetapi teman-temanmu sebangsa berkata: Tindakan Tuhan tidak tepat! Padahal tindakan mereka yang tidak tepat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the high places that were before Jerusalem, which were on the right hand of the mount of corruption, which Solomon the king of Israel had builded for Ashtoreth the abomination of the Zidonians, and for Chemosh the abomination of the Moabites, and for Milcom the abomination of the children of Ammon, did the king defile.
target: Bukit-bukit pengorbanan yang ada di sebelah timur Yerusalem di sebelah selatan bukit Kebusukan dan yang didirikan oleh Salomo, raja Israel, untuk Asytoret, dewa kejijikan sembahan orang Sidon, dan untuk Kamos, dewa kejijikan sembahan Moab, dan untuk Milkom, dewa kekejian sembahan orang Amon, dinajiskan oleh raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth, and hid his lord's money.
target: Tetapi hamba yang menerima satu talenta itu pergi dan menggali lobang di dalam tanah lalu menyembunyikan uang tuannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As righteousness tendeth to life: so he that pursueth evil pursueth it to his own death.
target: Siapa berpegang pada kebenaran yang sejati, menuju hidup, tetapi siapa mengejar kejahatan, menuju kematian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he hath said, It profiteth a man nothing that he should delight himself with God.
target: Karena ia telah berkata: Tidak berguna bagi manusia, kalau ia dikenan Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And set him before Eleazar the priest, and before all the congregation; and give him a charge in their sight.
target: suruhlah ia berdiri di depan imam Eleazar dan di depan segenap umat, lalu berikanlah kepadanya perintahmu di depan mata mereka itu

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Again, a new commandment I write unto you, which thing is true in him and in you: because the darkness is past, and the true light now shineth.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Dan seluruh penduduk negeri turut menguburnya dan hal itu menjadikan mereka kenamaan pada hari Aku menyatakan kemuliaan-Ku, demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have taught thee in the way of wisdom; I have led thee in right paths.
target: Aku mengajarkan jalan hikmat kepadamu, aku memimpin engkau di jalan yang lurus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when Rachel had born Joseph, that Jacob said unto Laban, Send me away, that I may go unto mine own place, and to my country.
target: Setelah Rahel melahirkan Yusuf, berkatalah Yakub kepada Laban: "Izinkanlah aku pergi, supaya aku pulang ke tempat kelahiranku dan ke negeriku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses said unto them, If ye will do this thing, if ye will go armed before the LORD to war,
target: Lalu berkatalah Musa kepada mereka: "Jika kamu hendak berbuat demikian, jika kamu hendak mempersenjatai diri untuk berperang di hadapan TUHAN,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
