input: And thou shalt beat some of it very small, and put of it before the testimony in the tabernacle of the congregation, where I will meet with thee: it shall be unto you most holy.
target: Sebagian dari ukupan itu haruslah kaugiling sampai halus, dan sedikit dari padanya kauletakkanlah di hadapan tabut hukum di dalam Kemah Pertemuan, di mana Aku akan bertemu dengan engkau; haruslah itu maha kudus bagimu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Create in me a clean heart, O God; and renew a right spirit within me.
target: Biarlah aku mendengar kegirangan dan sukacita, biarlah tulang yang Kauremukkan bersorak-sorak kembali!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart; and they defile the man.
target: Tetapi apa yang keluar dari mulut berasal dari hati dan itulah yang menajiskan orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When Pilate therefore heard that saying, he brought Jesus forth, and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement, but in the Hebrew, Gabbatha.
target: Ketika Pilatus mendengar perkataan itu, ia menyuruh membawa Yesus ke luar, dan ia duduk di kursi pengadilan, di tempat yang bernama Litostrotos, dalam bahasa Ibrani Gabata.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then was Abner very wroth for the words of Ishbosheth, and said, Am I a dog's head, which against Judah do shew kindness this day unto the house of Saul thy father, to his brethren, and to his friends, and have not delivered thee into the hand of David, that thou chargest me to day with a fault concerning this woman?
target: Lalu sangat marahlah Abner karena perkataan Isyboset itu, katanya: "Kepala anjing dari Yehudakah aku? Sampai sekarang aku masih menunjukkan kesetiaanku kepada keluarga Saul, ayahmu, kepada saudara-saudaranya dan kepada sahabat-sahabatnya, dan aku tidak membiarkan engkau jatuh ke tangan Daud, tetapi sekarang engkau menuduh aku berlaku salah dengan seorang perempuan?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he that was over the house, and he that was over the city, the elders also, and the bringers up of the children, sent to Jehu, saying, We are thy servants, and will do all that thou shalt bid us; we will not make any king: do thou that which is good in thine eyes.
target: Sebab itu kepala istana dan kepala kota, juga para tua-tua dan para pengasuh mengirim pesan kepada Yehu, bunyinya: "Kami ini hamba-hambamu dan segala yang kaukatakan kepada kami akan kami lakukan; kami tidak hendak mengangkat seseorang menjadi raja; lakukanlah apa yang baik menurut pemandanganmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Jesus said unto them, Yet a little while is the light with you. Walk while ye have the light, lest darkness come upon you: for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth.
target: Kata Yesus kepada mereka: "Hanya sedikit waktu lagi terang ada di antara kamu. Selama terang itu ada padamu, percayalah kepadanya, supaya kegelapan jangan menguasai kamu; barangsiapa berjalan dalam kegelapan, ia tidak tahu ke mana ia pergi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she lay at his feet until the morning: and she rose up before one could know another. And he said, Let it not be known that a woman came into the floor.
target: Jadi berbaringlah ia tidur di sebelah kakinya sampai pagi; lalu bangunlah ia, sebelum orang dapat kenal-mengenal, sebab kata Boas: "Janganlah diketahui orang, bahwa seorang perempuan datang ke tempat pengirikan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The chief of the people; Parosh, Pahathmoab, Elam, Zatthu, Bani,
target: Dan dari pemimpin-pemimpin bangsa: Paros, Pahat-Moab, Elam, Zatu, Bani,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Judah said unto Onan, Go in unto thy brother's wife, and marry her, and raise up seed to thy brother.
target: Lalu berkatalah Yehuda kepada Onan: "Hampirilah isteri kakakmu itu, kawinlah dengan dia sebagai ganti kakakmu dan bangkitkanlah keturunan bagi kakakmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So all the cities which ye shall give to the Levites shall be forty and eight cities: them shall ye give with their suburbs.
target: Segala kota yang harus kamu berikan kepada orang Lewi itu berjumlah empat puluh delapan kota, semuanya dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Jesus said unto him, Follow me; and let the dead bury their dead.
target: Tetapi Yesus berkata kepadanya: "Ikutlah Aku dan biarlah orang-orang mati menguburkan orang-orang mati mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye shall wash your clothes on the seventh day, and ye shall be clean, and afterward ye shall come into the camp.
target: Lagipula kamu harus mencuci pakaianmu pada hari yang ketujuh, supaya kamu tahir, dan kemudian bolehlah kamu masuk ke tempat perkemahan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He went away again the second time, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if this cup may not pass away from me, except I drink it, thy will be done.
target: Lalu Ia pergi untuk kedua kalinya dan berdoa, kata-Nya: "Ya Bapa-Ku jikalau cawan ini tidak mungkin lalu, kecuali apabila Aku meminumnya, jadilah kehendak-Mu!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they came and besieged him in Abel of Bethmaachah, and they cast up a bank against the city, and it stood in the trench: and all the people that were with Joab battered the wall, to throw it down.
target: Tetapi sampailah orang-orang Yoab, lalu mengepung dia di Abel-Bet-Maakha; mereka menimbun tanah menjadi tembok terhadap kota ini dan tembok ini merapat sampai ke tembok luar sedang seluruh rakyat yang bersama-sama dengan Yoab menggali tembok kota itu untuk meruntuhkannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If Balak would give me his house full of silver and gold, I cannot go beyond the commandment of the LORD, to do either good or bad of mine own mind; but what the LORD saith, that will I speak?
target: Sekalipun Balak memberikan kepadaku emas dan perak seistana penuh, aku tidak akan sanggup melanggar titah TUHAN dengan berbuat baik atau jahat atas kemauanku sendiri; apa yang akan difirmankan TUHAN, itulah yang akan kukatakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Having the understanding darkened, being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them, because of the blindness of their heart:
target: dan pengertiannya yang gelap, jauh dari hidup persekutuan dengan Allah, karena kebodohan yang ada di dalam mereka dan karena kedegilan hati mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD: he departed not from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who made Israel to sin.
target: Ia melakukan apa yang jahat di mata TUHAN. Ia tidak menjauh dari dosa-dosa Yerobeam bin Nebat, yang mengakibatkan orang Israel berdosa pula.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For some of them thought, because Judas had the bag, that Jesus had said unto him, Buy those things that we have need of against the feast; or, that he should give something to the poor.
target: Karena Yudas memegang kas ada yang menyangka, bahwa Yesus menyuruh dia membeli apa-apa yang perlu untuk perayaan itu, atau memberi apa-apa kepada orang miskin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when the angel of the LORD spake these words unto all the children of Israel, that the people lifted up their voice, and wept.
target: Setelah Malaikat TUHAN mengucapkan firman itu kepada seluruh Israel, menangislah bangsa itu dengan keras.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: What shall we then say to these things? If God be for us, who can be against us?
target: Sebab itu apakah yang akan kita katakan tentang semuanya itu? Jika Allah di pihak kita, siapakah yang akan melawan kita?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For my brethren and companions' sakes, I will now say, Peace be within thee.
target: Oleh karena saudara-saudaraku dan teman-temanku aku hendak mengucapkan: "Semoga kesejahteraan ada di dalammu!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the one of them, whose name was Cleopas, answering said unto him, Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem, and hast not known the things which are come to pass there in these days?
target: Seorang dari mereka, namanya Kleopas, menjawab-Nya: "Adakah Engkau satu-satunya orang asing di Yerusalem, yang tidak tahu apa yang terjadi di situ pada hari-hari belakangan ini?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And sware by him that liveth for ever and ever, who created heaven, and the things that therein are, and the earth, and the things that therein are, and the sea, and the things which are therein, that there should be time no longer:
target: dan ia bersumpah demi Dia yang hidup sampai selama-lamanya, yang telah menciptakan langit dan segala isinya, dan bumi dan segala isinya, dan laut dan segala isinya, katanya: "Tidak akan ada penundaan lagi!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The God of this people of Israel chose our fathers, and exalted the people when they dwelt as strangers in the land of Egypt, and with an high arm brought he them out of it.
target: Allah umat Israel ini telah memilih nenek moyang kita dan membuat umat itu menjadi besar, ketika mereka tinggal di Mesir sebagai orang asing. Dengan tangan-Nya yang luhur Ia telah memimpin mereka keluar dari negeri itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The fishers also shall mourn, and all they that cast angle into the brooks shall lament, and they that spread nets upon the waters shall languish.
target: Para nelayan akan mengaduh dan berkabung, yaitu semua orang yang memancing di sungai Nil; semua orang yang menjala di situ akan merana juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Saul eyed David from that day and forward.
target: Sejak hari itu maka Saul selalu mendengki Daud.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: At the west side four thousand and five hundred, with their three gates; one gate of Gad, one gate of Asher, one gate of Naphtali.
target: Di sisi sebelah barat, yang ukurannya empat ribu lima ratus hasta, terdapat tiga pintu gerbang juga, yaitu pintu gerbang Gad, pintu gerbang Asyer dan pintu gerbang Naftali.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Cursed be he that doeth the work of the LORD deceitfully, and cursed be he that keepeth back his sword from blood.
target: Terkutuklah orang yang melaksanakan pekerjaan TUHAN dengan lalai, dan terkutuklah orang yang menghambat pedang-Nya dari penumpahan darah!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Kedesh, and Edrei, and Enhazor,
target: Kedesh, Edrei, En-Hazor,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she said, These six measures of barley gave he me; for he said to me, Go not empty unto thy mother in law.
target: serta berkata: "Yang enam takar jelai ini diberikannya kepadaku, sebab katanya: Engkau tidak boleh pulang kepada mertuamu dengan tangan hampa."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The posts went out, being hastened by the king's commandment, and the decree was given in Shushan the palace. And the king and Haman sat down to drink; but the city Shushan was perplexed.
target: Maka dengan tergesa-gesa berangkatlah pesuruh-pesuruh cepat itu, atas titah raja, dan undang-undang itu dikeluarkan di dalam benteng Susan. Sementara itu raja serta Haman duduk minum-minum, tetapi kota Susan menjadi gempar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These words spake Jesus in the treasury, as he taught in the temple: and no man laid hands on him; for his hour was not yet come.
target: Kata-kata itu dikatakan Yesus dekat perbendaharaan, waktu Ia mengajar di dalam Bait Allah. Dan tidak seorang pun yang menangkap Dia, karena saat-Nya belum tiba.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there they abode long time with the disciples.
target: Di situ mereka lama tinggal bersama-sama dengan murid-murid itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For not he that commendeth himself is approved, but whom the Lord commendeth.
target: Sebab bukan orang yang memuji diri yang tahan uji, melainkan orang yang dipuji Tuhan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king called the Gibeonites, and said unto them; (now the Gibeonites were not of the children of Israel, but of the remnant of the Amorites; and the children of Israel had sworn unto them: and Saul sought to slay them in his zeal to the children of Israel and Judah.)
target: Lalu raja memanggil orang-orang Gibeon dan berkata kepada mereka, — orang-orang Gibeon itu tidak termasuk orang Israel, tetapi termasuk sisa-sisa orang Amori dan walaupun orang Israel telah bersumpah kepada mereka, Saul berikhtiar membasmi mereka dalam kegiatannya untuk kepentingan orang Israel dan Yehuda, —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honour, especially they who labour in the word and doctrine.
target: Penatua-penatua yang baik pimpinannya patut dihormati dua kali lipat, terutama mereka yang dengan jerih payah berkhotbah dan mengajar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Forsake her not, and she shall preserve thee: love her, and she shall keep thee.
target: Janganlah meninggalkan hikmat itu, maka engkau akan dipeliharanya, kasihilah dia, maka engkau akan dijaganya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, I beseech thee, shew me thy glory.
target: Tetapi jawabnya: "Perlihatkanlah kiranya kemuliaan-Mu kepadaku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have overthrown some of you, as God overthrew Sodom and Gomorrah, and ye were as a firebrand plucked out of the burning: yet have ye not returned unto me, saith the LORD.
target: "Aku telah menjungkirbalikkan kota-kota di antara kamu, seperti Allah menjungkirbalikkan Sodom dan Gomora, sehingga kamu menjadi seperti puntung yang ditarik dari kebakaran, namun kamu tidak berbalik kepada-Ku," demikianlah firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And a man's uncle shall take him up, and he that burneth him, to bring out the bones out of the house, and shall say unto him that is by the sides of the house, Is there yet any with thee? and he shall say, No. Then shall he say, Hold thy tongue: for we may not make mention of the name of the LORD.
target: Dan jika pamannya, pembakar mayat itu, yang datang mengangkat dan mengeluarkan mayat itu dari rumah itu, bertanya kepada orang yang ada di bagian belakang rumah: "Adakah lagi orang bersama-sama engkau?" dan dijawab: "Tidak ada," ia akan berkata: "Diam!" Sebab tidaklah patut menyebut-nyebut nama TUHAN!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Though I were perfect, yet would I not know my soul: I would despise my life.
target: Aku tidak bersalah! Aku tidak pedulikan diriku, aku tidak hiraukan hidupku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the weight of gold that came to Solomon in one year was six hundred threescore and six talents of gold,
target: Adapun emas, yang dibawa kepada Salomo dalam satu tahun ialah seberat enam ratus enam puluh enam talenta,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O our God, wilt thou not judge them? for we have no might against this great company that cometh against us; neither know we what to do: but our eyes are upon thee.
target: Ya Allah kami, tidakkah Engkau akan menghukum mereka? Karena kami tidak mempunyai kekuatan untuk menghadapi laskar yang besar ini, yang datang menyerang kami. Kami tidak tahu apa yang harus kami lakukan, tetapi mata kami tertuju kepada-Mu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife; and some also of good will:
target: Ada orang yang memberitakan Kristus karena dengki dan perselisihan, tetapi ada pula yang memberitakan-Nya dengan maksud baik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joshua rose early in the morning, and the priests took up the ark of the LORD.
target: Keesokan harinya Yosua bangun pagi-pagi, lalu para imam mengangkat tabut TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Give not sleep to thine eyes, nor slumber to thine eyelids.
target: janganlah membiarkan matamu tidur, dan kelopak matamu mengantuk;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then when lust hath conceived, it bringeth forth sin: and sin, when it is finished, bringeth forth death.
target: Dan apabila keinginan itu telah dibuahi, ia melahirkan dosa; dan apabila dosa itu sudah matang, ia melahirkan maut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In those days came John the Baptist, preaching in the wilderness of Judaea,
target: Pada waktu itu tampillah Yohanes Pembaptis di padang gurun Yudea dan memberitakan:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king said, And where is thy master's son? And Ziba said unto the king, Behold, he abideth at Jerusalem: for he said, To day shall the house of Israel restore me the kingdom of my father.
target: Kemudian bertanyalah raja: "Di manakah anak tuanmu?" Jawab Ziba kepada raja: "Ia ada di Yerusalem, sebab katanya: Pada hari ini kaum Israel akan mengembalikan kepadaku kerajaan ayahku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Slay utterly old and young, both maids, and little children, and women: but come not near any man upon whom is the mark; and begin at my sanctuary. Then they began at the ancient men which were before the house.
target: Orang-orang tua, teruna-teruna dan dara-dara, anak-anak kecil dan perempuan-perempuan, bunuh dan musnahkan! Tetapi semua orang yang ditandai dengan huruf T itu, jangan singgung! Dan mulailah dari tempat kudus-Ku!" Lalu mereka mulai dengan tua-tua yang berada di hadapan Bait Suci.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To turn aside the needy from judgment, and to take away the right from the poor of my people, that widows may be their prey, and that they may rob the fatherless!
target: untuk menghalang-halangi orang-orang lemah mendapat keadilan dan untuk merebut hak orang-orang sengsara di antara umat-Ku, supaya mereka dapat merampas milik janda-janda, dan dapat menjarah anak-anak yatim!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Saying, Hurt not the earth, neither the sea, nor the trees, till we have sealed the servants of our God in their foreheads.
target: katanya: "Janganlah merusakkan bumi atau laut atau pohon-pohon sebelum kami memeteraikan hamba-hamba Allah kami pada dahi mereka!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: What is it then? I will pray with the spirit, and I will pray with the understanding also: I will sing with the spirit, and I will sing with the understanding also.
target: Jadi, apakah yang harus kubuat? Aku akan berdoa dengan rohku, tetapi aku akan berdoa juga dengan akal budiku; aku akan menyanyi dan memuji dengan rohku, tetapi aku akan menyanyi dan memuji juga dengan akal budiku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour: other men laboured, and ye are entered into their labours.
target: Aku mengutus kamu untuk menuai apa yang tidak kamu usahakan; orang-orang lain berusaha dan kamu datang memetik hasil usaha mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in hell he lift up his eyes, being in torments, and seeth Abraham afar off, and Lazarus in his bosom.
target: Orang kaya itu juga mati, lalu dikubur. Dan sementara ia menderita sengsara di alam maut ia memandang ke atas, dan dari jauh dilihatnya Abraham, dan Lazarus duduk di pangkuannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ozias begat Joatham; and Joatham begat Achaz; and Achaz begat Ezekias;
target: Uzia memperanakkan Yotam, Yotam memperanakkan Ahas, Ahas memperanakkan Hizkia,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If any man think himself to be a prophet, or spiritual, let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord.
target: Jika seorang menganggap dirinya nabi atau orang yang mendapat karunia rohani, ia harus sadar, bahwa apa yang kukatakan kepadamu adalah perintah Tuhan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk, in the vanity of their mind,
target: Sebab itu kukatakan dan kutegaskan ini kepadamu di dalam Tuhan: Jangan hidup lagi sama seperti orang-orang yang tidak mengenal Allah dengan pikirannya yang sia-sia

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass after all thy wickedness, (woe, woe unto thee! saith the LORD GOD;)
target: Dan sesudah segala kejahatanmu itu — celaka, celakalah engkau! Demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he took the cup, and when he had given thanks, he gave it to them: and they all drank of it.
target: Sesudah itu Ia mengambil cawan, mengucap syukur lalu memberikannya kepada mereka, dan mereka semuanya minum dari cawan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The lips of those that rose up against me, and their device against me all the day.
target: percakapan orang-orang yang melawan aku, dan rencana mereka terhadap aku sepanjang hari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And under it was the similitude of oxen, which did compass it round about: ten in a cubit, compassing the sea round about. Two rows of oxen were cast, when it was cast.
target: Di sebelah bawah tepinya ada gambar lembu-lembu yang mengelilinginya sama sekali, sepuluh dalam sehasta, merangkum "laut" itu berkeliling; lembu itu dua jajar, dituang setuangan dengan bejana itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It shall be a place for the spreading of nets in the midst of the sea: for I have spoken it, saith the Lord GOD: and it shall become a spoil to the nations.
target: Ia akan menjadi penjemuran pukat di tengah lautan, sebab Aku yang mengatakannya, demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH; ia akan menjadi jarahan bagi bangsa-bangsa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.
target: "Aku adalah Alfa dan Omega, firman Tuhan Allah, yang ada dan yang sudah ada dan yang akan datang, Yang Mahakuasa."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And on the morrow, when they were come from Bethany, he was hungry:
target: Keesokan harinya sesudah Yesus dan kedua belas murid-Nya meninggalkan Betania, Yesus merasa lapar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I saw in the right hand of him that sat on the throne a book written within and on the backside, sealed with seven seals.
target: Maka aku melihat di tangan kanan Dia yang duduk di atas takhta itu, sebuah gulungan kitab, yang ditulisi sebelah dalam dan sebelah luarnya dan dimeterai dengan tujuh meterai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This is my comfort in my affliction: for thy word hath quickened me.
target: Inilah penghiburanku dalam sengsaraku, bahwa janji-Mu menghidupkan aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, Ye have taken away my gods which I made, and the priest, and ye are gone away: and what have I more? and what is this that ye say unto me, What aileth thee?
target: "Allahku yang kubuat serta imam juga kamu ambil, lalu kamu pergi. Apakah lagi yang masih tinggal padaku? Bagaimana perkataanmu itu kepadaku: Mau apa engkau?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Lord, all my desire is before thee; and my groaning is not hid from thee.
target: aku kehabisan tenaga dan remuk redam, aku merintih karena degap-degup jantungku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I said unto you, That ye also have seen me, and believe not.
target: Tetapi Aku telah berkata kepadamu: Sungguhpun kamu telah melihat Aku, kamu tidak percaya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he had forty sons and thirty nephews, that rode on threescore and ten ass colts: and he judged Israel eight years.
target: Ia mempunyai empat puluh anak laki-laki dan tiga puluh cucu laki-laki, yang mengendarai tujuh puluh ekor keledai jantan. Ia memerintah atas orang Israel delapan tahun lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the lords of the Philistines gathered them together for to offer a great sacrifice unto Dagon their god, and to rejoice: for they said, Our god hath delivered Samson our enemy into our hand.
target: Sesudah itu berkumpullah raja-raja kota orang Filistin untuk mengadakan perayaan korban sembelihan yang besar kepada Dagon, allah mereka, dan untuk bersukaria; kata mereka: "Telah diserahkan oleh allah kita ke dalam tangan kita Simson, musuh kita."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses rose up, and his minister Joshua: and Moses went up into the mount of God.
target: Lalu bangunlah Musa dengan Yosua, abdinya, maka naiklah Musa ke atas gunung Allah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There was also a lot for the rest of the children of Manasseh by their families; for the children of Abiezer, and for the children of Helek, and for the children of Asriel, and for the children of Shechem, and for the children of Hepher, and for the children of Shemida: these were the male children of Manasseh the son of Joseph by their families.
target: Jadi bagian itulah yang ditentukan bagi anak-anak Manasye yang lain, menurut kaum-kaum mereka, yakni bagi bani Abiezer, bani Helek, bani Asriel, bani Sekhem, bani Hefer dan bani Semida; itulah keturunan yang laki-laki dari Manasye bin Yusuf, menurut kaum-kaum mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then shall he return into his land with great riches; and his heart shall be against the holy covenant; and he shall do exploits, and return to his own land.
target: Kemudian ia akan pulang ke negerinya dengan banyak harta, dan hatinya bermaksud menentang Perjanjian Kudus; dan itu dilakukannya, lalu pulang ke negerinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the king said, Cause Haman to make haste, that he may do as Esther hath said. So the king and Haman came to the banquet that Esther had prepared.
target: Maka titah raja: "Suruhlah Haman datang dengan segera, supaya kami memenuhi permintaan Ester." Lalu raja datang dengan Haman ke perjamuan yang diadakan oleh Ester.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall be, when thou shalt hear a sound of going in the tops of the mulberry trees, that then thou shalt go out to battle: for God is gone forth before thee to smite the host of the Philistines.
target: Dan bila engkau mendengar bunyi derap langkah di puncak pohon-pohon kertau itu, maka haruslah engkau keluar bertempur, sebab Allah telah keluar berperang di depanmu untuk memukul kalah tentara orang Filistin."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Storehouses also for the increase of corn, and wine, and oil; and stalls for all manner of beasts, and cotes for flocks.
target: juga tempat perbekalan untuk hasil gandum, untuk anggur dan minyak, dan kandang-kandang untuk berbagai jenis hewan besar dan kandang-kandang untuk kawanan kambing domba.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I said, Who art thou, Lord? And he said, I am Jesus whom thou persecutest.
target: Tetapi aku menjawab: Siapa Engkau, Tuhan? Kata Tuhan: Akulah Yesus, yang kauaniaya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Rejoice, O young man, in thy youth; and let thy heart cheer thee in the days of thy youth, and walk in the ways of thine heart, and in the sight of thine eyes: but know thou, that for all these things God will bring thee into judgment.
target: Bersukarialah, hai pemuda, dalam kemudaanmu, biarlah hatimu bersuka pada masa mudamu, dan turutilah keinginan hatimu dan pandangan matamu, tetapi ketahuilah bahwa karena segala hal ini Allah akan membawa engkau ke pengadilan!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD shall count, when he writeth up the people, that this man was born there. Selah.
target: TUHAN menghitung pada waktu mencatat bangsa-bangsa: "Ini dilahirkan di sana." S e l a

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For this is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days, saith the Lord; I will put my laws into their mind, and write them in their hearts: and I will be to them a God, and they shall be to me a people:
target: "Maka inilah perjanjian yang Kuadakan dengan kaum Israel sesudah waktu itu," demikianlah firman Tuhan. "Aku akan menaruh hukum-Ku dalam akal budi mereka dan menuliskannya dalam hati mereka, maka Aku akan menjadi Allah mereka dan mereka akan menjadi umat-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore, I pray thee, pardon my sin, and turn again with me, that I may worship the LORD.
target: Maka sekarang, ampunilah kiranya dosaku; kembalilah bersama-sama dengan aku, maka aku akan sujud menyembah kepada TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Strangers shall submit themselves unto me: as soon as they hear, they shall be obedient unto me.
target: orang-orang asing tunduk menjilat kepadaku, baru saja telinga mereka mendengar, mereka taat kepadaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And those that died in the plague were twenty and four thousand.
target: Orang yang mati karena tulah itu ada dua puluh empat ribu orang banyaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if they will learn any thing, let them ask their husbands at home: for it is a shame for women to speak in the church.
target: Jika mereka ingin mengetahui sesuatu, baiklah mereka menanyakannya kepada suaminya di rumah. Sebab tidak sopan bagi perempuan untuk berbicara dalam pertemuan Jemaat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Pilate then went out unto them, and said, What accusation bring ye against this man?
target: Sebab itu Pilatus keluar mendapatkan mereka dan berkata: "Apakah tuduhan kamu terhadap orang ini?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The like figure whereunto even baptism doth also now save us (not the putting away of the filth of the flesh, but the answer of a good conscience toward God,) by the resurrection of Jesus Christ:
target: Juga kamu sekarang diselamatkan oleh kiasannya, yaitu baptisan — maksudnya bukan untuk membersihkan kenajisan jasmani, melainkan untuk memohonkan hati nurani yang baik kepada Allah — oleh kebangkitan Yesus Kristus,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore, our God, we thank thee, and praise thy glorious name.
target: Sekarang, ya Allah kami, kami bersyukur kepada-Mu dan memuji nama-Mu yang agung itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now if I do that I would not, it is no more I that do it, but sin that dwelleth in me.
target: Jadi jika aku berbuat apa yang tidak aku kehendaki, maka bukan lagi aku yang memperbuatnya, tetapi dosa yang diam di dalam aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the Avites made Nibhaz and Tartak, and the Sepharvites burnt their children in fire to Adrammelech and Anammelech, the gods of Sepharvaim.
target: dan orang-orang Awa membuat patung Nibhas dan Tartak. Orang-orang Sefarwaim membakar anak-anak mereka sebagai korban bagi Adramelekh dan Anamelekh, para allah di Sefarwaim.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thou hast delivered my soul from death: wilt not thou deliver my feet from falling, that I may walk before God in the light of the living?
target: Nazarku kepada-Mu, ya Allah, akan kulaksanakan, dan korban syukur akan kubayar kepada-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye shall appoint the possession of the city five thousand broad, and five and twenty thousand long, over against the oblation of the holy portion: it shall be for the whole house of Israel.
target: Sebagai milik kota harus engkau tentukan: lima ribu hasta lebarnya dan dua puluh lima ribu hasta panjangnya, berbatasan dengan persembahan khusus yang kudus itu. Itulah untuk seluruh kaum Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Benjamin did not drive out the Jebusites that inhabited Jerusalem; but the Jebusites dwell with the children of Benjamin in Jerusalem unto this day.
target: Tetapi orang Yebus, penduduk kota Yerusalem, tidak dihalau oleh bani Benyamin, jadi orang Yebus itu masih diam bersama-sama dengan bani Benyamin di Yerusalem sampai sekarang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he answered and said unto them, My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God, and do it.
target: Tetapi Ia menjawab mereka: "Ibu-Ku dan saudara-saudara-Ku ialah mereka, yang mendengarkan firman Allah dan melakukannya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Is any thing too hard for the LORD? At the time appointed I will return unto thee, according to the time of life, and Sarah shall have a son.
target: Adakah sesuatu apa pun yang mustahil untuk TUHAN? Pada waktu yang telah ditetapkan itu, tahun depan, Aku akan kembali mendapatkan engkau, pada waktu itulah Sara mempunyai seorang anak laki-laki."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Isaac's servants digged in the valley, and found there a well of springing water.
target: Ketika hamba-hamba Ishak menggali di lembah itu, mereka mendapati di situ mata air yang berbual-bual airnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he called the multitude, and said unto them, Hear, and understand:
target: Lalu Yesus memanggil orang banyak dan berkata kepada mereka:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jonathan smote the garrison of the Philistines that was in Geba, and the Philistines heard of it. And Saul blew the trumpet throughout all the land, saying, Let the Hebrews hear.
target: Yonatan memukul kalah pasukan pendudukan orang Filistin yang ada di Geba; dan hal itu terdengar oleh orang Filistin. Karena itu Saul menyuruh meniup sangkakala di seluruh negeri, sebab pikirnya: "Biarlah orang Ibrani mendengarnya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when the king heard the words of the woman, that he rent his clothes; and he passed by upon the wall, and the people looked, and, behold, he had sackcloth within upon his flesh.
target: Tatkala raja mendengar perkataan perempuan itu, dikoyakkannyalah pakaiannya; dan sedang ia berjalan di atas tembok, kelihatanlah kepada orang banyak, bahwa ia memakai kain kabung pada kulit tubuhnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So David went, he and the six hundred men that were with him, and came to the brook Besor, where those that were left behind stayed.
target: Lalu pergilah Daud beserta keenam ratus orang yang bersama-sama dengan dia, dan sampailah mereka ke sungai Besor. Sementara orang-orang yang mau tinggal di belakang berhenti di sana,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When Mordecai perceived all that was done, Mordecai rent his clothes, and put on sackcloth with ashes, and went out into the midst of the city, and cried with a loud and a bitter cry;
target: Setelah Mordekhai mengetahui segala yang terjadi itu, ia mengoyakkan pakaiannya, lalu memakai kain kabung dan abu, kemudian keluar berjalan di tengah-tengah kota, sambil melolong-lolong dengan nyaring dan pedih.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they gave by lot out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, and out of the tribe of the children of Benjamin, these cities, which are called by their names.
target: Mereka memberikan juga dengan diundi kota-kota tadi, yang mereka sebutkan nama-namanya, dari suku bani Yehuda, dari suku bani Simeon dan dari suku bani Benyamin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Blessed are the peacemakers: for they shall be called the children of God.
target: Berbahagialah orang yang membawa damai, karena mereka akan disebut anak-anak Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Happy is the man that hath his quiver full of them: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate.
target: Berbahagialah orang yang telah membuat penuh tabung panahnya dengan semuanya itu. Ia tidak akan mendapat malu, apabila ia berbicara dengan musuh-musuh di pintu gerbang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sons of Benjamin; Bela, and Becher, and Jediael, three.
target: Anak-anak Benyamin ialah Bela, Bekher dan Yediael, tiga orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus Solomon finished the house of the LORD, and the king's house: and all that came into Solomon's heart to make in the house of the LORD, and in his own house, he prosperously effected.
target: Demikianlah Salomo menyelesaikan rumah TUHAN dan istana raja, dan berhasil melaksanakan dalam rumah TUHAN dan dalam istananya segala sesuatu yang timbul dalam hatinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Musa:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his sister Hammoleketh bare Ishod, and Abiezer, and Mahalah.
target: Saudaranya perempuan, Molekhet, melahirkan Isyhod, Abiezer dan Mahla.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD shall make the rain of thy land powder and dust: from heaven shall it come down upon thee, until thou be destroyed.
target: TUHAN akan menurunkan hujan abu dan debu ke atas negerimu; dari langit akan turun semuanya itu ke atasmu, sampai engkau punah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Shake thyself from the dust; arise, and sit down, O Jerusalem: loose thyself from the bands of thy neck, O captive daughter of Zion.
target: Kebaskanlah debu dari padamu, bangunlah, hai Yerusalem yang tertawan! Tanggalkanlah ikatan-ikatan dari lehermu, hai puteri Sion yang tertawan!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he had thus spoken, he kneeled down, and prayed with them all.
target: Sesudah mengucapkan kata-kata itu Paulus berlutut dan berdoa bersama-sama dengan mereka semua.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As long as it lieth desolate it shall rest; because it did not rest in your sabbaths, when ye dwelt upon it.
target: Selama ketandusannya tanah itu akan menjalani sabat yang belum dijalaninya pada tiap-tiap tahun sabatmu, ketika kamu masih diam di situ.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun, and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, that dwelt in the villages of the Netophathites.
target: serta Obaja bin Semaya bin Galal bin Yedutun dan Berekhya bin Asa bin Elkana yang diam di desa-desa orang Netofa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When the morning stars sang together, and all the sons of God shouted for joy?
target: pada waktu bintang-bintang fajar bersorak-sorak bersama-sama, dan semua anak Allah bersorak-sorai?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Should ye not hear the words which the LORD hath cried by the former prophets, when Jerusalem was inhabited and in prosperity, and the cities thereof round about her, when men inhabited the south and the plain?
target: Bukankah ini firman yang telah disampaikan TUHAN dengan perantaraan para nabi yang dahulu, ketika Yerusalem dengan kota-kota yang di sekelilingnya masih didiami orang dan masih sentosa dan Tanah Negeb dan Daerah Bukit masih didiami?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet, and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds, from one end of heaven to the other.
target: Dan Ia akan menyuruh keluar malaikat-malaikat-Nya dengan meniup sangkakala yang dahsyat bunyinya dan mereka akan mengumpulkan orang-orang pilihan-Nya dari keempat penjuru bumi, dari ujung langit yang satu ke ujung langit yang lain.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And say unto him, Take heed, and be quiet; fear not, neither be fainthearted for the two tails of these smoking firebrands, for the fierce anger of Rezin with Syria, and of the son of Remaliah.
target: dan katakanlah kepadanya: Teguhkanlah hatimu dan tinggallah tenang, janganlah takut dan janganlah hatimu kecut karena kedua puntung kayu api yang berasap ini, yaitu kepanasan amarah Rezin dengan Aram dan anak Remalya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moab hath been at ease from his youth, and he hath settled on his lees, and hath not been emptied from vessel to vessel, neither hath he gone into captivity: therefore his taste remained in him, and his scent is not changed.
target: Moab hidup aman dari sejak masa mudanya, dia hidup tenang seperti anggur di atas endapannya, tidak dituangkan dari tempayan yang satu ke tempayan yang lain, tidak pernah masuk ke dalam pembuangan; sebab itu rasanya tetap padanya, dan baunya tidak berubah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they removed from Jotbathah, and encamped at Ebronah.
target: Mereka berangkat dari Yotbata, lalu berkemah di Abrona.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, your house is left unto you desolate.
target: Lihatlah rumahmu ini akan ditinggalkan dan menjadi sunyi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore, if God so clothe the grass of the field, which to day is, and to morrow is cast into the oven, shall he not much more clothe you, O ye of little faith?
target: Jadi jika demikian Allah mendandani rumput di ladang, yang hari ini ada dan besok dibuang ke dalam api, tidakkah Ia akan terlebih lagi mendandani kamu, hai orang yang kurang percaya?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All things are full of labour; man cannot utter it: the eye is not satisfied with seeing, nor the ear filled with hearing.
target: Segala sesuatu menjemukan, sehingga tak terkatakan oleh manusia; mata tidak kenyang melihat, telinga tidak puas mendengar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they took Lot, Abram's brother's son, who dwelt in Sodom, and his goods, and departed.
target: Juga Lot, anak saudara Abram, beserta harta bendanya, dibawa musuh, lalu mereka pergi — sebab Lot itu diam di Sodom.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And one goat for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, and his drink offering.
target: dan seekor kambing jantan sebagai korban penghapus dosa, selain dari korban bakaran yang tetap serta dengan korban sajiannya dan korban curahannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in every several city he put shields and spears, and made them exceeding strong, having Judah and Benjamin on his side.
target: perisai dan tombak pun disediakan di tiap-tiap kota. Ia membuat kota-kota itu amat kokoh. Demikianlah Yehuda dan Benyamin menjadi daerah kekuasaannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, Hagar, Sarai's maid, whence camest thou? and whither wilt thou go? And she said, I flee from the face of my mistress Sarai.
target: Katanya: "Hagar, hamba Sarai, dari manakah datangmu dan ke manakah pergimu?" Jawabnya: "Aku lari meninggalkan Sarai, nyonyaku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And falling into a place where two seas met, they ran the ship aground; and the forepart stuck fast, and remained unmoveable, but the hinder part was broken with the violence of the waves.
target: Tetapi mereka melanggar busung pasir, dan terkandaslah kapal itu. Haluannya terpancang dan tidak dapat bergerak dan buritannya hancur dipukul oleh gelombang yang hebat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All the heave offerings of the holy things, which the children of Israel offer unto the LORD, have I given thee, and thy sons and thy daughters with thee, by a statute for ever: it is a covenant of salt for ever before the LORD unto thee and to thy seed with thee.
target: Segala persembahan khusus, yakni persembahan kudus yang dipersembahkan orang Israel kepada TUHAN, Aku berikan kepadamu dan kepada anak-anakmu laki-laki dan perempuan bersama-sama dengan engkau; itulah suatu ketetapan untuk selama-lamanya; itulah suatu perjanjian garam untuk selama-lamanya di hadapan TUHAN bagimu serta bagi keturunanmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For except we had lingered, surely now we had returned this second time.
target: Jika kita tidak berlambat-lambat, maka tentulah kami sekarang sudah dua kali pulang."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover from the time that I was appointed to be their governor in the land of Judah, from the twentieth year even unto the two and thirtieth year of Artaxerxes the king, that is, twelve years, I and my brethren have not eaten the bread of the governor.
target: Pula sejak aku diangkat sebagai bupati di tanah Yehuda, yakni dari tahun kedua puluh sampai tahun ketiga puluh dua pemerintahan Artahsasta jadi dua belas tahun lamanya, aku dan saudara-saudaraku tidak pernah mengambil pembagian yang menjadi hak bupati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Aram begat Aminadab; and Aminadab begat Naasson; and Naasson begat Salmon;
target: Ram memperanakkan Aminadab, Aminadab memperanakkan Nahason, Nahason memperanakkan Salmon,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.
target: Sebab itu marilah kita, oleh Dia, senantiasa mempersembahkan korban syukur kepada Allah, yaitu ucapan bibir yang memuliakan nama-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thy mouth uttereth thine iniquity, and thou choosest the tongue of the crafty.
target: Kesalahanmulah yang mengajar mulutmu, dan bahasa orang licik yang kaupilih.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Musa:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He shall separate himself from wine and strong drink, and shall drink no vinegar of wine, or vinegar of strong drink, neither shall he drink any liquor of grapes, nor eat moist grapes, or dried.
target: maka haruslah ia menjauhkan dirinya dari anggur dan minuman yang memabukkan, jangan meminum cuka anggur atau cuka minuman yang memabukkan dan jangan meminum sesuatu minuman yang dibuat dari buah anggur, dan jangan memakan buah anggur, baik yang segar maupun yang kering.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jephthah sent messengers unto the king of the children of Ammon, saying, What hast thou to do with me, that thou art come against me to fight in my land?
target: Kemudian Yefta mengirim utusan kepada raja bani Amon dengan pesan: "Apakah urusanmu dengan aku, sehingga engkau mendatangi aku untuk memerangi negeriku?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This is the third time I am coming to you. In the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established.
target: Ini adalah untuk ketiga kalinya aku datang kepada kamu: Baru dengan keterangan dua atau tiga orang saksi suatu perkara sah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt set the laver between the tent of the congregation and the altar, and shalt put water therein.
target: Kautaruhlah bejana pembasuhan di antara Kemah Pertemuan dan mezbah itu, lalu kautaruhlah air ke dalamnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will cast thee out, and thy mother that bare thee, into another country, where ye were not born; and there shall ye die.
target: Aku akan melemparkan engkau serta ibumu yang melahirkan engkau ke negeri lain, yang bukan tempat kelahiranmu; di sanalah kamu akan mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He had also seven sons and three daughters.
target: Ia juga mendapat tujuh orang anak laki-laki dan tiga orang anak perempuan;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Lift up thine eyes round about, and see: all they gather themselves together, they come to thee: thy sons shall come from far, and thy daughters shall be nursed at thy side.
target: Angkatlah mukamu dan lihatlah ke sekeliling, mereka semua datang berhimpun kepadamu; anak-anakmu laki-laki datang dari jauh, dan anak-anakmu perempuan digendong.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then I went on to the gate of the fountain, and to the king's pool: but there was no place for the beast that was under me to pass.
target: Lalu aku meneruskan perjalananku ke pintu gerbang Mata Air dan ke kolam Raja. Karena binatang yang kutunggangi tidak dapat lalu di tempat itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall carry forth the bullock without the camp, and burn him as he burned the first bullock: it is a sin offering for the congregation.
target: Dan haruslah ia membawa lembu jantan itu ke luar perkemahan, lalu membakarnya sampai habis seperti ia membakar habis lembu jantan yang pertama. Itulah korban penghapus dosa untuk jemaah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the tongue is a fire, a world of iniquity: so is the tongue among our members, that it defileth the whole body, and setteth on fire the course of nature; and it is set on fire of hell.
target: Lidah pun adalah api; ia merupakan suatu dunia kejahatan dan mengambil tempat di antara anggota-anggota tubuh kita sebagai sesuatu yang dapat menodai seluruh tubuh dan menyalakan roda kehidupan kita, sedang ia sendiri dinyalakan oleh api neraka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So he consented to them in this matter, and proved them ten days.
target: Didengarkannyalah permintaan mereka itu, lalu diadakanlah percobaan dengan mereka selama sepuluh hari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Lying lips are abomination to the LORD: but they that deal truly are his delight.
target: Orang yang dusta bibirnya adalah kekejian bagi TUHAN, tetapi orang yang berlaku setia dikenan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if a man take a wife and her mother, it is wickedness: they shall be burnt with fire, both he and they; that there be no wickedness among you.
target: Bila seorang laki-laki mengambil seorang perempuan dan ibunya, itu suatu perbuatan mesum; ia dan kedua perempuan itu harus dibakar, supaya jangan ada perbuatan mesum di tengah-tengah kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But he did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD, as did Manasseh his father: for Amon sacrificed unto all the carved images which Manasseh his father had made, and served them;
target: Ia melakukan apa yang jahat di mata TUHAN seperti yang telah dilakukan Manasye, ayahnya. Amon mempersembahkan korban kepada segala patung yang dibuat Manasye, ayahnya, dan beribadah kepada patung-patung itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the woman came and told her husband, saying, A man of God came unto me, and his countenance was like the countenance of an angel of God, very terrible: but I asked him not whence he was, neither told he me his name:
target: Kemudian perempuan itu datang kepada suaminya dan berkata: "Telah datang kepadaku seorang abdi Allah, yang rupanya sebagai rupa malaikat Allah, amat menakutkan. Tidak kutanyakan dari mana datangnya, dan tidak juga diberitahukannya namanya kepadaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, they have there with them their two sons, Ahimaaz Zadok's son, and Jonathan Abiathar's son; and by them ye shall send unto me every thing that ye can hear.
target: Ingatlah, di sana bersama-sama dengan mereka ada kedua anak mereka, Ahimaas anak Zadok dan Yonatan anak Abyatar; dengan perantaraan mereka haruslah kamu kirimkan kepadaku segala hal yang kamu dengar."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, why weepest thou? whom seekest thou? She, supposing him to be the gardener, saith unto him, Sir, if thou have borne him hence, tell me where thou hast laid him, and I will take him away.
target: Kata Yesus kepadanya: "Ibu, mengapa engkau menangis? Siapakah yang engkau cari?" Maria menyangka orang itu adalah penunggu taman, lalu berkata kepada-Nya: "Tuan, jikalau tuan yang mengambil Dia, katakanlah kepadaku, di mana tuan meletakkan Dia, supaya aku dapat mengambil-Nya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I the LORD have called thee in righteousness, and will hold thine hand, and will keep thee, and give thee for a covenant of the people, for a light of the Gentiles;
target: "Aku ini, TUHAN, telah memanggil engkau untuk maksud penyelamatan, telah memegang tanganmu; Aku telah membentuk engkau dan memberi engkau menjadi perjanjian bagi umat manusia, menjadi terang untuk bangsa-bangsa,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Beside their genealogy of males, from three years old and upward, even unto every one that entereth into the house of the LORD, his daily portion for their service in their charges according to their courses;
target: kecuali kepada setiap orang yang masuk ke rumah TUHAN, menurut hari-hari yang ditetapkan, menurut tugas jabatan yang ditugaskan kepadanya, dan menurut rombongannya, yakni mereka yang tercatat dalam daftar sebagai laki-laki yang berumur tiga tahun ke atas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of the porters: the children of Shallum, the children of Ater, the children of Talmon, the children of Akkub, the children of Hatita, the children of Shobai, in all an hundred thirty and nine.
target: Inilah kaum penunggu pintu gerbang: bani Salum, bani Ater, bani Talmon, bani Akub, bani Hatita, bani Sobai, semuanya seratus tiga puluh sembilan orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when they had eaten up the corn which they had brought out of Egypt, their father said unto them, Go again, buy us a little food.
target: Dan setelah gandum yang dibawa mereka dari Mesir habis dimakan, berkatalah ayah mereka: "Pergilah pula membeli sedikit bahan makanan untuk kita."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A lying tongue hateth those that are afflicted by it; and a flattering mouth worketh ruin.
target: Lidah dusta membenci korbannya, dan mulut licin mendatangkan kehancuran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Verily I say unto you, It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment, than for that city.
target: Aku berkata kepadamu: Sesungguhnya pada hari penghakiman tanah Sodom dan Gomora akan lebih ringan tanggungannya dari pada kota itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of Neziah, the children of Hatipha.
target: bani Neziah, bani Hatifa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that handleth a matter wisely shall find good: and whoso trusteth in the LORD, happy is he.
target: Siapa memperhatikan firman akan mendapat kebaikan, dan berbahagialah orang yang percaya kepada TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when all the people were clean passed over, that the ark of the LORD passed over, and the priests, in the presence of the people.
target: Ketika seluruh bangsa itu selesai menyeberang, maka menyeberanglah tabut TUHAN itu serta para imam di depan mata bangsa itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if the priest's daughter be a widow, or divorced, and have no child, and is returned unto her father's house, as in her youth, she shall eat of her father's meat: but there shall be no stranger eat thereof.
target: Tetapi apabila perempuan itu menjadi janda atau diceraikan, dan ia tidak mempunyai anak, dan telah kembali ke rumah ayahnya seperti waktu ia masih gadis, maka ia boleh makan dari makanan ayahnya; tetapi setiap orang awam janganlah memakannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the servant said unto him, Peradventure the woman will not be willing to follow me unto this land: must I needs bring thy son again unto the land from whence thou camest?
target: Lalu berkatalah hambanya itu kepadanya: "Mungkin perempuan itu tidak suka mengikuti aku ke negeri ini; haruskah aku membawa anakmu itu kembali ke negeri dari mana tuanku keluar?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Rehoboam went to Shechem: for to Shechem were all Israel come to make him king.
target: Kemudian Rehabeam pergi ke Sikhem, sebab seluruh Israel telah datang ke Sikhem untuk menobatkan dia menjadi raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as for you, O my flock, thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I judge between cattle and cattle, between the rams and the he goats.
target: Dan hai kamu domba-domba-Ku, beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Sungguh, Aku akan menjadi hakim di antara domba dengan domba, dan di antara domba jantan dan kambing jantan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And said, My LORD, if now I have found favour in thy sight, pass not away, I pray thee, from thy servant:
target: serta berkata: "Tuanku, jika aku telah mendapat kasih tuanku, janganlah kiranya lampaui hambamu ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The king answered and said, I know of certainty that ye would gain the time, because ye see the thing is gone from me.
target: Jawab raja: "Aku tahu benar-benar, bahwa kamu mencoba mengulur-ulur waktu, karena kamu melihat, bahwa aku telah mengambil keputusan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the vine said unto them, Should I leave my wine, which cheereth God and man, and go to be promoted over the trees?
target: Tetapi jawab pohon anggur itu kepada mereka: Masakan aku meninggalkan air buah anggurku, yang menyukakan hati Allah dan manusia, dan pergi melayang di atas pohon-pohon?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore, son of man, prophesy and say unto Gog, Thus saith the Lord GOD; In that day when my people of Israel dwelleth safely, shalt thou not know it?
target: Sebab itu, bernubuatlah, hai anak manusia dan katakanlah kepada Gog: Beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Ketika umat-Ku Israel sedang diam dengan aman tenteram, pada waktu itulah engkau akan bergerak

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee, where he made the water wine. And there was a certain nobleman, whose son was sick at Capernaum.
target: Maka Yesus kembali lagi ke Kana di Galilea, di mana Ia membuat air menjadi anggur. Dan di Kapernaum ada seorang pegawai istana, anaknya sedang sakit.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when Israel was strong, that they put the Canaanites to tribute, and did not utterly drive them out.
target: Setelah orang Israel menjadi kuat, mereka membuat orang Kanaan itu menjadi orang rodi dan tidak menghalau mereka sama sekali.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ishmael also slew all the Jews that were with him, even with Gedaliah, at Mizpah, and the Chaldeans that were found there, and the men of war.
target: Juga semua orang Yehuda yang ada bersama-sama dengan Gedalya di Mizpa dan orang-orang Kasdim, yakni prajurit, yang terdapat di sana dipukul mati oleh Ismael.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the LORD your God is God of gods, and Lord of lords, a great God, a mighty, and a terrible, which regardeth not persons, nor taketh reward:
target: Sebab TUHAN, Allahmulah Allah segala allah dan Tuhan segala tuhan, Allah yang besar, kuat dan dahsyat, yang tidak memandang bulu ataupun menerima suap;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Bethlebaoth, and Sharuhen; thirteen cities and their villages:
target: Bet-Lebaot dan Saruhen: tiga belas kota dengan desa-desanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses said unto Joshua, Choose us out men, and go out, fight with Amalek: to morrow I will stand on the top of the hill with the rod of God in mine hand.
target: Musa berkata kepada Yosua: "Pilihlah orang-orang bagi kita, lalu keluarlah berperang melawan orang Amalek, besok aku akan berdiri di puncak bukit itu dengan memegang tongkat Allah di tanganku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses said, This is the thing which the LORD commanded that ye should do: and the glory of the LORD shall appear unto you.
target: Kata Musa: "Inilah firman yang diperintahkan TUHAN kamu perbuat, agar kemuliaan TUHAN tampak kepadamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD your God hath multiplied you, and, behold, ye are this day as the stars of heaven for multitude.
target: TUHAN, Allahmu, telah membuat kamu banyak dan sesungguhnya, sekarang kamu sudah seperti bintang-bintang di langit banyaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto Aaron, Take thee a young calf for a sin offering, and a ram for a burnt offering, without blemish, and offer them before the LORD.
target: lalu berkatalah ia kepada Harun: "Ambillah bagimu sendiri seekor lembu muda, untuk korban penghapus dosa, dan seekor domba jantan untuk korban bakaran, kedua-duanya yang tidak bercela, kemudian persembahkanlah itu di hadapan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the five and twenty thousand of length, and the ten thousand of breadth shall also the Levites, the ministers of the house, have for themselves, for a possession for twenty chambers.
target: Yang dua puluh lima ribu hasta panjangnya dan sepuluh ribu hasta lebarnya harus menjadi milik orang-orang Lewi yang mendapat tugas pelayanan dalam Bait Suci; itulah kota-kotanya, tempat tinggal mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, what have I to do with thee? mine hour is not yet come.
target: Kata Yesus kepadanya: "Mau apakah engkau dari pada-Ku, ibu? Saat-Ku belum tiba."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And came even before the king's gate: for none might enter into the king's gate clothed with sackcloth.
target: Dengan demikian datanglah ia sampai ke depan pintu gerbang istana raja, karena seorang pun tidak boleh masuk pintu gerbang istana raja dengan berpakaian kain kabung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Say unto them, As truly as I live, saith the LORD, as ye have spoken in mine ears, so will I do to you:
target: Katakanlah kepada mereka: Demi Aku yang hidup, demikianlah firman TUHAN, bahwasanya seperti yang kamu katakan di hadapan-Ku, demikianlah akan Kulakukan kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jehu the son of Nimshi shalt thou anoint to be king over Israel: and Elisha the son of Shaphat of Abelmeholah shalt thou anoint to be prophet in thy room.
target: Juga Yehu, cucu Nimsi, haruslah kauurapi menjadi raja atas Israel, dan Elisa bin Safat, dari Abel-Mehola, harus kauurapi menjadi nabi menggantikan engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Turn away my reproach which I fear: for thy judgments are good.
target: Lalukanlah celaku yang menggetarkan aku, karena hukum-hukum-Mu adalah baik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Hannah answered and said, No, my lord, I am a woman of a sorrowful spirit: I have drunk neither wine nor strong drink, but have poured out my soul before the LORD.
target: Tetapi Hana menjawab: "Bukan, tuanku, aku seorang perempuan yang sangat bersusah hati; anggur ataupun minuman yang memabukkan tidak kuminum, melainkan aku mencurahkan isi hatiku di hadapan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Our holy and our beautiful house, where our fathers praised thee, is burned up with fire: and all our pleasant things are laid waste.
target: Bait kami yang kudus dan agung, tempat nenek moyang kami memuji-muji Engkau, sudah menjadi umpan api, maka milik kami yang paling indah sudah menjadi reruntuhan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Balak's anger was kindled against Balaam, and he smote his hands together: and Balak said unto Balaam, I called thee to curse mine enemies, and, behold, thou hast altogether blessed them these three times.
target: Lalu bangkitlah amarah Balak terhadap Bileam dan dengan meremas-remas jarinya berkatalah ia kepada Bileam: "Untuk menyerapah musuhku aku memanggil engkau, tetapi sebaliknya sampai tiga kali engkau memberkati mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Jesse made Shammah to pass by. And he said, Neither hath the LORD chosen this.
target: Kemudian Isai menyuruh Syama lewat, tetapi Samuel berkata: "Orang ini pun tidak dipilih TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Praise the LORD from the earth, ye dragons, and all deeps:
target: Pujilah TUHAN di bumi, hai ular-ular naga dan segenap samudera raya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Seven days shalt thou prepare every day a goat for a sin offering: they shall also prepare a young bullock, and a ram out of the flock, without blemish.
target: Selama tujuh hari engkau harus mengolah setiap hari seekor kambing sebagai korban penghapus dosa; harus diolah juga seekor lembu jantan muda dan domba jantan dari antara domba-domba, yang tidak bercela.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For as often as ye eat this bread, and drink this cup, ye do shew the Lord's death till he come.
target: Sebab setiap kali kamu makan roti ini dan minum cawan ini, kamu memberitakan kematian Tuhan sampai Ia datang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joshua did unto them as the LORD bade him: he houghed their horses, and burnt their chariots with fire.
target: Yosua melakukan terhadap mereka seperti yang difirmankan TUHAN kepadanya: kuda mereka dilumpuhkan dan kereta mereka dibakar dengan api.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Enos lived ninety years, and begat Cainan:
target: Setelah Enos hidup sembilan puluh tahun, ia memperanakkan Kenan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples, and said, (the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty,)
target: Pada hari-hari itu berdirilah Petrus di tengah-tengah saudara-saudara yang sedang berkumpul itu, kira-kira seratus dua puluh orang banyaknya, lalu berkata:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And we took at that time out of the hand of the two kings of the Amorites the land that was on this side Jordan, from the river of Arnon unto mount Hermon;
target: Jadi pada waktu itu dari tangan kedua raja orang Amori itu kita merampas negeri yang di seberang sungai Yordan, mulai dari sungai Arnon sampai gunung Hermon

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And from thence to Philippi, which is the chief city of that part of Macedonia, and a colony: and we were in that city abiding certain days.
target: dari situ kami ke Filipi, kota pertama di bagian Makedonia ini, suatu kota perantauan orang Roma. Di kota itu kami tinggal beberapa hari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore kill every male among the little ones, and kill every woman that hath known man by lying with him.
target: Maka sekarang bunuhlah semua laki-laki di antara anak-anak mereka, dan juga semua perempuan yang pernah bersetubuh dengan laki-laki haruslah kamu bunuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Judas Iscariot, one of the twelve, went unto the chief priests, to betray him unto them.
target: Lalu pergilah Yudas Iskariot, salah seorang dari kedua belas murid itu, kepada imam-imam kepala dengan maksud untuk menyerahkan Yesus kepada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hidest thy face, they are troubled: thou takest away their breath, they die, and return to their dust.
target: Apabila Engkau menyembunyikan wajah-Mu, mereka terkejut; apabila Engkau mengambil roh mereka, mereka mati binasa dan kembali menjadi debu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now when Mephibosheth, the son of Jonathan, the son of Saul, was come unto David, he fell on his face, and did reverence. And David said, Mephibosheth. And he answered, Behold thy servant!
target: Dan Mefiboset bin Yonatan bin Saul masuk menghadap Daud, ia sujud dan menyembah. Kata Daud: "Mefiboset!" Jawabnya: "Inilah hamba tuanku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But ye shall offer an offering made by fire unto the LORD seven days: in the seventh day is an holy convocation: ye shall do no servile work therein.
target: Kamu harus mempersembahkan korban api-apian kepada TUHAN tujuh hari lamanya; pada hari yang ketujuh haruslah ada pertemuan kudus, janganlah kamu melakukan sesuatu pekerjaan berat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Justice and judgment are the habitation of thy throne: mercy and truth shall go before thy face.
target: Punya-Mulah lengan yang perkasa, kuat tangan-Mu dan tinggi tangan kanan-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: God, who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets,
target: Setelah pada zaman dahulu Allah berulang kali dan dalam pelbagai cara berbicara kepada nenek moyang kita dengan perantaraan nabi-nabi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the pillars of brass that were in the house of the LORD, and the bases, and the brasen sea that was in the house of the LORD, did the Chaldees break in pieces, and carried the brass of them to Babylon.
target: Juga tiang-tiang tembaga yang ada di rumah TUHAN dan kereta penopang dan "laut" tembaga yang ada di rumah TUHAN dipecahkan oleh orang Kasdim dan tembaganya diangkut mereka ke Babel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtechah: and the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
target: Keturunan Kush ialah Seba, Hawila, Sabta, Raema dan Sabtekha; anak-anak Raema ialah Syeba dan Dedan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall, and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers.
target: Kemudian serdadu-serdadu wali negeri membawa Yesus ke gedung pengadilan, lalu memanggil seluruh pasukan berkumpul sekeliling Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These words spake Jesus, and lifted up his eyes to heaven, and said, Father, the hour is come; glorify thy Son, that thy Son also may glorify thee:
target: Demikianlah kata Yesus. Lalu Ia menengadah ke langit dan berkata: "Bapa, telah tiba saatnya; permuliakanlah Anak-Mu, supaya Anak-Mu mempermuliakan Engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him, that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake.
target: Kepada murid itu Simon Petrus memberi isyarat dan berkata: "Tanyalah siapa yang dimaksudkan-Nya!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then they rent their clothes, and laded every man his ass, and returned to the city.
target: Lalu mereka mengoyakkan jubahnya dan masing-masing memuati keledainya, dan mereka kembali ke kota.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Why is my pain perpetual, and my wound incurable, which refuseth to be healed? wilt thou be altogether unto me as a liar, and as waters that fail?
target: Mengapakah penderitaanku tidak berkesudahan, dan lukaku sangat payah, sukar disembuhkan? Sungguh, Engkau seperti sungai yang curang bagiku, air yang tidak dapat dipercayai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Cut off the sower from Babylon, and him that handleth the sickle in the time of harvest: for fear of the oppressing sword they shall turn every one to his people, and they shall flee every one to his own land.
target: Lenyapkanlah orang penabur dari Babel dan orang penyabit pada musim menuai! Untuk mengelakkan pedang yang dahsyat ini, setiap orang akan berpaling pulang kepada bangsanya, setiap orang akan lari ke negerinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He preserveth not the life of the wicked: but giveth right to the poor.
target: Ia tidak membiarkan orang fasik hidup, tetapi memberi keadilan kepada orang-orang sengsara;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass in the fifth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah, in the ninth month, that they proclaimed a fast before the LORD to all the people in Jerusalem, and to all the people that came from the cities of Judah unto Jerusalem.
target: Adapun dalam tahun yang kelima pemerintahan Yoyakim bin Yosia, raja Yehuda, dalam bulan yang kesembilan, orang telah memaklumkan puasa di hadapan TUHAN bagi segenap rakyat di Yerusalem dan bagi segenap rakyat yang telah datang dari kota-kota Yehuda ke Yerusalem. —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye ask, and receive not, because ye ask amiss, that ye may consume it upon your lusts.
target: Atau kamu berdoa juga, tetapi kamu tidak menerima apa-apa, karena kamu salah berdoa, sebab yang kamu minta itu hendak kamu habiskan untuk memuaskan hawa nafsumu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And fields shall be bought in this land, whereof ye say, It is desolate without man or beast; it is given into the hand of the Chaldeans.
target: Orang akan membeli ladang lagi di negeri ini yang kamu katakan: Itu adalah tempat tandus tanpa manusia dan hewan; itu telah diserahkan ke dalam tangan orang-orang Kasdim!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The shady trees cover him with their shadow; the willows of the brook compass him about.
target: Mungkinkah ia mengajukan banyak permohonan belas kasihan kepadamu, atau berbicara dengan lemah lembut kepadamu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they went out, they and all their hosts with them, much people, even as the sand that is upon the sea shore in multitude, with horses and chariots very many.
target: Kemudian keluarlah raja-raja ini bersama-sama semua tentaranya, amat banyak rakyat, seperti pasir di tepi laut banyaknya, beserta sangat banyak kuda dan kereta.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh, which is called the Passover.
target: Hari raya Roti Tidak Beragi, yang disebut Paskah, sudah dekat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And on the day that the tabernacle was reared up the cloud covered the tabernacle, namely, the tent of the testimony: and at even there was upon the tabernacle as it were the appearance of fire, until the morning.
target: Pada hari didirikan Kemah Suci, maka awan itu menutupi Kemah Suci, kemah hukum Allah; dan pada waktu malam sampai pagi awan itu ada di atas Kemah Suci, kelihatan seperti api.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the Son of man is not come to destroy men's lives, but to save them. And they went to another village.
target: Lalu mereka pergi ke desa yang lain.
