en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were fifty and three thousand and four hundred.
target: Pasukannya terdiri dari lima puluh tiga ribu empat ratus orang yang dicatat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, Know ye Laban the son of Nahor? And they said, We know him.
target: Lagi katanya kepada mereka: "Kenalkah kamu Laban, cucu Nahor?" Jawab mereka: "Kami kenal."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O come, let us worship and bow down: let us kneel before the LORD our maker.
target: Masuklah, marilah kita sujud menyembah, berlutut di hadapan TUHAN yang menjadikan kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore thy gates shall be open continually; they shall not be shut day nor night; that men may bring unto thee the forces of the Gentiles, and that their kings may be brought.
target: Pintu-pintu gerbangmu akan terbuka senantiasa, baik siang maupun malam tidak akan tertutup, supaya orang dapat membawa kekayaan bangsa-bangsa kepadamu, sedang raja-raja mereka ikut digiring sebagai tawanan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ahishar was over the household: and Adoniram the son of Abda was over the tribute.
target: Ahisar menjadi kepala istana; Adoniram bin Abda menjadi kepala rodi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then I spake unto them of the captivity all the things that the LORD had shewed me.
target: dan aku sampaikan kepada para buangan itu segala sesuatu yang diperlihatkan TUHAN kepadaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in the candlesticks shall be four bowls made like unto almonds, with their knops and their flowers.
target: Pada kandil itu sendiri harus ada empat kelopak berupa bunga badam — dengan tombolnya dan kembangnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Absalom fled. And the young man that kept the watch lifted up his eyes, and looked, and, behold, there came much people by the way of the hill side behind him.
target: Absalom melarikan diri. Ketika orang yang berjaga-jaga melayangkan pandangnya, maka terlihatlah olehnya sejumlah besar orang datang dari jurusan Horonaim, sepanjang sisi pegunungan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he spake unto the man clothed with linen, and said, Go in between the wheels, even under the cherub, and fill thine hand with coals of fire from between the cherubims, and scatter them over the city. And he went in in my sight.
target: Maka Ia berkata kepada orang yang berpakaian lenan itu: "Masuklah ke bawah kerub dari antara roda-rodanya dan penuhilah rangkup tanganmu dengan bara api dari tengah-tengah kerub itu dan hamburkan ke atas kota itu." Lalu aku melihat dia masuk.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The king by judgment establisheth the land: but he that receiveth gifts overthroweth it.
target: Dengan keadilan seorang raja menegakkan negerinya, tetapi orang yang memungut banyak pajak meruntuhkannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore his height was exalted above all the trees of the field, and his boughs were multiplied, and his branches became long because of the multitude of waters, when he shot forth.
target: Maka dari itu tumbuhnya lebih tinggi dari segala pohon di padang; ranting-rantingnya menjadi banyak, cabang-cabangnya menjadi panjang lantaran air yang melimpah datang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For though I should boast somewhat more of our authority, which the Lord hath given us for edification, and not for your destruction, I should not be ashamed:
target: Bahkan, jikalau aku agak berlebih-lebihan bermegah atas kuasa, yang dikaruniakan Tuhan kepada kami untuk membangun dan bukan untuk meruntuhkan kamu, maka dalam hal itu aku tidak akan mendapat malu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus hath the Lord GOD shewed unto me: and, behold, the Lord GOD called to contend by fire, and it devoured the great deep, and did eat up a part.
target: Inilah yang diperlihatkan Tuhan ALLAH kepadaku: Tampak Tuhan ALLAH memanggil api untuk melakukan hukuman. Api itu memakan habis samudera raya dan akan memakan habis tanah ladang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They shall eat the meat offering, and the sin offering, and the trespass offering: and every dedicated thing in Israel shall be theirs.
target: Persembahan, korban penghapus dosa dan korban penebus salah, merekalah yang harus memakannya dan segala yang dikhususkan di tanah Israel adalah bagian mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Fear came upon me, and trembling, which made all my bones to shake.
target: Aku terkejut dan gentar, sehingga tulang-tulangku gemetar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the word of the LORD came unto Zechariah, saying,
target: Firman TUHAN datang kepada Zakharia, bunyinya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I saw another sign in heaven, great and marvellous, seven angels having the seven last plagues; for in them is filled up the wrath of God.
target: Dan aku melihat suatu tanda lain di langit, besar dan ajaib: tujuh malaikat dengan tujuh malapetaka terakhir, karena dengan itu berakhirlah murka Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Speak now in the ears of the people, and let every man borrow of his neighbour, and every woman of her neighbour, jewels of silver and jewels of gold.
target: Baiklah katakan kepada bangsa itu, supaya setiap laki-laki meminta barang-barang emas dan perak kepada tetangganya dan setiap perempuan kepada tetangganya pula."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: God be merciful unto us, and bless us; and cause his face to shine upon us; Selah.
target: Untuk pemimpin biduan. Dengan permainan kecapi. Mazmur. Nyanyian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Blessed are ye, when men shall hate you, and when they shall separate you from their company, and shall reproach you, and cast out your name as evil, for the Son of man's sake.
target: Berbahagialah kamu, jika karena Anak Manusia orang membenci kamu, dan jika mereka mengucilkan kamu, dan mencela kamu serta menolak namamu sebagai sesuatu yang jahat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall come to pass, after that I have plucked them out I will return, and have compassion on them, and will bring them again, every man to his heritage, and every man to his land.
target: Tetapi setelah Aku mencabut mereka, maka Aku akan menyayangi mereka kembali. Aku akan mengembalikan mereka masing-masing ke milik pusakanya dan masing-masing ke negerinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she said, Behold, thy sister in law is gone back unto her people, and unto her gods: return thou after thy sister in law.
target: Berkatalah Naomi: "Telah pulang iparmu kepada bangsanya dan kepada para allahnya; pulanglah mengikuti iparmu itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD was very angry with Aaron to have destroyed him: and I prayed for Aaron also the same time.
target: Juga kepada Harun TUHAN begitu murka, hingga Ia mau membinasakannya; maka pada waktu itu aku berdoa untuk Harun juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he turned unto her by the way, and said, Go to, I pray thee, let me come in unto thee; (for he knew not that she was his daughter in law.) And she said, What wilt thou give me, that thou mayest come in unto me?
target: Lalu berpalinglah Yehuda mendapatkan perempuan yang di pinggir jalan itu serta berkata: "Marilah, aku mau menghampiri engkau," sebab ia tidak tahu, bahwa perempuan itu menantunya. Tanya perempuan itu: "Apakah yang akan kauberikan kepadaku, jika engkau menghampiri aku?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there were six steps to the throne, with a footstool of gold, which were fastened to the throne, and stays on each side of the sitting place, and two lions standing by the stays:
target: Takhta itu enam tingkatnya, dan tumpuan kakinya dari emas, yang dipautkan pada takhta itu, dan pada kedua sisi tempat duduk ada kelek-kelek. Di samping kelek-kelek itu berdiri dua singa,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But now the LORD my God hath given me rest on every side, so that there is neither adversary nor evil occurrent.
target: Tetapi sekarang, TUHAN, Allahku, telah mengaruniakan keamanan kepadaku di mana-mana, tidak ada lagi lawan dan tidak ada lagi malapetaka menimpa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In his hand are the deep places of the earth: the strength of the hills is his also.
target: Bagian-bagian bumi yang paling dalam ada di tangan-Nya, puncak gunung-gunung pun kepunyaan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Eliphaz were Teman, Omar, Zepho, and Gatam, and Kenaz.
target: Anak-anak Elifas ialah T'eman, Omar, Zefo, Gaetam dan Kenas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God said, Let the earth bring forth grass, the herb yielding seed, and the fruit tree yielding fruit after his kind, whose seed is in itself, upon the earth: and it was so.
target: Berfirmanlah Allah: "Hendaklah tanah menumbuhkan tunas-tunas muda, tumbuh-tumbuhan yang berbiji, segala jenis pohon buah-buahan yang menghasilkan buah yang berbiji, supaya ada tumbuh-tumbuhan di bumi." Dan jadilah demikian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Remember now thy Creator in the days of thy youth, while the evil days come not, nor the years draw nigh, when thou shalt say, I have no pleasure in them;
target: Ingatlah akan Penciptamu pada masa mudamu, sebelum tiba hari-hari yang malang dan mendekat tahun-tahun yang kaukatakan: "Tak ada kesenangan bagiku di dalamnya!",

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Israel sent messengers unto Sihon king of the Amorites, saying,
target: Kemudian orang Israel mengirim utusan kepada Sihon, raja orang Amori, dengan pesan:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jacob beheld the countenance of Laban, and, behold, it was not toward him as before.
target: Lagi kelihatan kepada Yakub dari muka Laban, bahwa Laban tidak lagi seperti yang sudah-sudah kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the bed is shorter than that a man can stretch himself on it: and the covering narrower than that he can wrap himself in it.
target: Sebab tempat tidur akan kurang panjang untuk dipakai membujurkan diri dan selimut akan kurang lebar untuk dipakai menyelubungi diri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Go to now, ye that say, To day or to morrow we will go into such a city, and continue there a year, and buy and sell, and get gain:
target: Jadi sekarang, hai kamu yang berkata: "Hari ini atau besok kami berangkat ke kota anu, dan di sana kami akan tinggal setahun dan berdagang serta mendapat untung",

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Look thou upon me, and be merciful unto me, as thou usest to do unto those that love thy name.
target: Berpalinglah kepadaku dan kasihanilah aku, sebagaimana sepatutnya terhadap orang-orang yang mencintai nama-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I said unto their children in the wilderness, Walk ye not in the statutes of your fathers, neither observe their judgments, nor defile yourselves with their idols:
target: Maka Aku berkata kepada anak-anak mereka di padang gurun: Janganlah kamu hidup menurut ketetapan-ketetapan ayahmu dan janganlah berpegang pada peraturan-peraturan mereka dan janganlah menajiskan dirimu dengan berhala-berhala mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass that night, that the angel of the LORD went out, and smote in the camp of the Assyrians an hundred fourscore and five thousand: and when they arose early in the morning, behold, they were all dead corpses.
target: Maka pada malam itu keluarlah Malaikat TUHAN, lalu dibunuh-Nyalah seratus delapan puluh lima ribu orang di dalam perkemahan Asyur. Keesokan harinya pagi-pagi tampaklah, semuanya bangkai orang-orang mati belaka!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wilt thou be angry with us for ever? wilt thou draw out thine anger to all generations?
target: Pulihkanlah kami, ya Allah penyelamat kami, dan tiadakanlah sakit hati-Mu kepada kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Surely such are the dwellings of the wicked, and this is the place of him that knoweth not God.
target: Sungguh, demikianlah tempat kediaman orang yang curang, begitulah tempat tinggal orang yang tidak mengenal Allah."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That saith to the deep, Be dry, and I will dry up thy rivers:
target: Akulah yang berkata kepada tubir lautan: Jadilah kering, Aku mau mengeringkan sungai-sungaimu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as Samuel was offering up the burnt offering, the Philistines drew near to battle against Israel: but the LORD thundered with a great thunder on that day upon the Philistines, and discomfited them; and they were smitten before Israel.
target: Sedang Samuel mempersembahkan korban bakaran itu, majulah orang Filistin berperang melawan orang Israel. Tetapi pada hari itu TUHAN mengguntur dengan bunyi yang hebat ke atas orang Filistin dan mengacaukan mereka, sehingga mereka terpukul kalah oleh orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That ye would walk worthy of God, who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory.
target: dan meminta dengan sangat, supaya kamu hidup sesuai dengan kehendak Allah, yang memanggil kamu ke dalam Kerajaan dan kemuliaan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Israel did so as Joshua commanded, and took up twelve stones out of the midst of Jordan, as the LORD spake unto Joshua, according to the number of the tribes of the children of Israel, and carried them over with them unto the place where they lodged, and laid them down there.
target: Maka orang Israel itu melakukan seperti yang diperintahkan Yosua. Mereka mengangkat dua belas batu dari tengah-tengah sungai Yordan, seperti yang difirmankan TUHAN kepada Yosua, menurut jumlah suku Israel. Semuanya itu dibawa merekalah ke seberang, ke tempat bermalam, dan diletakkan di situ.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yea, and we are found false witnesses of God; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ: whom he raised not up, if so be that the dead rise not.
target: Lebih dari pada itu kami ternyata berdusta terhadap Allah, karena tentang Dia kami katakan, bahwa Ia telah membangkitkan Kristus — padahal Ia tidak membangkitkan-Nya, kalau andaikata benar, bahwa orang mati tidak dibangkitkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when David and his men were come to Ziklag on the third day, that the Amalekites had invaded the south, and Ziklag, and smitten Ziklag, and burned it with fire;
target: Ketika Daud serta orang-orangnya sampai ke Ziklag pada hari yang ketiga, orang Amalek telah menyerbu Tanah Negeb dan Ziklag; Ziklag telah dikalahkan oleh mereka dan dibakar habis.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jonah began to enter into the city a day's journey, and he cried, and said, Yet forty days, and Nineveh shall be overthrown.
target: Mulailah Yunus masuk ke dalam kota itu sehari perjalanan jauhnya, lalu berseru: "Empat puluh hari lagi, maka Niniwe akan ditunggangbalikkan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he commanded them, saying, Thus shall ye speak unto my lord Esau; Thy servant Jacob saith thus, I have sojourned with Laban, and stayed there until now:
target: Ia memerintahkan kepada mereka: "Beginilah kamu katakan kepada tuanku, kepada Esau: Beginilah kata hambamu Yakub: Aku telah tinggal pada Laban sebagai orang asing dan diam di situ selama ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When ye were but few, even a few, and strangers in it.
target: Ketika jumlah mereka tidak seberapa, sedikit saja, dan mereka orang-orang asing di sana,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall take to cleanse the house two birds, and cedar wood, and scarlet, and hyssop:
target: Kemudian, untuk menyucikan rumah itu, haruslah ia mengambil dua ekor burung, kayu aras, kain kirmizi dan hisop.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD maketh poor, and maketh rich: he bringeth low, and lifteth up.
target: TUHAN membuat miskin dan membuat kaya; Ia merendahkan, dan meninggikan juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David laid up these words in his heart, and was sore afraid of Achish the king of Gath.
target: Daud memperhatikan perkataan itu, dan dia menjadi takut sekali kepada Akhis, raja kota Gat itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For she said within herself, If I may but touch his garment, I shall be whole.
target: Karena katanya dalam hatinya: "Asal kujamah saja jubah-Nya, aku akan sembuh."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then were assembled unto me every one that trembled at the words of the God of Israel, because of the transgression of those that had been carried away; and I sat astonied until the evening sacrifice.
target: Lalu berkumpullah kepadaku semua orang yang gemetar karena firman Allah Israel, oleh sebab perbuatan tidak setia orang-orang buangan itu, tetapi aku tetap duduk tertegun sampai korban petang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he answered, My lord, O king, my servant deceived me: for thy servant said, I will saddle me an ass, that I may ride thereon, and go to the king; because thy servant is lame.
target: Jawabnya: "Ya tuanku raja, aku ditipu hambaku. Sebab hambamu ini berkata kepadanya: Pelanailah keledai bagiku, supaya aku menungganginya dan pergi bersama-sama dengan raja! — sebab hambamu ini timpang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Issachar according to their families, the cities and their villages.
target: Itulah milik pusaka suku bani Isakhar menurut kaum-kaum mereka, kota-kota itu dengan desa-desanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will make thy seed to multiply as the stars of heaven, and will give unto thy seed all these countries; and in thy seed shall all the nations of the earth be blessed;
target: Aku akan membuat banyak keturunanmu seperti bintang di langit; Aku akan memberikan kepada keturunanmu seluruh negeri ini, dan oleh keturunanmu semua bangsa di bumi akan mendapat berkat,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself; but whatsoever he shall hear, that shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come.
target: Tetapi apabila Ia datang, yaitu Roh Kebenaran, Ia akan memimpin kamu ke dalam seluruh kebenaran; sebab Ia tidak akan berkata-kata dari diri-Nya sendiri, tetapi segala sesuatu yang didengar-Nya itulah yang akan dikatakan-Nya dan Ia akan memberitakan kepadamu hal-hal yang akan datang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Unto the church of God which is at Corinth, to them that are sanctified in Christ Jesus, called to be saints, with all that in every place call upon the name of Jesus Christ our Lord, both their's and our's:
target: kepada jemaat Allah di Korintus, yaitu mereka yang dikuduskan dalam Kristus Yesus dan yang dipanggil menjadi orang-orang kudus, dengan semua orang di segala tempat, yang berseru kepada nama Tuhan kita Yesus Kristus, yaitu Tuhan mereka dan Tuhan kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To Titus, mine own son after the common faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour.
target: Kepada Titus, anakku yang sah menurut iman kita bersama: kasih karunia dan damai sejahtera dari Allah Bapa dan Kristus Yesus, Juruselamat kita, menyertai engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the seven thin ears devoured the seven rank and full ears. And Pharaoh awoke, and, behold, it was a dream.
target: Bulir yang kurus itu menelan ketujuh bulir yang bernas dan berisi tadi. Lalu terjagalah Firaun. Agaknya ia bermimpi!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.
target: Apabila orang-orang benar itu berseru-seru, maka TUHAN mendengar, dan melepaskan mereka dari segala kesesakannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then believed they his words; they sang his praise.
target: Ketika itu percayalah mereka kepada segala firman-Nya, mereka menyanyikan puji-pujian kepada-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For all people will walk every one in the name of his god, and we will walk in the name of the LORD our God for ever and ever.
target: Biarpun segala bangsa berjalan masing-masing demi nama allahnya, tetapi kita akan berjalan demi nama TUHAN Allah kita untuk selamanya dan seterusnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And brake up for it my decreed place, and set bars and doors,
target: ketika Aku menetapkan batasnya, dan memasang palang dan pintu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD; For three transgressions of Tyrus, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they delivered up the whole captivity to Edom, and remembered not the brotherly covenant:
target: Beginilah firman TUHAN: "Karena tiga perbuatan jahat Tirus, bahkan empat, Aku tidak akan menarik kembali keputusan-Ku: Oleh karena mereka telah menyerahkan tertawan suatu bangsa seluruhnya kepada Edom dan tidak mengingat perjanjian persaudaraan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let the work of this house of God alone; let the governor of the Jews and the elders of the Jews build this house of God in his place.
target: Biarkanlah pekerjaan membangun rumah Allah itu. Bupati dan para tua-tua orang Yahudi boleh membangun rumah Allah itu di tempatnya yang semula.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ataroth, and Dibon, and Jazer, and Nimrah, and Heshbon, and Elealeh, and Shebam, and Nebo, and Beon,
target: "Atarot, Dibon, Yaezer, Nimra, Hesybon, Eleale, Sebam, Nebo dan Beon,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the goat, on which the lot fell to be the scapegoat, shall be presented alive before the LORD, to make an atonement with him, and to let him go for a scapegoat into the wilderness.
target: Tetapi kambing jantan yang kena undi bagi Azazel haruslah ditempatkan hidup-hidup di hadapan TUHAN untuk mengadakan pendamaian, lalu dilepaskan bagi Azazel ke padang gurun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Where no counsel is, the people fall: but in the multitude of counsellors there is safety.
target: Jikalau tidak ada pimpinan, jatuhlah bangsa, tetapi jikalau penasihat banyak, keselamatan ada.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years: and he died.
target: Jadi Adam mencapai umur sembilan ratus tiga puluh tahun, lalu ia mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, Let me go, for the day breaketh. And he said, I will not let thee go, except thou bless me.
target: Lalu kata orang itu: "Biarkanlah aku pergi, karena fajar telah menyingsing." Sahut Yakub: "Aku tidak akan membiarkan engkau pergi, jika engkau tidak memberkati aku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David said unto Achish, But what have I done? and what hast thou found in thy servant so long as I have been with thee unto this day, that I may not go fight against the enemies of my lord the king?
target: Tetapi Daud berkata kepada Akhis: "Apa yang telah kuperbuat? Dan kesalahan apa yang kaudapati pada hambamu ini, sejak saat aku menjadi hamba kepadamu, sampai hari ini, sehingga aku tidak boleh ikut pergi berperang melawan musuh tuanku raja?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ephraim provoked him to anger most bitterly: therefore shall he leave his blood upon him, and his reproach shall his LORD return unto him.
target: Israel dituntun oleh TUHAN keluar dari Mesir dengan perantaraan seorang nabi, ya, ia dijaga oleh seorang nabi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he set the one in Bethel, and the other put he in Dan.
target: Lalu ia menaruh lembu yang satu di Betel dan yang lain ditempatkannya di Dan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This is the day which the LORD hath made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.
target: Inilah hari yang dijadikan TUHAN, marilah kita bersorak-sorak dan bersukacita karenanya!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he made him to ride in the second chariot which he had; and they cried before him, Bow the knee: and he made him ruler over all the land of Egypt.
target: Lalu Firaun menyuruh menaikkan Yusuf dalam keretanya yang kedua, dan berserulah orang di hadapan Yusuf: "Hormat!" Demikianlah Yusuf dilantik oleh Firaun menjadi kuasa atas seluruh tanah Mesir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, the Lord GOD will come with strong hand, and his arm shall rule for him: behold, his reward is with him, and his work before him.
target: Lihat, itu Tuhan ALLAH, Ia datang dengan kekuatan dan dengan tangan-Nya Ia berkuasa. Lihat, mereka yang menjadi upah jerih payah-Nya ada bersama-sama Dia, dan mereka yang diperoleh-Nya berjalan di hadapan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Adina the son of Shiza the Reubenite, a captain of the Reubenites, and thirty with him,
target: Adina anak Siza orang Ruben, kepala orang-orang Ruben dan beserta dia ada tiga puluh orang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I myself also am persuaded of you, my brethren, that ye also are full of goodness, filled with all knowledge, able also to admonish one another.
target: Saudara-saudaraku, aku sendiri memang yakin tentang kamu, bahwa kamu juga telah penuh dengan kebaikan dan dengan segala pengetahuan dan sanggup untuk saling menasihati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For they shall eat, and not have enough: they shall commit whoredom, and shall not increase: because they have left off to take heed to the LORD.
target: Mereka akan makan, tetapi tidak menjadi kenyang, mereka akan bersundal, tetapi tidak menjadi banyak, sebab mereka telah meninggalkan TUHAN untuk berpegang kepada sundal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said unto Joshua, Get thee up; wherefore liest thou thus upon thy face?
target: Lalu berfirmanlah TUHAN kepada Yosua: "Bangunlah! Mengapa engkau sujud demikian?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou waterest the ridges thereof abundantly: thou settlest the furrows thereof: thou makest it soft with showers: thou blessest the springing thereof.
target: Engkau mengindahkan tanah itu, mengaruniainya kelimpahan, dan membuatnya sangat kaya. Batang air Allah penuh air; Engkau menyediakan gandum bagi mereka. Ya, demikianlah Engkau menyediakannya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The pillars of heaven tremble and are astonished at his reproof.
target: tiang-tiang langit bergoyang-goyang, tercengang-cengang oleh hardik-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For these things were done, that the scripture should be fulfilled, A bone of him shall not be broken.
target: Sebab hal itu terjadi, supaya genaplah yang tertulis dalam Kitab Suci: "Tidak ada tulang-Nya yang akan dipatahkan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD will give strength unto his people; the LORD will bless his people with peace.
target: TUHAN kiranya memberikan kekuatan kepada umat-Nya, TUHAN kiranya memberkati umat-Nya dengan sejahtera!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Give ye ear, and hear my voice; hearken, and hear my speech.
target: Pasanglah telinga dan dengarkanlah suaraku; perhatikanlah dan dengarkanlah perkataanku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The word of the LORD came unto me again, saying,
target: Lalu datanglah firman TUHAN kepadaku:
